40001001	Jisu Kristo Davidor bongso ar Davide Abrahamor bongso. Igun olakke Jisu Kristor buro-burigun.
40001002	Abrahamor puo olode Isaak, Isaakor puo Jakob, Jakobor puo olode Juda ar tar bheiun.
40001003	Tamari dine Judar puo olakke Perez, Zera. Perezor puo Hesron, Hesronor puo Aram.
40001004	Aramor puo Aminadab, Aminadabor puo Nahson, Nahsonor puo olode Salmon.
40001005	Salmonor puo Boaz, mabuo elode Rahabi, Boazor puo Obed, Obedor mabuo olode Ruthi. Obedor puo Jesi.
40001006	Jesir puo olode David raja. David rajar puo olode Solomon. Solomonor mabuo olode Urior mogkuo.
40001007	Solomonor puo Rehabom. Rehabomor puo Abija, Abijar puo olode Asa.
40001008	Asar puo Jehosapad. Jehosapador puo Jehoram, Jehoramor puo olode Uzzia.
40001009	Uzziar puo Jotham, Jothamor puo olode Ahaz. Ahazor puo olode Hezekia.
40001010	Hezekiar puo Manasi, Manasir puo Amon. Amonor puo olode Josia.
40001011	Josiar puo Jekonia ar Jekoniar bheiun Babylonor manuschune Israel manuschunore banidajit nibar lokke jormo oion.
40001012	Tharare Babylonot banidajit nejanar porendi Jekoniar puo Shealtiele jormo oie. Shealtielor puo Jerubabel.
40001013	Jerubabelor puo Abiudor, Abiudoro puo Eliakim. Eliakimor puo olode Azor.
40001014	Azoror puo Zadog. Zadogor puo Akim. Akimor puo olode Eliud.
40001015	Eliudor puo Eliazar. Eliazaro puo Mothan. Mothanor puo olode Jakob.
40001016	Jakobor puo Joseb. Josebe olode Merir neg. Sei Merittun Jisu jormo oie. Manjie tare Kristoio hon.
40001017	Sebeden beg pirigun Abrahamottun duri Davidor song olakke soiddio piri. Davidottun duri Babylonot banidajit nionde somoi song olakke soiddio piri. Ar Babylonot banidajit nionde somoiottun duri Kristo song olakke soiddio piri.
40001018	Jisu Kristor jormogan olode edogkie: Tar ma Meri Josebpoi jodon bananar porendi, hintu thara ekhaborot no thagke Meri Pobitro Apta darai pedoli oie.
40001019	Hintu tar negkuo Josebe dharmitto manus elo hinottei, the Merire manjior mujungot itjiot phelei dibar no selo. The Merire mure-mure sari dibar mone-mone thik gorsie
40001020	Hintu Josebe ien bhabi sanar porendi, Probur ekkuo sorgo-dud sobone-sobone tar idu dega dinei tare holo, “Joseb, Davidor bongso, tui Merire tor mog ijebe lobar no dores. Haron tar pedot agede sibie olode Pobitro Aptar.”
40001021	The ekkuo morod puo phudebo, tui tar nangan Jisu thoi dis. Haron the tar manuschun tharar pabpanittun mukti goribo.
40001022	Ien begkan ghodi gelode jene Probuie munibuor muendi hoiede sien puron oi:
40001023	“Suno, ekkuo shodi gabur-milie pedoli obo, the ekkuo morod puo phudebo. Tare ‘Immanuel’ nang thoi dibag.” Sienor orthogan, “Amar loge Itchior age.”
40001024	Sebeden, Josebe ghumottun jagilo. Tare Probur sorgo-dudtuoi ugum dede doge-doge gorilo. Sebeden, the Merire lo-lo.
40001025	Hintu Puobuo no oi song the Meri loi ek haborot no thai. Polim morod Puobuore Josebe nang thoi dilode Jisu.
40002001	Herod rajar amolot, Judea dejor Bethlehem adamot Jisu jormo onar porendi pugottun pundigkunδ Jerusalem sohorot ejchion.
40002002	Sebeden thara pujor gorilakki, “Judaiunor Rajabuo jormmeiegidie sibie hudu? Pugendi tar tarabuo ami degkiei ar tare salam goribartei ami ejchiei.”
40002003	Jokke Herod rajai sei hoboran sunilo, the sintiet porilo ar goda Jerusalem sohorot manuschuneo sintiet porilak.
40002004	Sebeden the beg manuschunor Guruthagurun ar dhormo niomor mastorun eksomare dagi, tharattun pujor gorilo, “Kristo hudu jormeibogi?”
40002005	Thara Herodore uttor dilak, “Judea dejor Bethlehem adamortei edogkie gori munibuoi legkie:
40002006	‘Tui Judea dejor Bethlehem, Judea dejor sohoro moiddie tui hono din begottun sigon noi. Haron tor Bidiriettun ek jon sason-gorie bhar obo, the mor Israel manuschun rakkoli obo.’”
40002007	Sei jeredi Herode mure-mure pundigkunore daginei, hon somoi tarabuo dega die tharattun pujor gori lo-lo.
40002008	Ar tharare the sei hodagan hoinei Bethlehemot tharare dipadelo, “Jaw ar gome-dalei sigon gurobuore togeiogoi. Ar jokke tumi tare suph po, more hobor duo, muio tare salam gori paronggoi para.”
40002009	Suno, raja hodagan sunonar porendi pundigkune gelak. Ar thara pugendi degkuonde tarabuo sigon gurobuo agede uju lungegoi song tharattun akke-akke ja dhorilo.
40002010	Tarabuo deginei pundigkune baari hujhi olak.
40002011	Jokke thara ghoro bidirie somilakkoi, sigon gurobuo ar tar ma Meri somot deginei, thara adu pari tare salam gorilak. Sebeden tharar dhon-baksu hulinei sigon gurobuore dan dilakke sona, poiriek ar mura.
40002012	Sebeden thara Herodor sidu phiri no jebartei Itchiore tharare sobone-sobone uij dilo. Senottei thara oinnio podedi thara nijor dejot phiri gelak.
40002013	Pundigkun janar porendi probur ekkuo sorgo-dud sobone-sobone Josebor sidu dega dinedi tare holo, “Herode gurobuore morei pebartei togar. Senottei, tui uth, gurobuore ar tar mare loinei Egypt dejot dhei ja. Ar mui tore jedog dinsong no hong, sedog dinsong sidu thagkoi.”
40002014	Sebeden Josebe udi, the gurobuore ar tar mare loinei reide-reide Egypt dejot gelo.
40002015	Herode no more song the sidu thelo. Ien ghodi gelode jene Probuie munibuor darai hoiede sien puron oi, “Egypt dejottun mor Puobuore mui dagi anilung.”
40002016	Jokke Herode pugor pundigkune tare phagi mari jeion bili buji pari, the baari rak olo. The pundigkunottun tarabuor somoibuo pujor gori loiede doge, Bethlehemot ar tar seropala jaganit di bojor ar di bojorattun tole beg morod puogun morei pheleibartei the ugum dilo.
40002017	Siendoi muni Jeremia legkiede hodagan puron olo.
40002018	The legkie de, “Rama adamot bug pora oinei gujuri-gujuri hande ro suno jeie. Rakilir puogun morsion hinottei haner, tare huno jone bujei no parton.”
40002019	Hintu Herod rajar moranar porendi, Egypt dejot Probur ekkuo sorgo-dud Josebor sidu sobone-sobone dega dinedi tare holo,
40002020	“Tui uth, gurobuore ar tar mare loinei Israel dejot phiri ja.Gurobuore morei pheleibar seionde sigun morchion.”
40002021	Sebeden the udinei, gurobuore ar tar mare loinei Israel dejot phiri elo.
40002022	Hintu Judea dejot Arkelauze tar bab Herodor azai raja uttie bili Josebe suninei, the sidu jebar dorelo. Itchiore tare sobone-sobone uij denar porendi, the Galili dejot gelo.
40002023	The ekkan adamot jei, siot bojotti gorilogoi. Sei adamor nangan olode Nazareth. Siendoi munigune hoionde hodagan puron olo, “Manjie tare ‘Nazareth hullie’ hobak.”
40003001	Sei somoiot baptisma goridie Johone Judea dejor moruobomit einei phogodang gorer.
40003002	The hor, “Itchioro rejjiogan hai ejchie hinottei tomar monani phiro!”
40003003	Ei Johonor sombonde muni Isaiar darai ei hodagan ho oie, “Moruobomit ek jonor roi horte: ‘PROBUR podtan hajeinei, tar podtani uju goro.’ ”
40003004	Ar Johone the nije uduo hejchoi bunnie habor uri thai, ar tar homorot samarar homor pijoni pini thai. Ar the shuduo-phiring ar jharo modhu hedo.
40003005	Sei somoi, manus Jerusalem sohorottun, goda Judea dejottun ar goda Jordan sorar seropala jaganittun tar sidu gelak.
40003006	Ar tharar pabpani haam heinei Jordanot tartun baptisma lolak.
40003007	Hintu Johone jokke shagor Pharisi ar Sadduki tar idu baptisma goribartei ettonde degilo, the tharare holo, “Bijollo sabor bongsogun, ebode rakkanottun dhei jebartei honna tomare uij dilo?
40003008	Tomar monani pabottun phireio bili manjie degon para ham goro na.
40003009	Ar tumi mone-mone no hoio, ‘Amar bab Abrahame amattei agedo.’ Haron mui tomare hongor: Itchiore ei silunottuno Abrahamottei puo banei di pare.
40003010	Ikkunu gajchunor gorat hurolan thuo oie. Jei gajchuot gom gulo no doribo, sibie goschei dinedi agunot phelei die obo.
40003011	“Tomar monani phireio hinottei, mui tomare jodepode gori panit baptisma gori duongor. Hintu mortun bes oborug ek jon ejer. Mui tar jodaganio boie dibar lak noi. The tomare Pobitro Aptaloi ar agundoi baptisma gori dibogi
40003012	Tar ghomun gome-dalei boier dinedi gola-ghorot bhorei thobartei tar hulogan adot loinei age. Hintu sobhagun huno din no morede agunot puri pheleibo.”
40003013	Sei somoi Galili dejottun Jisu lungilogi. The Johonottun baptisma lobartei Jordan sorat tar idu elo.
40003014	Hintu Johone ien hoinei tare badha dibar selo, “Mui tortun baptisma lona dorkar, a hittei tui mor idu baptisma lobartei elede?”
40003015	Jisu Johonore uttor dilo, “Ikkunuttei ien goribar dena. Haron edogkie gori ami beg dharmig niomani purei dena hamakkai dorkar.” Sebeden Johone raji olo.
40003016	Johone Jisure baptisma gori denar jogon-togon, Jisu panittun udi elo. Ar sawh, tartei sorgogani huli die oie. Johone Itchioro Aptabuo ekkuo hodoro dogkie oinei lambegi ar Jisur ugure portegi degilo.
40003017	Sebeden jogon-togon sorgottun ekkuo sobdo bhar olo, “Ibie olode mor agojor Puo, tar ugure mui baari hujhi olung.”
40004001	Sei porendi Diabolaδ Jisure lub degeinei pabot pheleibartei Aptai tare moruobomit nejeilo.
40004002	Solis din solis reid ubos thanar porendi Jisure ped porai dorilo.
40004003	Sebeden Diabolaδ tar idu einei tare holo, “Tui judi Itchioro puo os, ei silun pidie obartei ugum de.”
40004004	Hintu Jisu uttor dilo, “Sastrot ien lega age, ‘Manus bana pidieloi no bajibak, hintu Itchioro muottun bhar oidie hodaloi bajibak.’ ”
40004005	Sebeden Diabolaδ tare pobitro sohoranot nejeilo. Ar the tare Mondiro suischieng badhi-sugkuor ugure thiei bajei dilo.
40004006	Ar the holo, “Tui judi Itchioro Puo os, iottun jham de. Haron Sastroie hoi, ‘Tor thengani silot dhuz no hai para, Itchiore tar dudtunore tortei ugum dibo. Thara tore ad-padi thebakki.’ ”
40004007	Jisu tare holo, “Sastrot ien lega age, ‘Tor PROBU Itchiorbuore tui porikkie no seis.’ ”
40004008	Aro, Diabolaδ Jisure ekkuo shanggadik ojol mounot tulilogoi. Siottun the songsaro beg rejjiogani ar sienir beg oborugkani tare degeilo.
40004009	Sebeden Diabolaδ Jisure holo, “Tui judi nije bukpari porinei more tobona gorinei tor Probu bili more mani los, ieni begkani mui tore dim.”
40004010	Sebeden Jisu tare holo, “Soitan, iottun jagoi! Sastrot ien lega age, ‘Tor PROBU Itchiorbuore tobona goris, ar tui bana tare sebona goris.’ ”
40004011	Sebeden Diabolaδ Jisure phelei gelogoi. Ar sawh, sorgo-dudtune einei tare jotton gorilakki.
40004012	Sebeden Johonore jiel-hanat bhoreion bili Jisu suninei, the Galili dejot phiri elo.
40004013	Nazareth adaman the sari jeinei Kapernaum sohorot rolo. Ien olode Galili sagoro parot, Zebulun ar Nephtali zelar bamot,
40004014	jene muni Isaiar darai ho oiede hodagan puron oi,
40004015	“Bilo parot, Jordan sorar uhuledi, Zebulun ar Nephtalir bamot, Be-jadtunor Galili dejot,
40004016	jei manuschune andharot agon sigune ekkan asarjio phor degilak. Ar morana jagat, sabbath agonde sigunor ugure phor phudilogi.”
40004017	Sei lokkettun duri Jisu prosar gora arambo gorilo. Ar the hor, “Sorgo rejjiogan hai ejchie hinottei tomar monani phiro!”
40004018	Ar Jisu Galili sagoro parot berade, the di bheiore, Simon, tare Pitor hon ar tar bheibuo Andriore sagorot ekkan jal pelade degilo. Haron thara olakke jallie.
40004019	Sebeden, Jisu tharare dagilo, “Mor loge ejo, mui tomare manus dhorie jallie banem.”
40004020	Ar jogon-togon tharar jalani phelei jeinei tar loge gelak.
40004021	Ar siottun hottur jeinei, the aro oinnio di bheiore degilo. Zebedior puo Jakob ar Jakobor bheibuo Johon. Thara ekkan nawt tharar bab Zebedi somot boinei jalani tundon. Jisu tharare dagilo.
40004022	Ar jogon-togon thara nawgan ar tharar babpuo phelei jei tar loge gelak.
40004023	Jisu Galili dejot beg jaganit berei-berei, synagogot sigkie dilo ar Itchioro rejjiogano gom hoboran prosar gorilo. Ar manuschunor beg biedi ani ar beg aw-sugkiegun the gom gori dilo.
40004024	Tar hoboran goda Syria dejot shidie gelo. Senottei, manuschune beg aw-sugkiegun tar idu anilak. Sigune nanan biediloi ar pireloi dug padon. Bhude peie, bandor pagol, ar ajorchie pirellieo elak. Sigunore the beg gom gori dilo.
40004025	Ar shagor manus Jisur loge gelak. Sigune ejchionde Galili dejottun, Dekapolis bamottun, Jerusalem sohorottun, Judea dejottun ar Jordan sorar uhulottun.
40005001	Sebeden Jisu manjior jhagkun deginei, the ekkuo mounot udilogoi. The bojanar porendi, tar sisjiogun tar idu elak.
40005002	Sebeden Jisu tharare sigkie die dorilo,
40005003	“Jigune aptadi gorib, thara hoballie. Haron sorgo rejjiogan olode sigunor.
40005004	“Jigune mono dugot agon, thara hoballie. Haron Itchiore sigunore mono suge thobo.
40005005	“Jigune nombro, thara hoballie. Haron pittimigan sigunor dhon-sompotti obo.
40005006	“Jigune ped pora ar pani saj dogkie mone-prane Itchioro ischie doge goribar sade hosto bhug goron sigun hoballie. Haron Itchiore sigunore mon purei dibo.
40005007	“Jigune manjiore doye goron thara hoballie. Haron Itchiore sigunore doye goribo.
40005008	“Jigunor ontor pobitro thara hoballie. Haron sigune Itchiorore degibak.
40005009	“Jigune milie-mili ham goron, thara hoballie. Haron Itchiore sigunore tar puo hobo.
40005010	“Jigune Itchioro ischie doge gorte manjie tharare dug-hosto lagan, thara hoballie. Haron sorgo rejjiogan olode sigunor.
40005011	“Manjie mortei tomare insie gorilie, dug-hosto lagele ar mijie-mijie gori beg nanan horab hoda tomar biruddie hole, tumi hoballie sie.
40005012	Ei sedogkie gori tomar agendi elakke munigunoreio manjie dug-hosto lageion. Hintu tumi shanggadik hujhi oinei utchob goro. Haron tomartei sorgot ekkan oborug poriskari thoidie oie.
40005013	“Tumi olade pittimir nun. Hintu nunonor judi nunsuogan no thai, salen, hingori nunonore aro nunsuo gori para jebo? Ien gunor no lakkie obo. Senottei manjie ien barendi phelei duon sebeden uron.
40005014	“Tumi olade songsaro phor. Ekkuo mouno pidit ekkan sohor banilie lugei thoi no pare.
40005015	Huno jone serag dhoreinei lei dagi no thon. Hintu serag-danit thon, ar ghoro bidirie beg manuschunore seragkuoi phor de.
40005016	Ei sedogkie gori tomar phoran manjior mujungot phudok. Sebeden tomar gom hamani thara degibak ar tomar sorgo Babore baini goribak.
40005017	“Mosir Niomani bah, munigunor sigkiegani bhonggo gori dibartei mui ejchiong bili tumi no bhappo. Sieni bhonggo gori dibartei mui no ejong, hintu sieni puripunnuo gori dibartei mui ejchiong.
40005018	Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor: Jedog dinsong sorgo ar pittimi boij no jai, sedog dinsong begkani ghodi no gele, Niomanittun huno din ekkuo sigon orok bah, ekkuo phuduoioδ bad jedo noi.
40005019	Senottei, je nahi ei ugumanittun ekkan samannio ugum no mane ar manjiore sien no manibartei sigkie de, Itchiore sorgo rejjiot tare begottun gunor no lakkiebuo hobo. Hintu je nahi ei ugumani mane, ar manjiore manibartei sigei, Itchiore sorgo rejjiot tare gunor manuschuo hobo.
40005020	Mui tomare hongor, tomar dharmigkani dhormo niomor mastorunor ar Pharisigunor dharmigkanittun bes no ole, tumi huno din sorgo rejjiot somi peda noi.
40005021	“Tumi suinniode ago dinor manuschunore Niomane hoie, ‘Hun no goris. Je hun gore, the bijierot puribo.’
40005022	Hintu mui tomare hongor, je tar bheibuor ugure magana-magana rak tule, the bijierot puribo. Ar je tar bheibuore judi hoi, ‘Behup!’ The Senhedrinot jebar lak. Hintu judi je hoi, ‘Be-akkol!’ The norogor agunot jebar lak.
40005023	“Senottei, jokke tui tor danan pallienganot anos, ar tor bheibuor tor biruddie monot dug age bili siot judi tor idot ude,
40005024	tor danan pallienganor mujungot phelei jei, akke tor bheibuo sidu jeinei tarloi milie-mili ogoi. Tar porendi einei tor danan Itchioro idu utchorbo gorischi.
40005025	“Tor biruddibuoi tore kuduot no nejade, jade-jade tarloi hoschiegani seret gori sireis. Sedogkie no ole tor biruddibuoi tore agimuor adot gojei dibogoi. Ar agimuoi tore polischuor adot gojei dibogoi. Sebeden mondiro polischuoi tore jiel-hanat bhorei thobogoi.
40005026	Mui tore soittio hodagan hongor, ekkuo poijieδ bagi theleio tui siottun nigili pede noi.
40005027	“Tumi suinniode ago dinor manuschunore Niomane hoie, ‘Tui shanda no goris.’
40005028	Hintu mui tomare hongor, je ekkuo miliere lub laginei rini sai, the tar ontorot honatto shanda gorsie.
40005029	Senottei judi tor den sogkuoi tore pabot pelai, sibie hueinei lugimari dis. Tor goda heyegan norogor agunot porana darane tor ek onggo hani onagan tortei gom obo.
40005030	Ar judi tor den adtane tore pabot pelai, sien habi phelei lugimari dis. Tor goda heyegan norogor agunot porana darane tor ek onggo hani onagan tortei gom obo.
40005031	“Niomane ieno hoi, ‘Je mog sari de the tar mogkuore shur hagos dok.’
40005032	Hintu mui tomare hongor: Shanda duj bade je tar mogkuore sari de, the tar mogkuore shanda gora bajeide. Ar je siennie gori sarsie milie loi, theo shanda gore.
40005033	“Ar ebar tumi suinniode ago dinor manuschunore Niomane hoie, ‘Mijie sobot no heis. Hintu Probu sidu mannioschie sien sireis.’
40005034	Hintu mui tomare hongor, Shobai sobot no heis. Sorgo shakki gori sobot no heis, sien olode Itchioro singason.
40005035	Pittimigan dhorinei sobot no heis, sien olode tar theng thoidie jaga. Jerusalem sohoranan dhorinei sobot no heis, ien olode moha rajar sohor.
40005036	Ar tor madat dhorinei sobot no heis, haron tui ekkan sulo mone hole hala ar mone hole dhub gori no paros.
40005037	Ole, ‘Oi’ ar no ole, ‘Noi’ hoio. Ei barattun ole, sien bojonggottun.
40005038	“Tumi suinniode Niomane hoie, ‘Sogor azai sog ar dador azai dad.’
40005039	Hintu mui tomare hongor: Tor ugure je oborad gore, sibier ugure hena no ugureis. Judi huno jone tore den hanjabat suoran, bang hanjabagano padi dis.
40005040	Ar judi je huno jone tor shilummuo lobartei torloi mogoddima goribar sai, tare tor huttuoio lobartei dis.
40005041	Je huno jone judi tore tar poja ek meilδ boi bajei de, sien di meil boi dis.
40005042	Je mage tare dis. Ar je tortun udor mage tartun tui muon no phireis.
40005043	“Ek jone hoiede sien tumi suinnio, ‘Tor paralliegunore tui hos pei pebe, ar tor sottrugunore tui hinsie no goris.’
40005044	Hintu mui tomare hongor, tomar sottrugunore hos peio. Jigune tomare geil duon sigunore asirbad duo. Jigune tomare hos no pan sigunore gom ham gori duo. Jigune tomare gome bebohar no goron, ar tomare dug-hosto lagan sigunottei bor magi duo,
40005045	Jene tumi sorgo Babor puo aw para. Haron the gom manuschunottei ar bojong manuschunottei tar belan tuli de. Ar the dharmig ar pabi manuschunottei jhor di de.
40005046	Jigune tomare hospan judi tumi bana sigunore hos pele, hi poriskari peba? Hajana-tullieguneo siennie goronde noi ni?
40005047	Ar tumi judi bana tomar bheiunore salam janeile, oinnio jonottun bes hi goror? Hajana-tullieguneo siennie goronde noi ni?
40005048	Senottei, tomar sorgo Babe jeannie puripunnuo, tumio sei doge puripunnuo uo puribo.
40006001	“Hobotdar, manjiore degebar-tei tumi tharar mujungot dan-dhormo no gorsio. Judi goro, salen tomar sorgo Babottun tumi hitchu poriskari no peba.
40006002	“Senottei jokke tumi dan-dhormo goro, phagaragunor sannie no gorsio. Tharare manjie baini goribartei synagogot ar pode-ghade thara begol bajeinei dan-dhormo goron. Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor, thara honatto tharar poriskarigan peion.
40006003	Hintu tui jokke dan-dhormo goros, Sokkene tor den adtane hi gorer tor bang adtane hobor no pok.
40006004	Ei sedogkie gori tor dan-dhormogan ghubone die obo. Sebeden tor Babe, ghubone sei thaidie sibiei, hulomela gori tore poriskari dibo.
40006005	“Ar tui jokke bor magos, phagaragunor sannie no goris. Manjie tharare degon para, thara synagogot ar podo dojorot thieinei bor magibar gom pan. Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor, thara honatto tharar poriskarigan peion.
40006006	Hintu tui jokke bor magibie, tor gudhibuor bidirie somes. Tar porendi duoran nadinei ghubone thaidie tor Babottun bor magis. Sebeden tor Babe, ghubone sei thaidie sibiei, hulomela gori tore poriskari dibo.
40006007	Hintu tumi jokke bor mago, Be-jadtunor dogkie gori ortho sara hoda bar-bar hoinei bor no magkio. Haron thara mone goronde thara jokkene bar-bar hon, tharar Itchiorbuoi tharar bor maganagani sunibo.
40006008	Senottei tumi thara dogkie no gorsio. Tumi bor no magode tomar Babe tomar hi dorkar the hobor pai.
40006009	“Senottei, edogkie gori tumi bor magkio: Amar sorgo Bab, tor nangan pobitro ok.
40006010	“Tor rejjiogan ejok. Tor ischie sorgot jedogkie goron, ei pittimitio sedogkie gortok.
40006011	“Amare nitto hebar mojim bhat oi para dis.
40006012	“Amar ugure duj goronde sigunore mab di die dogkie, tuio amar dujchani mab goris.
40006013	“Amare hu-podedi no nis. Hintu bojongguottun amare rokkie goris. Haron rejjiogan, hemodagan ar mohimagan umore-umor tor. Amen.
40006014	“Judi tomar biruddie manjie duj goronde sieni mab duo, tomar sorgo Babeio tomar dujchani mab dibo.
40006015	Hintu judi tumi manjiore mab no duo, salen, tomar Babeio tomar niom bhonggogani mab no dibo.
40006016	“Tumi jokke ubos thago, phagaragunor dogkie suduo muo gori no thagkuo. Thara ubos agon gori manjie debartei tharar muoni dog-judo goron. Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor, thara honatto tharar poriskarigan peion.
40006017	Hintu tui jokke ubos thas, tor muon dhoinei dhoi tel madat dis,
40006018	jene manjie tui ubos agos bili hobor no pan para. Hintu ghubone thaidie bana tor Babe dege para goris. Sebeden tor Babe ghubone sei thaidie sibiei hulomela gori tore poriskari dibo.
40006019	“Tomar nijottei pittimit dhon joma no gorsio. Idu phuge haan, jangare dhore ar surune sominei sur goron.
40006020	Hintu tomar nijottei sorgot dhon joma goro. Sidu phuge no haan, jangare no dhore ar suruneio sominei sur no goribak.
40006021	Haron tomar dhonani jiot thai tomar monanio siot thebo.
40006022	“Sog olakke heyeganottei seragor dogkie. Senottei tor sog gom ole, tor goda heyegan phor obo.
40006023	Hintu tor sog horab ole, tor goda heyegan andhar obo. Senottei tor bidirie phoran judi andhar ole, sei andharan hodog ghur andhar obo!
40006024	“Huno jone di jon girojor ham gori no pare. Haron ek jonore the hinsie goribo ar ek jonore the hos pebo bah, the ek jonore agudinei ar ek jonore the bis degibo. Tumi eksomare Itchioror ar dhon-sompotti daji oi parta noi.
40006025	“Senottei mui tomare hongor: Tomar poranani bajibartei hi heba ar tomar heyeganittei hi uriba hi piniba sidie no gorsio. Poranan haiddiottun bes dorkar ar heyegan habor-suborottun bes dorkar noi ni?
40006026	Pheigkunore sawh. Thara noio hujuon ar noio habon Tobuio tomar sorgo Babe tharare habar. Pheigkunor darane tumi bes moillio noi ni?
40006027	Hintu tomartun honna sidie gorinei tar heyegan ek adδ lamba gori pare?
40006028	“Uron-pinonor sombonde tumi a hittei sidie goro? Mado phulun hingori dangor on bhabi sawh. Thara hamio no goron ar shuduoio no hadon.
40006029	Hintu mui tomare hongor, Solomonore oborug gori shajileo esannie ekkuo phulor dogkie doul odo noi.
40006030	Madot edchie jei herani age ar hellie suluot phelei die obode sienire judi Itchiore sedog shajele, oh hom bischias-bolagun! Sittun bes tomare the no shajeibo ni na?
40006031	Senottei sidie no gorsio ar no hoio, ‘Hi hebong?’ Bah, ‘Hi uribong pinibong?’
40006032	Be-jadtune ieni onsur togan. Ieni begkani tomar dorkar lagede tomar sorgo Babe hobor pai.
40006033	Hintu akke Itchioror rejjiogan ar Tar dharmigkan togo. Sebeden ieni bara, sieni begkani tomare dibo.
40006034	Hellier sidie hellie goribo hinottei, helliettei sidie no gorsio. Ek dinor hosto ek dinottei jodasto.
40007001	“Manjiore dujot no dhorsio, sebeden tomareo dujot dhora no obo.
40007002	Haron jei doge tumi manjiore dujot dhoro, sei doge manjie tomareo dujot doribak. Ar tumi jei mabpoi mabo, tomareo sei mabpoi maba obo.
40007003	“Tor bheibuor sogkuot phejagan degos hintu tor nijor sogkuot gaj hottagan agede sien a hittei no bhabos?
40007004	Ar sunis, tor nijor sogkuot gaj hottagan age, a hingori tor bheibuore hobe sei, ‘More de tor sogkuottun phejagan huei duong’?
40007005	“Oh phagarabuo! Akke tor nijor sogkuottun gaj hottagan huo, sebeden tor bheibuor sogkuottun phejagan huei dibartei porak-porak gori degibie.
40007006	“Hugurunore pobitro jinij no duo. Ar sugorunor mujungor tomar muktogun phelei no duo. A no ole thara sieni uribak ar phirinei tomare dappenei phari phelebak.
40007007	“Mago, tomare die obo. Togo, tumi peba ar baschuo, tomare huli die obo.
40007008	Haron je mage the pai. Je togai the suph pai ar je baschiei tare huli die oi.
40007009	“Tomar moiddie judi tar ek jon puoi pidie mage, tare sil die agon nahi?
40007010	The judi maj mage, the hi tare sap dibo?
40007011	Tumi gom noi oineio tomar puogunore gom-gom jinij di jano, senottei tomar sorgo Babe jigune magon sigunore sittun bes gom jinij a hittei no dibo?
40007012	Senottei manjie tomartei jei doge goridibar tomartun mone hoi, tumio manjiortei sei doge beg gorsio. Ien olode Mosi Niomanor ar munigunor sigkie orthogan.
40007013	“Sibie-sippie girie duora-nodi somo. Haron nas oidie jaganot lungegoidie girie duoran ar podtan olode ojar ar utchuo. Ar sindi jeieio bes.
40007014	Jibonanot lungegoidie girie duoran olode sibie-sippie ar podtan olode aghattie hinottei bana hoiek jone gori ien suph pan.
40007015	“Bhes dhorsie munigunottun uije thagkuo! Ugure-ugure degte bera-shagolo dogkie gori thara tomar idu ejon, hintu bidirie-bidirie thara jodepode jharbuo huguro dogkie.
40007016	Tumi tharar pholunor darai tharare puro gori sini loi pariba. Hada jaburot anggur no dhoron, ar hojoi-ludit dumur gulo no dhoron.
40007017	Ei sedogkie gori prottiek gom gajot gom gulo dhoron, ar bojong gajot bojong gulo dhoron.
40007018	Hintu gom gajot bojong gulo dori no paron, ar bojong gajotio gom gulo dori no paron
40007019	Ar jei gajchuot gom gulo no doribuo, sibie goschei dinedi agunot phelei die obo.
40007020	Senottei tumi tharar pholunor darai tharare puro gori sini loi pariba.
40007021	“Jigune more hon, ‘Probu, Probu.’ Sigun begkun sorgo rejjiot somi paribakke sien noi. Hintu je mor sorgo Babor ischie doge gore bana the somi paribo.
40007022	Sei dinnuot onek manjie more hobak, ‘Probu, Probu, ami tor nange Itchioro hobor no hoi ni na? Ami tor nangandoi bhud dabei no di ni na ar onek amok ham no gori ni na?’
40007023	Sebeden mui tharare pang gori bhangi hom, ‘Niom saragun, mortun jogoi! Mui tomare no sinong.’
40007024	“Senottei, je mor ei hodagani sune ar gore, the ei gyeni manuschuor sannie. Gyeni manuschuoi tar ghoran silluor ugure tullie.
40007025	Sebeden jhor dinei paniban olo. Ar boier beinei ghoranot bajilo. Hintu ghoran silo ugure tullie hinottei bhangi no porilo.
40007026	Ar je mor ei hodagani suninei no gore, the ei bhul manuschuor sannie. Bhul manuschuoi tar ghoran horoli ugure tullie.
40007027	Sebeden jhor dinei paniban olo. Ar boier beinei ghoranot bajhi, ghoran bhangi porilo. Sien hi asarjio dor gore para!”
40007028	Jokke Jisu hoda hoi phureilo, manuschune tar sigkieniloi shanggadik amok olak.
40007029	Haron the dhormo niomor mastorunor dogkie noi, hintu odhikar-bola dogkie gori sigkie die.
40008001	Jokke Jisu mounnuottun lami elo, jhag-jhag manus tar pune-pune olak.
40008002	Sawh, ek jon pharangi manus Jisur idu einei tar mujunge bukpari pori salam gorinei holo, “Probu, tortun mone hole more sudduo gori paros.”
40008003	Jisu tar adtan babei tare dhorinei holo, “Mortun mone hor, sudduo ok.” Ar jogon-togon tar pharangigan sudduo olo.
40008004	Sebeden Jisu tare holo, “Seis hobotdar, ien harore no hos. Hintu Dhormo mastoro sidu jeinei degagoi. Ar thara hobor pan para shakki ijebe, Mosi ugum dede doge dan gorischoi.”
40008005	Jisu Kapernaumot sominei ek jon soinnio ugure senapotiδ tar idu einei sahajjio goribartei hujoli gorilo.
40008006	The Jisure holo, “Probu, mor gaburbuo ajorchie pirellie oinei ghorot pori age. The baari hosto par.”
40008007	Jisu tare holo, “Mui eim, tare gom gori dimbi.”
40008008	Hintu senapotibuoiδ holo, “Probu, mor ghoro bidirie tore bhoreibar mor lak noi. Hintu bana tui holeio mor gaburbuo gom obo.
40008009	Haron muio odinor tole agong. Soinnioguneio mor odinor tole agon. Mui ei soinniobuore ‘Ja!’ hole, the jai. Ar mui ei soinniobuore ‘Ai!’ hole, the eje. mui mor banidajibuore ‘Ien gor!’ hole, the gore.”
40008010	Jisu sei hodagan suninei, the amok olo ar tar pune-pune jadonde manuschunore holo, “Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor, Israel manuschunor moiddieo edogkie jodepode bischias gorie mui lagot no pang.
40008011	Ar mui tomare hongor, onek manus pugottun ar pojimortun ebag. Thara sorgo rejjiot Abraham, Isaak ar Jakob dagi loge bojibak.
40008012	Hintu sorgo rejjiogano projagun barendi an-dharanot phelei die obo. Siot thara dad hamere-hamere hanibak.”
40008013	Ar Jisu ek shot soinnio ugure senapotibuoreδ holo, “Ghorot ja. Tui jeannie gori bischias gorsios, siennie gori tortei mui ien gori dim.” Ar thik sei somoiot tar gaburbuo gom oie.
40008014	Jisu Pitoror ghorot sominei Pitoror shuribuo jor oinei bischonot pori agede degilo.
40008015	Jisu tar adtan dhoridinei tar joran gom olo. Sebeden the udinei tharare lobiot gorilo.
40008016	Sajonnie oinei, manuschune onek bhude peie manus tar idu anilak. The ekko hodai bhudtun dabei die ar beg aw-sugkiegun gom gorilo.
40008017	Siendoi muni Isaia hoiede hodagan puron olo, “The amar bolneieni lolo, ar amar biedigani bugilo.”
40008018	Jisu tar seropala manjior jhag deginei tar sisjiogunore sagoro uhule jebartei ugum dilo.
40008019	Sekke ek jon dhormo niomor mastor tar idu einei holo, “Guruthagur, tui jidu jas mui tor pune-pune eim.”
40008020	Sebeden Jisu tare holo, “Sialunottun haath age ar agajot uronde pheigkunottun bha age. Hintu Munischioro Puobuottun tar siriebuo thobaro jaga nei.”
40008021	Ar oinnio ek jon tar sisjioi tare holo, “Probu, babare garebartei more akke jebartei onumoti de.”
40008022	Hintu Jisu tare holo, “Mor loge ai. Moragune tharar nijor moragun garadok.”
40008023	Sebeden Jisu ekkan nawt uduonar porendi tar sisjiogune tar loge gelak.
40008024	Ar sawh, sagoranot borboh bah dorilo. Pani tubole nawganore jhabar. Hintu Jisu ghum jar.
40008025	Tar sisjiogune tar idu einei tare jageinei holak, “Probu, amare rokkie gor! Ami dubir.”
40008026	Jisu tharare holo, “Oh hom bischias-bolagun, a hittei doror?” Sebeden the udinei udi, boieranore ar sagoranore gobinei, boieran ar sagoran jodepode olor olo.
40008027	Ar sisjiogune ien degi amok oinei holak, “Ibie henjannie manus? Boierani ar sagoraneio tar hoda mani pai.”
40008028	Jisu Galili sagoror uhuledi Gerasin manjior dejot lunginei, dijon bhude peie manus shojanholattun einei tar idu dega dilakki. Thara shanggadik dorgore para hinottei, sei podtanodi huno jon jei no paron.
40008029	Thara jogar pari Jisure holak, “Itchioro Puo Jisu, tui amare hi gorte sas? Somoibuo no ette amare tui sasti dibartei ele ni na?”
40008030	Tharattun hottur durot dangor ek pal sugor sorton.
40008031	Ar bhudtune Jisure hujoli gorinei holak, “Tui judi amare nigilei duos uo sugoro palluor bidirie amare dipada.”
40008032	Ar Jisu tharare holo, “Jo!” Bhudtune manuschunottun nigili jei sugorunor bidirie somilakkoi. Ar sawh, goda sugor palluo jhok pori, tarengodi porinei sagorot panit dubi mori gelak.
40008033	Sei sugorun soreiegune sekke daba-daba jeinei sohorot somi sugorunor hi-hi ghottie begkani hobor hoiondoi. Ar bhude peiegunor hi-hi ghottie thara hoiondoi.
40008034	Ar sawh, goda sohoro manuschun Jisure sebartei nigili elak. Tare deganar porendi, manuschune tharar bamottun jebartei Jisure hujoli gora dorilak.
40009001	Senottei Jisu nawt udinei sagoran par oinei tar nijor adamot elo.
40009002	Ar sawh, manuschune sokkene ek jon ajorchie pirellie padi ugure palgit porei tar idu bhaar gori anilak. Ar Jisu sei manuschunor bischiaschani deginei, the ajorchie pirelliebuore holo, “Put, mon shanti gori thak. Mui tor pabpani mab dilung.”
40009003	Ar sawh, siot hoiek jon dhormo niomor mastorune thara mone-mone hodon, “Ei Manuschuoi Itchiore sorjar.”
40009004	Ar Jisu thara mone-mone hodonde ien buji parinei, tharare holo, “Tumi mone-mone a hittei bojong bhabor?
40009005	Hubon hode juit obo, ‘Mui tor pabpani mab dilung,’ bah ‘Udinei adi ja’?
40009006	Hintu Munischioro Puobuottun pabpani mab goribar pittimit odhihar age. Sien tumi hobor pebartei ien mor gora porer. Sebeden Jisu ajorchie pirelliebuore holo, “Uth, tor padibuo tulinei tor ghorot ja.”
40009007	Sebeden manuschuoi udi tar ghorot gelogoi.
40009008	Manuschune ien deginei amok olak ar esannie hemoda manjiore dede Itchiorbuore baini gorilak.
40009009	Ar Jisu siottun jade Mothi nange the ek jon manus degilo. The hajana tulede ghoranot boi age. Jisu tare holo, “Mor loge ai!” Sebeden Mothi udi tar loge gelo.
40009010	Ar edogkie olo, Jisu ghoro bidirie bhat poiot boitsiede lokke, sawh, onek hajana-tullie ar pabi manus einei Jisur ar tar sisjiogunore loge hebartei bolakki.
40009011	Pharisigune ien deginei, thara Jisur sisjiogunore holak, “Tomar guruthagurbuoi hajana-tullie pabigunor somare a hittei bhat haar?”
40009012	Hintu Jisu sien suninei holo, “Ni-rugi manjiortei daktor no lage, hintu aw-sugkiettei daktor lage.
40009013	Tumi jeinei ei orthogan Sastrottun shigi logi, ‘Doyegan sang, dali no sang.’ Haron mui dharmig manuschun dagibartei no ejong, hintu pabottun mon phiran para, pabigun dagibartei mui ejchiong.”
40009014	Sebeden Baptisma gori die Johonor sisjiogun Jisur idu einei tare holak, “Ami ar pharasigune ubos thei. A hittei tor sisjiogune ubos no than?”
40009015	Ar Jisu tharare holo, “Nuo-jameior loge thele tar somarsiegune monot dugot thebak parapang? Hintu dinun ebag, sebeden nuo-jameibuore tharattun pharok gori neja obo, sokkene thara ubos thebak.
40009016	“Huno jone puron haborot mar no gallie nuo haborloi tali no duon. Haron nuo taligandoi puron haboran tana jei phadagan ojar obo.
40009017	Ar huno jone taza angguro ros puron samarar holliet no bhoran. Judi bhorele, taza angguro roschane puron samarar holliebuo phulei phadi phelebo. Angguro roschan nigili jebo ar samarar holliebuo borbat obo. Taza angguro ros nuo samarar holliet bhorana, sebeden duo pod gome gori thebo.”
40009018	Jisu sei hodagani tharare horte lokke, sawh, ek jon synagog lobiot gorie tar idu einei the nije Jisur mujungot bhug pari salam gori porinei holo, “Mor jhibuo ikkie molode, hintu tui einei tor adtani tar ugure tuli dile, the aro jeda obo.”
40009019	Sebeden Jisu udi tar pune-pune gelo ar tar sisjioguneo tar loge gelak.
40009020	Ar sawh, siot ekkuo baro bojorchie ridupirie-bola milie elo. The Jisur pije-pije einei tar haboro hazat dhorsiegi.
40009021	The mone-mone holo, “Mui bana tar haboran dhorilieo gom om.”
40009022	Ar Jisu pijendi rini seinei tare deginei holo, “Jhi, sahoj gor, tor bischiaschane tore gom gorilo. Ar sei lokkettun duri miliebuo gom olo.”
40009023	Ar jokke Jisu synagog lobiot-goriebuor ghoro bidirie somilogoi, the bashi-bajeiegunore ar joul gortonde manuschunore degilogoi.
40009024	The tharare holo, “Pod duo! Milie-shawhbuo daw no more the daw ghum jar.” Sebeden thara tare azilak.
40009025	Manuschunore the barendi nigilei denar porendi, milie-shawhbuoi agede gudhibuot Jisu sominei tare addot dhorinei sebeden milie-shawhbuoi udilo.
40009026	Ei hoboran sei bamot goda shidie gelo.
40009027	Ar Jisu siottun jadegoi dijon han manjie ro sari-sari, tare dagi-dagi tar pune-pune jadon, “Davidor puo, tui amare doye gor.”
40009028	Ar the ghoro bidirie sominei, han manuschune tar idu elak, sebeden Jisu tharare holo, “Ien mui gori parim bili tumi bischias goro ni?” Thara tare holak, “Bischias gori, Probu.”
40009029	Sebeden Jisu tharar sogkun dhori dinei holo, “Tumi bischias gorode doge-doge ok.”
40009030	Ar tharar sog gom olak. Sebeden Jisu tharare shokto gori uij dinei holo, “Seio, ien harore no hoio.”
40009031	Hintu thara siottun nigili jeinei tar sombonde hoboran sei bamot beg jaganit phogodang gori dilak.
40009032	Sei dijon manus jadondoidie lokke, sawh, hoiek jon manjie ek jon bhude peinei madi no parsie manus Jisur idu anilak.
40009033	Ar Jisu bhudtuo dabei denar porendi, amad oi roiede manuschuoi hoda hoi parilo. Sebeden manuschune amok oinei holak, “Ami huno bar Israel dejot edogkie no degi.”
40009034	Hintu Pharisigune holak, “Bhudo rajar darai the bhud dabei de.”
40009035	Jisu beg sohoranit ar adamanit jeinei synagogot sigkie dilo ar Itchioro rejjio gom hoboran prosar gorilo. Ar manuschunor beg biedigani ar beg aw-sugkani the gom gori dilo.
40009036	Ar the manjior jhagkun degile, tartun sit puri ude. Haron thara upai-sara oinei sintiet pori rakkoli sara bera-shagolo obostani dogkie oi agon.
40009037	Sebeden Jisu tar sisjiogunore holo, “Phojolani deibar jodepode shagor age, hintu ham gorie hom.
40009038	Senottei, phojol dieie jhumot dipadebartei phojolanir Girojchuore shokto gori hujoli goro.”
40010001	Jisu tar barojon sisjio tar idu dagi, hajorchie aptagun dabei di paribartei ar nanan biedi ar pirellie gom gori diparibartei odhihar dilo.
40010002	Igun olakke barojon apostolunor nangani: Bego akke olode Simon, tar hellie nangan olode Pitor, ar tar bheibuo Andrio, Zebedior puo Jakob ar tar guro bheibuo Johon.
40010003	Philip, ar Bartholomai, Thoma, ar hajana-tulliebuo Mothi. Alphaior puo Jakob ar Lebbai, tar hellie nangan olode Thaddeus.
40010004	Dej-bhokto Simon ar Juda Iskariod, the olode Jisure dhora bajei diebuo.
40010005	Jisu sei barojonore ei ugumani hoinei dipadelo, “Be-jadtunor sidu no jeio ar ekkan Samaria manjior sohoroto no someio.
40010006	Hintu ajhi jeie bera-shagol, Israel manuschunor sidu jo.
40010007	Tumi jade, ei hoboran prosar gorsio, ‘Sorgo rejjiogan hai ejchie.’
40010008	Aw-sugkiegun gom gorsio. Morattun jeda gorogoi. Pharangigun gom gorogoi. Bhudtun dabei duo. Tumi magana peio hinottei magana duo.
40010009	Tomar homor pijonit gori sona, rubuo, bah pidolor poijieδ no loio.
40010010	Porbhajottei hotchal no loio. Odol-bodol shilum no loio, joda ar ludig no loio, haron ham goriebuoi tar hebar bhat pana lak.
40010011	“Ar tumi je huno sohorot, bah, adamot somilegoi, gorba tuli pare pa manus togeiogoi. Sebeden tumi siottun no jo song tar ghorot thagkuo.
40010012	Ar tumi ghoranot udibagkoio ghoro girojchuore salam gorsiogoi.
40010013	Judi sei ghorbuoboi salam goribar ole, toma shantigan thara siot thok. Hintu judi lak no ole, salen tomar shantigan tomar idu phiri ejok.
40010014	Ar je tomare lobiot no gore, bah, tomar hoda no sune tumi sei ghoranottun, bah, sohoranottun jadegoi tomar thengot dhullie tumi jhari di ejchio.
40010015	Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor: Itchiore bijier goribode dinnuot Sodom ar Gomora sohoranittei sasti dibode sittun bes sei sohoranottei aghattie sasti dibo!
40010016	Sawh, jharbuo huguro sere bera-shagolo dogkie gori mui tomare padangor. Senottei, sabo dogkie shojag ar Hodoro dogkie oinnio jonore hoti no gorsie tumi oi peba.
40010017	“Manjiortun uijkare thagkuo. Haron thara tomare sanhedrinot gojei dibagkoi. Ar tharar synagogot thara tomare maribak.
40010018	Sason-gorie ar rajagunor sidu, tharare ar Be-jadtuno sidu shakki ijebe mortei tomare nibak.
40010019	Hintu jokke thara tomare sigunor sidu gojei duondoi, tumi hi hobagoi, bah, hingori hobagoi sidie no gorsio, haron sei lokke tumi hi hobagoi tomare Pobitro Aptai jobei dibo.
40010020	Haron hoiebuo tumi no oba. Hintu sibie olode tomar bidirie hoidiebuo tomar Babor Aptabuoi.
40010021	“Ar bheibuoi tar bheibuo morei pheleibartei dhora bajei dibo. Ar babpuoi tar puobuo morei pheleibartei dhora bajei dibo. Puogun tharar bab-ma biruddie oinei manjie tharare morei pelan para goribak.
40010022	Mor nanganottei beg manjie tomare hos no pebak, hintu je thumsong thori thei pare, the uddhar obo.
40010023	Hintu jokke tomare ekkan sohorot dug-hosto lagele, aro ekkan sohorot dhei jeio. Haron mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor, tumi beg Israel dejor sohorani berei no phurode, Munischioro Puobuo ebo.
40010024	“Sisjiobuoi huno tar guruthagurbuottun dangor noi. Banidajio huno tar girojchuottun dangor noi.
40010025	Sisjiobuoi tar guro dhormothagurbuo dogkie ar banidajibuoi tar girojchuo dogkie hunorogom oi parilie share. Ghoro girojchuore judi thara ‘Beelzebul’ hon, tar ghoro manuschunore aro hi hobak?
40010026	“Senottei, tharare no doreo. Haron phogodang gora no obo jinij hitchu nei jieni dagi raga oie, ar hobor no peie jinij hitchu nei, jieni ghubei thuo oie.
40010027	Mui tomare jieni andharot hongor, sien tumi phorot hoiogoi. Ar jien mui tomare hane-hane hongor, sien salo ugurottun jogar pari-pari gorogoi.
40010028	Manjie heyegan morei phelei di paron, hintu aptabuo morei phelei di no paron hinottei tharare no doreo. Hintu heyegan ar aptabuo norogor agunot nas gori di parede sibiere doreo.
40010029	Dibie soroi ekkuo pidolor poijieloiδ beja no jai ni na? Tobuio tomare Babor onumoti sara ekkuoio madit portak noi.
40010030	Hintu tomar mada sulanio beg gona oie.
40010031	Senottei, no doreo. Tumi ektal soroiottun bes moillio.
40010032	“Senottei je manjior mujungot more haam hai, muio mor sorgo Babo mujungot tare haam heim.
40010033	Hintu je manjior mujungot more bharebo, muio tare mor sorgo Babo mujungot tare bharem.
40010034	“Songsarot milie-mili gori dibartei mui ejchiong bili tumi mone no gorsio. Milie-mili gori dibattiei mui no ejong, hintu horgogani dibartei mui ejchiong.
40010035	Puobuore tar babpuor biruddie jhibore tar mabuor biruddie ar bobuore tar shuribuor biruddie uo bajei dibartei mui ejchiongge.
40010036	Nijor ghorbuogun nijor sottru obak.
40010037	“Je tar bab magunore mortun bes hos pai, the mor manus obarlak noi. Ar je tar puo-jhigunore mortun bes hos pai, the mor manus obarlak noi.
40010038	Ar je tar kroschan buginei mor loge no eje, the mor manus obarlak noi.
40010039	Je tar poranan thogai sien areibo. Ar je tar poranan mortei arai, the tar poranan thogei pebo.
40010040	“Je tomare lobiot gore, moreio lobiot gore, ar je more lobiot gore the more dipadeiebuoreo lobiot gore.
40010041	Je ek jon munire muni ijebe lobiot gorajaidie doge lobiot gore, the munir poriskari pebo. Ar je ek jon dharmig manjiore, dharmig manus lobiot gora jaidie doge lobiot gore the dharmig manjior poriskari pebo.
40010042	Ar je begottun niroit ek jonore mor bischiasi bilinei bana ek goloj juro pani habeleio, mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor, the hamakkai tar poriskaran no areibo.”
40011001	Jisu tar barojon sisjiore ugum di phureinei, Galili sohoranit sigkie dibartei ar prosar goribartei the siottun gelogoi.
40011002	Jiel-hanat Johone Jisu Kristor hamanir hobor suninei, the tar di jon sisjio dipadelo.
40011003	Thara Jisure holak, “Ebode sibie tui ni na, nahi, ami oinnio jonore barchedong?”
40011004	Sebeden Jisu tharare uttor dinei holo, “Tumi jieni degor ar sunor, sieni jeinei Johonore hoiogoi:
40011005	Hanune degodon, lengune adton, pharangi manuschun sudduo odon, halune sunodon, ar moragun jeda odon. Ar goribpunor sidu gom hoboran prosar gora awr.
40011006	Jar mor sombonde shiongshama nei the hoballie!”
40011007	Johonor sisjiogune siottun jadonde lokke Jisu Johonor sombonde manuschunore holo, “Moruobomit tumi hi sebartei jeio? Boiere laraidie hagara sebartei jeio ni na?
40011008	Hintu tumi hi sebartei jeio? Doul habor ursie manus sebartei tumi jeio ni na? Suno, doul habor uronde manuschun raj-ghorot no than.
40011009	Hintu tumi hi sebartei jeio? Muni sebartei tumi jeio ni na? Mui tomare hongor: oi, the munittun bes dangor.
40011010	Haron Johonor sombonde Sastrot lega age: ‘Sawh, mor hoborboiebuo tor mujungedi padangor. The tor podtan hajei dibo.’
40011011	“Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor, jedog jon miliettun jormo oion baptisma goridie Johonottun bes hono jon dangor nei. Hintu sorgo rejjiot je begottun sigon, the Johonottun bes dangor.
40011012	Baptisma gori die Johonor lokkettun duri ikkie song sorgo rejjiogan manjie hara-hari gorsion, ar jigune bole paron, thara lon.
40011013	Haron Johonor amol song beg munigune ar Mosir Niomane akke duri hoi die.
40011014	Ar judi tumi lo, ebode Elija olode the.
40011015	Jar sunibar han age, the sunok.
40011016	“Hintu ikku jugor manuschun mui hiloi tulona gorim? Thara olakke ath-hola bazarot boinei daga-dagi goronde gurogunor dogkie.
40011017	Thara hon, ‘Ami tomartei bashi bei dilong hintu tumi no najila. Ami tomartei mono dugo gan gei dilong hintu tumi abiles heinei no hanila.’
40011018	“Haron Johone einei, the bhat-panio no hai hinottei manjie tare hon, ‘Tare bhude peie.’
40011019	Munischioro Puobuo einei haba-daba gorilo. Ar manjie tare hon, ‘Habubuo ar mattolliebuore sawh, the olode hajana-tulliegunor, ar pabigunor bondhu.’ Hintu Itchioro gyenan tar hamanit dega jai.”
40011020	Sebeden Jisu jei sohoranit beg bhag tar amok hamani gorsie, sei sohoro manuschune tharar monani no phirien hinottei tharare goba dorilo.
40011021	“Oh Korazin, tor hobal puribo! Oh Bethsaida, tor hobal puribo! Haron tomar siot amok ham gora jeiede sieni judi Tyre ar Sidon sohoranit gora jedo, thara bosta urinei ar shei gulinei honatto tharar monani phireion bili degelakkun.
40011022	Hintu mui tomare hongor, bijiero dinnuo tumi sasti pebade darane Tyre ar Sidonor sastigan sorjio gora jebo.
40011023	Ar oh Kapernaum, tui sormanloi sorgo song uttuoschie sibie, Padalot tore phelei die obo. Tor iot amok ham gorajeiede sieni judi Sodom sohorot gora jedo, sieni edchie song thelun.
40011024	Hintu mui tore hongor, bijiero dinnuot tui sasti pebede darane Sodom sohoranor sastigan hom obo.”
40011025	Sei lokke Jisu holo, “Oh Ba, sorgo ar pittimir Probu, tui ei hodagani gyeni ar buddhi-bola manuschunottun lugei thoios, hintu sigon guro sannie manuschuno idu ieni phogodang gorilie hinottei mui tore donniobad duongor.
40011026	oi Ba, haron sien tor gom lage.
40011027	“Baba more beg gojeidie. Babe bade Puobuore huno jone hobor no pan. Ar Puobuo bade Babore huno jone hobor no pan ar Puobuoi jigunore janei dibar mone hoi, sigune Babore hobor pan.
40011028	“Oh oran oiegun ar guor bugi bugkiegun, tumi begkun mor idu ejo, mui tomare jiren dim.
40011029	Mor jungolluo loi tomar ugure soreinei mortun shigi logi. Mui nombro ar norom mon-bola hinottei tumi tomar aptabuottei jiren peba.
40011030	Haron mor jungollo utchuo ar mor bugibuo padol.”
40012001	Sei lokke Judaiunor Jireni Dinnuot Jisu tar sisjiogundoipaganadhan-bhuiedi jar. Thara jade tar sisjiogune ped porai dhan sijier madagani shininei ha dorsion.
40012002	Pharisigune sien deginei Jisure holak, “Sah, amar Jireni Dinnuot jien no goribar mana age sien thara gorton.”
40012003	Hintu Jisu tharare holo, “Davide ar tar somarsiegune ped porai hi gorsion sien tumi madei no sawh?
40012004	The Itchioro ghoranot sominei, the ar tar somarsiegune utchorbo gorsie pidieganiδ heion. Niomo doge sei pidiegani bana dhormothagurune hei paron.
40012005	Ar dhormothagurune hi gorsion Mosir Niomot tumi madei seio ni? Jireni Dinnuot dhormothagurune Mondirot niom bhonggo goron. Tobuio thara ni-duji.
40012006	Mui tomare hongor: Mondirbuottun bes oborug ek jon iot age.
40012007	Hintu tumi judi ien hi hoie hobor peda, ‘Mui doyegan sang, dali no sang.’ Sebeden tumi ni-dujibuore duj badei no dilan.
40012008	Haron Munischioro Puobuo Jireni Dinnuoro Probu.”
40012009	Ar Jisu siottun janar porendi tharar ekkan synagogot the somilogoi.
40012010	Ar sawh, siot ek jon sidie-ad manus age. Jisure dujot pheleibar pod togadon hinottei thara tartun pujor gorilak, “Jireni Dinnuot manus gom goribar niom age ni nei?”
40012011	Jisu tharare holo, “Tomar ekkuo bera-shagol judi Jireni Dinnuot gadot pole, honna sibiere dhorinei no tulibo?
40012012	Ek jon manus ekkuo bera-shagolottun bes moillio noi ni! Senottei, Jireni Dinnuot gom ham gorana osit.”
40012013	Sebeden Jisu manuschuore holo, “Tor adtan babei de.” Ar the tar adtan babei dilo. Jisu tar adtan oinnio gom adtano dogkie gom gori dilo.
40012014	Hintu Pharisigune nigili jei Jisure morei pheleibartei temmang gorilakkoi.
40012015	Hintu Jisu sien hobor peinei the sei jaganottun jeiegoi. Sebeden jhag-jhag manus tar pune-pune gelak ar the begkunore gom gori dilo.
40012016	Ar tar hoda manjiore no hobartei Jisu tharare shokto gori mana gorilo.
40012017	Muni Isaiar darai huo oiede sien puron olo:
40012018	“Sawh, ibie olode mui bei tullie sagorsiebuo. The mor agojorbuo. Mor monan tar ugure baari hujhi. Mui tar ugure mor Aptabuo thom ar the Be-jadtunor sidu bijiero hodagan prosar goribo.
40012019	The torgo no goribo ar roio no saribo. Huno jone tar robuo podottun sundak noi.
40012020	Jedogkon song the niaiganore joi gora bajei no de, sedogkon song the ekkuo mojorsie nolhagara sini no pheleibo ar ekkan dhumoidie serago buddi morei no pheleibo.
40012021	Ar Be-jadtune tar nanganot asha rageibak.”
40012022	Sebeden ek jon bhude peie manus Jisur idu anilak. Sei manuschuo hane-han ar bube-bub. Jisu tare gom gori dinei the hoda hoi parer ar deger.
40012023	Ar beg manuschune shanggadik amok oinei holak, “Ete Davidor Puo noi ni?”
40012024	Hintu Pharisigune ien suninei thara holak, “Bana Belzebulo darai the bhudtun dabei di pare.”
40012025	Hintu Jisu thara bhabodonde sieni hobor peinei holo, “Jei rejjiogan odosat di bhag oinei nijere-nije biruddie solilie, sei rejjiogan dongso obo. Ar jei sohoran odosat, bah, ghorbobuo odosat di bhag oinei nijore-nije biruddi solliede sei sohoran, bah, ghorbobuo bhangi jebo.
40012026	“Ar judi soitanore soitane dabei de, the nijore-nije biruddi obo. Salen, tar rejjiogan hingori tigi thebo?
40012027	Ar mui judi Belzebula darai bhud dabei duong, tomar puogune har darai bhud dabei duon? Senottei thara tomar bijier gorie odog.
40012028	Hintu mui judi Itchioro Aptabuo darai bhud dabei duong, salen, Itchioro rejjiogan hamakkai tomar hai ejchie.
40012029	“Judi ek jon boli manuschuore akke no banilie, the hingori tar ghorot somi tar pojabirie ludi loi paribo? Sebeden the tar ghorottun pojabirie ludi loi paribo.
40012030	“Je mor loge noi, the mor biruddie age. Ar je mor loge no thuboi the settera gore.
40012031	Senottei mui tomare hongor, Itchioro biruddie manjior beg pabpani ar sorjanagani mab die obo. Hintu je huno jone judi Aptabuore sorjai, salen, huno din mab die no obo.
40012032	Ar je Munischioro Puobuor biruddie hoda hoi, sien mab die obo. Hintu je Pobitro Aptabuor biruddie hoda hoi, sien tare ei jugkuot ar ebode jugkuoto mab die no obo.
40012033	“Gajchuo gome seresta gorilie guloguno gom obak, gajchuo gome seresta no gorilie guloguno gom no obak. Senottei, gulogundoi gajchuo henjannie sini para jai.
40012034	Bijollo sabor bongsogun! Tumi dujto hinottei a hingori gom hoda hoi pariba? Haron ontorot jien boron oi age sien muendi huo eje.
40012035	Gom manjie tar ontorot gom jinij thoiettun gom jinij nigilei. Bojong manjie tar ontorot bojong jinij thoiettun bojong jinij nigilei.
40012036	Hintu mui tomare hongor, manjie jedogkani bhainnie hoda hon, bijiero dinnuot sieni begkani thara ijeb di pebak.
40012037	Haron tomar hodaloi tumi ni-duji oba ar tomar hodaloi tumi duji obo.”
40012038	Sebeden hoiek jon dhormo niomor mastor ar Pharisigune madi udilak, “Guruthagur, tui amare ekkan sinno degebartei amar mone hor.”
40012039	Hintu Jisu tharare uttor dilo, “Ei jugor dujto ar biebijier gorie manuschune sinno sebar magon! Hintu muni Jona sinnogan bade tharare huno sinno dega no obo.
40012040	Jona bor maschuor pedo bidirie tin din tin reid roiede dogkie gori Munischioro Puobuoio madi bidirie tin din tin reid thebo.
40012041	Bijiero dinnuot Ninevi sohoro manuschune ei jugo manuschuno loge udinei, tharare dujot doribakki. Haron, Jona prosar gorinei, thara monani phireion. Ar sawh, Jonattun bes dangor iot ek jon age.
40012042	Bijiero dinnout, Dokkino Ranibuoi ei jugo loge udinei tharare dujot doribogi. Haron, Solomon rajar gyeno hoda sunibartei pittimir thumortun the ejchie. Ar sawh, Solomon rajartun bes dangor iot ek jon age.
40012043	“Jokke hajorchie aptabuoi manjiortun nigili jai. Sokkene the jireibartei shuguno jaga hotta di jeinei jireibar jaga togeinei no pelo.
40012044	“Sebeden the holo, ‘Mui phelei ejchiongge ghoranot phiri jang.’ Bhudtuo einei, ghoran hali, suri phellie ar sajeie gori degilogi.
40012045	Sebeden the jeinei tartun bes bojong oinnio sattuo bhud tar loge anilogoi. Ar thara sominei siot bojotti gorilakki. Sei manuschuor polim dojaganottun jero dojagan bes horab olo. Ei jugor dujto manuschuoro siennie doja obo.”
40012046	Jisu hoda horte lokke, sawh, tar mabuo ar tar bheiun tar loi hoda hobartei barendi thiei agondi.
40012047	Sebeden ek jone tare holo, “Sah, tor mabuo ar tor bheiun tor loi hoda hobartei barendi thiei agondi.”
40012048	Ar the sei manuschuore je tare hoie gi tare uttor dinei holo, “Honna mor ma ar hugun mor bheiun?”
40012049	Sebeden Jisu tar sisjioguno hittendi angul degei dinei holo, “Sawh, mor ma ar mor bheiun.
40012050	Haron je mor sorgo Babor ischie doge gore, the olode mor bhei, bon ar ma.”
40013001	Sei dinnie Jisu ghorottun nigilinei bilo parot bojilogoi.
40013002	Tar seropala shagor manus thubeion hinottei the ekkan nawt udinei bojilogoi. Ar beg manuschun bilo parot thiei thelak.
40013003	Sebeden Jisu tharare onek hoda tulona hodadi holo, “Sawh! Ek jon biji shidiei biji shidibartei gelo.
40013004	The biji shidi dede gulodok biji podo pazarat porilag. Sigun pheigkune einei hei phelliekki.
40013005	Ar gulodok biji madi padol sadara jagat porilag. Madi padol hinottei jhadi gejeilak.
40013006	Hintu jokke belan udinei rode shegilo, ar singor nei hinottei sidie oi gelak.
40013007	Ar gulodok biji hada bonot porilag. Hada bonan ojol oinei bijigunore dagi rageilo.
40013008	Hintu aro gulodok biji gom madit porinei phol dorilak. Hoiekkunottun ek shot dunuo, heit dunuo ar tiris dunuo gori phol dorilak.
40013009	Jar sunibar han age, the sunok!”
40013010	Sisjiogune Jisur idu einei pujor gorilakki, “Tui a hittei manuschunore tulona hodadi hos?”
40013011	Sebeden Jisu tharare uttor dilo, “Haron sorgo rejjior gubonan buji paribartei tomare gyen die oie, hintu tharare die no oi.
40013012	Haron jar age tare aro bes die obo ar tar alajhala gori thebo. Hintu jar nei, tar jien age sieno tartun hari luo obo.
40013013	Ienottei mui tharare tulona hodadi hongge, haron, thara sade sebak, hintu buji loi partak noi. Sunde sunibak, hintu buji no paribak.
40013014	Muni Isaia agami hoidi jeiede hodagan puron olo. ‘Tumi sunde suniba, hintu shobai buji no pariba. Sade seba, hintu shobai buji loi no pariba.
40013015	Tharar monani horab oie hinottei tharar hanedi no sunon ar sogedio no degon. Siennie no ole, tharar sogedi degibak ar hanedi sunibak, sebeden tharar ontorot buji loi parinei phiribak. Sebeden mui tharare gom gori dim.’
40013016	“Hintu tomar sogedi tumi degor ar tomar hananiloi sunor hinottei tumi hoballie!
40013017	Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor, balukjon munie ar dharmig manjie tumi jieni degor ar sunor, sieni tharaio sebar ar sunibar dab gorsion hintu thara sien no pan ar sunio no pan.
40013018	“Senottei biji shidiebuor tulona hodagano orthogan suno.
40013019	Jigune Itchioro rejjior hoboran suninei buji loi no paron sigunor obostani olode podo pazarat porsie bijigunor dogkie. Dujtobuo einei tharar ontorot shitte Itchioro hodagan nigilei nejeie.
40013020	Jigune Itchioro hodagan sunonar jogon-togon hujhi gori mani lon sigunor obostani olode sadara jagat porsie bijigunor dogkie.
40013021	Hintu tharar ontoro murot song singor nei hinottei bana hanekkon gori tigi thei paron. Jogon Itchioro hodaganottei hosto ele, ar manjie uttiesar gorilie, jogon-togon odot jhuri poron.
40013022	Ar hoiek jon manjior obostani olode sei hada bonot porsie bijigunor dogkie. Itchioro hodagan thara sunon, hintu thara ei halor sintiettei, dhon-sompottir lubbot baji, Itchioro hodaganore dagi ragai hinottei phola phol neie on.
40013023	Hintu hoiek jon manjior obostani olode sei gom madit porsie bijigunor dogkie. Itchioro hodagan sunilie buji loi paron hinottei thara phola phol on. Ek dagie ek shot dunuo, heit dunuo, ar tiris dunuo phol utponno goron.”
40013024	Jisu aro ekkan tulona hoda tharare hoi dilo, “Sorgo rejjiogan olode edogkie: Ek jon manjie tar hedot gom shidilogoi.
40013025	Hintu reidot manuschune ghum jade tar sottrubuo ei, ghomuno sere dhan-hero biji shidi di gelo.
40013026	Jokke ghomun udinei sijie nigililo, sebeden dhan-herani sini para gelo.
40013027	Sei girojchuor sagorsiegune tar idu einei tare holakki, ‘Babu, tor hedot gom shittoschie noi ni? Salen, dhan-hero bijigun huttun elak?’
40013028	Ar the tharare holo, ‘Sottrubuoi shidi diegi obol ai.’ Sagorsiegune tare holak, ‘Salen, ami jeinei sieni ugure phelei didonggoi tui henjan mone goros?’
40013029	Hintu malikkuoi holo, ‘Thok, thok. Dhan-herani ugurei dede adikkie tumi gomanio ugurei pheleiba.
40013030	Habibar okto song eksomare uttok. Sokkene mui habiegunore hom, “Akke dhan-herani hurei thoinei puri pheleibartei bona bano. Ar sebeden ghomun mor gola-ghorot bhorei thoiogoi.” ’ ”
40013031	Jisu tharare aro ekkan oinnio tulona hoda hoi dilo, “Sorgo rejjiogan olode edogkie: Ek jon manjie ekkuo sorjio biji loinei tar hedot shidilogoi.
40013032	Sorjio bijibuo olode bijir moiddie begottun sigon. Hintu ibie dangor elo, beg shak pado gajottun bes dangor oinei jodepode gaj oi hinottei pheigkune einei dhelagunot bha gorondi.”
40013033	Jisu tharare aro ekkan tulona hoda hoi dilo, “Sorgo rejjiogan olode moli dogkie. Ekkuo miliei sei molibuo loinei tin leiδ moidie loi gulinei guli begkan jurebartei thoi para.”
40013034	Jisu sei hodagani bana tulona hodadi manuschunore holo. Tulona hoda sara tharare hitchu no hoi.
40013035	Sieniloi munibuor darai huo oiede hodagan puron olo, “Tulona hoda hobartei mor muon hulim. Songsar sristi gora oiede siottun duri gubonot thoie hodagani mui hom.”
40013036	Sebeden Jisu manuschunore dipadanar porendi the ghoro bidirie somilogoi. Ar tar sisjiogune tar idu einei holakki, “Hedot dhan-heranir tulona hodagan amare bhangi de.”
40013037	Ar the uttor dilo, “Biji shittede manuschuo olode Munischioro Puobuo.
40013038	Hedtan olode songsaran. Ghomun olakke sorgo rejjior manuschun. Dhan-herani olode soitanor manuschun.
40013039	Sottrubuo, dhan-hero biji shidi dede sibie olode Diabolaδ. Habibar oktogan olode jugor thuman. Habiegun olakke sorgo-dudtun.
40013040	Jeannie gori manjie dhan-herani thubeinei agunot puri pelan, jugor sejotio thik siennie gora obo.
40013041	Munischioro Puobuoi tar sorgo-dudtun dipadebo. Jienie manjiore pabot pelai, jigune pab goron ar oinnio jonoreio pabot pelan sigunore rejjioganottun eksomare tharare bhaar gori dibag.
40013042	Ar sorgo-dudtune tharare norogo agunot phelei dibag. Siot thara dad hamere-hamere hanibak.
40013043	Sebeden dharmig manuschun tharar Babo rejjiot belo dogkie jolibak. Jar sunibar han age the sunok!
40013044	“Sorgo rejjiogan olode edogkie: Ek jon manjie hedot lugei thoie dhon suph peinei, the aro lugei thologoi. Sebeden adik hujhie the jeinei ar tar jieni age begkani bejinei sei jagan hini lologi.
40013045	Sorgo rejjiogan olode aro edogkie: Ek jon bebarie doul muktuo togar.
40013046	Ekkuo moillioban muktuo the suph pelo. The jeinei tar jieni age begkani bejinei sei muktobuo hini lologi.
40013047	“Sorgo rejjiogan olode aro edogkie: Hoiek jon jalliei ekkan bor jal sagorot pheleinei nanan babottie maj bajiliek.
40013048	Jalan boron oinei, jalliegune jalan hulo ugure tani tulilak. Sebeden thara bojinei gom majchun harangot bhorei tholak ar bojong majchun phelei dilak.
40013049	Jugor sejot esannie gora obo. Sorgo-dudtune einei pabi manuschun dharmig manuschunottun pharok goribakki.
40013050	Sebeden sorgo-dudtune tharare norogo agunot phelei dibag. Siot thara dad hamere-hamere hanibak.”
40013051	Jisu pujor gorilo, “Ei hodagani tumi begkani buji parila ni?” Ar thara holak, “Oi, buji parilong, Probu.”
40013052	Sebeden Jisu tharare holo, “Senottei jei dhormo niomor mastorbuo sorgo rejjior sisjio oi, the olode ek jon ghoro giroje tar dhonor bhandarottun puron ar nuo jinij nigileidie sibie dogkie.”
40013053	Ar edogkie olo, Jisu sei tulona hodagan hoi phureinei the siottun gelogoi.
40013054	Tar nijor adamot lunginei, tharar synagogot the sigkie die arambo gorilo. Jisur hodagani suninei manuschune amok oinei holak, “Ei Manuschuoi ei gyenan ar amok ham goribar hemodagan huttun pelogoi?
40013055	Ei Manuschuo haligorsie ar Merir puobuo, noi ni? Jakobor, Josebor, Judar ar Simonor bheibuo, noi ni?
40013056	Amar loge agonde sigun tar beg bonun, noi ni? Ieni begkani the huttun pelogoi?”
40013057	Senottei thara Jisure bischias no gorilak. Hintu Jisu tharare holo, “Nijor adamot ar ghorot bade ek jon munie beg jagat sorman pai.”
40013058	Thara bischias no gorilak hinottei the siot bes amok ham no gore.
40014001	Sei lokke Herod Tetrakoδ Jisur hobor sunilo.
40014002	The tar sagorsiegunore holo, “Sibie baptisma gori die Johone obode, the morattun jiei uttie. Senottei the ei amok hamani gore.”
40014003	Herode tar bheibuo Philibor mogkuo Herodittei Johonore dhori, baninei jiel-hanat bhorei thoie.
40014004	Haron Johone tare hoie, “Tare loioschie ien tor niom noi.”
40014005	Herode Johonore morei pheleibar seie. Hintu jonogone Johonore muni bili mani loion hinottei dorelo.
40014006	Hintu Herodor jormo din utchob gorte Herodir jhibuoi tharar mujungot najinei Herodore mon hujhi gori dilo.
40014007	Senottei Herodir jhibuoi jien mage sien dibartei Herode tare sobot heinei soittio dilo.
40014008	Tar mai tare hu-sholla dede doge the holo, “Baptisma gori die Johonor siriebuo ekkuo bajonot gori more degi.”
40014009	Sebeden rajar monot dug olo. Tobuio tar sobottanottei ar tar loge bojchionde sigunor harone the tare dibartei ugum dilo.
40014010	Ar the manus dipadenei jiel-hanat Johonor siriebuo haba bajei dilo.
40014011	Thara Johonor siriebuo ekkuo bajonot gori aninei miliebuore dilakki. Sebeden miliebuoi siriebuo loinei tar mare dilogoi.
40014012	Johonor sisjiogune einei Johonor madalabuo ninei garelakkoi. Sebeden thara jeinei Jisure hobor holakkoi.
40014013	Johonor moronor hobor Jisu suninei, the siottun ekkan nawt gori gai-gai ekkan niribili jagat gelo. Hintu manuschune ien suninei, sohoranittun torbuo tar pije-pije gelak.
40014014	Jokke Jisu nawganottun udilogoi, the jhag-jhag manus degilo. Tharare tartun sit purinei tharar aw-sugkiegun the gom gori dilo.
40014015	Beillie-beillie oinei, tar sisjiogun tar idu einei holakki, “Ien olode jonosunnio jaga, ar belano jeiegoi. Adamanit jeinei tharattei hebar jinij hini loi parondoi para manuschunore tui ja bajei de.”
40014016	Hintu Jisu tharare holo, “Tharar ja no puribo. Tumi tharare hiju hebar jinij duo.”
40014017	Ar thara tare holak, “Amattun bana paschan pidie ar dibie maj agonde.”
40014018	Sebeden Jisu holo, “Sieni mor idu ano.”
40014019	Hero ugure bojibartei manuschunore the ugum dilo. Sebeden the paschan pidie ar dibie maj adot lolo. Agajo hitte muo gori Itchiorore Jisu donniobad dilo. Ar manuschunore dibartei pidiegani the hotta gorinei tar sisjiogunore dilo.
40014020	Sebeden begkune helak ar begkunor ped bhorilo. Manuschune hei-hai ugursie pidie ar maj sisjiogune tuli lolakke boron baro lei.
40014021	Pidie heiegun olakke miliegun ar gurogun badgori bana morod perai pas azar.
40014022	Manuschunore the bidei gorte sagoro uhule tartun akke jei paron para, Jisu tar sisjiogunore jebartei jogon-togon nawt uduo bajei dilo.
40014023	Manuschunore bidei denar porendi the bor magibartei ekkuo mouno pidit udilogoi. Reid oinei the siot gai-gai elo.
40014024	Hintu sei somoi nawgan sagorano song moiddie elo ar jadonde mokkietun boier baar hinottei nawganot tubol abor haar.
40014025	Poittie amollie Jisu tar sisjiogunor idu pani uguredi adi-adi elo.
40014026	Sisjiogune tare pani uguredi adi jade deginei, thara shanggadik dorelak. Thara holak, “Ibie debeda!” Ar thara dore hijiek hari uttuon.
40014027	Hintu Jisu tharare jogon-togon holo, “Sahoj goro. Sibie mui, no doreo.”
40014028	Sebeden Pitore tare uttor dinei holo, “Probu, judi tui ole mui tor idu pani uguredi ei parong para ugum de.”
40014029	Ar Jisu holo, “Ai, ai.” Sebeden Pitore nawganottun lami, pani uguredi adi-adi Jisur mokkie ja dorilo.
40014030	Hintu the boier bhade deginei dorelo. Ar the dubpie-dubpie jogar parinei holo, “Probu, more rokkie gor!”
40014031	Jogon-togon Jisu tar adtan babeinei tare dhorilo. Ar the tare holo, “Oh hom bischias-bolabuo, a hittei tor shiongshama oie?”
40014032	Thara nawganot udinei, boierano thameilo.
40014033	Ar nawganot elakke sigune Jisure tobona gorinei holak, “Tui hamakkai Itchioro Puo.”
40014034	Thara sagoran par oinei, Gennesaret bamot lungilakki.
40014035	Sei jaganor manuschune Jisure sininei, seropala beg jaganit thara hobor padeilak. Sebeden manuschune tharar beg aw-sugkiegun tar idu anilak.
40014036	Aw-sugkiegunore bana Jisur ursie haboro hazat dhoribar dibartei manuschune tare hujoli gorilak. Ar aw-sugkie manjie je tare dhore the puro gom oi.
40015001	Sebeden hoiek jon dhormo niomor mastor ar Pharisi Jerusalem sohorottun Jisur idu elak.
40015002	Thara pujor gorilakki, “Tor sisjiogune borjonnune die dosturan a hittei no manon? Haron thara ad no dhoie gori bhat haan.”
40015003	Sebeden Jisu tharare uttor dilo, “Tomar dosturan paleibartei a hittei tumi Itchioro uguman no mano?
40015004	Itchiore ugum die, ‘Tor bab mare sorman goris.’ Ar ‘Je tar nijor bab mare gobe, tumi tare morei phellio.’
40015005	Hintu tumi hode, ‘Ek jon judi hoi, “Mor bab magunore sahajjio goribar tengagunδ Itchioro sidu utchorbo gora oie.”
40015006	Senottei tar bab magunore tar ar hitchu gora no puribo.’ Esannie gori tumi tomar dosturani paleibartei Itchioror uguman no mano.
40015007	Tumi phagaragun! Tomar sombonde muni Isaia thik gori hoi di jeie:
40015008	‘Ei manuschune tharar muendi more sorman goron. Hintu tharar monani mortun pharok.
40015009	Manjie baneie Itchioro ugumani dogkie gori thara sigan hinottei thara more tobona goronde ien aittie magana.’ ”
40015010	Sebeden Jisu jonogonore tar idu daginei tharare holo, “Tumi mor hoda suno ar buji lo.
40015011	Bharettun jieni manjior bidirie jai, sienie manjiore aw-pobitro no gore. Hintu manjior bidiriettun jieni nigili eje, sienie manjiore aw-pobitro gore.”
40015012	Sebeden sisjiogune tar idu einei holakki, “Pharisigune sei hodagan suninei ogoman peionde hobor pas ni?”
40015013	Hintu Jisu uttor dinei holo, “Jei gajchuo mor sorgo Babe no lagai, the ugurei pheleibo.
40015014	Tharare bad duo. Thara olakke han manjior han murubbi. Judi ek jon manjie oinnio ek jon han manjiore nejai, thara duo jon gadot poribakkoi.”
40015015	Sebeden Pitore Jisure holo, “Tulona hodagan amare bhangi de.”
40015016	Jisu holo, “Ejo song no buischie gori agode ne?
40015017	Tumi hobor no po ni na? Jien muendi some, sien pedot jai. Tar porendi sien heyettun nigili jaigoi.
40015018	Hintu jieni muottun bhar oi, sieni ontorottun eje ar sienie manjiore aw-pobitro gore.
40015019	Haronan olode, ontorottun ejede hu-bhab, hun gorana, shanda, sur, mijie shakki, ar manjiore sorjana.
40015020	Ei ienie manjiore aw-pobitro gore. Hintu ad no dhoie gori hele manus aw-pobitro no on.”
40015021	Jisu sei jaganottun jei, Tyre ar Sidon bamot elo.
40015022	Ar sawh, sei bamottun ekkuo Kanaan milie Jisu idu einei jogar pari-pari holo, “Oh Probu, Davidor Puobuo, more doye gor! Mor jhibore shanggadik gori bhude peie.”
40015023	Hintu Jisu tare ekkan hodaio uttor no dilo. Ar tar sisjiogune tar idu jeinei tare hujoli gorinei holak, “Tare dipada. Amar pune-pune the joul gori-gori ejer.”
40015024	Jisu uttor dilo, “More bana Israel jadottun ajhi jeie bera-shagoluno idu dipada oie.”
40015025	Hintu miliebuoi einei Jisur mujungot bukpari salam gori porinei holo, “Probu, more sahajjio gor!”
40015026	Hintu Jisu holo, “Gurogunottun pidie hari loinei hugur’unore dena gom noi.”
40015027	Sebeden miliebuoi Jisure uttor dinei holo, “Probu, ene daw oi. Hintu gurogune haade girojchuor tebilo tole pidie gori jhuri pole hugurune daw haan.”
40015028	Sebeden Jisu tare uttor dilo, “Miliebuo, tor bischiaschan hom noi. Tor jeannie mone hoi siennie ok.” Thik sei oktot tar jhibuo gom oie.
40015029	Jisu siottun janar porendi, Galili Sagoro phare-phare jeinei ekkuo mouno pidit udinei siot bojilogoi.
40015030	Jhag-jhag manus Jisur idu elak. Adur, han, rukkie, bub ar shagor aw-sugkie tar idu aninei tar thengo hure tholakki. Jisu sigunore gom gori dilo.
40015031	Bubpunore hoda hoi parte deginei, rukkiegun gom oionde deginei, adurune adi parte deginei ar hanune degodonde sieni manuschune deginei amok oinei Israeluno Itchiorbuore baini gorilak.
40015032	Jisu tar sisjiogunore tar idu daginei tharare holo, “Ei manuschunore mortun sit purer. Thara mor somare tin din olakki ar tharattun hitchu hebar nei. Thara jade ped porai alugo obakkoi hinottei tharare abuhoda dipadeb ar mortun mone no hor.”
40015033	Sebeden tar sisjiogune tare holak, “Edukkun manjiore ped bhora habebartei jonosunnio jagat huttun alajhala pidie pei dibonggoi?”
40015034	Jisu tharattun pujor gorilo, “Tomartun hoien pidie age?” Ar thara holak, “Amattun sattan pidie ar guri maj ghuleg agon.”
40015035	Sebeden Jisu manuschunore madi ugure bojibartei ugum dilo.
40015036	Sebeden the sattan pidie ar guri majchun adot loinei Itchiorore donniobad dilo. Sebeden the pidiegani hotta gorinei tar sisjiogunore dilo. Ar tar sisjiogune sieni manuschunore dilak.
40015037	Thara begkune helak, ar begkunor ped bhorilo. Tar porendi manuschune hei-hai ugursieni sisjiogune tuli lolakke boron sat lei.
40015038	Miliegun ar gurogun badgori, ser azar manjie heion.
40015039	Jisu manuschunore dipadanar porendi, the ekkan nawt udi Magdala bamot gelo.
40016001	Sebeden hoiek jon Pharisi ar Sadduki Jisur idu elak ar tare joga sebartei sorgottun ekkan sinno tharare degebartei thara magilak.
40016002	Hintu Jisu tharare uttor dilo, “Sajonnie ole tumi ho, ‘Agas ranga oie, hellie dinnuo gom goribuo.’
40016003	Ar beinnie ole tumi ho, ‘Agas ranga oie ar debabuo hala gorsie, edchie debabuoi gom no goribuo.’ Phagaragun! Debabuoi gom goribuo na gom no goribuo tumi hobor po, hintu somoior sinnoganir orthogan tumi hobor no po.
40016004	Ei jugor manuschun dujto ar shanda. Tharattun sinno sebar shanggadik mone hoi. Muni Jonar sinnogan bade tharare huno sinno dega no obo.”
40016005	Sisjiogune sagoro uhule par odegoi pidie nibar puri phellion.
40016006	Jisu tharare holo, “Seio! Phara-sigunor ar Saddukigunor moli pokke uijkare thagkuo.”
40016007	Sebeden thara-thara huobula gorinei holak, “Ami pidie no ani hinottei the ei hodagan hor.”
40016008	Hintu thara huobula gortonde sien Jisu hobor peinei tharare holo, “Oh hom bischias-bolagun! Pidie neidie sombonde a hittei huobula goror?
40016009	Ejosong no bujotte parapang? Pas azar manjiortei paschan pidie hodagan monot tulona? Hoi lei tumi tuli loiode?
40016010	Ser azar manjiortei sattan pidie hodagan monot tulona? Dongor hoi lei tumi tuli loiode?
40016011	Pidieganor sombonde mui tomare no hongor sien tumi a hittei no bojor? Hintu Pharisi ar Saddukigunor moli pokke uijkare thagkuo.”
40016012	Sebeden sisjiogune buji parilakke pidie banade hamot lagande moli pokke uijkare thebartei the no hoi. Hintu Pharisi ar Saddukigunor sigkie hoda pokke uijkare thebartei the tharare horte sien buji parilak.
40016013	Sebeden Jisu Kaisarea Philippi bamot lunginei, the tar sisjiogunottun pujor gorilo, “Munischioro Puobuo more manjie honna bili hon?”
40016014	Thara holak, “Hoiek jone hon, the baptisma gori die Johone, ar ek dagie hon, the Elija, aro ek dagie hon, the munigunottun ek jon obode.”
40016015	Jisu tharare holo, “Hintu tumi more honna bili ho?”
40016016	Ar Simon Pitore uttor dilo, “Tui olede Kristo, jeda Itchioro Puobuo.”
40016017	Jisu holo, “Jonar puo Simon, tui bhaggottie. Haron lo ar eragane ien tore janei no die, hintu mor sorgo Babe tore ien janei die.
40016018	Ar mui ien tore hongor: Tui olede Pitor, ar ei Bor Silluor ugure mui mor mondoli tulim. Padalor girie duoraneio ienore joi gori no paribo.
40016019	Mui tore sorgo rejjior chabigani dim. Ei pittimit tui jien bon goros sien sorgotio bon gora obo. Ar pittimit tui jien huli dios sien sorgotio huli die obo.”
40016020	Sebeden the tar sisjiogunore the Kristo bili harore no hobartei shokto gori mana gorilo.
40016021	Sei somoiottun duri Jisu tar sisjiogunore ei hodagani huo dorilode je, tartun Jerusalemot ja puribo. Borjonnune, rajguru-thagurune ar dhormo niomor mastorune tare dug-hosto lageibak ar tare morei pheleibak. Hintu tin dino madat the aro jeda obo.
40016022	Ar Pitore tare ek huredi ninei tare goba dorilo, “Probu, Itchiore tore rokkie gorog! Siennie tor huno din no ok.”
40016023	Hintu Jisu muo phireinei Pitorore holo, “Soitan, mor iottun jagoi! Tui olede mor podtan bondo goridiebuo. Haron tor bhabonagan Itchiorottun no eje, hintu manjiortun ejchie.”
40016024	Sebeden Jisu tar sisjiogunore holo, “Je mor loge judi edo sai, salen, tar nijor monjokka no gori tar kroschan buginei mor loge ejok.
40016025	Haron je tar poranan bajeibartei sai, the areibo. Hintu je mortei tar poranan arai, the tar poranan thogei pebo.
40016026	Haron ek jone goda songsaran peinei judi tar nijor poranan areile, sien tar hi lab obo? Bah tar porananor bodoli the hi dam di paribo?
40016027	Haron Munischioro Puobuo tar Babor mohimagandoi ar tar sorgo-dudtun somot ebo. Sokkene the prottiek manjiore tharar hamor doge poriskari dibogi.
40016028	Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor, iot hoiek jon thiei agonde igunottun Munischioro Puobuore tar rejjioganot ette no degon song mortak noi.”
40017001	Shoi din porendi Jisu Pitorore, Jakobore, Jakobor bhei Johonore tar loge nilo. The tharare ekkuo ojol mounot tulilogoi.
40017002	Siot tharar mujungot Jisur debo-rong phudilo. Tar muon belano dogkie joljollie olo ar tar haborani phoro dogkie dhub olo.
40017003	Ar sawh, Mosi ar Elija tharar mujungot dega dinei, Jisu loi hoda hodon.
40017004	Sebeden Pitore Jisure madelo, “Probu, ami iot thele gom obo. Tortun mone hole tinan bajei bani tortei ekkan, Mosittei ekkan ar Elijattei ekkan.”
40017005	Pitore sei hodagan horte lokke, sawh, eksak potpottie meg einei tharare dagilogi. Ar suno, megkanottun ekkuo sobdo bhar olo, “Ibie olode mor agojor Puobuo, mui tar ugure baari hujhi. Tumi tar hoda suinnio.”
40017006	Sisjiogune sei sobdobuo suninei dore madit bukpari polak.
40017007	Hintu Jisu einei ar tharare dhorinei holo, “Uduo, no doreo.”
40017008	Thara jokke seropala rini selak, Jisure bade ar huno jonore thara no degilak.
40017009	Mounnuottun thara lambegi Jisu tharare mana gorilo, “Munischioro Puobuo morattun jedogkon song jiei no ude, sedogkon song tumi degilade ien harore no hoio.”
40017010	Sisjiogune Jisuttun pujor gorilak, “Dhormo niomor mastorune Elija akke eja poribo, a hittei hon?”
40017011	Jisu tharare uttor dilo, “Elija daw hamakkai akke ebo, beg the thik gori dibogi.
40017012	Hintu mui tomare hongor, Elija daw honatto ejchie. Manjie tare no sininei, jien mone hoi sien tare gorsion. Thik siennie gori Munischioro Puobuoi tharar adot hosto pebo.”
40017013	Sebeden sisjiogune buji parilakke tharare Jisu baptisma gori die Johonor sombonde hor.
40017014	Thara jokke manuschunor jhagkuot lungilakki, ek jon manus Jisur idu einei tar mujungot adu pari salam gori porilogi.
40017015	The holo, “Probu, mor puobuore doye gor. The thadei pore ar baari hosto par. Agunot ar panit onsur pore.
40017016	Mui tare tor sisjioguno idu anniong, hintu thara gom gori no paron”
40017017	Sebeden Jisu holo, “Oh ei jugor bischias no gorsie manuschun, mui tomar loge hodog bilon theim? Hodog bilon mui tomare sahajjio gorim? Tare mor idu ano.”
40017018	Sebeden Jisu bhudtuore gobinei gurobuottun bhudtuo nigili gelo. Ar gurobuore the jogon-togon gom gori dilo.
40017019	Tar porendi sisjiogune nibirot Jisur idu einei pujor gorilakki, “Ami a hittei bhudtuore dabei di no pari?”
40017020	Jisu tharare holo, “Tomar bischiaschan nei hinottei! Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor, sigon soijjio biji para tomar bischias thele, judi tumi ei mounnuore ho, ‘Iottun jagat lor.’ Mounnuo lori pebo. Tumi begkani gori pariba.
40017021	Hintu edogkie bhud bor magana ar ubos thana darai no ole dabei dibar noi.”
40017022	Thara Galili dejot eksomare thagke, Jisu tharare holo, “Munischioro Puobuore manjior adot gojei dibar somoi oi ejchie.
40017023	Thara tare morei pheleibak. Ar tin dine tare aro jiei tuluo obo.” Sebeden sisjiogunor shanggadik mono dug olo.
40017024	Thara Kapernaumot lunginei, Mondiro hajana-tulliegune Pitoror idu einei holakki, “Tor Guruthagurbuoi Mondiro hajanaδ de ni?”
40017025	Pitore holo, “Oi, the de.” Thara jokke ghoro bidirie somilakkoi, Jisu tare akke holo, “Simon, tui hi mone goros? Pittimir rajagune hartun hajana tulon? Tharar puogunottun hajana tulon ni na oinnio jonottun tulon?”
40017026	Pitore uttor dilo, “Oinnio jonottun.” Sebeden Jisu tare holo, “Salen, puogune hajana di no pan.
40017027	Tobuio thara amare mono dug no pan para, sagorot jeinei borsi bagoi. Polim dhoribode maschuor muon hulile tui ekkuo rubuo poijieδ pebe. Sibie aninei tortei ar mortei hajana dischi.”
40018001	Sei lokke sisjiogune Jisur idu einei tartun pujor gorilakki, “Sorgo rejjiot honna begottun dangor?”
40018002	Sebeden Jisu ekkuo sigon guro tar idu daginei tharar song moiddie bojeinei holo,
40018003	“Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor, judi tumi mon phireinei sigon guro sannie no aw, huno din tumi sorgo rejjiot somi no peba.
40018004	Senottei je ei sigon gurobuo sannie niroit obo, sorgo rejjiot the begottun dangor.
40018005	Je mor nange edogkie ekkuo sigon guro lobiot gore, the more lobiot gore para obo.
40018006	Je huno ek jone edogkie ekkuo sigon gurore judi more bischias gorinei aro bischias no gore para gore, sei manuschuor ekkuo dangor sil tar gortonabuot bani dinei sagorot phelei dile tartei gom obo.
40018007	“Songsaro manuschune oinnio manuschunore pabot pelan hinottei tharar hobal purok! Sieni eneio uo poribo. Hintu jei manuschuo tharare pabot phelei tar hobal purok!
40018008	Judi tor adtane bah tor thengane tore pabot pelai, sien habi pheleis. Ononto agunanot dien ad bah dien theng somot porana darane ekkan ad bah ekkan theng neie gori jibonanot somanagan tortei gom obo.
40018009	Ar judi tor sogkuoi tore pabot pelai, sibie huei pheleis. Dibie sogkuoi norogor agunot jana darane, ekkuo sogkuoi jibonanot somanagan tortei gom obo.
40018010	“Seio, esannie ekkuo sigon guroreio aw-pela no gorsio. Mui tomare hongor, tharar sorgo-dudtune sorgot onsur mor sorgo Babor muonot sei agon.
40018011	Haron Munischioro Puobuoi ajhi jeiegun togeibartei ejchie.
40018012	“Tumi hi mone goro? Ek jon manjior ek shottuo bera-shagolottun ekkuo ajhi gelo, tar nirienobboibuo bera-shagol langelo pidit phelei jeinei ajhi jeiebuo the no togeibogoi ni na?
40018013	Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor, the judi sibie suph pheleigoi, ajhi no jande nirienobboibuo bera-shagolunttun bes sibie ugure hujhi obo.
40018014	Thik siennie gori tomar sorgo Babottun esannie sigon guro ekkuoio areibar mone no hoi.
40018015	“Judi tor bheibuoi tor biruddie pab gore, tui jeinei nibirot tar dujchan degei dischoi. Judi the tor hoda sune, salen, tor bheibuore tui jidinei phirei phelei.
40018016	Hintu judi the tor hoda no sune, tui ek jon bah di jon tor loge nejeis, senottei ‘di-tin jono shakkir hoda begkani soittio bilinei proman oi.’
40018017	Tobuio judi the tharar hoda no sune, mondolit hoi dis. Ar judi the mondolir hodaio no sune, salen, tui tare Be-jad bah, hajana-tullie dogkie bebohar goris.
40018018	Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor, ei pittimir tumi jien bondo goro, sorgotio bondo gora obo. Ar ei pittimit tumi jien huli duo, sorgotio huli die obo.
40018019	Mui tomare aro soittio hodagan hongor, jokkene ei pittimit tumi dijone ek song oinei je huno jinijottei bor mago, mor sorgo Babe sien gori dibo.
40018020	Haron mor nange jiot dijon bah tin jon eksomare thubeile, siot mui tharar loge agong.”
40018021	Sokkene Pitore Jisur idu einei pujor gorilogi, “Probu, mor bheie mor ugure oborad gorilie, tare mui hoi bar mab dim? Sat bar song ni na?”
40018022	Jisu tare holo, “Mui tore hongor, bana sat bar noi hintu huttur huttur gori sat bar mab goris.
40018023	Sorgo rejjiogan olode edogkie: Ek jon rajai tar sagorsiegunottun ijeb selo.
40018024	Ijeb sade, tar idu ek jon sagorsie anilak. Sei sagorsiebuoi tare dos azar talenδ di pai.
40018025	The sujhi no paribo hinottei, tar horojchun ujol goribartei tar malikkuoi tare, tar mog-puo ar tar agede sieni somot bejibartei ugum dilo.
40018026	Sebeden sagorsiebuoi rajar mujungot bukpari salam gori porinei holo, ‘Doye gorinei more somoi de, mui tore begkun sujhim.’
40018027	Sebeden sagorsiebuor malikkuottun tare shanggadik sit purilo. Tar horojchun mab dinei tare iri dilo.
40018028	Hintu sei sagorsiebuoi jeinei tar dogkie sagorsei tare ek shot denariδ di paidie sibiere lagot pelo. Tare noroli sibi dhorinei holo, ‘More di paschie igun de.’
40018029	Sibiei tar thengot purinei tartun bikkie magilo, ‘Doye gorinei more somoi de, mui tore begkun sujhim.’
40018030	Hintu the mab no dilo. The jeinei tar horojchun sujhi phuroi song tare jiel-hanat bhorei thologoi.
40018031	Oinnio sagorsiegune sien deginei tharar baari monot dug lagilo. Ar thara jeinei tharar malikkuore begkani holakkoi.
