40018032	Sebeden malikkuoi sei sagorsiebuore daginei holo, ‘Pazi sagorsie tui! Tui mab maginei mui tor beg horojchun mab duong.
40018033	Hintu mui tore jingori doye gorsiong tuio sengori tor dogkie sagorsiebuoreo doye gorana osit elode noi ni?’
40018034	Ar tar malikkuottun rak udi, tare di paidie sigun begkun sujhi phuroi song sasti goriegunor adot tare gojei dilo.
40018035	Judi tomar ontorottun tomar bheiunor oboradtani mab no duo, mor sorgo Babpuoio thik sedogkie gori tomare goribuo.”
40019001	Ar edogkie olo, Jisu sei hodagan hoi phureinei Galili dejchan phelei jei Jordan Sora uhuledi Judea dejot lungilogi.
40019002	Jhag-jhag manus tar pune-pune jeion. Siot tharare the gom goreie.
40019003	Ar Pharisigune Jisur idu einei tare joga sebartei tare holakki, “Ek jon manjie tar mogkuore je huno harone sari dibar niomot age nahi?”
40019004	Jisu uttor dilo, “Adi purbe Itchiore ‘tharare milie ar morod gori baneie’ sien tumi madei no so?
40019005	Senottei daw ‘Morodtuoi tar bab-magun phelei jei tar mogkuoloi egottor obogoi. Ar thara di jone ekkan heye obak.’
40019006	Senottei thara di jon noi ar hintu ekkan heye olak. Senottei Itchiore jien joragori di die, sien manjie pharok no gortok.”
40019007	Thara Jisure holak, “Salen, a hittei Mosi shur hagos dinei mog sari dibar ugum die?”
40019008	Jisu tharare holo, “Tumi akkol han hinottei mog sari dibar tomare Mosi onumoti dede ai. Hintu adi purbettun duri edogkie no elo.
40019009	Mui tomare hongor: Je tar mogkuoi oinnio jonloi shanda no gorsie gori sari dinei ar the oinnio milie loi, tar puron mogkuor biruddie biebijier obo. Ar je sei sari die miliebuore loi, tareo biebijier obo.”
40019010	Tar sisjiogune tare holak, “Judi neg-mogor sere sedogkie obosta ole, lo-li no onagan bhala.”
40019011	Jisu tharare holo, “Begkune ei hodagan maniloi no paron. Bana jigunore die oie sigune maniloi paron.
40019012	Hoiek jon gorbhottun duri nomonshuk than. Ar hoiek jon nomonshuk oineio than. Ar hoiek jon sorgo rejjiottei thara nijere-nije nomonshuk oineio than. Je ei hodagan maniloi pare, the mani lok.”
40019013	Sokkene manjie sigon sigon guro Jisur idu sigunor mada ugure ad tuli dinei bor magi dibartei anilak. Hintu sisjiogune sei manuschunore aw-hoda holak.
40019014	Hintu Jisu holo, “Sigon gurogunore mor idu ebartei duo, tharare mana no gorsio. Haron sorgo rejjiogan olode ei sigon guroguno dogkien.”
40019015	Sigon gurogunore ugure ad tuli denar porendi Jisu siottun gelogoi.
40019016	Ar sawh, ek jon manus Jisur idu einei hologi, “Gom guruthagur, ononto jibon pebartei mor hi gom ham gora poribo?”
40019017	Jisu tare holo, “Tui a hittei more gom hole? Itchior bade ekjono gom nei ar. Hintu tui judi jibonanot somibar sas, shilegun paleis.”
40019018	Manuschuoi tare holo, “Hon shilegun?” Sebeden Jisu holo, “ ‘Hun no goris,’ ‘shanda no goris,’ ‘sur no goris,’ ‘mijie shakki no dis.’
40019019	‘Tor bab magunore sorman goris,’ ‘Tui nijore-nije hos paschie sannie, tor paralliegunoreio hos peis.’ ”
40019020	Gabur-morodtuoi Jisure holo, “Gaburottun duri sei beg ugumani mui palei ejongor. Mor aro hi goribar bagi age?”
40019021	Jisu tare holo, “Tui judi puripunnuo obar sas, ja tor hi-hi age sieni bejinei tengagunδ gorib dugkiere degoi. Sebeden sorgot tor dhon thebo. Tar porendi einei mor pune-pune eis.”
40019022	Hintu sei hodagan gabursiebuoi suninei, the monot dug peinei gelogoi. Haron tartun onek dhon-sompotti age.
40019023	Sebeden Jisu tar sisjiogunore holo, “Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor, thagoie manjiortei sorgo rejjiot somana aghattie age!
40019024	Mui aro tomare hongor: Ekjon dhoni manus Itchioror rejjioganot somana darane ekkuo uth sujor pajidi sominei nigili janagan bes utchuo.”
40019025	Sisjiogune ei hodagan suninei thara shanggadik amok oinei holak, “Salen, honna mukti pebo?”
40019026	Jisu tharare rini seinei holo, “Manjiortei aw-sombob hintu Itchiorottei begkani sombob.”
40019027	Sebeden Pitore Jisure holo, “Sah, ami beg phelei einei tor loge elong. Salen, ami hi pebong ar?”
40019028	Jisu tharare holo, “Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor, nuo jugkuot jokke Munischioro Puobuoi tar oborug singasonanot bobo. Sokkene tumi mor pune-pune ebade siguneo barogan singasonot boinei Israelo baro jadore bijier goriba.
40019029	Ar je mortei ghor-duor, bhei-bon, bab-ma, mog-puo, ar jaga-jobin phelei eje the ek shot dunuo pebo, ononto jibonio pebo.
40019030	Hintu onek manus akkuol oi agonde sigun jer poribak, ar jero sigun akkuol obakkoi.
40020001	“Haron sorgo rejjiogan olode edogkie: Ekjon jagar giroje tar anggur baganot ham gora bajei dibartei beinnie poittie manus toga gelo.
40020002	Dine ek denariδ hamgoriegunore bedon the dibartei thik gorinei tar baganot tharare ham goribartei dipadelo.
40020003	Perai bennie tin ghonta somoiot the aro ath-holat gelo. Siot hoiek jon manus hitchu ham no gorsie gori thiei agonde the degilo.
40020004	The tharare holo, ‘Tumio mor angguro baganot jeinei ham gorogoi. Mui tomare thik bedon dim.’ Sebeden tharaio gelak.
40020005	Dibursie ar beillie tin porsie the aro jeinei sedogkie gorilogoi.
40020006	Beillie pastai the jeinei oinnio hoiek jon hitchu ham no gorsie gori thiei agonde deginei tharare holo, ‘Tumi iot a hittei hitchu ham no gorsie gori goda dinnu thiei agogi?’
40020007	Thara tare holak, ‘Amare huno jone gabur no lon huttun.’ Ar the tharare holo, ‘Tumio mor anggur baganot jeinei ham gorogoi. Tumi thik bedon peba.’
40020008	Bellie oinei angguro baganano girojchuoi tar sompotti rakkolibuore holo, ‘Ham goriegunore daginei bedon de. Bego jerobuottun duri arambo gorinei polimmuo song dis.’
40020009	Bellie pastattun duri ham gorsionde sigune einei ek denaritδ dore pelak.
40020010	Akke hamot jeiegune einei bes pebak bili asha gorsion. Hintu tharaio ek denaritδ dore pelak.
40020011	Jogon thara bedon lolak, thara girojchiore bodnam gora arambo gorilak.
40020012	Thara holak, ‘Ei begottun jere ham goriegune daw bana ek ghonta ham gorsion. Ami goda dinnuo rodot ham gorilong, hintu tui amare thara jogai bedon dilede!’
40020013	The tharar ek jonore uttor dilo, ‘Bhai, mui tore oinniei no gorong daw. Tui ek denariloiδ ham goribar raji oioschie noi ni?
40020014	Tor bedon loinei jagoi. Tore jingori diong, jere ham goriegunoreio sei doge dibar mor mone hor.
40020015	Mor nijor tengaloiδ mui jien gortung sat noi ni? Nahi mui doyeli hinottei tui pijhum goror?’
40020016	Thik siennie gori, jero sigun akke obakkoi, ar akke oi agonde sigun jer poribak.”
40020017	Jisu Jerusalem sohor song jadte lokke podot tar sisjiogunore ek huredi ninei tharare holo,
40020018	“Suno, ami Jerusalem song jeir. Sidu Munischioro Puobuore rajguruthagurunor ar dhormo niomor mastorunor adot gojei die obo. Thara tare dujot pelanar porendi tar moribar dorkar bili thik goribak.
40020019	Ar sebeden thara Be-jadtunor adot tare gojei dibag. Thatta goribak, sabukkoi maribak ar Krosot dibag. Ar tin dino madad the aro jiei udibo.”
40020020	Sokkene Jebedior mogkuo tar puogundoi Jisur idu elo. The Jisur mujungot bukpari salam gori porinei tartun ekkan jinij magilo.
40020021	Jisu tartun pujor gorilo, “Tui hi sas?” Ar the holo, “Mor ei dibie puo tor denedi ekjon bangedi ek jon tor rejjiot boji paron para ugum de.”
40020022	Jisu holo, “Tumi magilade ien tumi hobor no po. Mui heimbe golojchuottun tumi hei pariba parapang? Mui lombe baptismagandoi tumi baptisma oi pariba parapang?” Thara tare holak, “Ami paribong.”
40020023	Jisu tharare holo, “Mor golojchuottun tumi hamakkai heba, ar mui lombe baptismagan tumi loba. Hintu mor denedi ok, mor bangedi ok bojeibar mor odhihar nei. Mor Babe jigunottei banedie sigune bojibak.”
40020024	Jokkene oinnio dos jone ien sunilak, thara di bheior ugure rak olak.
40020025	Hintu Jisu tharare tar idu daginei holo, “Tumi hobor pode Be-jadtune sason goronde sigunor odhihari on ar tharar murubbigune sigunor ugure ugum salei ni paron.
40020026	Hintu tomar moiddie siennie no obo. Je tomar moiddiettun dangor obar sai, the tomar sagorsie uo poribo.
40020027	Ar je tomar moiddiettun bego dangorbuo obar sai, the tomar banidaji uo poribo.
40020028	Thik sedogkie gori Munischioro Puobuoio manjiortun ham hebartei no eje, hintu the manjiore ham gori dibartei ar onek manjior muktir dam ijebe tar poranan dibartei ejchie.”
40020029	Jisu ar tar sisjiogun Jerikko sohorottun jade, jhag-jhag manus tharar pune-pune jadon.
40020030	Sawh, di jon han manus podo pazarat boji thagode, Jisu sei podtanodi jar bili suninei thara jogar pari-pari holak, “Probu, Davidor Puobuo, amare doye gor!”
40020031	Manuschune tharare jhaji dinei tharare sub gori thebartei holak. Hintu thara sie bes jogar pari-pari holak, “Probu, Davidor Puobuo, amare doye gor!”
40020032	Jisu mow oinei tharare daginei holo, “Mui tomartei hi gori didung tomartun mone hoi?”
40020033	Thara uttor dilak, “Probu, ami degi para amattun mone hoi.”
40020034	Sebeden Jisuttun tharare sit purinei tharar sogkun dhori dilo. Jogon-togon tharar sogkun gom oinei tar pune-pune gelak.
40021001	Thara Jerusalemot lungibar hadallie Bethphage ada-manot lungilakki. Sebeden Oliv Mounnuor hai hurettun Jisu tar di jon sisjio padeilo.
40021002	Jisu tharare holo, “Tomar mujungedi adamanot jo. Tumi jebaio ekkuo gadha ar ekkuo gadha shawh bannie gori debagoi. Sigun hueinei mor idu anogoi.
40021003	Ar judi huno jone tomare hon, tumi tharare hoio, ‘Probur igun lagodon,’ the aro jhadi gori idu thoidie bajei dibo.”
40021004	Siendoi munibuor darai huo oiede hodagan puron olo.
40021005	“Zaion jhibore hogoi, ‘Sah, tor Rajabuo tor idu gadha ugure sorinei ejer. The olode nombro oinei dut heie gadha shawh ugure sorinei ejer.’ ”
40021006	Senottei, sisjiogune jeienei, Jisu tharare ugum dede doge gorilakkoi.
40021007	Thara gadhabuo ar gadha shawhbuo aninei tharar haborani sigunor ugure bijei dilak. Sebeden Jisure sienir ugure bojeilak.
40021008	Ar shagor manjie tharar haborani podot bijei dilak. Ar hoiek jone gajottun dhela habi aninei podot bijei dilakki.
40021009	Sebeden Jisur mujungedi jadonde sigune ar pijendittun ettonde sigune joi jogar pari-pari holak, “Davidor Puobuore hosanna! ‘PROBUR nange eiebuo donniobad gori thok!’ Begottun ugure hosanna!”
40021010	Jisu Jerusalem sohorot somineigoi, beg manuschun joul bodilak. Thara pujor gorton, “Ibie honna?”
40021011	Manuschune holak, “The muni Jisu, Galili dejor Nazareth hullie.”
40021012	Sebeden Jisu Itchioror Mondirbuot sominei, siot beja-hine goronde sigunore dabei dilo. Tengaδ bodoli duonde sigunor tebilani ar hodor bejiegune bojonde jagagani the ullei phelei dilo.
40021013	Jisu tharare holo, “Sastrot lega age, ‘Mor ghoran bor magede ghor huo obo.’ Hintu tumi ienore ‘dagedor haath’ banei phellio.”
40021014	Sebeden han ar leng Mondirot tar idu elak, ar the tharare gom gori die.
40021015	Hintu rajguruthagurune ar dhormo niomor mastorune tar amok hamani deginei ar Mondirot gurogune, “Davidor Puobuore hosanna,” hode suninei, tharattun rak udilo.
40021016	Sebeden thara Jisure holak, “Ei gurogune hi hodon tui sunor ni?” Jisu tharare holo, “Sunongor daw! Sastroie hi hoie sien tumi madei no sawh? ‘Sigon guro ar hujhi guro muottun tumi puripunnuo baini peba.’ ”
40021017	Sei porendi, Jisu tharare phelei jei sohorottun nigili jei Bethani adamot jeinei bha roiegoi.
40021018	Tar hellie beinnie the sohoranot phiri jade lokkene Jisuttun ped puri udilo.
40021019	Podor hure the ekkuo dumur gaj deginei the gajchuor siot gelo. Hintu the bana padagani bade ar hitchu no deginei gajchuore holo, “Tor huno din gulo no dorto ar.” Ar jogon-togon dumur gajchuo shugei gelo.
40021020	Sisjiogune sien deginei thara amok oinei holak, “Dumur gajchuo edok jhadi a hingori shugei gelo?”
40021021	Sebeden Jisu tharare uttor dinei holo, “Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor, tumi judi bischias goro ar tomar monot shiongshama no thai, salen, bana dumur gajchuore gori paribade noi, hintu ei murobuore judi tumi ho, ‘Uguri jeinei sagorot polloi.’ Salen, sien obo.
40021022	Ar tumi judi bischias gele, tumi jien bor mago sien peba.”
40021023	Jisu aro Mondirot somilogoi. The sigkie dede seiet, rajguru-thagurune ar borjonune einei tare holakki, “Ieni hi odhihare tui goror? Honna tore ei odhiharan die?”
40021024	Hintu Jisu tharare uttor dinei holo, “Muio tomare ekkan prosonno dorim. Tumi judi more uttor duo, ieni hi odhihare mui gorongor mui tomare hom.
40021025	Johonor baptismagan huttun? Sien hi sorgottun nahi, manjiortun?” Thara-thara huobula gorte holak, “Ami judi hoi, ‘Sorgottun’ salen, the hobo, ‘A hittei tumi tare bischias no goro?’
40021026	Hintu judi ami hoi, ‘Manjiortun’ sio, ami jonogonore dorei. Haron beg manuschune Johonore ek jon muni bili mani loion.”
40021027	Senottei thara Jisure uttor dinei holak, “Ami hobor no pei.” Sebeden Jisu tharare holo, “Ieni hi odhihare mui gorong muio tomare no hom.”
40021028	“Hintu tumi hi mone goro? Ek jonottun dibie puo agon. The tar polim puobuo sidu jeinei holo, ‘Put, edchie tui mor angguro bagananot jeinei ham gorloi.’
40021029	Puobuoi holo, ‘Mui no jeim.’ Hintu porendi the mon phireinei hamot gelo.
40021030	The a ekkuo puo sidu jeinei sei hodagan hologoi. puobuoi tare holo, ‘Oh ba, mui jeim.’ Hintu the no gelo.
40021031	Sei di jonottun honna tar babor hoda dorilo sei?” Thara Jisure uttor dilak, “Polimmuoi ai.” Jisu tharare holo, “Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor, hajana-tulliegune ar beischie miliegune tomartun akke Itchioro rejjioganot somibag.
40021032	Haron Johone dharmio podtan degei dibartei tomar idu ejchie, ar tumi tare bischias no goro. Hintu hajana-tulliegune ar beischie miliegune tare bischias gorsion. Ien tumi deganar porendio tomar monani no phiro ar tare bischias no goro.
40021033	“Aro ekkan tulona hoda suno. Ek jon giroje ekkan anggur bagan tulilo. The bagananor sero-hitte tengera beri dilo. The angguro ros perebartei ekkan ghani-hol bojeibartei ekkuo gat hurilo. Ar subi dibartei tong ekkan banilo. Sebeden the hoiek jon hed goriere tar anggur baganan daw-bhagi denar porendi the bi-dejot gelo.
40021034	Anggur sinibar okto oinei, the tar bhagkuo anibalottei tar sagorsiegunore hed goriegunor sidu padeilo.
40021035	Hed goriegune tar sagorsiegunore dhorinei dhori, ek jonore marsion, ek jon morei phellion ar ek dagire sil mela duon.
40021036	Girojchuoi polimmunottun bes aro tar sagorsie dipadelo. Hed goriegune tharareo siennie gorilak.
40021037	Sebeden bego jere tar puobuore thara sidu dipadelo. The holo, ‘Thara mor puobuore sorman goribak.’
40021038	Hintu hed goriegune puobuore deginei thara-thara huobula gorton, ‘Ete daw porendi sompottir girojchuo obo. Jei, ami tare morei pheleioi. Sebeden ami ei bagananor giroj obong.’
40021039	Sebeden thara tare dhorinei dhori baganor barendi phelei dinei morei pheleilak.
40021040	Salen Baganor girojchuo ele, sei hed goriegunore hi goribogi sei?”
40021041	Thara Jisure holak, “The sei dujto manuschunore, begkunore morei pheleibogi ar tar baganan oinnio hed goriegunore daw-bhagi dibogi. Sigune tare okto mozim phol bhag dibag.”
40021042	Jisu tharare holo, “Ien tumi Sastrot no mado ni na? ‘Ghor-tulliegunor monot no porede silluo, hunot begottun gunor silluo olo. Ien PROBUIE gori dilo, amar ien sade hodog shoba lage!’
40021043	“Senottei mui tomare hongor, Itchiore rejjiogan tomartun hari loinei phol utponno gori parede jadtuore die obo.
40021044	Ar je sei silluo ugure pore, the guri oi jebo. Ar sei silluo jar ugure pore, the phagu oi jebo.”
40021045	Rajguruthagurune ar Pharisigune tar tulona hodagan suninei buji parilakke the tharar sombonde hor.
40021046	Thara Jisure dhoribar selak. Hintu jonogone Jisure ek jon muni bili mani loion hinottei thara jonogonore dorelak.
40022001	Ar Jisu uttor dinei tulona hodaloi manuschunore aro holo,
40022002	“Sorgo rejjiogan olode edogkie: Ek jon rajai tar puobuottei mela-meitban gorer.
40022003	Ar senottei tar boleie gorbagun dagibartei, the tar dajigunore dipadelo. Hintu manuschunor ek jonoro ebar mone no holo.
40022004	Sebeden the aro oinnio jon daji dipadelo. The tharare holo, ‘mui boleiongge gorbagunore hogoi, “Suno, mui ikkie bhat sara gorsiong. Bor damara goru ar pokta-pokta poshugun habinei jugol gorsiong. Senottei meitbanot ejo.” ’
40022005	Hintu thara hono jone hando no gorinei tharar nijor-nijor hamot gelak. Ek jone tar hedot gelo, ar ek dagie tharar bebaro jagat gelak.
40022006	Ar ek dagie siot elakke sigune dajigunore dhorinei thajei marinei morei pheleilak.
40022007	Jokkene rajai sien sunilo, the sei manuschunor ugure asarjio rak olo. Sebeden, tar sonniogunore sien gorsionde manuschunore nas gorinei tharar adamanio puri phelei dibartei the dipadelo.
40022008	Sebeden rajai tar dajigunore holo, ‘Bhat sara olo. Hintu mui boleiongge gorbagun ebar lak noi.
40022009	Senottei podo dojorot jo, manus jare degogoi tharare melat bhat hebartei dagi anogoi.’
40022010	Ar sei dajigune podot jeinei jigun degkuondoi sigun gom bojong manus, thara mela ghoranot boron gori thubeilakki. Sigune bhat hebartei bojilakki.
40022011	“Hintu jokkene melat bhat hebartei boi agonde sigunore sebartei rajai mela ghorot somilogi, mela pojak no ursie ek jon manus the degilo.
40022012	Ar rajai sei manuschuore holo, ‘Bhai, a hingori tui iot mela pojak no ursie gori sommoschi?’ Hintu sei manuschuoi madi no parilo.
40022013	Sebeden rajai dajigunore holo, ‘Tare adhot-thengot baninei barendi andhar jagat phelei duogoi. Siot the dad hamere-hamere hanibo.’
40022014	Haronan olode edogkie, Itchiore dagkie manuschun olakke ektal. Hintu bei tullie manuschun olakke gulodok gori.”
40022015	Sebeden Pharisigune nigili jeinei Jisure tar hodat tare phajeibartei huobula gorilak.
40022016	Sebeden tharar sisjiogun ar Herodor manuschun somot Jisur sidu dipadenei, sigune Jisure holak, “Guruthagur, tui soittio manus ar jodepode gori Itchioro hoda tui sigkie dede harore no dhoraschie ami hobor pei.” Haron tui manjior barendi ien no sas.
40022017	Senottei, tui amare ho, tui ien henjan bujos? Niomor doge Kaisarore ami hajana diduong ne no diduong?”
40022018	Hintu Jisu tharar bojong monani hobor peinei tharare holo, “Oh phagaragun! A hittei more joga sor?
40022019	Manjie hajana duonde poijiebuoδ More degogi.” Sebeden thara ek denariδ tare dilakki
40022020	Jisu tharare holo, “Ibie har subhi, ar iot har nang legkie age?”
40022021	Sebeden thara uttor dinei holak, “Sibie daw Kaisaror.” Ar Jisu tharare holo, “Kaisaror jinijchani Kaisarore duo, ar Itchioror jinijchani Itchiorore duo.”
40022022	Jokkene thara sieni sunilak, thara amok oinei, tare phelei jeinei siottun gelakkoi.
40022023	Ei sei dinnie, Saddukigune, jiei uduonagan nei honde sigune Jisur idu einei tartun pujor gorinei,
40022024	Jisure holak, “Guruthagur, Mosi hoiede judi hono jone bongso no peie gori mori gele, sei manuschuor guro bheibuoi tar boschuore loinei tar bheibuottei bongso rokkie gori douk.
40022025	Amar loge sedogkie sat bhei elak. Begottun bor bheibuoi mog loinei mori jeie. Hintu the huno bongso no peie gori the tar guro bheibuore tar mogkuo phelei di gelo.
40022026	Sedogkie gorinei tar di lombor ar tin lombor guro bheibuo loinei ar eksottie gori tharar boschuore sat bheie lolak.
40022027	Sei sat bheie mori janar porendi, sei rani-miliebuoi bego jere mori gelo.
40022028	Senottei, jiei udibagke lokkene, sei sat bheior moiddiettun the har mog obo? Haron begkune tare loion.”
40022029	Jisu tharare uttor dinei holo, “Sastrogan ar Itchioro hemodagano no bujinei tomar bhul oie.
40022030	Haron jiei udibagke lokkene thara neg-mog thedak noi ar. Thara neg-mogo lodak noi ar hintu thara sorgot Itchioro sorgo-dudtuno dogkie obak.
40022031	Hintu moragun jiei uduonar sombonde Itchiore tomare hi hoie, tumi sien madei no sawh?
40022032	“Itchiore hoiede, ‘Mui Abrahamor Itchior, Isaakor Itchior, ar Jakobor Itchior.’ Itchiorbuo daw moragunor Itchior noi, hintu the olode jedagunor Itchior.”
40022033	Manuschune sei sigkiegan suninei thara asarjio amok olak.
40022034	Hintu jokkene Saddukigune Jisur mujungot juob dibar haidie no peinei olor oion bili Pharisigune sunilak, thara eksomare thubeilak.
40022035	Tharar moiddiettun ek jon Niom hobor peiei, Jisure joga sebartei pujor gorilo,
40022036	“Guruthagur, Niomor moiddiettun begottun dangor ar gunor siliebuo hubo?”
40022037	Jisu tare uttor dinei holo, “ ‘Tor PROBU Itchiorbuore tor goda ontorandoi, tor goda aptabuoloi ar goda tor monandoi, tui hos pei pebe.’
40022038	Sibie olode polim begottun dangor ar gunor siliebuo.
40022039	Ar di lombor dangor uguman olode ien, ‘Tore tui hos paschie dogkie tor paralliegunoreio hos pa poribo.’
40022040	Sei dibie siliet beg niom ar beg munigunor hodagani pureie.”
40022041	Jokkene Pharisigun eksomare thubeilak. Jisu tharattun pujor gorilo,
40022042	“Kristo sombonde tumi hi mone goro? The har Puo?” Thara Jisure uttor dinei holak, “The olode Davidor Puo.”
40022043	The tharare holo, “Sedogkie ole, Davide a hittei Apta darai hode seiet tare ‘Probu’ hoie? Haron Davide legkiede sieni mui pujor gorongor.
40022044	The hoie, ‘PROBUIE, mor Probure hoie, “Tor sottrugun jedogkon song, tor thengot tole no thong, sedogkon song mor denedi boji thak.” ’
40022045	Senottei, Davide judi tare ‘Probu,’ dagilie, hingori the tar Puo oi pare?”
40022046	Jisur hodagan huno jone uttor di no parilak. Siottun durinei huno jone tartun pujor goribar sedame no hulelo ar.
40023001	Sebeden Jisu manjior jhagkuore ar tar sisjiogunore holo,
40023002	“Dhormo niomor mastorunore ar Pharisigunore Mosir odhiharo jaganot bojon.
40023003	Senottei, thara jieni hon sieni begkani gorsio ar dorsio. Hintu thara jieni goron sieni tumi no gorsio. Haron thara hode hon, hintu thara hitchu ham no goron.
40023004	Haron thara nijore-nije guor bugi banenei, manjiore bugei duon. Hintu thara bugibar ole, tharar ekkuo angulo no laran.
40023005	Manjie tharare debartei thara beg hamani goron. Haron tharar tabittun dangor goron ar tharar haboro judogun birat-birat gori tangan.
40023006	Haana-meitbanot begottun gom jaga ar synagogot, tharattun bojibar begottun moillioban jaga porane mage.
40023007	Ar ade-bazare manjiortun tharar salam hebar mone hoi. Manjie jene tharare ‘Robbi, Robbi,’ hon para tharattun mone hoi.
40023008	Hintu tomare manjie ‘Robbi’ dagon para gori no thagkuo. Haron tomartun ek jon Guruthagur age, ar sibie olode Kristo. Ar tumi begkun olade bhei.
40023009	Ei pittimit harore ba no dagko. Haron tomar Bab olode ekkuo gori, sorgot agede sibie.
40023010	Ar manjie tomare mastor no hodok. Haron tomartun ek jon gori guruthagur age, sibie olode Kristo.
40023011	Hintu tomar moiddiettun bego dangorbuo obode tomar sagorsiebuo.
40023012	Je nijore-nije dangor holai, tare niroit gora obo, ar je nijore-nije niroit gore, tare dangor gora obo.
40023013	“Oh phagara dhormo niomor mastorun ar Pharisigun, tomar hobal puribo! Haron manjiortei sorgo rejjioganor duoran bondo goridio, ar tumi nijeio no somo. Ar manjie somodondoidie sigunoreo somibartei no duo.
40023014	Oh phagara dhormo niomor mastorun ar Pharisigun, tomar hobal puribo! Haron tumi rani-milieguno ghorani hari lo. Barendi degebartei lamba-lamba gori bor mago. Senottei tumi shanggadik sasti peba.”
40023015	“Oh phagara dhormo niomor mastorun ar Pharisigun, tomar hobal puribo! Haron, tumi ek jon jadot bhoreibartei, thogeibartei muro ar sagoro uguredi bero. Jokkene tumi jadot bhoreibaδ, sei manuschuore tomartun di dunuo norogor agunot tumi tare pelo.
40023016	“Oh han murubbigun, tomar hobal purok! Haron tumi hode, ‘Mondirbuo shakki gori sobot hele hitchu noi. Judi Mondirbuor sonagani dhorinei sobot hele, tar sobottanot the bana jebo.’
40023017	Oh han behuppun! Hubon bes mollioban, sonagan bes mollio nahi, sonagan pobitro gori dede Mondirbuo bes mollioban?
40023018	Ar tumi hode, ‘Ek jone judi palliengan dhori sobot hele hitchu noi. Hintu ek jone judi palliegano ugure jinijchani dhorinei sobot hele tar sobottanot the bana jebo.’
40023019	Oh han behuppun! Hubon bes mollioban, dali dibar jinijchani nahi, dalibuo pobitro gori dede palliengan?
40023020	Senottei, je palliengan dhorinei sobot hai, the palliengan, ar palliengano ugure beg jinijchani dhorinei sobot hai.
40023021	Ar je mondirbuo dhorinei sobot hai, the mondirbuo ar mondirbuot thaidie sibie dhorinei sobot hai.
40023022	Ar je sorgo shakki gorinei sobot hai, the Itchioro singasonan ar siot bojede sibiere dhorineio sobot hai.
40023023	“Oh phagara dhormo niomor mastorun ar Pharisigun, tomar hobal puribo! Haron tumi lungphul, pudina ar jirie dos bhagor ek bhag dan goro. Hintu tumi niomor dorkari hodagani jieni olode, soittio bijieran, doyegan ar bischiaschan bad duo. Oinnio hamani no gorsie gori phelei no jeinei ieni tomar gorana osit elo.
40023024	Oh han murubbigun! Tumi pugigun shaginei uttuon gilor.
40023025	“Oh phagara dhormo niomor mastorun ar Pharisigun, tomar hobal puribo! Haron tumi goloj ar bajon-hodora barendi shap goro. Hintu bidirendi ien olode lube ar aw-dharmigkoi boron.
40023026	Oh han Pharisigun! Bajon-hodoragun akke bidirendi dhoio na, barendio poriskar on para.
40023027	“Oh phagara dhormo niomor mastorun ar Pharisigun, tomar hobal puribo! Haron tumi olade gour dhub-dhub gori hos-sorei duonde dogkie barendi sele doul, hintu bidirendi sele, bana mora manjior aar, ar gin gore para.
40023028	Thik sedogkie gori, tumio manjior samne ugure-ugure degte dharmig, hintu bidirendi ole phagaraloi ar niom saraloi boron oi ago.
40023029	“Oh phagara dhormo niomor mastorun ar Pharisigun, tomar hobal puribo! Haron tumi munigunottei guor bano ar dharmig manjiortei sojanhola doul gorinei shajo.
40023030	Ar tumi horte, ‘Judi amar buro-burigunor amolot ami thedong, sei munigunore lo phelei denat ami no mijeilongun.’
40023031	Senottei, munigun hun gorsionde sigunor puogun tumi bili tumi nijore-nije shakki ola.
40023032	Salen, tomar buro-burigune gorsionde sien purei duo.
40023033	Oh bijollo sabpun, ar bijollo sabor bongsogun! Norogo agunot poribagoidie bijieranor sastiganottun tumi hingori sari pariba?
40023034	Senottei suno, mui tomar idu muni-gyeni ar dhormo niomor mastorun dipadei dim. Tumi tharare ek dagire morei pheleiba ar ek dagire krosot diba. Ar tumi ek dagire synagogot mariba, ar ek dagire sohore-sohore uttiesar goriba.
40023035	Senottei pittimit beg dharmig manjior lo porsiede sienir beg dujchani tomar ugure poribo, dharmig manus Abelor lo phelei denattun duri Barakor puobuo Zekariare lo phelei dena song, jare tumi mondir ar palliengano sere hun gorsio.
40023036	Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor, begkani ikkie jugor manuschunor ugure lungibogi.
40023037	“Oh Jerusalem, Oh Jerusalem, munigun morei pheleiebuo, ar Itchiore tor idu dipadai die sigunore sil mela dinei morei pheleiebuo! Shorma huruoi shawhgun duot tole ragaidie dogkie gori aja gorinei rageibartei mui tor puogun onsur hodog rageibar seiong. Hintu sien tomar mone no hoi.
40023038	Sawh, tomar ghorani tomartei hali oi gelo.
40023039	Haron mui tomare hongor, jedogkon song no ho, ‘PROBUR nange ejchiede sibie baini oinei thok,’ sedogkon song tumi more no degiba.”
40024001	Sebeden Jisu Mondirbuottun nigili jadte lokkene tar sisjiogune Mondirbuor dalanani tare degei dibartei elak.
40024002	Jisu tharare uttor dinei holo, “Tumi ieni begkani no degor? Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor, tumi degotte sei soga-sok sillun ekkuoio soga-sok gori thedak noi. Thara beg soga-sok sillun lugimari phelei dibag.”
40024003	Sei porendi, Oliv mounnuot Jisu boji thagke, tar sisjiogune nibirot tar sidu einei Tartun pujor gorilakki, “Homole sieni ghodi jebo, tui amare ho? Tui ebede lokkene hi sinno thebo ar jugor sejot hi sinno thebo?”
40024004	Sebeden, Jisu tharare uttor dinei holo, “Huno jone tomare thogei no paron para uijkare thagkuo.
40024005	Haron onek jone mor nange einei hobakki, ‘Mui deie Kristo.’ Ar thara onek jonore thogeibakki.
40024006	Ar tumi judduor hobor suniba, judduor hoda mue-mue gorte suniba. Hintu sieniloi tumi bhokkol no heio. Haron sieni begkani hamakkai ghodi ja poribo. Hintu tobuio jugor thuman edo noi.
40024007	Haron ek jade oinnio jador biruddie obak, ar ek rejjioi oinnio rejjior biruddie judduo goribak. Jagai-jagai bhadorad poribo, bhujol bebo ar aw-sin ruk biedi jormeibo.
40024008	Sieni begkani guro ode ped pirie gorede dogkie gori arambo obo.
40024009	Sokkene tomare dug-hosto dibartei manjiore dhora bajei dibag ar tomare morei pheleibak. Mor nanganottei beg jador manjie tomare hos no pebak.
40024010	Ar Sokkene onek jone bischiaschan phelei dinei, ek jone oinnio jonore dhora bajei diedi goribak, ar bis dega-degi obak.
40024011	Ar onek bhes dhorsie muni nigilinei, onek jonore thogeibak.
40024012	Niom saragan bari jebo hinottei, onek jonor hospanagan jurei jebo.
40024013	Hintu je thumsong thori thei paribo, tare uddhar gora obo.
40024014	Beg jadtuno sidu shakki ijebe ei Itchioro rejjior gom hoboran goda songsarot prosar gora obo. Sei porendi jugor thuman ebo.
40024015	“Senottei, muni Daniele hoi jeiede, ‘Itchiore bis degede nas goriebuoi’ pobitro jaganot thieibogi.” (Je ien madai the orthogan buji lok.)
40024016	“Sokkene Judea dejot agonde sigune moununot dhei jadok.
40024017	Je salo ugure thebo, ghoro bidiriettun hono poja nigilei anibartei the no lamokki.
40024018	Je hedot thebo, the tar haboran anibartei phiri no jok.
40024019	“Hintu sokkene pedoli miliegunor ar hujhi pormagunor hobal puribo!
40024020	Tumi dhei jei pebade dinnuo jarhallie bah, Jireni Dinnuot no oi para bor mago.
40024021	Haron, sokkene edogkie dongor uttiesar obo, jien pittimigan sristi oiede siottun duri ejosong ekbaro lagot pa no oi, ar huno din sedogkie noio obo.
40024022	Sei dinnun judi Itchiore homei no diduo, huno jonor bajibar no thelun. Hintu Itchiore bei tulliede sigunottei, sei dinun homei die obo.
40024023	Sei lokkene, huno jone judi tomare hon, ‘Sawh, iot Kristo age,’ bah, ‘Siot age,’ sien bischias no gorsio.
40024024	Haron Sokkene nogoli kristo ar nogoli muni bar oinei, manjiore thogeibartei, thara dangor dangor sinno ham ar amok ham degebakki. Sombob ole, Itchiore bei tulliegunoreio thogeibak.
40024025	Suno, mui tomare akke duri holung.
40024026	“Senottei, thara judi tomare hon, ‘Sawh, the moruobomit age,’ tumi sidu no jeio! Ar thara judi tomare hon, ‘Sawh, the bidirie gudhibuot age,’ sien tumi bischias no gorsio.
40024027	Haron pugendi debai jhimilele pojimendio phor oidie dogkie gori, Munischioro Puobuoi ebode lokkeneio sedogkie obo.
40024028	Haron, jiot poshu mora than, siot dhoba sillun eksomare thubon.
40024029	Sei lokkene, sei uttiesar dinun ghodi jebo io, belan andhar obo ar, junone jun phor no dibo. Taragun agajottun jhuri poribakki. Ar agajor hemodagani digdigie jebo.
40024030	Sebeden, Munischioro Puobuor sinnogan agajot dega dibogi. Sei lokkene, songsaro beg jador manjie abiles hebak. Munischioro Puobuore agajot hemodaloi ar birat oborug gori meg sagot gori ette thara degibak.
40024031	Ar birat begolo roloi the tar sorgo-dudtun padei dibo. Sorgo-dudtune sero hittettun, ar agajor ek hunottun duri aro ek hunottun song tar bei tulliegun eksomare thubeibak.
40024032	“Ar dumur gajchuottun tulona hoda sigi lo. Jokke sigon dhelagunot hujhi dikh nigilinei pada phudo doribo, sale, gorom din ejer bili mone gorsio.
40024033	Ei sedogkie gori jokke ieni ghodi jade degiba, sokkene tumi buji paribade somoibuo hai ejchie, ar duorot agegi.
40024034	Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor: Sieni begkani ghodi no gele, ei jugko lugi jedo noi.
40024035	Sorgo ar pittimigan lugi jebo, hintu mor hodagani huno din lugi jedo noi.
40024036	“Hintu sei dinnuor ar sei somoibuo huno jone hobor no pan. Sorgot sorgo-dudtuneio hobor no pan, hintu bana mor Babe hobor pai.
40024037	Noar amolot jeannie elo, Munischioro Puobuo ebode lokkeneio thik sedogkie obo.
40024038	Haron panibannuor agendi, Noa bor jahajchanot sommiegoidie lokkene song, manuschune haba-daba gorsion, bo annion ar bo diedi gorsion.
40024039	Panibannuo no eje song thara hobor no pan. Sebeden pani bane tharare begkunore bureie phellie. Munischioro Puobuoi ebode lokkeneio thik sedogkie obo.
40024040	Sei lokkene hedot di jone ham gorte, ek jonore tuli neja obo, ar ek jonore phelei ja obo.
40024041	“Dibie miliei dingit bara bande, ek jonore tuli neja obo ar ek jonore phelei ja obo.
40024042	“Tomar Probuie hon somoie ebo tumi hobor no po hinottei, shojage thago.
40024043	Hintu tumi ien hobor po daw. Ghoro girojchuoi judi surbuo ebode somoibuo hobor pedo, the subi theinei tar ghoran huno din sur obar no dilun.
40024044	Senottei, tumio jugol gori thei peba. Haron aza no gorode lokkene Munischioro Puobuoi ebo.
40024045	“Honna bischias-joggio ar gyeni banidaji sei? Sibiere tar girojchuoi tar ghoro daetto dibo, ar the tharare okto mojim hebar dibo.
40024046	Girojchuo ele tar dajibuor sedogkie gorte degilegi, sei dajibuo hoballie obo.
40024047	Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor: The tare tar beg dhon-sompottiganir ugure odhiharibuo banebo.
40024048	Hintu sei bojong dajibuoi judi mone-mone hoi, ‘Mor girojchuo harai edo noi,’
40024049	ar the tar somarsie sagorsiegunore mara arambo gore ar mod heiegundoi mod bhang hele,
40024050	sei dajibuor girojchuo the asha no gorede dinnuot ele, ar the aw-sedono oktot lungilegi, tar girojchuoi tare di hotta goribogi.
40024051	Ar the tare di hotta gorinei phagaraguno jagaganot phelei dibo. Siot the dad hamere-hamere hanibo.
40025001	“Sokkene sorgo rejjiogan doschuo shodi gabur-miliei lemboloi nuo-jamei barsei agondoidie siendoi tulona die obo.
40025002	Tharar moiddie pasjon gyeni ar paschuo olakke bhul.
40025003	Bhulune tharar lembogun loion, hintu lembogunor loge tel no lon.
40025004	Hintu gyenigune tharar lembogunor loge shijirit gori tel loion.
40025005	Hintu nuo-jameibuo ette diri oinei, thara begkune ghume dorinei ghum gelak.
40025006	Ar reid sombhagot ek jone jogar parinei hode suno gelo, ‘Sawh, nuo-jameibuo ejer, nigilinei tarloi egottor ogi!’
40025007	Sebeden sei beg sodi gabur-miliegun ghumottun udinei, tharar lembogun jugol gorilak.
40025008	Bhulune sei gyenigunore holak, ‘Amar lembogun jadon hinottei tomartun amare ekka tel bhag duo.’
40025009	Hintu gyenigune uttor dinei holak, ‘Adikkie tomartei ar amattei no hulebo hinottei, di no paribong. Senottei tel bejiettun tumi hini anogoi.’
40025010	Hintu thara tel hine jeionde lokkene, nuo-jameibuo lungilogi. Sebeden sodi gabur-miliegun jugol gorsie gori elak sigune nuo-jameibuor loge meitbano ghoro bidirie somilakkoi. Sebeden duoran nadilak.
40025011	Sei porendi, oinnio sodi gabur-milieguneo einei holakki, ‘Oh Babu, Oh Babu, amare duoran huli de.’
40025012	Hintu the uttor dinei holo, ‘Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor, mui tomare no sinong.’
40025013	Munischioro Puobuo ebode sei dinnuo ar ghontabuo tumi hobor no po hinottei, shojage thei peba.
40025014	“Haron sorgo rejjiogan edogkie: Ek jon manjie porbhajot lambe tar nijor dajigunore daginei tar dhon-sompottigani dajigunore gojei dilo.
40025015	Ek jon dajire the paschuo talen dilo. Sedogkie gori, the di talenδ oinnio ek jon dajire dilo. Aro ek jon dajire the ek talenδ dilo. The tharare jon bagene tharar saddio doge dinei the jogon-togon porbhajot gelogoi.
40025016	Sebeden jei dajibuoi paschuo talenδ peie, the sigundoi bebar gorinei aro paschuo talen bareilo.
40025017	Sedogkie gori, di talenδ peiede sibieio aro di talen bareilo.
40025018	Hintu jei dajibuoi ek talenδ peie, the madit gat hurinei tar girojchuor talennuo lugei thologoi.
40025019	“Onek din porendi, sei dajigunor girojchuo phiri elo. The tar talennunδ gojei dede sigun tharattun ijeb lolo.
40025020	Jei dajibuoi paschuo talenδ peie, the aro paschuo talen somot tar girojchuo sidu einei hologi, ‘Babu, tui paschuo talenδ more di jeios. Sah, mui aro paschuo talen bareiong.’
40025021	Sebeden tar girojchuoi tare holo, ‘Sabbas, tui gom ar bischiasi sagorsie. Tui gulodok gori jinijot bischiaschan rageile hinottei, mui tore onek jinijor ugure odhihar dim. Ar tor girojchuore hujhi uo bol de.’
40025022	Ar di talenδ peiede sibieio einei hologi, ‘Babu, tui more di talen di jeios, sah, mui aro di talen bareiong.’
40025023	Sebeden tar girojchuoi tare holo, ‘Sabbas, tui gom ar bischiasi sagorsie. Tui gulodok gori jinijot bischiaschan rageile hinottei, mui tore onek jinijor ugure odhihar dim. Ar tor girojchuore hujhi uo bol de.’
40025024	“Sebeden ek talenδ peiede sibiei einei hologi, ‘Babu, tui huttieri manus mui hobor pang. Tui no huschieguno dies. Tui no shitteguno tulos.’
40025025	Senottei mui tore dore, tor talennuoδ madit garei thoionggoi. Sah, eie tor talennuo.
40025026	“Hintu tar girojchuoi tare holo, ‘Tui dujto ar alsi sagorsie. Tui hobor pas, mui no huschieguno dieng ar biji no shitteguno tulong.
40025027	Sedogkie ole, tui mor talennuoδ sudi tenga duonde sidu dena osit elo. Sebeden mui phiri einei shuttun somot phelungun.
40025028	Senottei, tartun talennuoδ hari loinei, dos talen-bolabuore duo.
40025029	Haron jadtun age, tare aro bes die obo, sebeden tar alajhala obo. Hintu jadtun nei, tar agede sibieio hari luo obo.
40025030	Ei aw-gunor dajibuore barendi andhar jagat phelei duogoi. Siot the hani-hani dad hamere-hamere thokkoi.’
40025031	“Jokkene Munischioro Puobuoi tar oborugkandoi, ar beg tar pobitro sorgo-dudtundoi ebo, sokkene the tar oborug singasonot bojibogi.
40025032	Ar beg jador manuschun tar mujungot thubo bajei dibagki. Sebeden, shagol soreiebuoi tar jeit shagolunottun bera-shagolun pharok gorede dogkie gori the tharare tharattun pharok goribogi.
40025033	Bera-shagolun denedi the thobogi ar jeit shagolun bhangedi the thobogi.
40025034	Sebeden Rajabuoi denedi bojsiegunore hobo, ‘Mor Babe asirbad diegun ejo. Itchiore songsar sristi gorsiede lokke tomartei jugolei dede rejjiogan logi.
40025035	Haron mor ped purinei more hebar bhat tumi duo. Mui porbhajchie oinei tumi more gorba tullios. Mor pani saj gorinei tumi more pani duo.
40025036	Mui uttie langda elungge lokke tumi uribar habor more duo. Mui aw-sug oinei tumi more hobor dorsiogi. Mui jiel-hanat porinei tumi more hobor dorsiogi.’
40025037	“Sebeden dharmig manuschune tare uttor dibag, ‘Probu, homole ami tor ped purinei tore hebar bhat diei die? Ar homole tor pani saj gorinei ami tore hebar pani diei die?”
40025038	Homole tui porbhajchie oi thagke ami tore gorba tullie die? Ar homole tore uttie langda deginei uribar habor ami tore diei die?
40025039	Ar homole ami tore aw-sugot ar jiel-hanat deginei hobor dhorsieidie?’
40025040	Ar Rajabuoi sokkene tharare hobo, ‘Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor, mor ei bego niroit bheibuore je mor nange ieni goridide, the more gori didede dogkie obo.’
40025041	“Sebeden bhangedi igunoreio the hobo, ‘Obisab heiegun! Diabolatteiδ ar tar dudtunottei Itchiore jugolei dede ononto agunanot mor iottun jo.
40025042	Haron mor ped purinei hebar bhat tumi more no duo. Mor pani saj gorinei more hebar pani tumi no duo.
40025043	Mui porbhajchie oi thagke tumi more gorba no tulo. Mui uttie langda gori roinei tumi more uribar habor no duo. Mui aw-sug ar jiel-hanat thagke tumi more hobor no dorogoi.’
40025044	“Sokkene thara tare uttor dibag, ‘Probu, homole ami tore ped pora, pani saj, porbhaj gorte, uttie langda gorinei, aw-sug ar jiel-hanat deginei lobiot no goridie?’
40025045	Sebeden the tharare uttor dinei hobo, ‘Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor, mor ei bego niroit bheiunottun ek jonore tumi mor nange ieni gori no duo hinottei, ieni tumi more gori no duo.’
40025046	Ar igune aw-phurondi sastiganot jebak, hintu dharmig manuschun ononto jibono jaganot jebak.”
40026001	Ar edogkie olo, Jisu sieni begkani hoi puronar porendi, tar sisjiogunore holo,
40026002	“Tumi hobor po, di dino porendi Rokkie Utchobor dinnuo ejer. Ar Munischioro Puobuore krossot dibartei dhora bajei dibag.”
40026003	Sebeden rajguruthagurune, dhormo niomor mastorune, ar manuschunor borjonnune, Kaiapha honde moharajguruthagurbuor ghoro udonot thubeilakki.
40026004	Jisure dujot phajeinei, dhorinei dhori tare morei phelebartei temmang gorilak.
40026005	Hintu thara holak, “Utchobo lokkene tare no dhorsio. Adikkie manuschune jagulug tulibak.”
40026006	Sei lokkene Jisu Bethani adamot pharangi Simonor ghorot elo.
40026007	Ekkuo miliei baari mongga tumbas tel ekkuo alabasterδ sijirit gori loinei tar sidu elo. Jisu tebilot bhat haade tar siriebuot telan guli dilogi.
40026008	Hintu tar sisjiogune sien deginei rak gorinei thara holak, “Ar hittei ei telan borbat pelana olode?
40026009	Ei thumbas telan onek mongga gori bejinei, sei tengagunδ gorib dugkiere di para gelun.”
40026010	Hintu Jisu sien suninei tharare holo, “Miliebuore hittei bojong mone goror? Haron the daw mortei gom ham gori dilo.
40026011	Haron tomar loge goribpun daw onsur agon. Hintu mui daw tomar loge onsur no theim.
40026012	Ei thumbas telan the mor heyet guli dilode, more garebartei sien gora olo.
40026013	Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor, goda songsarot ei gom hoboran jidu prosar gortak sat, ei miliebuoi gorilode hamanio thara hoi pebak, ar sengori tare monot rageibak.”
40026014	Sebeden baro jon sisjiottun ek jon, Juda Iskariod honde sibiei, rajguruthaguruno sidu gelo.
40026015	The hologoi, “Mui judi Jisure tomar adhot gojei dilegi, tumi more hi diba?” Sebeden thara tirischuo rubuor tengaδ tare goni dilak.
40026016	Senottei, sittun duri the Jisure dhori dibartei sujuk togar.
40026017	Moli-guri agullie pidie Utchobor polim dinnuot sisjiogune Jisur idu einei, tare holakki, “Rokkie Utchobor haanabuo tui hebartei ami tortei hudu jugol gori didonggoi?”
40026018	Jisu tharare holo, “Sohoranot ek jono sidu jeinei tare hoiogoi, ‘Amar guruthagurbuoi horte, “Mor somoibuo hai ejchie. Senottei, mor sisjiogundoi tor ghorot mui Rokkie Utchobpan paleimbi.” ’ ”
40026019	Jisu hoiede doge-doge sisjiogune jeinei, Rokkie Utchobor haanabuo jugol gorsiondoi.
40026020	Jokkene sajonnie olo, baro jon sisjio somot Jisu bhat hebartei tebilot bojilo.
40026021	Thara hadonde lokkene, the holo, “Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor, tomartun ek jone more dhora bajei dibo.”
40026022	Sebeden thara shanggadik shuduo mu oinei, prottiek jone pujor gora dorilak, “Probu, sibie mui ni na?”
40026023	Ar Jisu uttor dinei holo, “Je mor loge hodorabuot ad buror, the more dhora bajei dibo.
40026024	Munischioro Puobuor sombonde Sastrot lega agede doge ghodi jebo. Hintu Munischioro Puobuore dhora bajei dibode sibier ugure hobal puribo! The judi jormo no odogi, tartei gom olun.”
40026025	Sebeden, Juda tare dhora bajei dibode sibiei holo, “Robbi, sibie mui ni na?” Jisu tare uttor dinei holo, “Tui holede doge oi.”
40026026	Thara hadonde lokkene, Jisu pidiegan loinei donniobad dinei hotta dilo. Sebeden pidiegan tar sisjiogunore dinei holo, “Loinei ho. Ien mor heyegan.”
40026027	Sebeden the golojchuo adot loinei hujhi hoda hoinei the tharare dinei holo, “Tumi iottun begkune ho.
40026028	Haron ien olode mor loganor nuo nioman. Jei logan onek manjior pab hema obartei dali die oie.
40026029	Hintu mui tomare hongor: Ikkiettun duri mui jedog din song mor Babor rejjiot tomarloi nuo gori ien no haanggoi, sedog din song ei angguro roschan mui hedung noi ar.”
40026030	Sebeden thara ekkuo Itchioro baini gid ganar porendi, thara Oliv Mounnuot gelak.
40026031	Sebeden Jisu tharare holo, “Edchie reidot mortei tomar begkunor bischiaschan jhuri poribo. Haron Sastrot ien lega age, ‘Mui bera-shagol Soreiebuore mugureim, sebeden palluor bera-shagolun settera obak.’
40026032	Hintu more jiei tulonar porendi, mui tomartun akke-akke Galili dejot jeim.”
40026033	Sebeden, Pitore Jisure uttor dinei holo, “Tor harone begkunor bischiaschani jhuri poleio, mor bischiaschan hono din jhuri porido noi.”
40026034	Jisu tare holo, “Mui tore soittio hodagan hongor, edchie reidot radai dag no harte, tui tin bar more bharebe.”
40026035	Pitore Jisure holo, “Judi tor loge mor mori ja porileio mui tore shobai no bharem.” Ar sedogkie gorinei beg sisjioguneo holak.
40026036	Sei porendi, Jisu tar sisjio-gundoi Gethsemane honde jaganot lungilakki. Sebeden tar sisjioguno-re holo, “Ubuot mui bor magongoi, tumi iot boi thago.”
40026037	Ar the tar loge Pitorore, ar Zebedior puo di jon nejeilo. the monot duge, shanggadik sintiet pora dorilo.
40026038	Sebeden the tharare holo, “Mor aptabuo baari sintiet porinei, morana soman olo. Iot theinei mor loge shojage thago.”
40026039	Sebeden the huttur durot jeinei, bukpari porinei bor magilo. the holo, “Oh mor Ba, judi sombob ole, ei golojchuo mortun neja. Hintu mor ischie doge no oinei, tor ischie doge ok.”
40026040	Sebeden the tar sisjioguno idu phiri einei ghume jhurtonde deginei, the Pitorore holo, “Hi bepar? A hittei tumi ek ghontaio mor loge shojage thei no paror?.
40026041	Tumi jagi thago ar bor mago adikkie lubbot poriba. Aptabuor jodepode mone hor hintu heyegane no der.”
40026042	The aro di bar jeinei bor magilogoi. The holo, “Oh Ba, judi mui no heie bade ei golojchuo neja no oi, tor ischie doge gora ok.”
40026043	Ar jokkene the elo, thara aro ghume jhurtonde degilogi. Haron ghume tharar sogkun meli no parton.
40026044	Senottei, the tharare aro phelei jeinei tin barot sei ekkui boran magilogoi.
40026045	Sebeden the tar sisjioguno idu phiri einei tharare hologi, “Tumi hi ejosong arame ghum jor nahi? Sawh, somoibuo ejchie, Munischioro Puobuore dhorinei pabi manjior adot gojei die awr.
40026046	Uduo jei. Sawh, more dhoridiebuo lungiegi.”
40026047	Ar the horte lokkene, sawh, Juda, baro jonottun ek jon sisjio siot lungilogi. Ek jhag manus horgo ar mugor dhorinei tar loge elak. Rajguruthagurune ar manuschunor borjonnune tharare padeion.
40026048	Sei lokkene tare dhoridiebuo sigunore the ekkan sinno dinei holo, “Mui jare sumonggoi, the sibie sie. Tumi tare dhorsio.”
40026049	Ar the jogon-togon Jisur mokkie jeinei tare hologoi, “Robbi, salam.” Ar the tare sumilo.
40026050	Hintu Jisu tharare holo, “Bhai, a hittei ele?” Sebeden thara einei Jisure dhorinei banilak.
40026051	Ar jhimidot Jisur loge elakke siottun ek jone ad babeinei tar horgogan hueilo. Ar the moharajguruthagurbuor dajibuor hanan beja urei habi phelei dilo.
40026052	Sebeden Jisu tare holo, “Tor horgogan dappuot bhorei tho. Haron je horgo dhore the horgot moribo.
40026053	Baro azarottun bes sorgo-dud padei dibartei, mui Babare hujoli gori no parim bili tui mone goros ni na?
40026054	Edogkie gori godhi no gele, Sastrot hoiede sien hingori puron obo?”
40026055	Sei lokkene Jisu manjior jhagkuore holo, “Mui daget ni na, tumi more dhoribartei horgoloi ar mugorloi ejchiode? Din bagene mui tomar loge mondirbuot sigkie di di roiong, sokkene tumi more no dhoro.
40026056	Hintu ieni begkani godhi gelode jene Sastrot munigune hoi jeionde sieni puron oi para.” Sebeden beg sisjiogune tare phelei jeinei dhei gelak.
40026057	Jisure dhorsionde sigune moharajguruthagur Kaiaphar ghorot nejeion. Siot dhormo niomo mastorun ar borjonnune thubei agondoi.
40026058	Hintu Pitore durot gori Jisur pune-pune jeinei, moharajguruthagurbuor udonanot somilogoi. Sebeden phola pholan sebartei mondiro polischuno loge bojilogoi.
40026059	Sei lokkene rajguruthagurune, borjonnune ar goda sanhedrinuor manuschune Jisure mijie shakki dinei morei pheleibartei haidie togadon.
40026060	Onek manjie mijie shakki dineio, tare morei phelei paron para ekkano thara duj badei di no paron. Ekkano duj badei di no paranar porendi, sejot di jon mijie shakki die elak.
40026061	Thara holakki, “Ei Manuschuoi hoiede, ‘Mui ei Itchioro mondirbuo bhangi pheleinei aro tin dine tuli parim.’ ”
40026062	Sebeden moharajgurutha-gurbuoi thieinei Jisure holo, “Tui ieni ekkanio uttor no dibe? Tor biruddie ei manuschune ieni hi shakki dedon?”
40026063	Hintu Jisu no madilo. moharajguruthagurbuoi tare holo, “Jeda Itchior shakki gorinei mui tore hongor, amare ho, tui hi hamakkai Itchioro Puobuo Kristo oi ni na?”
40026064	Jisu tare holo, “Tui holede doge mui oi. Hintu mui tomare hongor, ei porendi Munischioro Puobuore Hemoda-bolabuor denedi bojsie gori agajot megsagot gori ette tumi degiba.”
40026065	Sebeden moharajgurutha-gurbuoi tar ursie haborani phadi pheleinei holo, “The Itchiorore sorjar! Oinnio jon shakki die amar a hittei lagette ar? Sawh, ikkunuio Itchiorore sorjadte sien tumi sunila daw.
40026066	Tumi hi mone goro?” Sebeden thara uttor dilak, “Tar hamakkai morana dorkar.”
40026067	Sebeden thara tar muonot sep phelei denar porendi tare marilak. Ar ek dagie tare suoreilak.
40026068	Ar thara holak, “Tui Kristo ole, muni dogkie gori amare hodei, honna tore suoreilo?”
40026069	Sei lokkene Pitore udonot ek huredi boji age. Ar ekkuo sagorsie miliei tar idu einei tare hologi, “Tuio Galili hullie Jisur loge elede noi?
40026070	Hintu the tharar begkuno mujungot bharenei holo, “Tui horte ien mui no bujongor.”
40026071	Sebeden the girier barendi jeinei, aro ekkuo sagorsie miliei tare deginei, siot elakke manuschunore holo, “Ei Manuschuoio Nazareth hullie Jisur loge elo.”
40026072	Hintu the aro sobot heinei bharenei holo, “Mui sei Manuschuore no sinong.”
40026073	Ar hanekkon porendi, siot thiei elakke sigune Pitora sidu einei holakki, “Hamakkai thara dolottun ek jon oi. Haron tor gascharabuoi tore proman der.”
40026074	Sebeden tare the obisab dinei sobot heinei holo, “Tumi horte Manuschuore mui no sinong.” Sebeden jogon-togon ekkuo radai dag harilo.
40026075	Ar Pitore Jisu tare hoiede hodagan monot tullie, “Radai dag no haribar age, tui more tin bar bharebe.” Senottei, Pitore barendi jeinei gujhi-gujhi hanilogoi.
40027001	Beinnie phor oinei, beg rajguruthagurune ar manu-schunor borjonnune thubeinei Jisure morei pheleibartei, thara jukti gorilak.
40027002	Ar thara Jisure baninei, nejeinei sason-gorie Pontio Pilado sidu tare gojei dilakkoi.
40027003	Sebeden Juda, dhora bajei dede sibiei, mijie gori tare dhora bajeidie sien hobor peinei, the pottieinei tar monan phireilo. Ar the sei tirischuo rubuor tengaδ rajguruthaguruno ar borjonnuno sidu pherot dilogoi.
40027004	The holo, “Ni-duji Manuschuor logandoi bischas gatokota gorinei mor pab oie.” Hintu thara holak, “Sigun ami hi gorthong? Tui jien gorte sat tui gorloi.”
40027005	Sebeden rubuor tengagunδ mondirbuot the lugimari phelei dilogoi. Ar the jeinei nije-nije naddi morilogoi.
40027006	Hintu rajguruthagurune rubuor tengagunδ loinei holak, “Igun olakke hun gorsie dam. Senottei igun mondiro dan-baksut bhorana niom noi.”
40027007	Senottei, thara temmang gorinei aw-sin manus garebartei, sei tengagundoiδ humorbuor jagagan hini lolak.
40027008	Ei senottei edchie song sei jagagan, Lor Mad hon.
40027009	Siendoi muni Jeremia hoiede hodagan puron olo. The hoie, “Ar thara rubuor tengaδ tirischuo lolak. Tare tiris tenga dam bojei die oie. Sien olode Israel manuschune tare dam bojei duonde daman.
40027010	Ar PROBUIE more hoiede doge Humorbuor jagaganor daman thara dilak.”
40027011	Ar Jisure sason-goriebuor mujungot azil goreilakkoi. Sebeden sason-goriebuoi Jisuttun pujor gorilo, “Tui ne Judaiunor Rajabuo?” Jisu uttor dilo, “Tui holede doge mui oi.”
40027012	Ar jokkene rajguruthagurune ar borjonnune tare duj badei dedon, the ekkanio uttor no dilo.
40027013	Sebeden Pilade tare holo, “Tor biruddie hodogkani thara shakki dedondi sieni tui no sunor?”
40027014	Hintu Jisu tare ekkan hodaio uttor no dilo. Senottei, sason-goriebuoi baari amok olo.
40027015	Sei lokkene Rokkie Utchobo dinot ek jon jielot porsie manus, jonogone jare magon tare jielottun niomor doge sason-goriebuoi iri dide.
40027016	Ar sokkene ek jon nangkora daget jielot elo. Tar nangan olode, Barabba.
40027017	Sebeden jhag-jhag manus jokkene eksomare thubeilakki, Pilade sigunore holo, “Hare jielottun mui iri didung tomartun mone hoi? Barabbare, nahi Kristo honde Jisure iri didung?”
40027018	Haron thara Jisure insie darai tar adot gojei duonde sien the hobor pai.
40027019	Pilade bijierot bojede jaganot boji elode lokkene, tar mogkuoi tare hobor padeinei tare holo, “Sei dharmig Manuschuore tor hitchu goribar nei, haron tartei mui sobone-sobone edchie onek dug-hosto peiong.”
40027020	Hintu rajguruthagurune ar borjonnune manuschunore bhuleion, jene thara Barabbare iri dibartei ar Jisure morei phelebartei hujoli goron.
40027021	Sason-goriebuoi tharare holo, “Thara di jonottun hare mui iri didung tomartun mone hoi?” Ar thara holak, “Barabbare iri de.”
40027022	Pilade tharare holo, “Salen, Kristo honde Jisure mui hi gorim.” Ar thara begkune holak, “Tare krosot die ok!”
40027023	Sebeden sason-goriebuoi holo, “Hittei, ar the hi duj gorsiede.” Hintu thara sie bes jogar pari-pari holak, “Tare krosot die ok!”
40027024	Pilade huno hitchu gori borei no ejer, ar jagulug udibar oie bili deginei, pani ana bajei dinei, manjior jhagkuor sog dega tar adtani dhoinei holo, “mui ei dharmig Manuschuor loganor duji noi ar. Tumi tare jien gorta sat gorogoi.”
40027025	Ar beg manuschune holak, “Tar loganor dujchan amar ugure ar amar puo shabagunor ugure ok.”
40027026	Sebeden the Barabbare tharattei iri di dilo. Jisure the sabukkoi mari marai, krosot dibartei tharare gojei dilo.
40027027	Sebeden sason-goriebuor soinniogune Jisure praetoriumotδ bhoreineioi, goda hembor soinniogun Jisur seropala thubeilakki.
40027028	Ar thara tar shilummuo hari loinei, ekkan ranga habor tare urei dilak.
40027029	Ekkuo hadar tokkie banenei, tare madat di dilak, ar tar den adtanot ekkuo hagara ludig tare dhora bajei dilak. Sebeden Jisur mujungot adu hubi porinei thara thatta gorinei hodon, “Ju, Judaiunor Rajabuo!”
40027030	Sebeden tare sep phelei dinei, tartun hagara ludigkuo hari loinei tare sibieloi tar siriebuot mugurodon.
40027031	Ar tare thatta gori phuronar porendi, tartun ranga haboran hari loinei, tar nijor shilummuo tare urei dilak. Sebeden tare krosot dibartei nejeilak.
40027032	Ar thara ette seiet, Kurini bamottun ek jon lagot pelak. Tar nangan olode Simon. Tare bolajur gori Jisur kroschan hanat gori neja bajei dilak.
40027033	Golgotha honde jaganot thara lungilakki. Sienor orthogan olode, Hulosara Jaga.
40027034	Siot Jisure thara horo mod tidieloi mijeinei duon. Hintu sien the sagi seinei the no helo.
40027035	Sebeden thara Jisure krosot dilak. Thara ak seinei haborani bhag gorilak. Siendoi munibuoi hoiede hodagan puron olo. Munibuoi hoie, “Mor haborani tharar moiddie bhag goribak, ar mor haboranittei thara ak sebak.”
40027036	Thara bojinei siottun tare sei thelak.
40027037	Tar biruddie gongolagan tar mada uguredi tangei diduon. Sienot edogkie gori lega age: IBIE OLODE JISU, JUDAIUNOR RAJABUO.
40027038	Sebeden di jon daget Jisur loge tar denedi ek jon ar bangedi ek jon thara krosot dilak.
40027039	Jei manuschune sindi adi jan, thara Jisure thatta gorinei, sirie najei-najei jan.
40027040	Ar thara hon, “Mondirbuo bhangi pheleinei aro tin dine tuli pariebuo, tore tui uddhar gor na! Tui judi Itchioro Puo ole, kroschanottun lami ai na!”
40027041	Sedogkie gori, rajgurutha-guruneio dhormo niomor mastorun ar borjonnun somot tare thatta gorton.
40027042	Ar thara hodon, “The onnio manjiore uddhar gorsie, hintu the nijore-nije uddhar gori no pare. the judi Israel manuschunor Raja ole, kroschanottun ikkie lami ejok na, sebeden ami tare bischias goribong.
40027043	The Itchiorore bischias gore daw. Tar loge judi Itchiorbuo thai, ikkie Itchiore tare siottun uddhar gorog na. Haron the nije hoie, ‘Mui Itchioro Puo.’ ”
40027044	Tar loge krosot duonde dagettuneio sedogkie gori hoinei tare peiz gorton.
40027045	Sokkene dibursiettun durinei beillie tin phor song, goda dejchan andhar olo.
40027046	Bel tin porot portegoi, Jisu birat ro gori jogar parilo, “Eloi, Eloi lama sabachthani?” Sienor orthogan olode, “Mor Itchior, mor Itchior, a hittei tui more phelei gele?”
40027047	Siot thiei agonde sigunottun ek dagie sien suninei, holak, “Ei Manuschuoi Elijare dager.”
40027048	Ar jogon-togon tharattun ek jone daba jeinei, ekkan pul loinei sien horo modot bureinei, ekkuo hagara ludigo madat gori Jisure hebartei dilo.
40027049	Bagi manuschune holak, “Gai-gai thok, Elija tare uddhar goribartei eje ne no eje, sei thei.”
40027050	Ar sebeden, birat ro gori Jisu aro jogar parinei, tar aptabuo iri dilo.
40027051	Ar sawh, sei porendi, mondirbuor porda haboran ugorottun duri tole song phadi jeinei di hotta olo. Bhujol beinei bor sillun phadi udilak.
40027052	Gourun hulo gelak. Ar morsionde sadhu manuschunor heyegani jiei tulo oie.
40027053	Jisu jiei uduonar porendi, sigune gouronottun nigili einei, pobitro sohoranot jeinei onek manjior idu dega duondoi.
40027054	Senottei, ek shot jon soinnior ugure senapotibuoiδ ar tar hai Jisure subi agonde sigune bhujol beinei ar godhi jadte sieni deginei, thara shanggadik dorelak. Ar thara holak, “Ete hamakkai Itchioro Puo.”
40027055	Ar siot bhalukkun miliei thara ekdurottun sei agon. Thara Galili dejottun duri Jisur loge ejchion, ar tare lobiot gorsion.
40027056	Sigunor moiddie, Meri Magdalini, Jakobor ar Josiar mabuo Meri, ar Zebedior puogunor mabuoio siot elak.
40027057	Ar sajonnie oinei, ek jon majon manus siot elo. The olode Arimathea adamortun. Tar nangan olode Joseb. The nijeio Jisur sisjio oie.
40027058	Ei Manuschuoi, Pilado sidu jeinei Jisur heyegan magilogoi. Sebeden Pilade Jisur heyegan tare dibartei ugum dilo.
40027059	Ar Josebe Jisur heyegan loinei, the ekkan poriskar pador haborloi bereilo.
40027060	Sebeden the tar nijor nuo gouranot morabuo bhorei thologoi. Sien the silo sadarat huninei baneie. Ar the ekkuo bor sil goschei-goschei ninei dhoran nadi dinei phelei gelo.
40027061	Meri Magdalini, ar oinnio Merio gourano mokkie gori boi elak.
40027062	Tar hellie, ortat, Judaiune jugol goronde dinnuorδ porendi dinnuot, rajguruthagurune ar Pharisigune Pilado idu thubeilakkoi.
40027063	Ar thara Piladore holak, “Babu, amar monot age, the baji thagke, ei manus hu-podedi nejeiebuoi hoie, ‘Tin dino porendi mui aro jiei udim.’
40027064	Senottei, sidiesalan tin dinsong subi dinei rageibartei tui ugum de. Adikkie tar sisjiogune reidot einei Jisur heyegan sur gori ninei, ‘The morattun jiei uttie’ gori manjior mujungot hobakkoi. Ar sengori, sejor thoganagan polim thoganaganottun bes horab obo.”
40027065	Sebeden Pilade tharare holo, “Subi dibar soinnio tomar agon daw. Jo, tumi jengori gom po sengori subi tha bajei duogoi.”
40027066	Sebeden thara jeinei, sidiesalan rokkie gora bajei dilak Ar sidiesalo silluot thara marga dinei subi tha bajei dilak.
40028001	Judaiunor Jireni Dinnuo bidi jeinei, saptar polim dinnuot, phor ode-ode Meri Magdalini, ar oinnio Meri somot sidiesalan sebartei elak.
40028002	Ar sawh, Probur ekkuo sorgo-dud sorgottun lami ejchie hinottei, ekkan shanggadik bor bhujol belo. Sorgo-dudtuoi einei duoranottun silluo ogodeinei, silluor ugure boji agegi.
40028003	Tar dogkan olode deba jhimileni dogkie, ar tar pojakkani olode borobor dogkie dhub.
40028004	Subidargune dore girgireinei mora manjior dogkie oion.
40028005	Hintu sorgo-dudtuoi miliegunore holo, “No doreo. Haron mui hobor pang krosot duonde Jisure tumi togor.
40028006	The iot nei. Haron the hoiede doge iottun jiei udinei jeiegoi. Ejo, Probure thoionde jagagan sawhgi.
40028007	Senottei, tumi jhadi jeinei tar sisjiogunore the morattun jiei uttie bili hoiogoi. The tomartun akke-akke Galili dejot jar. Tumi tare sidu debagoi. Ar sawh, mui tomare hoiong.”
40028008	Sebeden miliegune sidie shalanottun dore ar hujhie daba-daba jeinei Jisur sisjiogunore hobor hobalottei gelak.
40028009	Ar sawh, thara Jisur sisjiogunore hobor hobalottei jadonde seiet, Jisu thararloi lak pa-pi oinei tharare holo, “Hujhi awh!” Sebeden thara einei tar thengot dhorinei tare tobona gorilak.
40028010	Sebeden Jisu tharare holo, “No doreo, jo, mor bheiunore hoi duogoi, Galili dejot jadok. Sidu thara more debakkoi.”
40028011	Miliegun jadonde seiet, sawh, hoiek jon subi diei sohoranot einei, ghodi jeiede sieni begkani rajguruthagurunore holakki.
40028012	Sebeden thara borjonnun somot temmang gorinei, sei subidargunore ektal tengaδ dilak.
40028013	Ar tharare holak, “Tharare hoiogoi, ‘Ami ghum jade tar sisjiogun reidot einei tar heyegan amattun sur gori nuondi.’
40028014	Ar ei hodagan judi sason-goriebuor hanot lungegoi, ami tare bujeidinei tomare sharebong.”
40028015	Senottei, subidargune tengagunδ loinei tharare ugum die oiede doge gorilakkoi. Senottei edchie song Judaiunor moiddie ei hoboran age.
40028016	Sebeden egaro jon sisjioi Galili dejot jeinei, Jisu hoiede mounnuot thara gelak.
40028017	Ar thara jokkene tare degilak, tare tobona gorilak. Hintu ek dagir mono shiongshama thelo.
40028018	Sebeden Jisu thara idu einei hologi, “Sorgot ar pittimit beg odhiharani more die oie.
40028019	Senottei tumi jo, beg jadtunottun sisjio gorogoi. Tharare Bab, Puo ar Pobitro Aptar nange Baptisma gori duogoi.
40028020	Mui tomare sigeiongge sieni begkani manibartei tharare sigkie duogoi. Ar suno, jug thum no oi song mui tomar loge onsur theim.” Amen.
41001001	Itchioro Puo Jisu Kristor gom hoboran arambo.
41001002	Muni Isaiar Boibout legkie age, “Sawh, mor hobor boiebuo tor mujungedi padangor, the tor podtani hajei dibo.”
41001003	“Moruobomit ek jonor roi horte, ‘PROBUR podtan hajeinei, tar podtani uju goro.’ ”
41001004	Moruobomit baptisma gori die Johone einei, baptisma gori der, ar pabor mab pebartei imie hanar baptisma hoda prosar gorilo.
41001005	Beg Judea dejor manuschun, ar Jerusalemortun nigilinei tar sidu gelak. Ar begkune tharar pabpani haam heinei Jordan sorat tartun baptisma lolak.
41001006	Johone udor hejchoi baneie habor uri thai, ar tar homorot samarar homorpijoni pini thai, Ar the shuduo-phiring ar jharo modhu hedo.
41001007	Ar the janei di horte, “Mor porendi ek jon ebo, the mortun bes oborug, tar jodar durieni mui nigurinei huei dibario lak noi.
41001008	Mui tomare panit baptisma gori duong, the hintu tomare Pobitro Aptaloi baptisma gori dibo.”
41001009	The sokkene dinot edogkie olo, Jisu Galili dejor Nazareth adamortun elo, Jordan sorat Johone tare baptisma gori dilo.
41001010	Jokke, Jisu panittun udi ejer, Johone degilode agaschan hulo jeinei di bak oie ar Aptabuo hodoro dogkie oinei Jisur ugure lambegi degilo.
41001011	Sebeden, sorgottun ekkuo sobdo bhaar olo, “Tui mor agojor Puo, tor ugure mui baari hujhi olung.”
41001012	Ar Aptabuoi Jisure jogon-togon moruobomit padeilo.
41001013	Ar the moruobomit solis din, Soitane buleinei, jharbuo poshu loge thelo. Siot sorgo-dudtune tare jottone rageion.
41001014	Johonore Herode jiel-hanat bhoranar porendi, Jisu Itchioror gom hoboran prosar gori-gori Galili dejot elo,
41001015	Ar the horte, “Somoibuo lungilogi, Itchioror rejjiogan hai ejchie. Tomar monani phiro, ar gom hoboran bischias goro.”
41001016	Jisu Galili sagoro parot berade, Simon ar tar bhei Andrio dagire sagorot jal pelade degilo. Haron thara olakke jallie.
41001017	Sebeden Jisu tharare dagilo, “Mor loge ejo, mui tomare manus dhorie jallie banem.”
41001018	Ar jogon-togon tharar jalani phelei jeinei tar loge gelak.
41001019	Siottun hottur jeinei, Zebedior puo Jakob, ar Jakobor bhei Johonore the degilo. Thara ekkan nawt boinei jalani tundon.
41001020	Jisu tharare deganar jogon-togon dagilo. Ar tharar bab Zebediore gaburun sumuttuo nawt phelei jei, tar loge gelak.
41001021	Jisu tar sisjiogun somot Kapernaumot gelo. Ar Jireni Dinnuo lunginei Jisu synagogot somi sigkie dilo.
41001022	Tar sigkieni jara sunilak thara amok olak. Haron the dhormo niomor mastoruno dogkie noi, hintu odhihar-bola dogkie gori sigkie die.
41001023	Sokkene synagogot ek jon jhar hajorchie apta elo, the hijiek harinei holo,
41001024	“Nazareth hullie Jisu, tui amare hi gorte sas? Amare nas goribartei ele ni na? mui tore sinong, tui olede Itchioror Pobitrobuo!”
41001025	Jisu bhudtore holo, “Sube-sabe manuschuottun nigili ai!”
41001026	Hajorchie aptabuoi Manuschuore thajei jhagerei, hijiek harinei nigili gelo.
41001027	Manuschune baari amok oinei, thara-thara huobula gorton, “Ien hi? ien hi nuo sigkie? Ei Manuschuor hajorchie Aptagunore, ugum dibar odhihar age ar thara tar hoda manon!”
41001028	Ar senottei Jisur hoboran Galili dejor seropala jogon-togon shidie gelo.
41001029	Jisu ar tar sisjio, Jakob ar Johon somot, synagogottun nigilinei Simon ar Andrior ghorot gelak.
41001030	Simonor shuribuo jor oinei bischonot pori elo. Thara Jisure tar aw-sugor hoda holak.
41001031	Jisu tar siot jeinei tare addot dhori tulilo. Sebeden tar joran jogon-togon gom olo. ar the tharare lobiot gorilo.
41001032	Sei dinnie bellie bel dubonar porendi, jonogone beg aw-sugkie ar bhude peiegun tar idu anilak.
41001033	Goda sohoro manuschun ghoranor mujungot thubeiondi.
41001034	Nanan biedi-bola aw-sugkie Jisu gom gorilo, ar bhalukkun bhud dabei dilo. Bhudtune tare sinon hinottei tharare madibar no de.
41001035	Beinnie poittie phor no ode, Jisu udinei ekkan niribili jagat jeinei bormagilogoi.
41001036	Simon ar tar somarsiegune Jisure toga jeion.
41001037	Jogon suph pelak, thara Jisure holak, “Begkune Tore togadon.”
41001038	Jisu tharare holo, “Oinnio adamanit jei, sidu prosar gori parimboi. Senottei daw mui ejchuongge.”
41001039	Senottei Jisu goda Galili dejchanot, berei-berei synagogot prosar gorilo ar bhudto dabei dilo.
41001040	Ek jon pharangi manus Jisur idu einei, tar mujunge adu pari salam gorinei holo, “Tortun mone hole more sudduo gori paros.”
41001041	Jisuttun manuschuore baari sit purilo. Tar adtan babei manuschuore dhorinei holo, “Mortun mone hor, sudduo ok.”
41001042	Jisu hoieio jogon-togon, tar pharangigan sudduo olo.
41001043	Jisu tare shokto uij dinei jogon-togon tare dipadebartei holo.
41001044	Seis hobotdar, “Ien harore no hos. Hintu Dhormothaguro sidu jeinei degagoi. Tui sudduo oios bili begkune hobor pan para shakki ijebe, Mosi ugum dede doge, dali dischoi.”
41001045	Hintu manuschuoi jeinei hoboran jagai-jagai janei dilogoi. Senottei Jisu sohorot hulomela gori somi no parilo ar. Hintu barendi niribili jagat thelo. Tobuio manuschun nanan jagattun tar idu elak.
41002001	Hoiek din pore Jisu aro Kapernaumot gelo. Manuschune suinnionde the ghorot age.
41002002	Senottei jogon-togon shagor manus thubeiondi, shagor manus elak hinottei, duoranor bhare song thieibario jaga nei. Sebeden Jisu tharare sigkie hoda holo.
41002003	Sokkene, ser jon manjie ek jon ajorchie pirellie bhaar gori tar idu anilak.
41002004	Manjior gij hinottei, thara Jisur hai ni no palliek. Senottei Jisu je uju elo, thik tar uguredi salan hana gorinei ajorchie pirelliebuo padi ugure porei, lamei dilak.
41002005	Ar Jisu sei manuschunor bischiaschani deginei, the ajorchie pirelliebuore holo, “Put, mui tor pabpani mab dilung.”
41002006	Siot hoiek jon dhormo niomor mastor boi elak. Thara mone-mone bhabodon,
41002007	“Ei Manuschuoi a hittei edogkie hoinei Itchiorore sorjar? Itchior bade ar honna pabpani mab gori pare?”
41002008	Thara mone-mone hi bhabodon jogon-togon, Jisu tar ontorot buji parilo. Senottei the tharare holo, “Tumi a hittei sedogkie mone-mone bhabor?
41002009	Ajorchie pirelliebuore hubon hode juit obo, ‘Mui tor pabpani mab dilung,’ bah ‘Uth, tor padibuo tulinei adi ja’?
41002010	Hintu Munischioro Puobuottun pabpani mab goribar pittimit odhihar age. Sien tumi hobor pebartei ien mor gora porer.” Sebeden Jisu ajorchie pirelliebuore holo,
41002011	“Mui tore hongor, uth, tor padibuo tulinei, tor ghorot ja.”
41002012	Jogon-togon sei hub manuschuo thieilo, tar padibuo lolo, tharar begkunor mujungottun adi-adi gelo. Senottei beg manuschune amok olak, ar Itchiorore baini gori holak, “Ami huno din edogkie no degi!”
41002013	Jisu aro Galili sagoro parot gelo. Goda manuschun tar sidu gelak, ar the tharare sigkie dilo.
41002014	Tar porendi Jisu jade-jade, degilo Alphaior puo Levire the hajana tulede ghoranot boi age. Jisu tare dagilo, “Mor loge ai.” Sebeden Levi udi tar loge gelo.
41002015	Levir ghorot Jisu bhat hebartei poiot bojsie. Ar edogkie olo, Jisur loge ejchie manus siot shagor elak hinottei, shagor hajana-tullie ar pabi manus Jisu ar tar sisjiogun somot, bhat hebartei boi agon.
41002016	Pharisi ar dhormo niomor mastorune, jokke Jisure hajana-tullie ar pabi manuschun somot bhat haade degilak, thara Jisur sisjiogunore holak, “Hajana-tullie ar pabi manuschunor somare the a hittei bhat hai?”
41002017	Ien suninei, Jisu tharare holo, “Ni-rugi manjiortei daktor no lage, hintu aw-sugkiettei daktor lage mui dharmig manuschun dagibartei no ejong, hintu pabottun mon phiran para, pabigun dagibartei mui ejchiong.”
41002018	Baptisma gori die Johonor ar Pharisi dagir sisjiogune ubos than. Senottei hoiek jon manus Jisur idu einei tare holaki, “Baptisma gori die Johonor ar Pharisi dagir sisjiogune ubos than, a hittei tor sisjiogune ubos no than?”
41002019	Jisu tharare holo, “Nuo-jameior loge thele tar somarsiegune ubos thebak parapang? Jedog din nuo-jameior somare than, sedog din thara ubos thebar noi.
41002020	Hintu dinun ebag, sebeden nuo-jameibuore tharattun pharok gori neja obo. Sokkene thara ubos thebak.
41002021	“Huno jone puron haborot mar no gallie nuo haborloi tali no duon. Judi duon, nuo taligandoi puron haboran tana jei phadagan ojar obo.
41002022	Huno jone taza angguro ros puron samarar hoilliet no bhoran. Judi bhoreile, taza angguro roschane puron samarar hoilliebuo phulei phadi phelebo. Angguro roschan nigili jebo ar samarar hoilliebuo borbat obo, Senottei taza angguro ros nuo samarar hoilliet bhorana.”
41002023	Ek Dine Jirenot, Jisu tar sisjiogundoi pagana dhan-bhuiedi jadon. Thara jade tar sisjiogune dhan sijier madagani shinie dorsion.
41002024	Pharisigune Jisure holak, “Sah, amar Jireni Dinnuot jien no goribar mana age sien thara a hittei gorton?”
41002025	Jisu tharare uttor dilo, “Davida ar tar somarsiegune hebar neidie lokkenene, tharar ped porai hi gorsion sien tumi madei no sawh?
41002026	Abiathare moharajguruthagur elode amolot, Davida Itchioro ghorot somei utchorbo gorsie pidiegani heye, ar the tar somarsiegunoreio die. Niomor doge sei pidiegani bana dhormo mastorune hei paron.”
41002027	Sebeden Jisu tharare holo, “Itchiore Jireni Dinnuo manjiortei banedie, Hintu manus Jireni Dinnuottei no banai.
41002028	Senottei Munischioro Puobuo Jireni Dinnuoro Probu.”
41003001	Jisu synagogot aro sommiegoi. Siot ek jon sitto ad manus elo.
41003002	Pharisigune Jisure sog di agon, Jireni Dinnuot sei sitto ad Manuschuore the gom gore nahi no gore. Judi gore, sale tare dujot phelebartei.
41003003	Jisu sitto ad Manuschuore holo, “Begkunor mujungot thie.”
41003004	Sebeden Jisu tharare holo, “Niomani onusare Jireni Dinnuot gom ham goribar de nahi hu-ham goribar de? Ien hi niomot age, gom gori dinei morei pelana?” Hintu thara hitchu no holak.
41003005	Jisu rak gori tharare seropala selo. Thara akkol han oion hinottei the monot dug pelo. Ar the sitto ad Manuschuore holo, “Tor adtan babei de.” Ar the tar adtan babei dilo. Jisu tar adtan oinnio gom adtano dogkie gom gori dilo.
41003006	Sebeden jogon-togon Pharisigune synagogottun nigilinei, Herodor manuschun somot Jisure morei pheleibar temmang gorilak.
41003007	Tar porendi Jisu tar sisjiogundoi sagoror parot gelak. Galili ar Judea dejottun jhag-jhag manus tar loge gelak.
41003008	Jisur gunor hamanir hobor suninei Jerusalemortun, Idumea dejottun ar Jordan sorar uhulor dejottun, Tyre ar Sidon sohoro hai-hure bamottun, shagor manus tar idu elak.
41003009	Manjior jhage tar thoschie obo hinottei, Jisu tar sisjiogunore tartei ekkan sigon naw jugol gori thoi dibartei holo.
41003010	Jisu shagor manus gom gorsie hinottei, biedi-bolagune tar heyet bajibartei thela-theli gorton.
41003011	Hajorchie aptai peie manuschune Jisure degile, bukpari salam gori porinei jogar parinei hon, “Tui Itchioror Puo.”
41003012	Jisu sei bhude peiegunore the honna bili no hobartei mana gorilo.
41003013	Jisu mouno pidit udinei tartun jigunore mone hoi sigunore tar sidu dagilo. The thara Jisur sidu gelak.
41003014	Jisur loge thebartei ar prosar gora dipadebartei, the baro jon baji tulilo.
41003015	Jisu tharare bhud dabei di paribartei ar aw-sugkie gom gori paribartei odhihar dilo.
41003016	Tharar nangani olode: Simon (Jisu tare nang thoi dilode Pitor.),
41003017	Zebedior puo Jakob ar Jakobor bhei Johon (Jisu ei di bheiore nang thoi dilode Boanerges. Sienor orthogan olode han gorommie manus.),
41003018	Andrio, Philip, Bartholomai, Mothi, Thoma, ar Alphaior puo Jakob, Thaddai ar dej-bhokto Simon.
41003019	Ar Juda Iskariod, Jisure dhora bajei diebuo.
41003020	Jokke Jisu ghoro bidirie somilogoi ek jhag manus thubeiondi, Senottei Jisu ar tar sisjiogune hitchu hei no tangoron.
41003021	Tar ghorbuogune sieni suinnion hinottei thara bhabilakke, “Jisu pagol oie” Senottei thara tare hoja elak.
41003022	Hoiek jon dhormo niomor mastor Jerusalemortun lami einei holakki, Hintu hoiek jone holak, “Bhudo raja Belzebular darai the bhud dabei de.”
41003023	Senottei Jisu tharare tar sidu dagi tulona hodadi holo; “Soitanore Soitane hingori dabei dibo?
41003024	Judi ekkan rejjio di bhag oinei biruddi solile, sei rejjiogan huno din thikko noi.
41003025	Judi ek ghorbuoi di bhag oinei biruddi solile, sei ghorbobuo huno din thikko noi.
41003026	Senottei, judi soitane nijere nije bhag oinei biruddi solile, the huno din thikko noi, Hintu nas obo.
41003027	Hono jone boli manuschuore akke no banilie, the tar ghorot somi pojabirie ludi loi no paribo. Sebeden the tar pojabirie ludi loi paribo.
41003028	“Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor, munischioror puogunor beg pabpani ar sorjanagani mab die obo;
41003029	Hintu je huno jone judi Pobitro Aptabuore sorjai sale huno din mab die no obo, sei manuschuo aw-phurondi sasti pebo.”
41003030	Dhormo niomo mastorune “Jisure hajorchie aptai peie” hoion hinottei, ei hodagan The holo.
41003031	Sokkene Jisur mabuo ar tar bheiun einei ghoro barendi thiei agondi, tare dagibartei thara ek jon manus dipadelak.
41003032	Tar seropala boi agonde manuschune tare holak, “Sah, torloi egottor obartei tor mabuo ar tor bheiun barendi Tore togadon.”
41003033	Ar the tharare uttor dinei holo, “Honna mor ma ar hugun mor bheiun?”
41003034	Tar seropala boi agonde manuschunor hitte seinei holo, “Igun mor ma ar mor bheiun.
41003035	Haron je Itchioror ischie doge gore, the olode mor bhei, bon ar ma.”
41004001	Sebeden sagoro parot jhag-jhag manus Jisur idu thubelakki. Senottei Jisu panit ekkan nawt bojilo. Beg manuschunore sigkie dibartei sagoro parot tar mokkie muo gori boja bajei dilo. Sebeden Jisu tharare sigkie die dorilo.
41004002	Ar the tharare tulona hodadi onek sigkie dilo. Jisu tharare sigkie dede holo,
41004003	“Suno! Sawh! Ek jon biji shidiei biji shidibartei gelo.
41004004	Ar edogkie olo, the biji sidi dede gulodok biji podo pazarat porilag. Sigun pheigkune einei hei phelliekki.
41004005	Ar gulodok biji madi padol sadara jagat porilag. Madi padol hinottei jhadi gejeilak.
41004006	Hintu jokke belan udinei rode shegilo, ar singor nei hinottei sidie oi gelak.
41004007	Ar gulodok biji hada bonot porilag. Hada bonan ojol oinei bijigunore dagi ragelo hinottei phol dori no parilak.
41004008	Hintu aro gulodok biji gom madit porilag. Igunottun sara udinei sawh loi-loi bari gelak ar phol dorilak. Hoiekkunottun tiris dunuo, heit dunuo, ar ek shot dunuo gori phol dorilak.”
41004009	Sei porendi Jisu holo, “Jar sunibar han age, the sunok!”
41004010	Ar gai-gai elode lokkene Jisur baro jon sisjio ar tar seropala elakke sigune sei tulona hodaganor sombonde pujor gorilak.
41004011	Jisu tharare holo, “Itchioror rejjior gubonan buji paribartei tomare gyen die oie. Hintu barendi agonde sigunore tulona hodadi beg huo oie.
41004012	“Senottei: ‘Thara sade sebak, hintu buji loi partak noi. Sunde sunibak, hintu bujtak noi. Seienie no ole tharar monani phireibak ar tharar pabpani mab die obo.’ ”
41004013	Ar Jisu tharare holo, “Ei tulona hodagan buji no parotte parapang? Sedogkie ole a hingori beg tulona hodagani buji pariba?
41004014	Biji sidiebuoi Itchioror hodagan sider.
41004015	Hoiek jon manus olakke sei podo pazarat porsie bijigunor obostani dogkie. Thara sunonar jogon-togon soitannuoi eje ar sigunor ontorot sittie Itchioror hodagan nigiliei nejai.
41004016	Thik sedogkie gori hoiek jon manus olakke sei madi padol sadara jagat porsie bijigunor obostani dogkie. Itchioror hodagan thara sunile jogon-togon thara hujhi gori mani lon.
41004017	Hintu tharar ontoro murot song singor nei hinottei bana hanekkon gori tigi thei paron. Jogon Itchioror hodaganottei hosto ele, ar manjie uttiesar gorilie, jogon-togon odot jhuri poron.
41004018	Ar hoiek jon manus olakke sei hada banot Porsie bijigunor obostani dogkie. Itchioror hodagan thara sunonde oi.
41004019	Hintu thara ei halor sintiettei, dhon-sompottir lubbot bajhi, aro oinnio lub somi, Itchioror hodaganore dagi ragai hinottei phola phol neie on.
41004020	Hintu hoiek jon manus olakke sei gom madit porsie bijigunor obostani dogkie. Itchioror hodagan thara sunon ar mani lon hinottei thara phola phol on. Ek dagie tiris dunuo, hoi ek dagie heit dunuo, ar ek dagie ek shot dunuo phol utponno goron.”
41004021	Jisu tharare holo, “Serag ogiro tole bah leio tole thobartei ano ni na? Serag dagi thona oi ni noi?
41004022	Haronan olode manjie jieni gubei thon, Itchiore sieni phogodang gori dibo. Jien dagi tho oie sien hulo obo.
41004023	Jar sunibar han age, the sunok.”
41004024	Aro Jisu tharare holo, “Uijkare suni thago! Tumi jei mabpoi mabo, tomareo sei mabpoi maba obo. Aro ekka bes gori tomare maba obo.
41004025	Haron jar age tare aro bes die obo. Hintu jar nei, tar jien age sieno tartun hari luo obo.”
41004026	Jisu aro holo, “Itchioror rejjiogan edogkie: Ek jon manjie madit biji sidilo.
41004027	The reidot ghum jei ar dinot jagi theinei somoi hadeilo. Sei somoio bidirie bijigun gejeilak ar sara udi dangor-digol olak. Sei Manuschuoi tar hedtan henjannie olo hoi no pare.
41004028	Madigane gai-gai saragun dangor-digol goreilo, ar biji dorilak. Akke pada phudilo, tar porendi thor nigililo, ar tar porendi biji boron gori shora nigililo.
41004029	Jokke bijigun pagilak, habibar okto olo. Sebeden manuschuoi tar sharigan loi haba dorilo.”
41004030	Jisu holo, “Itchioror rejjiogan hiloi tulona goribong? Hior tulona hodadi ien bhangi di paribong?
41004031	Ien olode tumi madit sidode iottun ekkuo sorjio biji dogkie. Sorjio bijibuo olode madit sidonde biji moiddie begottun sigon.
41004032	Hintu sidenar porendi, ibie dangor oi. Beg shak padorottun bes dangor oi. Dangor-dangor dhela loi. Senottei pheig ejon ar sorjio gajo shabat tole bhah goron.”
41004033	Shagor edogkie tulona hodadi Jisu manuschunore Itchioro hoda hoi die. Thara jittur buji paron sittur The tharare hoi dilo.
41004034	Hintu Jisu bana tulona hodadi tharare hoi die. Manus no thande lokkene, the tar sisjiogunore begkani bhagi de.
41004035	Sei dinnie beillie Jisu tar sisjiogunore holo, “Ami uhule jei.”
41004036	Sokkene sisjiogune manuschunore dipadanar porendi, Jisu jei nawganot elo sei nawganot gori thara tare loinei gelak. Siot aro oinnio sigon noio elo.
41004037	Tokkanot borboh bah dorilo. Pani tubol nawganot abor hei nawganot pani somer.
41004038	Jisu nawganor pazandi balos sidendi ghum jar. Tar sisjiogune tare jaginei holak, “Guruthagur, ami daw mori jer, amare ekka sah nah!”
41004039	Sebeden Jisu udi boieranore gubilo, ar sagoranore the holo, “Thama! Olor awh!” Sebeden boieran thameilo, ar jodepode olor olo.
41004040	Tar porendi Jisu tar sisjiogunore holo, “A hittei edok dorelade? Ejo song tomar bischias shokto no oi?”
41004041	Sebeden thara Jisure shanggadik dorelak. Thara-thara huobula gorilak, “Ibie henjannie manus? Boierane ar sagoraneio tar hoda mani pai.”
41005001	Sebeden Jisu ar tar sisjiogun somot Galili sagoro uhule Gadara manjior dejot lungilakki.
41005002	Jisu nawganottun uttiegoio, ek jon hajorchie aptai peie manus sojan holattun tar idu elo.
41005003	Ei Manuschuo sojan holat thedo. Tare huno jone singolloio bani rage no paron.
41005004	Manjie tare tar adot thengot singolloi bani thodak. Hintu the ador thengot singolani sini pelai. Huno jone tar loge borei no ejon.
41005005	Dine-reide onsur sojan holai-holai ar ek murottun aro ek murot hijiek hari-hari beredo. Ar dhar silloi tar nijor heyet habido.
41005006	Jisure durottun denei, the daba-daba elo ar tar mujungot bukpari salam gori porilo.
41005007	Ar the birat ro gori Jisure holo, “Jisu, begottun Dangor Itchioror puobuo! Tui more hi gorte sas? Itchioror nage mui magongor, tui more hosto no dis.”
41005008	Haron Jisu tare hoiede, “Hajorchie aptabuo, ei manuschuottun nigili ja!”
41005009	Sebeden Jisu tartun pujor gorilo, “Tor nangan hi?” Ar sei manuschuoi uttor dilo, “Ami jakkuo hinottei, mor nangan olode Legionδ.”
41005010	Ar the Jisure bar-bar hujoli gorer jen tharare sei jaganottun dabei no de.
41005011	Sokkene sei mounnuor hai dangor ek pal sugor sorton.
41005012	Beg bhudtune Jisure hujoli gori holak, “Sugorunor bidirie somi pari para, amare dipada.”
