41005013	Ar jogon-togon Jisu tharare somibartei ugum dilo. Hajorchie aptagune manuschuottun nigili jei sugorunor bidirie somilakkoi. Sebeden goda sugoro palluo jhok pori tarengodi porinei sagorot dubi mori gelak. Sei sugoro palluot perai di azar sugor elak.
41005014	Jigune sei sugorun soradon, thara sokkene daba-daba jeinei sohoror ar hai-hure beg jaganit ei hoboran holakkoi.
41005015	Jokke thara Jisur hai lungilakki, sei azar bhude peie manuschuoi habor uri, lokki gori boi agede deginei thara dorelak.
41005016	Ei ghodonagan jigune degkion, sigune sei bhude peie Manuschuor hoboran ar sei sugorunor hoboran manus-chunore holak.
41005017	Ar manuschune tharar bamottun jebartei Jisure hujoli gora dorilak.
41005018	Jisu jekke nawganot uder, sokkene, jei Manuschuore agendi bhude peie, the tar loge jebartei Jisure hujoli gorilo.
41005019	Hintu Jisu tare loge jebar no dilo. Senottei the tare holo, “Tui tor ghorot phiri ja. Ar probu tortei hodog dangor ham gori die ar tore hodog doye gorsie sieni tor ghorbuogunore jeinei hogoi.”
41005020	Sebeden Manuschuoi siottun jeinei goda Doschan sohorot berei-berei Jisu tartei hodak dangor ham goridie hologoi. Senottei, jigune tar hoboran sunon sigune amok on.
41005021	Jisu aro nawt gori sagoro uhule par oinei, jhag-jhag manus tar idu thubelakki. The sokkene sagoro parot elo.
41005022	Jaira nange ek jon synagog lobiot gorie Jisur idu einei tar thengo hure bukpari salam gori porilogi.
41005023	The Jisure thajei hujoli gori holo, “Mor sigon jhibuo morong-morong oie. Doye gori einei Tor adtani tar ugure tuli dille the gom obo ar bajibo.”
41005024	Sebeden Jisu tar loge gelo: Ar Jisur pune-pune jhag-jhag manus thela-theli gori jadon.
41005025	Ar siot ekkuo baro bojorchie ridupirie-bola milie elo.
41005026	Onek daktoror adot hosto peie. The jedog pare sedog horoj gorilo. Sokkene gom obo, aro bes oiede.
41005027	Jisur hoboran the suni, manjior jhag siri einei Jisur haborot dhorsiegi.
41005028	The mone-mone holo, “mui bana tar haboran dhorilieo gom om.”
41005029	Ar jogon-togon tar lo poranagan gom oie bili nije tar heyet hobor pelo.
41005030	Sebeden Jisu tar bidiriettun ham gori parede hemodagan nigilie bili jogon-togon tar ontorot hobor pelo. Manuschunor hitte muo phireinei holo, “Honna mor haborot dhorsie?”
41005031	Tar sisjiogune tare holak, “Edukkun manjie Tore thelonde degor, a hittei tui hor, ‘More honna dhorsie?’ ”
41005032	Sebeden Jisu tare dhorsiede miliebuor seropala selo.
41005033	Ar sei miliebuoi tar heyet hi ghodi jeie sien hobor pei, dore girgirei-girgirei einei Jisur mujungot bukpari salam gori pori tare beg soittio hodagan holo.
41005034	Ar the tare holo, “Jhi, tor bischiaschane tore gom gorilo. Shantie jagoi, ar tor edogkie hosto no ok ar.”
41005035	Jisu hoda horte lokkene Jairar ghorottun hoiek jon manus elak. Thara Jairare holak, “Tor jhibuo nei ar. A hittei Guruthagurore dug lagor?”
41005036	Hintu Jisu sei manuschunor hodagani sunonar jogon-togon Jairare holo, “No dores. Bana bischias gor.”
41005037	Ar Jisu Pitorore, Jakobore ar Jakobor bhei Johonore bade huno jon tar loge no nilo.
41005038	Jokke thara synagog lobiot goriebuor ghorot lungilakki, Jisu joul gortonde degilogi. Manuschune ek dajie gujhi-gujhi handon ar ek dagie gujhi-gujhi handonde degilogi.
41005039	Jisu ghoro bidirie jeinei manuschunore holo, “Tumi a hittei joul goror ar hanor? Milie-shawhbuo no more, hintu ghum jar.”
41005040	Ar ei hodagan suninei manuschune Jisure azilak. Senottei the begkunore barendi nigilei dilo. Sebeden milie-shawhbuor bab-ma ar tar tin jon sisjio somot milie-shawhbuo agede siot somilakkoi
41005041	Jisu tare addot dhorinei holo, “Talitha koumi.” Sienor orthogan olode, “Nagori, mui hongor, tui uth.”
41005042	Jogon-togon milie-shawhbuoi udinei bera dorilo. The olode baro bojorchie milie. Manuschune sien deginei shanggadik amok oi sadhu olak.
41005043	Hintu Jisu tharare huno jonore no hobartei shokto gori mana gorilo. Sebeden Jisu milie-shawhbuore hebar jinij dibartei holo.
41006001	Sienor porendi Jisu siottun jei tar nijor adamot lungilogi. Tar sisjioguneo tar loge gelak.
41006002	Jireni Dinnuot Jisu synagogot jeinei sigkie die dorilo. Shagor manus tar hoda gani suni amok oinei holak, “Ei Manuschuoi huttun ei hodagani peie? Ei Manuschuore edogkie gyen hona dilo?
41006003	“Ei Manuschuo haligorsie ar Merir puobuo, noi ni? Jakobor, Josebor, Judar ar Simon dagir bhei, noi ni? Amar loge agonde sigun tar bonun noi ni?” Senottei thara Jisure bischias no gorilak.
41006004	Hintu Jisu tharare holo, “Nijor adamot, nijor sodorsieguno bidire ar ghorot bade ek jon munie beg jagat sorman pai.”
41006005	Ar aw-sugkie manus hoiek jon adtuli dinei gom goranar bade siot ar the mohima ham gori no pare.
41006006	Manuschune Jisure bischias no golliek hinottei the shanggadik amok olo. Sebeden manuschunore sigeibartei, adame-adame the bera dorilo.
41006007	Jisu tar baro jon sisjio tar idu dagilo. Ar dijon-dijon gori the tharare phadelo. Hajorchie aptaguno ugure ham gori paribartei the tharare odhihar dilo.
41006008	Jisu tharare edogkie ugum dilo: porbhajot jade bana ekkuo ludig bade ar hitchu no nejeio. Pidie, hotchal, ar jebot tengaioδ no loio.
41006009	Sendel pinnio hintu dibie shilum no loio.
41006010	Jisu aro tharare holo, “Tumi je ghoranot gorba uduogoi, sei adaman sari no jo song sei ghoranot thagkuo.
41006011	Ar je tomare lobiot no gore bah, tomar hoda no sunilie, sale, sei adamortun jade tomar thengopadar dhullie jhari di etchio. Sien tharar biruddie shakki obo. Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor: Itchiore bijier goribode dinnuot Sodom ar Gomorat sasti dibode sittun bes sei sohoranottei aghattie sasti dibo!”
41006012	Sebeden Jisur sisjiogune lod dilak ar manuschune pabottun mon phirebartei prosar gorilak.
41006013	Thara onek bhud dabei dilak ar onek aw-sugkiere madat tel guli dinei gom gorilak.
41006014	Jisu nangkora oie hinottei Herod Rajai tar hobor sunilo. Herode holo, “Baptisma gori die Johone morattun jiei uttie. Senottei the ei amok hamani gorer.”
41006015	Ek dagie holak, “The Elija obode.” Aro ek dagie holak, “The purona amolor muni dogkie ek jon muni obode.”
41006016	Hintu Herode suninei holo, “The hamakkai mui sirie habi duongge Johone obo. Morattun the aro jiei uttiede!”
41006017	Haron tar bhei Philibor mogkuo Herodittei Herode manus padeinei Johonore bani ani jiel-hanat bhorei thoiegi. Haron Herode Herodire loie.
41006018	Baptisma gori die Johone Herodore bar-bar hoi, “Tor bheior mogkuo tui loioschie ien niom noi.”
41006019	Senottei Herodi Johonore bis degilo ar morei pheleibar mone hor. Hintu morei pheleibar tartun hemoda nei.
41006020	Herode Johone dharmig ar pobitro manus bili hobor pai. Senottei tare dhorai ar rokkie gori ragai. Johonor hoda suninei Herode onek ham gorsie. The tar hodagani mon di suni thai.
41006021	Bego sejot ekkan sujuk elo. Herodor jormo utchobo dinnuot tar ajol ajol murubbigun, senapotigunδ ar Galilir murubbigunore reidot meitbanot bolelo.
41006022	Sebeden Herodir jhibuo einei tharar mujungot najilogi. Herodore ar tar gorbagunore the mon hujhi gori dilo. Senottei Herod Rajai sei gaburire holo, “Tor jien mone hoi sien mag, mui tore dim.”
41006023	Ar Herode sobot heinei sei gaburire holo, “Tui jien magos mui tore sien dim, dorkar ole mor rejjiogan song bhag mui tore dim.”
41006024	Ar the nigili jei tar ma sidu gelo. The tar mare holo, “Ma, mui rajartun hi magim?” Tar mai tare holo, “Baptisma gori die Johonor siriebuo magkoi.”
41006025	Ar jogon-togon miliebuoi jhadi gori rajar idu elo. The rajare holo, “Baptisma gori die Johonor siriebuo ekkuo bajonot gori more ikkie de.
41006026	Ar rajar shanggadik monot dug olo: Hintu tar sobottanottei ar tar loge bojchionde sigunor harone the no dinei sari no parilo.
41006027	Ar jogon-togon rajai ek jon joldar dagi Johonor siriebuo anibartei ugum dilo. Ar sei joldarbuoi jiel-hanat somi Johonor siriebuo habi anilogoi.
41006028	Sebeden the siriebuo ekkuo bajonot tuli gaburire dilogi. Ar gaburi sei siriebuo tar mare dilogoi.
41006029	Johonor sisjiogune ei hoboran peinei thara elak. Johonor madalabuo ninei thara garelakkoi
41006030	Jisu je baro jon sisjio dipadeie thara phiri elak. Ar thara jieni-jieni gorsion ar sigkie duon sieni begkani tare holakki.
41006031	Sokkene shagor manus siot etton-jadon hinottei Jisu ar tar sisjiogune hebar somoi no pelak. Senottei Jisu tar sisjiogunore holo, “Tumi mor loge juj gori ejo, ekkan niribili jagat jeinei jireioi.”
41006032	Sebeden thara nawt gori ekkan niribili jagat juj gori gelak.
41006033	Ar thara jade somoi manuschune tharare degkion. Bhaluk jone Jisure sinnion. Senottei prottiek jagattun manuschune daba-daba torbuo jei, sei jaganot tharattun akke lunginei thubei agondoi.
41006034	Jisu nawganottun laminei shagor manjior jhag degilo. Rakkoli sara bera-shagolor dogkie manuschunor obostani deginei tartun baari sit puri udilo. Senottei the tharare onek sigkie die dorilo.
41006035	Jokke dinnuo ses oi gelo, Jisu sisjiogune tar idu einei holakki, “Ien olode jonosunnio jaga, ar belano duberloi.
41006036	Manuschunore tui dipada tharattun hitchu hebar nei hinottei, thara hai-hure adamanit jeinei nijor hebar pidie hini loi parondoi para.”
41006037	Hintu Jisu tar sisjiogune holo, “Tumi tharare hiju hebar jinij duo.” Ar tar sisjiogune tare holak, “Ami jeinei di shot denarirδ pidie hini aninei hi tharare hebartei dibong?”
41006038	Senottei Jisu tharattun pujor gorilo, “Tomartun hoien pidie age? Jeinei sawhgoi.” Ar thara hoion age hobor peinei holakki, “Paschan pidie ar dibie maj.”
41006039	Sebeden Jisu tar sisjiogune ugum dilo jen thara beg manuschunore eil heror ugure dol-dol gori boja bajei duon.
41006040	Ar manuschune ek shot jon, ponjas jon ponjas jon gori bojilak.
41006041	Sebeden Jisu sei paschan pidie ar dibie maj adot loinei, agajor hitte muo gori Itchiorore hujhi hoda holo. Ar manuschunore dibartei pidiegani hotta gorinei tar sisjiogunore dilo. Esannie gori the begkune dibie maj bhag gori dilo.
41006042	Sebeden begkune helak ar begkunor ped bhorilo.
41006043	Manuschune hei hai ugursie pidie ar maj sisjiogune tuli lolakke boron baro lei.
41006044	Pidie heiegun olakke bana morodo pas azar.
41006045	Manuschunore the bidei gorte sagoro uhuledi Bethsaida adamot tartun akke jei paron para, Jisu tar sisjiogunore jebartei jogon-togon nawt uduo bajei dilo.
41006046	Manuschunore bidei denar porendi the bor magibartei ekkuo mouno padit udilogoi.
41006047	Reid oinei Jisur sisjiogune nawgandoi sagoro song moiddie lungondoi ar indi Jisu gai-gai muro ugure elo.
41006048	Jisu degilo tar sisjiogun jadonde mokkiettun boier baar hinottei thara baari hosto gori pangei badon. Poittie amollie Jisu thara idu pani uguredi adi-adi ei, tharare phelei jebar oie.
41006049	Hintu tar sisjiogune tare pani uguredi adi jade denei thara bhud mone gori hijiek hari uttuon.
41006050	Jisure deginei thara begkune doreon. Senottei jogon-togon Jisu tharare madeinei holo, “Sahoj goro. Sibie mui, no doreo.”
41006051	Sebeden Jisu tharar loge nawganot udilo, ar boieranio thameilo. Tar sisjiogune shanggadik amok oi asarjio olak.
41006052	Thara akkol han hinottei pas azar manjiore pidie habeieganor ortho thara buji loi no paron. Senottei ikkieio thara asarjio olak.
41006053	Thara sagoran par oinei, Gennesaret bamot lungilakki. Thara nawgan gang hule bani tholak.
41006054	Thara nawganottun lammuono manuschune Jisure sinnion.
41006055	Sei bamot jagai-jagai dumoro-dumuri porilo. Sebeden manuschune Jisu hudu age hobor loinei, thara padi ugure tuli aw-sugkiegunore tar idu bhaar gori ana dorilak.
41006056	Ar Jisu adamot jok, bah hedot jok, manuschune aw-sugkiegun bazarot ledei thon. Aw-sugkiegunore tar ursie haboro hazat dhoribar dibartei manuschune Jisure hujoli goron. Ar aw-sugkie manjie je tare dhore the gom oi.
41007001	Sebeden hoiek jon Pharisi ar dhormo niomor mastor Jerusalemortun einei Jisur hai thubelakki.
41007002	Thara degilak Jisur hoiek jon sisjioi hajor adtoi hebartei bojchion. Hajor ortho olode adhoie. Senottei thara-tharar ugure abitti gorilak.
41007003	Pharisigune ar beg Judaiune tharar borjonnune die dostur mojim thara dolei ad no dhole hitchu no haan.
41007004	Bazarottun thara elegoio burinei no gadile thara hitchu no haan. Ienor bade thara aro bhalukkani dostur palei pan. Sieni olode goloj, hum, pidolor pilie, ar ghum jaidie ogirani dhona.
41007005	Sebeden Pharisi ar dhormo niomor mastorune Jisuttun pujor gorilak, “Tor sisjiogune borjonnune die dosturano doge no adinei a hittei thara ad no dhoie gori bhat haan?”
41007006	Jisu tharare uttor dinei holo, “Tumi phagaragun! Tomar sombonde muni Isaia thik gori hoi di jeie. Tar boibuot edogkie gori legkie age: ‘Ei manuschune tharar muendi more sorman goron. Hintu tharar monani mortun pharok.
41007007	Manjie baneie niomani thara sigan hinottei thara more tobona goronde ien aittie magana.’
41007008	Tumi Itchioror ugumani no maninei, manjie die dosturani tumi palor. Ei dosturani doge tumi hum, ar goloj dhoi po. Aro seienie onek tumi goro.”
41007009	Jisu tharare holo, “Tomar nijor dosturani paleibartei Itchioror uguman tumi aw-mannio goror. Sedogkie gorilie baari gom bilinei tumi mone goror.
41007010	Mosi hoie, ‘Tor bab mare sorman goris.’ Ar ‘Je tar nijor bab mare gobe, tumi tare morei phellio.’
41007011	Hintu tumi hode, ‘Ek jon judi hoi, “Mor bab-magunore sahajjio goribar tengagunδ korban oie.” ’ Sienor ortho olode Itchioro sidu utchorbo gora oie.
41007012	Senottei tumi tar bab-Mattei ar hitchu no goribar mana goro.
41007013	Esannie gori tomar borjonnune die dosturani sigkie dinei Itchioror hodagan tumi aw-mannio goror. Ar sedogkie ham onek goro.”
41007014	Sebeden Jisu beg jonogonore tar idu dagi tharare holo, “Tumi begkune mor hoda suno ar buji lo.
41007015	Bharettun jieni manjior bidirie jai, sienie manjiore aw-pobitro gori no pare. Hintu manjior bidiriettun jieni nigili eje, sienie manjiore aw-pobitro gore.
41007016	Jar sunibar han age, the sunok.”
41007017	Ar Jisu manuschunore phelei jei ghoro bidirie somilogoi. Sebeden tar sisjiogune tartun sei tulona hodagano sombonde pujor gorilak.
41007018	Senottei Jisu tharare holo, “Tumio ien buji no parotte parapang? Bharettun jieni manjior bidirie some, sienie tare aw-pobitro gori no pare.
41007019	Ienor haronan olode, sien daw tar ontorot no some, hintu tar ped dor bidirie some ar tar porendi heyettun nigili jai. Ei hodagandoi Jisu bujei dilode, beg haidie jinijchani pobitro.”
41007020	Jisu aro holo, “Manjior bidiriettun jieni nigili eje, sieni manjiore aw-pobitro gore.
41007021	Haronan olode manjior bidiriettun, mane ontorottun ejede hu-bhab, shanda, porpagol, hun gorana,
41007022	Sur, lubbo, phagara, hanggi, geil dena, manjior thogana, sorjana, podani ar aw-gyen.
41007023	Ei beg horabpani manjior bidiriettun nigili eje ar manjiore aw-pobitro gore.”
41007024	Jisu sei jaganottun jei Tyre ar Sidon bamot elo. Tartun mone holode tare huno jone hobor no pedak. Senottei the ekkan ghorot somilogoi. Hintu The pollei thei no parilo.
41007025	Ekkuo miliei Jisur hobor sunilo. Tar jhibuo hajorchie aptai peie hinottei the Jisu idu einei Jisur thengot bukpari salam gori porilogi.
41007026	Sei miliebuo olode Grik milie. Tar jormo olode Syria, Phoenikia dejot. Tar jhibottun bhudtuo dabei dibartei the Jisure hujoli gorilogi.
41007027	Hintu Jisu tare holo, “Akke gurogune ped boron hadok. Gurogunottun pidie hari loinei hugurunore dena gom noi.”
41007028	Sebeden miliebuoi Jisure uttor di holo, “Probu, enedo oi. Hintu gurogune haade tebilor tole pidie guri jhuri pole hugurune daw haan.”
41007029	Ar Jisu tare holo, “Ei hodagan hole hinottei tui jei paribie. Tor jhibuottun bhudtuo nigili jeiegoi.”
41007030	Ar tar jhibuottun bhudtuo nigili jeie hinottei the ghorot jeinei tar jhibuo ogirot Porsie gori degilogoi.
41007031	Jisu aro Tyre ar Sidon baman sari Dekapolis bamot phuri jei Galili sagorot lungilogi.
41007032	Hoiek jon manjie Jisur idu ek jon haal aro bub manus anilak. Ar sei Manuschuor ugure tar adtani tuli dibartei thara Jisure hujoli gorilak.
41007033	Sebeden Jisu sei manuschore manjior jhagor bidiriettun ek huredi ninei, tar di-hanot angul di dilo. Ar sep dinei tar jilan dhori dilo.
41007034	Sebeden Jisu agajor hitte seinei bor-nijes iridi manuschuore holo, “Ephphatha.” Sienor ortho olode, “Huluo ja.”
41007035	Ar jogon-togon tar hanani huluo gelo. Tar jilano huluo gelo ar the gome-dalei hoda hoi parilo
41007036	Ar Jisu thara harore no hobartei tharare mana gorilo. Hintu jedog tharare the mana gorilo, sedog thara prosar gorilak.
41007037	Ar thara begkune baari amok oinei holak, “The beg dolei gorilo. Halore sunon para ar bubore hoda hoi paron para gori dilo.”
41008001	Sei lokkene manjior jhagkuo baari dangor elo. Tharar hitchu hebar nei hinottei Jisu tar sisjiogunore tar idu daginei holo,
41008002	“Ei manuschunore mortun sit purer. Thara mor somare tin din olakki ar tharattun hitchu hebar nei.
41008003	Mui judi tharare abuhoda tharar ghorot padang, jade adah podot thara ped porai oran obakkoi. Ek dagie olakke pod durottie.”
41008004	Ar tar sisjiogune Jisure uttor dilak, “Ei moruobomit tharar ped bhore song pidie huttun pei dibong?”
41008005	Ar Jisu tharattun pujor gorilo, “Tomartun hoien pidie age?” Ar thara holak, “Amattun sattan pidie age.”
41008006	Sebeden Jisu manuschunore madi ugure bojibartei ugum dilo. Ar the sattan pidie adot loinei Itchiorore hujhi hoda honar porendi pidiegani hotta gorilo. Manuschunore bhag gori dibartei, Jisu tar sisjiogunore dilo. Sebeden thara bhag gori dilak.
41008007	Tharar guri maj gulek elak. Jisu ei manuschunotteio Itchiorore baini gorilo. Manuschunore bhag gori dibartei tar sisjiogunore ugum dilo.
41008008	Sebeden begkune helak, ar begkunor ped bhorilo. Manuschune hei hai ugursieni sisjiogune tuli lolakke boron dangor sat lei.
41008009	Siot perai ser azar manjie heion. Sebeden Jisu tar tharare bidei dilo.
41008010	Jogon-togon Jisu tar sisjiogun somot ekkan nawt udi Dalmanutha bamot gelak.
41008011	Sebeden hoiek jon Pharisi Jisur idu einei tarloi torgo gora dorilakki. Tare sagi sebartei thara Jisuttun ekkan sorgottun sinno degebartei magilak.
41008012	Hintu Jisu tar ontorottun bor-nijes iri dinei holo, “Ei jugor manuschune a hittei sinno togan? Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor, ei jugor manuschunore huno sinno dega no obo.”
41008013	Ar sebeden Jisu tharare phelei jei nawganot udi sagoro uhule gelo.
41008014	Ar Jisu tharare pidie nibar puri peillion nawganot tharar bana ekkan pidie elo.
41008015	Ar Jisu tharare uij dilo, “Seio! Pharisigunor ar Herodor moli pokke uijkare thagkuo.”
41008016	Sebeden thara-thara huobula gorinei holak, “Amattun pidie nei hinottei the ei hodagan hor.”
41008017	Hintu thara huobula gortonde sien Jisu hobor peinei tharare holo, “Pidie neidie sombonde a hittei huobula goror? Ejosong hobor no pode nahi no bujode parapang? Ejosong akkol han oi ago ni na?
41008018	Tomar sog age, a hittei tumi no dego? Tomar han age, a hittei tumi no suno? A hittei tomar manot nei?
41008019	Jokke mui pas azar manjiortei paschan pidie hotta gori duong, sei lokkene boron hoi lei hei-hai ugursieni tumi tulliode?” Thara Jisure holak, “Baro lei.”
41008020	Aro Jisu holo, “Jokke mui sattan pidie ser azar manjiortei hotta gori duong, sei lokke dangor hoi lei heie ugursieni tumi tulliode?” Ar thara holak, “Sat lei.”
41008021	Sebeden Jisu tharare holo, “Sale, tumi ejosong a hittei no bujor?”
41008022	Sebeden thara Bethsaida adamot lungilakki. Ar hoiek jon manjie ek jon han manus Jisur idu anilak. Han manuschuor heyet dhoribartei thara Jisure hujoli gorilak.
41008023	Sebeden Jisu han manuschunore adot dhori adamor barendi nilo, manuschuor sogkuot sep didenar poride tar heyet adtani dinei tartun pujor gorilo, “Huno ekkan degor ni?”
41008024	Han manuschuoi rini seinei holo, “Mui manuschunore degongor. Hintu tharare gajor dog gori berade degongor.”
41008025	Sebeden Jisu aro tar adtani manuschuor sogkunot di dilo. Jisu tare dege para gori dilo. Tar sogkun hulo jei phor olak. Sebeden manuschuoi beg porak-porak gori deger.
41008026	Ar Jisu tharare tar nijor ghorot dipadei dede holo, “Adamot no someschoi ar adamot harore no hos.”
41008027	SebedenJisuartarsisjiogune sei jagan phelei jei Kaisarea Philippi adamanit gelak. Jade-jade Jisu tar sisjiogunottun pujor gorilo, “Mui honna bili manjie hon?”
41008028	Thara uttor dilak, “The baptisma gori die Johone, ar ek dagie hon, the Elija, aro ek dagie hon, the munigunottun ek jon obode.”
41008029	Jisu tharare holo, “Hintu tumi more honna bili ho?” Pitore Jisure uttor dinei holo, “Tui olede Kristo.”
41008030	Sebeden Jisu tharare shokto gori mana gorilo. Mor sombonde tumi harore no hoio.
41008031	Tar porendi Jisu tar sisjiogunore sigkie die dorilo: Munischioror Puobuoi onek dug-hosto pebo. Borjonnune, rajguruthagurune ar dhormo niomor mastorune tare no manibak. Tare morei pheleibak, hintu tin dino porendi the aro jiei udibo.
41008032	Jisu ei hodagan hulomela gori hoi dilo. Hintu Pitore ek huredi ninei tare goba dorilo.
41008033	Hintu Jisu muo phireinei tar sisjiogunor hitte sei Pitore gubilo, “Soitan, tui mor iottun jagoi! Haron tor bhabonagan Itchiorottun no eje, hintu manjiortun ejchie.”
41008034	Sebeden Jisu manuschunore sisjiogun somot tar idu daginei holo, “Je mor loge judi edo sai, salen, tar nijor monjokka no gori tar kroschan buginei mor loge ejok.
41008035	Haron je tar poranan bajeibartei sai, the arebo. Hintu je mortei ar gom hoboranottei tar poranan arai, the tar poranan rokkie goribo.
41008036	Haron ek jone goda songsaran peinei judi tar nijor poranan arele, sien tar hi lab obo?
41008037	Bah tar porananor bodoli the hi dam di paribo?
41008038	Haron je mortei ar mor hodaganittei ei biebijier ar pabor jugkuot lajai, Munischioror Puobuoio jokke tar Babor mohimagandoi ar pobitro sorgo-dudtun somot ebo, sokkene sibiettei the lajeibo.”
41009001	Jisu tharare holo, “Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor, iot hoiek jon thiei agonde igunottun Itchioror rejjiogan hemodaloi ette no degon song mortak noi.”
41009002	Shoi din porendi Jisu Pitorore, Jakobore ar Johonore judo gori tar loge nilo. The tharare ekkuo ojol mounnot tulilogoi. Siot tharar mujungot Jisur debo-rong phudilo.
41009003	The uri agede haborani joljollie oi borobor dogkie dhub-dhub olo. Ei pittimit huno jone dhoinei sedogkie dhub-dhub gori partak noi.
41009004	Mosi ar Elija tharar mujungot dega dinei Jisuloi hoda hodon.
41009005	Sebeden Pitore Jisure madelo, “Robbi, ami iot thele gom obo. Tinan bajei bani tortei ekkan, Mosittei ekkan ar Elijattei ekkan.”
41009006	Thara adik dore, Pitore hi hobo bili hobor no pai.
41009007	Sebeden tharare mege dagilo, ar sei megkanottun ekkuo sobdo bhar olo, “Ibie mor agojor Puobuo. Tar hoda suinnio.”
41009008	Jogon-togon, thara seropala rini selak. Jisure bade ar huno jonore tharar loge no degilak
41009009	Mounnuottun thara lambegi Jisu tharare mana gorilo: Munischioror Puobuo morattun jedogkon song jiei no ude, sedogkon song tumi degilade ien harore no hoio.
41009010	Thara Jisur sombonde harore no holak. Hintu thara-thara huobula gorton, morattun jiei uduonar orthogan hi.
41009011	Thara Jisuttun pujor gorilak, “Dhormo niomor mastorune Elija akke eja poribo, a hittei hon?”
41009012	Jisu tharare uttor di holo, “Elija daw hamakkai akke ebo, beg jabotio thik gori dibogi. Munischioror Puobuoi onek dug-hosto pebo ar manjie tare aw-pela goribak gori, a hittei lega age?
41009013	Mui tomare hongor: Elija daw honatto ejchie. Tar sombonde legkonde doge manjie mone hoi sien tare gorsion.
41009014	Jisu ar sei tin jon sisjio somot oinnio sisjiogunor idu phiri einei degilakki, tharar seropala shagor manus thubeion. Ar dhormo niomor mastorune thararloi suol gora-gori gorton.
41009015	Jogon-togon beg manuschune Jisure degkionuo thara baari amok olak. Tar sidu daba-daba jei tare salam gorilakkoi.
41009016	Jisu dhormo niomor mastorunottun pujor gorilo, “Tumi thararloi a hittei suol gora-gori goror?”
41009017	Sebeden manjior jhagottun ek jone holo, “Guruthagur, mor puobuore no mattie bhude peie hinottei mui tor idu anilung.
41009018	Sei bhudtuoi tare jokke dhore, tare madit goschei pelai. Gurobuor han phena nigilie, geret-geret dad hamarai, ar goda heye honggorong oie. Mui tor sisjiogunore bhudtuo dabei dibartei hoiong, hintu thara no paron.”
41009019	Jisu tare uttor di holo, “Oh, ei jugor bischias no gorsie manuschun, mui tomar loge hodog bilon theim? Hodog bilon mui tomare soijjio gorim? Tare mor idu ano.”
41009020	Sebeden manuschune gurobuore Jisur idu anilak. Bhudtuoi Jisure degkieo gurobuore thajei jhagerei madit goschei pheleilo. Madit egor-ugor har ar tar han phena sag nigilie.
41009021	Jisu gurobuor babpuottun pujor gorilo, “Homolettun duri tar edogkie oie?” Gurobuor babpuoi uttor dilo, “Sigonottun duri.
41009022	Bhudtuoi tare morei pheleibartei onsur tare agunot ar panit pheleide. Hintu tui judi amare je huno ekkan upai gori di paros, sale, doye gorinei amare sahajjio gor.”
41009023	Jisu tare holo, “Tui judi bischias gori paros, je bischias gore tartei beg sombob.”
41009024	Jogon-togon gurobuor babpuoi sogor pani dara-dara oi jogar pari holo, “Probu, mui bischias gorong. Mor aw-bischiaschanot more bol de.”
41009025	Jisu manuschunore daba-daba ek loge ette deginei hajorchie aptabuore gobinei ugum dilo, “Hal ar no mattie aptabuo, mui tore ugum dilung, tar bidiriettun nigili ai! Tar bidirie ar huno bar no somes.”
41009026	Sebeden bhudtuoi gurubuore thajei jhagerei hijiek thareinei tartun nigili gelo. Gurubuoi mora dogkie gori rolo. Bhalukkun manjie holak, “The morsie.”
41009027	Hintu Jisu tare adot dhori tulilo, sebeden the thieilo.
41009028	Jisu ekkan ghoro bidirie somanar porendi tar sisjiogune nibirot tartun pujor gorilak, “Ami a hittei bhudtuore dabei di no pari?”
41009029	Jisu uttor dilo, “Edogkie bhud bor magana ar ubos thana darai no ole dabei dibar.”
41009030	Jisu ar tar sisjiogune sei jagan phelei jei, Galili dejchan phuri gelak. Jisuttun mone hoidie the hudu age huno jone hobor no pedak.
41009031	Jisu tar sisjiogunore sigei hinottei tharare holo, “Munischioro Puobuore manjior adot gojei dibar somoi oi ejchie. Thara tare morei pheleibak. Ar tare morei pelanar porendi, tin dine the jiei udibo.”
41009032	Hintu The hoiede hodaganor orthogan thara no bujon, tartun pujor goribario dorelak.
41009033	Jisu ar tar sisjiogun Kapernaum adamot lungilakki. Ghoro bidirie the elode lokkene tar sisjiogunottun pujor gorilo, “Adah podot tumi-tumi hi suol gora-gori gorsio?”
41009034	Hintu adah podot thara moiddie honna begottun dangor obo sienor sombonde suol gora-gori gorsion hinottei thara juj gori thelak.
41009035	Sebeden Jisu bojilo ar baro jon sisjiogunore daginei tharare holo, “Je begottun dangor obar sai, the begottun sigon oi thok ar begkunor sagorsie ok.”
41009036	Sebeden Jisu ekkuo sigon guro aninei tharar song moiddie thie bajei dilo. The gurobuore aza gorinei tharare holo,
41009037	“Je mor nange edogkie ekkuo sigon guro lobiot gore, sale, the more lobiot gore para obo, ar je more dipadeiebuoreo lobiot gore para obo. Morloi birud no sole the mor pokke age.”
41009038	Johone Jisure holo, “Guru-thagur, ek jon manjie Tor nange bhudtun dabei dede ami degkiei. The amar dolor manus noi ar amar loge no eje hinottei ami tare mana gorsei.”
41009039	Hintu Jisu holo, “Tare mana no gorsio ar. Je mor nange ham gore, sibiei ar more jhadi bodnam gori no paribo.
41009040	Je amarloi birud no sole, the mor pokke age.
41009041	Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor, tumi Kristor manus hinottei je mor nange tomare ek goloj pani hebartei de, sibiei hamakkai tar poriskarigan no arebo.
41009042	“Je huno ek jone edogkie ekkuo sigon gurore judi more bischias gorinei aro bischias no gore para gore, sei manuschuore ekkuo dangor sil tar gortonabuot bani dinei sagorot phelei dile tartei gom obo.
41009043	Ar judi tor adtane pabot pelai, sien habi pheleis. Huno din agun no morede norogo agunot dien ad sumuttuo jana darane rukkie gori jibonanot somanagan tortei gom obo.
41009044	Siot, ‘era heie pukkun huno din no moron ar agunonuo huno din no more.’
41009045	Ar judi tor thengane tore pabot pelai, sien habi pheleis. Norogo agunot dien theng sumuttuo jana darane leng gori jibonanot somanagan tortei gom obo
41009046	Siot, ‘era heie pukkun huno din no moron ar agunonuo huno din no more.’
41009047	Ar judi tor sogkuoi pabot pelai, sibie huei pheleis. Dibie sogkuoi norogo agunot jana darane, ekkuo sogkuoi Itchioror rejjioganot somanagan tartei gom obo.
41009048	Siot, ‘era heie pukkun huno din no moron ar agunano huno din no more.’
41009049	Dali loge nun de para, prottiek jonore nunor dogkie gori agunot phelei die obo.
41009050	Nun olode gom jinij. Hintu nunonor judi nunsuogan no thai, salen, hingori tumi nunonore aro nunsuo goriba? Tomar moiddie nun rageo, ar tumi shantie somora-somori thagkuo.”
41010001	Sebeden Jisu sei jagagan sari jei Jordan soragan par oi Judea rejjiot elo. Manus jhag-jhag tar idu elak. The gorede doge manuschunore aro sigkie dilo.
41010002	Hoiek jon Pharisi Jisu idu einei tare joga sebartei holak, “Ek jon manjie tar mogkuore sari dibar niomot age nahi?”
41010003	Sebeden Jisu tharare uttor di holo, “Mosi tomare hi niom die?”
41010004	Thara holak, “Mosi onumoti dede shur hagos leginei mog sari di pare.”
41010005	Jisu tharare uttor di holo, “Tumi akkol han hinottei Mosi sei nioman tomartei legi diede ai.
41010006	Hintu, Itchiore sristi arambo gorsiede lokkene ‘tharare milie ar morod gori baneie.’
41010007	‘Senottei daw mor odtuoi tar bab-magun phelei jei tar mogkuoloi egottor obogoi.
41010008	Ar thara di jone ekkan heye obak.’ Senottei thara di jon noi ar hintu ekkan heye olak.
41010009	Senottei Itchiore jien joragori di die, sien manjie pharok no gortok.”
41010010	Thara ghoro bidirie elakke aro tar sisjiogune sei hodagano sombonde Jisuttun pujor gorilak.
41010011	Jisu tharare holo, “Jei manuschuoi tar mogkuo sari dinei judi oinnio milieloi, sale, tar puron mogkuo biruddie biebijier obo.
41010012	Ar jei miliebuoi tar negkuo sari dinei judi oinnio morod loi, sale, tar puron negkuo biruddie biebijier obo.”
41010013	Hoiek jon manjie sigon guro Jisur idu anilak, jen The tharar ugure adtuli de. Hintu Jisur sisjiogune sei manuschunore aw-hoda holak.
41010014	Sebeden Jisu ien deginei baari rak gorinei tar sisjiogunore holo, “Sigon gurogunore mor idu ebartei duo, tharare mana no gorsio. Haron Itchioror rejjiogan olode ei sigon guroguno dogkien.
41010015	Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor, je Itchioror rejjiogan sigon guroi gojhi londe sannie gori gojhi no loi, sale, the huno din Itchioror rejjioganot somi patto noi.”
41010016	Sebeden Jisu sei sigon gurogunore horot lolo. Tharar madat adtuli dinei tharare asirbad dilo.
41010017	Jisu podedi jadte lokkene ek jon manus tar idu daba-daba elo. The Jisur mujungot adu pari salam gori porinei tartun pujor gorilo, “Gom Guruthagur, ononto jibon pebartei mor hi gora poribo?”
41010018	Hintu Jisu tare uttor dinei holo, “Tui a hittei more gom hole? Itchior bade ek jono gom nei ar.
41010019	Tui shilegun hobor pas daw, ‘Shanda no goris,’ ‘Hun no goris,’ ‘Sur no goris,’ ‘Mijie shakki no dis,’ ‘Manjiore no thogeis,’ ‘Tor bab magunore sorman goris.’ ”
41010020	Manuschuoi Jisure holo, “Guruthagur gaburottun duri sei beg ugumani mui palei ejongor.”
41010021	Jisu tare rini seinei hos pelo. Sebeden tare holo, “Ek pod bagi age, sien tor gora poribo. Ja tor hi-hi age bejinei tengagunδ gorib dugkiere bhag gori degoi. Sebeden sorgot tor dhon thebo. Tar porendi einei kroschan buginei mor loge eis.”
41010022	Hintu ei hodagani suninei the suduo muo olo. The monot dug peinei gelogoi. Haron tartun onek dhon-sompotti age.
41010023	Seropala seinei Jisu tar sisjiogunore holo, “Jigunor dhon-sompotti age sigunor Itchioror rejjioganot somade hodog aghattie!”
41010024	Sisjiogune Jisur hodagan suninei amok olak. Hintu Jisu tharare aro uttor di holo, “Sawh, jigune dhon-sompottir ugure nirbhor goron, sigune Itchioror rejjioganot somade hodog aghattie!
41010025	Ek jon dhoni manus Itchioror rejjioganot somana darane ekkuo uth sujor pajidi sominei nigili janagan bes utchuo.”
41010026	Ei hodaganottei thara shanggadik amok oinei thara-thara huobula gora dorilak, “Salen, honna mukti pebo?”
41010027	Hintu Jisu tharare rini seinei holo, “Itchiorottei begkani sombob hinottei ien manjiortei aw-sombob oleio hintu Itchiorottei sombob.”
41010028	Sebeden Pitore Jisure holo, “Sah, ami beg phelei einei tor loge elong.”
41010029	Jisu tare uttor dilo, “Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor, je mortei ar gom hoboranottei ghor-duor, bhei-bon, bab-ma, mog-puo, ar jaga-jobin phelei ebo,
41010030	Ei jugkuot thara ek shot dunuo pebak. Ghor-duor, bhei-bon, ma, puo-jhi, jaga-jobin ar dug-hosto thara pebak. Ar ejette jugkuot thara ononto jibon pebak.
41010031	Hintu onek manus akkuol oi agonde sigun jer poribak, ar jero sigun akkuol obakkoi.”
41010032	Jokke thara Jerusalem song jebartei podot uttuondoi, Jisu tar sisjiogunotton akke-akke jar. Senottei tar sisjiogune amok olak. Jisur pune-pune jadonde siguneo dorelak. Sebeden Jisu baro jon sisjiogunore aro ek huredi ninei hi-hi ghodibo sieni tharare huo dorilo.
41010033	The holo, “Suno, ami Jerusalem song jeir. Sidu Munischioro Puobuore rajguruthagurunor ar dhormo niomor mastorunor adot gojei die obo. Thara tare dujot pelanar porendi tar moribar dorkar bili thik goribak. Ar sebeden Be-jadtunor adot tare gojei dibag.
41010034	Sigune tare thatta ureibak. Tare sabukkoi baschiebak ar sep phelei dibag. Ar tare morei pheleibak. Tin dino porendi the aro jiei udibo.”
41010035	Sebeden Jebedaior puo Jakob ar Johone Jisur idu einei tare holak, “Guruthagur, amattun mone hoidie sien ami magilie tui amare dis.”
41010036	Jisu tharare holo, “Mui tomartei hi gori didung tomartun mone hoi?”
41010037	Thara tare holak, “Tui jokke tor oborug singasonot bobe, sokke tor denedi ek jon, bangedi ek jon tor loge ami bojibartei sei.”
41010038	Hintu Jisu tharare holo, “Tumi magilade ien tumi hobor no po. Mui heimbe golojchuottun tumi hei pariba parapang? Mui lombe baptismagandoi tumi baptisma oi pariba parapang?”
41010039	Ar thara tare holak, “Ami paribong.” Ar Jisu tharare holo, “Mor golojchuottun tumi hamakkai heba, ar mui lombe baptismagan tumi loba.
41010040	Hintu mor denedi ok, mor bangedi ok bojeibar mor odhihar nei. Jigunottei banedie sigune bojibak.”
41010041	Jokkene oinnio dos jone ien sunilak, thara Jakobor ar Johonor ugure rak uduo dorilo.
41010042	Hintu Jisu tharare diginei holo, “Tumi hobor pode Be-jadtune sason goronde sigunor odhihari on ar tharar murubbigune sigunor ugure ugum salei ni paron.
41010043	Hintu tomar moiddie siennie no obo. Je tomar moiddiettun dangor obar sai, the tomar sagorsie uo poribo.
41010044	Ar je tomar moiddiettun bego dangor obar sai, the begkunor banidaji uo poribo.
41010045	Haron Munischioro Puobuoio manjiortun ham hebartei no eje, hintu The manjiore ham gori dibartei ar onek manjior muktir dam ijebe tar poranan dibartei ejchie.”
41010046	Sebeden Jisu ar tar sisjiogune Jerikko sohorot lungilakki. Jisu tar sisjiogundoi jhag-jhag manus somot Jerikkottun nigili jade, ek jon han manus raj podor pazarat boinei bikkie mager. Tar nangan olode Bartimai, Timaior puo.
41010047	Jokke the Nazareth hullie Jisu bili sunilo, the jogar pari-pari dagi huo dorilo, “Jisu, Davidor Puobuo, more doye gor.”
41010048	Onek manjie tare jhaji dinei tare sub gori thebartei holak. Hintu the sie bes jogar pari-pari huo dorilo, “Davidor Puobuo, more doye gor.”
41010049	Jisu mow oinei tare dagibartei ugum dilo. Sebeden manuschune hanare dagi holak, “Hujhi aw. Uth, the tore dager.”
41010050	Sebeden the uri agede haboran lugimari dinei udinei Jisur sidu gelo.
41010051	Sebeden Jisu tare holo, “Mui tortei hi gorididung tui sas?” Han manuschuoi tare holo, “Robboni, mui degidung sang.”
41010052	Sebeden Jisu tare holo, “Tor podedi tui jagoi, tor bischiaschane tore gom goreilo.” Ar jogon-togon the degilo, ar the podedi Jisur pune-pune gelo.
41011001	Thara Jerusalemot lungibar hadallie Oliv mounnuor hai Bethphage ar Bethani adamanit lungilakki. Sebeden Jisu tar di jon sisjio padeilo.
41011002	Jisu tharare holo, “Tomar mujungedi adamanot jo. Adamanot somibagoio ekkuo gadha shawh bannie gori debagoi. Sei gadha shawhbuor pidit huno jone no soron. Sibie hueinei idu anogoi.
41011003	Ar judi huno jone tomare hon, ‘A hittei tumi ien goror?’ Sale, tumi hoio, ‘Probur ibie lager.’ The aro jhadi gori idu thoidie bajei dibo.”
41011004	Thara jeinei gadha shawhbuo banniettun huei dilak.
41011005	Siot hoiek jon manus thiei elakke sigune tharattun pujor gorilak, “Gadha shawhbuo tumi a hittei hulor?”
41011006	Jisu hoiede doge sisjiogune tharare holak, ar sei manuschune gadha shawhbuo anibartei onumoti dilak.
41011007	Sebeden di jon sisjioi gadha shawhbuore Jisur idu anilak. Sibier pidi ugure tharar haborani bijei dilak, sebeden Jisu gadha shawhbuor pidit udilo.
41011008	Ar shagor manjie tharar haborani podot bijei dilak. Ar hoiek jone gajottun pada-bola dhela habi aninei podot bijei dilakki
41011009	Sebeden Jisur mujungedi jadonde sigune ar pijendittun ettonde sigune joi jogar pari-pari holak: “Hossana! ‘PROBUR nange eiebuo donniobad gori thok.’
41011010	Amar bab Davidor ejette rejjiogan donniobad gori thok! Begottun ugure Hossana!”
41011011	Jisu Jerusalemot somanar jogon-togon mondirot gelo. The seropala begkani rini selo. Bel jeiegoi hinottei tar baro jon sisjio somot Bethanit gelak.
41011012	Tar hellie Bethanittun janar porendi Jisur ped puro dorilo.
41011013	Sebeden Jisu durottun ekkuo jhubur dumur gaj degilo. Gulo agon bili sebartei the gajchuo hai gelo. Hintu dumur gulo okto noi hinottei the gajchuo hure jeinei bana padagani degilogoi.
41011014	Jisu gajchuore holo, “Edchiettun duri umor song tortun huno jone guluo no hadok ar.” Tar sisjiogune sien The hode suinnion.
41011015	Ar thara Jerusalemot elak. Sebeden Jisu Mondirbuot sominei, siot beja-hine goronde sigunore dabei dilo. Tengaδ bodoli duonde sigunor tebilani ar hodor bejiegune bojonde jagagani the ullei phelei dilo.
41011016	Jisu mondiro udonedi huno malmatta nibar no dilo ar.
41011017	Sebeden the manuschunore sigkie dinei holo, “ ‘Beg jador manuschunottei mor ghoran bor magede ghor huo obo,’ ien legkie agede noi ni? Hintu tumi ienore ‘dagedor haath’ banei phellio”
41011018	Dhormo niomor mastorune ar rajguruthagurune ien suninei thara Jisure morei pheleibartei pod toga dorilak. Beg manuschune Jisur sigkiegani sunilie amok on hinottei thara tare dorelak.
41011019	Ar sajonnie ole Jisu tar sisjiogundoi sohorottun nigili jai.
41011020	Tar hellie beinnie poittie thara porendi jade, dumur singorottun duri sidie oiede thara degilak.
41011021	Pitoror tun idot udinei Jisure holo, “Guruthagur, sah, tui geil duoschie dumur gajchuo shidie oie.”
41011022	Jisu tharare uttor dilo, “Itchiorore bischias goro.
41011023	Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor, ek jone tar ontorot aw-bischias no aninei hintu jien hobo sien obo gori bischias gorinei judi ei mounnuore hoi, ‘Uguri jeinei sagorot polloi.’ Sale, tartei ien gori die obo.
41011024	Senottei mui tomare hongor, tumi bor magode jien mago sien peio bili bischias gorsio, sebeden tumi sieni peba.
41011025	Jokke tumi bor magibartei thio, judi huno jone tomar biruddie duj goron, sieni tharare mab duo. Sebeden tomar Bab sorgot agede ibiei tumi niom bhonggo gorode ieni mab dibo.
41011026	Hintu judi tumi tharare mab no duo, tomar Bab sorgot agede ibieio tumi niom bhonggo gorode ieni mab dido noi.”
41011027	Thara aro Jerusalemot lungilakki. Jisu mondirot berade seiet rajguruthagurune, dhormo niomor mastorune ar borjonnune tar idu elak.
41011028	Thara Jisure holak, “Ieni hi odhihare tui goror? Ar ieni goribartei honna Tore ei odhiharan die?”
41011029	Jisu tharare uttor dinei holo, “Mui tomare ekkan prosonno dorim. Tumi more uttor duo. Sebeden mui tomare hom, ieni hi odhihare mui gorongor.
41011030	Johonor baptismagan sorgottun nahi, manjiortun? More uttor duo.”
41011031	Thara-thara huobula gorte holak, “Ami judi hoi, ‘Sorgottun’ salen, the hobo, ‘A hittei tumi tare bischias no goro?’
41011032	Hintu judi ami hoi, ‘Manjiortun’ sio, ami jonogonore dorei.” Haron beg manuschune Johonore ek jon muni bili mani loion.
41011033	Senottei thara Jisure uttor dinei holak, “Ami hobor no pei.” Sebeden Jisu tharare uttor dinei holo, “Ieni hi odhihare mui gorong muio tomare no hom.”
41012001	Sebeden Jisu tharare tulona hodadi holo, “Ek jon manjie ekkan anggur bagan tulilo. The bagananor sero hitte tengera beri dilo. The angguro ros phereibartei ekkan ghani-hol bojeilo, ar subi dibartei tong ekkan banilo. The hoiek jon bagan suliere tar anggur baganan daw-bhagi denar porendi bi-dejot gelo.
41012002	Anggur sinibar okto oinei, the tar bhagkuo anibalottei tar sagorsie ek jon do-bhagi diede sigunor sidu phadelo.
41012003	Hintu sigune tare dhorinei dhori mari marai suduo adtoi phirei dilak.
41012004	Sebeden girojchuoi aro ek jon tar sagorsie do-bhagi dede sigunor sidu phadelo. Tare sil meladi, tar siriebuot gha gori duon. Ar tare thatta gori phirei dilak.
41012005	The aro ek jon sagorsie phadelo. Sibiereo thara morei phelei dilak. The aro bhaluk jon sagorsie phadelo. Thara ek dagire pidilak ar ek dagire morei pheleilak.
41012006	The padebartei bana tar ekkuo gori agojor puo, sibie bagi thelo. The mone gorilo, ‘Mor puobuore thara sorman goribak,’ sebeden bego jere tar puobuoreo phadelo.
41012007	Hintu do-bhagi loiegune thara-thara huobula gorton, ‘Ete daw porendi sompottir girojchuo obo. Jei, ami tare morei phelei. Sebeden ami ei bagananor giroj obong.’
41012008	Sebeden thara tare dhorinei dhori baganor barendi phelei dinei morei pheleilak.
41012009	Sebeden baganor girojchuoi tharare hi goribogi sei? The einei do-bhagi dede sigunore morei phelei aro oinnio manjiore tar anggur baganan do-bhagi dibo.
41012010	Ien tumi Sastrot no mado ni na? ‘Ghor-tulliegunor monot no porede silluo, hunot begottun gunor silluo olo.
41012011	Ien PROBUIE gori dilo, amar ien sade hodog shoba lage!’ ”
41012012	Haron thara buji parilakke Jisu ei tulona hodagan tharar biruddie hoie. Senottei thara Jisure dhoribartei seresta gorilak. Hintu thara manuschunore dorelak. Sebeden thara Jisure phelei jei siottun jeiondoi.
41012013	Sebeden sigune hoiek jon Pharisi ar Herodor manus Jisure hodat phajeibartei Jisur idu padelak.
41012014	Thara einei Jisure holak, “Guruthagur, ami hobor pei, manjie gom bannie bhabi no sade tui soittio hodagan hoi duos. Tui begkunore eksong gorinei Itchioror soittio podtanor hodagan janei duos. Tui amare ho, Moharaja Kaisarore ami hajana di die sien niom oi ni noi?
41012015	Ami tare hajana didong na no didong?” Hintu Jisu tharar hu-sokra monani hobor peinei holo, “Tumi a hittei more phajeibar sor? More ekkuo denariδ aninei degogi.”
41012016	Thara ekkuo poijieδ ani dilak. Ar Jisu tharattun pujor gorilo, “Ibie har subhi? Ar har nang lega age?” Thara holak, “Kaisaror.”
41012017	Sebeden Jisu tharare uttor dilo, “Kaisaror jinijchani Kaisarore duo ar Itchioror jinijchani Itchiorore duo.” Ar thara Jisur hodagan suninei amok olak.
41012018	Sebeden hoiek jon Sadduki, jiei uduonagan nei honde sigune Jisur idu einei tartun pujor gorinei holak:
41012019	“Guruthagur, Mosi amattei legi di jeie: Judi ek jon manjie mog loinei bongso no peie gori mori gele, tare bongso rokkie gori dibartei, sibier guro bheibuoi tar bhojchuore luo poribo.
41012020	Ek ghorbuot sat bhei elak. Bego dangor bheibuoi mog lo-lo. The bongso neie gori mori gelo.
41012021	Tar toledi guro bheibuoi tar bhojchuore loinei, theo bongso no peie gori mori gelo. Ar tin lombor guro bheibuoio sedogkie gori mori gelo.
41012022	Thara sat bheie ekkuo mog loinei bongso neie gori begkun mori gelak. Bego jere sei miliebuoio mori gelo.
41012023	Senottei, jiei uduonaganot jokkene thara jiei udibag sibie har mog obo? Haron thara sat bheie begkune tare mog ijebe loion.”
41012024	Jisu tharare uttor dinei holo, “Senottei tomar bhul oiede noi ni? Haron Sastrogan ar Itchioror hemodagano no bujo.
41012025	Haron jokke thara morattun jiei udibag, thara ar neg-mog thedak noi ar neg-mogo lodak noi. Hintu thara sorgo-dudtuno dogkie obak.
41012026	Morattun jiei uduona hodagan Mosir boibuot angie hero jaburbuo hodagan tumi no mado ni? Siot legkie agede, Itchiore Mosire hoie, ‘Mui Abrahamor Itchior, Isaakor Itchior, ar Jakobor Itchior.’
41012027	Itchiorbuo daw moragunor Itchior noi, hintu The olode jedagunor Itchior. Senottei tumi mone gorotte ien shanggadik bhul.”
41012028	Ek jon dhormo niomo mastor einei hai hurettun thara torga-torgi gortonde ieni suni agegi. Jisu Saddukigunore dolei gori uttor dede sien the hoi parinei, theo Jisuttun ekkan hoda pujor gorilo, “Ugumanir moiddie begottun dangor uguman hubon?”
41012029	Jisu tare uttor dilo, “Begottun dangor uguman olode ien, ‘Oh Israel manuschun tumi suno. PROBU amar Itchiorbuo olode ekkuo PROBU.
41012030	Tor PROBU Itchiorbuore tor goda ontorandoi, tor goda aptabuoloi, goda tor monandoi, ar tor goda bolandoi tui hos pei pebe.’ Ien olode begottun dangor uguman.
41012031	Di lombor dangor uguman olode ien, ‘Tore tui hos paschie dogkie tor paralliegunoreio hos pa poribo.’ Ei ugumani bade huno dangor ugum ar nei.”
41012032	Dhormo niomor mastorbuoi Jisure holo, “Guruthagur, oi daw, tui hoioschie ien soittio. Itchior olode ekkuo, the bade ar huno jon nei.
41012033	Itchiorbuore goda poranandoi, goda gyenandoi, goda ontorandoi ar goda bolandoi hos pa poribo. Nijere-nije hos pa jaidie dogkie, paralliegunoreio hos pa poribo. Ei dibie shilie dan ar dali denattun bes dangor.”
41012034	Jisu sei dhormo niomor mastorbuoi gyeni manjior dogkie gori uttor dede deginei tare holo, “Tui Itchioror rejjioganottun bes durot noi.” Siottun duri Jisuttun huno ekkan pujor goribar huno jonor sedame no hulelo.
41012035	Jisu mondirot sigkie dede, the pujor gorilo, “Dhormoniomor mastorune Kristo Davidor Puo bili hingori hon?
41012036	Haron Davide nije Pobitro Apta darai hoie, ‘PROBUIE, mor Probure hoie, “Tor sottrugun jedogkon song, tor thengot tole no thong, sedogkon song mor denedi boji thak.” ’
41012037	Davide nije tare ‘Probu’ hoie. Salen, the hingori tar Puo oi pare?” Shagor manjie Jisur hodagani hujhi oinei suni agon.
41012038	Tharare sigkie dede Jisu holo, “Dhormo niomor mastorunottun tumi uije thagkuo. Lamba shilum urinei bereibar tharattun mone hoi. Ath-bazarot manjiortun salam hebar tharattun mone hoi
41012039	Synagogot begottun moillioban bojibar jaga ar haana-meitbanot begottun gom jaga tharattun mone hoi.
41012040	Thara rani-milieguno ghorani hari lon. Barendi degebartei lamba-lamba gori bor magon. Thara shanggadik sasti pebak.”
41012041	Ar Jisu dan goronde jaganor uju bojilo. Manuschune mondiror dan-baksubuot tengaδ bhorei dedon.
41012042	Sebeden ekkuo gorib rani-milie einei dibie pidolor poijieδ bhorei dilogi. Sei dibie pidolor poijie olakke ekkuo kodranorδ moillio.
41012043	Jisu tar sisjiogunore daginei tharare holo, “Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor: Ei gorib rani-miliebuoi oinnio jonottun bes dan-baksubuot bhorei dilogi.
41012044	Oinnio jone daw beg tharar ugursie dhonottun duondi. Hintu ei gorib rani-miliebuoi tar goribpanottun tar poranan bajibartei rageiede sien begkan dan-baksubuot bhorei dilogi.”
41013001	Jisu mondiro jaganottun nigili jade, tar ek jon sisjioi tare holo, “Guruthagur, sah, hi asarjio doul pakka dalan!”
41013002	Sebeden Jisu tare uttor dilo, “Ei dangor-dangor ghorani tumi degor? Ek din ekkuo silo soga-sok gori thedo noi. Begkun lugimari phelei die obo.”
41013003	Sei porendi Jisu Oliv mounnuot mondiro mokkie gori bojilo. Sebeden Pitore, Jakobe, Johone ar Andrio dagi nibirot pujor gorilak,
41013004	“Homole sieni ghodi jebo, tui amare ho? Ar sieni ghodi jade hi-hi sinno thebo?”
41013005	Jisu tharare uttor die dorilo, “Huno jone tomare thogei no paron para uijkare thagkuo.
41013006	Haron onek jone mor nange einei hobakki, ‘Mui deie the.’ Ar thara onek jonore thogeibakki.
41013007	Tumi jokke judduor hobor suniba ar manjie judduor hoda mue-mue gorte suniba, sidie no gorsio. Sieni eneio ghodi ja poribo, hintu sokkeneio thuman je no ebo.
41013008	Haron ek jade oinnio jador biruddie obak, ar ek rejjioi oinnio rejjior biruddie judduo goribak. Jagai-jagai bhujol bebo, ar bhadorad poribo ar gondogul obo. Ieni begkani olode dug-hosto arambogani.
41013009	“Tumi nije-nije uijkare thagkuo. Haron thara tomare sanhedrinot gojei dibagkoi. Synagogot tomare pidibag. Mortei tumi sason-goriegunor ar rajagunor mujungot tharare shakki dibartei thiei pebagoi.
41013010	Ar gom hoboran beg jador sidu akke prosar gora poribo.
41013011	Ar jokke tomare dhorinei gojei duondoi, sokkene tumi hi hobagoi sieni akke duri sintie no gorsio. Jokke somoibuo ebo, jieni Pobitro Aptai tomare jobeide, sieni hoiogoi. Haron hoiebuo obode Pobitro Aptabuo.
41013012	Ar bheibuoi tar bheibuo morei pheleibartei dhora bajei dibo. Ar babpuoi tar puobuo morei pheleibartei dhora bajei dibo. Puogun tharar bab-ma biruddie oinei manjie tharare morei pelan para goribak.
41013013	Mor nanganottei beg manjie tomare hos no pebak, hintu je thumsong thori thei paribo, tare uddhar gora obo.
41013014	“Senottei muni Daniele hoi jeiede, ‘Itchiore bis degede nasgoriebuoi’ no thieibar jaganot thieibogi.” (Je ien madai, the buji lok.) “Jokke the siot thieibogi je sien degon, sokkene Judea dejot agonde sigune moununot dhei jadok.
41013015	Je salo ugure thebo, ghorot no lamokkoi ar tar ghoro bidiriettun hono poja nigilei anibartei the no somogkoi
41013016	Je hedot thebo, the tar haboran anibartei phiri no jok.
41013017	Hintu sokkene pedoli-miliegunor ar hujhi pormagunor hobal poribo!
41013018	Tumi dhei jei pebade dinnuo jarhallie no oi para bor mago.
41013019	Sei lokkene edogkie uttiesar obo. Itchiore songsar sristi gorsiede siottun duri ejo song sedogkie no oi, ar tar porendio huno din odo noi ar.
41013020	Probu judi sei dinun homei no dido, sale, huno jon no bajilakkun. Hintu Itchiore bei tulliede sigunottei sei dinun the homei die.
41013021	Sei lokkene, huno jone judi tomare hon, ‘Sawh, iot Kristo age,’ bah, ‘Siot age,’ sien bischias no gorsio.
41013022	Haron Sokkene nogoli kristo ar nogoli muni bar oinei, manjiore thogeibartei, thara dangor dangor sinno ham ar amok ham degebakki. Sombob ole, Itchiore bei tulliegunoreio thogeibak.
41013023	Hintu tumi uijkare thagkuo. Mui tomare akke duri begkani hoi dilung.
41013024	“Hintu sei lokkene, sei uttiesar dinun ghodi jebo io, belan andhar obo ar, junone jun phor no dibo.
41013025	Taragun agajottun jhuri poribakki. Agajor hemodagani digdigei die obo.
41013026	Sei lokkene Munischioror Puobuo dangor hemodagandoi ar oborugkandoi megot ette manjie degibak.
41013027	Sebeden the tar sorgo-dudtunore dipadebo ar tar bei tulliegunore sero hittetun duri, pittimir begor durottun duri sorgor begor durot song tubeibak.
41013028	“Ar dumur gajchuottun tulona hoda sigi lo. Jokke sigon dhelagunot hujhi dikh nigilinei pada phudo doribo, sale, gorom din ejer bili mone gorsio.
41013029	Ei sedogkie gori jokke ieni ghodi jade degiba, sokkene tumi buji paribade somoibuo hai ejchie, ar duorot agegi.
41013030	Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor: Sieni begkani ghodi no gele, ei jugko lugi jedo noi.
41013031	Sorgo ar pittimigan lugi jebo, hintu mor hodagani huno din lugi jedo noi.
41013032	“Hintu huno jone sei dinnuo ar somoibuo hobor no pan, sorgot sorgo-dudtuneio ar Puobuoio hobor no pai. Hintu bana Babe hobor pai.
41013033	Uijkare thagkuo! Sojag gori theinei bor mago. Sei somoibuo hokke ebo tumi hobor no po.
41013034	Ien ek jon manjie tar ghor-duor phelei bi-dejot jadte dogkie. Tar sagorsiegunore jon bagene ham dinei di tharare odhihar dilo. Ar duor subi theiebuore sojage thebartei ugum dilo.
41013035	“Senottei sojage thagkuo! Haron ghoror girojchuo hokke ebo tumi hobor no po. Sajonnie nahi beinnie poittie ebo.
41013036	Judi the abada gori eje, adikkie the tomare ghumot lagot pebogi. Senottei sojage thagkuo.
41013037	Mui tomare hongorte ien, begkunore hongor: Sojage thagkuo!”
41014001	Rokkie Utchobpan ar moli agullie pidie Utchobpan bana di din bagi elo. Rajguru-thagurune ar dhormo niomor mastorune Jisure gubone dhorinei tare morei pheleibartei pod togadon.
41014002	Thara holak, “Utchobo lokkene tare no dhorsio. Adikkie manuschune jagulug tulibak.”
41014003	Jisu Bethani adamot pharangi Simonor ghorot elo. The bhat poiot boinei ekkuo miliei alabaster sijirit gori shanggadik dami hati ador tel anilo. Sebeden miliebuoi sijiribuo bhangi telan Jisur siriebuot dali dilo.
41014004	Siot elakke manuschunottun hoiek jone rak udinei thara-thara huobula gorilak, “A hittei ei ador telan borbat phelelo?
41014005	Ei telan tin shot denariδ loinei bejido, Sebeden tengagunδ gorib-dugkiere di parilun.” Ar thara miliebuore shanggadik gubilak.
41014006	Hintu Jisu holo, “Tare bad duo! Tumi tare a hittei jagulugot pelor? The daw mortei gom ham gorsie.
41014007	Gorib manuschun daw tomar loge onsur agon. Tomar jokke mone hoi sokkene tumi tharare sahajjio gori paro. Hintu tumi more onsur peda noi.
41014008	The jittur gori pare gorilo. Mor heyegan garebartei the akke duri einei tel guli dilogi.
41014009	Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor, goda songsarot ei gom hoboran jidu prosar gortak sat, ei miliebuoi gorilode hamanio thara hoi pebak, ar sengori tare monot rageibak.”
41014010	Sebeden baro jon sisjiottun ek jon Juda Iskariode Jisure dhori dibartei rajguruthagurunor sidu gelo.
41014011	Tar hodagan suninei rajguruthagurune hujhi olak. Tare tengaδ dibartei thara soittio dilak. Senottei the Jisure dhori dibartei gom sujuk toga dorilo.
41014012	Moli agullie pidie utchobor polim dinnuot rokkie utchobor bera-shagolo shawh dali duonde sei dinnie Jisur sisjiogune tartun pujor gorilak, “Rokkie Utchobor haana hebartei ami hubot jeinei tortei jugol gori didonggoi tortun mone hoi?”
41014013	Sebeden Jisu di jon sisjio phadelo. The tharare holo, “Tumi sohoro bidirie jo. Ek jon morode hummoi pani bode tomare lagot pebo. Tar pune-pune jeio.
41014014	The jei ghoranot somaigoi, sei ghoro girojchuore hoio, ‘Guruthagure hoiede, “Mor sisjiogun somot Rokkie Utchobor haana hembe gorba gudhibuo hudu?” ’
41014015	The tomare uguro tolat ekkuo jugol gorsie ar sajeie dangor gudhi dege dibo. Siot amattei jugol gorogoi.”
41014016	Sisjiogune Jisure phelei jei sohorot somilakkoi. Jisu tharare hoiede doge thara degkuondoi. Sebeden Rokkie Utchobor haanagan jugol gorilak.
41014017	Reid oinei Jisu tar baro jon sisjio somot sidu gelo.
41014018	Thara hadonde lokkene, Jisu holo, “Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor: Tomartun ek jone more dhora bajei dibo. Sibiei mor loge har.”
41014019	Sebeden sisjiogunor baari monot dug uo dollio, ar ek jon ek jon gori Jisure hodon, “Sibie mui ni na?” Ar ek jon holo, “Sibie mui ni na?”
41014020	Jisu uttor dilo, “Sibie olode tomar baro jonottun ek jon. The mor loge pidiegan hodorabuot buror.
41014021	Munischioro Puobuor sombonde Sastrot lega agede doge ghodi jebo. Hintu Munischioro Puobuore dhora bajei dibode sibier ugure hobal puribo! The judi jormo no odogi, tartei gom olun.”
41014022	Thara hadonde lokkene, Jisu pidiegan loinei donniobad dinei hotta dilo. Sebeden pidiegan tar sisjiogunore dinei holo, “Loinei ho. Ien mor heyegan.”
41014023	Tar porendi Jisu golojchuo adot lolo. The donniobad dinei tharare dilo. Sebeden thara begkune golojchuottun helak.
41014024	Jisu tharare holo, “Ien olode mor nuo niomanor logan, jien onek manjiortei dali die oie.
41014025	Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor: Ikkiettun duri mui jedog din song Itchioror rejjiot nuo gori ien no haanggoi, sedog din song ei angguro roschan mui hedung noi ar.”
41014026	Sebeden thara ekkuo Itchioro baini gid ganar porendi, thara Oliv Mounnuot gelak.
41014027	Sebeden Jisu tharare holo, “Edchie reidot mortei tomar begkunor bischiaschan jhuri poribo. Haron Sastrot ien lega age, ‘Mui bera-shagol Soreiebuore mugureim, sebeden bera-shagolun settera obak.’
41014028	“Hintu more jiei tulonar porendi, mui tomartun akke-akke Galili dejot jeim.”
41014029	Sebeden, Pitore Jisure uttor dinei holo, “Tor harone begkunor bischiaschani jhuri porileio, mor bischiaschan hono din jhuri porido noi”
41014030	Jisu tare holo, “Mui tore soittio hodagan hongor: Edchie dinnuot, reidot radai di bar dag no harte, tui tin bar more bharebe.”
41014031	Hintu Pitore aro doromoro gori holo, “Judi tor loge mor mori ja porileio mui tore shobai no bharem.” Ar sei doge thara begkune holak.
41014032	Jisu ar tar sisjiogune Gethsemane honde jaganot lungilakkoi. Jisu tar sisjiogunore holo, “Mui jedogkon song bor magongoi sedogkon song tumi iot thago.”
41014033	Pitorore, Jakobore ar Johonore tar loge nilo. Ar the monot duge shanggadik sintiet porilo.
41014034	Sebeden the tharare holo, “Mor aptabuo baari sintiet porinei, morana soman olo. Iot theinei shojage thago.”
41014035	The hottur durot janar porendi madit bukpari pori bor magilode je, judi sombob ole, ei dugor somoibuo tartun hadei jok.
41014036	Ar Jisu holo, “Oh Abba, Ba, tortei begkani sombob oi. Ei golojchuo mortun neja. Hintu mor ischie doge no oinei, tor ischie doge ok.”
41014037	Sebeden the phiri einei tharare ghum jadonde deginei, the Pitorore holo, “Simon, tui ghum jotte nahi? Ek ghontaio jagkie gori tui thei no parilede?
41014038	Tumi jagi thago ar bor mago adikkie lubbot poriba. Aptabuor jodepode mone hor hintu heyegane no der.”
41014039	Jisu aro ek bar jeinei hoiede doge-doge aro bor magilogoi.
41014040	The phiri einei thara aro ghum jadonde degilogi. Thara sogkun ghume mela no jadon hinottei, thara Jisure hi uttor dibag hoi no parilak.
41014041	Jisu tin bar phiri ejanar porendi tharare holo, “Tumi hi ejosong arame ghum jor nahi? Obo ebol. Somoibuo lungilogi. Sawh, Munischioro Puobuore dhorinei pabi manjior adot gojei die awr.
41014042	Uduo jei. Sawh, more dhoridiebuo lungiegi.”
41014043	Ar the horte lokkene, sawh, Juda, baro jonottun ek jon sisjio adikkie gori siot lungilogi. Ek jhag manus horgo ar mugor dhorinei tar loge elak. Rajguruthagurune, dhormo niomor mastorune ar borjonnune tharare padeion.
41014044	Sei lokkene tare dhoridiebuo sigunore the ekkan sinno dinei holo, “Mui jare sumonggoi, the sibie sie. Tumi tare dhorsio ar gomedale nejeio.”
41014045	Juda Iskariode lungiegio Jisur hai einei tare holo, “Robbi! Robbi!” Sebeden the Jisure sumilo.
41014046	Sebeden manuschune Jisure dhorilak.
41014047	Ar Jisur hai thiei elakke sigunottun ek jone tar horgogan hueilo. The moharajguruthagurbuor banidajibuore beja urei sibier hanan habi phelei dilo.
41014048	Jisu tharare holo, “Mui daget ni na, tumi more dhoribartei horgoloi ar mugorloi ejchiode?
41014049	Din bagene mui tomar loge elungge lokkene mondiro sidu sigkie duong, hintu sokkene daw more no dhoro. Hintu Sastro hodaganor doge uo poribo.”
41014050	Sebeden beg sisjiogune tare phelei dhei gelak.
41014051	Ek jon gabur-morode tar uttie heyet ad-habor bereinei Jisur pije-pije jar. Gabhuschiegune tare dhorsion.
41014052	Hintu the uschie haboran pheleinei uttie-buttie thara siottun dhei gelo.
41014053	Sebeden Jisure moharajguru-thagurbuor ghorot nilak. Siot beg rajguruthagurun, borjonnun ar dhormo niomor mastorun thubeion.
41014054	Pitore durot gori Jisur pune-pune jeinei, moharajguru- thagurbuor ghoro udonot gelo. The siot mondiro polischuno somare boinei agun phuo dorilo.
41014055	Sei lokkene rajguruthagurune ar goda sanhedrinuor manus-chune Jisure mijie shakki dinei morei pheleibartei haidie togadon. Hintu thara huno ekkan shakki no pelak.
41014056	Onek manjie Jisur biruddie mijie shakki di selak. Hintu tharar ekkan shakkio no hadilo.
41014057	Sebeden hoiek jon manjie thieinei Jisur biruddie mijie shakki dilak.
41014058	Thara holak “The edogkie gori hode ami suinnei, ‘Ei adtoi tullie mondirbuo bhangi pheleim ar tin dine aro ekkuo adtoi no tullie mondir mui tulim.’ ”
41014059	Hintu tharar ekkan shakkio no hadilo.
41014060	Sebeden moharajguruthagurbuoi begkunor song moiddie thieinei Jisuttun pujor gorilo, “Tui ieni ekkanio uttor no dibe? Tor biruddie ei manuschune ieni hi shakki dedon?”
41014061	Hintu Jisu ekkanio uttor no dinei olor gori rolo. Moharajguruthagurbuoi tartun aro pujor gorilo, “Tui hi Kristo, baini goridie Itchioro Puobuo ni na?”
41014062	Jisu holo, “Oi mui. Ar Munischioro Puobuore Hemoda-bolabuor denedi bojsie gori agajot megsagot gori ette tumi degiba.”
41014063	Sebeden moharajgurutha-gurbuoi tar uschie haboran phadi pheleinei holo, “Oinnio jon shakki die amar a hittei lagette ar?
41014064	Itchiorore the sorjaidie ien tumi sunila daw. Tumi hi mone goro?” Thara begkune Jisur moronor sasti pebar lak bilinei thik gorilak.
41014065	Sebeden hoiek jon manjie tare sep phelei die dorilak. Ar thara Jisure sog bani dinei bugkei-bakkai holak, “Gona sadei!” Ar mondiro polischune tare ninei ni podas-podas suoreilak.
41014066	Pitore toledi udonot elode lokkene moharajguruthagurbuor ekkuo sagorsie gabur-milie tar sidu gelo.
41014067	The Pitorore agun phuode degilo ar tare gome-dalei seinei holo, “Tuio daw Nazareth hullie Jisu loge ele!”
41014068	Hintu bharenei Pitore holo, “Tui hi hole sien mui hoi no parongor ar noio bujongor.” Sebeden the girieganor duoro barendi nigiliegoio ekkuo radai dag harilo.
41014069	Sagorsie gabur- miliebuoi Pitorore aro deginei siot thiei agonde sigunore the huo dorilo, “Ei manuschuo olode tharar dolottun ek jon.”
41014070	Hintu Pitore aro bharelo. Ar hanekkon porendi tar hai thiei agonde sigune Pitorore aro holak, “Tor gajcharabuo loi hobor pai, tui ek jon Galili hullie senottei hamakkai tui tharar dolottun ek jon oi.”
41014071	Hintu Pitore tare the geil di ar the sobot heinei sigunore holo, “Tumi horte Manuschuore mui no sinong.”
41014072	Jogon-togon radai di bar dag harilak. Sebeden Pitore Jisu tare hoiede hodagan monot tullie, “Radai di bar dag no haribar age, tui more tin bar bharebe.” Ar Pitore sien monot udi gujhi-gujhi hanilo.
41015001	Beinnie poittie rajguru-thagurune, borjonnune, dhormo niomor mastorune, ar goda sanhedrinuoi temmang gorinei, thara Jisure bani ninei Pilador sidu gojei dilakkoi.
41015002	Pilade Jisuttun pujor gorilo, “Tui ne Judaiunor Rajabuo?” Jisu tare uttor dinei holo, “Tui holede doge mui oi.”
41015003	Ar rajguruthagurune Jisure onek duj badei dilak.
41015004	Pilade aro Jisuttun pujor gorilo, “Tui hitchu uttor no dibe? Sah, tor biruddie hodogkani thara shakki dedon.”
41015005	Hintu Jisu hitchu uttor no dilo ar. Senottei Pilade amok olo.
41015006	Rokkie utchob bagene Pilade jielot porsie manus ek jon, jonogone jare magon tare tharattei iri dide.
41015007	Sei lokkene Barabba nange ek jon manus tar somarsie andolon goriegunor somare jielot bannie gori elo. Thara andolon gorte ek jon manus hun gorsion.
41015008	Manuschune Pilade tharare gori dede doge gori dibartei jogar pari-pari hujoli gora dorilak.
41015009	Hintu Pilade tharare uttor dinei holo, “Judaiunor Rajabuo mui tomartei iri didung tomar mone hoi ni?”
41015010	Haron rajguruthagurune Jisure insie darai tar adot gojei duonde sien the hobor pai.
41015011	Hintu rajguruthagurune Jisur bodoli Barabbare magibartei manuschunore bhejei duon.
41015012	Pilade tharare aro uttor dilo, “Tumi Judaiunor Raja hode ibiere mui hi gori didung tomartun mone hoi?”
41015013	Hintu thara jogar parinei aro holak, “Tare krosot de!”
41015014	Pilade tharattun pujor gorilo, “Hittei, ar the hi duj gorsiede.” Hintu thara sie bes jogar pari-pari holak, “Tare krosot de!”
41015015	Piladottun jonogonor monani purei dibar mone holo hinottei Barabbare tharattei iri dilo. Sebeden the Jisure sabukkoi mara bajei didai krosot dibartei Jisure tharar adot gojei dilo
41015016	Sebeden soinniogune Jisure praetoriumδ honde siot bhoreilakkoi. Ar siot thara oinnio beg soinniogun daga-dagi gori thubelak.
41015017	Thara Jisure ekkan halisuri habor pinei dilak. Ar ekkuo hadar tuk banenei thara Jisure madat di dilak.
41015018	Sebeden thara Jisure salam gora dorilak, “Ju, Judaiunor Rajabuo.”
41015019	Thara Jisur siriebuot ekkuo hagara ludigkuoi mugureilak. Thara tare sep phelei dilak. Ar thara adu pari nigurinei Jisure salam gori sorman gortonde sannie gorilak.
41015020	Ar thara Jisure thatta gori phureinei, halisuri rongor haboran huei loinei tar nijor haboran pinei dilak. Sebeden tare krosot dibartei barendi nilak.
41015021	Simon nange ek jon manus hedottun ette thara lagot peinei, soinniogune tare Jisur kroschan bolajure bugei dinei neja bajei dilak. Simone olode Alexanderor ar Rufor bab, Kurini dejor manus.
41015022	Ar thara Jisure Golgotha honde jaganot nilak. Sienor orthogan olode, Hulosara jaga.
41015023	Sebeden thara Jisure hebartei modtoi mura dilak. Hintu The no helo.
41015024	Thara Jisure krosot denar porendi tar haboran bhag goribartei, har bhagot hi pore sebartei thara bhaggio porikkie selak.
41015025	Beinnie tin ghonta oktot thara Jisure krosot duon.
41015026	Kroschanor madat tare duj banaidie gonggolanot Pilade legi die: JUDAIUNOR RAJABUO.
41015027	Thara di jon daget ek jon denedi ar ekjon bhangedi Jisur loge krosot duon.
41015028	Siendoi Sastror ei hodagan puron olo, “Ar tare niom saragunor somare gona olo.”
41015029	Ar sindi adi jande sigune thara sirie najei-najei thatta gorinei holak “Ihi jok! Tui ne mondirbuo bhanginei aro tin dine tulliebuo!
41015030	Kroschanottun lambina ar Tore tui rokkie gor!”
41015031	Ei sedogkie gorinei rajguru-thagurune ar dhormo niomor mastorune Jisure thatta gorinei thara-thara huobula gorilak, “The onnio manjiore uddhar gorsie, hintu The nijore-nije uddhar gori no pare.
41015032	Ami deginei tare bischias jei para, Kristo, Israelunor rajabuo kroschanottun ikkunu lami ejok!” Ar Jisur somare krosot duonde siguneo tare peis gorilak.
41015033	Dibursiettun duri tin porsie song goda dejchan andhar oi roie.
41015034	Bel tin porsie oinei, Jisu birat ro gorinei holo, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabachthani?” Sienor orthogan olode: “Mor Itchior, mor Itchior, more a hittei tui phelei gele?”
41015035	Siot thiei agonde sigunottun ek dagie sien suninei, holak, “Sawh, the Elijare dager.”
41015036	Thara siottun ek jon daba-daba jeinei ekkan pul horo modot bureinei ekkuo hagara ludigo madat bajeinei Jisure hebartei dinei di holo, “Gai-gai thok, Elija tare kroschanottun lameibartei eje ne no eje, sei thei.
41015037	Ar Jisu birat ro gori jogar porilo, sebeden tar poranan nigili gelo.
41015038	Sei porendi, mondirbuor porda haboran ugorottun duri tole song phadi jeinei di hotta olo.
41015039	Ek shot jon soinnior ugure senapotibuoiδ Jisur mujungot thiei elo, ar Jisu jogar pari udinei the suinnie. Ar Jisu hingori mori gelo the deginei holo, “Ei Manuschuo hamakkai Itchioror Puo.”
41015040	Hoiekkuo miliei ek durottun sei agon. Tharar moiddie Meri Magdalini, honet Jakob ar Joseb dagir mabuo Meri ar Solomio elo.
41015041	Jisu Galilit elode lokkenettun duri ei miliegune tar loge jan, ar tar ham gori duon. Ar bhalukkun oinnio milie Jisur somare Jerusalemot ejchion, tharaio siot elak.
41015042	Sei dinnuo elo jugoleibar din, mane, Jireni Dinnuor agendi dinnuo. Honatto sajonnie oie hinottei,
41015043	Arimathea adamor Josebe lungilogi. The ek jon sanhedrinor nangkora manus ar ebode Itchioror rejjiogan the barsei elo. The sahoj gori Pilador sidu jeinei Jisur heyegan magilogoi.
41015044	Jisu honatto morsie bili suninei, Pilade amok olo. Sebeden ek shot jon soinnior senapotibuoreδ the daginei Jisu morsiede hodogkon song olo sien pujor gorilo.
41015045	Ek shot jon soinnior senapotibuottunδ hobor panar porendi, Pilade Josebore morabuo nibartei onumoti dilo.
41015046	Josebe padol habor hinilo. Morabuo kroschanottun pari haborandoi berei ekkan sadarat hunnie sidiesalot bhorei tholo. Sebeden the sidiesalanor gattuo duoran ekkuo dangor silloi nadi dilo.
41015047	Meri Magdalini ar Josebor mabuo Meri somot Jisur heyegan hudu thologoi thara sei roion.
41016001	Jireni Dinnuo bidi janar porendi, Meri Magdalini, Jakobor mabuo Meri ar Solomi dagi tumbas jinij Jisur heyeganot jeinei guli dibartei hini lolak.
41016002	Saptar polim dinnuot, beinnie poittie bel uttie-uttie thara sidiesalanot gelak.
41016003	Jade-jade thara-thara huobula gorton, “Sidiesalanor silluo duoranottun amattei honna larei dibo?”
41016004	Hintu thara senei degilakke semba dangor sil jagattun lareie gori age.
41016005	Thara sidiesalanor gattuor bidirie sominei ek jon gabursie manus lamba dhub shilum ursie gori den dagedi boi agede degilak.
41016006	Hintu The tharare holo, “Amok no oio. Mui hobor pang, krosot duonde Nazareth hullie Jisure tumi togor. The idu nei. The jiei uttie. Tare thoionde jagan tumi rini sawhgi.
41016007	Jo, tar sisjiogunore ar Pitorore hogoi: The tomartun akke-akke Galili dejot jar. Tomare the hoiede doge sidu tumi tare degibagoi.”
41016008	Senottei miliegune jhadi gori nigilinei daba-daba Gouro gattuottun dhei gelak. Haron thara girgireinei amok oion. Ar thara harore hitchu no hon, haron thara doreon.
41016009	Saptar polim dinnuot beinnie poittie Jisu jiei uduonar porendi the sattuo bhud dabei dede sei Meri Magdalini idu akke dega diegi.
41016010	Jisur loge elakke sigune buk porah oi handonde seiet The jeinei tharare hobor hologoi.
41016011	Jokke thara Jisu jei uttie ar Meri Magdalini tare degkie gori hobor sunilak, thara bischias no gorilak.
41016012	Sienor porendi tharattun di jon hedo mokkie jade Jisu thara sidu dog-judo gori dega diegi.
41016013	Thara phiri einei oinnio bagi sisjiogunore holakki, hintu siguneo bischias no gorilak.
41016014	Bego jere, egaro jon sisjioi haade thara sidu Jisu dega dilogi. Thara bischias no goron ar the jiei uduonar porendi tare degkuonde sigunor hodagani akkol han oinei bischias no goron hinottei the tharare thajei gubilo.
41016015	Jisu tharare holo, “Goda songsarot jo, beg poran-bolagunor sidu gom hoboran prosar gorogoi.
41016016	Je bischias jeinei baptisma goribuo, the mukti pebo, hintu je bischias no jai, the dujot poribo
41016017	Ar ei sinnogani bischiasigunor loge thebo, mor nange thara bhud dabei di paribak. Thara nuo bhasadi hoda hobak.
41016018	Thara sap dhori tulibak. Ar thara morede bis heleio tharar sobai hitchu odo noi. Aw-sugkiegunor heyet tharar adtani tuli dile aw-sugkiegun gom obak.”
41016019	Probu Jisu thararloi hoda hoi phuronar porendi, tare sorgot tuli neja olo. Ar the Itchioror denedi, bojilogoi.
41016020	Sisjiogune siottun jeinei jagai jagai prosar gorilak. Probuie tharar somare ham gorilo. Ar thara prosar goronde sien soittio bili sinnoganiloi Probuie proman gori dide. Amen.
42001001	Amar moiddie ghodi jeiede ghotonani sombonde legibartei balukjone seresta gorsion. Sieni olode jodepode ami bischias goridie ieni.
42001002	Jigune polliettun duri degkuon ar hodaganor sagorsie elak, thara amare legi phelei dijeion. Senottei, thara jedogkie gori amare legi phelei dijeion, thik sedogkie gori mui legilung.
42001003	Oh moha mannio Theophil, polliettun duri sieni begkani mui doledalei sigi loiong hinottei, muio bhabi selungge sieni tore mui gome-dalei legile gom obo.
42001004	Oinnio jone tore jei hodagani sigei duon, sieni hamakkai oi hinei tui puro gori hobor pebartei mui legilung.
42001005	Judea dejor Herod raja amolot, Zekaria nange ek jon dhormo mastor elo. The olode Abija dolo manus. Zekaria mogkuo Elizabethi olode Aronor bongso.
42001006	Itchioro doge, thara duo jon dharmig. Huno ekkan duj di no parsie Probur beg shiliegun paleidak ar niomani manidak.
42001007	Elizabethi bhaj hinottei thara puo no pan. Ar ikkie thara duo jon buro oion.
42001008	Zekaria tar dolot Dhormo mastoro ijebe Itchioro samne ham gorte seiet, ien tar ghodilo.
42001009	Dhormo mastoro ijebe ham goribartei, the ak selo. Tar haman porilode Probur pobitro jaganot jeinei dhub-hadi anganagoi.
42001010	Ar the dhub-hadi angande somoi, beg manuschune Mondirbuo barendi bor magodon.
42001011	Sebeden Probur ekkuo sorgo-dud tar idu dega dinei dhub-hadi angande sienor denedi thiei agegi.
42001012	Zekaria sorgo-dudtuore deginei jagulug olo ar dorelo.
42001013	Sebeden sorgo-dudtuoi tare holo, “Tui no dores. Tor Itchiorbuoi tui bor magkuosie sien suinnie hinottei, tor mogkuoi Elizabethi tore ekkuo morod puo phudei dibo. Tare ‘Johon’ nang thoi dis.
42001014	Tor mon hujhi ar utchob obo. Ar jokke the jormo obo, sagor manjie hujhi obak.
42001015	Haron the Probur ijebe oborug obo. The tar gorbhot thagkettun duri Itchiore tare Pobitro Aptabuottei dibo. Ar huno din angguro ros ar mod hedo noi.
42001016	The shagor Israel manus Probu, tharar Itchiorbuo idu phirei anibo.
42001017	Elija aptabuoloi ar hemodagandoi the Probur akke-akke jebo. ‘Babpunor monani tharar puoguno idu phirei dibo.’ Hoda no manonde manuschunore dharmig manuschune bhabonde dogkie bhabon para gori dibo. Probuttei jugol oie manus the banebo.”
42001018	Zekaria sorgo-dudtuottun pujor gorilo, “Hamakkai sien obo bili mui hingori hobor peim? mui buro oiong ar mor mogkuoio baari buro oie.”
42001019	Sorgo-dudtuoi uttor dilo, “Mui Gabriel. Mui Itchiorbuo mujungot thiei thang. Mui torloi hoda hobartei ar sei gom hoboran tore hobartei Itchiorbuoi more dipadeie.
42001020	Ar sunis, tui mor hodagan bischias no gorilie hinottei, ieni thara olode ghodi no jaisong ikkie bub obe ar hoda hoi no paribie.”
42001021	Manuschune Zekariare barsei agon. Mondirbuot edokkon song the diri gori age hinottei thara amok olak.
42001022	The nigili einei, the thararloi hoda hoi no parilo. Madi no parsie gori the thararloi ijiriedi hoda hor hinottei thara buji parilakke pobitro jaganot the azilie peie.
42001023	The tar dhormo haman phureinei, the ghorot gelo.
42001024	Sei porendi tar mogkuo Elizabethi pedoli olo. Pas mas song ghoro bidiriettun the no nigililo.
42001025	The holo, “Probuie ien mortei gori di die. Ingillie the tar doyegan degelo ar manuschuno moiddiettun The mor bodnaman tuli nilo.”
42001026	Shoi majot, Itchiore sorgo-dud Gabrielore Galili dejor Nazareth adamot dipadelo.
42001027	The ekkuo shodi gabur-milie sidu gelo. Shodi gabur-miliebuo nangan olode Meri. Tare Josebpoi jodon bani duon. Josebe olode Davidor bongso.
42001028	Sorgo-dudtuoi tar sidu jeinei hologoi, “Monggol ok! Probuie tore hos peie. Probu tor loge age. Milier moiddie Probuie tore asirbad gorilo.”
42001029	Hintu Meri Gabrielore deginei, tar hodagandoi the jagulug olo. Ar tare the pujor gorer: Sei salamano orthogan hi?
42001030	Hintu sorgo-dudtuoi tare holo, “Meri, tui no dores. Haron Itchiorottun hospanagan tui peios.
42001031	Sunis, tui pedoli obe ar ekkuo morod puo phudebe, ar tare “Jisu” nang thoi dis.
42001032	The oborug manus obo ar tare Begottun Dangor Itchiorbuor Puo hobak. Ar Probu Itchiore tar Purbo-puruschun Davidor singasonan tare dibo.
42001033	The Jakobo ghorbuoguno ugure umore-umor sason-goribuo. Tar rejjiogan huno din thum odo noi.”
42001034	Meri sorgo-dudtuore holo, “Mui olungge shodi gabur-milie, mor hono morodtoi ai pai nei sien hingori obo?”
42001035	Sorgo-dudtuoi uttor dilo “Pobitro Apta tor ugure ebo, ar Begottun Dangor Itchiorbuor hemodagane tar shababuoloi tore dagibogi. Senottei, tui phudebede pobitro gurobuore Itchioror Puo hobak.
42001036	Sunis, tor sodorsie Elizabethio buro-hale pedoli oie. Manjie tare bhaj milie hon, hintu the pedoli oiede shoi mas olo.
42001037	Itchiore no pare para hitchu nei.”
42001038	Meri holo, “Shah, mui olungge Probur banidaji. Tui holede doge mor ok.” Sebeden sorgo-dudtuo tar siottun gelogoi.
42001039	Sei lokke Meri jhadi gori udi Judea dejot ekkan muro adamot gelo.
42001040	Zekaria ghoro bidirie somilogoi ar Elizabethire salam gorilo.
42001041	Elizabethi Meri robuo suninei, tar pedo bidirie puobuo sattei udilo. Ar Elizabethi Pobitro Aptaloi boron olo.
42001042	Birat ro gori the holo, “Milier moiddie Itchiore tore asirbad gorsie. Tor pedo bidirie puobuoreo Itchiore asirbad gorsie.
42001043	Hintu a hittei tui mor Probur mabuo more hobor dhora elede?
42001044	Shadei, tui more salam gorsioschie robuo mui suinniongoi, mor pedo bidirie puobuo hujhie sattei uttie.
42001045	Bischias gorsios hinottei tui hoballie. Haron Probuie tore hoiede sieni purei dibo.”
42001046	Meri holo, “Mor ontorane Probure shanggadik baini gore.
42001047	Ar mor aptabuoi, mor mukti gorie Itchiorbuo iot baari hujhi oie.
42001048	Haron, mui, tar niroit banidajibuore the selo hinottei mor aptabuo hujhi oi. Sunis, ikkiettun duri juge-juge manjie more Itchioro asirbad peiebuo hobak.
42001049	Haron Hemoda-bolabuoi mortei dangor ham gori die ar tar nangan olode pobitro.
42001050	Ar jigune tare bhokti goron, juge-juge tharare the doye gore.
42001051	Tar adtandoi bolimondo ham gorsie. Jigunor ontorot phodani age sigunore the settera gorsie.
42001052	Hemoda-bola manuschunore the tharar singasonanittun lameie. Hintu The niroit manuschunote ojolot tullie.
42001053	Ped pora hande manuschunore the gom jinij ped borei die. Hintu thagoie manuschunore the suduo adtoi dipadeie.
42001054	Tartun doyegan monot thai hinottei, the tar nijor sagorsie Israelore sahajjio gorsie.
42001055	The amar purbo puruschundoi soittio gorsiede doge, Abrahamore ar tar bongsogunore the juge- juge sahajjio gorsie.”
42001056	Sebeden Meri Elizabethi loge perai tin mas thanar porendi tar ghorot phiri elo.
42001057	Elizabethir guro obar somoi oinei, the morod puo ekkuo phudelo.
42001058	Tar paralliegune ar tar sodorsiegune Probuie tare shanggadik doye gorsie bili suninei, thara tar somare hujhi olak.
42001059	Attio dinot gurobuore thara sundu-sam habi dibartei gelak. Tar babo nange-nange tare Zekaria nang thoi dedon.
42001060	Hintu tar mabuoi holo, “Noi, noi, tar nangan obode Johon.”
42001061	Sebeden thara-thara holak, “Sei nangan daw tomar sodorsie moiddie haror nei.”
42001062	Tar bab Zekariai gurobuore hi nang thoi dibar sai pujor goribartei, thara-thara ijiriedi holak.
42001063	The legibar jinij ekkan maginei, legilo: “Tar nangan Johon.” Ar thara begkune amok olak.
42001064	Sebeden Jogon-togon Itchiore Zekariar muon ar jilan huli dilo, ar the madi parinei Itchiorore baini gorilo.
42001065	Beg paralliegune dorelak. Ar goda Judea muro dejchanot, manuschune sieni sombonde huobula gorton.
42001066	Sieni zara sunon thara mone-mone eksottie bhabidak. Tare pujor goron, “Ibie henjannie guro obo?” Ar Probur shoktigan tar loge elo.
42001067	Tar bab Zekaria Pobitro Aptaloi boron olo. Sebeden the muni dogkie gori holo.
42001068	Probu tar manuschuno idu einei tharare uddhar gorsiegi hinottei, “Probur Israelo Itchiorbuore baini gori.
42001069	The amattei tullie ek jon mukti die David tar sagorsie Davidor ghorottun.
42001070	Tar pobitro muniguno muoni darai the agendi protiggia gorsiede doge sien olo.
42001071	Amar sottrugunottun ar amare hos no pande sigunor adottun amare rokkie goribartei the amarloi protiggia gorsie.
42001072	Amar purbo puruschunore doye goribartei ar the tar pobitro suktigan idot tulibartei the protiggia gorsie.
42001073	Amar Purbo-puruschun Abrahamboi the sobot heinei protiggia gorsie.
42001074	The protiggia gorsiede, amar sottruguno adottun The amare rokkie goranar porendi, ami tare no doreie gori tobona gori para.
42001075	Ami jedog din baji thei, pobitro ar dharmig gori tar mujungot ami tare tobona gori para.
42001076	Oh put, tar podtani tartei jugolei dibartei tui Probur akke-akke jebe hinottei, tore begottun dangor Itchioror munibuo hobak.
42001077	Tharar pabpani mab gorinei Itchiore tharare mukti dibo gori tui jeinei tar manuschunore gyen dibegoi.
42001078	Amar Itchioror meyet darai the tharar pabpani mab gore ar ugurottun amar idu bennie belo sodogkanδ elo.
42001079	Jigune andharot boi agon ar jigune morono shabat tole agon sigunore phor dibartei the elo. Amar thengani shanti podedi adei nibartei the elo.”
42001080	Gurobuo dangor-digowl oinei aptadi shokto olo. Israel manus-chuno mujungot hulomela gori the no eje song, the moruobomit roie.
42002001	Sei lokke moharaja Kaisara Augusto ugum dede, songsaro manuschune jon bagene nijor-nijor jagat tharar nangani manus gonanat legidak.
42002002	Kurini Syria rejjiogan sason gorette lokke polim sei manus gonanagan gora oie.
42002003	Jon bagene nijor-nijor sohorot nang legibartei gelak.
42002004	Ar Galili dejot Nazareth adamortun, Josebeo Judea dejot gelo. The Davidor bongso ar Davidor ghorbuo hinottei, Davidor adamanot, Bethlehemot the gelo.
42002005	The Meri somot nang legibartei jeie. Meri, tar jodon bannie mogkuo guro ong-ong oie.
42002006	Thara siot elakke lokke, Merir gurobuo obar din pureie.
42002007	Ar Meri tar polim morod puobuo phudelo. Thara porbhajchie ghor no pan hinottei, gurobuore lengera haniloi bereinei tare ekkan phiongot porei tholak.
42002008	Sei lokke, sei bamot bera-shagol soreiegune madot thedak. reidot tharar bera-shagolun subi agon.
