42002009	Ar sawh, Probur ekkuo sorgo-dud thara sidu dega dilogi. Probur mohimagan tharar seropala phor gori phudilogi. Sebeden thara shanggadik dorelak.
42002010	Hintu sorgo-dudtuoi tharare holo, “No doreo, Haron suno, beg manuschunottei shanggadik hujhi obar gom hobor mui aniduong.
42002011	Haron edchie Davido adamanot tomartei ek jon mukti gorie jormo oie. The olode Probu Kristo.
42002012	Ien tomar idu sinno obo: Ekkuo huji guro lengera haniloi bereie gori ekkan phiongot porei thoie gori debagoi.”
42002013	Addikie gori, birat ek jhag sorgo-dud Itchiorore baini gori-gori sei sorgo-dudtuo somare dega dilakki.
42002014	Thara hodon, “Begottun ugure Itchioror mohima ok. pittimit shanti ar, manjiortei monggol ok.”
42002015	Sorgo-dudtune janar porendi, bera-shagol soreiegune thara-thara holak, “Bethlehemot ami ikkie jei. Probu amare holo, sien hi olo seigoi.”
42002016	Sebeden thara hijie-hijchie gori gelak. Gurobuore ekkan phiongot porsie gori ar Meriloi Josebore thara suph pelakkoi.
42002017	Gurobuore tare deganar porendi, sorgo-dudtuoi gurobuor sombonde tharare hoiede hodagan thara phogodang gorilak.
42002018	Bera-shagol soreiegune sien holak ar sei hodagan sunieni beg manuschune amok olak.
42002019	Hintu Meri sieni begkani idot udi mone-mone hub bhabi sar.
42002020	Sebeden bera-shagol soreiegune, sorgo-dudtuoi tharare hoiede sieni begkani suninei ar deginei, thara Itchiorore mohima ar baini gori-gori phirei gelak.
42002021	Gurobuore sundu-sam habi dibar attio dinot, thara tare Jisu nang thoi dilak. The pedot no ode, tare sorgo-dudtuoi sei nangan thoi die.
42002022	Mosir Niomo doge, tharar sudduo-shanggo oionde dinun phureinei, Probu sidu gojei dibartei thara Jisure Jerusalemot anilak.
42002023	Probur Niomanot Mosi legkiede doge, “Polimmo morod puo ole, PROBUR sidu pobitro ijebe mone gora obo.”
42002024	Probur Niomo doge, “Ek jur hodor bah, ek jur haw-shawh,” utchorbo goribarlottei tare Jerusalemot nejeilak.
42002025	Ar sawh, Jerusalemot Simeon nange ek jon dharmig, ar Itchior bhokto manus elo. Israel jadtuore dug muson goridibode sibiere asha gori the barsei elo. Tar ugure Pobitro Aptabuo elo.
42002026	Pobitro Aptai tare janei dede, Probur Kristore no degkie gori the morto noi.
42002027	Pobitro Aptai tare Mondirbuot nejeilo. Ar guro Jisure tar bab-magune Mondirbuot nejeilak. Thara tartei Niomo dosturo doge gorton.
42002028	Sebeden Simeone Jisure adot loinei Itchiorore baini gorinei holo,
42002029	“Probu, tor hoda doge ikkie tor banidajibuore shantie jebartei de.
42002030	Haron mor sogkundoi tor muktigan degilung.
42002031	Ien tui begkunor mujungot jugolei duos.
42002032	The be-jadtuno sidu phor obo ar the Tor Israel manuschunor mohimagan obo.”
42002033	Simone gurobuor sombonde hode suninei, Josebpoi Meri amok olak.
42002034	Sebeden Simeone tharare asirbad dinei gurobuor mabuo, Merire holo, “Sha, Israel manjiortun shagor manus udibartei ar jhuri poribartei Itchiore ei gurobuore thik gorsie. Biruddie gori thara madibagke sienor sinnogan The obo.
42002035	Siennie gori Itchiore shagor manjior mono hodagani phogodang gori dibo. Mono dugkan dhar horgo dogkie gori tor nijor ontorot phudibo.”
42002036	Siot Anna nange ekkuo milie munio elo. The olode Asher goza, phanuelo jhi. The neg lonar porendi, the shodi elode siottun duri bana sat bojor giritti gorsie. The shanggadik buro oie.
42002037	The perai surasi bojor rani oinei elo. The huno din mondirbuottun no jai. Dine-reide ubos thei ar bor magi-magi the Itchior tobona gori-gori roie.
42002038	Thik sei lokke, theo einei Probure baini gorilogi. Itchiore Jerusleman uddhar goribode sien asha gori agonde beg manuschunore the gurobuor sombonde holo.
42002039	Sebeden Josebpoi Meri Probur Niomo doge begkani gori phureinei, thara Galili dejot nijor Nazareth adamot phiri gelak.
42002040	Gurobuo dangor-digowl oinei, aptai ar gyene boron olo. Ar Itchioror doyegan tar ugure elo.
42002041	Bojor bagene Jisur bab-magune Rokkie Utchobo lokke Jerusalemot jedak.
42002042	The baro bojor oinei, dosturo doge Utchobo lokke thara Jerusalemot gelak.
42002043	Utchobo dinun ses onar porendi, thara ghorot phiri jadon. Guno Jisu Jerusalemot roiede sien Josebpoi ar Jisur mabuoi hobor no pan.
42002044	Thara dolot The age bili mone gori, thara ek din gelak. Sebeden tharar sodorsie ar somarsiegune siot tare togei selak.
42002045	Tare suph no peinei, thara Jerusalemot phiri togadondi.
42002046	Tin dino porendi Mondirbuot tare suph pelak. The dhormoniomo mastoruno loge boi age. The tharar hodagani suni age ar the tharareo prosonno pujor gorer.
42002047	Jigune Jisur hodagani suinnion, sigun begkune tar bujonagan deginei ar tar juobpani suninei shanggadik amok olak.
42002048	Tar bab-maguneo tare deginei amok olak. Tar mabuoi tare holo, “Porannie, a hittei amare tui ien gorilie? Shadei, monot dug gori tor babpuo ar mui tore togeir.”
42002049	Jisu tharare holo, “A hittei tumi more togana? Mui mor Babo hamot lagi peimbe tumi hobor no po.”
42002050	Hintu The tharare hi hor sien thara no bujilak.
42002051	Sebeden the thara loge Nazareth adamot gelo, ar tharar hoda manilo. Hintu tar mai sei hodagani begkani tar monot rageilo.
42002052	Itchioror ar manjior hospanat gyenodi ar heyedi, Jisu dangor-digowl olo.
42003001	Moharaja Tiberia Kaisara pondoro bojor rajotto lokkene, Judea rejjioganot Pontio Pilade sason-gorie elo. Galili rejjioganot Herode sason-gorie elo, tar bheibuo Philibe Iturea ar Trakoniti rejjioganir sason-gorie elo. Lysania Abilene rejjioganot sason-gorie elo.
42003002	Anna ar Kaiapha begottun dangor moharajguruthagur elak. Sei lokke Itchioror hodagan moruobomit Zekariar puo Johono idu ejchie.
42003003	Johone Jordan Sora Seropala beg bamanit jeinei pabor mab pebartei imie hana baptisma hoda prosar gorilo.
42003004	Siendoi muni Isaia tar boibuot legkiede sien puron olo, “Moruobomit ek jonor roi horte: ‘PROBUR podtan hajeinei, tar podani uju goro.
42003005	Beg hijingani boron gora obo. Beg moun murogun nijo gora obo. Tega- tekkie podtani uju gora obo. Ar phullie hattong podtani birbischie gora obo.
42003006	Beg manuschune Itchioror muktigan degibak.’ ”
42003007	Tar idu baptisma goribartei jhag-jhag manus gelak. Sebeden the tharare holo, “Bijollo sabor bongsogun, ebode rakkanottun dhei jebartei honna tomare uij dilo?
42003008	Tomar monani pabottun phireio bili manjie degonpara ham goro! Ar tumi mone-mone no hoio, ‘Amar bab Abrahame amattei agedo’ Haron mui tomare hongor: Itchiore ei silunottuno Abrahamottei puo banei di pare.
42003009	Ikkunu gajchunor gorat hurolan thuo oie. Jei gajchuot gom gulo no doribo, sibie goschei dinedi agunot phelei die obo.”
42003010	Sebeden manjior jhagkune pujor gorilak, “Judi siennie ole, amar hi gora poribo?”
42003011	Johone uttor dilo, “Jartun dibie shilum age, jar nei tare ekkuo bhag duok. Ar jar hebar jinij age, theo siennie gorog.”
42003012	Baptisma lobartei hajana-tulliegune Johono sidu gelak. Thara tare holak, “Guruthagur amar hi gora poribo?”
42003013	Johone tharare holo, “Niomor bara hajana no tullio.”
42003014	Ar hoiek jon soinnio tartun pujor gorilak, “Amar hi gora poribo?” the tharare holo, “Bolajure tengaδ no loio. Mijie-mijie gori manjiore duj no dou. Tomar bedonundoi mon hujhi gori thagkuo.”
42003015	Manuschune Kristore asha gori barsei agon hinottei, thara mone-mone Johonore hodon: the Kristo oini noi?
42003016	Johone begkunore holo, “Mui tomare jodepode gori panit baptisma gori duongor. Hintu mortun bes oborug ek jon ejer. Mui tar joda durienio huei dibar lak noi. The tomare Pobitro Aptaloi ar agundoi baptisma gori dibogi.
42003017	Tar ghomun gome-dalei boier dinedi gola-ghorot bhorei thobartei tar hulogan adot loinei age. Hintu sobhagun huno din morede agunot puri pheleibo.”
42003018	Johone shagor oinnio hodaloi manuschunore utchuo tuli dinei gom hoboran tharare janei dilo.
42003019	Seiran rejjiottun ekkan rejjio sason-gorie Herod Tetrakoδ tar bheio mogkuo Herodire loie hinottei Johone tare gobpie. Herode oinnio bojong ham gorsie hinotteio Johone tare gobpie.
42003020	Sieni baraio Herode aro ekkan duj gorilo. The Johonore jielot bhorei thoie.
42003021	Johone beg manuschunore baptisma gori dede, Jisureo baptisma gori dilo. Jisu bor magode, sorgogan hulo gelo.
42003022	Pobitro Apta hodoro ruk dhorinei Jisur ugure porilogi. Sebeden sorgottun ekkuo sobdo bhar oinei holo, “Tui mor agojor Puo, mui Tor ugure baari hujhi olung.”
42003023	Jisu tar ham arambo gorsiede lokke, the perai tiris bojor boios oie. Manjie mone gortak The Josebor puo, Josebe Helir puo.
42003024	Heli Motthador puo Motthade Levi Melukir puo, Meluki Jannar puo, Janna Josebor puo.
42003025	Josebe Mottathiar puo, Mottathia Amosor puo, Amose Nahumor puo, Nahume Eslir puo, Esli Naggar puo.
42003026	Nagga Maathor puo, Maathe Mottathiar puo, Mottathia Semeir puo, Semei Josebor puo, Josebe Judar puo,
42003027	Juda Joannanor puo, Joannane Rhesar puo, Rhesa Zerubabelor puo, Zerubabele Shealtielor puo, Shealtiele Nerir puo.
42003028	Neri Melukir puo, Meluki Addir puo, Addi Kosamor puo, Kosame Elmodamor puo, Elmodame Erar puo,
42003029	Era Joshuar puo, Joshua Eliezerar puo, Eliezera Jorimor puo, Jorime Motthador puo, Motthade Levir puo,
42003030	Levi Simeonor puo, Simeone Judar puo, Judar Josebor puo, Josebe Jonanor puo, Janane Eliakimor puo,
42003031	Eliakima Melear puo, Melea Mainanor puo, Mainane Mottathiador puo, Mottathiade Nathanor puo Nathane Davidor puo.
42003032	Davida Jesir puo, Jesi Obedor puo, Obede Boazor puo, Boaze Salmonor puo, Salmone Nahsonor puo.
42003033	Nahsone, Aminadabor puo, Aminadobe Aramor puo, Arame Joramor puo, Jorame Hezrono puo, Hezrone Perezor puo, Pereze Judar puo.
42003034	Juda Jakobor puo, Jakobe Isaakor puo, Isaake Abrahamor puo, Abrahame Terar puo, Tera Nahoror puo.
42003035	Nahore Serugor puo, Seruge Reur puo, Regu Pelegor puo, Pelege Eberor puo, Ebere Shelar puo.
42003036	Shela Kainanor puo, Kainane Arphasador puo, Arphasade Shemor puo, Sheme Noar puo, Noa Lamekor puo.
42003037	Lameke Methuselar puo, Methusela Enokor puo, Enoke Jaredor puo, Jarede Malalelor puo, Malalele Kainanor puo.
42003038	Kainane Enosor puo, Enose Sethor puo, Sethe Adamor puo, Adame Itchioror puo.
42004001	Jisu Pobitro Aptaloi boron oinei, Jordan sorattun phirilogoi. Sebeden Aptai tare moruobomit nejeilo.
42004002	Siot Diabolaδ tare solis din song lub degenei pabot pheleibartei seie. Sei dinunot The hitchu no hai hinottei dinun bidi janar porendi, tar ped purilo
42004003	Diabolaδ tare holo, “Tui judi Itchioro Puo os, ei silluo pidie obartei ugum de.”
42004004	Jisu tare holo, “Pobitro Sastrot ien lega age: ‘Manus bana pidieloi no bajibak, hintu Itchioro muottun bhar oidie hoda darai bajibak.’ ”
42004005	Sebeden Diabolaδ tare ekkuo ojol muonot tulilogoi. Siottun the Jisure songsaro beg rejjiogani bidirie degelo.
42004006	Ar Diabolaδ tare holo, “Ei begkanir odhihar ar tharar oborugkani mui Tore dim. Ieni more die oie hinottei, mortun jare mone hoi tare ieni mui di parong.
42004007	Senottei, tui judi more tobona goros, ieni begkani Tor obo.”
42004008	Jisu holo, “Soitan, iottun jagoi haron Sastroie hoi, ‘Tor PROBU Itchiorbuore tobona goris, ar tui bana tare sebona goris.’ ”
42004009	Diabolaδ Jisure Jerusalemot ninei, Mondirbuor suischieng badhi-sugkuor ugure thie bajei dilo. Ar the holo, “Tui judi Itchioro Puo os, iottun jham de.
42004010	Haron Sastroie hoi, ‘The Tore rokkie goribartei tar sorgo- dudtunore ugum dibo.
42004011	Tor thengani silot dhuz no hai para, tare ad padi thebakki.’ ”
42004012	Sebeden Jisu tare holo, “Pobitro Sastroie hoi, ‘Tor PROBU Itchiorbuore tui porikkie no seis.’ ”
42004013	Diabolaδ beg lubpani dege phureinei, the Jisure sujuk pai song iri gelo.
42004014	Sebeden Jisu Apta hemodaloi Galili dejot phirilo. Jisur hoboran beg jaganit sidie gelo.
42004015	The tharare ynagogot sigkie dilo ar beg manuschune tare baini gorilak.
42004016	Sebeden the dangor-digol oiede Nazareth adamanot lungilogi. Ar Judaiunor Jireni Dinnuot, tar dosturo doge, the synagogot gelo. Madeibartei the theilo.
42004017	Muni Isaia legkie boibuo tare dilak. Bodi thoie boibuo melinei the sei bhagkuo pelo jiot ien lega age:
42004018	“PROBUR Aptabuo mor ugure age. Senottei, gorib manuschunore gom hoboran mui hobarlottei, the more bei loie. Jigunor monani bhanggie, sigunor monani gom gori dibartei, ar bondi oi agonde sigunore halas hodagan hoi dibartei, hanune degon para gori dibartei, the more dipadeie. Jigune dug-dorop padon, sigunore uddhar goribartei, the more dipadeie.
42004019	PROBUR gojhi loidie bojorbuo prosar goribartei, the more dipadeie.”
42004020	Ar Jisu boibuo bodinei bodi lobiot goriebuore dilo. Jokke the bojilo, synagogot beg manuschune tare rini sei agon.
42004021	The tharare ho arambo gorilo, “Edchie, tumi suni agode lokke Sastro hodagan puron olo.”
42004022	Ar begkune tare gom hodon. Tar muottun doye hodani suninei thara amok oinei holak, “Ete Josebor puo noi ni?”
42004023	Jisu tharare holo, “Tumi hamakkai ei dagho hodagan more hoba ‘Daktorchie, tore tui gom gor! Kapernaumot tui jieni gorsios bili ami suinnei, sieni tor adamanotio gor na.’ ”
42004024	The aro holo, “Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor, munire tharar nijor adamot huno jone gojhi no lon.
42004025	Hintu mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor: Eliza amolot Israel dejot shagor rani-milie elak. Itchiore debabuo share-tin bojor bondo gori thoie. Goda dejchanot shanggadik bhadorad oie.
42004026	Tobuio, Itchiore Elijare sei ekkuo rani-milie sidu di no padai. Hintu The Elijare Sidon bamot Zarephat adamot ekkuo gori rani-milie sidu dipadeie.
42004027	Ar muni Elisha amolot, Israel dejot shagor pharangi manus elak. Syria dejor manus Naaman bade the harore gom gori no de.”
42004028	Sei hodagani suninei, synagogot beg manuschunor shanggadik rak udilo.
42004029	Thara udi, tare adamortun bhar gori dilak. Tharar adaman muro ugure elo. Tare hama madandi phelei dibartei, tare ekkan ojol tarengo madat nilak.
42004030	Hintu Jisu manuschuno jhago serendi nigili, jeiegoi.
42004031	Sebeden Jisu Galili dejor Kapernaum sohorot gelo. Ar Judaiunor Jireni Dinnuot The tharare sigkie der.
42004032	The hemoda-bola dogkie gori hoda hor hinottei, the sigkie dette siendoi manuschun amok olak.
42004033	Synagogot ek jonor hajorchie bhudor apta elo. The birat ro gori holo,
42004034	“Oh Nazareth hullie Jisu, tui amare hi goribartei ele? Amare nas goribartei ele ni na? mui tore sinong. Tui olede Itchiorottun Pobitrobuo.”
42004035	Sebeden Jisu tare gobinei holo, “No madis, sube-sabe tartun nigili ai!” Begkunor song moiddie bhudtuoi tare goschei pheleinei, tare hoti no gorsie gori nigili gelogoi.
42004036	Begkune amok olak. Thara-thara huobula gorton, “Ien hi hoda? The hajorchie aptagunore hemoda ar odhihar loi ugum de, ar thara nigili jan.”
42004037	Ar tar hoboran goda seropala jaganit sidie gelo.
42004038	Jisu synagogottun nigilenar porendi, the Simonor ghorot gelo. Sei lokke Simonor shuribuottun shanggadik jor uttie, ar tartei thara Jisure hujoli gorilak.
42004039	Sebeden Jisu tar ugure gujong oinei joranore gubilo. Joran gom oinei the jogon-togon udinei tharare lobiot gorilo.
42004040	Bel duppie-duppie, jigunor nanan doronor biedi age begkunore tar idu anilak. The tharar ugure jon bagene ad dinei gom gori dilo.
42004041	Shagor manjiortun bhud nigili jeion. Thara birat ro gori holak, “Tui olede Kristo, Itchioror Puobuo.” Jisu bhudtunore gubilo. The Kristo bili thara hobor pan hinottei, the tharare madibar no dilo.
42004042	Phor ode-ode Jisu siottun jei, ekkan niribili jagat gelo. Manuschune tare togadon, manuschune tare suph peineigoi, tharare phelei no jebartei tare rageibar selak.
42004043	Hintu the holo, “Oinnio adamanitio Itchioro rejjiogano hoda mui prosar gori peim. Senottei Itchiore more dipadeie.”
42004044	Galili dejot synagogot the prosar goger.
42005001	Ek dine, Jisu Gennesaret billuo parot thiei thagke manus-chune Itchioro hoda sunibartei tare theli nedon.
42005002	Hulo-sorot the dien naw degilogoi. Jalliegune tharar jalani dhobartei nawgani phelei jeion.
42005003	Siottun ekkan naw simonor elode sienot the udilo. Hulo-sorottun ekka theli dibartei the hujoli gorilo. Jisu nawganot bojinei siottun The manuschunore sigkie dilo.
42005004	The hoda hoi phureinei’ Simonore holo, “Nawgan gobhinot nejeinei Maj pebartei tor jalan ek hup marloi.”
42005005	Simone holo, “Guruthagur, goda reidtuo dug gorinei hitchu no pei. Hintu tui hole hinottei, ek hup jal mari sang.”
42005006	Jalan marinei ektal dangor-dangor maj bajilak. Jalan jane phadong-phadong oie.
42005007	Sebeden oinnio nawt agonde tharar somarsiegune einei tharare bol dibartei ijiriedi dagilak. Thara einei duogan nawt bhoreilak ar thara jane dubong-dubong oion.
42005008	Sien Simon Pitore deginei, the Jisur thengot salam gori porinei holo, “Probu, mui pabi, tui iottun jagoi.”
42005009	Sedukkuo maj bajeion hinottei the ar tar loge elakke sigune beg amok olak.
42005010	Simonor somarsie Zebedior puogun, Jakobpoi Johone amok olak. Sebeden Jisu Simonore holo, “No dores tui edchiettun duri manus dhoribede.”
42005011	Tharar nawgani hulot bireinei, begkani phelei jei thara Jisur pije-pije jeion.
42005012	Ar edogkie olo, Jisu ekkan sohorot elode lokke, sawh, ek jon goda pharangi heye manus lungilogi. The Jisure deginei, bukpari salam gori pori shokto gori tare hujoli gorinei holo, “Probu, tortun mone hole more sudduo gori paros.”
42005013	Jisu tar adtan babeinei tare dhorinei holo, “Mortun mone hor, sudduo ok.” Jogon-togon tar pharangigan sudduo olo.
42005014	Sebeden Jisu tare ugum gorilo, “Harore no hos. Hintu jeinei tor heyegan dhormothagurbuore degeichoi. Tui sudduo oios bili hobor pan para shakki ijebe, Mosi ugum dede doge utchorbo gorloi.”
42005015	Hintu tar hoboran jedog pai sidie gelo. Jhag-jhag manus sunibartei ar the tharar biedigani gom gori dibartei tar idu thubodondi.
42005016	Hintu Jisu nitto niribili jagat jeinei bor magegoi.
42005017	Ek dine Jisu sigkie dede edogkie olo, Galili ar Judea dejor siot hoiek jon Pharisi ar hoiek jon dhormoniomo mastor adam bagenettun ar Jerusalemortun. Ar tharare gom gori dibartei siot Probur hemodagan elo.
42005018	Sawh, hoiek jon manjie ek jon ajorchie pirellie padiloi bhereinei bhaar goribarlottei pod togei selak.
42005019	Manuschunottei, thara tare bidirie ni no parilak. Sebeden tare salo ugure ninei, salan ogodeinei padibuo somot tare manuschuno song moiddie Jisur mujungot lamei dilak.
42005020	Jisu tharar bischiaschani deginei, pirelliebuore holo, “Bhai, mui tor pabpani mab dilung.”
42005021	Pharisigune ar dhormo niomo mastorune mone-mone hodon, “Itchiorore sorjadte ei Manuschuo honna? Itchior bade ar honna pabpani mab gori pare?”
42005022	Thara mone-mone hi bhabodon Jisu hoi parinei pujor gorilo, “Tumi sei hodagani a hittei tomar monot bhabor?
42005023	Hubon hode juit? ‘Mui tor pabpani mab dilung’ bah, ‘Udinei adi ja.’
42005024	Hintu Munischioro Puobuottun pabpani mab goribar pittimit odhihar age. Sien tumi hobor pebartei ien mor gora porer.” Sebeden Jisu ajorchie pirelliebuore holo, “Uth, tor padibuo tulinei tor ghorot ja.”
42005025	Manuschuoi begkunor mujungot jogon-togon thieilo. The tar bischonan tulinei Itchiorore baini gori-gori tar ghorot gelo.
42005026	Siene thara begkunore shanggadik amok gorelo ar thara Itchiorore baini gorilak. Thara dorelak ar holak, “Ami edchie asarjio jinij degilong.”
42005027	Sei porendi, Jisu gelogoi ar Levi nange the ek jon hajana tullie degilo. The hajana tulede ghoranot boi age. Jisu tare holo, “Mor loge ai.”
42005028	Sebeden Levi udi, begkani phelei jei Jisur pije gelo.
42005029	Sebeden Levi Jisuttei tar ghorot ekkan moitto haana dilo. Birat ek jhag hajana-tullie ar oinnio manus tharar loge hebartei bojilak.
42005030	Hintu Pharisigune ar tharar dhormo niomo mastorune tar sisjiogunore budbudeinei holak, “Tumi a hittei hajana-tulliegundoi ar pabigundoi bhat ho?”
42005031	Jisu tharare uttor dilo “Ni-rugi manjiortei daktor no lage, hintu aw-sugkiettei daktor lage
42005032	Mui dharmig manuschun dagibartei no ejong, hintu pabottun mon phiran para, pabigun dagibartei mui ejchiong.”
42005033	Pharisigune Jisure holak, “Johonor sisjiogune nitto ubos thei thei bor magon. Pharisigunor sisjioguneo sedogkie goron. Hintu tor sisjiogune a hittei bhat-pani haan?”
42005034	Jisu tharare holo, “Nuo-jameibuor loge buo hoja jeie thara nuo-jameibuor loge thagke tharare ubos tha bajei di pariba para pang?
42005035	Hintu dinun ebag, sebeden nuo-jameibuore tharattun pharok gori neja obo. Sokkene thara ubos thebak.”
42005036	Jisu ei tulona hodagan tharare holo, “Huno jone puron haborot mar no gallie nuo haborloi tali no duon. Judi tali dile, nuo haborane phadi pheleibo. Nuo taligan puron haborandoi mildo noi.
42005037	Ar huno jone taza angguro ros puron samara holliet no bhoran. Judi bhorele, taza angguro roschane puron samara holliebuo phulei phadi phelebo. Angguro roschan nigili jebo ar samara holliebuo nosto obo.
42005038	Senottei, taza angguro ros nuo samara holliet bhorana, sebeden ros hebar mone no hoi.
42005039	Ar je puron ros heie, tartun jogon-togon nuo angguro ros hebar mone no hoi. Haron the hobo, ‘Puron modtan uttom.’ ”
42006001	Ar edogkie olo, Judaiunor polim Jireni Dinnuor porendi Jireni Dinnuot, Jisu pagana dhan-bhuiedi jar. Tar sisjiogune dhan shijier madagani shininei adtoi hojodinei helak.
42006002	Hoiek jon Pharisie tharare holak, “Amar Jireni Dinnuot jien goribar niom nei sien tumi a hittei goror?”
42006003	Sebeden Jisu tharare uttor dilo, “Davide ar tar somarsiegune ped porai hi gorsion sien tumi madei no sawh?
42006004	The Itchioro ghoranot sominei, the ar tar somarsiegune utchorbo gorsie pidiegani heion. Niomo doge sei pidiegani bana dhormothagurune hei paron.”
42006005	Jisu aro tharare holo, “Munischioro Puobuo Jireni Dinnuoro Probu.”
42006006	Aro ekkuo oinnio Jireni Dinnuot, Jisu synagogot sominei sigkie dilogoi. Siot ek jon manus elo, tar den adtan sitto.
42006007	Pharisigune ar dhormo niomo mastorune tare sog di agon. The judi Jireni Dinnuot gom gori de, tare duj badei di paribak.
42006008	Hintu thara mone-mone hi bhabodon sien Jisu hoi parinei, sitto ad manuschunore holo, “Udinei song moiddie thie.” Manuschuoi udinei thieilo.
42006009	Sebeden Jisu tharare holo, “Mui tomartun ekkan hoda pujor gorongor: Niomani onusare Jireni Dinnuot gom ham goribar de nahi hu-ham goribar de? Ien hi niomot age, gom gori dinei nas gorana?”
42006010	Thara begkunore Jisu sanar porendi, manuschuore holo, “Tor adtan babei de.” Ar the dilo. Jisu tar adtan oinnio gom adtano dogkie gom gori dilo.
42006011	Hintu tharattun rak udilo. Thara Jisure hi goribak sien thara temmang gorilak.
42006012	Sei lokkene edogkie olo, Jisu bor magibartei mounnuot gelo. The goda reidtuo Itchiorottun bor magilogoi.
42006013	Beinnie phor oinei, the tar sisjiogun tar idu daginei dagi, tharattun baro jon beitulilo. The tharareio Apostol nang thoi dilo.
42006014	Simon, tare ‘Pitor’ gori hellie nang thoi dilo. Ar tar bheibuo Andrio, Jakob Johon, Philip, Bartholomai,
42006015	Mothi, Thoma, Alphaior puobuo Jakob ar dej-bhokto Simon.
42006016	Jakobor puobuo Juda ar Juda Iskariod, jeredi Jisure dhora bajei die oiede sibie.
42006017	Jisu tar sisjiogun somot lami einei, ekkan thol jagat thiei thelakki. Siot tar ek jhag sisjio ar birat ek jhag manus elak. Sigun goda Judea dejottun, Jerusalem sohorottun, ar sagoro paror Tyre ar Sidon sohoranittun Jisur hoda sunibartei ar the tharar biedigani gom goridibartei ejchion.
42006018	Hajorchie aptai peinei hosto padonde sigun The gom gori dilo.
42006019	Hemodagan Jisuttun nigileinei gom gore hinottei beg manuschune tare dhoribartei sadon.
42006020	Jisu tar sisjiogunore rini seinei holo, “Tumi jigun gorib, tumi hoballie. Haron Itchioror rejjiogan olode tomar.
42006021	Tumi jigune ikkie ped pora hor, tumi hoballie. Haron tomare ped bhorei die obo. Tumi jigune ikkie hanor, tumi hoballie. Haron tumi aziba.
42006022	Manjie mortei tomare hos no phele, tomare dabei dile, insie gorilie ar tomar nangani habi phelei dile, tumi hoballie sie.
42006023	Tharar Purbo-puruschunune munigunore ei sedogkie gorsion. Hintu tumi, sei dinnie hujhi oio ar utchob oinei phalleio. Haron sawh, tomar oborug poriskarigan sorgot age.
42006024	Tumi jigun thagoie, tomar hobal purok! Haron tumi honatto sug bhug gorsio.
42006025	Tumi jigune ikkie ped boron gori ago, tomar hobal puribo! Haron tumi ped pora heba. Tumi jigune ikkie azor, tomar hobal puribo! Haron tumi monot duge haniba.
42006026	Hintu beg manuschune tomare mije gorinei baini gorilie, tomar hobal puribo! Tharar Purbo-puruschunune bhes dhorsie munigunore ei sedogkie gorsion.
42006027	“Hintu jigune suni agon sigunore mui hongor: Tomar sottrugun hos peio. Jigune tomare hinsie goron, sigunore gom ham gori duo.
42006028	Jigune tomare geil duon, sigunore asirbad duo. Jigune tomarloi aw-shot bebohar goron, tharattei bor magi duo.
42006029	Je tore ekkan hanjabat suorai, tui tare aro ekkan hanjabaio padei dis. Ar je tor haboran nejai, tor shilummuoio holi no goris.
42006030	Je mage tare dis. Ar huno jone judi tor jinij nejeile, sien pherot no magis ar.
42006031	Manjie tomartei jedogkie gori, gori dibar tomartun mone hoi, tumio manjiortei sedogkie gori, gori duo.
42006032	Jigune tomare hos pan, tumi judi bana sigunore hos pele, tumi hi baini peba? Pabi manuschuneio daw tharare hos pande sigunore hos pan.
42006033	Ar jigune tomare gom ham gori duon, tumi judi bana sigunore gom ham gori duo, tumi hi baini peba? Pabi manuschuneio daw sedogkie goron.
42006034	Ar jigune ugurei paribak gori tomar asha thai, bana sigunore tumi judi udor duo, tumi hi baini peba? Pabi manuschuneio daw bes gori pebartei, pabi manjiore udor duon.
42006035	Hintu tumi tomar sottrugunore hos peio, ar tharare gom ham gori duo. Ugurei parilie partok no parilie nei, tharare udor dhar duo. Sebeden tomar poriskarigan birat obo ar tumi begottun dangor Itchioro puo oba. Haron jara donniobad no duon ar bojonggunoreo Itchiore doye gore.
42006036	Senottei, tomar Babe jedogkie doyeli, tumio sedogkie doyeli oio. Duj Dhoranar Sombonde Jisur Sigkie
42006037	“Manjiore no sorjeio, tomareo no sorjeibak manjiore dujot no dorsio, tomareo dujot no dhoribak. Mab duo, tharaio tomare mab dibag.
42006038	Manjiore duo, tharaio tomare dibag. Shabi, shabi jhagerei, jhagerei duo, gome gori mabi duo, pelangbei pore song tomar horo ugure mabi dibag. Haron tumi jei mabpoi mabo, tomareo sei mabpoi maba obo.”
42006039	Jisu tare ei tulona hodaganio hoi dilo. The holo, “Ek jon han manjie han manus nejei paribo ni? Judi nejai, thara duo jon gadot no poribakkoi?
42006040	Sisjiobuoi huno tar guruthagurbuottun dangor noi. Hintu je puripunnuo sigkie pai, the tar guruthagurbuo dogkie obo.
42006041	Tor bheibuor sogkuot phejagan degos, hintu tor nijor sogkuot gaj hottagan agede sien a hittei no degos?
42006042	Ar tor nijor sogkuot gaj hottagan age, a hingori tor bheibuore hobe sei, ‘Bhei, more de tor sogkuottun phejagan huei duong’? Oh phagarabuo! Akke tor nijor sogkuottun gaj hottagan huo, sebeden tor bheibuor sogkuottun phejagan huei dibartei porak-porak gori degibie.
42006043	“Gom gajot bojong gulo no dhoron. Ar bojong gajotio gom gulo no dhoron.
42006044	Pholunor darai gajchun sinie jai. Haron manjie hada gajottun dumur gulo no shinon. Hada jaburottun anggur no shinon.
42006045	Gom manjie tar ontorot gom jinij thoiettun gom jinij nigilan. Bojong manjie tar ontorot bojong jinij thoiettun bojong jinij nigilei. Haron ontorottun jien eje, sien muendi huo jai.
42006046	“Mui jien hong sien no goro, a hittei tumi more ‘Probu, Probu,’ dago?
42006047	Je mor idu eje, the mor hoda sune ar mor hoda dhore. The henjannie manus obo mui tare degeim.
42006048	The olode ek jon ghor tullie dogkie. The gobhin gori hurinei bor silo ugure ham gareie. Pani ban oinei, ghoranore pani nale thelilo. Hintu bor silottun tullie hinottei, pani nale ghoran theli no parilo.
42006049	Je mor hodagani no sune ar no dhore, the sedogkie obo. Ek jon manjie madi ugure ham no gareie gori ghor tulilo. Pani nale ghoranore thelinei, jogon-togon uguri porilo. Soragane ghoran ekkubare ses gori dilo.”
42007001	Jisu tar beg hodagani manus-chunore hoi phureinei, the Kapernaum sohorot gelo.
42007002	Siot ek shot jon soinnior ugure senapotibuorδ ek jon banidaji elo. The tare baari hos pai. The aw-sug oinei morong-morong oie.
42007003	Senapotibuoiδ Jisur hobor suninei, the hoiek jon Judaiunor borjon Jisu sidu di padeilo. Jisu einei, ei tar banidajibuore gom gori de para thara hujoli goribartei gelak.
42007004	Thara Jisur sidu lungineioi, tare baari hujoli gorinei holak, “Tui tare sien gori dena lak.
42007005	Haron the amar jadtuo hos pai, ar the amattei ekkan synagog banei dede.”
42007006	Sebeden Jisu tharar loge gelo. Jisu ghorot lungong-lungong oineigoi, senapotibuoiδ tare hoiek jon somarsier darai hoipadeinei holo, “Probu, tui hosto no goris. Haron tui mor ghorot ebar mor lak noi.
42007007	Senottei, mui tor sidu jebar lak bili mui nijore-nije shobai mone no gorong. Hintu tui hole, mor sagorsiebuo gom obo.
42007008	Haron muio odinor tole agong. Soinnioguneio mor odinor tole agon. Mui ek jon soinniore ‘Ja!’ hole, the jai. Ar mui ei soinniobuore ‘Ai!’ hole, the eje. Mui mor banidajibuore ‘Ien gor!’ hole, the gore.”
42007009	Jisu sei hodagan suninei, tare amok thareilo. The tar pune-pune jadonde manusc-hunor mokkie phirinei holo, “Mui tomare hongor, Israel manuschunor moiddieo edogkie jodepode bischias gorie mui lagot no pang.”
42007010	Senapotibuorδ hobor buoiebuo ghorot phiri einei aw-sugkiebuo gom oie gori lagot pelakki.
42007011	Tar hellie ien olo. Jisu Nain honde sohoranot gelo. Ek jhag manus ar tar onek sisjio tar loge gelak.
42007012	Sohoranor girie duoaranot The lungiegio, sawh, ekkuo mora manus bhar gori andon. The olode tar mabuor ekkuo gori puo elo, ar tar mabuo olode rani-milie. Sohoranottun ek jhag manus tar loge elak.
42007013	Sei rani-miliebuore deginei, Probuttun sit puri udilo. The tare holo, “No hanis.”
42007014	Sebeden Jisu hai jeinei, pallieng ghoranot dhorilo, ar bhaar gori nedonde sigune mow olak. Jisu holo, “Gabursie, mui tore hongor, uth.”
42007015	Mora manuschuoi udinei bojilo, ar hoda ho dorilo. Sebeden Jisu tare tar mabuore gojei dilo.
42007016	Thara begkune dorelak. Ar thara Itchiorore baini gorinei holak, “Amattun ek jon dangor muni nigillie. Itchiore tar manuschunor idu bereilogi.”
42007017	Jisur sombonde sei hoboran goda Judea dejot, ar seropala adamanit shidie gelo.
42007018	Johonor sisjiogune Johonore begkani holakki.
42007019	Johone tar di jon sisjio daginei, Jisuttun pujor goribarlottei tharare dipadelo. The ei hodagan pujor gora bajei dilo, “Ebode sibie tui ni na, nahi, ami oinnio jonore barchedong?”
42007020	Sei di jon sisjioi Jisur sidu lungineigoi, thara Jisure holak, “Ami tortun pujor goribarlittei, Johone amare tor idu dipadeie. The pujor gora bajei dede ‘Ebode sibie tui ni na, nahi, ami oinnio jonore barchedong?’ ”
42007021	Thik sei lokkene, Jisu onek manus biedittun ar bor aw-sugottun gom gorsie, ar dujto aptagun dabei di die. Onek han manuschio gom gorsie.
42007022	Jisu tharare uttor dinei holo, “Tumi jieni degila ar sunila, jeinei sieni Johonore hogoi: Hanune degodon, lengune adton, pharangi manuschun sudduo odon, halune sunodon, ar moragun jeda odon. Ar goribpunor sidu gom hoboran prosar gora awr.
42007023	Jar mor sombonde monor shiongshama nei the hoballie!”
42007024	Sebeden Johonor hobor buoiegun janar porendi, Jisu Johonor sombonde manuschunore huo arambo gorilo, “Moruobomit tumi hi sebartei jeio? Boiere laraidie hagara sebartei jeio ni na?
42007025	Hintu tumi hi sebartei jeio? Doul habor ursie manus sebartei tumi jeio ni na? Suno, jakjomog habor urinei arame thande manuschun raj-ghorot no than.
42007026	Hintu tumi hi sebartei jeio? Muni sebartei tumi jeio ni na? Mui tomare hongor: oi, the munittun bes dangor.
42007027	Etar sombonde Pobitro Sastrot lega age: ‘Sawh, mor hoborboiebuo tor mujungedi padangor. The tor podtan hajei dibo.’
42007028	Haron, mui tomare hongor: Jedog jon miliettun jormo oion, baptisma goridie Johonottun bes huno jon dangor muni nei. Hintu Itchioro rejjiot je begottun sigon, the Johonottun bes dangor.”
42007029	Beg manuschune ar hajana-tulliegune sien suninei Itchioror hodagan thik bili haam helak. Haron sei doge-doge Johone tharare baptisma gori die.
42007030	Hintu Pharisigune ar dhormo Niom hobor pande sigune tharar nijottei bili Itchioror uddischuo-gan mani no lon. Haron thara Johonor baptismagan no manon.
42007031	Sebeden Probuie holo, “Ei jugor manuschun hiloi mui tulona gorim? Thara hedogkie?
42007032	Thara olakke ath-hola bazarot bojinei daga-dagi goronde guroguno dogkie. Thara hon: ‘Ami tomartei bashi bei dilong, hintu tumi no najila. Ami tomartei mono dugor gan gei dilong, hintu tumi no hanila.’
42007033	Haron Johone einei, the pidie ar angguro ros no hai. Ar tumi tare hoio, ‘Tare bhude peie.’
42007034	Munischioro Puobuo einei, haba-daba gorilogi. Ar tumi ho, ‘Habubuo ar mattolliebuore sawh, the olode hajana-tulliegunor, ar pabigunor bondhu.’
42007035	Hintu Itchioro gyenan tar hamanit dega jai.”
42007036	Sei lokkene ek jon Pharisie Jisure bhat hebartei bolelo.
42007037	Sawh, sei sohoranot ekkuo pabi milie elo. Jisu Pharisibuor ghorot bhat har bili hobor peinei, the ekkuo alabaster silo shijirit tumbas tel loinei elo.
42007038	The Jisur pijendi thieinei hanilogi. Tar thengani sogo paniloi bhijei dinei di, tar mada sulaniloi puji dilo. The tar thengani thajei suminei sumi, tumbas tel guli dilo.
42007039	Pharisibuoi Jisure tar ghorot boleiede sibiei, sien deginei mone-mone holo, “Ei miliebuo pabi hinottei, ei Manuschuo judi muni ole, ei miliebuo honna ar hedogkie miliei tare dhorer the hoi paribo.”
42007040	Jisu tare holo, “Simon, mortun tore ekkan hoda hobar age.” Simone holo, “Guruthagur, ho.”
42007041	Sebeden Jisu holo, “Di jon manjie ek jon tengaδ udor diere tenga ugurei pan. Ek jone pas shot denariδ aro ek jone ponjas denari ugurei pan.
42007042	Harottun tengaδ ugureibar no elak hinottei, the duo jono horojchun doye gorinei mab dilo. Ikkie tharar di jonottun honna bes tare hos pebo sei?”
42007043	Simone uttor dilo, “Mui mone gorong, jar bes horoj mab gora oie, sibiei.” Jisu tare holo, “Tui thik hoda hole.”
42007044	Sebeden the miliebuor mokkie oinei Simonore holo, “Ei miliebuore tui degor ni? Mui tor ghorot einei, mor thengani dhoidibartei tui more pani no duos. Hintu the mor thengani tar sogo paniloi bhijei dinei di, tar mada sulloi puji dilo.
42007045	Tui more no sumos. Hintu mui sommuonggidie sittun durinei, the mor thengani sumi no phuroi.
42007046	Tui more tel madat di no duos. Hintu the mor thenganit tumbas tel guli di die.
42007047	Sienittei, mui tore hongor: The more baari hos pai hinottei, tar shagor pab theleio, mui mab dilung. Hintu jare ekkan gori mab die oie, the ekkan gori mab pebo.”
42007048	Sebeden Jisu miliebuore holo, “Mui tor pabpani mab dilung.”
42007049	Tar loge boji agonde sigune holak, “Pabio mab dede Manuschuo ibie honna?”
42007050	Jisu miliebuore holo, “Tor bischiaschane tore uddhar gorilo. Shantie jagoi.”
42008001	Sei porendi, Jisu adame-adame ar sohore-sohore bereinei Itchioro rejjior gom hoboran prosar gori-gori janei dilo. Baro jon sisjio tar somare elak.
42008002	Ar tar somare milieio hoiek jon elak. Sigunottun The dujto aptagun dabei die ar tharar aw-sugkani gom gori die. Meri Magdalini tartun sattuo bhud nigili jeion. Theo tar loge elo.
42008003	Chuzar mogkuo Joana, ar Susannaio tharar loge elak. Joanar negkuo Herod rajar sompotti rageidie elo. Sei miliegune ar onek jone tharar nijor horojchoi Jisure lobiot gorsion.
42008004	Jhag-Jhag manus adam bagenettun tar idu einei thubeiondi. Sebeden Jisu ei tulona hodagan tharare hoi dilo:
42008005	“Ek jon biji shidiei tar bijigun shidibartei gelo. The biji sidi dede sittun, gulodok biji podo pazarat porilag. Manjie uri denar porendi, pheigkune hei phelliekki.
42008006	Ar gulodok biji madi padol sadara jagat porilag. Toj shuguno hinottei uthtie-uthtie sidie oi jeion.
42008007	Ar gulodok biji hada bonot porilag. Hada bonan somare ojol oinei bijigunore dagi rageilo.
42008008	Hintu gulodok biji gom madit porilag. Udinei, ojol oinei ek shot dunuo phol dorilak.” Sei hodagani the honar porendi, birat ro gori holo, “Jar sunibar han age, the sunok!”
42008009	Tar sisjiogune tartun pujor gorilak, “Ei tulona hodagano orthogan hi?”
42008010	Jisu holo, “Itchioror rejjior gubonan buji paribartei tomare gyen die oie. Hintu mui bagi manuschunore tulona dinei hongge jen. ‘Thara sebak hintu seinei buji loi partak noi. Sunde sunibak, hintu buji no paribak.’
42008011	Ien olode tulona hodagano orthogan: Bijibuo olode Itchioro hodagan.
42008012	Podo pazarat porsie bijigun bujoidie sunon sigun. Tare bischias gorineio mukti no pan para Diabolaδ einei tharar ontoranittun Itchioro hodagan nigilei nejai.
42008013	Sadara jagat porsie bijigun Itchioro hodagan suninei hujhi gori mani lon. Tharattun singor nei hinottei thara hanekkon gori bischias goron, ar lubbot poronde somoi thara phelei duon.
42008014	Hada bonot porsie bijigun bujoidie jigun sunir. Hintu thagke-thagke, ior halo sintiet dhon-sompot ar sugkanie dagi rageinei puripunnuo oi no paron.
42008015	Gom madit porsie bijigun bujoidie, jigun Itchioro hodagan ega mone ar gom mone suninei tharar ontorot dorjio dori ragan ar phola phol on.
42008016	“Huno jone seragkuo dhoreinei leiloi dagi no thon. Huno jone subi tholeio no thon. Hintu je somegi, the phor dege para serag serag-dani ugure thon.
42008017	Haron jien lugei thuo oie, sien hulomela gori dega obo. Ar jien ghubei thuo oie sien phogodang gori die obo.
42008018	Senottei, tumi hingori sunor uijkar oio. Haron jar age, tare aro bes die obo. Ar jadtun nei, tar jien age bili mone gore, sien tartun hari luo obo.”
42008019	Sei lokke Jisur mabuo ar tar bheiun tare sebartei jeion. Manjior ghij hinottei thara tar hai jei no paron.
42008020	Sebeden ek jone tare holo, “Sah, tor mabuo ar tor bheiun tor loi hoda hobartei barendi thiei agondi.”
42008021	Jisu tharare holo, “Jigune Itchioro hoda sunon ar manon thara olakke mor ma ar bheiun.”
42008022	Ar ek dine Jisu tar sisjiogun somot ekkan nawt udinei, ar tharare holo, “Billuo uhule jei.” Sebeden thara gelakkoi.
42008023	Ar thara nawdi jade, the ghum gelo. Sebeden billuot borboh bar. Tharar nawgan pani somer hinottei tar bipodot porilak.
42008024	Sisjiogune jeinei tare jageinei holak, “Guruthagur, guruthagur, ami dubir.” Ar the udinei boieranore ar tubol udette paniganore gubilo. Sebeden boieran thameilo ar billuoio olor olo.
42008025	Jisu tar sisjiogunore holo, “Tomar bischiaschan hudu?” Thara dore amok oinei thara-thara pujor goton, “Ibie henjannie Manus? Boierane ar paniganeo ugum de ar tar hoda manon.”
42008026	Ar thara Galili dejor uhuledi Gadara manjio dejot lungilakkoi.
42008027	Thara hulo ugure udineigoi, ekkan sohorottun ek jon manus Jisur idu elo. Tare bhude peie baluk bilon olo. The habor-subor no ure no pine, the ghorot no theinei sojan holat thai.
42008028	The Jisure deginei, jogar parinei tar thengot salam gori porilo. Ar the birat ro gori holo, “Jisu begottun dangor Itchioror Puobuo, tui more hi gorte sas? Mui tore shokto gori hujoli gorongor, tui more hosto no dis.”
42008029	Jisu hajorchie aptabuore Manuschuottun nigili jebartei ugum die hinottei the sien holo. Bhudtuo manuschuore onek bar nejeie. Manjie tare shigolloi adhot-thengot bani rageibar seion. Hintu shigollani the sini phelei ar bhudtuoi tare jonosunnio jagat nejai.
42008030	Jisu tartun pujor gorilo, “Tor nangan hi?” Ar the holo, “Legionδ,” haron onek bhud tar bidirie sommon.
42008031	Tharare tolanei gattuot jebartei Jisu ugum no de para the Jisure hujoli gorer.
42008032	Muonnuot dangor ek pal sugor sorton. Sugoruno bidire jebartei onumoti de para bhudtune Jisure hujoli gorilak. Ar Jisu tharare onumoti dilo.
42008033	Bhudtune manuschuottun nigili jei sugoruno bidire somilakkoi. Sugoro palluo jhok porilo ar tarengodi porinei billuot dubinei mori gelak.
42008034	Jigune sei sugorun soradon, thara sien deginei daba-daba jeinei adamanit ar hai-hure jaganit hoboran holakkoi.
42008035	Hi olo manuschune sebartei elak. Thara Jisu idu lunginei, Jisu bhudtun dabei dede manuschuore degilakki. The habor urinei Jisur thengo hure lokki gori boi agede deginei thara dorelak.
42008036	Ei godhonagan jigune degkuon, sigune sei bhude peie manuschuore Jisu hingori gom gorsier janei dilak.
42008037	Thara shanggadik doreon hinottei, beg Gadara bamo manuschune Jisu thara siottun jaigoi para hujoli gorilak. Ar the nawganot udi gelogoi.
42008038	Hintu bhud dabei dede manuschuoi tar loge jebartei tare baari hujoli gorilo. Hintu tare dipadelo.
42008039	Jisu holo, “Tor ghorot phiri ja. Itchiore tortei hodog dangor ham gori dilo hogoi.” Sebeden manuschoi jeinei Jisu tartei hodog dangor ham gori die begkani goda sohoranot prosar gorilogoi.
42008040	Jisu phirineigoi, manuschune tare asha gori barsei agon hinottei hujhi gori tar loi dega olakkoi.
42008041	Ar sawh, Jaira nange ek jon synagog lobiot gorie siot einei the nije Jisur tengot dhorinei Jisure tar ghorot jebartei hujoli gorilo.
42008042	Haron tar ekkuo gori jhi, sibie morer. The perai baro bojor boios oie Jisu jade manuschune tare theli nedon.
42008043	Sei lokke, siot ekkuo baro bojorchie lo porede phirie bola milie elo. Tar jieni age begkani daktor dorte-dorte horoj gorsie, ar huno jone tare gom gori no paron.
42008044	The Jisur pijendi jeinei Jisur haboro hazat dhorinei jogon-togon lo poranagan bondo olo.
42008045	Jisu pujor gorilo, “More honna dhorsie?” Jogon huno jone haam no haan, Pitore holo, “Probu, manuschune Tore giere theli andon, a hittei, ‘More honna dhorsie?’ hor.”
42008046	Jisu holo, “Mortun hemodagan nigili jeie hinottei mui hoi parong more je the dhorsie.”
42008047	Miliebuoi sien dhora no porsie gori thei no paribo bili hoi parinei, the dore girgirei-girgirei einei the nije mujungot bukpari salam gori porilogi. The hittei tare dhorsie ar tare dhorinei hingori jogon-togon gom olo sien the beg manuschuno mujungot Jisure ho.
42008048	Sebeden Jisu tare holo, “Jhi, sahoj gor. Tor bischiaschane tore gom gorilo. Shantie jagoi.”
42008049	Jisu sei hodagan hode, synagog lobiot goriebuo ghorottun ek jon lunginei tare holo, “Tor jhibuo morsie. Probure hosto no lages ar.”
42008050	Sei hodagan suninei Jisu Jairare holo, “No dores. Bana bischias gor, mui tare gom goreim.”
42008051	The Jaire ghorot lunginei, Pitor, Jakob, Johon ar milie-shawh buor bab-magun bade huno jon tar loge bidirie jebar no dilo.
42008052	Sei lokke thara begkune tartei buk pora oinei handon. Ar gujhi-gujhi handon ar Jisu holo, “No hannio. The no more, the ghum jar.”
42008053	Milie-shawhbuo morsiede thara hobor pan hinottei thara Jisure thatta gori azilak.
42008054	Begkunore the nigilei denar porendi, the tare adot dhorinei daginei holo, “Nagori, uth!”
42008055	Tar poranan aro phiri einei the jogon-togon udilo. Sebeden, the hebartei bhat tharare Jisu die bajei dilo.
42008056	Milie-shawhbuor bab-magune shanggadik amok olak. Hintu The hi goridie sien harore no hobartei tharare mana gorilo.
42009001	Sebeden Jisu tar baro jon sisjio ek loge daginei tharare beg bhudtuno ugure ar biedi gom gori dibar, hemoda ar odhihar dilo.
42009002	Ar Itchioror rejjiogan prosar goribartei ar aw-sugkie gom goribartei the tharare dipadelo.
42009003	Jisu tharare holo, “Porbhajottei hitchu no loio. Ludig ok, hotchal ok, pidie ok no loio. Tengaδ no loio ar dibie shilum no loio.
42009004	Ar tumi je ghoranot gorba uduogoi, sei jaganottun no jo song, siot thagkuo.
42009005	Ar je tomare lobiot no gore tumi jokke sei adamanottun nigili jade tharare tomar thengo dhullieni jhari di ejchio. Sien tharar biruddie shakki obo.”
42009006	Sebeden thara jeinei adame-adame. gelak. Jagai jagai gom hoboran prosar gorilak ar manuschio gom gorilak.
42009007	Sei lokke, seiran rejjior sason-gorie Herod Tetrakoδ Jisu gorsiede hamanir hobor begkani suninei buji borei no ejer. Hoiek jone honde Johone morattun jiei uttie.
42009008	Hoiek jone olakke Elija dega diegidie. Aro ek dagie holakke ek jon purona amolo muni jiei uttie.
42009009	Herode holo, “Mui Johonore sirie habi duong. Hintu mui hobor sunongotte sibie honna obo? Ar the Jisure sebartei dharoj gorilo.
42009010	Dipadeiede sigun phiri einei thara hi-hi gorsiondoi begkani Jisure holakki. Sebeden the tharare Bethsaida sohoro hai ekkan niribili, jonosunnio jagat nejeilo.
42009011	Manuschune hobor peinei, thara tar pije gelak. Sebeden tharare ghoji lonar porendi, the tharare Itchioro rejjiogano sombonde holo. Ar jigun gom gori dibar elak sigun The gom gori dilo.
42009012	Bel duppie-duppie, baro jon sisjioi tar sidu jeinei holakkoi, “Ien niribili jaga hinottei thara ei jagano seropala adamanit ar hedot jan para manuschunore dipada. Thara sei jaganit hebar-thebar togei pari bakkoi.”
42009013	Hintu the tharare holo, “Tumi tharare hiju hebar jinij duo.” Thara holak, “Amartun paschan pidie ar dibie maj bade ar hitchu nei. Anole, ami jeinei ei beg manuschunottei haidie jinij hini pebonggoi.”
42009014	Haron siot perai pas azar morod elak. Hintu Jisu tar sisjiogunore holo, “Ponjas jon ponjas jon gori tharare boja bajei duo.”
42009015	Ar thara beg manuschunore boja bajei dilak.
42009016	Jisu paschan pidie ar dibie maj adot loinei, agajo mokkie seinei pidiegani ar majchuno ugure asirbad girilo. Sebeden the pidiegani hotta gorinei, manuschunore bhag gori dibartei sisjiogunore dilo.
42009017	Thara begkune helak ar begkunor ped bhorilo. Hei-hai hotta-hutti ar ugursieni thara tuli lolakke boron baro lei.
42009018	Ar edogkie olo, Jisu gai-gai gori bor mager. Tar sisjioguno tar loge elak. Sebeden the tharattun pujor gorilo, “Jonogone mui honna bili hon?”
42009019	Thara uttor dilak, “Hoiek jone honde baptisma gori die Johon, ar oinnio jone honde Elija. Ar ek dagie honde ekkuo purona amolo muni jiei uttuoschie.”
42009020	Jisu holo, “Hintu tumi more honna bili ho?” Pitore uttor dinei holo, “Tui olede Itchioror Kristo.”
42009021	Thara harore no hobartei Jisu tharare shokto gori mana gorilo ar ugum dilo.
42009022	Jisu holo, “Munischioror Puobuoi onek dug-hosto pebo. Borjonnune, rajguruthagurune ar dhormo niomor mastorune tare no manibak. Tare morei pheleibak, hintu tin dino madat The aro jiei udibo.”
42009023	Sebeden Jisu thara begkunore holo, “Je mor loge judi edo sai, salen, tar nijor monjokka no gori din bagene tar kroschan buginei mor loge ejok
42009024	Haron je tar poranan bajeibartei sai, the areibo. Hintu je mortei tar poranan arai, the tar poranan rokkie goribo.
42009025	Haron ek jone goda songsaran peinei judi the nas ole bah areile, tar hi lab obo?
42009026	Haron je mortei ar mor hodaganittei lajai, jokke, Munischioro Puobuo tar nijor ar Babor oborugkandoi pobitro sorgo-dudtun somot ebo, sekke tartei lajei dibo.
42009027	Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor: Iot hoiek jon thiei agonde sigunottun Itchioror rejjiogan no degon song thara mortak noi.”
42009028	Jisu sei hodagan honar perai attio din porendi, the Pitorore, Johonore ar Jakobore tar loge nilo. Ekkuo mounot bor magibartei the udilogoi.
42009029	The bor magode, tar muo sengera bodolinei debo-rong phudilo. Tar haborani dhub oinei jhimid-jhimid joler.
42009030	Ar sawh, di jon manjie tarloi hoda hodon. Sigun olakke Mosiloi Elija.
42009031	Thara oborug gori dega duondi. Thara Jerusalemortun The songsaran sari jebode hodagan hodon.
42009032	Hintu Pitore ar tar somarsiegune ghum jadon. Thara ghumottun puro gori jaginei, Jisur oborugkan degilak ar tar somare di jon thieie gori degilak.
42009033	Sei di jon manus Jisu hai hurettun jadonde seiet, Pitore Jisure holo, “Guruthagur, ami iot thele gom obo. Tinan bajei bani tortei ekkan, Mosittei ekkan ar Elijattei ekkan.” Pitore hi hor theio hobor no pai.
42009034	Pitore sien horte seiet, ek sak meg einei tharare dagilogi. Megkane tharare dagode thara dorelak.
42009035	Megkanottun ekkuo sobdo bhar olo, “Ibie mor agojor Puobuo. Tar hoda suinnio.”
42009036	Sobdobuo thum oinei, thara bana Jisure degilak. Ar thara olor gori thelak. Sei lokke thara hi degkuon, thara harore no hon.
42009037	Tar hellie thara mounnuottun lambegoi, shagor manus Jisuloi egottor olakki.
42009038	Ar sawh, manjior jhagottun ek jone birat ro gori holo, “Guruthagur, mui tore hujoli gorongor, the bana ekkuo gori mor puo hinottei tare ekka sei de.
42009039	Sah, tare bhude pai ar abada gori the hijiek hari ude. Tare borat gori pelai, honggorong oi ar muendi phena nigilai. Tare gha goridinei mone no hoie gorinei nigili jai.
42009040	Mui tor sisjiogunore bhudtuo dabei dibartei baari hujoli gorsiong. Hintu thara no paron.”
42009041	Jisu holo, “Oh ei jugor bischias no gorsie hu-pode jode manuschun! Mui tomar loge hodog bilom theim? Hodog bilom mui tomare soijjio gorim? Tor puobuore idu ano.”
42009042	Gurobuo ette seiet, bhudtuoi tare borat ori phelei honggorong goreie. Jisu hajorchie aptabuore gobinei begkune sokko-bokko olak. Jisu gorsiede haman begkune amok thareilak. Sebeden Jisu tar sisjiogunore holo.
42009043	Itchioro mohimagan deginei, gurobuore gom gori dinei di tar babo idu gojei dilo.
42009044	Ei hodagani mondi suno: Haron Munischioro Puobuore manjior adot gojei dibar somoi oi ejchie.”
42009045	Hintu The hi holo thara no bujilak. Thara no bujon para, the ghubei thoie. Ar tharaio dore pujor no gorilak.
42009046	Honna begottun dangor obo, ei hoda ganottei tharar moiddie torga-torgi arambo olo.
42009047	Hintu Jisu, tharar mono hodani buji parinei, ekkuo sigon guro aninei tar dagedi thie bajei dilo.
42009048	Sebeden the tharare holo, “Je ei sigon gurobuore mor nange lobiot gore, the more lobiot gore para obo. Ar je more lobiot gore, more dipadeiebuoreo the lobiot gore para obo. haron je tomar moiddie begottun niroit, the begottun dangor obo.”
42009049	Ar Johone holo, “Guruthagur, tor nange bhud dabei dette ami ek jon manus degkiei. The amar moiddie tor pijedi jeie manus noi hinottei, ami tare mana gorsei.”
42009050	Jisu holo, “Tare mana no gorsio. Haron je amar biruddie noi, the amar pokke.”
42009051	Jisure sorgot tulibarloi somoibuo hai ejchie. Sei udischuo gori Jerusalemot jebartei the sindi mokkie mu olo.
42009052	Tar akke akke the hoborbuo padeilo. Tartei thebar jaga togei dibartei, sei manuschune ekkan Samari manjior adamot somelakkoi.
42009053	Jisu Jerusalemot jar hinottei, adammiegune tare lobiot no gorilak.
42009054	Tar sisjio Jakobpoi Johone sien deginei, thara holak, “Probu, ami agun dagilie tui hi mone goros?”
42009055	Hintu The phirinei tharare gobinei holo, “Tumi henjannie aptar manus tumi hobor no po.
42009056	Munischioro Puobuo manjior poran nas gori dibartei no eje. Hintu rokkie gori dibartei ejchie.” Sebeden thara aro ekkan adamot gelak.
42009057	Thara podedi adi jade, ek jone Jisure holo, “Probu, tui jidu jas mui tor pune-pune eim.”
42009058	Sebeden Jisu tare holo, “Sialunottun haath age ar agajot uronde pheigkunottun bha age. Hintu Munischioro Puobuottun tar siriebuo thobaro jaga nei.”
42009059	Ar Jisu aro ek jonore holo, “Mor pune-pune ai.” Hintu the holo, “Probu, babare garebartei more akke jebartei onumoti de.”
42009060	Hintu Jisu tare holo, “Moragune tharar nijor moragun garadok. Hintu tui ja ar akke Itchioro rejjiogan prosar gorloi.”
42009061	Sebeden aro ek jone holo, “Probu, mui tor loge eim. Hintu mui akke jeinei mor ghorbuogunottun bidei magi ejonggoi.”
42009062	Jisu tare holo, “Je alsuode langolanot dhorinei pijendi sei thai, the Itchioro rejjiottei lak noi.”
42010001	Sei porendi, Probu aro oinnio huttur jon beitulilo. The jebode sohoranit ar jaganit tartun akke-akke tharare di jon di jon gori dipadelo.
42010002	The tharare holo, “Ghomun diebar jodepode shagor age, hintu ham gorie hom. Senottei, ghomun dieie hedot dipadebartei gomor Girojchuore shokto gori hujoli gori.
42010003	Sawh, jharbuo huguro sere bera-shagolo shawh dogkie gori mui tomare padangor.
42010004	Tengaδ hollie ok hotchal ok no loio. Jodaio no loio. Ar podot harore salam no gorsio.
42010005	Je ghoranot tumi uduogoi, akke hoio ‘Ei ghoranot shanti ok.’
42010006	Judi shanti hos peie manus thele, tomar shantigan tar ugure thok. Anole, shantigan tomar idu phiri ebo.
42010007	Ekkan ghorot thagkuo. Thara hebar-debar jien duon sien heio. Haron ham goriebuoi tar bedonun pana lak. Ghore-ghore no bereio.
42010008	Tumi je sohoranot somogoi, thara tomare lobiot goribak. Thara tomare jien hebartei duon sien heio.
42010009	Aw-sugkie thele, tharare gom gori duo. Ar tumi tharare hoio: Itchioro rejjiogan tomar hai ejchie.
42010010	Ar tumi je sohoranot somogoi, thara tomare lobiot no gorilie, pode-pode jeinei ien hoiogoi:
42010011	Tomar sohorano dhullieni amar thengopadar baschie, Sieni ami tomar biruddie jhari dir. Tobuio tumi hobar peio, Itchioro rejjiogan tomar hai ejchie.
42010012	Hintu mui tomare hongor, Bijiero Dinnuot sei sohorano manuschunor sastiganottun borong Sodomor sastigan sorjio gora jebo.
42010013	Oh Korazin, tor hobal puribo! Oh Bethsaida, tor hobal puribo! Haron tomar siot amok ham gora jeiede sieni judi Tyre ar Sidon sohoranit gora jedo, thara bojinei bosta urinei ar shei gulinei honatto tharar monani phireion bili degelakkun.
42010014	Hintu bijierot tumi sasti pebade darane Tyre ar Sidonor sastigan sorjio gora jebo
42010015	Ar oh Kapernaum, tui sormanloi sorgo song uttuoschie sibie, Padalot tore phelei die obo.
42010016	Je tomar hoda sune, the mor hodaio sune. Je tomare the moreio no manibo. Ar je more no manibo, the more dipadeiebuoreo no manibo.”
42010017	Sebeden hottur jon manus hujhi gori phiri einei holakki, “Probu, tor nange bhudtuneo amar Odino tole than.”
42010018	Jisu tharare holo, “Deba jhimileni dogkie gori Soitannuo sorgottun portegi mui degkuong.
42010019	Sawh, sabo ar di-darchie pugo ugure hus di paro para, ar huno hitchuie tomare hoti gori parto noi.
42010020	Hintu Bhudtun tomar odinot tole thande hinottei hujhi no oio. Hintu tomar nangani sorgot lega age hinottei hujhi oio.”
42010021	Sei lokke Jisu Apta darai hujhi oinei holo, “Oh Ba, sorgo ar pittimir Probu, tui ei hodagani gyeni ar buddhi-bola manuschunottun lugei thoios, hintu sigon guro sannie manuschuno idu ieni phogodang gorilie hinottei mui Tore donniobad duongor. Oi Ba, haron sien tor gom lage.
42010022	Baba begkani mor adot gojei die. Babe bade Puobuore huno jone hobor no pan. Puobuo bade ar Babpuoi janei dede sigun bade huno jone Babore hobor no pan.”
42010023	Sebeden Jisu tar sisjioguno mokkie phirinei juj-juj gori holo, “Tumi jieni degor sieni degodonde sogkun baari hoballie.
42010024	Mui tomare hongor, bhaluk jon munie ar rajai tumi degotte sieni sebartei dhap gorineio, thara sei no pan. Ar tumi sunotte sieni sunibartei dhap gorineio, thara suni no pan.”
42010025	Ar sawh, ek jon Dhormo Niom janiei Jisure joga sebartei thieinei holo, “Guruthagur, ononto jibon pebartei mor hi gora poribo?”
42010026	Jisu tare holo, “Niomanot hi legkie? Siot tui hi madeios?”
42010027	Sebeden Dhormo Niom janiebuoi uttor dilo, “ ‘Tor PROBU Itchiorbuore tor goda ontorandoi, tor goda aptabuoloi, tor goda bolandoi ar goda tor monandoi, tui hos pei pebe,’ ar ‘Tore tui hos paschie dogkie tor paralliegunoreio tui hos peis.’ ”
42010028	Jisu tare holo, “Tui thik gori uttor dile, tui sien gorloi tui bajibe.”
42010029	Hintu the nijore-nije ni-duji bili dagebartei tartun mone hor hinottei, the holo, “Honna mor parallie?”
42010030	Jisu tare uttor dilo, “Ek jon manus Jerusalemortun Jerikkot jade, dagedo adot porilo. Dagettune tar habor-suborani phuei loinei tare thajei marinei, adha-mora gori phelei gelak.
42010031	Sebeden edogkie olo, ekkuo dhormo guru sei podtanodi jar. Dhormo gurubuoi tare deginei podtan pazara phari gelogoi.
42010032	Ar sedogkie gori ek jon Levi manus siot lungilogi. The tare deginei, theo podtan pazara phari gelogoi.
42010033	Hintu ek jon Samari manus porbhajot jade, tare lagot pelogi. The tare deginei sit purilo.
42010034	The tar sidu gelo. Tar ghobanit tel ar angguro ros dali dinei, bani dilo. The tare tar nijor gadhabuo pidit tulinei ekkan porbhajchie ghorot ninei, tare jotton gori thoiegoi.
42010035	Tar hellie the siottun jadegoi, the dibie denariδ nigileinei porbhajchie ghoro girojchuore dinedi holo, ‘Tare jotton goris. Tui aro jigun horoj goros, mui phirte sigun dimbi.’
42010036	Sei tin jonottun honna dagedo adot porsie manuschuor parallie bili tui mone goros?”
42010037	Dhormo Niom janiebuoi holo, “Tare doye gorsiede sibie.” Jisu tare holo, “Tuio jeinei sedogkie gorloi.”
42010038	Sebeden thara jade-jade ekkan adamot somilakki. Martha nange ekkuo milie Jisure tar ghorot lobiot gorilo.
42010039	Meri nange sei miliebuor ekkuo bon elo. Meri Jisure thango hure bojinei tar hoda suni age.
42010040	Hintu Martha hebar jugol gorte no tangorer. The Jisur sidu jeinei hologoi, “Probu, mor bonnuoi beg hamani more theli aberei dede tui mone no goror? Senottei, more bol dibartei tare hona?”
42010041	Jisu tare uttor dilo, “Martha, Martha, tui balukkani sintie gorinei jagulug oi thas.
42010042	Bana ekkan jinij dorkar. Meri sei gom jinijchan bei loie. Mui sien tartun hari no lom.”
42011001	Jisu ekkan jagat bormagode edogkie olo. The bor magi phureinei, tar ek jon sisjioi tare holo, “Probu, hingori bormage Johone tar sisjiogunore sigei dede dogkie gori amareo sigei dena.”
42011002	Jisu tharare holo, “Edogkie gori tumi bor magkio: Amar sorgo Bab, tor nangan pobitro ok. Tor rejjiogan ejok. Tor ischie sorgot jedogkie goron, ei pittimitio sedogkie gortok.
42011003	Amare nitto hebar haiddio oi para dis.
42011004	Amar ugure duji goronde sigun mab di die dogkie, tuio amar pabpani mab goris. Ar amare hu-podedi no nis hintu bojongguottun amare rokkie goris.”
42011005	Jisu tharare holo, “Dorilo, tomar ek jonottun ekkuo bondhu age. Ar reid songbhagot the tar bondhubuo sidu jeinei hoiegoi, ‘Bondhu, more tinan pidie udor dena.
42011006	Haron more ekkuo bondhu porbhaj gorte ikkie the mor idu ejchie. The hebartei mortun hitchu nei.’
42011007	Sebeden manuschuoi ghoro bidiriettun holo, ‘More thoischie no goris. Duoran nada oie ar mor puo-shabagun mor loge bischonot ghum jadon. Mui bischonottun udinei tore hitchu di pattung noi.’
42011008	Mui tomare hongor, the tar bondhu bili udinei tare hitchu no dileo, the laj thiek gori hujoli gorer hinottei tar jedogkani lage sedogkani dibo.
42011009	Mui tomare hongor: Mago, tomare die obo. Togo, tumi peba ar baschuo, tomare huli die obo.
42011010	Haron je mage the pai. Je togai the suph pai ar je baschiei tare huli die oi.
42011011	Tomar moiddie ek jon babottun tar ekkuo puoi judi pidie mage, the hi tare sil dibo? The judi maj mage, majo azai the hi tare sap dibo?
42011012	Ar the judi boda mage, the hi tare di-darchie puk dibo ni na?
42011013	Tumi gom noi oineio tomar puogunore gom-gom jinij di jano, senottei tomar sorgo Babe jigune magon sigunore sittun bes Pobitro Apta a hittei no dibo?”
42011014	Jisu ekkuo no mattie bhud dabei der. Bhudto nigili jeinei, manuschuoi hoda holo senottei manuschune amok olak.
42011015	Hintu hoiek jone holak, “Bhudo raja Belzebular darai the bhud dabei de.”
42011016	Ar ek dagie tare joga sebartei agajottun ekkan sinno tartun magilak.
42011017	Hintu Jisu tharar mono bhabonagani hobor peinei tharare holo, “Jei rejjiogan odosat di bhag oinei nijere-nije biruddie solilie, sei rejjiogan dongso obo. Ar jei ghorbobuo di bhag oinei nijere nije biruddie solilie, sei ghorbobuo bhangi jebo.
42011018	Ar Soitannuo judi the nijere-nije bhag oinei biruddie sole, hingori tar rejjiogan tigi thebo? Belzebula darai mui bhudtunore dabei duong tumi hola hinottei mui ei hodagan holung.
42011019	Ar mui judi Belzebula darai bhudtunore dabei duong, tomar puogune har darai bhud dabei duon? Senottei thara tomar bijierok obak.
42011020	Hintu mui judi Itchioro angulluo darai bhudtunore dabei duong, salen Itchioro rejjiogan hamakkai tomar hai ejchie.
42011021	Ek jon boli manjio aittier saji theinei, the tar nijor ghoran subi thele, tar pojabiriegani rokkie obo.
42011022	Hintu tartun bes boli ek jon ei, tare akkromon gorinei tare jidinei, the nirbhor gorede aittierani hari lole, the luddi loie jinijchani bhag goribuo.
42011023	Je mor loge noi, the mor biruddie age. Ar je mor loge no thuboi the settera gore.
42011024	Jokke hajorchie aptabuoi manjiortun nigili jai. Sokkene the jireibartei shuguno jaga hotta di jeinei jireibar jaga togeinei no pelo. Sebeden the holo, ‘Mui phelei ejchiongge ghoranot phiri jang.’
42011025	Bhudtuo einei, ghoran suri phellie ar sajeie gori degilogi.
42011026	Sebeden the jeinei tartun bes bojong oinnio sattuo bhud tar loge anilogoi. Ar thara sominei siot bojotti gorilakki. Sei manuschuor polim dojaganottun jero dojagan bes horab olo.”
42011027	Jisu sei hadagani hode, manjior jhagottun ekkuo miliei birat ro gori tare holo, “Jei miliebuoi tore phudeie ar bugo-dut habeie, the hoballie.”
42011028	Hintu Jisu holo, “Noi, noi, je manuschune Itchioro hoda sunon ar manon, thara hoballie.”
42011029	Jhag-jhag manus Jisur seropala thubeinei, the huo arambo gorilo, “Ei jugo manuschun olakke bojong. Thara sinno sebartei mone hoi. Muni Jonar sinnogan bade tharare huno sinno dega odo noi ar.
42011030	Ninevi sohoro manuschunottei Jona elode sinnogan. Thik sedogkie gori, Munischioro Puobuoio ei jugo manuschunottei sinno obo.
42011031	Bijiero dinnout, Dokkino Ranibuoi ei jugo manuschuno loge udinei tharare dujot doribogi. Haron, Solomon rajar gyeno hoda sunibartei pittimir thumortun the ejchie. Ar sawh, Solomon rajartun bes dangor iot ek jon age.
42011032	Bijiero dinnuot Ninevi sohoro manuschune ei jugo manuschuno loge udinei, tharare dujot doribakki. Haron, Jona prosar gorinei, thara monani phireion. Ar sawh, Jonattun bes dangor iot ek jon age.
42011033	“Huno jon serag dhorenei lugei no thon ar soro dagi no thon. Hintu je somegi the phor dege para, serag-danit the thoi.
42011034	Sog olakke heyeganottei seragor dogkie. senottei, tor sogkun gom ole, tor goda heyegan phor obo. Hintu tor sogkun horab ole, tor heyegan goda andhar obo.
42011035	Senottei tor bidirie agede phoran andhar no oi para seis.
42011036	Sebeden judi tor goda heyegan phor ole, ekkenaio andhar no ole, tor heyet serag jolette dogkie gori tor goda heyegan phor olode sie.”
42011037	Jisu hoda hoi phureinei ek jon Pharisie tar loge bhat hebartei tare bolelo. Senottei, Jisu bidirie jeinei hebartei bologoi.
42011038	Hebar akkendi Jisu bureinei ad no dhoi bili Pharisibuoi thareinei, the amok olo.
42011039	Sebeden Probuie tare holo, “Tumi Pharisigune goloj ar bajon-hodora barendi sap goro. Hintu bidirendi oghur lubbo ar bojonggoi boron oi ago.
42011040	Tumi murukkogun Jei Itchiorbuoi manjior barendi ien baneie, the manjior bidirendi ieno no banai ni na.
42011041	Tumi gorib dugkiere bidiriettun dan gorillie, ar sawh begkani tomar sudduo obo.
42011042	Oh Pharisigun, tomar hobal purok! Haron tumi dos bhagor ek bhag toloji, sabarang ar beg sak pat dan goro. Hintu niai ar Itchioro hospanagan tumi puri phellio. Oinnio hamani no gorsie gori phelei no jeinei ieni tomar, gorana osit.
42011043	Oh Pharisigun, tomar hobal purok! Haron synagogot begottun moillioban bojibar jaga ar ade-bazare manjie tomare salam goridak tomartun mone hoi.
42011044	Oh phagara dhormo niomor mastorun ar Pharisigun, tomar hobal puribo! Haron tumi olade no degkie sidiesalo dogkien, ar manjie hobor no peinei uri-uri beran.”
42011045	Sebeden ek jon dhormoniom janiei tare holo, “Guruthagur, sei hodaganiloi tui daw amareo itjiot marotte.”
42011046	Jisu tare holo, “Oh dhormo niom janiegun, tomar hobal purok! Haron tumi manjiore no jinede gour bugi bugei duo. Ar tum ole, nije ekkuo angulloio bugibuo no dhoro.
42011047	Tomar hobal puribo! Haron tumi munigunottei sidiesal bano, jigunore tomar purbo-puruschune morei pheleion.
42011048	Senottei tomar purbo-puruschune gorsionde hamani tumi mannio bili tumi shakki duor. Haron thara morei phellion ar tumi sigunor sidiesalani bano.
42011049	Sienittei, Itchiore tar gyenodi hoie, ‘Mui thara sidu munigunore dipadeiegun padeim. Thara hoiek jon tharattun morei pheleibak ar ek dagire uttiesar goribak’.
42011050	Senottei, songsar sristi gora oiede siottun duri jei munigunor logani phellion, sigunor daetto ei jugo manuschune bugi pebak.
42011051	Oi, mui tomare hongor, Abelor lo phelei denattun duri Zekariar lo phelei dena song, jare pallienganor mondiro sere morei pela oie. Sienir beg daettogani ei jugo manuschune bugi pebak.
42011052	Oh dhormo niom janiegun, tomar hobal purok! Haron gyeno chabigan tumi loio. Tumi nijeio no somo ar somadonde sigunoreo tumi giri rageio.”
42011053	Jisu sei hodagani honar porendi, dhormo niomo mastorun ar Pharisigun tarloi rak gori torga-torgi gora arambo gorilak. Nanakkan hoda sombonde the tharare uttor de para, tare huo bajei dibartei sesta gorilak.
42011054	Tar hodat tare dujot phelebartei thara subi thelak.
42012001	Sei lokke, guni no parsie ektal manus thubeion hinottei thara-thara uro-uischie gorton. Bego akke Jisu tar sisjiogunore ho dorilo, “Pharisiguno molitun tumi nije uijkare thagkuo. Sien olode phagara.
42012002	Haron phogodang gora no obo jinij hitchu nei jieni dagi raga oie, ar hobor no peie jinij hitchu nei, jieni ghubei thuo oie.
42012003	Senottei, andharot tumi jieni hoio, sieni phorot sunibak. Gudhi bidirie tumi jieni hanot phuju-phuju gori hoio, sieni salo ugurottun jogar pari-pari hoi die obo.
42012004	Bondhulok, mui tomare hongor: ‘Je heyegan morei phelei di pare ar sei bara hitchu gori no pare ar, tare no doreo.
42012005	Hintu tumi hare doreba mui tomare degei duong: Morei pelanar porendi, norogo agunot phelei di paribar jar hemoda age tare doreo. oi, mui tomare hongor, tare doreo.
42012006	Paschuo soroi dibie poijieloiδ bejonde noi ni? Tobuio Itchiore ekkuo soroio puri no pelai.
42012007	Hintu tomar mada sulanio beg gona oie. Senottei, no doreo. Tumi ektal soroiottun bes moillio.
42012008	Mui tomare hongor, “Manjior mujungot je nahi haam hebo, Munischioro Puobuoio Itchioro sorgo-dudtuno mujungot tare haam hebo.
42012009	Hintu manjior mujungot je more bharai, Munischioro Puobuoio Itchioro sorgo-dudtuno mujungot tare bharebo.
42012010	Ar je Munischioro Pobuo biruddie hoda hoi, sien tare mab die obo, Hintu je Pobitro Apta biruddie hoda hoi, tare mab die odo noi.
42012011	Manjie tomare synagogo manuschuno mujungot, sason-gorieguno mujungot nejeile, hingori hobagoi ar hi hobagoi sienir sombonde sidie no gorsio.
42012012	Haron, sei lokke tumi hi hobagoi sien Pobitro Aptai sigei dibo.”
42012013	Manjior jhagottun ek jone Jisure holo, “Guruthagur, babo sompotti morloi bhag gorto mor bheibuore hoi de.”
42012014	Hintu Jisu tare holo, “Bhai honna more bijier goridie ok bah bhag goridie baneie?”
42012015	Sebeden Jisu tharare holo, “Tumi lubbo no aw para nijere nije uij rageio. Haron, manjior jibonan bana aisai dhon-sompottir jurono noi.”
42012016	Sebeden Jisu ei tulona hodagan tharare hoi dilo. The holo, “Ek jon dhoni manjior bhuiot baari unnoti olo.
42012017	The bhabi seinei holo, ‘Mui hi gorim? Mor ghomun thobar daw jaga nei ar.’
42012018	Sebeden the holo, ‘Mui ien gorong. Mor gom ghorani bhanginei birat birat gori tulong. Sienit beg mor ghomun ar mor gom jinijchani bhorei thom.
42012019	Sebeden mui mor porananore hom, “Oh poran, tui shagor gom jinij aisai gori joma gori thoios. Sieni baluk bojor paribie. Aram gor, haba-daba gor, ar hujhie thak.” ’
42012020	Hintu Itchiore tare holo, ‘Tui behup, edchie reidot tor poranan nigili gele, tui tortei joma gori rageioschie jinijchani har obo sei?’
42012021	Je Itchioro pokke dhoni noi ar nijottei dhon-sompotti joma gore, the sei manuschuo dogkie obo.”
42012022	Sebeden Jisu tar sisjiogunore holo, “Senottei, mui tomare hongor: Tomar poranani baji thebartei hebar sidie no gorsio. Tomar heyeganittei, hi uriba piniba sidie no gorsio.
42012023	Poranan haiddiottun bes dorkar ar heyegan habor-suborottun bes dorkar.
42012024	Hobaguno sombonde bhabi sawh dei. Thara noio hujuon ar noio habon. Tharattun dhan-sorong bah gola ghorio nei. Tobuio Itchiore tharare habai. Tumi pheigkunottun onek bes moillio daw.
42012025	Hintu tomartun honna sidie gorinei tar heyegan ek ad lamba gori pare?
42012026	Tumi judi sei shadaron jinijchan gori no paro, a hittei oinnio jinijchani sombonde sidie goror?
42012027	“Phulun hingori dangor on bhabi sawh. Thara hamo no goron ar shuduoio no hadon. Hintu Solomonore oborug gori sajileo esannie ekkuo phulo dogkie doul odo noi.
42012028	Madot edchie jei herani age ar hellie suluot phelei die obode sienire judi Itchiore sedogkie gori sajele, Oh hom bischias-bolagun Sittun bes tomare the no sajebo ni na?
42012029	Sebeden haana-dana sombonde tumi no thogeio ar ienor belai monot shiongshama no gorsio.
42012030	Haron songsaro beg jado manuschune ieni togan. Hintu tomar Babe ieni tomar dorkar lagede the hobor pai.
42012031	Hintu Itchioror rejjiogan togo, ar sieni the begkani tomare dibo.
42012032	“Oh sigon bera-shagolo dolluo, tui no dores. Haron Babe tomare rejjiogan dibartei bhar oie.
42012033	Tomar dhon-sompottigani bejinei gorib dugkiere dan gorogoi. Puron no oidie tengaδ hollie jugolo. Sure sur gori no paran ar puge hei no paron hinottei huno din hoi no jaidie jaganot sorgot tomar dhonani joma goro.
42012034	Haron tomar dhonani jiot thai tomar monanio siot thebo.
42012035	“Guz dinedi jugol oinei thago ar serag dhoreinei jaleinei thoio.
42012036	Gaburune tharar girojchun melattun phiribarlottei barsei thande dogkie oio. Thara ele, duorani baschiebakgo jogon-togon tare huli dibag.
42012037	Girojchuo ele jei dajigun sojage the lagot pebogi sigun hoballie. Mui tomare soittio gori hongor, the nije habor ureidie tharare hebartei bojeinei the einei tharare lobiot goribogi.
42012038	The reid songbhagot ok bah poittie amollie ok the einei jigunore sojage lagot pebogi sigun hoballie.
42012039	Hintu tumi ien hobor po daw. Ghoro girojchuoi judi surbuo ebode somoibuo hobor pedo, the subi theinei tar ghoran huno din sur obar no dilun.
42012040	Senottei, tumio jugol gori thei peba. Haron aza no gorode lokkene Munischioro Puobuoi ejer”
42012041	Sebeden Pitore Jisure holo, “Probu, ei tulona hodagan tui bana amare hole, nahi begkunore hole?”
42012042	Probue holo, “Honna sale bischiasi ar gyeni sompotti rakullibuo sei? Tar girojchuoi tare tar ghoro daetto dibo. The oinnio sagorsiegunore okto mojim tharar hebar bhagkun bhag gori dibo.
42012043	Girojchuo ele tar dajibuor sedogkie gorte degilegi, sei dajibuo hoballie obo.
42012044	Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor: The tar jieni age sieni ugure odhiharibuo tare banebo.
42012045	Hintu sei dajibuoi judi mone-mone hoi, ‘Mor girojchuo harai edo noi,’ ar the milie ar morod sagorsiegunore mara arambo gore ar mod bhang heinei mattol oi thele,
42012046	sei dajibuor girojchuo the asha no gorede dinnuot ele, ar the aw-sedono oktot lungilegi, tar girojchuoi tare di hotta goribogi. Ar the tare Aw-bischiasiguno somare jaga thik gori dibo.
42012047	“Jei dajibuio tar girojchuo tare hi gora bajei dibo hobor pai, hintu the nije jugol no oinei ar girojchuor ischie doge, tare thajei mara obo.
42012048	Hintu je hobor no peie gori sasti peie gori sasti pebar ham gore, tar sastigan hom gora obo. Jare bes die oie, tartun bes dabi gora obo. Jar idu bes gori gojei die oie tartun bes gori maga obo.
42012049	“Songsarot mui agun bajei dibartei ejchiong. Ien honatto agun bajei die odo gom olun. Dori pari arambo odo mor mon phureilun,
42012050	Mui ek bar baptisma lom. Ar sien jabot shir no jai, tabot mor shanggadik heye gor age.
42012051	Songsarot mui shanti gori dibartei ejchiong bili tumi mone goro ni na? Mui tomare hongor, “Shobai noi. Hintu munischioror moiddie parok goribartei mui ejchiongge.
42012052	Haron ikkiettun duri ekkuo ghorbuot pas jon manus bhag gorim. Tin jone di jono biruddie obak. Ar di jone tin jono biruddie obak.
42012053	Babpuoi tar puobuor biruddie parok obo, ar puobuoi tar babpuor biruddie, obo. Mabuoi tar jhibuor biruddie obo, ar jhibuoi tar mabuor biruddie obo. Shuribuoi tar bobuor biruddie obo, ar bobuoi tar shuribuor biruddie obo.”
42012054	Sebeden Jisu manuschuno-reio holo; “Pojimendi meg sak uttie degilie jogon-togon tumi ho, ‘Jhor ejer. Ar sien oi’.
42012055	Ar dokkinottun boier bele tumi ho, ‘Edchie dinnuo gorom obo.’ Ar sien oi.
42012056	Phagaragun! Debabuoi ar pittimigan gom obo na no obo tumi hobor po, a hittei ei jugo hobor no po?
42012057	“Thik oi ni noi a hittei tumi nije bijier gori no sawh?
42012058	Tomar sottrubuoloi agimo sidu jade, adapodot, tarloi tomar jagulugkani shireio. A no ole the tore agimuor adot gojei dibogoi. Ar agimuoi tore polischuor adot gojei dibogoi. Sebeden polischuoi tore jiel-hanat bhorei thobogoi.
42012059	Mui tore hongor: Ekkuo poijieδ bagi theleio tui siottun nigili pede noi.”
42013001	Sebeden sei lokke, siot elakke manjiortun hoiek jone Galili hullier sombonde Jisure hobor holak. Thara dali dede, seiet Pilade tharar lo mejei die.
42013002	Jisu manuschunore holo, “Thara sedogkie gori bibodot porsion hinottei sei Galili hulliegunore oinnio Galili hulliettun bes pabi bili tumi mone goro nahi?
42013003	Mui tomare hongor, Shobai noi, hintu tumi judi tomar monani no phiro, tumio sedogkie gori begkun nas oba.
42013004	Siloamo ojol ghorane jhabeinei adaro jon morsion. Sei manuschun Jerusalemot thande oinnio beg manuschuno darane bes bojong bili tumi mone goro ni na?
42013005	Mui tomare hongor: Shabai noi. Hintu tumi judi tomar monani no phiro, tumio sedogkie gori begkun nas oba.”
42013006	Sebeden Jisu tharare ei tulona hodagan hoi dilo: “Ek jonor ekkuo dumur gaj tar anggur bagananot lageie elo. The gajchuot gulo sa einei ekkuoio no pelogi.
42013007	Senottei, the anggur bagan subi theiebuore holo, ‘Sadei, tin bojor song mui ei dumur gajchuot einei gulo togei selunggi, ekkuoio no pelung. A hittei madigan juri thedo? Goschei de.’
42013008	Hintu the uttor dilo, ‘Babu, ei bojorbuoio thokna. Mui gajchuor seropala hurinei gobor di dimbi.
42013009	Ibiet judi gulo dori paron daw. Gom obo hintu judi no dhoron, habinei goschei dischi.’ ”
42013010	Jireni Dinnuot Jisu ekkan synagogot sigkie der.
42013011	Ar sawh, siot ekkuo milie elo. Tare bhude peinei bhudtuoi adaro bojor song durbol gori thoie. The gujong oie ar shobai uju oi no pare.
42013012	Jisu tare deginei dagi tare holo, “Miliebuo, mui tore ei durbolanottun shorei di dilung.”
42013013	Ar the tar adtani miliebuor ugure tuli dieo, miliebuo uju oinei Itchiorore baini gorilo.
42013014	Jireni Dinnuot Jisu gom gori die hinottei, synagog sason-goriebuoi rak olo. The manuschunore holo, “Ham goribartei manjior shoi din age daw. Senottei tumi gom obartei sei dinunot ejchio. Jireni Dinnuot no ejchio.”
42013015	Sebeden Probuie tare holo, “Phagaragun! Jireni Dinnuot tumi tomar goru ok gadha ok oruottun iri dinei pani habebartei nejo.
42013016	Sawh, ei miliebuo Abrahamor bongso, tare adaro bojor song Soitane bani thoie. Mui tare Jireni Dinnuot ei banan huli dibar osit oi ni noi?”
42013017	Jisu ei hodagan hoinei, jigune tar biruddie elak sigune begkune lajeilak. Ar beg manuschune the jei oborug hamani gorer sienit hujhi olak.
42013018	Jisu holo, “Itchioro rejjiogan henjannie obo? ien mui hiloi tulona gorim?
42013019	Ien olode ekkuo sorjio biji dogkie. Ek jone sorjio bijibuo, loinei tar bagananot sidi dilogoi. Ibie udinei birat jhubur olo. Ar agajo pheigkune dhelagunot bha gorilakki.”
42013020	Jisu aro holo, “Mui hiloi Itchioro rejjiogan tulona gorim?
42013021	Ien olode moli dogkie. Ekkuo miliei sei molibuo loinei tin lei moidie loi gulinei guli begkan joribartei thoi para.”
42013022	Sohore-sohore ar adame-adame Jisu jeinei manuschunore sigkie di-di Jerusalemor mokkie jar.
42013023	Ek jone tartun pujor gorilo, “Probu, bana hoiek jone mukti pebak ni na?”
42013024	Jisu tharare holo, “Sibie-sippie girie duoranodi somibar sesta goro. Hintu mui tomare hongor, “Shagor manjie somibar sebak, hintu somi no paribak.
42013025	Ghoro girojchuo udinei duoran nadile, tumi somi parta noi. Barendi tumi thieinei duoran baschei-baschei ho doriba, ‘Probu, Probu, amare duoran huli de.’ The tomare hobo, ‘Tumi huttun ejchio mui hobor no pang.’
42013026	Sebeden tumi hoba, ‘Ami torloi eksomare heiei ar tui amar udonanit pode-pode sigkie duos daw.’
42013027	Hintu The hobo, ‘Tumi huttun ejchio mui hobor no pang. Tumi be-dhormo ham goriegun mortun jogoi.’
42013028	Itchioro rejjioganot tumi Abrahamore, Isaakore, Jakobore ar beg munigun degiba. Itchiore tomare bhar gori dibo hinottei tumi dad hamere-hamere hanibak.
42013029	Tare pugottun, pojimortun, uttorottun ar dokkinottun einei Itchioro rejjioganot bojibakki.
42013030	Ar sawh, jero manuschun akkuol obakkoi ar akkuol manuschun jer poribak.”
42013031	Sei dinnie, hoiek jon Pharisie tar sidu jeinei holak, “Herode tore morei pheleibartei togar hinottei ei jaganottun jagoi.”
42013032	Sebeden Jisu tharare holo, “Jeinei sei sialluore hogoi, ‘Sun, edchie-hellie mui bhud dabei duongor ar manus gom gorongor. Ar tin dine mui mor haman phureim.’
42013033	Jei odosat, edchie-hellie, porsuio mor ja puribo. Haron muni Jerusalemo barendi morana osit noi.
42013034	“Oh Jerusalem, Oh Jerusalem, munigun morei pheleiebuo, ar Itchiore tor idu dipadai die sigunore sil mela dinei morei pheleiebuo! Shorma huruoi shawhgun duot tole ragaidie dogkie gori aza gorinei rageibartei mui tor puogun onsur hodog rageibar seiong. Hintu sien tomar mone no hoi.
42013035	Sawh, tomar ghorani tomartei hali oi gelo. Ar mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor, jedogkon song no ho, ‘PROBUR nange ejchiede sibie baini oinei thok,’ sedogkon song tumi more no degiba.”
42014001	Ek Jireni Dinnuot edogkie olo, ek jon Pharisiguno murubbi ghorot Jisu pidie hebartei jeinei, Pharisigune tare sog di agon.
42014002	Ar sawh, tar mujungot ek jon phullie pirie manus elo.
42014003	Jisu dhormo Niom janiegunore ar Pharisigunore holo, “Jireni Dinnuot aw-sugkie gom gori dibar Niomane hoi ni no hoi?”
42014004	Hintu thara no madi thelak. Ar the manuschuore dhorinei dhori gom gori dinei dipadelo.
42014005	Jisu tharare holo, “Tomar gadha ok bah goru ok gadot porilegoi, Jireni Dinot jogon-togon tani no tulibagoi?”
42014006	Ar thara sienir sombonde Jisure uttor di no parilak.
42014007	Hebartei boleie manuschune begottun gom bojibar jagani bei lode Jisu thareinei, the tharare ekkan tulona hoda hoi dilo.
42014008	The holo, “Manjie tore mela-meitbanot bolele, sorman hei paidie jaganit no bojis. The tortun bes sormanio manus bolei pare.
42014009	Sebeden tore boleiede manuschuoi sei boleie manuschuo loi einei tore hobogi, ‘Tor bojibar jagagan etare de.’ Ar tui lajei-lajei sorman hom hei paidie jagano mokkie bojibartei jei pebe.
42014010	Hintu thara tore bolele, jeinei sorman hom hei paidie jagat bojischoi. Sebeden tore boleiede sibiei ele, tore hobogi, ‘Bondhu, gom jagat bojsi na.’ Sokkene tor gorba somarsiegune mujungot tui sorman hei pebe.
42014011	Haron je nije-nije dangor holai, the sigon oi pebo. Ar je nije-nije sigon holai, the dangor obo.”
42014012	Ar Jisu tar boleiebuore holo, “Bennie ok bellie ok bhat hebartei bolele, tor bondhu ok tor bhei ok tor sodorsiegun ok tor thagoie paralliegunore no dagis. A no ole sien tore suje para obo bili tharaio tore bolebak.
42014013	Hintu tui meitban gorilie, goribpun, rukkiegun, lengun ar hanun boleis.
42014014	Thara tore ugurei no paribak hinottei, tui hoballie sie. Haron dharmig manuschun jiei udibagke lokkene tore sujo obo.”
42014015	Jisur loge boi agonde sigunottun ek jone sei hodagani suninei the Jisure holo, “Itchioro rejjiot haidio hebogoidie sibie hoballie.”
42014016	Hintu Jisu tare holo, “Ek jone ekkan meitban gorinei the shagor manus boleie.
42014017	Bellie hebar hadallie, the boleiede siguno sidu tar dajigun dipadelo. The jeinei hologoi, ‘Ikkunu beg jugol oie, ejo.’
42014018	Thara begkune ek song gori dilak. Polim manuschuoi tare holo, ‘Mui ekkan hed hinong. Sien mui jeinei sa puribogoi. Mui tortun mab sang.’
42014019	Aro ek jone holo, ‘Mui pas jora sela-goru hinong. Sigun joga sebartei jangor. Mui tortun, mab sang.’
42014020	Aro ek jone holo, ‘Mui mog ekkuo loiong. Senottei mui ei no parim.’
42014021	Sei dajibuoi einei tar girojchuore sei hodagani janeilogi. Sebeden ghoro girojchuoi rak olo. The tar dajibuoi holo, ‘Sohoro bor podtanit ar sigon podtanit seret-seret jeinei goribpun, rukkiegun, adurun ar hanun idu andoi.’
42014022	Sagorsiebuoi holo, ‘Babu, tui ugum duoschie sien mui gorsiong. Tobuio ejosong hali jaga age.’
42014023	Girojchuoi dajibuoi holo, ‘Hulo raj-podtanit ar sigon podtanit jeinei mor ghoran bhore para tharare bolajure andoi.’
