42014024	Haron mui tomare hongor, ‘Mui boleiongge sigunottun ek joneo mor bellie haanabuo sagi sei pedak noi.’ ”
42014025	Sei lokke jhag-jhag manus Jisur loge jadon. The tharar mokkie phirinei holo,
42014026	“Je mor idu einei tar bab-ma, mog-puo, bhei-bon ar tar nijor porananio hos no peie gori thei no pare, the mor sisjio oi parto noi.
42014027	Ar je tar kroschan buginei mor loge ei no pare, the mor sisjio oi parto noi.
42014028	“Tomartun ek jone judi ekkan ojol ghor tulibar sai, the akke bojinei hodog horoj lagibo ar tar tengagundoiδ sara gori paribo ni no paribo ijeb gori sebo.
42014029	The judi ijeb gori no sai, ham goranar porendi judi tar ojol ghoran sara gori no pare, je dege the bege tare azibak.
42014030	Thara hobak, ‘Ek Manuschuoi ghoran tulona arambo gorsie, hintu sara gori no parilo.’
42014031	“Bah, judi ekkuo rajai oinnio aro ekkuo rajar biruddie judduo goribartei jai, sale, the akke boinei sintie gori pebo. Huri azar soinnio loi tar biruddie judduo goribartei ejer, dos azar soinnio loi the tare judduot dori paribo ni no paribo thik gori pebode noi ni?
42014032	The judi tare judduot dori no pare, the dud ekkuo padei pebo. Ar rajabuo judduo goribartei hai no ette, tarloi milie-mili obar hoda hoi pebo.
42014033	Senottei, tomar hi-hi age begkani thiek no gorilie mor sisjio oi parta noi.
42014034	“Nun olode gom. Hintu nunan judi nunsuo no ole, salen hingori aro nunsuo gori para jebo?
42014035	Madiganotteio gunor odo noi. Phas banebarteio gunor odo noi. Sien phelei die obo. Jar sunibartei han age the sunok!”
42015001	Sebeden Jisur hodagani sunibartei beg hajana-tulliegune ar pabigune tar hai jadon.
42015002	Pharisigune ar dhormo niomo mastorune abitti gora arambo gorilak. Thara holak budbudeinei, “Ei Manuschuoi pabigundoi song pore, ar haba-daba gore.”
42015003	Sebeden Jisu ei tulona hodagan tharare hoi dilo:
42015004	“Dorilo, tomartun ek jonor ek shottuo bera-shagol agon. The ekkuo bera-shagol areile, nirienobboibuo bera-shagol the niribili jagat phelei jeinei, ajhi jeiede sibie no pai song the no togeibogoi ni na?
42015005	The suph phelegoi, hujhi gori the hanat tulibo.
42015006	The ghorot lungiliegi, the tar bondhu-bandob ar paralliegun daginei tharare hobo, ‘Mor ajhi jeie bera-shagolluo peiong hinottei mor loge hujhi uo bol duo.’
42015007	Mui tomare hongor: Thik sedogkie gori ek jon pabi manjie tar monan phireile sorgot hujhi obak. Nirienobboi jon dharmig manjior monani phireibak dorkar no lagede sienottei noi. Hintu ek jon pabi manjie tar monan phireibode senottei hujhi obak.
42015008	“Bah, mone goro: Ekkuo milier doschuo rubuo poijieδ agon. The ekkuo areile, serag dorenei, the sibie no pai song ghoran suri-suri gome-dalei no togeibuo ni na?
42015009	The suph phele, tar bondhu-bandoppun ar paralliegun ek somare daginei tharare hobo, ‘Mui areiongge rubuo poijiebuoδ peiong hinottei mor loge hujhi uo bol duo.’
42015010	Mui tomare hongor: Thik sedogkie gori ek jon pabi manjie mon phirele Itchioro sorgo-dudtune mon phireiede pabi manuschuor ugure hujhi obak.”
42015011	Jisu holo, “Ek jonottun dibie puo elak.
42015012	Sigon puobuoi tar babore holo, ‘Ba, sompotti mui peimbe bhagkuo more de.’ senottei, tar babe puogunore begkani tharare bhag gori dilo.
42015013	Ar hoiek din porendi, sigon puobuoi tar jieni age begkani thubeilo. Ekkan duro dejot the gelogoi. Tare huno jone badha die nei hinottei. The sidu tar dhon-sompottigani andaje horoj gorinei ses gorsiegoi.
42015014	The begkani ses goranar porendi, goda dejchanot oghur bhadorad porilo. The shanggadik obhabot pora dorilo.
42015015	Sebeden the ek jon sei dejchano manjio sidu gabur udilogoi. Sugorunore adar dibartei manuschuoi tar hedot tare dipadelo.
42015016	Huno jone tare hitchu hebar jinij no duon. Sugorune hadonde adaran tartun hebar mone hor.
42015017	Hintu tar idie-it oinei, the holo, ‘Baba din boleie gabur loiede manuschunor alajhala hebar age. Ar mui iot ped porai morongor.
42015018	Mui udinei mor baba sidu jeim. Mui tare homboi, “Oh ba, mui sorgot agede sibier ar tor biruddie pab gorsiong.
42015019	Mui tor puo hobar lak noi ar. More tor ekkuo gaburo dogkie bana.” ’
42015020	Ar the udinei tar babo sidu gelo. Hintu the onek durot thagke tar babe tare deginei sit puri udilo. Ar the daba-daba jeinei aza gori dhorinei sumilo.
42015021	Tar puobuoi tare holo, ‘Ba, mui tor biruddie ar sorgot agede sibier biruddie pab gorsiong. Mui ar tor puo bili dagibar joggio noi.’
42015022	Hintu babpuoi tar dajigunore holo, ‘Begottun gom haboran aninei tare urei duogi. Ar tare adot ar thengot joda pinei duogi.
42015023	Pokta goru-shawhbuo aninei habogi. Anondo utchobe hei.
42015024	Haron ei mor puobuo morsie, hintu the aro jiei uttie. Ami tare areiei, hintu ami aro tare suph pelong.’ Ar thara anondo utchob gora arambo gorilak.
42015025	Hintu tar dangor puobuo hedot elo. Sebeden ette ghoro hai lungegi ghorot ette, baiddio jontro ro ar najodonde sunilo.
42015026	The ek jon ghoro sagorsie daginei pujor gorilo, ‘Ei somosto hi awr?’
42015027	The tare holo, ‘Tor guro-bheibuo ghorot ejchie. Tor babe tor bheibuo suge santie phiri elo hinottei pokta goru shawh buo haba bajei die.’
42015028	Hintu dangor puobuoi rak olo. Ar the ghorot jebar no sar. Sebeden tar babe einei ghoro bidirie jebartei tare hujoli gorilogi.
42015029	Hintu the tar babore holo, ‘Sun, edok bojor song mui tor sagorsie hadilung. Tor hoda mui ekbario aw-mannio no gorong. Hintu mui mor song somarsiegundoi anondo utchob goribartei, tui daw more ekbario ekkuo shagol shawh no duos.
42015030	Hintu tor ei puobuo, beischie miliettei tor beg dhon-sompottigani ses gori dede sibie einei, pokta goru- shawhbuo tartei habi duoschie oi?’
42015031	Tar babe tare holo, ‘Put, tui daw mor loge onsur agos. Mor beg dhon-sompottigani tor daw.
42015032	Hintu anondo utchob gorana osit. Haron tor bheibuo morinei aro jiei uttie, ami tare areiei, hintu aro suph pelong.’ ”
42016001	Jisu tar sisjiogunoreo holo, “Ek jon dhoni manjiortun ekkuo dhon-sompotti rakkoli elo. Tar dhon-sompotti rakkolibuoi tar sompottigani ses gori der gori manjie tare janeilakki.
42016002	The tar dhon-sompotti rakkolibuore daginei tare holo, ‘Tor sombonde mui hendogkie-hendogkie sunongor. Tui mor dhon-sompotti rakkoli thei no paribie ar hinottei mor dhon-sompottiganir ijeb de.’
42016003	Sebeden dhon-sompotti rakkolibuoi mone-mone holo, ‘Mor girojchuoi more tar dhon-sompotti rakkoli no rageibo ar hinottei mui hi gorim? Madi habibar mor bol nei, bikkie magibaro lajang.
42016004	Dhon-sompotti rakkolittun more phelei dile manjie thara ghorot more ragan para mui hi gorim hobor pelung.’
42016005	Tar girojchuottun jigune udor heion sigunore the jon bagene dagilo. Polim manuschuore the holo, ‘Mor girojchuore tui hodog di pas?’
42016006	Manuschuoi holo, ‘Ek shot toonδ tel.’ Dhon-sompotti rakkolibuoi holo, ‘Tui udor lo ar bojinei seret-seret Ponjas toon leg.’
42016007	Sebeden dhon-sompotti rakkolibuoi aro ek jonore holo, ‘Tui hodog di pas?’ Manuschuoi holo, ‘Ek shot barengδ gom.’ The tare holo, ‘Tor udoro hagoschan aninei azi bareng legki.’
42016008	The salagi ham gorsie hinottei, girojchuoi aw-dharmig dhon-sompotti rakkolibuore baini gorilo. Haron ei songsaro manuschun, thara ei jugor phoro manuschunottun bes buddhi-bola.
42016009	“Mui tomare hongor: Aw-dharmigo dhonloi tumi bondhu juro. Senottei jokkene tumi juri no paro, thara tomare siro jibonio ghorot gorba tulibak.
42016010	Je sigon bepare bischias-joggio, the dangor bepareo bischias-joggio. Je sigon bepare aw-dharmig gore, the shagor bepareo aw-dharmig gorsio.
42016011	Tumi judi songsaro dhonnoi bischias neie oi thele, soittio dhonani tomare honna bischias gorinei raga bajei dibo?
42016012	Ar oinnio manjior jinijchoi judi tumi bischias neie oi thele, honna tomare tomar nijor nijeschani dibo?
42016013	Ek jone di jon girojor ham gori no pare. Haron ek jonore the hinsie goribuo ar ek jonore the hos pebo bah, the ek jonore agudinei ar ek jonore the bis degibo. Tumi Itchioror ar dhon-sompotti daji oi parta noi.”
42016014	Tengaδ pherettie Pharisiguneo sei beg hodagani suninei Jisure pheiz gorilak.
42016015	Jisu tharare holo, “Tumi olade manjior mujungot dharmig holeiegun. Hintu Itchiore tomar ontorani hobor pai. Haron manjie jien baari moillio mone goron, Itchioro samne sien gin gore pa.
42016016	“Johono agendi, manjie Mosir Nioman ar muniguno hodagani prosar gorsion. Sokkettun duri Itchioro rejjioganor gom hoboran prosar gori duon ar begkune somibartei sadon.
42016017	Sorgo ar pittimigan boij jei pare, tobuio Niomanottun ekkuo puduoio boij jedo noi.
42016018	“Je tar mogkuo sari dinei oinnio milie loi, the shanda gore. Ar je neg sarsie milie loi, theo shanda gore.
42016019	“Ek jon dhoni manus elo. The halisuri rongor ar dol habor urinei din bagene suge monggole thai.
42016020	Ek jon Lazar nange bikari manus elo. Tare dhoni Manuschuo ghoro duoranot thondi. Tar goda heyeganot gobha elo.
42016021	Dhoni manuschuor tebilottun jhuri porsie bhattun tar hebar mon. Ar huguruneo einei tar gobhagani liei duondi.
42016022	Sebeden sei bikari Manuschuo morinei sorgo-dudtune Abrahamor buguot nejeilak. Ar sei dhoni Manuschuoio morinei tare garelakkoi.
42016023	Padalot hosto bhug gori agede siot the uguredi rini seinei, durot gori Abrahamore degilo. The Lazareio Abrahamo horot degilo.
42016024	The jogar parinei dagilo, ‘Oh ba Abraham, more doye gor. Mui ei agunonot shanggadik hosto pangor hinottei, Lazar tar angulo madagan juro panit bureinei mor jilan thanda gori dibartei tare dipada.’
42016025	Hintu Abrahame holo, ‘Put, tui baji thagke gom-gom jinij peioschie sieni monot tul. Ar sedogkie gori, Lazar bojong jinijchani peie. Ikkunu the santona par ar tui hosto por.
42016026	Ar sieni baraio, ittun tomar sidu ar honuo jone ujon-lamon gori no paribartei, di sere ekkan birat madipada, age. Senottei, Jara amar iot, toma idu jebar jei partak noi ar jara tomar iottun amar idu ebar ei par tak noi, di sere ekkan birat shokto pharok age.’
42016027	Ar the holo, ‘Ba, tore hujoli gorongor doye gorinei tare mor babo ghorot dipade.
42016028	Haron mor paschuo bhei agon. Tharaio ei hosto paidie jaganot no ejon para, the jeinei tharare uij duokkoi.’
42016029	Abrahame tare holo, ‘Mosi ar munigune legkonde boiun tharar agon daw. Thara sei hodagani sundok.’
42016030	Hintu the holo, ‘Oh ba Abraham! Noi, noi. Mora manjiortun judi thara sidu ek jon gele, tharar monani phireibak.’
42016031	Sebeden Abrahame tare holo, ‘Thara judi Mosir ar muniguno hodagani no sunon, salen ek jon morattun udinei thara sidu geleio thara mandak noi.’ ”
42017001	Sebeden Jisu tar sisjiogunore holo, “Manjiore pabot pelaidie jinij ebo. Hintu je sieni ebartei gore tar hobal purok.
42017002	Ei sigonunottun ek jonore judi huno jone nejai, sale tar gortonabuot ekkuo dangor sil bani dinei tare sagorot phelei dile tartei gom obo.
42017003	Uijkare thago! Judi tor bheie tor biruddie pab gore, tare aw-hoda hos. Ar the judi imie heinei mon phirei tare mab dis.
42017004	The judi tor biruddie dine sat bar pab gorinei ar tor idu dine sat bar phiri einei haam hai ar judi the hoi, ‘Mui mon phireiong,’ tare mab dis.”
42017005	Tar pore diphadeigun holak, “Amar bischiaschan barei de.”
42017006	Hintu Probuie holo, “Tomar judi ekkuo sorjio biji para bischias theinei ei opol gajchuore ho, ‘Uguri jeinei sagorot porloi.’ The tomar hoda manibo.
42017007	“Dorilo, tomartun ek jonor ekkuo daji alsuorloi bah bera-shagol soralloi. The hedottun elegoi honna thare hobo sei, ‘Jhadi-jhadi einei bojsi ar bhat ha’?
42017008	Hintu sien the tare no hobogi na, ‘More hebar bhat, bari de. Tui jugoleinei thak, ar mui haade more barsei thak . Mui hei udilegoi the tui heis’?
42017009	Dajibuore ugum gora jeiede doge gorsie hinottei, the tare donniobad dibo parapang? mui mone no gorong.”
42017010	Tumio thik sedogkie, mui tomare ugum gorsiongge sieni tumi begkani gorilie, tumi hoio, ‘Ami aw-gunor daji. Ami daw bana amar daettogan gorilongge.’ ”
42017011	Sei lokke Jisu Jerusalemor mokkie jade, Samaria ar Galili dejo phurinei jar.
42017012	The ekkan adamot sominei, dos jon pharangi manus lagot pelo. Thara durot thiei agon.
42017013	Thara birat ro gori holak, “Guruthagur Jisu, amare doye gor”
42017014	Sebeden Jisu tharare deginei holo, “Jo, dhormothagurunore degogoi. Ar thara jade-jade, tharar pharangigani sudduo olo.”
42017015	Tharattun ek jone Jisu tare gom gori dilo bili deginei, the phiri elo. Birat ro gori Itchiorore baini gorilo.
42017016	Madi hittendi sog phirienei Jisur thengot porinei the Jisure donniobad dilo. The elode samaria manus.
42017017	Jisu holo, “Dos jon mui sudduo gorsiongge noi ni? Hintu aro naw jon hudu?
42017018	Ei be-jadibuo bade ar huno jone Itchiorore baini goribartei phirchuon ni?”
42017019	Sebeden Jisu tare holo, “Udinei jagoi. Tor bischiaschane tore gom gorilo.”
42017020	Itchioro rejjiogan hokke ebo Pharisigune Jisuttun pujor gorilak. Jisu uttor dilo, “Itchioro rejjiogan dega jai para gori no eje.
42017021	Thara hodak noi ‘Sawh, iot age,’ bah, ‘Sawh ubuot age’ Suno, haron Itchioro rejjiogan tor bidirie age.”
42017022	Sebeden Jisu tar sisjiogunore holo, “Somoibuo ebo, sokke tumi Munischioror Puobuor ekkuo din sebar tomar shanggadik mone hobo. Hintu tumi sei dinnuo degi no peba.
42017023	Thara tomare hobak, ‘Iot sawhgi!’ Bah ‘Udu sawhgoi!’ Thara loge no jeio pune-pune no jeio.
42017024	Haron deba jhimilenei agaschan ek dagottun duri aro ek dag song phor goraidie dogkie, Munischioro Puobuor amolot sedogkie obo.
42017025	Hintu akke mui baari hosto peim. Ar ei jugo manuschune more aw-pela goribak.
42017026	“Noa amolot jedogkie oie, Munischioro Puobuor amoloto thik sedogkie obo.
42017027	Noa jahajchanot uttiegoidie dinnuo song heion-theion, ar bo diedi goridak. Sebeden paniban oinei begkun ses oion.
42017028	“Lotor amoloto thik sedogkie elo. Thara heion-theion, beja-hine gorsion, lageion ar ghor tullion.
42017029	Hintu Lote jei dinnuot Sodom sohoranottun nigili gelo, agajottun agun ar gondrogo jhor porinei begkun nosto oion.
42017030	“Munischioro Puobuo dega dibogidie dinnie thik sedogkie obo.
42017031	Sei dinnie je salo ugure thai, the laminei ghoro bidiriettun tar pojabiriegani no anokkoi. Ar thik sedogkie gori je tar hedot thai, tar pojabiriegani anibalottei the ghorot phiri no jok.
42017032	Lotor mogkuore monot rageio.
42017033	Je tar poranan rokkie goribartei sai, the areibo. Ar je tar poranan arai, the rageibo.
42017034	Mui tomare hongor, sei reidtuot, di jon ekkan bischonot thele, ek jonore tuli neja obo ar ek jonore phelei ja obo.
42017035	Dibie miliei eksomare bara bande, ek jonore tuli neja obo ar ek jonore phelei ja obo.
42017036	Sei lokkene hedot di jone ham gorte, ek jonore tuli neja obo, ar ek jonore phelei ja obo.”
42017037	Sebeden thara holak, “Probu, sieni hudu obo?” Jisu tharare holo, “Jiot morabuo age, siot dhoba silun eksomare thubeibak.”
42018001	Asha no areie gori onsur bor magibartei, Jisu tharare ekkan tulona hoda hoi dilo.
42018002	The holo, “Ekkan sohorot ek jon bijier gori die elo. The Itchiorore no dhorai ar manuscho hie no gore:
42018003	Ar sei sohoranot ekkuo rani-milie elo. The nitto bijier goridiebuo sidu jai ar hoi, ‘Mor biruddibuoloi gorongotte bijieran sirei dena thik mode bijier goride.’
42018004	Bhaluk bilom song bijier goridiebuoi sien gori dibar no sai. Hintu porendi the bhabi selo, ‘Mui Itchiorore no dhorang ar manuschio hie no gorong.
42018005	Hintu ei rani-miliebuoi more thoschie lagai hinottei, tar bijieran thik mode gori dim. Mui judi sien gori no duong, the no ageie gori ebo, ar more agei dibogi.’ ”
42018006	Sebeden Probuie holo, “Be-dhormi bijier goridiebuoi hi hoi suno.
42018007	Itchiore bei tullie manuschune tare reide-dine dagilie the thik mode oinniei bijier gori dibo noi ni? The tharare obohela goribuo ni na?
42018008	Mui tomare hongor, the jhadi gori thik bijier gori dibo. Hintu Munischioro Puobuo ele, songsarot bischiaschan pebogi ni?”
42018009	Jigune nijere-nije dharmig bili bischias goron ar manjiore hitchu mone no goron sigunoreo Jisu ei tulona hodagan hoi dilo.
42018010	The holo, “Di jon manus bor magibartei Mondirbuot gelak. Ek jon olode Pharisi ar ek jon olode hajana-tullie.
42018011	Pharisibuoi thieinei the bormagode holo, ‘Oh Itchior, mui oinnio manjio dogkie bolajuri, oinniei gorie, shanda gorie ar ei hajana-tulliebuor dogkie noi hinottei mui tore donniobad dongor.
42018012	Saptai di bar ubos thang, ar mui ham hangge sittun dos bhagor ek bhag duong.’
42018013	Hintu hajana-tulliebuoi durot gori thiei age. The agajo mokkieo rini sebar sahoj no pelo. The tar bugkuo bugkei-bugkei holo, ‘Oh Itchior, mui pabi, more doye gor.’
42018014	Mui tomare hongor: Itchiore ei hajana-tulliebuoi ghorot jade dharmig bili mone gorilo, hintu Pharisibuore noi. Haron je nijere-nije dangor mone gore, tare sigon bana obo. Ar je nijere-nije sigon holai, tare dangor bana obo.”
42018015	Ar manuschune tharar sigon gurogunoreio tar idu annion jene Jisu tharare dhorinei asirbad gore. Hintu sisjiogune deginei tharare aw-hoda holak.
42018016	Hintu Jisu tharare daginei holo, “Sigon gurogunore mor idu ebartei duo, tharare mana no gorsio. Haron Itchioror rejjiogan olode ei sigon guroguno dogkien.
42018017	Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor: Je esannie ekkuo sigon guroi Itchioro rejjiogan gojhi loidie dogkie gori gojhi no loi, the sidu somi parto noi.”
42018018	Ek jon dhoni sason-gorie pujor gorilo, “Gom guruthagur, ononto jibon pebartei mor hi gora poribo?”
42018019	Sebeden Jisu tare holo, “Tui a hittei more gom hole? Itchior bade ar ek jono gom nei.
42018020	Tui shilegun hobor pas daw, ‘Shanda no goris,’ ‘Hun no goris,’ ‘Sur no goris,’ ‘Mijie shakki no dis,’ ‘Tor bab magunore sorman goris.’ ”
42018021	Manuschuoi holo, “Gaburottun duri sei beg ugumani mui palei ejongor.”
42018022	Jisu sien suninei, tare holo, “Ejosong tor ekkan jinij bagi age. Tor hi-hi age sieni begkani bejinei tengagunδ gorib dugkiere bhag gori degoi. Sorgot tor dhon thebo. Sebeden einei mor pije-pije eis.”
42018023	Hintu manuschuoi sei hodagani suninei baari monot dug olo. Haron the baari dhoni.
42018024	The baari monot dug oiede Jisu deginei holo, “Jigunor dhon-sompotti age sigunor Itchioror rejjioganot somade hodog aghattie!
42018025	Haron ek jon dhoni manus Itchioror rejjioganot somana darane ekkuo uth sujor pajidi sominei nigili janagan bes utchuo.”
42018026	Sebeden suinnionde sigune holak, “Salen, honna mukti oi paribo?”
42018027	Hintu Jisu holo, “Manjiortei jieni aw-sombob, sieni Itchiorottei sombob.”
42018028	Sebeden Pitore holo, “Sah, ami beg phelei einei tor loge elong.”
42018029	Jisu tharare holo, “Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor: Itchioror rejjioganottei hoiek jone ghor-duor, bab-ma, bhei-bon, mog-puo phelei ejchion.
42018030	Ei jugkuot thara sittun onek dunuo pebak. Ar ebode jugkuot thara ononto jibon pebak.”
42018031	Jisu tar baro jon sisjio ek huredi ninei tharare holo, “Suno, ami Jerusalem song jeir. Munigune Munischioro Puobuor sombonde legkuonde sieni begkani puron obo.
42018032	Haron thara more Be-jadtunor adot gojei dibag. Thara more azibak, thatta goribak ar more sep phelei dibag.
42018033	Thara more sabuk maranar porendi morei pheleibak. Ar tin dine mui aro jiei udim.”
42018034	Sisjiogune sei hodagani ekkano no bujilak. Sei hodagani tharattun ghubei thuo oie hinottei tharare the hi holo hobor no pelak.
42018035	Sebeden Jisu Jerikko sohoro hai lunginei ek jon han manus podo pazarat bojinei bikkie magode degilo.
42018036	Jhag-jhag manus jade, hi awr the pujor gorilo.
42018037	Thara tare holak, Nazareth hullie Jisu jar.
42018038	Sebeden birat ro gori the holo, “Jisu, Davidor Puobuo, more doye gor.”
42018039	Akke-akke jadonde manuschune the sub gori thebartei tare gubilak. Hintu the sie bes birat-birat ro gori holo, “Davidor Puobuo, more doye gor.”
42018040	Sebeden Jisu mow oinei manuschuo tar idu anibartei ugum gorilo. Manuschuo tar hai lunginei, Jisu tartun pujor gorilo,
42018041	“Mui tore hi gori didung tortun mone hoi?” Sebeden the holo, “Probu, mui degidung sang.”
42018042	Jisu tare holo, “Tui degis. Tor bischiaschane tore gom gorilo.”
42018043	Jogon-togon manuschuoi sogedi degilo. Ar the Itchiorore baini gorinei Jisur pune-pune ja dorilo. Begkune sien deginei tharaio Itchiorore baini gorilak.
42019001	Jisu Jerikko sohorot sominei phuri jar.
42019002	Ar sawh, siot ek jon Zakaia nange hajana-tulliegunor murubbi elo. The olode dhoni manus.
42019003	Jisu honna sebartei tar mone hor. The bakkon hinottei manuschuno andole Jisure no degilo.
42019004	Senottei Jisu jadte mokkie the daba-daba jeinei the Jisure dege para ekkuo jogona gajot udilogoi.
42019005	Ar Jisu sei jaganot lungineigoi, the ujonnie selo ar tare deginei tare holo, “Zakaia, Jhadi lambi. Haron tor ghorot edchie mui gorba udi peimbi.”
42019006	Zakaia hijie-hijchie gori laminei, the Jisuloi hujhi gori egottor ologi.
42019007	Hintu sien deginei thara begkune budbudeinei holak, “Pabi manuschuo ghorot the gorba udilogoi.”
42019008	Zakaia thieinei Probure holo, “Sunis Probu, gorib-dugkiere mor dhon-sompottigani song bhag dim. Ar mui judi harottun mijie-mijie gori loi thang, ser dunuo gori phirei dim.”
42019009	Jisu Zakaiare holo, “Eteo Abrahamor bongso hinottei, edchie ei ghoranot muktigan elo.
42019010	Haron, Munischioro Puobuo ajhi jeie manuschun togeibartei ar tharare uddhar goribartei ejchie.”
42019011	Thara sei hodagan suni agonde lokke, Jisu aro ekkan tulona hoda hoi dilo. Haron Jisu Jerusalemo hai lungiegi hinottei thara mone gortonde Itchioro rejjiogan jogon-togon dega dibar oiegi.
42019012	Senottei, Jisu holo, “Ek jon bhoddro manjie tartei ekkan rejjior raja obartei ar phiribarlottei ekkan duro dejot gelo.
42019013	The tar dos jon daji daginei, tharare jon bagene ek mina ek minaδ dinedi tharare holo, ‘Mui phironggoi song igundoi bebar gorogoi.’
42019014	Hintu tar dejchano manuschune tare hos no pan. Tar pune-pune ek dol hobor buo dipadelak. Thara holak, ‘Ei manuschuo amar ugure raja odo ami no sei.’
42019015	Manuschuoi rejjiogan gojhi lonar porendi the phirilogoi. Sebeden sei dajigun jigunore the tengaδ die, bebar gorinei hodogkuo hameilak sebartei ugum dinei tar idu daga bajei dilo.
42019016	Polim manuschuo tar idu einei hologi, ‘Probu, tor minabuoiδ dos mina hameie.’
42019017	The tare holo, ‘Gom oie. Tui gom daji. Tui hom jinijot bischias-joggio ole hinottei, doschan sohoro ugure odhihar pebe.’
42019018	Tar porendi ejchiede manuschuoi einei tare hologi, ‘Probu, tor minabuoiδ pas mina hameie.’
42019019	The tare sedogkie aro sibiereo holo, ‘Tui paschan sohor sason goris.’
42019020	Aro ek jon tar idu einei hologi, ‘Probu, sah eie tor minabuoδ. Rumol haniloi mui moja gori thoiong.
42019021	Haron tui huttieri manus hinottei, mui tore doreong. Tui jien no thos, sien tuli los ar jien no sidos sien habi los.’
42019022	The tare holo, ‘Tui daji. Tor hodaloi mui tore dhorim. Tui hobor pas mui huttieri, jien no thong sien tuli long, jien no sidong sien dieng.
42019023	Senottei, tui mor tengagunδ bankot joma dibar osit elode noi ni? Sebeden mui phirinei shuttun somot pelungundi.’
42019024	Sei hai thiei agonde sigunore bhoddro manuschuoi holo, ‘Tartun minabuoδ loinei doschuo mina agede sibiere duo.’
42019025	Sebeden thara tare holak, ‘Probu, tartun daw dos minaδ age.’
42019026	Haron mui tomare hongor: Jadtun age, tare aro die obo, hintu jadtun nei, tar agede sieno tartun hari luo obo.
42019027	Hintu more raja no manonde sei mor sottrugun idu ano. Mor mujungot tharare morei pelogi.’ ”
42019028	Jisu sei hodagan hoi phuronar porendi, akke-akke the Jerusalem song ja dorilo.
42019029	Sebeden Oliv Mounnuo hai Bethphage ar Bethani adamanit lunginei, the di jon sisjio dipadelo.
42019030	The tharare holo, “Tomar mujungedi adamanot jo. Tumi adamanot somibagoio ekkuo gadha shawh bannie gori debagoi. Huno jone sibier pidit no soron. Sibie hueinei anogoi.
42019031	Huno jone judi tomare hon, ‘Gadha shawhbuo hittei hulor?’ Tharare hoio, ‘Probur ibie lager.’ ”
42019032	Di jon hoborbuo gelakkoi. Jisu tharare hoiede doge-doge thara begkani degilakkoi.
42019033	Thara gadha shawhbuo phuode, girojchune holak, “Gadha shawhbuo a hittei hulor?”
42019034	Thara holak, “Probur ibie lager.”
42019035	Gadha shawhbuo thara Jisur idu anilak. Gadha shawhbuor pidit habor bijei dinedi Jisure tulilak.
42019036	Jisu jade manuschune tharar haborani podot bijei dedon.
42019037	Ar sokke Jisu Oliv Mounnuottun lambegi hai einei beg sisjiogune utchuo olak. Beg amok hamani thara degkuon hinottei thara joi-jogar pari-pari Itchiorore baini gorton.
42019038	Thara hodon, “ ‘PROBUR nange ejette Rajabuo donniobad gori thok!’ Sorgot shanti ok ar Itchioror baini ok!”
42019039	Sebeden manjior jhagottun hoiek jon Pharisie Jisure holak, “Guruthagur, tor sisjiogunore aw-hoda hona.”
42019040	Jisu tharare holo, “Mui tomare hongor: Ei manuschune juro gori thele, jogon-togon sillune madi udibag.”
42019041	Hai lunginei, the sohoran sien dharai deginei hanilo.
42019042	The holo, “Shantittei hi jinij lagibo edchie tui judi hobor pede! Hintu ikkunu sien tomar sogottun lugei thuo oie.
42019043	Haron dinun etton, sokke tor sottrugune tor seropala madiloi dewal banebak ar tomare seropala giri rageibak. Tore sero hittendi giribakki.
42019044	Sebeden thara tore tor puo-shabagun somot madit phelei dibagki. Thara soga-sokkie sillun ekkuoio thoi didak noi. Haron Itchiore tor idu hokke ejchie tui hobor no pas.”
42019045	Sebeden Jisu Mondirbuot gelo. Siot beja-hine gortonde sigunore dabeidie dhorsiegoi.
42019046	The tharare holo, “Sastrot lega age, ‘Mor ghoran bor magede ghor huo obo.’ Hintu tumi ienore ‘dagedor haath’ banei phellio.”
42019047	Din bagene Mondirbuot The sigkie dilo. Hintu rajguruthagurune, dhormo niomo mastorune ar manuschunor murubbigune tare morei pheleibar sadon.
42019048	Hintu beg manuschune hup mon di tar hodagani suni than hinottei, thara tare hitchu gori no parilak.
42020001	Sei lokke ek dine edogkie olo, Mondirbuot manuschunore Jisu sigkie der ar gom hoboran prosar gorer. Sebeden rajguru-thagurune ar dhormo niomo mastorune borjonnun somot tar idu elak.
42020002	Thara Jisure holakki, “Tui amare ho ieni hi odhihare goror? Bah honna tore ei odhiharan die?”
42020003	Jisu tharare uttor dilo, “Muio tomare ekkan prosono pujor gorim.
42020004	More ho: Johonor baptismagan sorgottun nahi, manjiortun?”
42020005	Sebeden thara-thara huobula gorte holak, “Ami judi hoi ‘Sorgottun’, salen, the hobo, ‘A hittei tumi tare bischias no goro?’
42020006	Ami judi hoi, ‘Manjiortun’, beg manuschune amare sil mela dibag. Haron thara Johonore ek jon muni bili mani loion.”
42020007	Sebeden thara uttor dilak sien huttun, thara hobor no pan.
42020008	Jisu tharare holo, “Ieni hi odhihare mui gorong muio tomare no hom.”
42020009	Sebeden Jisu ei tulona hodagan manuschunore hoi die arambo gorilo, “Ek jone ekkan anggur bagan tullie. The hed goriegunore anggur baganan do-bhagi denar porendi, bi-dejot diri gori thelogoi.
42020010	Anggur sinibar okto oinei, the tar bhagkuo anibalottei tar sagorsie ek jon hed gorieguno sidu dipadelo. Thara tare mari marai suduo adtoi phirei dilak.
42020011	The aro ek jon sagorsie dipadelo. Tareo laj gor para gori mari marai suduo adtoi phirei dilak.
42020012	Tin baro dijiet, the dipadeiede sagorsiebuoreo gha gori didai, baganano bharedi phelei duon.
42020013	Sebeden anggur baganano girojchuoi holo, ‘Mui hi gorim daw? Mor agojor puobuo dipadang. Tare thara degile, ole sorman goribak.’
42020014	Hintu hed goriegune tare deginei, thara-thara huobula gorton, ‘Ete daw porendi sompottir girojchuo obo. The pebode sompottigani ami pei para, tare morei phelei.’
42020015	Sebeden thara tare baganano barendi phelei dinei morei pheleilak. Anggur baganano girojchuoi tharare hi goribogi sei?
42020016	The einei sei hed goriegunore nas gorinei onnio hed goriegunore baganan dibogi.” Akke thara ien suninei thara holak, “Sien huno din no ok.”
42020017	Sebeden Jisu tharare seinei holo, “Salen, ei bhagot Sastro hodagano orthogan hi? ‘Ghor-tulliegunor monot no porede silluo, hunot mul silluo olo.’
42020018	Je sei silluo ugure pore, the guri oi jebo. Ar sei silluo jar ugure pore, the phagu oi jebo.”
42020019	Sokkene rajguruthagurune ar dhormo niomo mastorune Jisure dhoribartei pod togeilak. Haron thara buji parilakke ei tulona hodagan the tharar biruddie hoie. Hintu thara manuschunore dorelak.
42020020	Sei murubbigune Jisure sog di agon. Tare hodat phajeinei, odhihari ar hemoda-bola sason-goriebuor adot gojei di paron para, thara dharmig bhes dhora bajei dinedi, guptosor dipadelak.
42020021	Guptosorune tartun pujor gorilak, “Guruthagur, ami hobor pei tui soittio hoda hos ar soittio hodagani shigas. Harore eitzabor nei gori tui soittio gori Itchioro hodagani shigas.
42020022	Niomo doge Kaisarore ami hajana diduong ne no diduong?”
42020023	Hintu Jisu tharar bojong monani hobor peinei tharare holo, “Hittei more joga sor?
42020024	More ekkuo denariδ poijieδ degogi. Ibie har subhi ar har hoda lega age?” Ar thara uttor dilak, “Kaisaror.”
42020025	Sebeden Jisu holo, “Kaisara jinijchani Kaisarore duo ar Itchioror jinijchani Itchiorore duo.”
42020026	Manuschuno mujungot thara tare hodat phajei no parilak. Tar uttoran suninei thara amok oinei juro gori thelak.
42020027	Sebeden hoiek jon Sadduki, jiei uduonagan nei honde sigune Jisur idu einei tartun pujor gorinei holak:
42020028	“Guruthagur, amattei Mosi legkiede: Ek jon manus judi mog loinei, puo no peie gori mori jai, sei manuschuor guro bheibuoi tar boschuore loinei tar bheibuottei bongso rokkie gori di pebo.
42020029	Ek ghorot sat bhei elak. Begottun bor bheibuoi mog loinei, puo no peie gori mori jeie.
42020030	Tar toledi guro bheibuoi tar boschuore loinei, theo puo no peie gori mori jeie.
42020031	Sebeden tin lombor guro bheibuoio tar boschuore lolo. Sedogkie gori beg sat bheie loinei puo no peie gori mori gelak.
42020032	Ar bego jere miliebuoio mori gelo.
42020033	Senottei, jiei uduonaganot the har mog obo? Haron thara sat bheie begkune tare mog ijebe loion.”
42020034	Jisu tharare uttor dilo, “Ei jugo manuschune lo-li goron ar bo duon.
42020035	Hintu jigun morattun jiei udinei ebode jugkuot thebar lak, thara neg-mog lo-li, ar bo diedi gortak noi ar.
42020036	Thara Itchioro puo, jiei uttie puo obak hinottei, sorgo-dudtuno dogkie mortak noi ar.
42020037	Hintu morattun jiei tulona hodagan Mosi angie hero jaburbuo siot degeie. Haron the Probure daginei hoie, ‘Abrahamor Itchior, Isaakor Itchior, ar Jakobor Itchior.’
42020038	Haron the olode moragunor Itchior noi hintu jedagunor Itchior. Haron tar darai begkune jeda agon.”
42020039	Sebeden hoiek jon dhormo niomo mastore Jisure holak, “Guruthagur, tui thik hoda hole.”
42020040	Huno ekkanor sombonde tartun pujor goribar tharar sahoje no hulelo ar.
42020041	Jisu tharare holo, “Kristo Davidor Puo bili thara hittei hon?
42020042	Haron Gido boibuot Davide the nije hoie, ‘PROBUIE, mor Probure hoie, “Mor denedi boji thak.
42020043	Tor sottrugun jedogkon song, tor thengot tole no thong, sedogkon song boji thak.” ’
42020044	“Davide the nije tare ‘Probu’ hoie, a hingori Kristo Davidor Puo oi pare?”
42020045	Beg manuschune suni agonde lokke, Jisu tar sisjiogunore holo,
42020046	“Dhormo niomor mastorunottun tumi uije thagkuo. Lamba shilum urinei bereibar tharattun mone hoi. Ath-bazarot manjiortun salam hebar tharattun mone hoi. Synagogot begottun moillioban bojibar jaga ar haana-meitbanot begottun gom bojibar jaga tharattun mone hoi.
42020047	Thara rani-milieguno ghorani hari lon. Barendi degebartei lamba-lamba gori bor magon. Thara shanggadik sasti pebak.”
42021001	Jisu uguredi rini seinei, dhoni manuschune Mon-dirbuo dan-baksubuot tharar dhonani bhorei dedonde degilo.
42021002	Ekkuo gorib rani-miliei dibie pidolor poijieδ bhorei dedegoi the degilo.
42021003	The holo, “Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor: Sei gorib rani-miliebuoi thara begkunottun bes tengaδ bhorei dilogi.
42021004	Haron oinnio beg manuschune daw tharar alajhala dhon agede sittun Itchiorore dan dilakkidie. Hintu the tar goribpanottun the dilogi. Tar bajibar jieni age, sien begkan the dan-baksubuot bhorei dilogi.”
42021005	Mondirbuo hingori doul-doul silloi, ar dan gorsionde sieniloi sajeion, sei sombonde hoiek jone hodon.
42021006	Sebeden Jisu holo, “Dinun ebag, tumi degotte sillun ekkuoio soga-sok gori thedak noi. Begkun lugimari phelei dibag.”
42021007	Thara tartun pujor gorilak, “Guruthagur, sieni homole obo? Sieni homole ghodi jebo, ar sieni ghodi jebar ole hi-hi sinno thebo?”
42021008	Jisu holo, “Huno jone tomare hu-podedi neje no paron para uijkare thagkuo. Haron onek jone mor nange einei hobakki, ‘Mui deie the,’ ar ‘Somoibuo hai ejer.’ Senottei tharar pune-pune no jeio.
42021009	Judduor hoda ar uruttul hoda sunilie no doreo. Haron sieni akke ghodi ja poribo. Hintu thuman hara edo noi.”
42021010	The eksottie holo, “Ek jade oinnio jador biruddie obak, ar ek rejjioi oinnio rejjior biruddie judduo goribak.
42021011	Jagai-jagai bor-bor bhujol bebo, bhadorad poribo ar, awsin-awsin biedi obo. Agajot dor gore para dangor sinno dega jebo.
42021012	“Hintu sieni ghodi no jade, manjie tomare dhoribak. Tomare dug-hosto lageibak, synagogot ar jielot borei dibagkoi. Mor nanganottei thara tomare raja ar sason-gureiguno mujungot nejeibak.
42021013	Tharare shakki obartei sien tomar sujuk hadibo.
42021014	Senottei tumi tomar rokkiettei hobagoi akke duri monot jugol gori tho no poribo.
42021015	Haron mui tomare gom hoda ar gom buddhi jobei dim. Tomar biruddigune huno jone sien badha di partak noi, ar torgoio gori partak noi.
42021016	Hintu tomar bab-magune, bheiune, sodorsiei ar bondhugune tomare dhori dibag. Tomar hoiek jon morei pheleibak.
42021017	Mor nanganottei beg manjie tomare hos no pebak.
42021018	Tomar mada sul ekkano ajhi jedo noi.
42021019	Soijjio gori theinei tumi mukti peio.
42021020	“Jerusalemo seropala soinni-ogun degilie, Jerusaleman nas obar oie bili mone gorsio.
42021021	Sokkene Judea dejot agonde sigune moununot dhei jadok. Sohoranot thebakke sigun nigili jadok. Ar jigune sohorano barendi thebak sigun sohoranot no somodokkoi.
42021022	Haron sei dinun hena uguroidie din. Pobitro Sastrot hoiede sieni begkani puron obo.
42021023	Sei lokke pedoli-milie, ar hujhi porma miliegunor hobal puribo. Haron dejchanot birat dugko-doja ar ei manuschuno ugure Itchioro rakkan lungibogi.
42021024	Thara haba hebak ar beg jado sere tharare banidajit hada obo. Be-jadtunor somoibuo par oi song Be-jadtune Jerusaleman thengo tole goribak.
42021025	“Belanot, sananot, ar taragunot sinno dega jebo. Sagoro tubolo roi, ar dorgorede para juore pittimit jadtune jagulug bodibag.
42021026	pittimit ebode sieni dore, ar sintiei manuschunot monani soittio oi jebo. Haron agajo hemodagani digdigei die obo.
42021027	Ar sebeden Munischioro Puobuore meg sagot gori hemodaloi ar birat oborug gori ette thara degibak.
42021028	Sieni begkani ode arambo ole, tomar muktigan hai ebo hinottei, sirie alok gorinei rini seio.”
42021029	Sebeden Jisu tharare ekkan tulona hoda hoi dilo, “Dumur gajchuo, ar beg gajchun rini sawh
42021030	Hor uttie degilie, tumi hoi parode gorom din hai ejchie.
42021031	Ei sedogkie gori jokke ieni ghodi jade degiba, tumi mone goribade Itchioro rejjiogan hai ejchie.
42021032	Mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor: Sieni begkani ghodi no gele, ei jugko lugi jedo noi.
42021033	Sorgo ar pittimigan lugi jebo, hintu mor hodagani huno din lugi jedo noi.
42021034	Hintu tumi nijere-nije uij rageio. A no ole, haba-dabai, mattole, ar ei songsaro sintiei tomar monani gour oinei, addikie gori sei Dinnuo tomar idu lungibogi.
42021035	Haron sei dinnuo pittimit thebakke beg manuschuno idu idi dogkie gori lungibogi.
42021036	Onsur uijkare thago. Ebode sieni begkanittun sari jei paro para ar Munischioro Puobuor mujungot thiei po para shokto goribartei bor mago.”
42021037	Sei lokke, dinot Jisu Mondir-buot sigkie de, ar reid ole, Oliv Mounnuot jeinei thaigoi.
42021038	Ar bennie pottie beg manuschune tar hodagani sunibartei Mondirbuot jan.
42022001	Moli-agullie pidie Utchob-pan, Rokkie Utchob honde sien hai ejchie.
42022002	Manuschunore dhoran hinottei, rajguruthagurune ar dhormo niomo mastorune Jisure morei pheleibartei sadon.
42022003	Sebeden Juda, hellie nange Iskariod honde sibier monot Soitan somilo. The olode baro jon sisijiottun ek jon.
42022004	The rajguruthaguruno sidu ar Mondiro poliso porisalona gorieguno sidu jeinei hingori the Jisure dhori di dibo hologoi.
42022005	Thara hujhi oinei tare tengaδ dibartei haam helak.
42022006	Theio manilo, ar manuschunottun durot gori thagke seiot the Jisure dhori dibartei sujuk togar.
42022007	Sebeden Moli-agullie pidie Utchobpanot, Rokkie Utchobo bera-shagolo shawhbuo habonde dinnuo lungilogi.
42022008	Jisu Pitorore ar Johonore dipadelo. The tharare holo, “Rokkie Utchobo haanabuo hebartei jeinei jugol gorogoi.”
42022009	Thara tare holak, “Ami hudu jeinei jugol gori dibonggoi tortun mone hoi?”
42022010	Jisu tharare holo, “Suno, tumi sohoranot somibagoio, ek jon morode hummoi pani buode tomar mokkie ebo. The sumibogoidie ghoranot tar pune-pune jeio.
42022011	Ar sei ghoro girojchuore hoio, ‘Guruthagure hoiede, “Mor sisjiogun somot Rokkie Utchobor haana hembe gorba gudhibuo hudu?” ’
42022012	Ghoro girojchuoi tomare uguro tolat ekkuo sajeie dangor gudhi degei dibo. Rokkie Utchobo haana siot jugol gorsiogoi.”
42022013	Thara jeinei, Jisu tharare hoiede doge-doge lagot pelakkoi. Sebeden Rokkie Utchobo haana thara jugol gorilak.
42022014	Okto oinei, Jisu tar baro jon sisjio somot hebartei bojilo.
42022015	Sebeden the tharare holo, “Hosto bhug goribar age, ei Rokkie Utchobo haanabuo tomarloi eksomare hobar mortun baari mone hor.
42022016	Haron mui tomare hongor, Itchioro rejjiot Rokkie Utchobpan puron no oi song ei haanabuo hedung noi ar.”
42022017	Sebeden the golojchuo adot loinei donniobad dilo. Ar the holo, “Ien loinei tomar moiddie bhag goro.
42022018	Haron mui tomare hongor, Itchioro rejjiogan no eje song, mui angguro ros hedung noi ar.”
42022019	Sebeden the pidiegan adot loinei donniobad dilo. Ar the pidiegan hotta gorinei tharare dinedi holo, “Ien olode mui tomare dimbie heyegan. More monot rageibartei ien gorsio.”
42022020	Thik sedogkie gori thara haanar porendi, the golojchuo adot loinei holo, “Ei golojchuo olode mor logandoi die nuo nioman, jien tomartei dali die oie.
42022021	Hintu sawh, more dhora bajei dibode adtano mor loge tebilanot age.
42022022	Munischioro Puobuottun Itchiore thik gorsiede doge-doge mora poribo. Hintu more dhora bajei diebuor hobal puribo!”
42022023	Sebeden sisjiogune tharattun honna edogkie goribuo thara-thara pujor gora-gori gorton.
42022024	Thara moiddiottun honna begottun dangor obo, sieno sombonde thara-thara torga-torgi gorton.
42022025	Jisu tharare holo, “Be-jadtunor rajagune tharar ugure giroji dogkie sason goron. Ar ‘gunor lagonde manuschun’ honde sigunor, tharar ugure odhihar thai.
42022026	Je Tomar moiddie begottun dangor oi, the begottun sigonnuo ok. Ar je murubbi oi, the sagorsiebuo ok.
42022027	Haron, honna dangor sei? Hebartei bojede sibie, nahi, loibiot gorede sibie? Hebartei bojede sibie noi ni dangor de? Tobuio muina tomar moiddie loibiot goriebuo dogkie.
42022028	Hintu tumi na mor pune-pune porikkie moiddie ela.
42022029	Mor Babe more ekkan rejjio dede dogkie gori muio tomare ekkan rejjio dim.
42022030	Mor rejjiot tumi mor loge haba-daba goribartei ar singasonot bojinei Israele baro jadore sason goribartei mui tomare odhihar dim.”
42022031	Ar Probuie holo, “Simon, Simon, sha Soitannuoi tore gom poje para pojibartei tore magkie.
42022032	Hintu tor bischiaschane borei eje para, mui tortei shokto gori bor magi duong. Ar tui jokke mor idu phiros, tor bheilogkunore shokto goris.”
42022033	Sebeden Simone tare holo, “Probu, mui tor loge jielot jebartei ar tor loge mori jebartei jugol agong.”
42022034	Jisu holo, “Pitor, mui tore hongor: Edchie dinnuot radai dag no haribar age tui more no sinong hoinei tin bar bharebe.”
42022035	Sebeden Jisu tharare holo, “Mui tomare tengaδ hollie, hotchal ar joda sara gori dipadenei hitchu pora no pode noi ni?” Ar thara holak, “Ami hitchu pora no pei”
42022036	Sebeden Jisu tharare holo, “Hintu ikkunu, jar tengaδ hollie age the lok. Thik sedogkie gori, jar porbhajchie beg age the lok. Ar jar horgo nei the tar shilummuo bejinei ekkan hini lok.
42022037	Mui tomare hongor: Sastrot hoiede hodagan mor iot puron obo. Pobitro Sastrore hoi, ‘Tare niom bhonggo gorieguno somare bhoreion.’ Haron mor sombonde beg hodagani puron obar hajeie.”
42022038	Thara holo, “Probu, iot dien horgo age.” Sebeden Jisu tharare holak, “Obo, obo.”
42022039	Sebeden Jisu nigili jeinei, the jaidie jaganot, Oliv mounnuot gelo. Ar tar sisjioguneo tar pune-pune gelak.
42022040	Sei jaganot lunginei, the tharare holo, “lubbot no poro para bor mago.”
42022041	Ar the tharattun pharok oinei, ek silo idie durot huttur durot jeinei, adu hubinei bor magilo.
42022042	The holo, “Ba, judi Tor ischie oi, ei golojchuo mortun neja. Hintu mor ischie doge no oinei, tor ischie doge ok.”
42022043	Sebeden sorgottun ekkuo sorgo-dud tar idu dega dinedi tare bol dilogi.
42022044	Shanggadik mono duge Jisu aro shokto gori bor magilo. Birat-birat lo phuduo dogkie gori tar gham phuduo madit porton.
42022045	Bor maganattun udinei, the tar sisjioguno sidu gelo. Mono duge ghum jadonde degilogoi.
42022046	Sebeden the tharare holo, “A hittei ghum jor? Lubbot no poro para udinei bor mago.”
42022047	Ar Jisu hoda hode seiot, sawh, thara hai ek jhag manus lungilakki. Baro jon sisjiottun ek jon Juda honde sibiei sigunore annie. The Jisure sumibartei hai ghoneiegi.
42022048	Hintu Jisu tare holo, “Judai, Munischioro Puobuore ek summon dinei dhora bajei dibe oi?”
42022049	Tar seropala elakke sigune hi obo deginei thara holok, “Probu, horgoganiloi beja ureibong ni na?”
42022050	Tharattun ek jone bego moharajguru-thagurbuor sagorsiebuore beja urei, tar den hanan habi phelei die.
42022051	Jisu holo, “Obo ebel.” Ar the tar hanan dhori dinei gom gori dilo.
42022052	Sebeden Jisu tar biruddie ejchionde rajguruthagurunore, Mondiro polisor lobiot goriegunore ar borjonunore holo, “Mui daget ni na, tumi horgo ar mugorloi ejchiode?
42022053	Din bagene tomar loge Mondirbuot elungge lokke tumi more no dhoro. Hintu ien tomar sujuk ar andharanor hemoda.”
42022054	Sebeden thara Jisure dhoranar porendi thara moharajguruthagur- buo ghorot anilak. Hintu, Pitore durot theinei pune-pune elo.
42022055	Jokkene thara udono song moiddie agun jaleinei hureie gori boji agon, siot Pitoreo tharar somare bojilogoi.
42022056	Sebeden ekkuo sagorsie-miliei tare agun phuode deginei, gome-dalei tare rini seinei holo, “Ei manuschuoio tar loge elo.”
42022057	Hintu Pitore bharenei holo, “Miliebuo, mui tare no sinong.”
42022058	Aro hanekkon porendi oinnio ek jon manjie tare deginei holo, “Tuio ek jon tharar dolo manus.” Pitore holo, “Bhai, mui noi!”
42022059	Ar perai ek ghonta porendi, aro ek jone shokto gori holo, “Theo Galili hullie hinottei, ei manuschuo hamakkai tar loge elo.”
42022060	Pitore holo, “Bhai, tui hi hor, mui no bujongor.” Ar the hode-hode ekkuo radai dag harilo.
42022061	Sebeden Probuie pijendi phirinei Pitorore selo. Ar Probuie tare hoiede hodagan Pitoror monot udilo, “Radai dag no haribar age, tui more tin bar bharebe.”
42022062	Ar Pitore barendi jeinei gujhi-gujhi hanilogoi.
42022063	Jisure dhori agonde manus-chune tare pidilak, ar thatta gorilak.
42022064	Tar muon dagi dinei musei suorelak. Thara tartun pujor gorton, “Muni dogkie gori amare hodei, honna Tore suoreilo?”
42022065	Tare sorjade, thara shagor oinnio bojong hoda tare holak.
42022066	Ar phor oieio, manuschunor borjonun, rajguruthagurun, ar dhormo niomo mastorun sidu thubelakkoi. Sebeden thara-thara Sanhedrinot nejeilak.
42022067	Thara holak, “Tui judi Kristo ole, amare ho.” Hintu Jisu holo, “Mui judi tomare hong, tumi more je bischias no goriba.
42022068	Ar mui judi tomartun pujor gorong, tumi more hamakkai uttor no diba. Tumi more irio dida noi.
42022069	Hintu ikkunuttun duri, Munischioro Puobuo hemoda-bola Itchiorbuo denedi buji thebogoi.”
42022070	Sebeden thara begkune holak, “Salen, tui Itchioro Puo?” Jisu tharare holo, “Tumi holade sibie mui.”
42022071	Thara holak, “Oinnio jon shakki die amar a hittei lagette ar? Tar muottun ami nije sunilong daw.”
42023001	Sebeden beg manuschune udinei jogon-togon tare Pilado sidu nejeilak.
42023002	Tare duji badeidie arambo gorilak. Thara holak, “Ami pelongge ei Manuschuoi jadtuore hu-podedi nejai ar moharaja Kaisare ami hajana dibartei the mana gore. The nijore-nije Kristo, ek jon raja hoi.”
42023003	Sebeden Pilade tartun pujor gorilo, “Tui ne Judaiunor Rajabuo?” Jisu uttor dinei holo, “Tui holede doge mui oi”
42023004	Sebeden Pilade rajguru-thagurunor ar manjiore holo, “Ei Manuschuor mui hitchu duj no pelung.”
42023005	Hintu thara sie bes holak, “The manuschunore jagulug tulo bajei die. Goda Judea dejchanot sigkie de. Galili dejot arambo gori idusong.”
42023006	Pilade Galili nangan suninei, the Galili hullie ni na pujor gorilo
42023007	The Herodor rejjior manus bili Pilade hobor peinei, tare Herodo sidu padei dilo. Sei lokke Herode the nije Jerusalemot elo.
42023008	Herode Jisure deginei baari hujhi olo. The tare sebartei bhaluk bilom agottun duri dhap elo. Haron the tar sombonde onek hoda suinnie. The amok ham gorte sebartei tar asha elo.
42023009	Sebeden the Jisuttun bhalukkani hoda pujor gorilo. Hintu Jisu tare shobai uttor no dilo.
42023010	Rajguruthagurune ar dhormo niomo mastorune udinei tare thajei duj badei dilak.
42023011	Sebeden Herode ar tar soinniogune tare hitchu mone no gorilak. Thara tare thatta gorilak. Tare jakjomog gori habor Urei dinei Pilado sidu phirei dilak.
42023012	Sei dinnout Herodtoi Pilade bondhu olak. Agendi thara sottru elak.
42023013	Pilade rajguruthagurun ar manuschunor murubbigun eksomare dagi thubelo.
42023014	Sebeden the tharare holo, “Tumi ei Manus-chuo mor idu annio. The manus-chunore phirei nejai gori tumi tare duj badei dila. Sawh, mui tomar mujungot tare porikkie gorilung. Tumi tare duj badei dilade sieni mui duj no pelung.
42023015	Herodeo tar siot hitchu duj no pai. Mui tomare Herodo sidu dipadangor. Sawh, the moribar lak gori theo tar siot hitchu no pai.
42023016	Senottei, mui tare sasti didai iri dim.”
42023017	Sei lokke tharattei ek jon utchobo lokke the iri di pai.
42023018	Hintu manuschune eksomare jogar pari-pari holak, “Ei Manuschuore neja, amattei Barabbare iri de.”
42023019	Barabba ekkan sohorot andolon gorinei ek jon hun gorsie. Senottei, tare jiel-hanat bhorei thoion.
42023020	Sebeden Jisure iri dibar mon hinottei, Pilade aro tharare dagilo.
42023021	Hintu thara eksottie jogar pari-pari hodon, “Tare krosot duo! Tare krosot duo!”
42023022	Ar tin bar the tharare holo, “A hittei? The hi bojong ham gorsie? The moribar lak gori tar siot mui hitchu duj no pang. Mui tare sasti dinei iri dim.”
42023023	Hintu thara sie bes birat birat ro gori holak Jisure krosot die poribo! Jisure krosot die poribo! manuschunor rogun ar rajguruthaguruno rogun mana olo.
42023024	Thara dabi gorilakke doge Pilade ugum dilo.
42023025	Tharattun mone hoidie manuschuore the iri di dilo. Sei manuschuo andolon gorinei manus hun gorsie hinottei, jielot porsiegoi. Thara Jisure jien mone hoi sien goribartei Pilade tharar adot gojei dilo.
42023026	Soinniogune Jisure nejade, Kurini sohoro manus Simone hedottun phirte thara tare dhorilak. Jisur pije-pije Kroschan nejei dibartei tare bugei dilak.
42023027	Birat ek jhag manus Jisur pije-pije jaddon. Siot milieio ektal elak. Tharaio buk saberei-saberei tartei monot duge handon.
42023028	Hintu Jisu phirinei tharare holo, “Jerusalemo miliegun, mortei no hannio, tomartei ar tomar puo-shabagunottei hano.
42023029	Sawh, haron dinnun etton, sokke hobak, ‘Puo-shaba neiegun ar bhaj miliegun hoballie. Huno din bugu dut no habande miliegun hoballie.
42023030	Sebeden ‘manjie moununore hobak, “Amare jhabo!” Ar murogunore hobak, “Amare dagi tho!” ’
42023031	Haron jeda gajore judi edogkie goron, mara gajore hi goribak?”
42023032	Siot di jon azami Jisur loge morei pheleibartei nuon.
42023033	Kalvary honde siot lungineigoi, tare krosot dilak. Azamigunorio tar denedi ek jon ar bangedi ek jon gori krosot dilak.
42023034	Sebeden Jisu holo, “Ba, tharare mab gor. Haron thara hi gorton sien thara hobor no pan.” Ar soinniogune ak seinei tar haborani bhag gorilak.
42023035	Manuschune thieinei sei agon. Murubbiguneio tharar loge thieinei tare thatta gorinei holak, “The manjiore rokkie gore. The judi Itchiore beiloiebuo, Kristo ole, the nijere nije rokkie gorog!”
42023036	Soinnioguneio tare thatta gorilak. Thara jeinei tare horo mod dilakkoi.
42023037	Thara holak, “Tui judi Judaiunor Raja ole, tore tui rokkie gor na!”
42023038	Tar uguredio ekkan gonggola thangi duon. Grik, Roman ar Hebru hodadi legi duon: IBIE OLODE JUDAIUNOR RAJABUO.
42023039	Siot ek jon krosot duonde azamittun ek jone Jisure gor dinei holo, “Tui judi Kristo ole, tore tui rokkie gor ar amareo rokkie gor na!”
42023040	Hintu oinnio azamibuoi tare jhaji ureinei holo, “Tui shobai Itchiorore no dhorash? Tuio daw ekkui sasti
42023041	Amar thik oie. haron ami jien gorsei sien ami peir. Hintu ei Manuschuoi hitchu duj no gore.”
42023042	Sebeden the Jisure holo, “Probu, tui Tor rejjioganot lungiliegoi more monot rageis!”
42023043	Jisu tare holo, “Mui tore soittio hodagan hongor, edchie tui mor loge Paradisot lungibiegoi.”
42023044	Sei lokke, dibursiettun duri tin porsie song goda songsaran andhar oie.
42023045	Belan hala oie ar mondirbuo porda haboran ugurottun duri tole song songmoiddie phadinei di sillie oie.
42023046	Jisu birat ro gori jogar parinei holo, “Ba, ‘Tor adot mor aptabuo gojei dilung.’ ” Ar the sien honar porendi Tar poronan nigili gelo.
42023047	Sei lokke ek shot soinnio ugure senapotibuoiδ hi ghodi gelo sien deginei the Itchiorore baini gorinei holo, “Ete hamakkai dharmig Manus.”
42023048	Sebartei ejchionde ek jag manuschune hi gora olo sien deginei, monot duge buk saberei-saberei tharar ghorot phiri gelak.
42023049	Jisure sinonde beg manuschune ar Galili dejottun tar pune-pune ejchionde miliegune thieinei durottun sieni sei thelak.
42023050	Ar sawh, Joseb nange ek jon manus elo. The Sanhedrinor ek jon manus, baari gom ar dharmig.
42023051	Sanhedrinot thik gorsionde sien bah tharar haman the no mane. The olode Judea dejor Arimathea adammie. The Itchioro rejjiogan barsei elo.
42023052	Ei Manuschuoi Pilado sidu jeinei Jisur heyegan magilogoi.
42023053	Sebeden the Jisure lameinei, padol haborloi berenei silo-sadarat hunni ekkan sidiesalot bhorei thologoi. Siot agendi huno mora bhorei no thon.
42023054	Sei dinnuo elode Jugol gorede din, ar Jireni Dinnuo ebar oie.
42023055	Galili dejottun Jisur pune-pune ejchionde milieguneo siot jeion. Jisu heyegan Josebe siot thoiede thara degkuondoi.
42023056	Sebeden thara phiri einei, thumbas mojola ar tel jugoleilakki. Ar Jireni Dinnuot Niomano doge thara jireilak.
42024001	Sebeden saptar polim dinnuot beinnie poittie, miliegune sidiesalanot gelak. Thara aro oinnio miliegune jugo-leionde tumbas telani nejeion.
42024002	Silluo, Gourottun lareie gori thara degilakkoi.
42024003	Sebeden thara bidire sominei Probu Jisur heyegan thara no degilakkoi.
42024004	Ar thara sieno sombonde bhabi sade, sawh, abada gori di jon jhimid-jhimid jolede habor ursie gori tharar hai thieilakki.
42024005	Miliegune dore mada nigurilak. Sebeden sei di jon manjie tharare holak, “Hittei mora manjior jagat jeda togor?
42024006	The iot nei, the jiei udinei jeiegoi. The Galili dejot thagke tomare hi hoie tomar monot tulo.
42024007	The hoie, ‘Munischioro Puobuore pabi manjior adot gojei die obo. Thara tare krosot dibag. Ar the tin dine jiei udibo.’ ”
42024008	Sebeden miliegunor tar hodagani idot udilo.
42024009	Sidiesalanottun thara phiri einei, sei beg hodagani egaro jon sisjiore ar oinnio beg manuschunore holakki.
42024010	Sisjiogunore hoiondoidie miliegun olakke Magdala adamo Meri, Joana, Jakobor mabuo Meri, ar oinnio miliegun.
42024011	Thara hodagani gop mone gorinei tharare bischiaso no gorilak.
42024012	Hintu Pitore udinei sidiesalanot daba-daba gelo. The niguri seineigoi, pado haborani ek huredi gori degilo. Hi ghodi gelo sieni bhabi-bhabi the ghorot gelogoi.
42024013	Ar sawh, sei dinnie tharattun di jon Emmaus adamot jadon. Sei adaman olode Jerusalemortun perai egaro kilomiter durot.
42024014	Beg ghodi jeiede hodagani thara hoi-hoi jadon.
42024015	Aro, huobula ar pujor gora-gori gorte, Jisu The nije thara hai lungineigoi thara loge jar.
42024016	Hintu tharar sogkun tare no sinon para gori die oie.
42024017	Jisu tharare holo, “Jade-jade tumi hi hoda huobula goror? A hittei tumi shuduo-mu oio?”
42024018	Sebeden Kliopa honde sibiei tare uttor dinei holo, “Ingillie Jerusalemot hi ghodi jeie sieni hobor no peie porbhajchie bana agoschie?”
42024019	Jisu tare holo, “Hi ghottiede?” Thara tare holak, “Nazareth hullie Jisur sombonde dei. Itchioro samne ar beg manjior samne hodai-battai ar hame horjai the olode ek jon hemoda-bola muni.
42024020	Rajguru-thagurune ar amar murubbigune tare Pilado adot gojei duondoi. The tare morei phelei bajei dinei, soinniogune tare krosot duon.
42024021	Ami asha gorseidie the Israel jadtuo mukti goribuo. Sieni ghodi jeiede edchie tin din olo.
42024022	Hintu amar dolottun hoiekkuo miliei amare amok goreion. Thara bennie pottie sidiesalanot jeion.
42024023	Hintu tar heyegan no degondoi. Thara einei amare holakkidie, thara sorgo-dud azil peiondoi ar sei sorgo-dudtune tharare hoionde the jeda oie.
42024024	Ar amattun hoiek jon sidiesalanot jeinei, miliegune hoionde doge-doge degkuondoi. Hintu thara tare no degondoi.”
42024025	Sebeden Jisu tharare holo, “Oh nadongsara manuschun! Munigune hoionde hodagani bischias gorte tomar diri jai.
42024026	Kristo sei dug-hostogani bhug gorinei tar mohimagan pana dorkar noi ni?”
42024027	The Mosir boiunottun duri beg muniguno boiun song, Sastrot tar sombonde hi lega age the tharare ortho bhangi dilo.
42024028	Thara jadonde adamano hai lungineigoi the tharattun bes durot jebode dogkie gorilo
42024029	Ar thara tare rageibartei holak, “Dinnuo gelogoi, saj awr. Amar loge thak. Ar the tharar loge thebartei gelo.”
42024030	The tharar loge hade, pidiegan The adot loinei donniobad dilo. Ar the pidiegan hotta gori tharare dilo.
42024031	Sebeden tharar sogkun meli die oinei thara tare sinilak. ar the tharattun aw-dega oi gelo.
42024032	Thara di jone huobula gorilak, “Podot amarloi hoda hoiede lokke ar Sastro orthogan amare bhangi dette lokke amar bidirie agun angette dogkie oiede noi ni?”
42024033	Thara jogon-togon udi Jerusalemot phiri einei, egaro jon sisjio ar oinnio manuschun somot eksomare thubei agonde lagot pelakki.
42024034	Thara huobula gorton, “Probu jodepode gori jiei uttie. Ar the Simono sidu dega diegoi.”
42024035	Podot hi-hi oie thara di joneo tharare janeilakkoi. Probuie pidiegan hotta gorte tare sinnonde sieno holak.
42024036	Thara sei hodagani huobula gorte, Jisu The nije tharar song moiddie thieinei tharare holo, “Tomar shanti ok.”
42024037	Thara bhud degkuon bili dore honggorong oion.
42024038	Sebeden Jisu tharare holo, “Hittei jagulug ola? Hittei tomar monanit shiongshama oi?
42024039	Mor adtanit ar mor thenganit sawh. Ibie mui. More dhori sawh. Mor era ar aar agede degotte dogkie bhudor era ar aar nei.”
42024040	Jisu sieni honar porendi, tharare tar adtani ar thengani degelo.
42024041	Adik hujhie thara ejosong bischias gori no parton. Ar thara amok oi agonde lokke, Jisu tharare holo, “Idu huno hebar jinij age ni?”
42024042	Thara tare ek doma sekkie mas ar ek hotta muba haat dilak.
42024043	Ar the sieni adot loinei, tharar mujungot helo.
42024044	Sebeden the tharare holo, “Mui tomar loge elungge lokke ei hodagani mui tomare hoiong. Mosir Niomanot, muniguno boiunot ar Gido boibuot mor sombonde lega agede beg hodagani puron oi pebo.”
42024045	Sebeden Sastro hodagani thara buji paron para, the tharar monani huli dilo.
42024046	Ar the tharare holo, “Sastroie ien hoi, Kristo dug-hosto pa poribo ar tin dine morattun jiei udibo.
42024047	Jerusalemortun duri beg jado sidu tar nage pabottun mon phiriena ar pabottun mab panagan prosar gori pebak.
42024048	Ei hodagani shakkidie olade tumi.
42024049	Suno. Mor Babe jien dibar protiggia gorsie sien mui tomar idu dipadem. Hintu sorgottun tomar ugure hemoda no eje song tumi Jerusalem sohorot barsei thagkuo.”
42024050	Ar Jisu tharare Bethani adam song nejeilo. The tar adtani alok gorinei tharare asirbad dilo.
42024051	The tharare bor dede, tare tharattun pharok gora olo ar sorgot neja olo.
42024052	Thara Jisure tobona goranar porendi, baari hujhi gori thara Jerusalem sohorot phiri elak.
42024053	Mondirbuot Itchiorore donniobad dinei ar baini gori-gori thara somoi hadeilak. Amen.
43001001	Adipurbe Hodagan elo. Sei Hodagan Itchioro siot elo, ar Hodagan olode Itchior.
43001002	The adipurbe Itchioro loge elo.
43001003	Beg jabotio the baneie. The no baneiede jinij hitchu nei.
43001004	Tar siot poranan elo, ar sei poranan olode manjior phor.
43001005	Phoran andharot phuttiegi, hintu andharane sienore no sinilo.
43001006	Itchiore ek jon manus dipadeie, tar nangan olode Johon.
43001007	Phoranor sombonde shakki dibartei, shakki ijibe the ejchie, jene tar darai beg manuschune bischias jan para.
43001008	The Phor noi. Hintu The ejchiede olode Phoranor sombonde proman dibartei.
43001009	Sei phoran olode soittio Phor. Je songsarot ejchie beg manuschunore phor der.
43001010	Hodagan songsarot elo. Hintu The baneiede songsarano manuschune tare no sinilak.
43001011	The tar nijor manuschuno idu ejchie, hintu tar nijor manuschune tare gojhi no lolak.
43001012	Hintu jedog jone tare gojhi loion ar tar nangan bischias jan, sigunore Itchioro puo obartei the odhihar die.
43001013	Sigunor jormo lottun noi, nijor era ischiettun noi ar manjior ischiettuno noi, hintu Itchiorottun.
43001014	Sei Hodagan manei hule jormeinei, amar idu bojotti ologi. Ami tar mohimagan degilong. Sien olode Babpuottun ekkuo gori Puo agede sibier oborugkan. The olode doye ar soittiogandoi boron.
43001015	Johone tar sombonde proman dinei jogar pari-pari hor, “Etar sombonde ie mui hoiongge, ‘Mor porendi ebode sibie mortun bes dangor, haron The mor akke elo.’ ”
43001016	Ami tar puripunnuoganottun begkune doyettun doye peiei.
43001017	Haron Mosir darai Nioman die oie. Jisu Kristor darai doyegan ar soittiogan ejchie.
43001018	Huno jone je huno somoiot Itchiorore no degon. Tar ekkuo gori Puo, Babo horod thaidie sibiei tare janei die.
43001019	“Tui honna,” gori pujor goribartei Judaiune Jerusalem sohorottun dhormo guru ar Levi manus Johono sidu dipadeon. Ien olode Johone shakki dede sien.
43001020	The no bharenei ar haam heinei holo, “Mui Kristo noi.”
43001021	Sebeden, thara pujor gorilak, “Salen tui honna? Tui Elija ni na?” The holo, “Mui noi.” Sebeden tare holak, “Tui hi honna sei, Munibuo ni na?” The uttor dilo, “Noi.”
43001022	Sebeden thara tartun pujor gorilak, “Amare dipadeonde sigunore hoi parigoi para amare ho, tui honna? Tor sombonde tui hi hobe?”
43001023	Johone holo, “Mui olungge, muni Isaia hoiede doge, ‘Moruobomit ek jonor roi horte: “PROBUR podtan uju goro.” ’ ”
43001024	Thara dipadeonde sigun olakke Pharisi dolottun.
43001025	Ar sebeden thara tartun pujor gorilak, “Salen, tui judi Kristo no ole, Elijaio no ole ar munio no ole, a hittei tui baptisma gori duos?”
43001026	Johone tharare uttor dilo, “Mui panit baptisma gori duong, hintu tumi no sinnie ek jon tomar loge thiei agegi.
43001027	The mor porendi ejer. The mortun bes dangor. Mui tar joda durieno huei dibar lak noi.”
43001028	Sieni ghottiede Bethania adamot, Jordan Sora uhuledi. Sei jaganot Johone baptisma gori di der.
43001029	Tar hellie Johone Jisure tar mokkie ette deginei holo, “Sawh, songsaro pabo bhar nejaidie Itchioro Bera-shagolo Shawhbuo.
43001030	Etar sombonde ie mui hoiongge, ‘Mor porendi ek jon ebo. The mor akke elo hinottei, the mortun bes dangor.’
43001031	Mui tare no sindung. Hintu Israel manuschunore tare dolei degei dibartei mui panit baptisma gori duongor.”
43001032	Johone proman dinei holo, “Aptabuo hodoro dogkie gori sorgottun lambegi ar tar ugure porsiede mui degkuong.
43001033	Mui tare no sindung. Hintu mui panit baptisma gori dibartei more dipadeiede sibiei hoie, ‘Aptabuo tar ugure porinei thagke tui debe, the olode Pobitro Aptaloi baptisma goridiebuo.’
43001034	Mui sien degkuong ar mui proman dilungge jei, the olode Itchioro Puobuo.”
43001035	Tar hellie, Johone aro, di jon sisjioloi thiei age.
43001036	Jisu siot berade Johone tare deginei holo, “Sawh, Itchioro Bera-shagolo Shawhbuo!”
43001037	Sebeden di jon sisjioi the hoiede sien suninei thara Jisur pune-pune gelak.
43001038	Tar pune-pune jadonde hoi parinei, Jisu pije phiri rini seinei tharare holo, “Tumi hi togor?” Ar thara holak, “Robbi, tui hudu thas?” “Robbi” ortho olode, “Guruthagur.”
43001039	The tharare holo, “Tumi einei sawhgi na.” Thara jeinei the thaidie jagagan degilakkoi. Sebeden thara sei dinnie tar loge thelak. Sien olode perai beillie ser ta.
43001040	Johono hodagan suninei Jisur pune-pune jeie di jonottun ek jon olode Simon Pitoror bheibuo, Andrio.
43001041	The akke tar bheibuo Simonore lagot peinei tare holo, “Ami Messaiare lagot peiei.” (Messaia orthogan olode Kristo.)
43001042	Sebeden Andrio Simonore Jisur idu anilo. Jisu tare seinei holo, “Tui Jonar puo Simon. Mui tore ‘Kepha’ dagim.” (Kepha ortho olode, Sil.)
43001043	Tar hellie Jisur Galili dejot jebar mone holo. The Philibore lagot peineigoi tare holo, “Mor loge ai.”
43001044	Philibie olode Bethsaida sohorottun. Sien olode Andrio ar Pitore dagir sohoran.
43001045	Philibie Nathanaelore lagot peineigoi tare holo, “Niomanot Mosi jiber sombonde legi jeie ami sibiere lagot peiei. Muniguneio tar sombonde legi jeion. The olode Josebor puobuo Jisu, Nazareth adamortun.”
43001046	Nathanaele Philibore holo, “Nazareth adamortun hi gom jinij nigili paribo?” Sebeden Philibie tare holo, “Tui einei sagi na.”
43001047	Jisu Nathanaelore tar idu ette deginei tar sombonde holo, “Ui-o sawh, ek jon hati Israel manus, tartun hitchu phagara mon nei.”
43001048	Nathanaele Jisure holo, “Tui hingori more sinilie?” Jisu tare uttor dilo, “Philibie tore dagibar agendi, tui dumur gajchuo tole elede lokkene mui tore degkuong.”
43001049	Nathanaele Jisure holo, “Robbi, tui olede Itchioro Puobuo. Tui olede Israelo Rajabuo.”
43001050	Jisu tare holo, “Mui tore hongor, ‘Mui tore dumur gajchuo tole degkuong,’ sienottei tui bischias gorilede oi ni? Tui ienottun bes oborug ham degibie.”
43001051	Jisu Nathanaelore holo, “Mui tomare soittio hodagan soittio gori hongor, ienor porendi sorgogan hulo gori tumi degiba. Itchioro sorgo-dudtun Munischioro Puobuor ugure tumi uttie ar lambegi degiba.”
43002001	Tin din oinei Galili dejor Kana sohorot ekkan mela olo. Siot Jisur mabuo elo.
43002002	Jisure tar sisjiogun somot melat boleion.
43002003	Ar jokke tharar angguro rose no hulor, Jisur mabuoi tare holo, “Tharattun angguro ros nei ar.”
43002004	Jisu tare holo, “Tui olede milie, tor hi hobor pebar age? Mor somoibuo ejo no eje.”
43002005	Tar mai porsonigunore holo, “The tomare jien hoi sien goribade-sie.”
43002006	Judaiune sudduo onde doge, siot shobuo silor pani sari bojeie elak. Ekkuot aji ek shot litarδ ade.
43002007	Jisu tharare holo, “Pani sarigunot pani bhoro.” Ar sigunot thara haza song boron gori bhoreilak.
43002008	Sebeden Jisu tharare holo, “Ikkie ekkena nigileinei porsoni mukpattibuo sidu nejo.” Ar thara nilak.
43002009	Ar jokkene porsoni mukpattibuoi angguro ros oiede panigan sagi selo, sien huttun ejchie, the hobor no pelo. Panigan nigilei nuonde porsonigune hobor pan. Porsoni mukpattibuoi nuo-jameibuore dagilo.
43002010	The tare holo, “Akke begkune gom angguro ros hebar duon. Ar jokke gorbagune il oi song hebar ole, sebeden ekka horab angguro ros duon. Hintu tui ejo song gom angguro roschan rageios!”
43002011	Jisu sei sinnogani Galili dejor Kana sohorot arambo gorilo. Ei siennie gori the tar mohimagan degelo ar tar sisjiogune tare bischias gorilak.
43002012	Tar porendi, Jisu lami einei Kapernaum sohorot gelo. Tar loge tar ma, tar bheiun ar tar sisjioguno gelak. Siot thara hoiek din thelak.
43002013	Judaiunor Rokkie Utchob din hai einei, Jisu Jerusalem sohorot gelo.
43002014	Mondirbuot damara goru, bera-shagol ar hodor bejchonde sigunore ar siot boi agonde tengaδ bodoli diegunoreo the degilo.
43002015	Duriloi the ekkan sabuk banelo ar siendoi the tharare begkunore mondirbuottun nigilei dilo. Bera-shagolun ar damara gorugun The nigilei dilo. The tharar tengagunδ dali phelei dinei tharar tebilani ullei phelei dilo.
43002016	The hodor bejiegunore holo, “Ieni iottun nejo. Mor Babor ghoran ath-hola no baneio!”
43002017	Sebeden Sastrot legkiede hodagan tar sisjiogunor monot udilo, “Tor ghoranottei mor dhappane more hei pheleilo.”
43002018	Senottei Judaiune Jisuttun pujor gorilak, “Tui ei hamani goror jogon, tui amare hi sinno degebe?”
43002019	Jisu tharare uttor dilo, “Tumi ei mondirbuo bhangi pelo, ar tin dine ibie mui tulim.”
43002020	Senottei Judaiune holak, “Ei mondirbuo tullie shoisolis bojor lakkie, tui parapang ien tin dine tuli paribie?”
43002021	Hintu Jisu horte mondirbuo hodagan olode tar heyegano sombonde.
43002022	Senottei, jokkene tare morattun jiei tullie, tar sisjiogune monot tullionde the ei hodagan tharare hoie. Ar sisjiogune Sastro hodagani ar Jisu hoiede hodagan bischias gorilak.
43002023	Rokkie Utchobo somoi the Jerusalem sohorot elode lokkene tar oborug hamani deginei onek manjie tar nange bischias gorsion.
43002024	Hintu The begkunore hobor pai hinottei, Jisu The nije tharare bischias no gore.
43002025	Manjior monot hi age the hobor pai hinottei, manjior hobor tare janeidibar huno jon no lage.
43003001	Ek jon Pharisi manus tarnangan Nikodem. The ek jon Judaiunor murubbi elo.
43003002	Sei manuschuoi reidot Jisur idu einei tare hologi, “Robbi, ami hobor pei tui olede Itchiorottun ejchie ek jon guruthagur. Haron Itchior judi loge no thele, huno jone tui gorotte edogkie amok hamani goribar hemoda no thelun.”
43003003	Jisu tare uttor dinei holo, “Mui tore soittio hodagan soittio gori hongor, je nuo jormo no oi, the Itchioro rejjiogan degido noi.”
43003004	Nikodema Jisure holo, “Ek jon manus judi buro ole, hingori tar mai tare jormo di paribo? Tar mai tare jormo dibartei, the aro tar ma ghorbo bidirie somi poribo ni na?”
43003005	Jisu tare uttor dilo, “Mui tore soittio hodagan soittio gori hongor: Je panittun ar Aptartun jormo no oi, the Itchioro rejjiot somi parto noi.
43003006	Manjiortun jormeile manus ar Aptartun jormeile apta.
43003007	Mui holungge, ‘Tui nuo jormo oi pebe,’ siendoi tui amok no os.
43003008	Boierane jindi mone hoi sindi bai, ar tumi tar abaschuo suno. Hintu huttun eje ar hudu jai sien tumi hobor no po. Aptartun jigunor jormo oie, sigunorio thik sedogkie oi.”
43003009	Nikodema Jisuttun pujor gorilo, “Sieni hingori oi pare?”
43003010	Jisu tare uttor dilo, “Tui Israel manuschunor ek jon sigkie die, a hittei sieni hobor no pas?
43003011	Mui tore soittio hodagan soittio gori hongor, ami jieni hobor pei sieni hoi. Ami jieni degkiei sieni ami sunei di. Hintu ami sunei di die hodagani tumi mani no lo.
43003012	Mui tomare songsaro jinijchanir sombonde hoinei tumi bischias no goro. Senottei, mui judi tomare sorgo jinijchanir sombonde hong, hingori bischias goriba?
43003013	“Munischioro Puobuo sorgot jibe thai, ar je sorgottun ejchie, sibie bade huno jon sorgot no jan.
43003014	Mosi moruobomit sabpuore ojolot tangeiede dogkie gori Munischioro Puobuoreo ojolot tangei pebak.
43003015	Uddischuogan olode je, tare bischias jai, the nosto odo noi, hintu ononto jibon pebo.
43003016	Haron Itchiore songsaran edok gori hos peie, tar bana ekkuo gori Puo elode sibie dan die. Ar je tare bischias gore the nosto odo noi, hintu ononto jibon pebo.
43003017	Songsaran dujot pheleibartei Itchiore tar Puobuo songsarot di no padai. Hintu tar darai songsaro manuschune mukti pebartei di padeie.
43003018	Je tare bischias jai, the dujot porto noi. Hintu je tare bischias no jai, the honatto duji oi age. Haron Itchioror ekkuo gori Puo sibiere the bischias no jai.
43003019	Dujchan olode ien, phoran songsarot ejchie. Hintu tharar hamani bojong hinottei, manuschune phoranottun andharan bes hos pan.
43003020	Haronan olode je bojong ham gore, the phoranore hos no pai. Tar hamani bojong dega jai bilinei the phoranotio no eje.
43003021	Hintu je gom ham gore, tar hamani Itchioro ischie doge gora oie bili porak-porak gori dega jebartei the phorot eje.”
43003022	Sei porendi, Jisu tar sisjio-gundoi Judea dejot gelo. Siot The tharar loge thelo ar baptisma gorilo.
43003023	Salim adamano hai Ainon jaganot shagor pani elo hinottei Johone baptisma gorider. Manus-chune siot jadon ar Johone tharare baptisma gorider.
43003024	Haron sokkene Herode Johonore jiel-hanat no bhorai.
43003025	Sei lokkene Johono sisjiogune hoiek jon Judaiundoi sudduo onde sombonde torga-torgi arambo oie.
43003026	Thara Johono sidu jeinei tare holak, “Robbi, shah, Jordan Sora uhule tor loge elode sibiei manus baptisma gorider. Tui tar sombonde janei duos. Begkune tar sidu jadon.”
43003027	Johone holo, “Sorgottun no dile huno jone hitchu pebar nei.
43003028	Tumi mui hode suinnio daw, ‘Mui Kristo noi,’ hintu ‘Itchiore more tartun akke dipadeie.’
43003029	Jadtun nuo buo age, the olode nuo-jamei. Hintu nuo-jameibuor shamalabuoi tar hai thai ar nuo-jameibuoi hoda hode sunilie baari hujhi oi. Senottei mor hujhigan pureilo.
43003030	Tartun bara poribo hintu mortun homa poribo.
43003031	“Je ugurottun eje the begottun seresto. Je pittimittun eje the pittimir hoda hoi. Je sorgottun eje the begottun seresto.
43003032	The jieni degkie ar jieni suinnie the shakki de. Ar huno jone tar shakki die hodagani mani no lon.
43003033	Je, tar shakkigan mannie the proman dede Itchiorbuo soittio.
43003034	Haron Itchiore jare dipadeie sibiei Itchioro hoda hoi. Itchiore tare Apta mabinei no de.
43003035	Babpuoi Puobuore hos pai. Ar tar adot beg gojei die
43003036	Je Puobuore bischias gore tar ononto jibon age, ar je Puobuore bischias no jai the jibon pedo noi. Ar Itchioro rakkan tar ugure thelo.”
43004001	Jisu Johonottun bes sisjio tullie ar baptisma gori die. Pharisigune sien suinnion bili Probuie hobor pelo.
43004002	Judio Jisu the nije baptisma gori no de, hintu tar sisjiogune baptisma gori duon.
43004003	The Judea dejchan phelei jei aro Galili dejot jebartei nigililo.
43004004	The Samaria dejchan phuri jei pelo.
43004005	Senottei, the ekkan Samaria sohorot Sykar honde siot lungilogoi. Sien olode ago dinot Jakobe tar puo Josebore dede jagano hai.
43004006	Jakobor jhanggabuo siot elo. Jisu atte-atte oran oie hinottei, jhanggabuo hai bojilo. Sien bel diboro oktot.
43004007	Ekkuo Samari milie pani tulibartei elo. Jisu tare holo, “More pani dena haang.”
43004008	Sei lokkene tar sisjiogune hebar jinij hinibartei sohorot jeion.
43004009	Sebeden Samari miliebuoi tare holo, “Tui olede ek jon Judai manus, mui olungge Samari milie. Tui hingori mortun pani hebar magor?” Haron Judai manuschune Samaria manuschundoi song no poron.
43004010	Jisu tare uttor dinei holo, “Tui judi hobor pede Itchioro danan hi, ar ‘Honna more pani dena,’ haang hor, sale tui tartun pani magidie ar the tore jibono pani dido.”
43004011	Miliebuoi tare holo, “Babu, tortun pani tulibar balti nei, ar janggabuo olode gobhin. Salen tui huttun sei jibono pani phele?
43004012	Amar Purbo-puruschun Jakobe, je amare ei janggabuo die ar tar puogune ar tar poshugune iottun pani heion, tui tartun dangor obe parapang?”
43004013	Jisu tare uttor dinei holo, “Je ei panigan hai tar aro pani saj goribuo.
43004014	Hintu mui dimbie panigan je hai, tar huno din pani saj shobai gorto noi ar. Haron mui dimbie panigan tar Pobitro oinei ononto jibon song nal adibo.”
43004015	Miliebuoi tare holo, “Babu, mor pani saj no gore para ar mui idu pani hoja ei no pang para, more sei panigan de na.”
43004016	Jisu tare holo, “Ja, tor negkuoredagiandoi.”
43004017	Miliebuoi tare holo, “Mortun neg nei.” Jisu tare holo, “Tui soittio hoda hole, oi ‘Mortun neg nei.’
43004018	Haron tortun paschuo neg elak, ar ikkie torloi thaidie manuschuoio tor neg noi hinottei, tui soittio hoda hole.”
43004019	Sebeden miliebuoi Jisure holo, “Babu, mui hoi parilung, tui ek jon muni.
43004020	Amar Purbo-puruschunune ei mounnuo ugure tobona gorsion. Hintu tumi Judaiune hode, manuschune Jerusalemo jaganot tobona gorana osit.”
43004021	Jisu tare holo, “Miliebuo, mor hoda bischias gor. Babore tumi ei mounnuot, bah, Jerusalemot tobona no goribade somoibuo ejer.
43004022	Tumi tobona gorode sibiere hobor no po. Muktigan Judai jado darai ejer hinottei ami tobona goridie ibiere ami hobor pei.
43004023	Ekkuo somoi ebo ar ejchie. Sokkene ajol tobona goriegunore togai.
43004024	Itchior olode Apta. Jigune tare tobona goron, apta ar soittioloi tobona goriegune Babore apta ar soittioloi tobona goribak. Babeio sedogkie tare tobona gora poribo.”
43004025	Miliebuoi tare holo, “Mui hobor pang, Messaia,” (jare Kristo hon,) “the ejer. Jokkene the ebo, the begkani amare janei dibogi.”
43004026	Jisu tare holo, “Sibie olungge mui, torloi hoda hongorte ibie.”
43004027	Jisu sei hodagan holoio tar sisjiogun lungilakki. The ekkuo milieloi hoda hode deginei thara amok olak. Hintu tharattun ek joneo tare no holakke, “Tui hi sas?” nahi “Tui tarloi hittei hoda hor?”
43004028	Sebeden miliebuoi tar pani hummuo phelei jei sohorot jeinei manuschunore hologoi,
43004029	“Ejo, ek jon manus mor jibonot gorsiongge sieni begkani hoidede sibiere sawhgi. The Kristo obode noi ni?”
43004030	Senottei sohorottun thara nigili einei Jisur idu eja dorilak.
43004031	Sei bidirie, tar sisjiogune tare hujoli gorinei hodon, “Robbi, ha.”
43004032	Hintu the tharare holo, “Tumi hobor no peie hebar bhat mortun age.”
43004033	Senottei tar sisjiogune thara-thara huobula gorton, “Tartei huno jone bhat ani duon ni na?”
43004034	Jisu tharare holo, “Mor bhat olode more dipadeie sibier ischie doge mor gorana ar tar haman mor gori phurona.
43004035	Tumi hode noi ni, ‘Dhan haba aro ser mas bagi age’? Suno, mui tomare hongor, hedtani sawh, pakkie hinottei diebar okto oie.
43004036	Je diei the bedon pai ar the ononto jibonotteio phol thubei thoi. Senottei biji shidiebuoi ar dieiebuoio duo jone song gori hujhi on.
43004037	Ei siennie gori ei dagho hodagan soittio, ‘Ek jone shidie ar ek jone habe.’
43004038	Tumi dug no gorsie sien diebarlottei mui tomare di padeiong. Oinnio jone dug gorsion ar tumi tharar dugo bhagkan pela.”
43004039	Sei sohoranottun balukjon Samaria manjie Jisure bischias gorsion. Haron miliebuoi proman dinei hoie, “Mui gorsiongge sieni begkani the hoi die.”
43004040	Senottei jokke Samaria manuschune tar idu elak, tharar loge thebartei thara Jisure hujoli gorilak. Senottei, the thara siot di din thelo.
43004041	Ar tar hoda suninei aro balukjone bischias gorilak.
43004042	Sebeden miliebuore thara holak, “Bana tor hoda suninei ami bischias no jei. Ikkie ami nije suninei hobor pelongge ete hamakkai Kristo, songsar Muktigoriebuo.”
43004043	Hintu sei di dino porendi, Jisu siottun jeinei, Galili dejot gelo.
43004044	Jisu nije holo jei munie nijor dejot sorman no pan.
43004045	Senottei, jokke the Galili dejot lungilogi, Galili hulliegune tare lobiot gorilak. Haron tharar utchobo somoi Jerusalem Sohorot jeion ar utchobo lokkene Jisu gorsiede sieni begkani degkuondoi.
43004046	Senottei, Jisu Galili dejor Kana adamot pani angguro ros banei dede siot aro lungilogi. Ek jon rajar murubbi puo Kapernaum adamot aw-sug oinei elo.
43004047	Judea dejottun Galili dejot Jisu ejchie bili the suninei, the tar sidu gelo. Tar puobuo morong morong oie hinottei tar puobuore gom goridibartei the Jisure hujoli gorilo.
43004048	Sebeden Jisu tare holo, “Tumi sinno ar amok ham judi no dego, tumi shobai bischias no jeba.”
43004049	Rajar murubbibuo tare holo, “Probu, mor puobuo no motte akke tui ai na.”
43004050	Jisu tare holo, “Ja, tor puobuo bajibo.” Ar manuschuoi Jisu tare hoiede doge hodagan bischias gorinei gelogoi.
43004051	The jadte seiot, tar sagorsiegune tare lak peinei tare janei dilak, “Tor puobuo bajilo.”
43004052	Senottei the hon oktot gom oie the tharattun pujor gorilo. Ar thara tare holak, “Gelle hellie bel alondit tar joran gom oie.”
43004053	Senottei puobuor babpuoi buji parilode, thik sei lokkene Jisu tare hoie, “Tor puobuo bajibo.” The ar tar goda ghorbobuo bischias gorilak.
43004054	Sien olode Judea dejottun Galili dejot einei Jisu gorilogidie dibar sinno haman.
43005001	Sienir porendi, Judaiunor ekkan utchob awr ar Jisu Jerusalem sohorot gelo.
43005002	Jerusalemot Bera-shagolo Duoro Girie hure ekkuo pour age. Ienot paschan baranda age. Hebru hodadi ieno nangan olode Bethesda.
43005003	Sienit ek jhag manus pori agon. Thara olakke aw-sugkie, han, leng ar ajorchie pirellie. Thara panigan loribartei barsei agon.
43005004	Haron okte-okte ekkuo sorgo-dud Pourbuot einei panigan ghudegi. Sebeden sorgo-dudtuoi panigan ghudonar porendi, je akke paniganot lami tangore, tar je huno pirie gom oi.
43005005	Siot attris bojorchie pirellie ek jon elo.
43005006	Jokke Jisu tare degilo, siot The bhalukbilon song siennie gori agede hobor pelo. Jisu tare holo, “Tortun gom obar mone hoi ni?”
43005007	Pirelliebuoi Jisure uttor dilo, “Babu, jokke sorgo-dudtuoi panigan ghudegi, more huno jone Pourbuot lamei die nei. Hintu mui jade oinnio jone mortun akkuondoi.”
43005008	Jisu tare holo, “Thie, tor bischonan loinei adi ja.”
43005009	Jogon-togon sei manuschuo gom olo. Tar bischonan loinei adi-adi gelo. Sei dinnuo elode Sabbath.
43005010	Senottei, Judaiune Jisu gom gori dede manuschunore holak, “Edchie dinnuo olode Jireni Din. Tor bischonan nibar niome no hoi.”
43005011	The tharare holo, “More gom gori dede sibiei more hoie, ‘Tor bischonan loinei adi ja.’ ”
43005012	Senottei thara tartun pujor gorilak, “Sibie honna tore hoie, ‘Tor bischonan loinei adi ja’?”
43005013	Jisu gom goridede manuschuoi sibie honna hobor no pai. Haron sei jaganot shagor manus elak ar Jisu siottun sube-sabe jeiegoi.
43005014	Jeredi, Jisu tare mondirbuot lagot pelo ar tare holo, “Shah, tui gom oios. Tor huno ekkan bojong no oi para pab no goris ar.”
43005015	Manuschuoi jeinei Judaiunore hologoi jei tare gom goridede sibie olode Jisu.
43005016	Senottei, sei Judaiune Jisure hosto lagadon ar tare morei pheleibar tharar mone hor. Haron the sieni Jireni Dinnuot gorer.
43005017	Jisu tharare holo, “Mor Babe ejo song ham gorer ar muio gorongor.”
43005018	Senottei Judaiunottun sie bes tare morei pheleibar mone hor. The bana Jireni Dinnuor niom bhonggo no gore, hintu Itchiororeio tar nijor Bab hoi. Ei sedogkie gori the nijore-nije Itchiorloi song gorer.
43005019	Sebeden Jisu tharare holo, “Mui tomare soittio hodagan soittio gori hongor, Puobuoi nijottun hitchu gori no pare. Babe jien goribar hoi, the siennie gore. Haron Babe jien gore Puobuoio sien gore.
43005020	Babe Puobuore hos pai ar the nije jien gore the sieni begkani Puobuore degai. Tumi amok aw para, the ienittun bes ham Puobuore degebo.
43005021	Babe jeannie gori morattun jiei tullie ar tharare jibon de, thik sedogkie gori, Puobuoio tartun jare mone hoi tare jibon dibo.
43005022	Babe haro bijier no gore, hintu The beg bijiero bharan Puobuore die.
43005023	Senottei Babore jedogkie gori sorman goron, thik sedogkie gori, Puobuoreo begkune sorman goron para The more bijiero bharan die. Je Puobuore sorman no gore, the Puobuore dipadeiede Baboreo sorman no gore.
43005024	“Mui tomare soittio hodagan soittio gori hongor, je mor hoda sune ar more dipadei dede sibiere bischias gorsie, the ononto jibon peie. The bijierot porto noi ar, hintu the moranaganottun sarinei jibon pelo.
43005025	Mui tomare soittio hodagan soittio gori hongor, somoibuo ejer ar honatto lungiegi. Sei lokkene mora manuschune Itchioro Puobuor robuo sunibak. Ar jigune sunon, sigune jeda obak.
43005026	Haron Babor jeannie poran age sedogkie poran thebartei the Puobuoreo dilo.
43005027	The Munischioro Puo hinottei the bijier gore para tare odhihar dilo.
43005028	Ienot amok no oio. Haron ekkuo somoi ejer, sokke jigune sidie shalot agon, sigune begkune tar robuo sunibak.
43005029	Ar thara nigili ebag. Jigune gom ham gorsion, sigune jibon pebartei jiei udibag, ar jigune bojong ham gorsion, sigune bijierot poribartei jiei udibag.
