43005030	Mor nijottun hitchu gori no parong. Mui jeannie sunong, siennie bijier gorong, ar mui dharmig bijier gorong. Haron mui mor monjokka goribar no sang, hintu more dipadeiede Babpuor ischie doge goribar sang.
43005031	“Mui judi nijore-nije shakki duong, sale, mor shakkigan soittio noi.
43005032	Oinnio ek jone mor sombonde shakki der. Ar mui hobor pang the mor sombonde shakki dette sien soittio.
43005033	“Tumi Johono idu pujor goribartei dipadeo ar the soittiogano sombonde shakki die.
43005034	Mui manjiortun shakki no sang. Hintu tumi mukti pebartei sieni mui tomare hongor.
43005035	Johone olode phor angette ar phor dette serago dogkie. Ar tomar tar phoranot hanekkon gori hujhi obar mone hoie.
43005036	“Hintu Johono shakkiganottun bes dangor shakki mor age. Sieni mui gori phureibartei Babe more hoiekkani ham die. Sei hamani gorongotte ienie Babe more dipadeie gori shakki der.
43005037	Ar more dipadeiede Babpuoio the nije mor sombonde shakki die. Tumi huno din tar robuo no suno ar tar dogkanio no dego.
43005038	Tumi tar hodagan monot no rago hinottei the dipadeiede ibereo bischias no goro.
43005039	“Sastrot tumi ononto jibon peba bili mone gorinei sieni tumi togo, ar ei Sastroganie mor sombonde shakki der.
43005040	Tobuio, tumi jibon pebartei mor idu ebar mone no hoi.
43005041	Mui manjiortun sorman no haang.
43005042	Hintu mui tomare hobor pelung, tomartun Itchiorottei hospanan nei.
43005043	Mui mor Babo nange elung ar tumi more gojhi no lola. Oinnio jone judi tar nijor nange edo, tumi tare gojhi lolan.
43005044	Tumi sorman gora-gori goro. Ar jei sormanan bana Itchiorottun eje, sien tumi no togo. Senottei hingori bischias goriba sei?
43005045	Babo idu mui tomare duji banem bili mone no gorsio. Ek jone tomare duji banai, ar sibie olode Mosi jare tumi asha goro.
43005046	Haron tumi judi Mosire bischias gorida, moreio bischias gorilan. Haron the mor sombonde legkie.
43005047	Hintu tumi judi the legkiede sien bischias no gorilie, hingori tumi mor hodagani bischias goriba?”
43006001	Sieno porendi, Jisu Galili Sagoro uhule par ologoi. Ei billuore Tiberia Sagor hon.
43006002	Pirellieguno ugure sinno ham gorididede sieni thara degkuon hinottei, shagor manus tar pune-pune jadon.
43006003	Ar Jisu ekkuo mouno pidit udinei tar sisjiogun somot bojilogoi.
43006004	Sei lokkene Judaiunor Rokkie Utchobpan hai ejchie.
43006005	Jisu jokkene rini selo, shagor manus tar mokkie ette deginei Philibore holo, “Ei manuschune hebartei huttun pidie hinibonggoi?”
43006006	Hintu Philibore joga sebartei Jisu sei hodagan holo. Haron the nije hobor pai the hi goribuo.
43006007	Philibe tare uttor dilo, “Jon bagene ekka-ekka bhag pebartei, di shot denarirδ pidieio no hulebo.”
43006008	Tar sisjiottun ek jone Simon Pitoror bheibuo Andrio Jisure holo,
43006009	“Iot ekkuo gurottun paschan hon bhado pidie ar dibie gori maj agon. Hintu edok jon manjiortei sigundoi hi obo?”
43006010	Sebeden Jisu holo, “Manuschunore boja bajei duo.” Sei jaganot shagor her elo hinottei manuschune bojilak. Siot morod elakke perai, pas azar jon.
43006011	Jisu pidiegani lolo. The donniobad denar porendi sisjiogunore dilo. Ar sisjiogune boi agonde sigunore bhag gori dilak. Sedogkie gori majchuno the bhag gori dilo. Jar jedog mone hoi sedog helak.
43006012	Manuschunor ped bhoranar porendi, Jisu tar sisjiogunore holo, “Hitchu borbat no jai para, ugursieni tulilo.”
43006013	Senottei, sei paschan hon bhado pidiettun hei hai ugursieni thara tuli lolakke baro lei.
43006014	Sebeden Jisu gorsiede sinnogan manuschune deginei thara holak, “Songsarot ebode Munibuo hamakkai ete obode.”
43006015	Senottei thara bolajure tare dhorinei raja tulibartei ebar oion bili Jisu buji parinei, the ek huredi gai-gai mounnuot gelogoi.
43006016	Reid oinei, tar sisjiogune sagoranot lamilakkoi.
43006017	Thara ekkan nawt udi sagoro uhuledi Kapernaum adamot jadon. Honatto andhar oie, ar Jisu thara sidu no jai.
43006018	Bor boier bar hinottei sagorot tubol udtie.
43006019	Tin bah ser meilδ pangei bei jana porendi, thara Jisure sagoro adi ette degilak. The nawgano hai ejer hinottei thara dorelak.
43006020	Hintu Jisu tharare holo, “Mui, mui, no doreo.”
43006021	Sebeden thara tare hujhie nawganot tulilak. Ar thara jadonde jaganot abada gori nawgan lungilogi.
43006022	Tar hellieio manuschun sagoro uhuledi elak. Thara hobor pan sisjiogune uttuonde sieno bade ar siot oinnio sigon naw elo. Ar thara hobor pan Jisu tar sisjioguno loge sigon nawganot gori no jai, hintu sisjiogune tare pheleinei jeiondoi.
43006023	Hintu oinnio sigon naw Tiberia sohorottun ejchie. Sieni Probuie hujhi hoda hoinei pidie habeiede jagano hai elo.
43006024	Senottei, manuschune Jisure ar tar sisjiogunore siot no deginei, tharaio nawt udi Jisure togeibartei Kapernaum adamot gelak.
43006025	Jisure sagoro uhuledi thara lak peineioi tare holak, “Robbi, tui hokke idu ejchiosh?”
43006026	Jisu tharare uttor dilo, “Mui tomare soittio hodagan soittio gori hongor, tumi sinno ham degkuode senottei more no togor. Tumi ped boron pidie heiode senottei more togotte.
43006027	Hoi jaidie bhadottei hosto no gorsio. Hintu ononto jibon song tegede bhadottei hosto goro. Munischioro Puobuoi tomare dibode bhattun umore-umor song tigibak. Haron Bab Itchiore mor ugure marga di thoie.”
43006028	Sebeden thara Jisure holak, “Itchioro ham goribartei amar hi gora poribo?”
43006029	Jisu tharare uttor dilo, “Ien olode Itchioro haman, the dipadeiede ibiere tumi bischias goro.”
43006030	Senottei thara tare holak, “Ami deginei tore bischias jei para, tui hi sinno degebe? Tui hi ham goribe?
43006031	Amar buro-burigune moruobomit manna heion. Sien Sastrot legkie age, ‘Itchiore tharare sorgottun pidie hebar die.’ ”
43006032	Sebeden Jisu tharare holo, “Mui tomare soittio hodagan soittio gori hongor, Mosi tomare sorgottun pidie no de. Hintu mor Babe tomare ajol pidie sorgottun der.
43006033	Haron Itchioro pidiegan olode the, je sorgottun lami einei songsarore jibon dede sibie.”
43006034	Sebeden thara Jisure holak, “Probu, siennie pidie amare onsur dis.”
43006035	Jisu tharare holo, “Mui jibonor pidiegan. Je mor idu eje, tar shobai ped no puribo. Ar je more bischias gore tar huno din shobai pani saj no goribuo.
43006036	Hintu mui tomare hongorte, tumi more degineo more bischias no goro.
43006037	Baba more jigun die, sigune mor idu ebag. Ar je mor idu eje mui tare huno din phelei didung noi.
43006038	Mor nijor monjokka goribartei mui sorgottun lami no ejong. Hintu more dipadeiede sibier mon purei dibartei mui ejchiong.
43006039	More dipadeiede Babo ischie olode ien, the more jigun die, sigun ek jono mui no areidung, hintu sejo dinnuot sigunore jiei tulidung.
43006040	Ar more dipadeiede iber ischie olode ien, je Puobuore dege ar tare bischias gore the ononto jibon pebo, ar mui tare sejo dinnuot jiei tulim.”
43006041	“Mui sorgottun lami ejchiongge pidiegan” Jisu hoie hinottei, Judaiune tar biruddie budhu-budhu gorton.
43006042	Ar thara hodon, “Ami tar babpuore ar tar mabuore sini, ete Josebor puobuo Jisu, noi ni? Senottei, the hingori hoi pare, ‘Mui sorgottun lami ejchiong’?”
43006043	Senottei Jisu tharare uttor dilo, “Tumi, tumi budhu-budhu no gorsio.
43006044	More dipadeiede Babpuoi tani no anilie, huno jon mor idu no ejon. Ar mui tare sejo dinnuot jiei tulim.
43006045	Munigune boiot legkuon, ‘Ar Itchiore tharare begkunore sigeibo.’ Senottei je Babo hoda sune ar shigie, the mor idu eje.
43006046	Ajole, huno jone Babore no degon. Bana Itchiorottun ejchiede sibiei Babore degkie.
43006047	Mui tomare soittio hodagan soittio gori hongor, je more bischias gorsie, the ononto jibon peie.
43006048	Mui sei jibono pidiegan.
43006049	Tomar buro-burigune moruobomit manna heion, ar thara mori jeion.
43006050	Ei pidiegan sorgottun lami ejchiede olode, je hai the no more para.
43006051	Mui sorgottun lami ejchiongge ibie olungge jeda goraidie pidiegan. Je huno jone judi ei pidiegan haan, the umore-umor bajibo. Ar mui dimbie pidiegan olode mor heyegan. Mui ien songsaro manuschunor jibonanittei dim.”
43006052	Siendoi Judaiune thara-thara torga-torgi gorton, “Ei Manuschuoi hingori tar heyegan amare hebar dibo?”
43006053	Sebeden Jisu tharare holo, “Mui tomare soittio hodagan soittio gori hongor, tumi judi Munischioro Puobuor eragan no ho ar tar logan pan no goro, salen tomar nijor jibon nei.
43006054	Je mor eragan hai ar mor logan hai, the ononto jibon pai. Ar sejo dinnuot mui tare jiei tulim.
43006055	Haron mor eragan olode jodepode haidie jinij ar mor logan olode jodepode pan gorede jinij.
43006056	Je mor eragan hai ar mor logan pan gore, the mor bidirie thai ar mui tar bidirie thang.
43006057	Jeda Babe more dipadeie ar Babor darai mui jeda agong. Thik sedogkie gori, je more hai, theo mor darai jeda thebo.
43006058	Ien olode sorgottun lami ejchiede pidiegan. Tomar buro-burigune manna heion, hintu mori jeiondoi. Ien sedogkie noi. Je ei pidiegan hai, the umore-umor bajibo.”
43006059	Jokke Jisu Kapernaum adamot sigkie die, the sei hodagani synagogot hoie.
43006060	Senottei, tar sisjiogune ien suninei, bhaluk jone holak, “Ien baari aghattie hoda, honna buji paribo?”
43006061	Sei hodaganottei tar sisjiogune budhu-budhu gortonde lokkene Jisu mone-mone buji parinei, the tharare holo, “Siendoi tumi ogoman pelade?
43006062	Tumi judi Munischioro Puobuore the agendi jidu elo, sidu uttiegoi degilie, salen hi obo?
43006063	Aptabuoi jibon de, hintu heyegane hitchu lab no pai. Mui tomare hongorte hodagan olode apta ar jibon.
43006064	Hintu tumi hoiek jone bischias no goro.” Haron Jisu polliettun duri hobor pai, hugune bischias no goribak ar honna tare dhora bajei dibo.
43006065	Ar the holo, “Ienottei mui tomare hongor, mor Babe judi bol no dile, huno jon mor idu ei no paron.”
43006066	Siottun duri balukjon tar sisjioi phiri gelak ar tar loge no gelak ar.
43006067	Senottei, Jisu baro jon sisjiore holo, “Tomartuno jebarloi mone hor ni na?”
43006068	Sebeden Simon Pitore tare uttor dilo, “Probu, ami a har idu jebong? Tortun ononto jibono hodagan age.
43006069	Ami tore bischias gorsei ar ami hobor peiei, tui olede Kristo, jeda Itchioro Puobuo.”
43006070	Jisu tharare uttor dillo, “Mui tomar baro jonore tulliong, ar tomartun ek jon suni noi ni?”
43006071	Hintu The Simonor puobuo Juda Iskariodor sombonde holo. Haron, the tare dhora bajei diebuo ar the olode baro jonottun ek jon.
43007001	Sei porendi Jisu Galili dejot berar. Judaiune tare morei pheleibar sadon hinottei the Judea dejot bereibar no selo.
43007002	Sei lokkene Judaiunor Bajei Utchobpan hai ejchie.
43007003	Senottei tar guro bheiune tare holak, “Ei jagan phelei jeinei Judea dejot jagoi, tui gorotte hamani tor sisjiogune degon para.
43007004	Haron je nangkora obar sai, the gubone hitchu no gore. Tui judi ieni jodepode gori goroschie oi, salen tui nije songsaro manuschunore dega.”
43007005	Tar bheiune tare bischias no goron hinottei thara sien holak.
43007006	Sebeden Jisu tharare holo, “Mor somoibuo ejo no eje, hintu tomar somoibuo daw onsur age.
43007007	Songsaro manuschune tomare hinsie no goribak, hintu tharar hamani bojong hoi duong hinottei thara more hinsie goron.
43007008	Tumi ei utchobpanot jo. Mor somoibuo ejo song puro gori no eje hinottei ikkie mui ei utchobpanot no jeim.”
43007009	The sei hodagan honar porendi, the Galili dejot thelo.
43007010	Hintu tar bheiune utchobot janar porendi, theio gelo, hintu The hulomela gori no jai, gubone jeie.
43007011	Senottei, Judaiune utchobot tare togadon ar hodon, “The hudu age?”
43007012	Ar manjior jhagot shagor manjie tar sombonde shanggadik budhu-budhu gorton. Ek dagie holak, “The gom manus.” Aro ek dagie holak, “Noi die suo the manuschunore hu-podedi nejaidie sie!”
43007013	Hintu thara Judaiunore doreon hinottei tar sombonde huno jone hulo mela gori no holak. Utchobpanot Jisur Sigkie
43007014	Utchobo song bhago oktot, mondirbuot Jisu jeinei sigkie der.
43007015	Ar Judaiune tare amok olak. Thara hodon, “Ei Manuschuoi hingori madei jane? The lega no shigie”
43007016	Jisu tharare uttor dilo, “Mor sigkiegan mortun noi, hintu ien olode more dipadeiede sibiettun.
43007017	Huno jone judi tar ischie doge goribar mone hoi, the hobor pebo mor sigkiegani huttun ejer. Ien hi Itchiorottun, nahi, mor nijor odhiharottun hongor.
43007018	Je nijor hoda hoi, the nijottei baini togai, hintu je tare dipadeie sibiere baini goribar sai, the soittio. Ar tar huno be-dhormi nei.
43007019	Mosi tomare Niom no de ni na? Ar tumi huno jone sei Niom no palo. A hittei tumi more morei pheleibar sor?”
43007020	Jonogone uttor dilak, “Tore bhude peiede. Tore honna morei pheleibar satte?”
43007021	Jisu tharare uttor dilo, “Mui ekkan ham gorinei tumi begkune amok awr.
43007022	Ienottei na, Mosi tomare sundu-sam habibar ugum dede. Jireni Dinnuot tumi sundu-sam habi duo. Hintu sundu-sam habi denagan Mosittun no eje. Ien daw buro-burigunottun.
43007023	Mosir Nioman bhonggo no oie gorinei judi Jireni Dinnuot sundu-sam habi die ole, Jireni Dinnuot mui ek jon manus puro gori gom gori dinei, a hittei tumi mor ugure shanggadik rak oio?
43007024	Ugure-ugure seinei bijier no gorsio na. Hintu thik mode bijier gorsio.”
43007025	Sebeden hoiek jon Jerusalem sohoro manjie holak, “Etare noi ni amar murubbigune morei pheleibartei sadonde?
43007026	Sawh, the hulomela gori hor ar thara tar biruddie hitchu no hodon. The hamakkai Kristo bili murubbigune hoi parsionde noi ni?
43007027	Ami hobor pei the huttun ejchie. Hintu Kristo ele, the huttun ebo huno jone hobor no pebak.”
43007028	Senottei mondirbuot Jisu sigkie dede, the birat ro gori holo, “Tumi more sino ar mui huttun tumi hobor po. Mui nije-nije no ejong. Hintu more dipadeiede sibie soittio ar tare tumi hobor no po.
43007029	Mui tartun hinottei, mui tare hobor pang ar the more dipadeie.”
43007030	Senottei thara tare dhoribar pod togadon. Hintu tar somoibuo ejo song no eje hinottei, tare huno jone ad no lagan.
43007031	Hintu sei manuschunottun bhaluk jone tare bischias gorsion ar hodon, “Kristo ele, ei Manuschuoi gorilode ienittun bes The sinno ham goribogi ni na?”
43007032	Sei hodagani manuschune tar sombonde budhu-budhu gori hode, Pharisigune suinnion. Sebeden Jisure dhoribartei, Pharisigune ar rajguruthagurune mondiro polischun dipadelak.
43007033	Senottei Jisu tharare holo, “Tomar loge mui aro hanekkon gori theimbe. Tar porendi, more dipadeiede sibier sidu mui jeimgoi.
43007034	Tumi more togeinei suph no peba ar mui theimboidie siot tumi jei no pariba.”
43007035	Sebeden Judaiune thara-thara huobula gorton, “Ami tare suph no pei para The hudu jebar sai? Grik manuschuno sere settera oie Judaiuno sidu jeinei Grik manuschunore sigkie dibogoi ni na?
43007036	The holode sien hi? ‘Tumi more togeinei suph no peba, ar mui theimboidie siot tumi jei no pariba’?”
43007037	Utchobo sejo mul dinnuot, Jisu thieinei birat ro gori holo, “Jar pani saj gore, the mor idu ejok, pani hokki.
43007038	Je more bischias gore, Sastroie hoiede doge, tar ontorottun jibono pani nal adibo.”
43007039	Hintu The ien holode, jigune tare bischias gorinei Apta pebak, ei sei sombonde. Haron Jisure ejo song mohimagan die no oi hinottei ejo song Pobitro Apta die no oi.
43007040	Senottei shagor manjie ei hodagan suninei holak, “Ete hamakkai sei Munibuo.”
43007041	Ek dagie holak, “Etedeie Kristo.” Hintu ek dagie holak, “Galili dejottun Kristo ebo ni?
43007042	Kristo Davidor bongsot jormeibogi. The Davide roiede Bethlehem adamanot jormeibogi gori Sastroie no hoi ni?”
43007043	Senottei tar darai manuschun bhag oi gelak.
43007044	Sigunottun hoiek jone tare dhoribar mone holo, hintu hono jone tare ad no bajan.
43007045	Sebeden mondiro polischune rajguruthagurunor ar Pharisigunor idu phiri elak. Thara tharare holak, “Tumi a hittei tare no anila?”
43007046	Mondiro polischune uttor dilak, “Huno jone ei Manuschuo dogkie gori huno din hoda no hon.”
43007047	Sebeden Pharisigune tharare holak, “Tumio bhulot porilagoi die?
43007048	Murubbittun ar Pharisigunottun ek joneo tare bischias gorsion ni?
43007049	Hintu ei Niom hobor no pande manuschune obisabot porilag.”
43007050	Agendi reidot Jisur sidu jeiede Nikodemaio ek jon tharar dolot elo, the tharare holo,
43007051	“Amar Niomane akke manuschuoi hi gorsie, sei sombonde tartun juob no loie gori tare duji banai ni na?”
43007052	Thara tare uttor dilak, “Tuio Galili dejottun ni na? Hobor loi-loi togei sa dei, huno jon muni Galili dejottun no ejon.”
43007053	Sebeden jon bagene jar ghorot the gelakkoi.
43008001	Hintu Jisu Oliv Mounnuot gelo.
43008002	Ar phor ode-ode, Jisu aro mondirbuot gelo ar beg manuschun tar idu elak. The boinei tharare sigkie der.
43008003	Sebeden, shanda gorte dhora porsie ekkuo milie dhormo niomor mastorune ar Pharisigune tar idu anilak. Tare song moiddie thie bajei dilak.
43008004	Ar thara Jisure holak, “Guruthagur”, ami ei miliebuore shanda gorte dhora pheleiei.
43008005	Niomanot Mosi amare ugum dede, ami edogkie miliere sil mela dena. Hintu tui hi hode sas?”
43008006	Tare duj badei dibartei ekkan haron pan para, thara ei hodagan tare sagi sebartei holak. Hintu Jisu no sunede dogkie gori nigurinei angulloi madit legilo.
43008007	Tartun thara bar bar pujor gorton hinottei, the ujonnie seinei holo, “Tomartun je pab no gore, the akke tare sil mela duok.”
43008008	The aro nigurinei madit leger.
43008009	Sebeden tar hodagan thara suninei, ar tharar bhul oie bili buji parinei burogunottun duri jero manuschuo song ek jon ek jon gori nigili gelak. Ar Jisu gai-gai olo ar miliebuoio jagat thiei rolo.
43008010	Jisu uju oinei, harore no degi hintu miliebuore gai-gai deginei tare holo, “Miliebuo, tore duj badei didonde sigun hudu? Huno jone tore duj badei duon ni na?”
43008011	The holo, “Probu, more huno jone duj badei no duon.” Ar Jisu tare holo, “Muio tore duj badei no dim. Jagoi ar pab no goris ar.”
43008012	Sebeden Jisu aro manus-chunore holo, “Mui songsaro phor. Je mor pune-pune eje, the shobai andharot bere daw noi, hintu the jibono phor pebo.”
43008013	Sebeden Pharisigune tare holak, “Tui nijor hodagan nije shakki duor. Tor hodagan soittio noi.”
43008014	Jisu tharare holo, “Mui mor hoda nije shakki dileo mor hodagan soittio. Haron mui hobor pang mui huttun ar hudu jeim. Hintu tumi hobor no po mui huttun ejchiong ar hudu jeim.
43008015	Tumi manjior doge bijier goro. Mui daw harore bijier no gorong.
43008016	Judi mui bijier gorilie, mui jien bijier gorong sien soittio. Haron mui gai no gorong, hintu mui ar more dipadeiede Babaloi gori.
43008017	Tomar niomanot lega oiede, di jone ekkan shakki dile sien soittio.
43008018	Mor hoda mui nije hong, ar more dipadeiede Babpuoi mor sombonde hoi.”
43008019	Senottei thara tare holak, “Tor Bab hudu?” Jisu uttor dilo, “Tumi moreio hobor no po ar mor Baboreo hobor no po. Tumi judi more hobor peda, mor Baboreo hobor pelan.”
43008020	The mondirbuot sigkie dette lokkene, Jisu sei hodagani dan goronde gudhibuot hoie. Tar somoibuo ejo song no eje hinottei, tare huno jone no dhoron.
43008021	Sebeden Jisu aro tharare holo, “Mui jangorloi ar tumi more togeiba ar tumi tomar pabe moriba. Mui jidu jeim sidu tumi jei no pariba.”
43008022	Senottei Judaiune holak, “The hi monor hujhie moribarloitei hor ni na, haron The hor, ‘Mui jidu jeim sidu tumi jei no pariba’?”
43008023	The tharare holo, “Tumi tolettun, mui ugurottun. Tumi ei songsarottun, mui ei songsarottun noi.
43008024	Senottei mui tomare hongor, tomar pabe tumi moriba. Mui olungge sibie hinottei, tumi judi bischias no goro, tomar pabe tumi moriba.”
43008025	Sebeden thara tare holak, “Tui honna?” Ar Jisu tharare holo, “Mui olungge tomare polimortun duri hoiongge sibie.
43008026	Tomar sombonde mor hobar ar bijier goribar shagor age. Hintu more dipadeiede sibie soittio. Ar mui tartun jieni suinniong, sieni mui songsaro manuschunore hong.”
43008027	The Babo sombonde horte sien thara buji no parilak.
43008028	Sebeden Jisu tharare holo, “Jokke tumi Munischioro Puobuore ojolot tuliba, sokke tumi buji pariba, sibie olungge mui. Tumi hobor peba, mui mortei hitchu no gorong. Hintu Baba more sigeiede doge mui sieni hong.
43008029	More dipadeiede sibie mor loge age. The hujhi oidie hamani mui onsur gorong hinottei, Baba more gai-gai gori phelei no jai.”
43008030	The sei hodagani hode, shagor manjie tare bischias gorilak.
43008031	Sebeden Jisu tare bischias gorsionde Judaiunore holo, “Tumi judi mor hoda doro, sale, tumi jodepode mor sisjio.
43008032	Soittiogan tumi hobor peba ar soittiogane tomare shorei dibo.”
43008033	Thara tare holak, “Ami Abrahamor bongso ar ami haror banidajit no hadi. Tui hingori hos, ‘Tomare uddhar gora obo’?”
43008034	Jisu tharare uttor dilo, “Mui tomare soittio hodagan soittio gori hongor, je pab gore, the pabor banidaji.
43008035	Banidajibuo umor song ghorot no thai. Hintu puobuo umor song thai.
43008036	Senottei Puobuo judi tomare iri de, salen tumi jodepode uddhar oba.
43008037	Mui hobor pang tumi Abrahamor bongso. Hintu tomar ontorot mor hodaganor jaga nei hinottei, tumi more morei pheleibar sor.
43008038	Mui mor Babpuo sidu jieni degkuong sieni hong. Hintu tumi tomar babo sidu jieni degkuo sieni tumi goro.”
43008039	Thara tare holak, “Amar babpuo olode Abraham.” Jisu tharare holo, “Tumi judi Abrahamor puo oda sale, Abrahamor sannie ham gorta.
43008040	Itchiorottun suinniongge soittio hodagan mui tomare holungge sibiere, hintu tumi ikkie more morei pheleibar togor. Abrahame daw edogkie no gore.
43008041	Tumi tomar babo sannie ham gorode.” Sebeden thara Jisure holak, “Ami jarbuo puo noi. Amattun ekkuo Bab age, sibie Itchiorbuo.”
43008042	Senottei Jisu tharare holo, “Itchiorbuo judi tomar Bab odo, tumi more hos pelan. Haron Itchiorottun mui ejchiong. Mui nije-nije no ejong, hintu The more dipadeie.
43008043	Tumi mor hodagan a hittei buji no paror? Tumi mor hodagan suni no paror hinottei.
43008044	Tumi olade tomar bab Diabolatunδ. Tomar babottun goribar mone hoidie sieni tomar goribar mone hoi. Polliettun duri the elode hungoriebuo, ar tar siot soittiogan nei hinottei, the soittioganot thei no pare. The olode gal madie ar galor bab. Senottei, the jokke mijie hoda hoi, sien tar nijottun hoi.
43008045	Mui soittio hodagan hong hinottei, tumi more bischias no goro.
43008046	Tomartun honna more pabi bilinei proman di pariba? Hintu mui judi soittio hodagan hole, a hittei tumi more bischias no goro?
43008047	Je Itchiorbuottun, the Itchioro hoda sune. Tumi Itchiorbuottun noi hinottei, tumi Itchioro hoda no suno.”
43008048	Sebeden Judaiune tare holak, “Tui Samari jad, ar tore bhude peie hoieidie sien thik noi ni?”
43008049	Jisu uttor dilo, “More bhude no pai. Mui mor Babore sorman gorong, hintu tumi more aw-mannio goro.
43008050	Mui hintu sorman hedung no sang. Ek jone more sorman gorer ar bijier gorer.
43008051	Mui tomare soittio hodagan soittio gori hongor, je mor hoda mane, the umor song moranagan degido noi.”
43008052	Sebeden Judaiune tare holak, “Ikkie ami hobor pelong, tore bhude peie. Abrahame mori jeie ar muniguno mori jeion. Ar tui hos, ‘Je mor hoda mane, the motto noi.’
43008053	Tui hi morsiede amar babpuo Abrahamottun bes dangor parapang? Munigun mori jeion. Tore tui hi baneide sas?”
43008054	Jisu uttor dilo, “More mui sorman gortung, mor sormanan hitchu no olun. Tumi mor Babore Itchior bilinei dabi goro, je more sorman gore.
43008055	Tobuio tumi tare hobor no po. Hintu mui tare hobor pang. Mui judi ‘Tare no sinong’ hodung mui tomar dogkie galluo olungun. Hintu mui tare hobor pang ar mui tar hoda manong.
43008056	Tomar bab Abrahame mor dinnuo sebartei shanggadik hujhi oie. Ar the ien deginei hujhi oie.”
43008057	Sebeden Judaiune tare holak, “Tui ejo ponjas bojoro no os. Ar tui horte, tui Abrahamore degkuos?”
43008058	Jisu tharare holo, “Mui tomare soittio hodagan soittio gori hongor, Abrahame jormeibar agottun duri MUI AGONG.”
43008059	Senottei thara tare mela dibartei sil adot lolak, hintu Jisu polleie. The tharar serendi jeinegoi mondirbuottun nigili gelo. Ar ei sedogkie gori the gelogoi.
43009001	Ar Jisu jade-jade ek jon jormortun duri han manus degilo.
43009002	Tar sisjiogune tartun pujor gorilak, “Robbi, har pabo darai ei manuschuo jormortun duri han oie? Tar pabo darai, nahi, tar bab-magunor pabo darai?”
43009003	Jisu uttor dilo, “Manuschuo pab no gore ar tar bab-maguneo pab no goron. Udischuogan olode, Itchiorbuoi ei Manuschuor darai tar hamani degebartei.
43009004	Din thagode more dipadeiede sibier hamani mor gorana dorkar. reid ole, huno jone ham gori no paron.
43009005	Mui songsarot thagode, mui songsaro phor.”
43009006	Jisu sei hodagan honar porendi, the madit sep dilo ar seppoi pheg banelo. Ar the sei phegkan han Manuschuor sogkunot guli dilo.
43009007	Jisu tare holo, “Ja, Siloam pourbuot tor sogkun dogoi.” Siloam ortho “The dipadeie.” Senottei han Manuschuoi jeinei dologoi. Sebeden sogedi deger hinottei the phiri elo.
43009008	Sebeden parallie ar oinnio jone jigune tare agendi han gori degkuon thara holak, “Ete noi ni bojinei bikkie magette?”
43009009	Hoiek jone holak, “Oi, oi ete.” Hintu ek dagie holak, “The ekkere sibier dogkie.” Hintu The holo, “Sibie mui.”
43009010	Senottei thara tare holak, “Tor sogkun hingori gom olak?”
43009011	The uttor dilo, “Ek jon manus tare Jisu honde sibiei pheg banenei mor sogkunot guli die. Ar the more hoie, ‘Siloam pourbuot ja ar tor sogkun dogoi.’ Mui jeinei dhoionggoi ar mor sogkun gom oion.”
43009012	Sebeden thara tare holak, “The hudu age?” the holo, “Mui hobor no pang.”
43009013	Agendi han elode Manus-chuore paralliegune Pharisiguno sidu nejeilak.
43009014	Jisu pheg banenei tar sogkun gom gori dede dinnuo elode Sabbath
43009015	Pharisigune aro tartun pujor gorilak, hingori tar sogkun gom oion. Ar the tharare holo, “The mor sogkunot pheg guli die ar mui mor sogkun dhoineigoi mui degong.”
43009016	Senottei hoiek jon Pharisie holak, “Sei Manuschuo Itchiorottun no eje. The Jireni Dinnuo no palai.” Ek dagie holak, “Pabi manjie hingori edogkie sinno ham gori paribo?” Sebeden thara-thara bhag olak.
43009017	Thara han manuschuore aro holak, “The tor sogkun gom gori die hinottei, tui tare hi mone goros?” the holo, “The ek jon muni.”
43009018	Hintu Judaiune the han elo ar tar sogkun gom oion bili han elode manuschuor bab-magun no dagon song tare bischias no goron.
43009019	Thara tharattun pujor gorilak, “Ibie tomar puo oi ni jibere tumi hode the jormortun duri han? Salen, ikkie the hingori deger?”
43009020	Tar bab-magunor tharare uttor dilak, “Ami hobor pei ibie amar puo. Ami hobor pei the jormortun duri han.
43009021	Hintu ikkie the hingori deger ami hoi no pari. Tar sogkun honna gom gori die ami hobor no pei. Tar jodasto boios oie. Tartun pujor goro. The tar nijor hoda hobo.”
43009022	Judaiunore thara dhoran hinottei tar bab-magune sei hodagani holak. Haron Judaiune honatto begkune mani loionde, je Jisure Kristo bili judi mane, tare synagogottun bar gori die obo.
43009023	Senottei tar bab-magunore holak, “The jodasto boios oie. Tartun pujor goro.”
43009024	Senottei Judaiune han elode manuschuore aro ekbar daginei tare holak, “Itchiorore baini gor. Ami hobor pei sei manuschuo pabi.”
43009025	Sebeden the holo, “The pabi ni na mui hobor no pang. Ekkan jinij mui hobor pang. mui han elung ar ikkie mui degong.”
43009026	Ar thara tare aro holak, “The tore hi gori die? The hingori tor sogkun gom gori die?”
43009027	The tharare uttor dilo, “Mui tomare honatto hoiong ar tumi no suno. A hittei tumi aro sunibar sor? Tumio tar sisjio obar mone hor ni na?”
43009028	Sebeden thara tare thajei geil dilak, “Tui tar sisjio. Hintu ami Mosir sisjio.
43009029	Ami hobor pei Itchiore Mosire hoie. Hintu sei Manuschuo huttun ejchie ami hobor no pei.”
43009030	Manuschuoi tharare holo, “Sien ekkan asarjio hoda. Tumi hobor no po the huttun, tobuio the mor sogkun gom gori die.
43009031	Hintu ami hobor pei Itchiore pabigunor hoda no sune. Hintu je Itchior tobona gore ar tar ischie doge gore, Itchiore sibier hoda sune.
43009032	Songsar sristi oiede siottun duri, jormottun duri han manjior sog ek jone gom gori dede suno no jai.
43009033	Sei Manuschuo judi Itchiorottun no aw daw, tar hitchu goribar hemoda no thelun.”
43009034	Thara tare holak, “Tui jodepode pabor phole jormo oios. Tui amare sigeibar sorte?” Ar thara tare bar gori dilak.
43009035	Pharisigune han manus-chuore bar gori duon bili Jisu suninei, tare lagot peinei holo, “Tui Itchioro Puobuore bischias goros ni?”
43009036	The uttor dilo, “Probu, mui tare bischias jebartei, the honna more ho.”
43009037	Jisu tare holo, “Tui tare degkuos ar, torloi hoda hongorte ibie olungge sibie.”
43009038	Sebeden the holo, “Probu, mui bischias gorong!” Ar the Jisure tobona gorilo.
43009039	Ar Jisu holo, “No degonde sigune debartei, ar jigune degon sigun han obartei mui ei songsarot bijierottei ejchiong.”
43009040	Ar hoiek jon Pharisi Jisur loge elakke sigune sei hodagan suninei, thara holak, “Amio han ni na?”
43009041	Jisu tharare holo, “Tumi han oda, pab no gorilan. Hintu ikkie tumi hor, ‘Ami degi.’ Tumi sien hola hinottei tomar pabpan thelo.
43010001	“Mui tomare soittio hodagan soittio gori hongor, je bera-shagol ghorot duoredi no sominei, giriedi udi oinnio hittendi some, the sur ar daget.
43010002	Hintu je duoredi some, the bera-shagol soreie.
43010003	Duor subidarbuoi tartei duoran huli de. Ar bera-shagolune tar robuo sunon. The tar bera-shagolun nang dorinei dage ar soreibartei nejai.
43010004	The tar nijor bera-shagolun nigileinei, the tharattun akke-akke jai. Ar thara tar robuo hobor pan hinottei, bera-shagolune tar pune-pune jan.
43010005	Thara aw-sin manjior ro hobor no pan hinottei, thara tar pune-pune shobai no jan. Thara tartun dhei jebak.”
43010006	Jisu ei tulona hodagan manuschunore hoi dilo. Hintu tharare the hi hor, thara no bujilak.
43010007	Senottei Jisu tharare aro holo, “Mui tomare soittio hodagan soittio gori hongor. Mui olungge bera-shagoluno girie duoran.
43010008	Mor agendi jigune ejchion, sigun olakke begkun sur ar daget. Hintu bera-shagolune tharar hoda no sunon.
43010009	Mui olungge duoran. Je mor darai somibo, the rokkie obo. The somibo ar nigilibo, ar soribar jagaio pebo.
43010010	Surbuo ebode bana sur goribartei, morei pheleibartei ar nas goribartei. Mui ejchiongge thara jibon pebartei ar sien alajhala gori thara pan para.
43010011	Mui olungge gom bera-shagol soreiebuo. Gom bera-shagol soreiebuoi tar bera-shagolunottei tar poranan de.
43010012	Hintu sagorsiebuo olode bera-shagol soreie noi hinottei bera-shagolun tar noi ar bera-shagolun pheleinei dhei jai. Pebobuoi bera-shagolun hamarai ar settera gore.
43010013	Sagorsiebuoi bedonottei ham gore hinottei the dhei jai. The bera-shagolun gome no sai.
43010014	“Mui olungge gom bera-shagol soreiebuo. Mor bera-shagol mui hobor pang, ar mor bera-shagolune more hobor pan.
43010015	Baba more jeannie gori hobor pai, muio siennie gori Babare hobor pang. Ar bera-shagolunottei mor poranan duong.
43010016	Ei shagolo palluo baraio oinnio bera-shagol mor agon ar sigun mor ana poribo. Thara mor robuo sunibak ar thara ek jon bera-shagol soreiebuor ek palot obakki.
43010017	Haron, mui mor poranan aro phirei loi parong para dim hinottei, Baba more hos pai.
43010018	Mortun huno jone mor poranan hari loi no nejeibak. Hintu mui nije-nije dim. Mor poranan dibaro hemoda age ar aro phirei lobaro mor hemoda age. Ei uguman mor Babottun peiong.”
43010019	Sei hodaganittei Judaiune aro bhag olak.
43010020	Hintu bhaluk jone holak, “Tare bhude peie ar pagole dorsie. Tar hoda tumi a hittei sunor?”
43010021	Ek dagie holak, “Ei hodagani bhude peie manjior hoda noi. Bhude han manjior sog gom gori di paron parapang?”
43010022	Gojei Dena Utchobpan Jerusalem sohorot porilo. Sien olode jarhallie.
43010023	Jisu mondirbuot, Solomono barandat berei-berei age.
43010024	Sebeden Judaiune tar seropala einei tare holak, “Tui amare hodog bilon song mono dugot rageibe? Tui judi Kristo ole, amare pang gori bhangi hona.”
43010025	Jisu tharare uttor dilo, “Mui tomare hoiong daw ar tumi more bischias no goro. Babo nange mui hamani gorong, sienie mor sombonde proman de.
43010026	Mui tomare hoiongge sannie gorinei tumi mor bera-shagol noi. Senottei tumi more bischias no goro.
43010027	Mor bera-shagolune mor robuo sunon ar mui tharare hobor pang. Ar thara mor pune-pune jan.
43010028	Mui tharare ononto jibon dim ar thara umore-umor nas no obak. Huno jone mor adottun tharare hari loi no nejeibak.
43010029	Mor Babpuo sigun more dede sibie begkunottun dangor. Ar sigun mor Babo adottun hari ni parie huno jon nei.
43010030	Baba ar mui olongge ek.”
43010031	Senottei, tare sil mela dibartei Judaiune aro sil adot lolak.
43010032	Jisu tharare holo, “Mui tomare Babattun bhalukkani gom ham degelung. Sei hamanittun hon hamanittei more sil mela diba?”
43010033	Judaiune tare uttor dilak, “Tui gom ham goroschie sienittei ami tore sil mela no dir. Tui Itchior sorjas hinottei, ar manus oineio tui Itchior holas.”
43010034	Jisu tharare holo, “Tomar niomanot legkie agede noi ni, ‘Mui holung, “Tumi olade Itchior” ’?
43010035	Jei Manuschuo idu Itchioro hodagan ejchie, sigunore the Itchior hoie. Ar huno jone Sastro hodagan bhonggo gori no paron.
43010036	Babe nokbhaj gorsiebuo ar songsarot dipadei dede sibiere tumi horte, ‘Tui Itchiorore sorjior,’ haron mui holungge siendoi je ‘Mui olungge Itchioro Puobuo’?
43010037	Mui judi mor Babo ham no gorong, tumi more bischias no gorsio.
43010038	Hintu mui judi gorong, more bischias no gorilieo, mor hamani bischias goro na, jene tumi hobor po ar bischias goro jei Baba mor iot age ar mui Baba siot agong.”
43010039	Senottei thara aro Jisure dhoribartei pod togadon. Hintu The tharar adottun sari gelo.
43010040	The aro Jordan Sora uhule jeinei, Johone akke baptisma gori dede jaganot jeinei sidu thelogoi.
43010041	Ar shagor manus tar sidu jeionde sigune holak, “Johone hitchu sinno ham no gore. Hintu Johone ei Manuschuor sombonde hoiede sieni begkani soittio.”
43010042	Ar shagor manjie siot Jisure bischias gorilak.
43011001	Lazar nange ek jon manus Bethani adamot aw-sugkie elo. Sien olode Meri ar tar bonnuo Martha dagir adaman.
43011002	Sibie olode Probure tumbas tel guli dinei tar sulaniloi Jisur thengani puji dede Meri. Aw-sug elode sibie olode tar bheibuo Lazar.
43011003	Senottei thara di bone Jisure hobor duon, “Probu, shah tui hos paschie sibie aw-sug oie.”
43011004	Hintu Jisu sien suninei holo, “Sei aw-sugkan olode moribartei noi, Itchioror mohima obartei ar sienor darai Itchioro Puobuo mohima oi para.”
43011005	Jisu Marthare, tar bonnuore ar Lazare hos pai.
43011006	Lazare aw-sug oie suninei, the elode jaganot aro di din thelo.
43011007	Sebeden sei porendi Jisu tar sisjiogunore holo, “Judea dejot aro jei.”
43011008	Tar sisjiogune tare holak, “Robbi, bes diri no ol, Judaiune tore sil mela dibar togeion, tui aro sidu jebede?”
43011009	Jisu uttor dilo, “Baro ghonta dino phor thaidie noi ni? Je dinot berai, the ei songsaro phoran dege hinottei, the azar no hai.
43011010	Hintu je reidot berai, tar nijor phor nei hinottei the azar hai.”
43011011	Jisu sei hodagan honar porendi, the tharare holo, “Amar somarsie Lazare ghum jar. Hintu mui tare jagei tulibartei jeim.”
43011012	Sebeden tar sisjiogune tare holak, “Probu, the judi ghum jai, the gom obo.”
43011013	Lazare morsiede sombonde Jisu hoie, hintu thara bujilakke the jodepode ghum jar.
43011014	Senottei Jisu tharare pang gori bhangi holo, “Lazare morsie.
43011015	Tumi bischias goro para, mui siot no elung hinottei mui tomartei hujhi. Jei ami tar sidu jei.”
43011016	Sebeden Thoma, Zama honde sibiei, tar somarsie sisjio-gunore holo, “Ami tar somare moribartei amio jei.”
43011017	Sebeden jokkene Jisu sidu lungilogoi, Lazare sojan holat honatto ser din oie bili Jisu hobor pelo.
43011018	Bethani adaman olode Jerusalem sohoro hai. Perai di meilδ durot obode ai.
43011019	Meri ar Marthare tharar bheibuo morsiede sombonde bujeibartei ejchionde siguno loge balukjon Judai manus mijeilakki.
43011020	Jisu ejer bili suninei, Martha jeinei tarloi egottor ologoi. Hintu Meri ghorot thelo.
43011021	Sebeden Martha Jisure holo, “Probu, tui judi thede, mor bheibuo no morilun.
43011022	Hintu mui hobor pang ikkunuio Itchiorottun tui jien magos sien Itchiore tore dibo.”
43011023	Jisu tare holo, “Tor bheibuo aro jiei udibo.”
43011024	Martha Jisure holo, “Mui hobor pang ses dinnuot jiei uduonaganot the aro jiei udibo.”
43011025	Jisu tare holo, “Mui jiei uduonagan ar poranan. Je more bischias gore, the morilieio bajibo.
43011026	Je jeda age ar more bischias gore, the huno din no moribo. Tui ien bischias goros ni?”
43011027	Martha tare holo, “Oi daw Probu, mui bischias gorong tui olede Kristo. Tui olede Itchioro Puobuo songsarot ebar elode sibie.”
43011028	Martha sei hodagan honar porendi the gelogoi. The tar bonnuo Merire juj gori daginei tare holo, “Guruthagurbuo ejchie ar the tore dager.”
43011029	Sien Meri sunineio, the bhujut gori udi tar sidu gelo.
43011030	Sei lokkene Jisu adamanot no lungegi. The Martha loi lak pa-pi oionde jaganot ejo song age.
43011031	Judaiune Meri somot ghoro bidirie elak. Thara tare bujodon. Meri bhujut gori udinei jade thara degkion hinottei thara tar pune-pune gelak. Thara holak, “The sojan holat hanibarloittei sidu jar.”
43011032	Meri Jisu elode jaganot lungilogi. The Jisure deginei the tar thengot salam gori porinei holo, “Probu, tui judi thede, mor bheibuo no morilun.”
43011033	Senottei Jisu tare gujhi-gujhi hande deginei ar tar loge ejchionde Judaiunore gujhi-gujhi hande deginei bo nijes iri dilo.
43011034	Sebeden the holo, “Tare hudu gareiogoi?” Thara tare holak, “Probu, ai sagi.”
43011035	Jisu hanilo.
43011036	Senottei Judaiune holak, “Sawh dei, Jisu tare hodog sitpurer!”
43011037	Hintu tharattun hoiek jone holak, “Ei Manuschuottun han manjior sog gom gori dibar hemoda age. Ei Manuschuoreo no more para gori parilunde noi ni?”
43011038	Sebeden Jisu aro ek bar bo nijes iri dinei sidie shalanot gelo. Sien olode ekkuo gat. Ekkuo silloi sien nadi thuo oie.
43011039	Jisu holo, “Silluo jagattun laro.” Martha, morsiede sibier bonnuoi tare holo, “Probu, the ser din olo morsiede, ikkunu pojabas obo.”
43011040	Jisu tare holo, “Mui tore hongor tui judi bischias goros, tui Itchioro mohimagan debe, mui tore no hong ni na?”
43011041	Sebeden mora Manuschuo gareionde siottun thara silluo lareilak. Jisu ujonnie seinei holo, “Oh Ba, tui mor hoda suinnios hinottei mui tore donniobad duongor.
43011042	Mui hobor pang tui onsur mor hoda sunos. Hintu mor seropala thiei agonde manuschunottei mui ien holung, tui more dipadeos bili thara bischias jan para.”
43011043	Sei hodagani honar porendi, Jisu birat ro gori holo, “Lazar, nigili ai!”
43011044	Sebeden morsiede sibier, Lazaror adot thengot mora manjior habor bannie gori ar tar muonot mora manjior habor bereie bade nigili elo. Jisu tharare holo, “Bereieni huei dinei ja bajei duo.”
43011045	Balukjon Judai manus Meri sidu jeionde sigune Jisu gorsiede sieni deginei, thara Jisure bischias gorilak.
43011046	Hintu tharattun hoiek jon Pharisiguno sidu jeinei Jisu gorsiede sieni tharare holakkoi.
43011047	Senottei rajguruthagurune ar Pharisigune Senhedrino temmangot bojinei huobula gorton, “Ami hi goribong? Ei manuschuoi daw bhalukkani amok ham gorilo.
43011048	Ami judi goribartei di, the onsur goribuo ar beg manuschune tare bischias goribak. Ar Romor manuschune einei amar podobigani ar amar jadtuo hari lobakki.”
43011049	Sebeden tharattun ek jon, Kaiapha, sei bojorot moharajguruthagur elode sibiei tharare holo, “Tumi hitchu hobor no po.
43011050	Tumi amattei bhabi no sawh de, goda jadtuo nas obode darane, manuschunottei ek jon moranagan gom.”
43011051	Sien the tar nijottun no hoi. Hintu sei bojor the moharajguruthagur elo hinottei the muni dogkie gori agami hoidilode, Jisu tharar jadtuo azai moribo.
43011052	Bana sei jadtuottei noi, hintu settera oie Itchioro puogun the begkun ek dolot thubeibartei the moribo.
43011053	Ar sei dinnuottun duri Jisure morei pheleibartei temmangot thara thik gorilak.
43011054	Senottei Jisu Judaiunor loge hulomela gori berei no parilo ar. Hintu the siottun jeinei murobomi hure ekkan sohor Ephraim honde siot tar sisjiogun somot rologoi.
43011055	Sei lokkene Judaiunor Rokkie Utchobo dinnuo hai ejchie. Rokkie Utchobo agendi nije-nije sudduo-shanggo obartei shagor manus adamortun Jerusalem sohor song jeion.
43011056	Thara Jisure togadon. Mondirbuot thara thiei thagke huobula gorton, “Tumi hi mone goro? The utchobot ebo ni?”
43011057	Rajguruthagurune ar Pharisigune ugum duonde jei Jisu hudu age judi huno jone hobor phele janadok, thara tare dhori parondoi para.
43012001	Sebeden Rokkie Utchobor shoi din agendi, Jisu Bethani adamot jeie. Morsiede sibiere the morattun jiei tulliede Lazare siot elo.
43012002	Senottei, thara Jisuttei bellie ek saj bhat jugol gorsion. Martha lobiot gorer, hintu Lazareio tharar somare Jisur loge bhat poiot bojsie.
43012003	Sebeden Meri mongga ek sijiri dami hati ador tel aninei, Jisur thenganit guli dilogi. Tar sulaniloi Jisur thengani puji dilo. Telo tumbaschandoi ghoro bidirie gonggolar.
43012004	Sebeden Jisur ek jon sisjio Simonor puobuo, Juda Iskariode, tare dhora bajei dibode sibiei holo,
43012005	“Ei tumbas telan tin shot denariδ loi bejinei gorib dugkiere a hittei die no gelo?”
43012006	Gorib dugkiegunore sit purinei the ei hodagan no hor. Hintu the sur hinottei ar tengaδ baksubuo tar siot elo ar tenga baksubuot tenga bhorei thole, the loi hinottei the sei hodagan hor.
43012007	Hintu Jisu holo, “Miliebuore the jien gorto sat goribar duo. The ei telan more garebartei rageiede.
43012008	Haron goribpun daw tomar loge onsur agon. Hintu tumi more onsur no peba.”
43012009	Sebeden shagor Judai manuschune Jisu siot age bili hobor pelak ar thara sidu gelak. Hintu bana Jisure sebartei thara no jan hintu morattun jiei tulliede Lazaroreio sebartei thara jeion.
43012010	Senottei, rajguruthagurune Lazaroreio morei pheleibartei thara temmang gorsion.
43012011	Haronan olode Lazaror darai shagor Judai manus jeiondoi ar thara Jisure bischias gora horilak. tulliede lokkene manuschun tar loge elakke sigune shakki duon.
43012012	Tar hellie, birat ek jhag utchobot jeie manus, Jisu Jerusalem sohorot ejer bili thara suninei ejchuon.
43012013	Thara bollie somot tal gajo pada loinei tarloi egottor obarloittei thara gelak ar thara joi-jogar parton, “Hossana! Israelor Rajabuo ‘PROBUR nange ejette sibie donniobad gori thok!’ ”
43012014	Sebeden Jisu, ekkuo gadha shawh peinei sibier pidit udilo. Sien Sastrot legkie doge olo,
43012015	“Oh Zaionor jhibuo, tui no dores. Sah, tor Rajabuo gadha shawh pidit gori ejer.”
43012016	Polim tar sisjiogune sieni buji no paron. Hintu jokkene Jisure mohima gora oie, sebeden tharar monot udilode, sieni tar sombonde Sastrot lega oie. Ar thara tare sieni gorsion.
43012017	Senottei Jisu Lazarore daginei sidie shalottun morattun jiei tulliede lokkene manuschun tar loge elakke sigune shakki duon.
43012018	Sienotteio manuschune sei amok haman The gorsie suninei, tarloi egottor olakki.
43012019	Senottei Pharisigune thara-thara huobula gorton, “Sawh dei, tumi hitchu shadi no paror. Sawh, goda songsaro manuschun tar loge jadondoi.”
43012020	Utchobot, tobona goribartei jeionde sigunor loge hoi ek jon Grik manus elak.
43012021	Senottei, sigune Galili dejottun Bethsaida hullie Philibo sidu jeinei tare hujoli gori holak, “Babu, amar Jisure sebar mone hor.”
43012022	Philibe jeinei Andriore hologoi. Sebeden Andrioloi Philibe Jisure holakkoi.
43012023	Hintu Jisu tharare holo, “Munischioro Puobuore mohima gora obode somoibuo ejchie.
43012024	Mui tomare soittio hodagan soittio gori hongor, ekkuo gom judi madit porinei mori no gele ekkuo gori thai. Hintu judi mori jai, sibiei shagor utponno gore.
43012025	Je tar poranan hos pai, the areibo. Ar je tar poranan ei songsarot hos no pai, the ononto jibonottei rokkie obo.
43012026	Je mor ham gore the mor loge ejok. Ar mui jidu theim mor sagorsiebuoi sidu thebogoi. Je mor ham gore, mor Babe tare sorman goribuo.
43012027	“Ikkie mor monan jagulug olo, ar mui hi hom? ‘Oh Ba, more ei bibodottun uddhar gor’? Hintu, iennottei na mui ei hennuot ejchiongge.
43012028	Oh Ba, tor nangan mohima gor.” Sebeden sorgottun ekkuo sobdo einei hologi, “Mui ien mohima gorsiong ar aro mui mohima gorim.”
43012029	Manuschune siot thiei elak ar sien suninei, thara holakke debabuoi gujurilo. Ek dagie holak, “Ekkuo sorgo-dude tarloi hoda holo.”
43012030	Jisu tharare holo, “Sobdobuo mortei no eje, hintu tomartei ejchie.
43012031	Ikkie somoibuo olode ei songsaro bijierottei. Ikkie ei songsaro rajabuore bar gori die obo.
43012032	Hintu more judi pittimittun tuli neja oi, mor idu beg manuschunore mui nije thani lom.”
43012033	The hingori moribo sei sombonde the agami holo.
43012034	Manuschune tare holak, “Niomo boibuottun ami suinnei, Kristo umore-umor thebo. Sale, tui hingori hor, ‘Munischioro Puobuore tuli neja obo’? Honna sei Munischioro Puobuo?”
43012035	Sebeden Jisu tharare holo, “A hanekkon song tomar loge phoran age. Andharan no eje para phoran thagode phoranot bero. Je andharot berai, the hudu jar the hobor no pai.
43012036	Tomar phor thagode, phoranore bischias goro, phoranor puogun oi paro para.” Jisu sieni honar porendi, the siottun jeinei tharattun pollei rologoi.
43012037	Judio the tharar mujungot bhalukkani amok ham gorilieo, thara tare bischias no goron.
43012038	Siendoi muni Isaia hoiede hi ghodibo sien puron olo, “Probu, honna amar hoboran bischias gorsie? Har idu PROBUR ado bolan dega diegi?”
43012039	Sienottei na thara bischias gori no paron, haron sien aro Isaia hoie,
43012040	“Tharar sogkunedi no degon para, the tharar sogkun han gori di die. Tharar akkolani loi buji no paron para, the tharar akkolani han gori di die. Siennie no ole, thara tharar akkolani phireibak ar mui tharare gom gori di dim.”
43012041	Purbe muni Isaia Probur mohimagan deginei sieni the hoinei ar tar sombonde hoie.
43012042	Tobuio, murubbittunio bhaluk jone Jisure bischias gorsion. Hintu Pharisigunottei tharare synagogottun nigilei duon bilinei thara dore haam no haan.
43012043	Thara olakke Itchiore tharare baini goranattun bes manjie tharare baini goranagan thara gom pan.
43012044	Sebeden Jisu jogar parinei holo, “Je more bischias gore, the more bischias no gore, hintu more dipadeide sibiere bischias gorsie.
43012045	Je more sai, the more dipadeiede sibiere saidie dogkie.
43012046	Mui songsarot phoro dogkie gori ejchiong. Senottei je more bischias gore, the andharot no thebo.
43012047	Je mor hoda suninei bischias no gore, mui tare duji no banem. Haron songsaran duji banebartei mui no ejong. Hintu songsaran uddhar goribartei mui ejchiong.
43012048	Je more no mane ar mor hoda no dhore tare bijier gorie ek jon age. Mui holungge hodagane tare sejo dinnuot bijierot pheleibo.
43012049	Haron mui mor nijottun no hong. Hintu more dipadeiede Babpuoi mui hi hom ar hingori hom The more ugum die.
43012050	Ar mui hobor pang, tar uguman olode ononto jibon. Senottei Baba more jeannie gori hobartei hoie, siennie gori mui hong.”
43013001	Rokkie Utchobo agendi, Jisu hobor pelode the ei songsaran phelei jeinei Babo sidu jebode tar somoibuo lungiegi. Ei songsarot agonde tar nijor manuschunore the hos pedo ar thum song The hos peie.
43013002	Thara bellie saschuo hadon. Simonor puo Juda Iskariodor monot Diabolaδ Jisure dhora bajei dibartei honatto mone ho bajei die.
43013003	Jisu hobor peie Babe begkani tar adot gojei die. The hobor pai the Itchiorottun ejchie ar the Itchioro sidu jebo.
43013004	Jisu sieni begkani hobor peinei, bhat poiottun udi, tar haborani ek huredi thoinei ekkan tobollie hani, tar homorbuot bereilo.
43013005	Sebeden, the ekkuo gabalat pani dalilo. The tar sisjioguno thengani dhoi die arambo gorilo. Ar tar homorot bainniede thoillie hanigandoi thengani puji dilo.
43013006	Siennie gori Jisu Simon Pitoro idu elo. Pitore tare holo, “Probu, tui mor thengani dhoi dibede parapang?”
43013007	Jisu tare uttor dilo, “Mui hi gorongor tui ikkie hobor no pebe. Tui porendi hobor pebe.”
43013008	Pitore tare holo, “Tui mor thengani huno din dhoi no dis.” Jisu tare holo, “Mui judi tore dhoi no duong, tui mortun bhag no pebe.”
43013009	Simon Pitore tare holo, “Probu, siennie ole, bana mor thengani noi, mor adtani ar siriebuoio dhoide.”
43013010	Jisu tare holo, “Je ghattie, tar thengani bade ar hitchu dhobar no lage, the puro poriskar. Tumi poriskar daw, hintu tumi begkun poriskar noi.”
43013011	Honna tare dhora bajei dibo, the hobor pai hinottei the hoie, “Tumi begkun poriskar noi.”
43013012	Sebeden the tharar thengani dhoi denar porendi, the tar haborani urilo ar bojinei tharare holo, “Mui tomare hi goridilung tumi bujor ni?
43013013	Tumi more Guruthagur ar Probu dago, sien thik, haron mui sibie oi.
43013014	Mui, tomar Probu ar Guruthagurbuoi judi tomare theng dhoi duong, tumio theng dhoi diedi gorana osit.
43013015	Mui tomare gori dilungge dogkie gori tumio goribartei mui tomare ekkan tulona dilung.
43013016	Mui tomare soittio hodagan soittio gori hongor, ek jon banidaji tar girojchuottun dangor noi. Ek jon hoborbuo tare dipadeibuottun hono dangor noi.
43013017	Judi tumi ei hodagani hobor peinei goro, tumi hoballie.
43013018	“Mui tomar begkunor hoda no hongor. Mui jigunore bei tulliong sigunore mui sinong. Mui tharare bei tulliongge Sastro hodagan puron obartei, ‘Je mor pidie hai, the mor ugure theng alok gorsie.’
43013019	Ien ghodi no jade, ikkie mui tomare akke duri hongor. Jokke ien ghodi jebo, tumi bischias goro para, mui olungge sibie.
43013020	Mui tomare soittio hodagan soittio gori hongor, mui padangge sibiere je gojhiloi the more gojhiloi ar je more gojhiloi the more dipadeide sibiereio gojhiloi.”
43013021	Jisu sei hodagani hoinei tar monan jagulug olo. The pang gori bhangi holo, “Mui tomare soittio hodagan soittio gori hongor, tomartun ek jone more dhora bajei dibo.”
43013022	Sebeden tar sisjiogune the hare hor udis no peinei thara-thara sa-si gorton.
43013023	Hintu tar ek jon sisjio Jisur buguot abuji elo. Tare Jisu hos pedo.
43013024	Simon Pitore Sibiere ijiriedi Jisu hare hor, pujor gora bajei dilo.
43013025	Sebeden Jisur buguot abuji agede sisjiobuoi tare holo, “Probu, the honna?”
43013026	Jisu tare uttor dilo, “Hodorabuot pidie hottagan bureinei mui jare dim, ei sibie sie.” Sebeden pidie hottagan bureinei the Simonor puo Juda Iskariodore dilo.
43013027	Juda Iskariode pidie hottagan lonar porendi, tar ontorot Soitan somilo. Sebeden Jisu tare holo, “Tui hi goribe jhadi gor.”
43013028	Hintu tebilo hure agonde sigunottun huno jone Jisu sei hodagan tare hittei holo buji no parilak.
43013029	Haron hoiek jone bhabilakke, Juda adot tengaδ baksubuo ragai hinottei Jisu tare hor, “Utchobo lokkene amar hi-hi lage hindoi,” bah, goribpunore hi-hi dibar age degoi.
43013030	The pidie hottagan loieo jeiegoi. Sokkene reid oie.
43013031	Juda janar porendi, Jisu holo, “Ikkie Munischioro Puobuore mohima gora oie, ar tar darai Itchiorbuoreoio mohima gora oie.
43013032	Itchiorbuore judi tar darai mohima gora oi, Itchioreo tare tar nijor darai jogon-togon mohima goribuo.
43013033	Oh bheilog, mui tomar loge a hanekkon gori theimbe. Tumi more togeiba. Judaiunore mui hoiongge dogkie gori, ikkie mui tomare hongor, ‘Mui jidu jeim tumi sidu jei no pariba.’
43013034	Mui tomare ekkan nuo ugum dim. Tumi hos pa-pi gorsio. Mui tomare hos peiongge dogkie gori, tumio hos pa-pi gorsio.
43013035	Tumi judi hos pa-pi goro, salen tumi mor sisjio bili bege hobor pebak.”
43013036	Simon Pitore tare holo, “Probu, tui hudu jebe?” Jisu tare uttor dilo, “Mui jeimbe sidu tui ikkie mor loge jei no paribie. Hintu jeredi tui mor loge jei paribie.”
43013037	Pitore tare holo, “Probu, ikkie a hittei mui Tor loge jei no parim? Mui Tortei mor poranano dim.”
43013038	Jisu tare uttor dilo, “Tui mortei tor poranan hamakkai dibe daw? Mui tore soittio hodagan soittio gori hongor, jedogkon na tui more tin bar bharebe sedogkon song radai dag no haribak.
43014001	“Tomar monani jagulug no ok. Itchiorore bischias goro, moreio bischias goro.
43014002	Mor Babo ghorot shagor thebar jaga age. Judi no thedo, mui tomare holungun. Mui tomartei ekkan jaga jugolei dibar jangor.
43014003	Mui judi jang, ar tomartei ekkan jaga jugolei duonggoi, mui aro tomare hoja eimboi, mui theimboidie siot tumio thei parogoi para.
43014004	Mui hudu jeim tumi hobor po, podtanio hobor po.”
43014005	Thoma Jisure holo, “Probu, tui hudu jor ami hobor no pei, a hingori podtan hobor pebong?”
43014006	Jisu tare holo, “Mui podtan, soittiogan ar jibonan. Mor darai no ole, huno jon Babo sidu jei no paribak.
43014007	Tumi judi more hobor po, mor Baboreo hobor peio. Ar ikkiettun duri tumi tare hobor po ar tare degkuo.”
43014008	Philibe tare holo, “Probu, Babpuo amare degei de. Ien amar jodasto.”
43014009	Jisu tare holo, “Philip, mui tomar loge edok bilon song agong, tobuio tui more hobor no pas? Je more degkie, the Babare degkie. A hittei tui hor, ‘Babpuo amare dega’?
43014010	Mui Baba siot agong ar Baba mor iot age bili tui bischias no goros ni na? Mui tomare hongge hodagani mor nijottun noi. Hintu mor idu thaidie Babe jobei dide.
43014011	Mui Baba siot agong ar Baba mor iot age bili tumi bischias goro. Anole, mor hamanittei ole more bischias goro na.
43014012	Mui tomare soittio hodagan soittio gori hongor, je more bischias gore, theio mui gorongge hamani goribuo. Mui Baba sidu jeim hinottei, the sei hamanittun bes dangor ham goribuo.
43014013	Tumi mor nange jien mago sien mui gori dim, jene Puobuor iot Babe mohima oi.
43014014	Mor nange tumi jien mago, sien mui gori dim.
43014015	“Tumi judi more hos po, mor ugumani mannio.
43014016	Mui Babottun hujoli gori magi dim ar the tomare aro ek jon Boldie tomar loge umore-umor thebartei dibo.
43014017	Boldiebuo olode soittior Apta. Songsaro manuschune tare no degon ar no sinon hinottei thara, tare loi no paron. Hintu The tomar loge age ar tomar bidirie thebo hinottei tumi tare hobor po.
43014018	Mui tomare bab-ma mora shawh dogkie gori phelei no jeim. Mui tomar idu eimboi.
43014019	Hanekkonottei songsaro manuschune more no debak ar. Hintu tumi more deba. Mui baji agong hinottei tumio baji theba.
43014020	Sei dinnuot tumi hobor peba, mui Baba siot agong ar tumi mor iot ago ar mui tomar loge agong.
43014021	Jar iot mor ugumani age ar the sieni mane, the more hos pai. Je more hos pai, tare mor Babe hos pebo. Mui tare hos peim ar tar idu mui nije-nije azil ombi.”
43014022	Juda (Iskariode noi) tare holo, “Probu, tui nije-nije songsaro manuschuno idu azil no oie gori hingori amar idu azil obegi?”
43014023	Jisu tare uttor dilo, “Je more hos pai the mor hoda manibo. Mor Babe tare hos pebo ar ami tar idu ebong. Ami tar loge thebonggi.
43014024	Je more hos no pai, the mor hoda no mane. Tumi sunotte hodagani mor hoda noi, ieni olode more dipadeiede Babor hoda.
43014025	“Mui tomar loge agongge lokkene sei hodagani mui tomare holung.
43014026	Hintu mor nange Boldiebuo Baba dipadeibo ar sibie olode Pobitro Aptabuo. The tomare begkani sigeibogi ar mui tomare hoiongge beg hodagani the tomare idot tuli dibogi.
43014027	“Mui tomare mor shantigan phelei di jeim. Songsare dede shantigano dogkie shanti mui tomare no dim. Tomar ontorani nije-nije jagulug no ok, noio dorok.
43014028	Mui tomare hode tumi suinnio, ‘Mui jangorloi ar mui tomar idu phiri eimboi.’ ‘Mui Baba sidu jeim’ sien holung hinottei tumi judi more hos pei thago, tumi hujhi oba. Haron mor Baba mortun bes dangor.
43014029	Ikkie sien ghodibar agendi, mui tomare holung, sien ghodi gele tumi more bischias goro para.
43014030	Ei songsaro rajabuo ejer hinottei, mui tomare bes hodung noi ar. Haron mor iot tar hitchu odhihar bhag pebar nei.
43014031	Hintu songsaro manuschune hobor padok, mui Babore hos pang ar Babe more ugum dede doge mui gorong. Uduo, iottun jogoi.
43015001	“Mui ajol angguro ludigan. Mor Baba olode bagano girojchuo.
43015002	Mor iot jei dhelagunot gulo no dhoron, sigun the habi phelei de. Gulo dhoronde dhelagun aro bes gori gulo doribartei the hajei dide.
43015003	Mui tomare hoiongge hodaganiloi tumi honatto poriskar oio.
43015004	Tumi mor iot thago ar mui tomar iot theim. Dhelagun judi ludiganot ek tade no thele, gulo dori no paron. Thik sedogkie gori tumio judi mor iot no thele nije-nije phol di no pariba.
43015005	Mui angguro ludigan. Tumi olade dhelagun. Tumi mui sara hitchu gori no paro hinottei, je mor iot thebo mui tar iot theim ar the shagor phol dibo.
43015006	Je mor iot no thai, tare dhela dogkie gori habi phelei die obo. Sien shugei jebo ar hureinei agunot phelei dinei puri pela obo.
43015007	Tumi judi mor iot thago, mor hodagano tomar iot thebo. Sebeden tumi jien mago sien tomartei goridie obo.
43015008	Tumi judi phol di parilie sienit mor Baba mohima obo. Sebeden tumi mor sisjio oba.
43015009	“Baba more hos paidie dogkie muio tomare hos pang. Mor hospanaganot thago.
43015010	Mui Baba ugumani manniong ar tar hospanaganot thang. Thik sedogkie gori, tumi judi mor ugumani mano, tumi mor hospanaganot theba.
43015011	Mor hujhigan tomar iot thebartei, mui ei hodagani tomare holung. Ar tomar hujhigan pureibartei mui sieni holung.
43015012	Ien olode mor uguman, mui tomare hos peiongge dogkie gori tumio hos pa-pi gorsio.
43015013	Ienottun para haror dangor hospana nei ar, ek jone tar bondhuttei jibon dena.
43015014	Tumi judi mui tomare ugum duongge sieni goro, salen, tumi mor bondhu.
43015015	“Mui tomare sagorsie no hom ar. Haron sagorsiebuoi tar girojchuoi hi gorer hobor no pai. Hintu mui tomare bondhu dagilung. Haron mor Babottun mui jieni sunong, mui tomare hong.
43015016	Tumi more bei no tulo, hintu mui tomare bei tulliong. Tumi jeinei phol di paribartei ar tomar pholluo tigibartei mui tomare bei tulliong ar thik gorsiong. Senottei, mor nange tumi Babattun jien mago, the sien tomare dibo.
43015017	Tumi hos pa-pi goribartei mui sieni tomare holung.
43015018	“Songsaro manuschune judi tomare insie goron, salen, tumi hobor peio, thara tomare insie no gorte, more akke insie gorsion.
43015019	Tumi judi songsaro manus oda, songsare tomare nijor bili hos pelun. Hintu mui tomare bei tulliong hinottei, tumi songsaro manus noi. Senottei, songsaro manjie tomare insie goron.
43015020	Mui tomare hoiongge hodagan monot rageio, ‘Bani dajibuoi tar girojchuottun dangor noi.’ Thara judi more uttiesar gorilie, tomareo uttiesar goribak. Thara judi mor hoda manidak, tomar hodaio manilakkun.
43015021	Hintu mor nanganottei thara sieni begkani tomare goribak. Haron more honna dipadeie thara hobor no pan.
43015022	Mui judi no edung ar tharare no hodunggi, tharar pab no thelun. Hintu ikkie tharar pabottei sholona dibar nei.
43015023	Je more bis dege, the mor Babareo bis dege.
43015024	Huno jone no goronde hamani mui judi thara siot gortung, tharar pab no thelun. Hintu ikkie thara amok hamani degineo thara more ar Babare hos no pan.
43015025	Hintu sien ghodi gelode jene tharar niomo boibuot legkiede sien puron obartei, ‘Thara more magana-magana bis degon.’
43015026	Hintu Boldiebuoi ele, the mor hoda hoi dibogi. Sibie olode Babattun Boldie tomare mui dipadembe sibie. The olode Babottun nigilede soittior Aptabuo.
43015027	Polliettun duri tumi mor loge ela hinottei, tumio mor hoda hoi duo.
43016001	“Tomar bischiaschan phelei no duo para sieni mui tomare holung.
43016002	Thara tomare synagogottun bar gori dibag. Somoibuo ejer, sekke je tomare morei pelai, the Itchiorottei dhormo ham gorer bili mone goribuo.
43016003	Thara more ar Babareo hobor no pan hinottei thara tomare sieni goribak.
43016004	Mui ieni tomare holungge jokke somoibuo ebo, sokke mui tomare sieni hoiong bili tumi idot tulo para. Mui tomar loge elung hinottei akke duri ei hodagani mui tomare no hong.
43016005	“Ikkie mui tar sidu jangor. Hintu tomartun huno jone pujor no gorila, ‘Tui hudu jor?’
43016006	Mui sei hodagani holung hinottei tomar mono dug olo.
43016007	Hintu mui tomare soittio hodagan hongor. Mui gelegoi tomartei gom obo. Mui no gele, Boldiebuo tomar idu no ebo. Hintu mui judi jang, mui tare tomar idu di padeim.
43016008	The ele, songsaro manuschunore pabo sombonde, dharmigo sombonde ar bijiero sombonde bujei dibogi.
43016009	Thara more bischias no goron hinottei, the pabo sombonde bujei dibogi.
43016010	Mui Baba sidu jeim ar tumi more no deba ar hinottei, the dharmigo sombonde bujei dibogi.
43016011	Ei songsaro rajabuore dujot phellie hinottei, the bijiero sombonde bujei dibogi.
43016012	“Mor ebosong tomare hobar shagor age, ikkie tumi sieniloi no pariba.
43016013	Hintu jokke soittior Aptabuo ebo, sokke the tomare beg soittioganit nejeibo. The nijottun hoda no hobo hinottei the jien sune sien The hobo ar ebode sieni janei dibogi.
43016014	Jieni mor sieni the ninei tomare janei dibogi hinottei, the more mohima goribuo.
43016015	Jieni Babar sieni begkani mor. Senottei mui holung, jieni mor sieni the ninei tomare janei dibogi.
43016016	“Mui Baba sidu jeim hinottei tumi more hanekkon porendi no deba. Aro hanekkon porendi tumi more deba.”
43016017	Sebeden hoiek jon sisjioi thara-thara huobula gorton, “The amare hi hor ar sienir ortho hi, ‘Hanekkon porendi tumi more no deba, ar aro hanekkon porendi tumi more deba,’ ar ‘Mui Baba sidu jeim’?”
43016018	Senottei thara holak, “Sien The hi hor, ‘Hanekkon porendi’? The hi hor ami no bujir.”
43016019	Sebeden thara tartun pujor goribar mone hor bili Jisu hobor peinei, the tharare holo, “Mui holungge siendoi tumi-tumi pujor gora-gori gorotte, ‘Hanekkon porendi tumi more no deba, ar aro hanekkon porendi tumi more deba’?
43016020	Mui tomare soittio hodagan soittio gori hongor, tumi gujhi-gujhi haniba. Hintu songsaro manuschune hujhi obak. Tomar mono dug obo, hintu tomar mono dugkan mono hujhit jebo.
43016021	Milier guro ode somoibuo ele, monot dug on hintu gurobuo onar porendi hostogani monot no ragan ar. Haron songsarot ekkuo guro jormo oie hinottei.
43016022	Tomar ikkie monot dug age hintu mui tomarloi aro egottor ombi. Sokkene tomar monani hujhi obo ar tomar hujhigan huno jone hariloi no paribak.
43016023	Sei lokkene tumi mortun hitchu no magiba. Mui tomare soittio hodagan soittio gori hongor, tumi Babattun mor nange jien mago, the sien dibo.
43016024	Ejosong mor nange tumi hitchu no mago. Mago, tumi puro gori hujhi aw para peba.
43016025	“Tomare mui sieni tulona hodadi hoi dilung. Hintu somoibuo ejer, sokkene mui tomare tulona hodadi no hom ar. Hintu Babar sombonde mui tomare pang gori bhangi hom.
43016026	Sei lokkene tumi mor nange magiba. Mui tomartei Babattun bor magi dim bili mui tomare no hongor.
43016027	Tumi more hos peio ar mui Itchiorottun ejchiong bili bischias gorsio hinottei Baba The nije tomare hos pai.
43016028	Mui Babattun songsarot ejchiong. Aro songsaran phelei jei mui Baba sidu jeim.”
43016029	Tar sisjiogune tare holak, “Shah, ikkie daw tui pang gori bhangi hole. Tui tulona hoda no hos.
43016030	Ikkie ami hobor pelong, tui begkani hobor pas, ar tor huno jonottun pujor goribar dorkar no lage. Siendoi ami bischias goridie tui Itchiorottun ejchios.”
43016031	Jisu tharare holo, “Ikkie tumi bischias gela ni?
43016032	Sawh, somoibuo ejer ar honatto ejchie. Sei lokkene tumi begkune nijor nijor jagat settera oba. Tumi more gai-gai gori phelei jeba. Hintu Baba mor loge age hinottei mui gai-gai noi.
43016033	Mor iot tumi shanti pebartei sieni mui tomare holung. Songsarot tomar hosto age. Hintu sahoj goro. Mui songsaran jittuong.”
43017001	Jisu sieni hoinei, ujonnie seinei holo, “Oh Ba, somoibuo ejchie. Tor Puobuore mohima gor, tor Puobuoio tore mohima gore para.
43017002	Tui tare beg manuschunor ugure odhihar duoschie dogkie gori, tui tare duoschie beg manuschunore ononto jibon de.
43017003	Ek mattro tui soittio Itchior ar tui dipadeoschie Jisu Kristore thara hobor panagan olode ononto jibon.
43017004	Mui tore pittimit mohima gorilung. Tui more goribar duoschie haman gori phureilung.
43017005	Oh Ba, ikkie tor mujungot more oborugkan de. Songsaran sristi no ode mui tor loge elungge lokkene elode oborugkandoi more oborug gor.
43017006	“Songsaranottun tui more duoschie manuschuno idu mui tor nangan janei dilung. Thara tor manus elak ar sigun begkun tui more duos. Thara tor hoda manilak.
43017007	Tui more jieni-jieni duos, sieni begkani tortun bili thara hobor pelak.
43017008	Haron tui more je hodagani tharare hobartei duos, mui sieni tharare hoi duong. Ar thara sei hodagani gojhi loion. Mui tortun ejchiong bili thara jodepode gori hobor pelak ar tui more dipadeos bilio thara bischias gelak.
43017009	Tui more duoschie manuschun tor manus hinottei mui tharattei bor magongor. Hintu mui songsaro manuschunottei bor no magongor.
43017010	Jieni mor sieni begkani tor. Sienittei mui tharar iot mohima olung.
43017011	Mui songsarot no theim ar. Hintu ei manuschun songsarot agon. Mui tor idu eim. Oh Pobitro Ba, tui more duoschie igunore tor nange rokkie gor. Ami jedogkie ek, tharaio sedogkie ek oi paron para tharare rokkie gor.
43017012	Mui songsarot tharar loge thagke, mui tharare tor nange rokkie gorsiong. Tui more duoschie sigunore mui rokkie gorsiong. Sastro hodagan puron oi para nas obode sibier bade huno jon ajhi jedak noi.
43017013	“Ikkie mui tor idu ejongor. Songsarot tui duoschie sigunore sieni holungge mor hujhigan tharar iot puron oi para.
43017014	Mui tor hodagan tharare dilung. Mui songsaror no idie dogkie gori, tharaio songsaror noi hinottei, songsaro manuschune tharare insie goron.
43017015	Songsarottun tharare tuli nibartei mui bor no magongor, hintu tui tharare dujtobuottun rokkie goribartei mui bor magongor.
43017016	Mui jeannie gori songsaror noi, tharaio songsaror noi.
43017017	Tor soittiogandoi tharare pobitro gor. Tor hodagan olode soittiogan.
43017018	Tui more songsarot dipadeoschie dogkie gori, muio tharare songsarot dipadeong.
43017019	Soittioganor darai thara pobitro on para, mui nije-nije tharattei pobitro olung.
43017020	“Bana igunottei mui bor magi no duongor, hintu tharar prosaro darai more jigune bischias goribak, sigunotteio mui bor magi duongor.
43017021	Oh Ba, tui jeannie gori mor iot agos ar mui tor iot agong, tharaio begkune ek oinei amar iot thadok. Tui more dipadeos bili songsaro manuschune bischias jan para.
43017022	Ami jeannie gori ek, tharaio ek obartei tui more duoschie oborugkan mui tharare duong.
43017023	Tui more dipadeos ar tui more jedogkie gori hos peios, tharareio sedogkie gori tui hos peios bili songsaro manuschune hobor pebartei. Ar thara puro gori ek obartei mui thara iot agong ar tui mor iot agos.
43017024	“Oh Ba, songsar sristi no gorte tui more hos peios hinottei, mor oborugkan thara degon para, tui more duoschie manuschun mui jidu theim sidu tharaio mor loge thebartei mortun mone hor.
43017025	“Oh dhormitto Ba, songsaro manuschune tore hobor no pan, hintu mui tore hobor pang. Ar ei manuschune hobor pan tui more dipadeos.
43017026	Tui more jei hospanagandoi hos peios, sei hospanagan thara siotio thai para ar mui thara iot thang para, mui tor nangan tharare janei duong ar janei dim.”
43018001	Jisu bor magi phureinei, the tar sisjiogun somot sohoranottun nigili jei Kidron Jurigan par olakkoi. Siot ekkan bagan elo, ar the tar sisjiogun somot bagananot somilogoi.
43018002	Jisu nitto tar sisjiogundoi siot egottor oigoi hinottei, Juda Iskariode tare dhora bajei diebuoio sei jagan hobor pai.
43018003	Sebeden Juda rajguruthagurunottun ar Pharisigunottun ek dol soinnio ar mondiro polischun loinei, lembo, agun luro ar attier somot sidu thara gelak.
43018004	Sebeden Jisu tar hi ghodi jebo begkani hobor peinei, the thara sidu jeinei tharare holo, “Tumi hare togor?”
43018005	Thara tare uttor dilak, “Nazareth hullie Jisure.” Jisu tharare holo, “Sibie mui.” Juda Iskariode tare dhora bajeidiebuoio siot thara loge thiei elo.
43018006	Sebeden, “Sibie mui,” The tharare hoieio, thara pijendi jeinei madit bojilak.
43018007	Senottei the aro tharattun pujor gorilo, “Tumi hare togor?” Ar thara holak, “Nazareth hullie Jisure.”
43018008	Jisu holo, “Mui tomare hongor, sibie mui. Senottei tumi judi more togeile, igunore jebartei duo.”
43018009	The sien holode tar hodagan puron obartei, “Tui more duoschie sigun mui ek jonio no arang.”
43018010	Sebeden, Simon Pitore tar elode horgogan phueinei moharaj-guruthagurbuor banidajibuor den hanan beja urei habi phelei dilo. Banidajibuor nangan olode Malka.
43018011	Sebeden Jisu Pitorore holo, “Tor horgogan dappuot bhorei tho. Baba more ei golojchuo dede siottun mui no heim ni na?”
43018012	Sebeden soinniogun, senapoti-buoiδ ar Judaiunor lobiot goriegune Jisure dhorinei banilak.
43018013	Thara akke tare Anna sidu nejeilak. Haron Anna olode Kaiaphar sour ar sei bojorot moharajguruthagurbuo olode the.
43018014	Ei Kaiapha Judai-unore buddhi die. The hoiede jei, manuschunottei ek jon morilie gom obo.
43018015	Simon Pitor ar oinnio ek jon sisjio Jisur pune-pune gelo. Sei sisjiobuore moharajguruthagurbuoi sinie hinottei, the Jisur loge moharajguruthagurbuor udonanot gelo.
43018016	Hintu Pitore duoro barendi thiei age. Senottei sei sisjiobuo, moharajguruthagurbuoi sinede sibiere phiri einei duor subi thaidie miliebuore hoinei Pitorore bidirie bhoreilogoi.
43018017	Sebeden duor subi thaidie miliebuoi Pitorore holo, “Tuio ei Manuschuor ek jon sisjio noi ni?” The holo, “Mui noi.”
43018018	Jar porsie hinottei banidajigune ar mondiro polischune angaraloi agun jaleinei thie-thie thara agun phuodon. Ar Pitore tharar loge thie-thie agun phuorloi.
43018019	Moharajguruthagurbuoi tar sisjioguno sombonde ar tar sigkie sombonde Jisuttun pujor gorilo.
43018020	Jisu tare uttor dilo, “Songsaro manuschunore hulomela gori mui hoiong. Mui onsur synagogot ar mondirbuot sigkie duong. Judaiune onsur sienit thubon. Gubone mui hitchu no hong.
43018021	Tui a hittei mortun pujor goros? Jigune mui hode suinnion, sigunottun pujor gor na. Shah, mui hi hoiong thara hobor pan.”
43018022	Hintu Jisu sei hodagani hode seiet, ek jon mondiro polis tar hai thiei elode sibiei tare ado padaloi suoreinei holo, “Moharajguruthagurbuore tui sei dogkie gori uttor duotte oi ni?”
43018023	Jisu tare holo, “Mui judi bojong hoda hoi thang, mui hi bojong hoda hoiong proman de. Mui judi thik hoda hoi thang, a hittei tumi more maror?”
43018024	Thara Jisure bananar porendi, moharajguruthagur Anna Kaiapha sidu tare padei dilo.
43018025	Simon Pitore thieinei agun phuor. Sebeden thara tare holak, “Tui ek jon tar sisjio oidie noi ni?” the bharenei holo, “Mui noi.”
43018026	Moharajguruthagurbuor ek jon banidaji siot elo. Sibie olode Pitore han habi phelei dede Manuschuor sodorsie. The holo, “Mui tore bagananot tar loge degkuongge noi ni?”
43018027	Pitore aro bhareloio ar jogon-togon ekkuo radai dag harilo.
43018028	Sebeden bennie poittie thara Jisure Kaiaphar ghorottun Praetoriumotδ nilak. Aw-shijhi on bilinei bijier goronde ghudibuot thara no somilakkoi. Thara judi aw-shijhi ole, Rokkie Utchobo haana hei no paribak.
43018029	Senottei, Pilade thara sidu jeinei holo, “Tumi ei Manuschuore hi duj pela?”
43018030	Thara tare uttor dilak, “The judi duj gori no thedo ami tor adot gojei no dilongundi.”
43018031	Sebeden, Pilade tharare holo, “Tare nejo ar tomar nijor niomo onusare tare bijier gorogoi.” Senottei Judaiune tare holak, “Manus morei pelana amar ainot nei.”
43018032	Thara holakke siendoi Jisu hedogkie gori moribo the hoiede sombonde hodagan puron obo.
43018033	Sebeden Pilade aro praetoriumotδ sominei Jisure daginei holo, “Tui ne Judaiunor Rajabuo?”
43018034	Jisu tare uttor dilo, “Tui tor nijor monottun hor, nahi, oinnio jone tore mor sombonde hoion?”
43018035	Pilade uttor dinei holo, “Mui Judai jad ni na? Tor nijor jado manuschune ar rajguruthagurune Tore mor idu gojei duondi, tui hi gorsios?”
43018036	Jisu uttor dilo, “Mor rejjiogan ei songsarot noi. Mor rejjiogan judi ei songsarot odo, salen mor sagorsiegune mui Judaiunor adot no porong para judduo gorilakkun. Hintu mor rejjiogan ei songsaranottun noi.”
43018037	Sebeden Pilade tare holo, “Sale, tui raja oi ni?” Jisu uttor dinei holo, “Tui holede sien soittio, mui raja. Sienottei daw soittiogan janei dibartei mui songsarot einei jormeionggi. Je soitioganor the mor robuo sune.”
43018038	Pilade tare holo, “Soittiogan hi?” the sien honar porendi, the aro Judaiunor sidu jeinei holo, “Mui tare hitchu duj no pelung.
43018039	“Hintu tomar ekkan dostur age. Rokkie Utchobo lokkene mui ek jon tomartei jiel-hanattun iri diduong. Senottei, Judaiunor Rajabuo mui tomartei iri didung tomar mone hoi ni?”
43018040	Sebeden thara begkune aro jogar parinei holak, “Ami ei Manuschuore no sei, hintu Barabbare sei.” Barabba olode daget.
43019001	Sebeden Pilade Jisure ninei sabukkoi mara bajei dilo.
43019002	Ar soinniogune ekkuo hada tokkie banenei tare madat di dilak. Tare halisuri habor ekkan urei dilak.
43019003	Sebeden thara holak, “Ju, Judaiunor Rajabuo!” Ar thara tare suorelak.
43019004	Sebeden Pilade aro jeinei tharare hologoi, “Sawh, mui tare hitchu duj no pelung bili tumi hobor pebartei tare aro anilung.”
43019005	Jokke Jisu hada tokkie madat gori ar halisuri haboran ursie gori elo, Pilade tharare holo, “Eie, manshunore sawh.”
43019006	Sebeden rajguruthagurune ar mondiro polischune tare daginei jogar pari-pari holak, “Tare krosot duo! Tare krosot duo!” Pilade tharare holo, “Mui tare hitchu duj no pang hinottei, tumi tare ninei krosot duogoi.”
43019007	Judaiune tare holak, “Amattun ekkan ein age. The Itchioro Puo holai hinottei amar aino onusare the morana osit.”
43019008	Pilade sei hodagan suninei, the sie bes dorelo.
43019009	The aro praetoriumotδ jeinei Jisuttun pujor gorilo, “Tui huttun?” Hintu Jisu tare uttor no dilo.
43019010	Sebeden Pilade tare holo, “Tui a hittei morloi hoda no hos? Mor Tore krosot dibartei odhihar age ar Tore iri dibartei odhihar age, tui hobor no pas?”
43019011	Jisu uttor dilo, “Ugurottun judi tore odhihar die no odo, mor ugure tor hitchu odhihar no thelun. Senottei, je more tor adot gojei die, tar dangor pab age.”
43019012	Sei porendi Pilade Jisure iri dibartei pod togei selo. Hintu Judaiune jogar parinei holak, “Tui judi ei Manuschuore iri duos, tui Kaisaror bondhu noi. Je raja holai the Kaisaror biruddie made.”
43019013	Sebeden Pilade sien suninei the Jisure barendi nejeinei, the bijiero jaganot bojilo. Sien silloi baneie hon ar, Hebru hodadi sienore Gabbatha hon.
43019014	Sei dinnuo olode Rokkie Utchobottei Jugol goronde Din. Bel diboro oktot the Judaiunore holo, “Tomar Rajabuore sawh!”
43019015	Hintu thara jogar pari pari holak, “Morei pelo, morei pelo! Tare krosot duo!” Pilade tharare holo, “Mui tomar rajabuo krosot didung para pang?” Rajguruthagurbuoi tare uttor dilo, “Kaisara bade ar amar raja nei.”
43019016	Sebeden Jisure krosot dibartei Pilade tharar adot gojei dilo. Thara Jisure loinei gelakkoi.
43019017	Ar Jisu tar kroschan hanat gori ninei, Hulosara Jaga honde jaganot nilo. Hebru hodadi Golgotha hon.
43019018	Siot tare krosot duon. Jisure song moiddie ar tar di dagedi di jon krosot dilak.
43019019	Pilade ekkan gonggola leginei kroschano madat thangei dilo. Legagan olode, NAZARETH HULLIE JISU JUDAIUNOR RAJABUO.
43019020	Jisure krosot duonde jagagan sohorano hai hinottei, shagor Judai manjie gongolagan madeilak. Sien Hebru, Grik ar Latin hodadi legkie elo.
43019021	Sebeden Judaiunor rajguruthagurbuoi Piladore holo, “Judaiunor Raja” no leginei, edogkie gori leg. “The hoiede, ‘Mui Judaiunor Raja.’ ”
43019022	Pilade holo, “Mui jei doge legkuong sei doge legkie bade thok.”
43019023	Sebeden soinniogune Jisure krosot dinei, tar haborani lolak. Thara ser jone ser bhag gorilak. Shilummuo a shileie, goda ek tade bunnie elo.
43019024	Senottei thara-thara huobula gorilak, “Shilummuo no phadinei, honna pai ak sei.” Senottei soinniogune sien gorinei Sastro hodagan puron olo, “Thara mor haborani thara-thara bhag gorilak. Mor ek hotta haborottei thara ak selak.”
43019025	Jisur mabuo kroschano hai thiei elo. Jisur mojengabuo, Kliopar mogkuo, Meri ar Meri Magdalinio siot elak.
43019026	Sebeden Jisu tar mare ar the hos paidie sisjiobuore siot thiei agonde deginei, tor mare holo, “Oh miliebuo, tor puobuore shah.”
43019027	Sebeden the sisjiobuore holo, “Tor mare shah.” Ar sekkettun duri sisjiobuoi Jisur mabuore tar nijor ghorot nejeilo.
43019028	Tar porendi, Jisu hobor pelo beg jabotio pureilo. Sastro hodagan puron obartei, the holo, “Mortun pani saj gorer.”
43019029	Siot ek toba horo mod elo. Soinniogune horo modot pul bureinei, pulan hagara ludigo madat bajeinei tar muonot di dilak.
43019030	Horo modtan Jisu sagi seinei holo, “Phureie.” Tar siriebuo nigurinei tar aptabuo iri dilo.
43019031	Sei dinnuo Judaiunor Jugol Goribar Din elo hinottei heyegani kroschani ugure Jireni Dinnuot no thai para, Judaiune Piladore hujoli gorilak. Jireni Dinnuo dangor din elo. Krosot die manuschunore theng bhangi dinei heyegani kroschanittun lamei nibartei, Pilade ugum de para tare hujoli gorilak.
43019032	Sebeden soinniogune einei Jisur loge krosot duonde polim manuschunore ar aro ekkuore theng bhangi dilak.
43019033	Hintu thara Jisu iot einei, the honatto morsiede deginei thara tare theng bhangi no dilak.
43019034	Hintu ek jon soinnio tare dagot jadhiloi gudeieio lo ar pani nigillie.
43019035	Mui sien degkuong ar janei dilung. Mor shakkigan soittio. Tumi bischias jo para mui soittio hoda hongor.
43019036	Sastroie hoiede doge obartei sieni ghodi gelo, “Tare ekkuo aaro bhangi die no obo.”
43019037	Sastroganor aro ekkan hodai hoiede, “Thara gudeionde Sibiere rini sebak.”
43019038	Sienir porendi, Jisur heyegan lamei anibartei Pilade ugum de para, Arimathea adammie Josebe Piladore hujoli gorilogoi. Pilade tare onumoti dilo. Sebeden the jeinei Jisur heyegan lamei anilogoi. Josebe Jisur sisjio elo. Hintu Judaiunore the dhorai hinottei the gubonor sisjio elo.
43019039	Nikodemaio perai ponjas ser poiriek ar muraδ mijeinei anilo. The olode reidot Jisur idu akkendi ejchiede sibie.
43019040	Sebeden thara Jisur heyegan lameinei Judaiune garande dosturo doge sei tumbas jinijchani somot padol haborloi bereilak.
43019041	Tare krosot duonde jaganot ekkan bagan elo. Ar sei bagananot ekkan nuo sidiesal elo. Siot huno mora bhorei no thon.
43019042	Judaiunor Jugol goribar Din ar sidie shalan hai hinottei, Jisure siot garelakkoi.
43020001	Saptar polim dinnuot, bennie poittie andhar-andhar thagode, Meri Magdalini sidiesalanot gelo. Gattuor duoranottun silluo lareie gori degilogoi.
43020002	Sebeden the daba daba gelo. Simon Pitor ar oinnio ek jon sisjio Jisu hos paidie sibie sidu jeinei tharare hologoi, “Probur sidie shalanottun nuon ar tare hudu tholakkoi ami hobor no pei.”
43020003	Senottei Pitore ar oinnio ek jon sisjio nigilinei sidiesalanot jadon.
43020004	Thara duo jon daba daba jadon. Oinnio sisjiobuoi Pitorottun akkoie ar the akke sidie shalanot lungiegoi.
43020005	The nigurinei pado haborani siot agede degkie. Hintu the bidirie no somai oi.
43020006	Sebeden Simon Pitore tar porendi lungiegoi. The sidie shalanot sominei pado haborani siot agede degilo.
43020007	Tar siriebuot bereie elode hobongan pado haborani loge no elo, hintu shap gorsie gori ekkan jagat age.
43020008	Sebeden oinnio sisjiobuoi akke lungiegoidie sibieio sidie shalano bidirie somilogoi. The deginei bischias gelo.
43020009	Haron thara ejosong hobor no pan Sastrot hoiede, Jisu morattun aro jiei uduo poribo.
43020010	Sebeden sisjiogune tharar nijor ghorot phiri gelakkoi.
43020011	Hintu Meri sidiesalano hai barendi hani-hani thiei age. The hande-hande, nigurinei sidiesalan rini selo.
43020012	The di jon sorgo-dud dhub habor ursie gori degilo. Jisur heyegan elode siot thara boi agon. Ek jon sidenedi ar ek jon poidenedi.
43020013	Thara tare holak, “Miliebuo, tui a hittei hanor?” Meri tharare holo, “Mor Probure nuon hinottei mui hanongor. Tare hudu tholakkoi mui hobor no pang.”
43020014	The sieni honar porendi, the phiri seie, Jisu siot thiei agede degilo. Sibie Jisu bili the hobor no pai.
43020015	Jisu tare holo, “Miliebuo, tui a hittei hanor? Tui hare togor?” Meri tare mone gorsiede bagano girojchuo. Senottei the tare holo, “Probu, tui judi tar heyegan ni thas, tare tui hudu thoioschoi, jagan more ho. Mui tare siottun nejeim.”
43020016	Jisu tare holo, “Meri.” Ar Meri phirinei tare holo, “Robbini.” Sienor orthogan, Guruthagur.
43020017	Jisu tare holo, “More no dhoris. Haron mui ejo mor Baba sidu no jang. Mor bheilogkuno sidu jeinei mui hoiong bili tharare hogoi, ‘Mui tomar Babo ar mor Babo sidu, tomar Itchior ar mor Itchiorbuo sidu jangor.’ ”
43020018	Meri Magdalini sisjioguno sidu gelo. The Probure degkie ar Probuie sei hodagani tare hoie bili the tharare hologoi.
