43020019	Saptar polim dinnuot sei dinnie bellie, thara Judaiunore dhoran hinottei, thara thubei agonde ghoro duorani sisjiogune nadi thoion. Tobuio, Jisu einei tharar song moiddie thieinei tharare hologi, “Tomar idu shantigan thok!”
43020020	The sien honar porendi, Jisu tharare tar adtani ar tar dakkan degelo. Sebeden sisjiogune Probure deginei hujhi olak.
43020021	Senottei Jisu tharare aro holo, “Tomar idu shantigan thok! Babe more jedogkie gori dipadeie, muio tomare thik sedogkie gori dipadangor.”
43020022	The sien hoinei the tharar ugure muor bhab phelei dilo. The tharare holo, “Pobitro Apta lo.
43020023	Tumi jare pabottei mab duo tare mab die obo, ar tumi jare pabottei mab no duo tare mab die no obo.”
43020024	Hintu jokkene Jisu siot elo, Thoma, zama honde sibie tharar loge no elo. The olode baro jon sisjiottun ek jon.
43020025	Senottei, oinnio sisjiogune tare holak, “Ami Probure degkiei.” Hintu Thoma tharare holo, “Mui judi tar adtanit joloi marsie marani no degong, angulloi tar joloi marsie maranit angul no duong, ar mui judi no sang, mui shobai bischias gortung noi.”
43020026	Attio din porendi tar sisjiogun aro ghoro bidirie elak, ar Thomaio tharar loge elo. Judi oh beg duorani bannie elo, Jisu siot lungiegi. The tharar song moiddie thieinei holo, “Tomar idu shantigan thok!”
43020027	Sebeden the Thomare holo, “Tor angulluo loi mor adtan dhori shah. Tor adtan babeinei mor dakkan dhori shah. Bischias no gorsie gori no theis, bischias gor.”
43020028	Thoma tare holo, “Mor Probu, ar mor Itchior.”
43020029	Jisu tare holo, “Thoma, tui more degilie hinottei bischias gorilie. Jigune more no degkie gori bischias gorsion, thara hoballie.”
43020030	Jisu tar sisjioguno mujungot shagor oinnio amok ham gorsie. Sieni ei boibuot lega no oi.
43020031	Hintu Jisu olode Kristo, Itchioro Puobuo bili tumi bischias goribartei ar tumi bischias gorinei tar nanganot jibon pebartei ieni lega oie.
43021001	Sienir porendi, Jisu nije-nije aro Tiberia Sagoranot sisjioguno idu tare the degelogi the edogkie gori dega dilogi:
43021002	Simon Pitor, Thoma, (Zama honde sibie) ar Galili dejor Kana adamortun Nathanael ar Zebedior puogun ar di jon oinnio sisjio ek loge elak.
43021003	Simon Pitore tharare holo, “Mui maj mara jangor.” Thara tare holak, “Amio tor loge jebong.” Thara jeinei jogon-togon ekkan nawt udilakkoi. Sei reidtuot thara hitchu no pelak.
43021004	Bennie phor oinei, Jisu hulo ugure thiei agegi. Tobuio, sisjiogune sibie Jisu bili no sinon.
43021005	Sebeden Jisu tharare holo, “Oh tunggolok, tomartun jei huno hebar jinij age ni?” Thara tare uttor dilak, “Nei.”
43021006	Jisu tharare holo, “Nawgano den dagedi jalan pelo, tumi maj peba.” Sebeden thara jalan pheleilak. Shagor maj baschuon hinottei, thara jalan tani borei no etton.
43021007	Sebeden Jisu hos paidie sisjiobuoi Pitorore holo, “Sibie sie Probu!” Simon Pitore sibie Probu bili sininei, the uttie-buttie age hinottei, the habor urinei panit jham dilo.
43021008	Oinnio sisjioguneo sigon nawt gori elak. Haron thara hulo sorottun bes durot noi, perai di shot ad obode. Thara jalan somot majchun tanilak.
43021009	Thara hulo ugure udineigoi, angaraloi agun jallie gori degilakkoi. Sei ugure maj ar pidie shegodondeio degilakkoi.
43021010	Jisu tharare holo, “Ikkunu marsiode siottun gulodok maj idu ano.”
43021011	Simon Pitore jeinei jalan sejerei hulo ugure tulilogoi. Majchundoi jalan bhorsie. Siot eksho-teppannobuo birat birat maj elak. Shagor maj bajineio jalan no phade.
43021012	Jisu tharare holo, “Ejo, hogi.” Hintu sisjiogune, sibie Probu bili hobor peion hinottei, “Tui honna?” pujor goribar hemodai no huloi.
43021013	Sebeden Jisu thara sidu gelo ar pidie adot loinei tharare dilo. Ar sedogkie gori, the majo dilo.
43021014	Jisure morattun jiei tulonar porendi, the nije-nije tar sisjioguno idu dega dilogidie ien tin bar olo.
43021015	Thara haanar porendi, Jisu Simon Pitorore holo, “Jonar puo Simon, tui ienittun bes more hos pas ni?” Simone tare holo, “Oi Probu, tui hobor pas, mui Tore hos pang.” Jisu tare holo, “Mor bera-shagolo shawhgun paleis.”
43021016	Jisu tare aro dibar holo, “Jonar puo Simon, tui more hos pas ni?” Simone tare holo, “Oi Probu, tui hobor pas, mui Tore hos pang.” Jisu tare holo, “Mor bera-shagolun soreis.”
43021017	Tin bar Jisu tare holo, “Jonar puo Simon, tui more hos pas ni?” Tin bar Jisu tare, “Tui more hos pas ni?” holo hinottei, Pitore monot dug peinei the Jisure holo, “Probu, tui begkani hobor pas, mui Tore hos pangge sieno hobor pas.” Jisu tare holo, “Mor bera-shagolun paleis.
43021018	Mui tore soittio hodagan soittio gori hongor, tui gabur thagke, tui tor nijor haborani urinei tor jidu mone hoi sidu jas. Ar tui buro ole, tui tor adtani alok goribe, ar oinnio jone tore habor urei dibag. Tartun jidu jebar mone no hoi, the tore sidu nibo.”
43021019	Jisu sei hodagan Simonore holode, the hingori moribo sien agami hoi dibartei. Sedogkie gori, the Itchiorore mohima goribuo. Jisu sien tare honar porendi, holo, “Mor loge ai.”
43021020	Hintu Pitore phiri seinei, Jisu hos paidie sisjiobuore degilo. Theo tharar pune-pune jar. The olode bellie saschuo hade, Jisur buguot abujinei hoiede sibie, “Probu, tore dhora bajei dibode sibie honna?”
43021021	Pitore tare deginei, Jisure holo, “Probu, etar hi obo?”
43021022	Jisu tare holo, “Mui ejong song judi mui tare ragang, sien tor hi obo? Tui mor pune-pune ai.”
43021023	Senottei, sei hodagan bheilogkuno idu phogodang oiede, sei sisjiobuo no moribo. Jisu tare the no moribo gori no hoi. Hintu Jisu hoiede, “Mui ejong song judi mui tare ragang, sien tor hi obo?”
43021024	Shakki duongotte sisjiobuo olungge mui. Mui sieni legkuong, ar ami hobor pei, mor shakkigan soittio.
43021025	Jisu shagor oinnio amok ham gorsie. Sieni judi ekkan-ekkan gori lega odo, mui mone gorong, sei legkie boiun songsaranot no adilakkun. Amen.
44001001	Oh Theophil, mui akke tortei legilung Jisu jieni gorsie ar sigkie die arambo gorsie sienir sombonde.
44001002	Tare tuli neja oiede dinno song sieni the gorsie. Pobitro Aptar darai the bei tulliede apostolunore ugum die.
44001003	Jisu hosto bhug gorana porendi, the siguno sidu dega dineigoi the jeda age bili tharare onek bujon para proman diegoi. The tharar sidu solis dinottun bes dega dineigoi Itchioro rejjior sombonde hoie.
44001004	Thararloi ekkan Temmangot, the tharare ugum dede jei thara Jerusalem sohoran sari no jeinei, hintu Babe soittio dede sien barsei thebartei. Jisu holo, “Ien olode mui hoiongge soittiogan.”
44001005	Haron Johone hamakkai paniloi baptisma gori die, hintu tomare hoiek din porendi Pobitro Aptaloi baptisma gori die obo.
44001006	Sebeden thara eksomare einei tartun pujor gorilakki, “Probu, ei somoibuot tui Israelunore rejjiogan phirei anidibe ni na?”
44001007	Jisu tharare holo, “Babe Tar nijor odhiharot thoiede sieno somoibuo bah sei halluo tomar hobor pebar noi.
44001008	Hintu jokke Pobitro Apta tomar ugure ebo tumi hemoda peba, ar Jerusalem sohorot, goda Judea rejjiot, goda Samaria rejjiot ar pittimir jagai-jagai mor shakki oba.”
44001009	Sebeden ei hodagani Jisu honar porendi, thara sei thagke-thagke tare sorgot tuli neja olo, ar ekkan megsage tare andol goreie.
44001010	Jisu sorgot uderloidie lokke thara begkune ekrini sei thagke, dijon dhub-habor ursie gori tar somare thieie gori degilak.
44001011	Sei manuschune holak, “Oh Galili hulliegun, hittei thieinei sorgo hitte rini sei ago? Jei Jisu tomartun sorgot tuli neja olo, the sorgot jade tumi degilade dogkie gori aro ebo.”
44001012	Sebeden Oliv moun honde siottun thara Jerusalem sohorot phiri elak. Sei mounnuo Jerusalemo hai, ek Jireni Dinor adana pod .
44001013	Jokke thara ghoro bidirie somilakkoi, thara uguro tolat gelak. Siot Pitor, Jakob, Johon, Andrio, Philip, Thoma, Bartholomai, Mothi, Alphaior puo Jakob, dej-bhokto Simon, ar Jakobor puo Juda dagi thedak.
44001014	Thara begkune ekmon oinei eksottie bor magkuon ar manjiortei bor magi duon. Hoiekkuo milie, ar Jisur mabuo Meri, ar tar bheiun tharar somare elak.
44001015	Siot begkune eksho huri jon. Sei lokke Pitoror sisjioguno moiddiettun thieinei holo,
44001016	“Bab-bheilog, Jisure dhoribartei nejeiede Judar sombonde Pobitro Aptai akke duri Davidor darai hoiede ei Sastro hodagan ghodi jana dorkar.
44001017	Haron tare amar loge gonat bhora oie, ar the ei hamanot phagot sommie.”
44001018	Ete be-dhormi hamo bedondoi sebeden ekkan jaga hinnie. Siot the ugudo-jabada gori pori, moiddie phadi jei tar beg adorigano nigili jeie.
44001019	Jerusalem sohorot theiegune begkune sien hobor peion. Senottei, tharar hodadi sei jagagan Akeldama nang thoi duon. Sieno ortho olode, Lor Mad.
44001020	“Haron Baini Gido Boibuot lega age: ‘Tar thebar jagagan sara porok, ar huno jon siot no thagodok.’ Ar, ‘Tar podobigan oinnio jone lodok.’
44001021	“Senottei amar loge elakke sigunottun ek jon bei tulona dorkar. Jisu amarloi ejana-jana gorsiede beg somoiunot sibie amar somare theiebuo ona dorkar.
44001022	Johone baptisma gorsiede siottun duri amattun Jisure tuli neja oiede dinno song, amar somare Jisu jiei uduonagano shakki diettun ek jon uo poribo.”
44001023	Sebeden thara dijon bei lolak. Dijonottun ek jon olode Joseb, jare Barsaba dagon ar tar hellie-nangan olode Justa. Aro ek jon olode Motthia.
44001024	Thara bor magode holak, “Oh Probu, tui begkuno monani hobor pas, ei dijonottun hare ei hamanot beg lobartei ar apostolo podobigan lobartei tui bei lole amare dega.
44001025	Juda sei hamano ar apostolo podobigano biruddie jeinei tar nijor jagaganot jeie.”
44001026	Sebeden thara ak seinei Motthiar nangan udilo. Ar tare egaro jon apostolo somare boreilak.
44002001	Pentikost Dinnuo jokkene puro gori lungiegi, thara begkune ekmon oinei ekkan jagat thubeilak.
44002002	Sebeden abada gori sorgottun ekkuo sobdo bor boier batte dogkie gori einei thara boi elakke ghoranot sominei boron ologi.
44002003	Ar aguno dogkie phaga jil tharar sidu dega dinei, tharar jon bagene mada ugure ekkan-ekkan bojilogi.
44002004	Sebeden thara begkune Pobitro Aptaloi boron olak ar Aptar bole thara oinnio hodadi hoda ho arambo gorsion.
44002005	Sei lokkene Jerusalemot thande Judaiune, ar nanan jagattun ejchionde Itchior bhokti manuschun siot elak.
44002006	Ar jokkene ei sobdobuo olo, manjior jhagkuo eksomare elak. Tharar nijor hodadi hode suinnion hinottei thara jagulug bodilakki.
44002007	Thara begkune asarjio ar amok oinei ek jone aro ek jonore hodon, “Sawh, hoda hodonde sigun begkun Galili hullie noi ni?
44002008	Ar hingori ien amar nijor jormottun duri sunirte hodadi sunir?
44002009	Ami olongge Parthia dejottun, Media dejottun, Elamit dejottun, ar Mesopotamia dejot theie, Judea dejot theie, Kappadokia dejot theie, Pontas dejot theie ar Asia dejot theie.
44002010	Phrygia dejot theie, Pamphulia dejot theie, Egypt dejot theie, ar Kurini sohoro hai Libia elagat theie, ar Rom sohorottun ejchie Judai manus ar Judai dhormot sommiedagio agi.
44002011	Kret dippuo manus ar Arab dejo manus Itchioro oborug hamanir hoda amar nijor hodadi thara hode sunir.”
44002012	Senottei thara begkune amok oinei jagulug bodi, ek jon aro ek jonore hodon, “Ien hi ortho oi pare?”
44002013	Hintu oinnio ek dagie thatta gorinei holak, “Thara siot nuo mod hei nei mattol oion.”
44002014	Hintu Pitoror egarojon apostol somot udinei, birat ro gori holo, “Oh Judea manuschun ar beg Jerusalem hulliegun, mor hoda suno mui tomare ien janei duong.
44002015	Tumi mone gorotte ijebe igune mattol no on. Haron ikkie bana beinnie noita.
44002016	Hintu ien olode muni Joele hoi jeie sien:
44002017	‘Itchiore hor, ‘Sejo dinunot mui beg manuschuno ugure mor Aptabuo dali dim. Tomar puo-jhigune muni dogkie gori hoda hobak. Tomar gabursiegune azilie degibak ar tomar burogune sobon degibak.
44002018	Sei lokke mui mor Aptabuo mor morod-sagorsieguno ugure ar milie-sagorsieguno ugure dali dim, ar thara muni dogkie gori hoda hobak.
44002019	Uguredi sorgot mui oborug ham degeim ar toledi pittimit mui sinno degeim: Lo, agun ar dhumor meg.
44002020	PROBUR oborug ar mohima dinnuo no ette belan andhar oi jebo, junan lo dogkie obo.
44002021	Sebeden edogkie obo, je ‘PROBUR nangan dage the mukti pebo.’
44002022	“Israel manuschun, ei hodagani suno. Nazareth hullie Jisure Itchiore tomar idu upojukto gorsie. Tar darai tomar moiddie oborug ham, asarjio ham ar sinno ham gora oie, sieni tumio nije hobor po.
44002023	Tare udischuo loinei ar Itchioro agami gyendoi tomar idu gojei die oie. Tumi tare niom sara adtoi loinei, krosot dinei morei phellio.
44002024	Moronar jontronagani ses gori dinei Itchiore tare jiei tullie. Haron moranagane tare dhori rageibar sombob noi.
44002025	Haron Davide tar sombonde hoie, ‘PROBUIE mor samne onsur thagke mui degkuong. The mor denedi age hinottei hitchuie more jhagerei parto noi.
44002026	Senottei mor ontoran hujhi oie ar mor jilan anondo elo. Ar mor heyegano ashaganot jireibo.
44002027	Haron tui mor aptabuore padalot iri ede noi, ar tui tor Pobitrobuore poji jebartei no dibe.
44002028	Tui more jibono podtan degei duos. Tui tor samne more puro gori hujhi goreibe.’ ”
44002029	Pitore aro hor, “Bab-bheilog, mui tomare hulomela gori hoi parong amar Purbo-puruschun Davide mori jeinei tare gareion. Ejchie song tar sidiesalan amar idu age.
44002030	The muni hinottei, the hobor pai jei Itchiore sobot heinei tare soittio dede jei, heyet onusare tar bongsottun ek jon tulinei tar singasono ugure bojeibo, ar sibie olode Kristo.
44002031	The akke duri ien deginei Kristor jiei uduonagano sombonde the hoiede jei tar aptabuo padalot iri ede noi ar tar heyegano poji jedo noi.
44002032	Ei Jisure Itchiore aro jiei tullie, ar ami begkune olongge sieno shakkidiegun.
44002033	Senottei Itchioro den adtoi tare tulo oie hinottei, ar Babottun Pobitro Aptar soittiogan peinei, the ien dali die jien ikkie tumi degor ar sunor.
44002034	Haron Davide sorgot no udegoi, hintu the nije hoie, ‘PROBUIE mor Probure hoie, “Mor denedi boi thak,
44002035	Mui tor sottrugun tor thengot tole thong song.” ’
44002036	“Senottei, beg Israelo ghor-buogune hamakkai hobor padok jei tumi krosot duode Jisure Itchiore Probu ar Kristo baneie.”
44002037	Jokke thara sien sunilak, tharar ontorot phudinei, Pitorore ar oinnio apostolunore thara holak, “Bab-bheilog, ami hi goribong?”
44002038	Sebeden Pitore tharare holo, “Monani phiro, ar pabpani hema pebartei tumi jon bagene Jisur nange baptisma goro, sebeden Pobitro Aptar bor’an peba.
44002039	Haron protiggiagan olode tomar, tomar puo-shabagunor, durot agonde sei begkunor, ar amar Probu Itchiorbuoi jedogkunore dage siguno begkunor.”
44002040	Ar onek oinnio hodaloi the shakki dinedi tharare ujuleinei holo, “Ei jugor dujto manuschunottun mukti aw.”
44002041	Sebeden jigune tar hodagan hujhi gori mani lolak sigune baptisma lolak. Sei dinnuot perai tin azar manus tharar dolot jok dilak.
44002042	Sebeden apostolunor sigkieni thara shokto gori eksottie doridak ar song pora-porit pidie hotta goridak ar bor magidak.
44002043	Ar prottiek jonor dor buguot somilo, ar apostoluno darai onek amok ar sinno ham gora oie.
44002044	Beg bischiasigune ek oinei tharar ja age begkani song somare hamot lagan.
44002045	Tharar juronot agede sieni ar tharattun agede sieni bejinei, jar jei lage tharar begkunor moiddie beg goron.
44002046	Eksottie din bagene thara ekmon oinei ega mone mondirbuot thubondoi. Ghore-ghore pidie hotta gorinei, hujhi ar sorol mone thara bhat hedak.
44002047	Thara Itchiorore baini goridak ar begkunor agudonagan thara pedak. Ar jigune mukti pan sigunore Probuie nitto mondolit borai.
44003001	Bellie tin ta bajinei, Pitorloi Johone bor magibar somoiot somora-somori mondirbuot jadon.
44003002	Ar ek jon gorbhottun duri leng manus mondirbuot somandoide sigunottun bikkie magibartei nitto mondolibuor Doul Girie Duoranot ninei thondoi.
44003003	The Pitorore ar Johonore mondirbuot somibar oionde deginei, tharattun bikkie maga dorilo.
44003004	Johon somot tare ekrini sei agon, Pitore tare holo, “Amare sa.”
44003005	Senottei tharattun huno ekkan pebar ashai tharare mondi sei age.
44003006	Sebeden Pitore holo, “Mor sona rubuo nei, hintu mor jien age sien mui duong. Nazareth hullie Jisu Kristo nange, thieinei bera.”
44003007	Ar the tare den adtanoi dhorinei alok gorilo. Ar jogon-togon tar thenganit ar thengopada joragunot bol somilo.
44003008	Sebeden the phal mari udinei thieilo. Ar the adi-adi jeinei tharar loge mondirbuot somilogoi. The adi-adi, phal mari-mari Itchiorore baini gorerloi.
44003009	The berade ar Itchiorore baini gorte beg manuschune tare degilak.
44003010	Sebeden thara hobor pelakke jei the olode mondirbuor Doul Girie Duoranot boinei bikkie magiebuo. Tar hi olo sien deginei thara amok oinei asarjio olak.
44003011	Leng manuschuo jibe gom oie, sibiei jokke Pitorore ar Johonore dhorinei age, beg manuschun shanggadik amok oinei Solomonor baranda honde siot daba einei tharar idu thubeilakki.
44003012	Pitore sien deginei the manuschunore holo, “Oh Israel manuschun, ien hittei amok ola? Ar amar nijor hemoda darai bah pobitro darai ei Manuschuore bera bajei diei die dogkie amare hittei ekrini sei ago?
44003013	Abrahamor, Isaakor ar Jakobor Itchiorbuoi, jibe amar buro-burigunor Itchior, sibiei tar sagorsie Jisure sorman gorsie. Jokke Pilade tare iri dibartei seie sokke tumi tare gojhi no loinei tumi tar adot gojei duo.
44003014	Pobitrobuore ar Dharmigkuore tumi osikar gorsio, ar tomare dibartei hungoriebuore magkuo.
44003015	Ar tumi Jibono Probubuore morei phelluo, hintu Itchiore tare morattun jiei tullie, ar sienor shakkidiegun olongge ami.
44003016	Tumi degotte ar sinode Manuschuoi Jisur nangan bischias gorsie, ar Jisu tare shokti die. Tar nangan bischias gorsie hinottei the gom oinei begkuno mujungot agegi.
44003017	“Bheilog, mui hobor pang tumi ien bhul gorinei gorsio ar tomar murubbiguneio gorsion.
44003018	Hintu Kristo dug-hosto pebogidie sieni Itchiore honatto tar beg muniguno muendi hoidie. Ar sieni Jisu purei dilogi.
44003019	Senottei, monani phireinei ejo jene tomar pabpani muson oi para, ar Probur samnettun mono hujhigan eje para.
44003020	Ar jiber sombonde agendi tomar idu prosar gora oie sei Jisu Kristore tomar idu the padei de para.
44003021	Beg jinijchani aro purona dogkie bana no oi song Jisu sorgot thana dorkar. Sei hodagan Itchiore ei age tar beg pobitro muniguno muendi hoie.
44003022	Haron Mosi jodepode gori amar buro-burigunore hoi jeie, ‘PROBU tomar Itchiorbuoi tomar bheilogo moiddiettun mor dogkie muni ek jon tomartei tulidibo. The tomare jei hodagani hoi sieni begkani suinnio.
44003023	Ar edogkie obo, je sei munibuor hoda no sunibo, manuschuno moiddiettun Sibiere puro gori dongso gora obo.’
44003024	Samuelottun duri ar tar porendi beg munigune ar onek jone jodepode gori sei dinun agami hoi di jeion.
44003025	Tumi olade munigunor puogun ar Itchiore amar purbo-puruschundoi sukti gorsiede sieno puogun. The Abrahamore hoie, ‘Tor bongsoguno darai songsaro beg ghorbuogune asirbad pebak.’
44003026	Itchiore tar sagorsiebuo Jisure tulinei, tomare asirbad goribartei ar jon bagene tumi tomar bojon-ganittun phiribartei tare akke tomar idu padeie.”
44004001	Thara manuschunore hode, dhormothagurune, mondiro subidaro netabuo ar Saddukigun tharar sidu lungilakki.
44004002	Tharattun baari rak udilo, haron thara prosar goronde Jisur darai morattun jiei udibag.
44004003	Thara Pitorore ar Johonore dhorinei, tar hellie song tharare jielot tholakkoi, haron sokke honatto bellie-bellie oie.
44004004	Hintu suinnionde manuschunottun onek jone bischias gorsion. Sebeden manjior songkie perai pas azar olak.
44004005	Ar edogkie olo, tar hellie, murubbigune, borjonnune, ar dhormo niomo mastorune Jerusalemot thubeilak.
44004006	Moharaj-guruthagurbuo Anna ar Kaiapha, Johon, Alexander ar moharaj-guruthagurbuor ghorbuobuor oinnio jono siot elak.
44004007	Sebeden tharare song moiddie aninei tharattun pujor gorilak, “Har hemoda darai Babor nange ien tumi gorila?”
44004008	Sebeden Pitore Pobitro Aptaloi boron oinei tharare holo, “Manuschunor murubbigun ar Israelo borjonnun:
44004009	Upai-sara Manuschuore ami gom ham gori dinei, jieno darai the gom olo, judi edchie tumi amare porikkie gorode oi,
44004010	tomare begkunore ar beg Israel manuschunore janei duong, tumi krosot duode ar Itchiore morattun jiei tulliede Nazareth hullie Jisu Kristo nangano darai ei manuschuo puro gori gom oinei tomar begkuno mujungot thiei agegi:
44004011	‘Ibie olode tumi ghor-tulliegune phelei dode silluo, jibe begottun gunor huno-silluo olo.’
44004012	Muktigan haro iot nei, haron sorgo tole manjiore nang thoi duonde moiddie amare mukti goribar oinnio nang nei ar.”
44004013	Pitoror ar Johonor sahojchan thara deginei, ar thara lega-pora no janon, ar podu noi bili buji parinei thara amok olak. Ar thara hobor pelakke thara Jisur loge roion.
44004014	Ar gom oiede manuschuo tharar loge thiei thagke deginei, sieno biruddie thara hitchu no holak.
44004015	Hintu tharare sanhedrino siottun barendi jebartei thara ugum dilak. Sebeden thara-thara huobula gorilak.
44004016	Thara holak, “Ei manuschunore ami hi goribong? Haron, jodepode gori tharar darai ekkan dega jaidie sinno ham gora oie. Ar sien beg Jerusalem hulliegune hobor peion, sien ar ami bharei no pari.
44004017	Hintu ei hodagan manjior moiddie ja no oi para ar, ei nangan ikkiettun duri harore no hon para, shanggadik gori tharare domki lagei.”
44004018	Sebeden tharare daginei, Jisur nangan shobai no hobartei ar Jisur nange sigkie no dibartei tharare ugum dilak.
44004019	Hintu Pitorloi Johone tharare uttor dinei holak, “Itchioro sogedi hubon thik obo? Ami tomar hoda dhortong nahi, Itchioro hoda dhortong? Tumi bijier goro?
44004020	Haron ami jieni degkiei ar suinniei sieni no hoie gori ami thei no pari.”
44004021	Sebeden tharare bes gori dhomki dinei iri dilak. Thara gorsionde hamanottei beg manuschune Itchiorore baini Gorton hinottei tharare sasti dibar upai no pelak.
44004022	Haron ei gom gori denar amok haman gora oiede sibie solis bojorottun bes boios oie.
44004023	Ar shoran peinei, thara tharar nijor somarsieguno sidu jeinei, rajguruthagurune ar borjonnune tharare hoionde sieni begkani tharare janeilakkoi.
44004024	Sei hodagani thara suninei, thara ekmon eksong oinei birat ro gori Itchiorore holak, “Probu, tui olede sorgo, pittimi, sagor ar sienit agede sieni begkani baneiebuo Itchiorbuo tui.
44004025	Tui tor sagorsie Davido muendi Pobitro Aptar darai hoios: ‘Be-jadtune hittei rak tullion? Ar manuschune hittei dorkar no lakkie hoda bhabon?
44004026	Pittimir rajagune ar murubbigune, PROBUR ar tar Kristo biruddie eksomare udilak.’
44004027	“Haron jodepode gori tumi tel guli duode tomar pobitro Sagorsiebuo Jisur biruddie, Herod loi Pontio Pilade Be-jadtun ar Israel manuschun somot thubeion.
44004028	Tomar adtanie ar monanie akke duri jien goribar elo sien gorsion.
44004029	Probu, ikkie tharar dhomkieni sa. Tor sagorsiegune Tor hoda bug-doro gori hoi paron para sahoj de.
44004030	Tor pobitro Sagorsiebuo Jisur nangano darai manus gom gori pari para, sinno ar amok ham gori pari para tor adtan babei de.”
44004031	Sebeden thara bor magi phureinei, thara thubeionde jagagan girgirei udilo. Ar thara begkune Pobitro Aptaloi boron oinei, bug-doro gori Itchioro hoda holak.
44004032	Shagor bischias gorsionde sigune ekmon eksong oion. Tharattun huno jone ekkan jinijio nijor bili dabi no gorsie gori tharar agede beg jinijchani song somare hamot lagan.
44004033	Birat hemoda somot apostolune Probu Jisur jiei uduonagan shakki duon, ar begkuno ugure shanggadik doyegan elo.
44004034	Tharar moiddie haror huno hitchu pora nei. Haron jaga-bolagune bah ghor-bolagune sieni bejinei tengagunδ anon.
44004035	Ar tengagunδ aninei apostoluno tengot thara gojei duondi. Sebeden jar jien lagede doge apostolune tengagun bhag gori duon.
44004036	Ar Kupra dejottun Joseb nange ek jon Levi manus, tare apostolune Barnaba nang thoi duon. Sieno orthogan, Shantona die manus.
44004037	Theo hed bejinei tengagunδ apostoluno tengot gojei dilogi.
44005001	Anania nange ek jon manus tar mogkuo Sapphiraloio ekkan sompotti bejilak.
44005002	The tar mogkuore janeinei tengaδ ek bhag rageinei, aro ek bhag aninei apostoluno tengot gojei dilogi.
44005003	Hintu Pitore tare holo, “Anania, hittei tor ontorot Soitan somilo? Pobitro Aptabuo sidu tui gal madinei ek bhag jagagano tengaδ tortei rageios.
44005004	No bejode sien tor elode noi ni? Bejana porendi tengagunδ tor odhiharot elakke noi ni? ien hittei tor ontorot hadeiosh? Tui manjior sidu gal no madile, hintu Itchioro sidu gal madile.”
44005005	Sebeden ei hodagani Anania suninei, borat gori pori mori gelo. Senottei jigune ei hodagani suinnion sigunor begkunor shanggadik dor buguot somilo.
44005006	Gabursiegune udinei morabuo bereilak, sebeden bhaar gori ninei tare garelakkoi.
44005007	Tar mogkuo hi godhi gelo hobor no peie gori, perai tin ghonta porendi einei somilogi.
44005008	Sebeden Pitore tare holo, “Jagaganot edukkun ne tengaδ peiode?” The holo, “Oi, sedukkun.”
44005009	Sebeden Pitore tare holo, “Probur Aptabuo porikkie sebartei hingori eksomare manila? Tor negkuore gareondoidie sigunor thengani dhoranot sa. Thara toreio bhaar gori nejeibak.”
44005010	Sebeden jogon-togon tar tengot borat gori pori mori gelo. Ar gabursiegune einei tare mora bade degilakki. Tare thara bhaar gori ninei tar negkuo hure garelakkoi.
44005011	Senottei beg mondoliguno ugure ar sei hodagani sunnionde siguno begkunor dor buguot somilo.
44005012	Sebeden apostoluno adedi onek sinno ar amok ham manus-chuno moiddie gora oie. Ar thara begkune ekmon oinei Solomono barandagano tole egottor olak.
44005013	Judio manuschune tharare shanggadik man gorilieo, thara-ttun huno jone tharar loge mijeibar sahoj no goron.
44005014	Shagor milie ar morod bischiasi bes oi-oi Probu sidu ek olakki.
44005015	Senottei, Pitore jade homsei-hom tar shababuo heyet pore para, aw-sugkiegun nigilei aninei podtanit bischoni ugure ar padi ugure porei tholakki.
44005016	Jhag-jhag manus seropala sohoranittun Jerusalem Sohorot thubeilakki. Aw-sugkie ar hajorchie apta darai hosto peie thara annion ar sigun begkun gom olak.
44005017	Sebeden moharajgurutha-gurbuo ar tar beg somarsiegun, jigun Sadduki dolot elak thara thieilak ar tharattun rak udilo.
44005018	Thara apostolunore dhorinei sorkari jiel-hanat bhorei tholakkoi.
44005019	Hintu reidot Probur ekkuo sorgo-dude jiel-hanar duorani huli dinei tharare nigilei aninei holo,
44005020	“Jo, mondirbuot thieinei beg manuschunore ei jibonano hoda hogoi.”
44005021	Apostolune sien suninei, bennie pottie mondirbuot thara jeinei sigkie dilakkoi. Sei lokkene moharajguruthagurbuo ar tar loge elakke sigune lun-ginei, beg Israelo borjonnun somot temmangot bojinei, sagorsie-gunore apostolunore jiel-hanattun anibalottei hoja dipadelak.
44005022	Hintu mondiro polischune jiel-hanat lungineioi, thara no degilakkoi. Sebeden thara phiri jeinei temmangot janeilakkoi.
44005023	Thara holakki, “Jiel-hanagan gome-dalei nattie gori ami degkigoi, ar shandaridiegun duoro barendi thieie elak. Hintu duorani huli seinei bidirie huno jon no degioi.”
44005024	Rajguruthagurbuoi, mondiro subidaro netabuoi ar mohaguruthagurune sei hodagani suninei amok oinei holak, “Ien hi obo sei?”
44005025	Sebeden ek jone einei hologi, “Sawh, tumi jiel-hanat bhorei thoiogoidie manuschune mondirbuot thieinei manuschunore sigkie dedondoi.”
44005026	Sebeden netabuoi ar mondiro polischune apostoluno sidu jeinei tharare juj gori anilakkoi. Haron adikkie manuschunottun sil mela haan bili thara doreon.
44005027	Tharare aninei temmang gortonde moiddie thiei bajei dilakki. Sebeden moharajguruthagurbuoi tharattun pujor gorilo,
44005028	“Sei nangandoi sigkie no dibartei ami tomare shokto gori mana gorsei. Sawh, tomar sigkien Jerusalemot bhorei dila. Ar sei Manuschuor loganor dujchan amar ugure badei dibar sor.”
44005029	Sebeden Pitore ar oinnio apostolune holak, “Manjior hoda no maninei Itchioro hoda amar manana osit.
44005030	Amar Purbo-puruschununor Itchiorbuoi jiei tulliede Jisure tumi gajot tanginei morei phellio.
44005031	Israel manus-chunore mon phirei dibartei ar pab hema dibartei Itchiore tare Probu ar Mukti gorie obartei tar denedi ojolot tullie.
44005032	Ei hodaganittei ami olongge tar shakkigun. Ar thik sedogkie gori Itchiorore je mane sigunore the dede Pobitro Aptabuoio shakki.”
44005033	Sei hodagani thara suninei, rage tharare morei pheleibar sadon.
44005034	Sebeden temmangot ek jon member thieilo. The Pharisi dolo manus ar tar nangan olode Gamaliel. The Niomanit podu ar begkune tare sorman goron. Hanekkon apostolunore barendi thobarlottei the ugum dilo.
44005035	Sebeden the tharare holo, “Oh Israel manuschun, ei manuschunore hi goribar sor sien gome bhabi sawh.
44005036	Haron agendi theudase nigilinei the ek jon bili holeie. Perai ser shot jon manus tar somare mijeion. Tare morei pheleinei, tare mannionde sigun begkun settera oi jeion ar boij jeiondoi.
44005037	Tar porendi, Galili hullie Juda, manuschun gondonde lokke nigilienei tar somare onek manus nejeie. Theo ses oinei, tare mannionde sigun begkun settera oion.
44005038	Ar ikkie ieno mui tomare hong, tharare bad dinei iri duo. Haron judi ei buddhigan bah haman manjiortun ole, ien hitchu odo noi.
44005039	Hintu judi ien Itchiorottun ole, tumi phelei diparta noi. Tumi Itchioro biruddi judduo gore para oi pare.”
44005040	Sebeden thara tar hoda dorilak. Ar apostolunore daginei marilak. Jisur nange no hobartei tharare ugum dinedi jebartei dilak.
44005041	Jisur nange thara aw-sorman obarlak oion bili gona oie hinottei sebeden utchob oinei temmanganottun gelakkoi.
44005042	Ar din bagene mondirbuot ar ghore-ghore Jisu olode Kristo bili sigkie denagan ar prosar goranagan no thaman.
44006001	Ar sei lokkene, jokke sisjio-guno songkie barton, ekkan abitti porilo. Grik hoda honde Judaigune Hebru hoda honde Judaiuno biruddie abitti dilak. Haron tharar rani-miliegunore din bagene bhat dede aw-pela goron.
44006002	Sebeden barojon apostole sisjioguno jhagkuo dagi thubeinei holak, “Itchioro hodagan bad dinei porsoni haman gorana amattei thik noi.
44006003	Senottei, bheilog, tomar moiddiettun sat jon togo. Thara gom shakki die, Pobitro Apta bhora ar gyeni uo poribo. Ami tharar ugure ei haman bhar di pari para.
44006004	Hintu ami nije eksottie bor maganat ar hodagan prosaro hamot lagi thebong.”
44006005	Ar hodagan begkuno monot porilo. Sebeden thara Stephanare bei lolak. The olode bischias ar Pobitro Aptaloi boron. Philibore, Prokorore, Nikanorore, Timonore, Parmenasore ar Nikolareio thara bei lolak. Nikola olode Antiok sohorottun. The Judaiuno dhormot sommie.
44006006	Sei manuschun thara apostolunore gojei dilak. Apostolune tharare madat dhorinei bor magi dilak.
44006007	Sebeden Itchioro hodagan shidie gelo. Jerusalem sohorot sisjiogunor songkie shanggadik barilo, ar shagor dhormothagure bischiaschan mani lolak.
44006008	Bischias ar hemoda-bola Stephanai manuschunor moiddie dangor-dangor oborug ar sinno ham gorsie.
44006009	Sebeden shadin manuschunor synagog honde sigunottun biruddi udilak. Thara olakke Judai manus Kurini bamottun, Alexandria sohorottun ar Kilikia ar Asia rejjioganittun. Sigune Stephanaloi torgo arambo gorilak.
44006010	Stephana jei gyenandoi ar Aptabuor darai hoie thara sieno samne thori no paron.
44006011	Sebeden thara gubone hoiek jon manus bhejei dilak. Sigune holak, “Mosir ar Itchioro biruddie the sorjade ami suinniei.”
44006012	Ar thara manuschunore, borjonnunore, ar dhormo niomo mastorunore jagulug bodei dilak. Sigune Stephanar biruddie einei tare dhorinei senhedrinnuo samne nejeilak.
44006013	Thara mijie-shakkidieio nejeion. Sigune holak, “Ei Manuschuoi ei pobitro jaganor ar Niomano biruddie sorjana huno din no thamai.”
44006014	Haron the hode ami suinnei jei ei Nazareth hullie Jisu ei jagan dongso goribuo ar Mosi amare dede dosturani bodolei dibo.”
44006015	Senhedrinnuot boi agonde sigune begkune Stephanare ekrini sei agon. Tar muon sorgo-dudo muo dogkie degkuon.
44007001	Sebeden moharajguruthagur-buoio holo, “Ei hodagani oi ni?”
44007002	Stephanai holo, “Bab-bheilog, suno. Amar Purbo-puruschun Abrahame Haran adamanot thebar agendi, Meso¬potamia dejot thagke Oborug Itchiorbuoi tar sidu azil oiegoi.
44007003	Itchiorbuoi tare hoie, ‘Tor dejchan ar tor sodorsiegun phelei ja, mui degei dimbie dejchanot jagoi.’
44007004	Senottei, Chaldea manu-schunor dejchan phelei jeinei Haran adamanot bojotti gorsie. Tar babe morinei, siottun ei dejchanot tare lara oie jiot ikkie tumi ago.
44007005	Itchiore siot hitchu odhiharo sompotti tare no de, ekhus madio no de. Hintu Abrahame puo no padeio, tar porendi obakke tar bongsogunore sompotti ijebe dejchan dibartei tare soittio die.
44007006	Hintu Itchiore edogkie gori hoie: Tor bongsogun bi-dejot thei pebakkoi. Ar sidu thara banidajit ar hostot ser shot bojor thei pebak.
44007007	Itchiore hoie, ‘Tharare banidajit hadeibode jadtuore mui sasti gorim. Tar porendi thara sei dejchanottun nigili einei ei dejchanot more sebona goribakki.’
44007008	Ar Itchiore Abrahamore sundu-sam habana nioman die. Senottei Abrahame Isaakore jormo denar porendi attio dinot tare sundu-sam habi die. Isaake Jakobore jormo die, ar Jakobe baro jador Purbo-puruschunun jormo die.
44007009	“Sei Purbo-puruschunune hinsie udinei Josebore Egypt dejot beschondoi. Hintu Itchiorbuo tar loge elo.
44007010	Itchiore Josebore beg hostoganittun bajeie ar Egypt dejor raja Pharao tare hospai para ar tar gyenan hobor pai para gori di die. Ar Pharao tare goda Egypt dejchano ugure ar tar ghorbobuo ugure sason-gorie baneie.
44007011	Sebeden goda Egypt dejchano ugure ar Kanaan dejchano ugure bhadorad porinei shanggadik hosto lungilogi. Ar amar Purbo-puruschununor hebar nei olo.
44007012	Hintu Jakobe Egypt dejot gom agon bili suninei, polim the amar Purbo-puruschunun dipadeie.
44007013	Ar di barot Josebe tar bheiunore sin porisoi dilo. Sebeden Pharao Josebor ghorbogun hobor pelo.
44007014	Sei porendi, Josebe tar babore ar tar beg sodorsiegun hoja dipadelo. Thara begkune pazahottur jon.
44007015	Sedogkie gori Jakobe Egypt dejot jeinei sidu morilogoi, ar amar Purbo-puruschununio sidu morsiondoi.
44007016	Tharar heyegani Seckemo adamot gareiondoi jien Abrahame rubuor tengaδ dinei Hamoror puogunottun hinnie. Hamore olode Seckemor bab.
44007017	“Hintu jokkene Itchiore Abra-hamore soittio dede somoibuo hai ejer, tharar manuschun bes oinei Egypt dejot onek jon barilak.
44007018	Sebeden Josebore hobor no peie ek jon oinnio raja udilo.
44007019	Ei rajabuoi amar manuschunore phagara buddhiloi hamot lageinei, amar Purbo-puruschununore dug-hosto lageie. Ar tharar huji gurogun moron para lugimara bajei die.
44007020	Sei lokkene Mosi jormo oie, ar Itchiore tar ugure baari hujhi. Tare tar babo ghorot tin mas paleion.
44007021	Hintu tare phelei dineio, Pharaor jhibuoi tare tuli aninei tar nijor puo dogkie gori paleiegoi.
44007022	Ar Egypt manuschunor beg gyenani Mosi shigi loie, hodat ar hamot the doro elo.
44007023	“The solis bojor oinei, tar bheilogkun Israel manuschuno sidu jebartei mone holo.
44007024	Ar ek jon Egypt manjie tharar ek jon Israel manjiore be-aini gorte deginei, the tare rokkie gorsie. Sei Egypt Manuschuore hena ugureibartei the tare morei phellie.
44007025	Haron Mosi mone gorsiede tar nijor manuschune buji paribakke tharare uddhar goribartei Itchiorbuoi tare dipadeie. Hintu thara sien no bujon.
44007026	Ar tar hellie, dijon Israel manjie mara-mari gorte Mosi degilo. The tharare milie-mili gori dibartei selo. The tharare holo, ‘Bheilog, tumi bhei-bhei daw. Hittei tumi be-aini ham gora-gori goror?’
44007027	Hintu tar parallie duji manuschuoi Mosire theli dinei holo, ‘Amar ugure sason-gorie ar bijier gorie honna tore baneie?
44007028	Gelle hellie tui Egypt Manuschuore morei phellioschie dogkie gori more morei pheleibar sor ni na?’
44007029	Mosi sien suninei, the Midian dejot dhei jeie. Sidu the bi-deji sannie gori roiegoi ar sidu tar dibie puo peie.
44007030	“Solis bojor bidi janar por-endi, moruobomit Sinai Mounnuot ekkuo sorgo-dud ekkuo jaburottun aguno jilo ugure tar sidu dega diegi.
44007031	Mosi sien deginei, the degkiede sienot amok olo. Ar the hai jeinei rini sadegoi, Probur robuoi tare holo,
44007032	‘Mui tor Purbo-puruschununor Itchiorbuo. Mui Abrahamor Itchior, Isaakor Itchior ar Jakobor Itchior.’ Mosi dore sei no parilo ar.
44007033	‘Sebeden PROBUIE tare holo, “Tor horomani then-gottun huei tho, haron tui thiei agoschie jagan pobitro madi.
44007034	Egypt dejot agonde mor manuschuno hostogani jodepode gori mui degkuong, thara bor-nijes peladonde sieni mui suinniong ar tharare uddhar goribartei mui elung.” ’
44007035	“Jei Mosire thara, ‘Honna tore sason-gorie ar bijier gorie baneie,’ hoinei phirei duon, tar sidu hero-jhaburot dega diegidie sorgo-dudtuo darai tare Itchiore sason-gorie ar uddhar gorie obartei dipadeie.
44007036	Sei manuschuoi Egypt dejot, Ranga sagoranot ar moruobomit jagat amok ar sinno ham solis bojor deganar porendi tharare the nigilei annie.
44007037	“Ibie sei Mosi Israel manus-chunore edogkie gori hoiede sibie, ‘PROBU, amar Itchiorbuoi mor dogkie muni ek jon tomartun banebo. Tar hoda suinnio.’
44007038	Sinai Mounnuot tarloi ar amar purbo-puruschundoi hoda hoiede sorgo-dudtuo somot moruobomit thubo oie manuschuno loge the elo. Amare dibartei jibon dede Itchioro hodagani the gojhi loie.
44007039	Hintu amar Purbo-puruschunun tare aw-pela gorsion. Ar thara mone-mone Egypt dejot phiri jeion.
44007040	Thara Aronore hoion, ‘Amar mujunge-mujunge jebartei amattei Itchiore jugolei de. Haron amare Egypt dejottun nigilei anniede Mosir hi olo ami hobor no pei.’
44007041	Sei lokke thara ekkuo goru-shawh mokti banenei, Sibiere dali-pujo duon. Tharar nijor adedi baneie sibieloi thara phorti gorsion.
44007042	Sebeden Itchiore tharare pid die. Taragun thara tobona goron para the tharare iri gelo. Sien muniguno boibuot edogkie gori lega age, ‘Oh Israelo ghorbuogun, moruobomit solis bojoro bidirie more poshu ar dali-pujo duo ni na?
44007043	Tumi Molokuorδ ar thara Itchioro terpal haboro shani ghoran tullio. Tobona goribartei tumi siguno moktigun baneio. Senottei mui tomare Babylono obola nejeim.’
44007044	“Amar Purbo-puruschununor moruobomit shakkir tambulo ghoran elo. Mosi degkiede dogkie gori banebartei Itchiore tare thik gorsie.
44007045	Joshua amol song, ek pirittun ek piri gori amar Purbo-puruschunune sien peion. Joshua somot sien ei dejchanot bhoreiondi. Sei lokke Itchiore Be-jadtunore amar Purbo-puruschununo samnettun dabei dinei dejchanot sommondi. David amol song sei shakkir terpal haboro ghoran hamot lageio.
44007046	Davide Itchioro doyegan peinei Jakobor Itchiorbuottei ekkan thebar jaga banebartei sujuk magkie.
44007047	Hintu Solomone Itchioro ghoran baneie.
44007048	Hintu, begottun dangor Itchiorbuoi adtoi tullie mondirot no thai. Sien munibuoi hoiede doge oi:
44007049	PROBUIE hor, ‘Sorgogan olode mor singason, ar pittimigan olode mor theng thoidie jaga. Mortei henjannie ghor tuli diba, bah, hudu mor jireibar jagan obo?
44007050	Mor adtane ieni begkani no banai ni na?’
44007051	“Tumi ekmonniegun ar ulluogun! Tumi onsur Pobitro Aptabuore badha duo. Tomar Purbo-puruschunune gorsionde dogkie gori tumio gorode.
44007052	Hon munibuore tomar Purbo-purus-chunune hosto no lagan? Je Dhormittobuo ebode sombonde agami hoidie Sibiere thara morei phellion. Ar ikkie tumi sei Pobitrobuore dhoga dinei hun gorsio.
44007053	Sorgo-dudtunor sahajjio darai tumi Nioman peio, ar tumi ien no palo.”
44007054	Thara sei hodagani suninei, rage tare dad hadon.
44007055	Hintu the, Pobitro Aptaloi boron oinei agajo mokkie rini selo ar Itchioro oborugkan degilo, ar Jisu Itchioro denedi thiei agede degilo.
44007056	Ar the holo, “Sawh, mui degongor sorgogan hulo jeie, ar Munischioro Puobuo Itchioro denedi thieie gori age.”
44007057	Sebeden tharar hanani nadinei, birat ro sarinei begkune ek loge tar mokkie gelak.
44007058	Tare sohoro barendi sejerei ninei sil mela dilakkoi. Ar shakkigune tharar haborani ek jon gabur manjior thengo hure tholak. Sibier nangan olode Saula.
44007059	Thara Stephanare sil mela dede, Stephanai Itchiorbuore dagode holo, “Probu Jisu, mor aptabuo gojhi lo.”
44007060	Sebeden the adu pari porinei birat ro gori holo, “Probu, ei pabpano bharan tharare no dis.” Ar the ien hoinei ghum gelo.
44008001	Ar Saula Stephanare hun goranagan raji oie. Sei dinnie Jerusalemo Mondolibuo biruddie birat hosto lagana arambo olo. Apostolun bade, thara begkun Judea ar Samaria rejjioganit shittiribonggo oion.
44008002	Itchior-bhokti manuschune Stephanare garelakkoi ar tartei baari abiles helak.
44008003	Saula ole, ghore-ghore sominei milie-morod sejerei aninei jiel-hanat bhorei thobartei gojei di di, mondolibuore baari hoti gorilo.
44008004	Sengori jigune shittiribonggo oion jagai-jagai jeinei prosar gorilakkoi.
44008005	Ar Philibe Samaria sohorot jeinei Kristor hoda prosar gorilogoi.
44008006	Philibe amok ham gorsiede sieni deginei ar suninei, ar the hoiede hodagani shagor manjie ega mone sunilak.
44008007	Haron onek hajorchie aptai peiegunottun hajorchie aptagune jogar parinei nigili jeion ar onek ajorchie ar leng-adur gom oion.
44008008	Sebeden sei sohoranot birat hujhi olak.
44008009	Sei lokkene Simon nange ek jon manus elo, sei agendi, sohoranot the bhilgi degenei Samaria manuschun amok gorinei, the ek jon dangor manus bili holeie.
44008010	Sigonottun duri dangor song, tare begkune hando gorinei holak, “Ei manuschuo olode Itchiorbuor dangor hemodagan.”
44008011	Onek somoi song the tar bhilgi darai manuschunore amok gori thoie hinottei thara tare hando gorsion.
44008012	Hintu jokke Philibe Itchioro rejjiogano sombonde prosar gorilo ar Jisu Kristor nangano sombonde holo, miliei ar morode bischias gorinei thara baptisma gorilak.
44008013	Sebeden Simone the nijeio bischiaso baptisma gorilo. The Philibo loge eksottie theinei, amok ar sinno hamani deginei shanggadik amok olo.
44008014	Jerusalem sohorot agonde apostolune jokke Samaria manuschune Itchioro hodagan bischias gorsion bili sunilak, thara Johonore ar Pitorore tharar sidu dipadelak.
44008015	Thara jeinei Samaria manuschune Pobitro Apta pan para bor magi dilak.
44008016	Haron Pobitro Apta ejosong tharar huno jono ugure no poregi. Tharare bana Probu Jisur nange baptisma gori die oie.
44008017	Sebeden Pitore ar Johone tharar ugure ad tuli dinei, thara Pobitro Apta pelak.
44008018	Sei lokkene apostolune manjior ugure ad tuli dile Pobitro Apta pande sien Simone jokke degilo, the tharare tengaδ jajinei holo,
44008019	“Mui jar ugure ad tuli duong the Pobitro Apta pai para, ei hemodagan moreio duo.”
44008020	Sebeden Pitore tare holo, “Itchioro boran tengaδ dinei pai bili tui mone goror hinottei, tor tengagun tor loge ses olak.
44008021	Itchioro sog degat tor monan uju noi hinottei, ei hamanot tui bhag no pebe ar phagodio somi no pebe.
44008022	Senottei, tor dujchanottun tor monan phirie. Itchiorottun bor mag, ole tor mono dharonagan the hema gori pare.
44008023	Haron mui degongotte tor ontoran tidie oie ar aw-dharmigkane tore bannie.”
44008024	Sebeden Simone uttor dinei holo, “Mortei Probuttun bor magi duo jene tui holede sieni ekkanio mor ugure no eje para.”
44008025	Ar Probur hodagani shakki denar ar prosar goranar porendi, thara Jerusalemot phiri gelakkoi. Jade thara onek Samaria manjior adamanit gom hoboran prosar gorsion.
44008026	Probur ekkuo sorgo-dude Philibore holo, “Udinei, Jerusalem sohorottun Gaza sohoro mokkie jeiede pode-pode dogkin mokkie ja.” Sien olode ekkan murobomi jaga.
44008027	Sebeden the udinei gelo. Ar sawh, ek jon Ethopia manus siot elo. The olode nomonshuk ar dangor odhihar-bola manus. Ar the olode Ethopia manuschunor rani Kandakir beg dhon-sompotti rakkolibuo. The Itchior tobona goribartei Jerusalem sohorot jeie.
44008028	The sittun phirer, ar the tar rodtanot bojinei muni Isaia boibuo madar.
44008029	Sebeden Aptabuoi Philibore holo, “Jeinei rodtanoi egottor ogoi.”
44008030	Senottei Philibe tar sidu daba-daba gelo ar the muni Isaia boibuo madade suninei tare holo, “Tui madotte sien buji paros ni?”
44008031	Ar Ethopia Manuschuoi holo, “Ek jone more bhangi no dile hingori mui buji parim?” Sebeden the Philibore rodtanot udinei tar hai bojibartei hujoli gorilo.
44008032	The madatte Sastro bhagkuo olode ien: “Habibarlottei bera-shagol nejaidie dogkie gori tare neja oie. Bera-shagolo shawhbuoi jedogkie gori heis habidiebuor mujungot juro gori thai, thik sedogkie gori the tar muon no hule.
44008033	The niroit oinei tare oinniei gora oie. Haron tar poranan songsarottun neja oie hinottei honna tar bongsogun monot tulibo?”
44008034	Sebeden nomonshukkuoi Philibore uttor dinei holo, “More hodei, munibuoi ien har hoda hor? Tar nijor hoda, nahi oinnio jonor hoda hor.”
44008035	Sebeden Philibe ho dorilo ar ei Sastroganottun arambo gorinei Jisur sombonde tare janei dilo.
44008036	Ar thara podedi jade-jade ekkena pani lagot pelakkoi. Sebeden nomonshukkuoi tare holo, “Sa, iot pani age. Baptisma goranattun hie more badha goribuo?
44008037	Sebeden Philibe tare holo, “Tui judi tor goda ontorandoi bischias goros, tui gori paribie.” Ar the holo, “Mui bischias gorong, Jisu Kristo olode Itchioro puo.”
44008038	Sebeden rodtan thameibartei the ugum dilo Ar Philippoi nomonshukkuo paniganot lami-lakkoi, ar Philibe tare baptisma gori dilo.
44008039	Ar thara panittun jokke udilakki, Probur Aptabuoi Philibore dhori nilo. Senottei, nomonshukkuoi tare no degilo ar. The tar podedi hujhi gori jargoi.
44008040	Hintu Philibore Azetos sohorot degilak. The jade, Kaisarea sohorot lungegoi song beg sohoranit prosar gori-gori jeie.
44009001	Probur sisjiogun morei pelana ar dhomki lagana Saular ejosong il no oinei, the moharaj-guruthagurbuo sidu gelo.
44009002	Milie ok morod ok nuo Podtan adeie judi the pai, tharare Jerusalem sohorot bani anibartei Damaska sohoro synagogottei tartun sidi magilogoi.
44009003	The jade Damaska sohoro hai lungineioi, jhimid gori sorgottun ekkan phor tar seropala phudilogi.
44009004	Sebeden the madit borat gori porilo, ar ekkuo roi tare hode sunilo, “Saula, Saula, tui hittei more hosto lagor?”
44009005	Ar the holo, “Probu, tui honna?” Sebeden robuoi holo, “Mui Jisu, tui hosto lagotte sibie.”
44009006	Saula amok oinei girgirer. Ar the holo, “Probu, tui more hi gora bajei dibar sas? Sebeden Probuie tare holo, “Tui uth ar sohoranot ja, ar tui hi gori pebe tore huo obo.”
44009007	Saula loge jadonde sigune robuo sunon hintu huno jonore no deginei madnei gori thiei agon.
44009008	Sebeden Saula madittun udilo, ar the jokke tar sogkun melilo the harore no dege. Hintu tare adot dhorinei nejeinei Damaska sohorot bhoreilakkoi.
44009009	Tin din the han gori roie, ar bhat-pani no hai.
44009010	Sei lokkene, Anania nange Damaska sohorot sisjio ek jon elo. Aziliet tar sidu Probuie dega dinei holo, “Anania!” Ar Anania holo, “Probu, mui iot agong.”
44009011	Ar Probuie tare holo, “Tui udinei Uju honde podtanot ja, ar Judar ghorot Tarsa hollie Saulare togagoi. Haron the bor mager.
44009012	Ekkan aziliet Saula degilode Anania nange ek jon manus einei, the dege para the tar ugure ad tuli derli.”
44009013	Hintu Anania holo, “Probu, mui onek manjiortun suinniong, Jerusalem sohorot the tor sadhu manuschunore hodog hoti gorsie.
44009014	The tor nangan idot thulon sigunore bani nibartei the rajguruthagurunottun odhihar loinei idu ejchie.”
44009015	Hintu Probuie tare holo, “Ja, haron the olode mor bei loie aittieran. The mor nangan be-jadtuno sidu, rajaguno sidu, ar Israel manuschuno sidu nejei dibo.
44009016	Haron the mor nanganottei hi-hi hosto gori pebo mui tare degeim.”
44009017	Sebeden Anania jeinei ghoranot somilogoi, ar the tar ugure ad tuli dinei holo, “Oh Bhai Saula, tui ette podot tor idu dega diegidie sei Probu Jisure, tui degos para ar Pobitro Aptaloi boron os para more dipadeie.”
44009018	Jogon-togon tar sogkunottun ekkan sogola dogkie jinij jhuri porilo ar the logot porak-porak gori deger. Sebeden the udilo ar baptisma lolo.
44009019	Ar the bhat haanar porendi tar bol bhorilo.
44009020	Sebeden Saula Damaska sohorot hoiek din sisjioguno somare thelo. Ar the jogon-togon synagogot Kristo Itchioro puo bili prosar gorilo.
44009021	Jigune sunon sigune begkune amok oinei hon, “Jerusalem sohorot je ei nangan loi sigunore dongso gorsiede ar sei uddischuoi, rajguruthaguruno sidu bani nibartei idu ejchiede sibie ete noi ni?”
44009022	Hintu Saula siebes shokto gori proman die jei, ei Jisu olode Kristo, ar the Damaska sohorot agonde Judaiunore jagulug bajei dilo.
44009023	Onek din bidijanar porendi, Judaiune tare morei pheleibartei jugol gorsion.
44009024	Thara dine-reide girie-duoranit tare morei pheleibartei hapdi than. Hintu Saula sien hobor peie.
44009025	Sebeden sisjiogune tare reidot nejeinei ekkuo dangor harangot bhoreinei giriegano hanadi lamei duon.
44009026	Ar jokkene Saula Jerusalem sohorot lungilogi, the nije sisjio-gundoi egottor obar sesta gorsie. Hintu thara begkune tare doreon, ar the ek jon sisjio oie bili thara bischias gori no paron.
44009027	Sebeden Barnaba tare loinei apostoluno sidu tare annie. Podot Saula hingori Probure degkie, Probuie tarloi hoda hoie, ar Damaska sohorot the hingori sahoj gori Jisur nange prosar gorsie, sieni Barnabai tharare janei die.
44009028	Senottei Saula tharar loge Jerusalem sohorot theinei ejana jana gorilo.
44009029	Ar the sahoj gori Probu Jisur nange prosar gorilo, ar Grik hoda honde Judaiundoi the torgo gore. Hintu thara tare morei pheleibar uddischuo loion.
44009030	Hintu bheilogkune sien hobor peinei, tare Kaisara sohorot lamei aninei, Tarsa sohorot padei dilak.
44009031	Sebeden goda Judea, Galili, ar Samaria rejjioganit mondoligunor shanti olo ar tharar bol olo. Ar Probur dhoranot theinei ar Pobitro Aptar bujunoganot theinei thara bari gelakkoi.
44009032	Sei lokkene Pitore goda dejchanot berade-berade, Lydda adamanot thande sadhu manus-chuno siduio the elo.
44009033	Sidu the ek jon manus lagot pelo, tar nangan olode Ainea. The ajor pirie oinei attio bojor song bischonot pori age.
44009034	Pitore tare holo, “Ainea, Jisu Kristoi tore gom gorilo. Udinei tor bischonan somori tho.” Sebeden the jogon-togon udilo.
44009035	Senottei Lydda adamanot thande sigune begkune ar Sharon tholanot thande sigune sibiere deginei thara Probur mokkie phirilak.
44009036	Sei lokkene Joppa adamanot ekkuo sisjio elo tar nangan olode Tabitha. Sieno orthogan olode Dorka. Ei miliebuoi onek gom ham gorsie ar onek dan gorsie.
44009037	Hintu sei lokkene hi olo, the aw-sug oinei morei gelo. Tare gadei dinei uguro tolat tholakkoi.
44009038	LyddaadamanJoppa sohorohai hinottei, ar sisjiogune suinnionde Pitore sidu agegi. Thara tar sidu di jon manus padeilak, ar jhadi gori tharar sidu ebartei hujoli gorilak.
44009039	Sebeden Pitore udinei sigunor loge gelo. The jokke elo, tare uguror tolabuot nejeilak. Beg rani-miliegune tar hai thieinei gujhi-gujhi handon, ar the baji elode lokke the shileiede shilummun ar bunniede haborani degadon.
44009040	Hintu Pitore tharare begkunore nigilei dilo ar the adu parinei bor magilo. Ar the morabuo mokkie phirinei holo, “Tabitha, uth.” Sebeden Tabitha sog melilo ar the Pitorore deginei udinei bojilo.
44009041	Ar Pitore tare adot dhorinei tulilo. Sebeden the sadhu manuschun ar rani-miliegun daginei tare jedabade tharar sidu gojei dilo.
44009042	Sei hoboran goda Joppa sohoranot shidie gelo ar onek jone Probure bischias gorilak.
44009043	Joppa sohoranot Simon nange ek jon samara baneie elo. Sibier ghorot Pitore onek din thelo.
44010001	Sei lokkene Kaisarea sohorot ek jon manus elo, tar nangan olode Kornelia. The Italy Soinnio Dolluot ek shot soinnio ugure neta.
44010002	The Itchiorore bhokti gorie elo, the ar tar ghoda ghorbobuo Itchior dhoran. The manjiore mon-hulo gori dan gore ar Itchiorottun onsur bor mage.
44010003	Ekdine perai tin porsie somoiot, ekkan aziliet tar sidu ekkuo sorgo-dud ette porak-porak gori the degilo. Ar sorgo-dudtuoi tare holo, “Oh Kornelia!”
44010004	The jokke tare rini selo, the dorenei tare holo, “Probu, ien hi?” Sebeden sorgo-dudtuoi tare holo, “Tui bor magorsie sieni ar tor danani monot udibartei Itchioro samne lungiegoi.
44010005	Hellie nange Pitor honde Simonore hoja jebartei Joppa adamot ikkie manus dipada.
44010006	Sagoro hai, Samara bejede Simono ghorot the age. Tor hi gora poribo the tore hobo.”
44010007	Tarloi hoda hoiede sorgo-dudtuo jeneigoi, Korneliai tar ghoro sagorsie di jon ar tare onsur barsei thande sigunottun ek jon bhokti-bola soinnio dagilo.
44010008	Sebeden Kornelia tharare begkani bhangi holo ar tharare Joppa adamanot dipadelo.
44010009	Tar hellie, thara jade ar adamo hai lungineioi, dibursie Pitore bor magibartei salo ugure udilogoi.
44010010	Tar baari ped purilo ar bhat hebar mone hor. Hintu jokkene thara bhat hebartei jugolodon, Pitore be-us olo.
44010011	Sebeden sorgogan hulo gori the degilo ar seirhun bannie budhi dogkie gori ekkan jinij tar sidu lambegi ar madit portegi the degilo.
44010012	Sieni bidirie, pittimir nanan doronor ser thenggie poshu, jharbuo jontur, buk sejerei berande jib-jontur, ar peik elak.
44010013	Sebeden the ekkuo ro sunilo. Robuoi hor, “Pitor, uth marinei ha.”
44010014	Hintu Pitore holo, “Na, Probu! Haron mui huno din aw-pobitro bah aw-poriskar jinij no haang.”
44010015	Di barot aro robuoi tare holo, “Itchiore jien pobitro gori die, sien tui aw-pobitro no hos.”
44010016	Sien tin bar onar porendi, sien sorgot aro tuli neja olo.
44010017	Pitore azilie degkiede sieno orthogan the mone-mone bhabi satte lokke, sawh, Kornelia dipadeiede manuschune Simono ghoran pujor gortondi ar thara giriegano duorano mujungedi thiei agondi.
44010018	Ar thara daginei, hellie-nange Pitor honde Simone siot thai ni no thai pujor gorilak.
44010019	Pitore aziliegano sombonde bhabi satte lokke, Aptabuoi tare holo, “Sa, tin jone tore togadondi.
44010020	Senottei, uth, lamboi ar hitchu mone no gorinei tharar loge ja. Haron mui tharare dipadeong.”
44010021	Sebeden Kornelia dipadeiede manuschuno sidu Pitore laminei jeinei hologoi, “Tumi togotte sibie mui. Hittei ela?”
44010022	Ar thara holak, “Kornelia ek shot soinnio ugure netabuoi, dharmigkuo ar Itchior bhokti ar beg Judai jador nangkorabuottun ami ejchiei. Ekkuo pobitro sorgo-dude tar ghorot tortun hobor sunibartei tore daga bajei die.”
44010023	Senottei, Pitore tharare ghoro bidirie dagilo ar tharare thebar jaga dilo. Tar hellie, Pitore tharar loge gelogoi ar tar loge Joppa adamortun hoiek jon bheilog tar loge jeion.
44010024	Tar hellie Pitore Kaisarea sohorot lungilogoi. Kornelia tar hudummogun ar tar ghonatie bondhugun dagi thu-beinei tare barsei age.
44010025	Pitore somadegi, Kornelia tarloi egottor oinei tar thengot porinei tobona gorilo.
44010026	Hintu Pitore tare tulinei holo, “Thie, muio manus daw!”
44010027	Tarloi hoda hoi-hoi bidirie somineigoi onek jon ejchionde the degilogoi.
44010028	Sebeden Pitore tharare holo, “Tumi hobor po Judai manus oinnio jadtoi bera-beri gorana bah song pora-pori ona be-aini. Hintu harore aw-pobitro bah aw-poriskar no hobartei Itchiore more degeie.
44010029	Senottei, more hoja dipadeono abitti no gorsie gori mui ejchiong. Sokkene mui pujor gorsiong, hittei more hoja ejchio?”
44010030	Ar Korneliai holo, “Gelle ser dino agendi, thik ei oktot mui ubos thagke tin porsie mui mor ghorot bor magode suno, ek jon manus jhimid-jhimid jolede habor ursie gori mor mujungedi thieiegi.
44010031	Ar the holo, ‘Kornelia, Itchiore tui bor magorsie sieni suinnie ar tor danani monot tullie.
44010032	Senottei, Joppa adamot manus dipadenei Simonore daga bajei de. Tar hellie-nangan olode Pitor. Sagoro hai, samara baneie Simono ghorot the thai. The ele, the tore hobogi.’
44010033	Senottei, jogon-togon mui tor sidu manus dipadeong ar tui ejchios hinottei baari gom oie. Ikkie senottei, ami begkune Itchioro samne agidie Itchiore tore ho bajei dede sieni sunibartei.”
44010034	Sebeden Pitore ho arambo gorilo, “Soittio gori mui degongge, Itchiorottun eitzabor nei.
44010035	Hintu jad bagene, je tare bhokti gore ar dharmig ham gore tare Itchiore gojhiloi.
44010036	Jisu Kristo darai Shantigan prosar gora oiede hodagan Itchiore Israelo puogunore dipadeie. The begkunor Probu.
44010037	Johone baptisma sombonde prosar gorana porendi, Galili rejjiot arambo oinei, goda Judea rejjiot prosar gora oiede hodagan tumi hobor po daw.
44010038	Tumi hobor po Itchiore Nazareth hullie Jisure hingori Pobitro Aptaloi ar hemodaloi tel guli die. The berei-berei jeinei Diabolaδ hosto lageiede sigunore gom ham gori diegoi ar tharare gom gori diegoi. Haron Itchiore tar loge elo.
44010039	Jerusalem sohorot ar Judaiuno rejjiot the gorsiede sienir begkanir shakki ami agi. Tare gajot tanginei morei phellion.
44010040	Tare Itchiore tin dine jiei tulinei hulomela gori degeie.
44010041	Begkune noi hintu, Itchiore akke duri bei loiede shakkidiegune tare degkuon. The morattun jiei uduonar porendi, jei, the amio tar loge haba-daba gorsei.
44010042	Manjiore ami prosar goribartei ar shakki dibartei the amare ugum dede olode moragunore ar jedagunore Bijier goribartei Itchiore thik gorsiede sibie.
44010043	Beg munigune tar sombonde shakki duonde jei, tar nangano darai je tare bischias gore the pab hema pebo.”
44010044	Pitore ei hodagani horte seiet, je sei hodagani suinnie sigunor begkuno ugure Pobitro Apta porsiegi.
44010045	Pitoror loge ejchionde sundu-sam happie bischiasigune amok olak, haron Pobitro Aptar danan Be-jadtuno ugureo porsiegi.
44010046	Haron oinnio hodadi Itchiorore thara baini gorte suinnion.
44010047	Sebeden Pitore holo, “Ami Pobitro Apta peieidie dogkie gori ei manuschuneio Pobitro Apta peion. Thara baptisma no goribartei honna tharare badha di paribo?”
44010048	Sebeden thara Probur nange baptisma lobartei the ugum dilo. Ar tharar loge hoiekdin thebartei tare hujoli gorilak.
44011001	Sei lokkene Judea dejot agonde apostolune ar bheilogkune suinnionde jei Be-jadtuneo Itchioro hodagan gojhi loion.
44011002	Sebeden Pitore jokke Jerusalem sohorot udineigoi, sundu-sam happie Judaiune tarloi torgo gorilak.
44011003	Thara holak, “Sundu-sam no happie manus-chuno sidu tui jeinei thararloi haba-daba gorsioschoi.”
44011004	Hintu Pitore polliettun duri ekkan-ekkan gori tharare bhangi dilo.
44011005	The holo, “Mui Joppa sohorot elungge lokke bor magode, be-ushot ekkan azilie degkuong. Sorgottun ekkan dangor haboro dogkie jinij ser hundoi lamei die oie ar sien mor hai lungiegi.
44011006	Sienot mui rini seinei bhabi sade, pittimir ser thenggie poshu, jharbuo jontur, buk sejerei berande jib-jontur, ar urbuo pheig degkuong.
44011007	Ar ekkuo roi more hode sunilung, ‘Pitor, uth marinei ha.’
44011008	“Hintu mui hoiong, ‘Na, Probu! Haron mui huno din aw-pobitro bah aw-poriskar jinij no haang.’
44011009	Hintu agajottun robuoi di barot more holo, ‘Itchiore jien poriskar gori die, sien tui aw-pobitro no hos.’
44011010	“Sien tin bar goranar porendi, begkani sorgot aro tuli neja olo.
44011011	Ar sawh, thik sei lokkene Kaisarea sohorottun mor idu dipada oiede sei tin jon manus mui elungge ghorano mujungot thiei agondi.
44011012	Sebeden hitchu mone no gorsie gori tharar loge jebartei Aptabuoi more hoie. Sigun bade, ei shoi jon bheio mor loge jeion, ar ami Korneliar ghorot somilonggoi.
44011013	“The amare holode jei tar ghorot the ekkuo sorgo-dud degkie. Sorgo-dudtuoi tar ghoranot thieinei tare hoie, ‘Hellie-nange Pitor honde Simonore boleibartei Joppa adamot manus dipada.
44011014	The tomare Itchioro hoda suneibogi, sieno darai tui ar tor goda ghorbobuo mukti peba.’
44011015	Mui hoda hobar arambo gorsiongo, polim amar ugure Pobitro Apta porsiede dogkie gori tharar ugureo Pobitro Apta porsiegi.
44011016	Ar Probuie hoiede sien mor monot uttie, ‘Johone paniloi baptisma gori die, hintu mui tomare Pobitro Aptaloi baptisma gori dim.’
44011017	Senottei, ami Probu Jisu Kristore bischias gorinei Itchiore judi amare dede boran tharareo de, mui Itchiorore badha diebuo honna?”
44011018	Thara jokkene sei hodagani sunilak olor olak. Ar thara Itchiorore baini gorinei holak, “Saledo Itchiorbuoi Be-jadtunoreo jibon pebartei mon phiranagan die.”
44011019	Stephanar ugure uttiede gondogulano porendi jigune settera oion sigune Phoenikia dejot, Kupra dippuot, ar Antiok sohorot jeinei haro sidu hodagan prosar no gorondoi hintu bana Judaiuno sidu prosar gorsiondoi.
44011020	Hintu sigunottun hoiek jon Kupra dippuor ar Kurini bamo manjie Antiok sohorot lunginei Grik hoda honde Judaiunore Probu Jisur hoda holak.
44011021	Ar Probur adtan tharar loge elo, ar sebeden shagor manjie bischias gorinei Probur mokkie phirilak.
44011022	Sebeden sei hodagani Jeru¬salem sohoro mondolibuoi suninei, Antiok sohor song jebartei Barnabare thara padei dilak.
44011023	The einei jokke Itchioro doyegan degilogi, the hujhi oiegi ar ega mone thara Probuloi thebartei the thara begkunore uschoni tuli dilogi.
44011024	Haron the gom manus, Pobitro Aptai puro ar bischias tar age. Shagor manus Probu sidu ana olo.
44011025	Sebeden Barnaba Saulare togeibartei Tarsa sohorot gelo.
44011026	Ar the tare peineioi, Antiok sohorot tare anilo. Sengori thara goda bojorbuo mondolibuoloi thubeinei shagor manjiore thara sigeilak. Ar sisjiogunore Antiok sohorot polim Kristien nang thoi dilak.
44011027	Sei lokkene munigun Jerusalem sohorottun Antiok sohorot elak.
44011028	Tharar moiddi-ettun Agabas nange ek jon udilo. Aptai tare janei dinei the agami hoi dilode jei ekkan dangor bhadorad goda songsaranot ebar oie. Sien moharaja Klaudia Kaisara amolot ghodi jeie.
44011029	Sebeden Judea dejot agonde bheilogkunore je jedog pare sahajjio dipadebartei sisjiogune thik gorilak.
44011030	Sieno thara gorinei Barnaba ar Saula ade borjonnunore dibarloittei padeilak.
44012001	Sei lokkene Herod rajai mondolittun hoi ek jonore hosto lageibartei ad tulilo.
44012002	Sebeden the Johonor bheibuo Jakobore horgoloi habi phellie.
44012003	Ar Judaiune siendoi hujhi oionde deginei, Pitororeo dhorilo. Sien olode moli no gullie pidie Utchobo lokkene.
44012004	Tare dhorinei jiel-hanat bhorei thoie. Rokkie Utchobo porendi manuschuno samne anibartei tare subi dibartei ser jonnie soinnio doluno adot gojei die.
44012005	Senottei Pitorore jiel-hanat age, hintu mondolibuoi tartei Itchiorottun eksottie bor magi duon.
44012006	Herode Pitorore bijierot anibar oiede reidtuot, Pitore dien shingolloi bannie gori di jon soinnio sere ghum jar. Ar shandaridiegune jiel-hana duorano mujungedi subi agon.
44012007	Ar sawh, Probur ekkuo sorgo-dud tar idu einei, jiel-hanagan phor oie. Sorgo-dudtuoi Pitorore dagot bascheinei holo, “Jhadi uth.” Ar shingollani Pitore adtanittun huei porilo.
44012008	Sebeden sorgo-dudtuoi tare holo, “Tor haborani ur ar sendelani pin.” Ar Pitore sieni gorilo. Sorgo-dudtuoi holo, “Tor haborani bereloinei mor pune-pune ai.”
44012009	Ar Pitore sorgo-dudtuo pune-pune jeinei jiel-hanattun nigili gelo. Sorgo-dudtuoi tartei gori dede sien soittio bili the hoi no pare hintu the mone gorette jei the ekkan azilie deger.
44012010	Thara polim ar di lombor subidarbuo phelei jeinei sohorot nigilegoidie lor girie duoranot elak. Sien gai-gai tharattei hulo jeinei thara nigili jeinei ekkan podot porineigoi, jhimid gori sorgo-dudtuoi tare phelei jeiegoi.
44012011	Sebeden Pitoror jokkene uij elo, the holo, “Ikkie mui jodepode gori hoi parilung jei Probuie tar sorgo-dudtuo dipadenei the more Herodo adottun ar beg Judai manuschune asha gorsionde sienottun rokkie gorsie.”
44012012	Pitore sei hodagan bhabinei, hellie-nange Marka honde Johono mabuo, Meri ghorot gelo. Siot onek jon thubeinei bor magodon.
44012013	Pitore girie duoranot bascheineioi, Rodhi nange ekkuo miliei huli dibartei elo
44012014	The Pitoror robuo sininei, adik hujhie girie duoran huli no dinei, daba-daba somineigoi Pitore girie duoranot thiei agegi bili janeilogoi.
44012015	Hintu sigune tare holak, “Tor mada horab oiede!” Hintu sien soittio bili the eksottie hor Senottei sigune holak, “Ibie tar aptabuo obode.”
44012016	Ar Pitore eksottie baschier. Jokke thara duoran hulinei tare degilak thara asharjio olak.
44012017	Hintu sub gori thebartei Pitore ad bijilo. The tharare holo hingori Probuie tare jiel-hanaganottun nigilei annie. Ar the tharare holo, “Jeinei Jakobore ar bheilogkunore ei hodagani hogoi.” Sebeden the siottun jeinegoi ekkan oinnio jagat gelo.
44012018	Beinnie phor oinei soinnioguno moiddie birat jagulug udilo. Pitore hudu gelo thara hobor no pan.
44012019	Herode Pitorore gome-dalei togeinei no peinei, the subidargunottun gome-dalei juob lologoi. Ar subidargunore morei pheleibartei soinniogunore ugum dilo.
44012020	Sei lokkene Herode Tyre ar Sidon sohoro manuschuno ugure baari rak oie. Hintu thara ega mone tar idu ejchion. Tharare sahajjio goribartei Blasta, rajar ghoro daettoloiebuore bujeion. Rajar dejottun haiddio tharar rejjiot duon hinottei shanti magilak.
44012021	Thik gorsiede dinnuot, Herode raj-pojak urinei tar singasonanot bojinei tharare bhason dilo.
44012022	Ar manuschune eksottie joi-jogar parton, “Ibie manjior sobdo noi, Itchioro sobdo!”
44012023	The Itchiorore baini no gore hinottei jogon-togon ekkuo sorgo-dude tare mugureie ar tare ereie puge heinei mori jeie.
44012024	Hintu Itchioro hodagan bari jeinei shagor olo.
44012025	Barnabaloi Saula tharar haman phureinei Jerusalem sohorottun phirilak. Ette tharar loge gori hellie-nange Marka honde Johonoreio anilak.
44013001	Antiok sohoro mondoli-buot muni ar mastor elak. Thara olakke Barnaba, Simeon, jare Niger hon, Kurini hullie Lucia, Manaen, je Tetrakoδ Herodo loge dangor-digowl oiede sibie ar Saula.
44013002	Thara Probur ham gorte ar ubos thagke seiet, Pobitro Aptai holo, “Jei haman goribartei mui tharare dakkuong sien goron para Barnabare ar Saulare mortei pharok gori duo.”
44013003	Sebeden ubos theinei ar tharar mada ugure ad tuli dinei bor magi dinei padei dilak.
44013004	Sebeden Pobitro Aptai tharare dipadenei thara Selukia adamanot gelak. Siottun jahajot gori Kupra dippuot jeion.
44013005	Thara Salami sohoranot lunginei, Jud-aiunor synagogot Itchioro hoda prosar gorilak. Tharare sahajjio gorie Johoneio tharar loge elo.
44013006	Thara goda dippuo bereinei Paphos sohor song gelak. Siot Bar Jisu nange Judai manus ek jon lak pelakkoi. The olode bhilgi parie ar no goli muni.
44013007	The sason-gorie Paular loge elo. Sergia Paula baari gyeni elo. The Itchioro hoda sunibartei Barnabare ar Saulare daga bajei die.
44013008	Hintu sason-goriebuoi bischias no gore para bhilgi parie Elyma tharare badha die. (tharar hodadi ‘Elyma,’ orthogan gyeni manus.)
44013009	Sebeden Saula, Paula honde sibiei, Pobitro Aptaloi boron oinei tare ekrini sei age.
44013010	Ar the holo, “Oh beg dhogabaschun ar hu-mondoi boronnuo, Diabolaδ puobuo, beg dharmigkotanir sottrubuo, Probur uju podtan benga goranagan hokkene thum goribe?
44013011	Ar sa, Probur adtan tor ugure age. Tui han obe ar belan hanekkon degidie noi.” Ar jogon-togon huo ar andhar gori degilo. The seropala bijirier jene manjie tare adot dhorinei nejan.
44013012	Sason-goriebuoi sien deginei bischias gorilo. Probur sigkiegan the baari asharjio mone gorilo.
44013013	Paula ar tar somarsiegun Paphos sohorottun jahajot gori einei, Pamphylia rejjior Perga sohorot lungilakki. Johone siot tharare phelei einei Jerusalem sohorot phiri ejchiegoi.
44013014	Hintu thara Perga sohorottun einei Pisidia rejjior Antiok sohorot lungilakki. Jireni Dinnuot thara synagogot jeiei bojilakkoi.
44013015	Niomo ar muniguno boiun madanar porendi synagog sason-goriegune tharare hujoli gorinei holak, “Bab-bheilog, jonogonottei judi uschoni tuli dibar hoda thai ho.”
44013016	Sebeden Paula thiei udinei ad bijinei holo, “Israel manuschun ar Itchior doreiegun, mor hoda suno:
44013017	Israel manus-chuno Itchiorbuoi amar Purbo-puruschunun bei loie. Thara Egypt dejot tullo gori roiondoidie lokkene tharare unjol goridie. Ar tar shoktisali adtandoi the tharare siottun nigilei annie.
44013018	Ar perai solis bojor song the tharare moruobomit rageie.
44013019	Kanaan dejot sat jad the dongso goranar porendi, tharar madigani amar Purbo-puruschununore aak seinei bhag gori die.
44013020	“Sei porendi, perai share-ser shot bojor song tharare bijier gori die. Sien muni Samuel amol song elo.
44013021	Sebeden thara raja maginei Itchiore Benjamin gojadtun Kishoro puobuo Saulare raja obartei die. The solis bojor rajotto gorsie.
44013022	Itchiore tar rajagan phelei dinei, the tharattei Davidore raja tuli die. Itchiore tar sombondeio shakki dinei hoie, ‘Mor nijor monano dogkie manus mor ischie doge goribartei Jesir puobuo Davidore mui peiong. The mor ischie doge begkani goribuo.’
44013023	Soittio dede doge, ei Manuschuor bongsottun Itchiore Israelunottei ek jon Muktigorie Jisure tulibo.
44013024	The ebar agendi, mon phireinei baptisma lobartei Johone beg Israel manuschuno sidu prosar gorsie.
44013025	Ar Johone tar prosaro ses hadallie hoie, ‘Mui honna bili tumi mone goro? mui sibie noi. Hintu sawh, mor porendi ek jon ejer. Tar thengo jodar durienio mui huei dibar lak noi.’
44013026	“Bab-bheilog, Abrahamor bongsolok ar tomar moiddie Itchior dorode sigun, ei mukti hodagan tomar idu padei die oie.
44013027	Haron Jerusalem sohoro manuschune ar tharar murubbi-gune tare no sinon. Tobuio, tare duj badei duonde sienot tar sombonde muniguno hodagani pureie. Sei hodagani thara Jireni Dinnuot bagene madan.
44013028	Tare morei pheleibar huno ekkan haron no pheleio, Pilade tare morei pheleibar thara magkuon.
44013029	Tar sombonde lega oiede sieni begkani phureinei, tare kroschanottun lameinei ekkan guorot gareiondoi.
44013030	Hintu Itchiore tare morattun jiei tullie.
44013031	Tar loge Galili dejottun Jerusalem sohorot jeionde sigune onek dinsong tare degkuon. Sigun olakke tar sombonde manus-chuno sidu shakkidie.
44013032	Amar Purbo-puruschununore Itchiore soittio dede gom hoboran ami tomare janei dir.
44013033	Ami jigun tharar bongso, Itchiore Jisure morattun jiei tulinei sei soittiogan amattei purei die. Sien Sastrot Di lombor Baini Gido Boibuot lega agede doge: ‘Tui mor puo, edchie mui tore jormo dilung.’
44013034	Tar heyegan poji no jai para Jisure morattun jiei tulo oie. The edogkie gori hoie, “Mui Davidore duongge bischias-joggio pobitro soittiogan tore dim.”
44013035	Senottei, aro ekkuo Baini Godo Boibuot the ieno hoie, ‘Tor Pobitrobuo poji jebartei tui no dibe.’
44013036	“Haron Davide tar nijor piribuo Itchioro ischie doge sebona goranar porendi, the mori jeie ar tar Purbo-puruschununo loge gareion ar tar heyegan poji jeie.
44013037	Hintu Jare Itchiore jiei tullie sibie poji no jai.
44013038	Bab-bheilog, senottei mui tomare janei duongor ei Manuschuor darai pab hemagan tomar idu prosar gora olo.
44013039	Mosir Niomane tomare dharmig banei no pare. Hintu tar darai je bischias jai tare begkanittun dharmig bana oie.
44013040	Senottei uijkar oio, munigune hoionde sieni tomar ugure no lungegi para.
44013041	Thara holak, ‘Tumi guruto no diegun, sawh. Asarjio ar boij jeiegun! Haron tomar amolot mui ekkan edogkie ham gorim sien ek jone judi tomare janei dileo tumi huno din bischias no goriba.’ ”
44013042	Judaiune synagogottun jeinegoi, Be-jadtune sei porendi Jireni Dinnuot tharar sidu sei hodagani prosar goribartei Paul-are ar Barnabare hujoli gorilak.
44013043	Synagogo sobhagan bhonggo oinei, onek Judai manus ar Judai dhormot sommie dharmitto manjie Paula ar Barnaba pune-pune gelak. Thara Itchioro doyeganot jabotio thebak bili thara tharare ujuleilak.
44013044	Sei porendi Jireni Dinnuot perai goda sohorano manuschune Itchioro hoda sunibartei thubeilakki.
44013045	Judaiune manjior jhagkun deginei pijhum udilo. Paula horte hodagani biruddie oinei torgo dorilak.
44013046	Sebeden Paulattun ar Barnabattun sahoj udinei holak, “Dorkar bilinei Itchioro hodagan ami akke tomar idu holong. Hintu tumi aw-baddio gorsio hinottei ar ononto jibon pebar lak noi bili tumi nijore-nije mone gorila hinottei, sawh, ami Be-jadtuno mokkie jeirgoi.
44013047	Haron Probuie edogkie gori amare ugum gorsie: ‘Be-jadtune phor pebartei mui tomare bojei dilung. Pittimir thumsong manjie mukti pebartei mui tomare thik gorilung.’ ”
44013048	Be-jadtune sien suninei thara hujhi oinei Probur hodagani baini gorilak. Ar ononto jibon pebartei upojukto gora oiede sigune begkune bischias gorilak.
44013049	Sebeden Probur hodagan thara goda bamanit sidi dilak.
44013050	Hintu Judaiune dharmitto ar bhoddro miliegun ar sohorano ajol ajol morodtun bhejei dinei Paula ar Barnaba ugure uttiesar gora bajei dinei, tharar bamottun nigilei dilak.
44013051	Hintu Paulaloi Barnaba tharar thengo dhullieni siguno biruddie jhari dinei Ikonium sohorot gelak.
44013052	Ar sisjiogune hujhi ar Pobitro Aptaloi boron olak.
44014001	Ikonium sohorot Paulaloi Barnaba Judaiuno synagogot sominei edogkie gori holakkoi jei jhag-jhag Judai ar Grik manus bischias gorilak.
44014002	Hintu bischias no goronde Judaiune Be-jadtunore jagulug bajei dinei bheilogkuno biruddie tharar monani horab gori duon.
44014003	Sengori Paulaloi Barnaba sidu onek din thelak. Probur sombonde thara sahoj gori ho dorilak. Probur doye hodagani shakki obartei tharar adedi amok ar asarjio ham gora bajei dilo.
44014004	Hintu sohoro jhag-jhag manuschun di bhag olak, ek dagie Judaiuno pokke ar ek dagie apostoluno pokke.
44014005	Be-jadtune ar Judaiune tharar murubbigun somot tharare gobodon ar sil mela dibar sadon.
44014006	Sien thara hobor pei, Lykonia zelar Lystra ar Derbe adamanit ar seropala jaganit dhei gelak.
44014007	Sienit thara gom hoboran prosar gorilakkoi.
44014008	Lystra adamanot jormottun duri leng, huno din adi no parsie ar thengot bolneie manus ek jon boi elo.
44014009	Sei Manuschuoi Paula hoda hode suinnie. Paula tare ekrini seinei mone gorilode jei tar bischias age hinottei tare gom gori para jebo.
44014010	Sebeden Paulai birat ro gori holo, “Tor thenganiloi uju gori thie!” Ar the pal mari udinei adi-adi bereilo.
44014011	Paula gorsiede sien manuschune deginei thara birat ro gori Lykonia hodadi holak, “Manjior ruk dorinei itchiorun amar idu ejchion!”
44014012	Barnabare thara Zeus dagilak. Paula hoda hoiebuo hinottei tare Hermen dagilak.
44014013	Sebeden tharar adamano mujungedi agede Zeus mondirbuottun dhormo-thagurbuoi, damara goru ar phul shora girie-duoranot anilo ar the manuschun somot Paula ar Barnaba sidu gojeinei dali-pujo diber sar.
44014014	Hintu apostol Barnaba ar Paulai sien suninei, tharar ursie haborani phadi pheleilak ar manjior jhagkuot daba-daba jeion.
44014015	Thara jogar parinei holak, “Babulok, ien hittei goror? Amio toma dogkie manus daw. Ami tomar idu prosar gorittie jei ei dorkar no lakkie jinijchani bad dinei jeda Itchiorbuo idu phiro. Ibie olode sorgo ar pittimi, sagor ar sienit agede beg jinijchani baneiebuo.
44014016	Ei Itchiorbuoi ago phirigunot beg jadtunore tharar nijor-nijor podedi jebartei die.
44014017	Jai ok, the jei gom ham gorsie sieni nijei shakki der. Amattei the agajottun jhor dide ar ritu bagene phol de. Amar monani the haiddioloi ar hujhiloi mon purei dide.”
44014018	Ei hodagani hoinei manjior jhagkuoi tharar sidu dali-pujo gojei dedonde siottun bole-bole badha di parsionde.
44014019	Sebeden Antiok ar Ikonium sohorottun Judaiune siot lungilakki. Manjior jhagkuore thara bhuleinei Paulare thara sil mela duon ar the morsie bilinei tare sejerei ninei adamo barendi thoiondoi.
44014020	Hintu sisjiogune tar seropala girineioi, the udinei adamot somilogoi. Tar hellie Paulaloi Barnaba Derbe adamot gelak.
44014021	Sei adamanot thara gom hoboran prosar gorinei onek sisjio tullion. Sebeden thara Lystra, Ikonium, ar Antiok sohorot phirilak.
44014022	Thara sisjio-guno monani shokto gori dilak, bischiaschanot onsur thebartei tharare uschoni tuli dinei holak, “Onek hosto bhug gorinei ami Itchioro rejjioganot somi pebong.”
44014023	Mondoli bagene thara borjon tuli duon. Ubos theinei bor maginei, thara bischias gorsionde Probu sidu tharare gojei duon.
44014024	Pisidia rejjiogan phuri jeinei thara Pamphylia rejjiot lungilakki.
44014025	Perga sohorot thara Itchioro hodagan prosar gorana porendi, thara Attalia jahaj ghadtanot gelak.
44014026	Siottun thara jahajot gori Antiok sohorot gelak. Sei jaganot thara gori phureionde haman Probur doyeganot gojei dilak.
44014027	Thara lunginei, mondoli manuschune eksomare thubeilak. Thararloi Itchiore gorsiede sieni begkani thara hoi suneilak ar Be-jadtune bischias goron para Itchiore pod huli dede sieno suneilak.
44014028	Ar siot thara sisjioguno loge bhalukbilon thelak.
44015001	Ar hoiek jone Judea rejjiottun sidu jeinei bhei-logkunore sigeilakkoi, “Mosir dosturo doge tumi sundu-sam no habilie mukti peda noi.”
44015002	Senottei, Paula ar Barnaba sigundoi birat mana-mani no oinei torgo bajilo. Sebeden ei prosonnogandoi Jerusalem sohor song jeinei apostoluno sidu ar borjonnuno sidu jebartei Paulare, Barnabare ar tharattun hoiek jon thik gorilak.
44015003	Senottei, mondolibuoi tharare dipadenei, thara Phoenikia rejjiogan ar Samaria rejjiogan phuri jade, Be-jadtune hingori Itchioro sidu phiri elak sien thara janei dilak. Sei hoborandoi beg bheilogkune baari hujhi olak.
44015004	Thara Jerusalem sohorot lunginei, mondolir manuschune, apostolune ar borjonnune tharare gojhi lolak. Itchiorbuoi Paulaloi Barnabar darai gorsiede sieni begkani thara holak.
44015005	Hintu hoiek jon Pharisi dolottun bischiasi manjie udinei holak, “Be-jadtune sundu-sam habana dorkar ar thara Mosir Nioman paleibartei ami tharare ugum di.”
44015006	Sebeden ei hodagan sintie goribartei apostolune ar borjonnune eksomare thubeilak.
44015007	Bhalukkon thara huobula goranar porendi, Pitore thieinei tharare holo, “Bab-bheilog, tumi hobor po agendi Be-jadtune mor muottun gom hoboran suninei bischias goron para Itchiore amar moiddiettun bei tullie.
44015008	Itchiore ontorani hobor pai hinottei, amare dede dogkie gori tharare Pobitro Apta dinei gojhi loie bili degeie.
44015009	Bischiaso darai tharar ontorani poriskar gori dinei amarloi tharare hitchu pharok no gore.
44015010	Senottei, ikkie hittei amar Purbo-puruschunune ar ami boi ni no parsie jungol sisjioguno gortona ugure tuli dinei Itchiorore porikkie sor?
44015011	Hintu ami bischias gori Probu Jisu Kristor doye darai thara dogkie gori amio mukti obong.”
44015012	Sebeden beg manjior jhagkuo olor oinei Barnabar ar Paular hodagani suni agon. Tharar darai Itchiore hingori Be-jadtuno moiddie sinno ar amok ham gorsie sieni thara janei dilak.
44015013	Ar thara olor oinei, Jakobe uttor dinei holo, “Bab-bheilog, mor hoda suno.
44015014	Simeone hoiede hingori Itchiore akke Be-jadtuno sidu bereinei tar nangan loie manus obartei tharar moiddiettun basoni gorsie.
44015015	Sastrot lega agede doge ei hodagandoi muniguno hodagan milie,
44015016	‘Ienir porendi mui phiri einei Davidor jhuri porsie terpal haboran aro tulimbi. Bhangi jeieni mui aro tulimbi.
44015017	Bagi manuschune ar mor nangano darai daga oiede Be-jadtuneo Probure togan para, sieni begkani gorsiede PROBUIE hor.’
44015018	“Purbettun duri Probuie beg tar hamani hobor pai.
44015019	Senottei, Itchioro sidu ettonde Be-jadtunore ami jagulug no gorana. Ien mor bijiere hoi.
44015020	Hintu ami tharare legi jene thara muktie aw-pobitro gorsie jinijchanittun durot than, shanda hamortun durot than, ar gortona mujoridinei morei phellie jinij ar lo no haan.
44015021	Haron agottun duri onek piri song Mosir hodagani prottiek sohorot prosar gori ejchuon, ar prottiek Sabbath bagene synagogot sieni madei etton.”
44015022	Sebeden apostolune ar borjonnune tharar moiddiettun manus bei loinei, Antiok sohorot padei dile gom obo bili mone gorilak. Ar goda mondolibuoio sien manilo. Paula ar Barnaba loge jei paron para, hellie-nange Barsaba dagonde Judare ar Silare thara bei lolak. Thara olakke bheilogkuno moiddie murubbi.
44015023	Tharar ade ei sidigan padei dilak: Ami apostolune, borjonnune ar Bheilogkune, Antiok sohorot, Syria rejjiot ar Kilikia rejjiot agonde Be-jad bischiasigunore salam janeinei legir.
44015024	Ami suinneidie amattun hoiek jon tomar idu einei tharar hodaloi tomar monani jagulug gori dinei, tomar bischiaschan shiongshama gori duondi. Thara tomare hoiondi, “Tumi sundu-sam habi peba ar Mosir Nioman palei peba.” Sedogkie gori hobarlittei ami tharare ugum no di.
44015025	Ami ega mone temmang gorinei, tomar idu bei tullie manus amar agojor Barnaba ar Paula loge dipadele gom obo bili mone gorilong.
44015026	Barnabaloi Paula olakke amar Probu Jisu Kristor nanganottei jibon bajeie manus.
44015027	Senottei, ami Judare ar Silare dipadelong. Tharaio muendi sei hoboran suneibakki.
