44015028	Haron ien Pobitro Aptai ar ami gom bili mone gorir jei ami tomare gour bugi bugeidi didong noi. Ieni olode dorkari hodagani:
44015029	Moktire gojeie jinij no heio, lo no heio, gortona mojori dinei morei phellie poshur era no heio ar shanda no gorsio. Tumi judi ienittun durot thago baari gom obo. Bejar no oio.”
44015030	Senottei, tharare dipada oinei thara Antiok sohorot elak. Thara manjior jhagkuo eksomare daginei sidigani dilak.
44015031	Thara sidigani madanar porendi shantona peinei hujhi olak.
44015032	Judaloi Sila thara nijeio muni hinottei, onek hodadi bheilogkunore uschoni tuli dinedi shokto gorilak.
44015033	Sidu thara hoiekdin thanar porendi, tharare apostoluno sidu bheilogkunottun salam somot Jerusalem sohorot phirei dilak.
44015034	Hintu sidu thana-gan gom obo bili Sila bhabilo.
44015035	Paulaloi Barnabaio Antiok sohorot thelak. Onek jon somot thara Probur hodagan sigkie di di prosar gorilak.
44015036	Sebeden onek din porendi Paula Barnabare holo, “Probur hoda prosar gorseidie prottiek sohoranit phiri jeinei bhei-logkunore hobor dorigoi ar thara hi gorton segoi.”
44015037	Hellie-nange Marka honde Johonore Barnabai tharar loge ebartei mone holo.
44015038	Hintu Paulai sien thik mone no gorilo. Haron Marka tharar loge hamot no jeinei tharare Pamphylia rejjiottun phelei ejchiegoi.
44015039	Sebeden ettoman mana-mani no olak jei thara pharok olak. Ar senottei Barnaba Markare loinei Kupra dippuot jahajot gori gelogoi.
44015040	Paula hintu Silare bei lolo. Ar bheilogkune tare Itchioro doyenot gojei dinei theo gelogoi.
44015041	Syria ar Kilikia rejjiogani berei-berei jeinei mondoligunore shokto gorilogoi.
44016001	Sebeden Paula Derbe ar Lystra adamanit lungilogi. Ar sawh, Timothi nange ek jon sisjio siot elo. Tar ma olode bischiasi Judai milie, hintu tar babpuo olode Grik manus.
44016002	Lystra adamot ar Ikonium sohorot agonde bheilogkune tare baari gom hon.
44016003	Paula tare loge gori nijeibartei mone hoinei, tare sundu-sam habi dilo. Haron sei bamot agonde beg Judaiune hobor pande Timothi babpuo olode Grik manus.
44016004	Thara adam berei-berei jade, apostolune ar borjonnune thara manibartei Jerusalemot thik gorsionde ugumani di di jeion.
44016005	Senottei, mondoligune bischiasot shokto olak ar din-din sangadik barilak.
44016006	Thara Phrygia ar Galatia rejjiogani phuri jade, Asia rejjiot prosar goranagan Pobitro Aptai mana gorilo.
44016007	Thara Mysia bamot ejanar porendi, Bithunia rejjiot jebartei selak. Hintu Aptai tharare jebartei no dilo.
44016008	Senottei thara Mysia baman phelei jeinei Troas adamanot elak.
44016009	Reidot Paula ekkan azilie degilo. Makidonia hullie ek jon thieinei tare hujoli gorinei holo, “Makidonia rejjiot par oinei amare bol duogi.”
44016010	Sebeden the aziliegan deginei, jogon-togon amattun Makidonia rejjziot jebar mone holo. Ami mone gorilongge tharare gom hoboran janei dibarloittei Probuie amare dagilo. Lydiai Bischias Gorilo
44016011	Senottei, Troas adamortun jahajot gori uju-uju Samothrace dippuot gelong. Tar hellie Neapolit gelong.
44016012	Siottun ami Philippi sohorot gelong. Sien olode ekkan Rom manuschune sason goronde jaga ar Makidonia jelar begottun dangor sohor. Siot ami onek din roiei.
44016013	Jireni Dinnuot sohorottun nigilinei sora parot bor magonde jaganot ami jedong. Ar siot bojineioi siot thubondoidie milie-gunore janei di.
44016014	Lydia nange ekkuo miliei amar hodagani sunilo. The olode Thyatira soho-rottun halisuri habor bejie ar Itchior bhokto. Paular hodagani sunibartei Probuie tar ontoran huli die.
44016015	The ar tar ghorbobuo baptisma lonar porendi, the amare hujoli gorinei holo, “Tumi more Probur bischiasi bili mone gorilie, mor ghorot ejo thagogi.” Ar the amare baddio goreilo.
44016016	Ar edogkie olo ami bor maga jade, ekkuo gonei di pharede bhude peie milie-shawh lagot pelong. Sibie olode banidaji milie ar gonei di di the tar girojchunore onek tengaδ hamei die.
44016017	Sei miliebuoi Paular ar amare pune-pune einei birat ro gori holo, “Ei manuschun olakke begottun dangor Itchiorbuor sagorsie ar thara amare muktir podtan janei dedondi.”
44016018	Sengiri miliebuoi onek din hoie. Hintu Paulattun rak udinei pijendi phirinei apta-buore holo, “Jisu Kristo nange mui tore ugum duongor, tartun nigili ai!” Ar jogon-togon aptabuoi tartun nigili gelo.
44016019	Hintu jokke tengaδ hameibar ashagan gelogoi bili tar girojchune degilak, thara Paulare ar Silare dhorinei bazarot sason-gorieguno sidu sejerei nejeilak.
44016020	Ar tharare agimuo sidu nejeinei holakkoi, “Ei Judai manuschune amar sohoranot birat gondogul bajei dilakki.
44016021	Thara amattei be-aini dostur sigei dedondi, ami Rom nagorig hinottei sieni lobar noi ar goribar noi.”
44016022	Sebeden manjior jhagkuoi Paula ar Silar biruddie udilak. Agimune Paula dagir ursie haborani phadi pheleilak. Sebeden tharare mugorloi mugurebartei thara ugum dilak.
44016023	Sebeden tharare thajei mugureinei, jielot bhorei tholakkoi. Ar gome subi dibartei jielor subidarbuore ugum dilak.
44016024	The Siennie ugum peinei the tharare moiddie jiel-hanaganot bhoreineioi tharar thengani toktat bani thoidilo.
44016025	Reid songbhagot Paulaloi Sila bor magodon ar Itchiorore baini gori-gori gid gadon ar beg jielot porsiegune suni agon.
44016026	Tokkanot ekkan birat bhujol beinei jiel-hana tolagan dhigdi-geilo. Jogon-togon jiel-hanaganor beg duorani hulo gelo ar beg jiel-hadiegunor shingollani huei gelo.
44016027	Jielor subidarbuo jaginei the jiel-hana duorani hulo gori degilo. Jiel-hadiegune dhei jeion bili the mone gorinei, horgogan hueinei tare the morei phelebar oie.
44016028	Hintu Paula tare birat ro gori dagi holo, “Tore tui hun no goris, ami begkun iot agi!”
44016029	Sebeden jielor subidarbuoi agun luro ana bajei dinei, daba-daba somilogoi. Dore girgirei-girgirei Paula ar Sila thengot porilogoi.
44016030	Sebeden the tharare barendi nejeinei holo, “Babulok, mukti pebartei mui hi gori peim?”
44016031	Ar thara holak, “Probu Jisu Kristore bischias gor tui ar tor ghorbobuo mukti peba.”
44016032	Sebeden thara Probur hodagan tare ar tar ghorot elakke begk-unore janei dilak.
44016033	Paulare ar Silare the tar ghorot reide-reide nejeinei tharar ghobagani dhoi dilogoi. Ar jogon-togon the ar tar beg ghorbobuo baptisma lolak.
44016034	Jielor subidarbuoi tharare tar ghorot nejanar porendi tharare bhat dilo. The ar tar beg ghorbobuo Itchiorore bischias gorsion hinottei the baari hujhi olo.
44016035	Roud phudinei, agimune jielor subidarbuo sidu polisor neta dipadenei holak, “Sei manuschun iri de.”
44016036	Ar jielor subidarbuoi sei hodagani Paulare holo, “Agimune mui tomare iri dibartei ugum duon. Tumi jei pariba. Shantie jogoi.”
44016037	Hintu Paula sigunore holo, “Ami olongge Rom nagorig, tobuio bijier neie gori thara amare manjior mujungot marsion ar jielot thoion. Ikkie thara amare gubone dipadeidak? Na, sien oi no pare! Thara nije einei amare nigilei dedogki.”
44016038	Sebeden polisor netagune ei hodagani agimunore hoineio, ar thara Rom nagorig bili suninei dorelak.
44016039	Sebeden thara einei hujoli gorinei tharare barendi aninei holak, sohoranottun jogoi.
44016040	Sebeden Paulaloi Sila jielottun nigilinei Lydia ghorot gelak. Bheilogkundoi dega-degi oinei tharare sahoj bhorei dilak. Sei porendi thara gelakkoi.
44017001	Amphipoli ar Apollonia sohorani berei phureinei Paulaloi Sila Thessalonika sohorot lungilakkoi. Siot Judaiunor synagog ekkan elo.
44017002	Sebeden Paula tar dosturo doge Judai manuschuno loge mijeineio, tin Sabbath song Sastrottun sei-sei thararloi huobula gorilogoi.
44017003	The orthogan bhangi di di degei dilo jei Kristo dug-hosto gori pebo ar morattun jiei udibo. Ar the tharare holo, “Mui tomare janei duongotte Jisu olode Kristo.”
44017004	Hoborandoi hoiek jone gom peinei Paula ar Sila indi mililekki. Shagor Itchior bhokto Grik manus ar onek ajol ajol milieio mililekki.
44017005	Hintu hoboran mani no paronde Judaiunottun pijhum udinei, bazarottun hoiek jon dujto manus aninei ekkuo jagulugkie dol goton gorilakki. Sebeden goda sohoranot uruttul bodeinei Jasono ghoran akkromon gorinei Paulare ar Silare bar gorinei manuschuno idu anibar selak.
44017006	Hintu tharare no peinei, thara Jasonore ar hoiek jon bheilog sohoro sason-gorieguno mujungge sejerei ninei holakkoi, “Ei manuschun songsaran ulot-palot gorinei iduio lungondi.
44017007	Jasone tharare jaga die. Moharaja Kaisaror ugumo biruddie thara begkani goron ar hon, aro oinnio ek jon raja age ar sibie olode Jisu.”
44017008	Manuschune ar sason-goriegune sei hodagani suninei jagulugot porilag.
44017009	Sebeden thara Jasonottun ar oinniogunottun tengaδ joma loinei iri dilak.
44017010	Sebeden bheilogkune Paulare ar Silare jogon-togon reide-reide Berea sohorot padei dilak. Thara lungineioi Judaiunor synagogot gelak.
44017011	Thessalonika manuschuno darane ei manuschun mon gom. Itchioro hodagan thara ega mone loion ar Paular hodagan oi ni noi sebartei thara nitto Sastrot togei san.
44017012	Senottei tharattun onek jone bischias gorsion. Balukjon Grik manjie ar onek nangkora morode ar milieio bischias gorsion.
44017013	Hintu Paula Berea sohorot Itchioro hoda prosar gorer bili thessalonika sohorottun Judaiune hobor peinei, siduio thara einei manjior jhagkun uruttul bodei dilakki.
44017014	Sebeden bheilogkune Paulare jogon-togon sagoro mokkie padei dilak. Hintu Silaloi Timothi duo jone sidu roion.
44017015	Paulare nejeionde sigune tare Athen sohor song barei duondoi. Thara ette, sittun Paula tharar ade ugum dilode Silaloi Timothi jhadi gori tar sidu jedak.
44017016	Athen sohorot Paula Silare ar Timothire barsei thagke, sohoran moktiloi boron gori the degilo. Siendoi tar monan jagulug olo.
44017017	Senottei synagogot the Judaiundoi ar oinnio bhokti manuschundoi huobula gorsie. Ath-bazarot thande manuschundoio nitto the huobula gorsie.
44017018	Sebeden hoiek jon Epikuriδ ar Stoikδ pundig Paulaloi lagot pa-pi olak. Ar hoiek jone holak, “Ei gop diebuoi hi hobar sai?” Ar ek dagie holak, “The bi-deji Itchioro sombonde prosar gorie obode,” haron the Jisur hoboran ar jiei uduonar sombonde tharare hoie.
44017019	Ar thara Paulare Ares Mounnuot nejeinei holak, “Ien ekkan nuo sigkie jieno sombonde tui hor, sien hi ami hobor pebartei sei.
44017020	Tui amare hobor no peie hoda suneile hinottei, sieni hi ortho ami hobor pebartei sei.”
44017021	Haron beg Athen hulliegunor ar siot bi-deji manuschunor, nuo hoda hona ar nuo hoda sunona bade ar hitchu goribar nei.
44017022	Sebeden Paula Ares Mounnuot moiddie thieinei holo, “Athen hulliegun, je huno iet mui degilungge tumi baari dharmig.
44017023	Haron mui berei-berei ette tumi tobona gorode jinijchani sade, mui ekkan pallieng lagot peiong ar siot ien lega age: HOBOR NO PEIE ITCHIORBUORE “Senottei, jare tumi hobor no peie gori tobona goro sibie mui tomare janei duongorli.
44017024	Jei Itchiorbuoi songsaran ar songsarot agede sieni begkani baneie, the sorgo ar pittimir Itchiorbuo hinottei manjior adtoi tullie mondirbuot no thai.
44017025	“The begkunore jibon, nijes ar jien lage sieni diebuo hinottei tartun huno ekkan jinij lagede dogkie gori, manjior adtoi jinij dinei tare tobona gora no pore.
44017026	Ek jonottun the beg jado manuschun baneie. Goda pittimit thara thei paron para tharattei somoi ar thebar shiminie banedie jene,
44017027	manjie tare bijirei-bijirei togan para ar asha gori tare togeinei pan para, judio the amar huno jonottun durot noi.
44017028	Haron ami tar darai poran peiei, bereir ar baji agi. Hoiek jon tomar nijor shulluk joreie hoion, ‘Haron amio olongge tar bongso.’
44017029	Senottei, ami Itchioro bongso hinottei Itchiorbuor hatchiekkan ar gotonan manjior adtoi ar haligoror darai sonaloi bah rubuoloi bah silloi baneie mukto dogkie mone no gorana.
44017030	Agendi Itchiore edogkie aw-gyenan obohela gori sei roie. Hintu ikkie the beg jagat ar beg manuschunore mon phireibartei ugum die.
44017031	Haron songsaran ek jono darai dhormo bijier goribartei Itchiore ekkuo din thik gorsie. Tare morattun jiei tulinei sien begkuno sidu proman die.”
44017032	Ar jokkene morattun jiei uduonar hoda suinnion, ek dagie thatta gorilak ar ek dagie holak, “Ei hodagan ami aro tortun sunibong.”
44017033	Senottei Paula tharar moiddiettun gelogoi.
44017034	Tobuio, hoiek jone Paular dol oinei bischias gorsion. Siguno moiddiettun olode Dionysia. The olode Ares Muonnorδ manus. Damari nange ekkuo milie ar oinnio jonio bischias gorie moiddie elak.
44018001	Sieni ghodi janar porendi, Paula Athen sohorottun jeinegoi Korinth sohorot gelo.
44018002	Siot Aquilla nange ek jon Pontus rejjior Judai manus the lagot pelogoi. Moharaja Klaudiai Rom sohorottun beg Judai manuschun jebarloittei ugum die hinottei Aquilla tar mogkuo Priskilla somot Italy dejottun hoiekdin agendi Korinth sohorot ejchie. Paula thararloi Lak pa-pi ologoi.
44018003	Tharar hameigan ekkuoi hinottei the tharar loge theinei ham gorilo. Tharar hameigan olode terpal habor banana.
44018004	Prottiek Jireni Dinnuot the synagogot huobula gorinei Judai manuschunore ar Grik manuschunore bujei dibartei seie.
44018005	Makidonia dejottun Sila ar Timothi lunginei, Aptai jor gori Paulare, Jisu olode Kristo bili Judai manuschunore shakki die bajei dilo.
44018006	Hintu thara tare badha duon ar tare sorjeion hinottei, the tar haborani jhari dinei tharare holo, “Tomar lor dujchan tomar nijor mada ugure thok. Mor dujchan mui erilung. Ikkiettun duri mui Be-jadtuno sidu jeim.”
44018007	Sebeden Paula siottun jeinei Justa nange ek jono ghorot somilogoi. The Itchior bhokti gore ar tar ghoran synagogo mujungot.
44018008	Sebeden synagog sason-gorie Krispu ar tar goda ghorbobuo bischias gorilak. Sebeden onek Korinth sohoro manjie suinnion ar bischias gorinei baptisma gorilak.
44018009	Reidot ekkan aziliet Probuie Paulare holo, “No dores, juro gori no theinei ho.
44018010	Mui tor loge agong hinottei, tore hoti goribartei huno jone tore akkromon no goribak, haron ei sohoranot onek mor manus agon.”
44018011	Senottei, tharar moiddie Paula der bojor theinei the Itchioro hoda tharare sigei dilo.
44018012	Gallio Akaia rejjior sason-gorie elode lokkene, Judaiune Paular biruddie eksong oinei udilak. Ar tare Kodot anilak.
44018013	Thara holak, “Ei Manuschuoi niomo biruddie gori manusch-unore Itchior tobona goribartei ujuluoi.”
44018014	Paula madi udibar oinei, Gallio Judai manuschunore holo, “Oh Judai manuschun! Tumi judi be-dhormi bah duj gorsie oborado hamo sombonde abitti goro sien mor sunibar osit.
44018015	Hintu ien ekkan edogkie hoda jienot nang ar tomar Niomo hoda age. Senottei tumi-tumi muohabilie goro. Haron mui edogkie hodat bijier gori odung no sang.”
44018016	Ar the bijieranottun bar gori dilo.
44018017	Sebeden beg Grik manuschune synagog sason-gorie Sosthenore dhorinei bijiero samne pidilak. Hintu Gallio sub gori roie.
44018018	Paula jei onek din thelo. Tar porendi bheilogkunottun the bidei loinei, jahajot gori Syria dejot gelo. Aquillaloi Priskillaio tar loge jeion. The Itchioro sidu manniegan shireibartei Kenkheria adamot tar sulan habilo.
44018019	Paula Ephesi sohorot lunginei, Priskillare ar Aquillare siot the phelei gelo. Hintu the nije synagogot jeinei Judaiundoi huobula gorilogoi.
44018020	Tharar loge hoiekdin thebartei Judaiune tare hujoli gorinei the no manilo.
44018021	Hintu the tharattun bidei loinei holo, “Ejette utchobpan je huno prokare mui Jerusalem sohorot phelei peimboi. Itchioro ischie ole, mui aro tomar idu phiri eim.” Sebeden the jahajot gori Ephesi sohorottun gelogoi.
44018022	Ar the Kaisarea sohorot udineigoi, Jerusalem sohorot jeinei mondo-libuore salam janeilogoi. Tar porendi, the Antiok sohorot gelo.
44018023	Antiok sohorot the hoiekdin thanar porendi, the aro porbhaj gorilo. Galatia ar Phrygia rejjiogani bar-bar berei-berei jeinei beg sisjiogunore shokto gorigoi.
44018024	Sei lokkene, Apollo nange ek jon Judai manus Ephesi sohorot lungilogi. The Alexandria sohorot jormo oie. The baari hodogi ar Sastro hoda shokto gori pare.
44018025	Tare Probur doge sigkie die oie. The mon doro hinottei, Probur hoda doledale hoi ar sigei de. Hintu the bana Johonor baptismagan hoboran pai.
44018026	synagogot the sahoj gori hoda ho arambo gorsie. Hintu jokkene Aquillaloi Priskilla suinnion, tare ek huredi ninei Itchioro hoda tare dolei bhangi dilak.
44018027	Jokkene Apollo Akaia dejot par obarloittei sar, bheilogkune sidugor sisjiogunore tare sorman gorinei gojhi lobartei sidi legilak. Sebeden the lungineioi, doyer darai bischias gorsionde sigunore birat sahajjio gorilogoi.
44018028	Haron hulomela gori the Judaiunore torga-torgit shokto gori odei dinei Sastrottun proman dinei Jisu olode Kristo bilinei tharare degeie.
44019001	Ar edogkie olo, Apollo Korinth sohorot thagke Paula uguro bamedi torbuo einei Ephesi sohorot lunginei hoiek jon sisjio lagot pelogi.
44019002	The tharare holo, “Tumi bischias gorinei Pobitro Apta peio ni?” Ar thara holak, “Pobitro Apta age bilio ami no suni.”
44019003	Sebeden Paula tharare holo, “Tumi hi baptisma loio?” Ar thara uttor dilak, “Johonor baptismagan ami loiei.”
44019004	Ar Paula holo, “Johone mon phiranar baptisma gori die. The manuschunore hoiede tar porendi ebode sibiere bischias goridak ar sibie olode Jisu Kristo.”
44019005	Sigune sei hodagan suninei, Probu Jisur nange baptisma lolak.
44019006	Ar jokkene Paula tharar ugure ad tuli dilo, Pobitro Apta tharar ugure elo. Sebeden thara oinnio hodadi hoda hoinei ar muni dogkie gori hoda holak.
44019007	Perai thara begkune olakke baro jon.
44019008	Paula synagogot jeinei tin mas song sahoj gori hologoi. Haron degei di di Itchioro rejjior sombonde manuschunore bujei dilo.
44019009	Hintu ek dagie akkol han oinei bischias no gorilak ar Podtano biruddie manjior jhagkuot sorjeiondoi. Sebeden Paula tharattun pharok oinei, sisjiogun tar loge nejeilo ar nitto sei hodagani Tyranu iskulot huobula goron.
44019010	Ar sedogkie gori di bojor song solilo. Senottei Asia dejot thande sigune begkune, Judai manuschune ar Grik manuschuneo Probu Jisur hodagan sunilak.
44019011	Itchiore Paula adedi huno din no oie oborug ham gorilo.
44019012	Rumol hani bah ursie habor tar heyettun aw-sugkieguno sidu ni dile biedigani gom oi ar dujto aptagun nigili jan.
44019013	Sebeden hoiek jon bereie Judai manjie bhud dabei duonde sigune dujto aptai peiegunore Probu Jisur nangandoi nije dabei dibar sesta gorilak. Thara holak, “Paula prosar gorsiede Jisur nange ami ugum dir, tumi nigili jo.”
44019014	Skeva nange ek jon Judai manjior rajguruthagur elo. Tar sattuo puoio sien gorsion.
44019015	Ekkuo dujto aptai uttor dinei holo, “Jisure mui sinong, Paulareio mui sinong hintu tumi honna?”
44019016	Sebeden dujto aptai peie manuschuoi tharar ugure phal mari udinei tharare odei dilo. Tharar begkunottun the bes boli hinottei sigune ghoranottun uttie langda aghat oinei dhei jeiondoi.
44019017	Ien Ephesi sohorot thande beg Judai manuschuno sidu ar Grik manuschuno sidu hobor olo. Begkunor dor buguot somilo ar Probu Jisur nangan dangor olo.
44019018	Onek jon bischias gorsionde sigune siot einei haam heinei tharar bojong hamani holakki.
44019019	Boiddio-ali goriei onek jone tharar boiun aninei begkuno mujungot puri pheleilakki. Sei boiunor damani ijeb gori selakke, begkune ponjas azar rubuor tengaδ.
44019020	Sengori Probur hodagan shang-gadik gori bari jeinei, jidilo.
44019021	Sieni begkani phurona porendi, Paula Makidonia ar Akaia rejjiogani berei-berei jeinei Jerusalem sohorot jebar mone-mone thik gorinei holo, “Mui sidu lungonar porendi, mor Rom sohoroto ja poribo.”
44019022	Sebeden tare ham boldie di jon Timothi ar Erastasare Makidonia rejjiot padeilo. Hintu the hoiek din Asia dejot thelo. Ephesi Sohorot Gondogul
44019023	Sei lokkene Podtano som-bonde birat gondogul udilo.
44019024	Haron ek jon Demetria nange rubuo bannie sokkene elo. The Dienar shani ghoran rubuoloi banai ar the onek ham gorie rageie.
44019025	The tar dogkie haligorun ar hamgoriegun eksomare daginei tharare holo, “Bheilog, tumi hobor po ami ei bebshaganottun lab peir.
44019026	Bana Ephesi sohorot noi hintu perai goda Asia dejot hi olo tumi degor ar sunor. Ei Paulai adtoi baneie itchiorun Itchior noi hoinei bujei dinei di onek jon ujuleinei phirei nejeilo.
44019027	Senottei bana amar bebshagan dongso no obo, hintu dangor Itchior Diena mondirbuoio jien goda Asia dejor manjie ar songsaro manjie tobona goron sienor oborugkan obohela obo ar dongso obo.”
44019028	Ei hodagan thara suninei shanggadik rak udilo ar joi jogar pari-pari holak, “Ephesi hulliegunor Diena oborug!”
44019029	Sebeden goda sohoran gondogul olo. Tamaja ghoranot thara begkune eksomare geja-gejchie gori jeinei Makidonia hullie Paular porbhajo somarsie Gaiusore, ar Aristarsare dhorilak.
44019030	Ar Paula manjior jhagkuot jebar seinei sisjiogune tare jebar no dilak.
44019031	Sebeden Asia dejottun hoiek jon murubbi jigun tar bondhu elak sigune tare tamaja ghoranot no jebartei hobor dinei hujoli gorilak.
44019032	Ek dagie ekkan jogar parinei hon ar ek dagie aro ekkan jogar parinei hon. Senottei, birat jagulug olo ar tharar begbhage hittei thubeion hobor no pan.
44019033	Hoiek jon Judai manjie Alexanderore manjior jhagkuottun thelinei bar gorilak. Sebeden the ad bijinei manjior jhagkuor mujungot tare the bajeibar selo.
44019034	Theo Judai manus bili hobor peinei, thara begkune eksomare perai di ghonta song jogar pari-pari holak, “Ephesi hulliegunor Diena oborug!”
44019035	Sohoro heranibuoi manuschun olor gorana porendi, the holo, “Ephesi hulliegun, begkune hobor pan Zeusottun jhuri porsiegidie dangor Diena debir subhibuo ar tar mondirbuor rakkoligun olade tumi.
44019036	Senottei, ieni bharebar noi hinottei tumi sub ona dorkar ar abadaschie hitchu no gorsio.
44019037	Haronan olode tumi idu anniode sigune tomar mondirbuo no luddon ar tomar Itchiorbuor biruddie noio sorjan.
44019038	Senottei, Demetriar ar tar haligor somarsiegunor judi haro biruddie abitti thele, podtan hulo age ar bijierokkunio agon. Tharar sidu abitti dedogkoi.
44019039	Hintu tomar judi hitchu hobor pujor goribar thai, sien temmangot aino doge gora obo.
44019040	Haron edchie gondogulanottei ami daga hei pari, ar iot niom sara gori thubeilonggidie huno ekkan haron nei.”
44019041	Ar sien the hoinei manjior jhagkuo bhonggo gori dilo.
44020001	Jagulugkan thameinei, Paula sisjiogunore tar idu dagilo. Ar tharattun bidei loinei Makidonia rejjiot gelogoi.
44020002	The sei baman phuri jade sigunore onek buk bani di jeinei Greece rejjiot lungilogoi.
44020003	The sidu tin mas thelo. Ar the Syria rejjiot jahajodi jebar oinei, Judaiune tare hab di thelak. Senottei the Makidonia rejjiodi jebartei thik gorilo.
44020004	Ei manuschun tar somare Asia dej song jeion, Beria sohorottun Sopater, thessalonika sohoro hullie Aristarkaloi Sekundu, Derbe sohorottun Gaius loi Timothi ar Asia dejor manus dijon Tykhika loi Trophima.
44020005	Igune akke-akke jeinei Troas sohorot amare barsei roiondoi.
44020006	Hintu moli no gullie Pidie utchobo dinuno porendi, ami Philippi sohorottun jahajot gori jeiei. Pas dino porendi ami Troas sohorot lunginei thararloi egottor olong ar sidu ek sapta thelong.
44020007	Saptar polim dinnuot, sisjio-gune jokkene eksomare pidie hotta goribartei ejchion, ar Paula tar hellie jebarloittei jugol oie hinottei, the thararloi hoda hode-hode reid song bhag oie.
44020008	Uguro tolat thara thubeionde siot onek lembo dhoreion.
44020009	Ekkuo phogodi hanat bojinei Eutyka nange ek jon gabur manus ghum jeie. Paula hoda hode, the ghume-ghume tin tolattun porineigoi tare mora bade tulliondoi.
44020010	Sebeden Paula tole lamineigoi tare sibi-sibi aza gorinei holo, “Mon jagulug no gorsio, haron tar ejo poran age.”
44020011	Sebeden Paula aro ugure udineigoi pidie hotta gorinei helo. Ar the hoda hode-hode phor olo. Sebeden the gelogoi.
44020012	Ar thara gabursiere nejeiondoi. The jeda oie hinottei tharar baari sahoj barilo.
44020013	Sebeden ami akke-akke jahajchanot jeinei ar jahajot gori Assos adamanot gelong. Siottun Paulare tuli lobonggoi gori mone-mone thik gorsei. Haron the ugum dede jei the torbuo jebar thik gorsie.
44020014	Ar Assos adamot ami tare lak peinei tuli loinei Mitylene sohorot gelong.
44020015	Siottun ami jahajot gori gelong ar tar hellie ami Kios dippuo uju lungilongoi. Aro tar hellie ami Samos dippuot lungineioi, Trogullio adamot roiegoi. Sebeden tar hellie ami Miletus sohorot lungiegoi.
44020016	Haron Asia dejot ami somoi nosto gori no pei para, Ephesi sohoran tek habi pelai jebartei Paula thik gorsie. Haron judi sombob ole, the Pentikost Dinnuot Jerusalem sohorot lungibarloittei hijie-hijchie bajeie.
44020017	Miletus sohorottun Paula Ephesi sohorot manus dipadenei mondolir borjonnunore daga bajei dilo.
44020018	Ar jokkene sigune lungilakki, the tharare holo, “Tumi hobor po mui Asia dejot ejchiongge polim dinnuottun duri mui tomar moiddie hi poribhese roiong.
44020019	Beg niroittaniloi, sogo pani phelei phelei ar Judaiune more morei pheleibar seionde sienir darai porikkie moiddieo Probure mui sebona gorsiong.
44020020	Tumi hobor po tomartei jieni labhoban sieni mui ekkanio no rageinei tomare janei duong. Ar mui ghore ghore berei-berei hulomela gori tomare sigeiong.
44020021	Judaiunore ar Grik manuschunore shakki di di, Itchioro pokke mon phereibartei ar amar Probu Jisu Kristore bischias goribartei mui tharare janei duong.
44020022	“Ar ikkie tumi sawh, Pobitro Aptai more Jerusalem sohorot ja bajei der. Sidu mor hi obo hobor no pang.
44020023	Prottiek sohorot Pobitro Aptabuoi more uij dede doge mui bana ien hobor pangge jei jiel-hanagane ar hostogane more barsei age.
44020024	Hintu sienie more larei no pare, ar mor jibonan mortei moillio bilio mui mone no gorong. Hintu bana mor dumuro-dumurigan hujhi gori thum gorana ar Probu Jisuttun mui peiongge haman purei dena. Mor haman olode Itchioro doyegano sombonde gom hoboranore shakki dena.
44020025	Itchioro rejjiogano sombonde janei dibartei mui tomar begkuno idu jeiong. Ar ikkie sawh, mui hobor peiongge tumi mor muon aro no degibar.
44020026	Senottei, mui edchie shakki duongotte jei mui begkunor ni-duji loganor bodobagittun sarchuong.
44020027	Haron Itchioro beg hodagan tomare janei no die gori mui bagi no ragang.
44020028	Senottei, tomar ugure ar beg dolluo ugureo uijkar oio. Pobitro Aptai tharar moiddie tomare sedon seresta gorie baneie. The tar nijor loloi hinniede Itchioro mondolibuore soreio.
44020029	Haron ien mui hobor pang, mui janar porendi, era haande jharbuo hugur tomar moiddie sominei dolluo dongso goribakki.
44020030	Ar tomar moiddiettunio udinei, sisjiogun tharar pokke pharok gori nejeibartei jore-ie hoda hobak.
44020031	Senottei uijkar oio. Tin bojor song mui sogo pani phelei phelei reide-dine no thameie gori tomare jon bagene uij duongge sien monot tullio.
44020032	“Senottei bheilog ikkie mui tomare Itchiorbuo sidu gojei duongor. Ar tar doye hodaganotio mui tomare gojei duongor. Siene tomare gorei tuli paribo, ar pobitro oionde sigunor begkunor moiddie tomare odhiharo sompotti dibo.
44020033	Mui haror sona, rubuo bah habor lubbo no gorong.
44020034	Tumi hobor po mor ei adtanie mor dorkari jinijchani hamei die ar mor loge elakke sigunor dorkari jinijchanio hamei die.
44020035	Mui tomare sieni begkani degeiong. Tumio sedogkie gori ham gorsio. Bolneiegunore bol dibartei thajei ham gora pore. Probu Jisu hoiede hodagan monot tullio, ‘Pana darane denagan bes asirbad.’ ”
44020036	Paula sieni hoi phureinei, tharar begkuno loge adu pari porinei bor magilak.
44020037	Begkune gujhi-gujhi hani-hani Paulare aza gorinei sumilak.
44020038	Haron the hoiede jei thara tar muon aro degidak noi ar. Sei hodagandoi tharar baari monot dug phudilo. Thara sebeden jahajchanot song tare barei dilakkoi.
44021001	Ar edogkie olo, ami tharattun pharok oinei jahajot udinei uju podedi jeinei, Kos dippuot lungiegoi. Tar hellie Rhodes dippuot gelong ar siottun Pathara sohorot gelong.
44021002	Ar siot ekkan jahaj Phoenikia rejjiot jadte peinei, siot ami udinei ja dorilong.
44021003	Jokkene Kupra dippuo dega gelo, ami dippuo dokkinendi jeinei Syria rejjiot gelong. Tyre sohorot ami lamilonggoi. ar siot jahajchanottun mal-mattani lameion.
44021004	Ar sisjiogun suph peinei sidu ek sapta thelong. Aptar darai thara Paulare Jerusalem sohor song no jebartei holak.
44021005	Ek sapta phureinei, ami nigilinei aro ja dorilong. Sisjiogune tharar mog-puogun somot begkune amare sohoro barendi song barei duondi. Sebeden sagoro parot ami begkune adu parinei bor magilong.
44021006	Ar ami bidei lo-li gorinei, ami jahajchanot udilonggoi ar thara ghorot phiri gelak.
44021007	Tyre sohorottun duri amar porbhajchan phureinei, ami Ptolemai sohorot lunginei, bheilogkunore salam janeilong ar ami tharar loge ek din thelong.
44021008	Tar hellie, Paula somot ami jeinegoi ar Kaisarea sohorot lunginei prosarog Philibor ghorot somilonggoi ar tar loge thelong. The olode sat jonottun ek jon.
44021009	Ei manuschuottun seirbuo sodi gabur jhi elak ar thara muni dogkie gori hoda hoion.
44021010	Ami siot onek din thanar porendi, Agabas nange ek jon muni Judea dejottun lungilogi.
44021011	The amar idu einei Paular homor pijonigan loinei tar nijor ad-thengani siendoi baninei holo, “Pobitro Aptai edogkie gori hor, ‘Ei homor pijonigano girojchuore Jerusalem sohorot Judai manuschune edogkie gori banibak ar tare Be-jadtuno adot gojei dibag.’ ”
44021012	Ami sei hodagani suninei, ami ar sei jagano manuschune Paulare hujoli gorilong jene the Jerusalem sohorot no jai.
44021013	Sebeden Paula uttor dilo, “Hittei hanor ar mor monan bhangi duor? Haron bana banan haanaganottei mui jugol oi no agong, hintu Probu Jisur nange Jerusalem sohorot mui mori jebartei jugol oi agong.”
44021014	Senottei ami jokkene tare bujei no pari, ami ien hoinei olor olong, “Probur ischie doge ok.”
44021015	Ar sei porendi, ami bhudi jugoleinei Jerusalem sohor song gelong.
44021016	Kaisarea sohorottun hoiek jon sisjioio amar loge jeion. Thara amare Masonor ghorot nejeion ar ami siot rolonggoi. The olode Kupra dip hullie ar the olode polim sisjiottun ek jon.
44021017	Ami Jerusalem sohorot lungineioi, bheilogkune amare hujhi gori gojhi loion.
44021018	Tar hellie Paula ar ami oinniogun somot Jakobo sidu gelong. Ar siot beg borjonnun elak.
44021019	Paula tharare salam goranar porendi, tar hamano darai Itchiore Be-jadtuno sidu gorsiede sieni ekkan-ekkan gori bhangi holo.
44021020	Sien thara suninei Itchiorore baini gorilak. Ar sebeden thara tare holak, “Da, tui sa, hodok azar-azar Judai manjie bischias gorsion, ar thara begkune niomanottei utjogi.
44021021	Hintu tharare tor sombonde janeidie oiede jei tui bilie Be-jadtuno moiddie agonde beg Judai manuschunore sigeioschie jei thara Mosir niomani no paleidak. Tui hoioschie bilie jei thara puogunore sundu-sam habi no didak, ar tharar dosturani no adeidak.
44021022	Ami hi goribong sei? Tui ejchios bili sunilie, manjior jhagkuoi hamakkai thubeibo.
44021023	Senottei, ami tore jien hoi sien gor. Amattun ser jone soittio gorsion.
44021024	Sigun loinei tharar somot sudduo ogoi. Thara sul murei bartei tharar horojchun degoi. Sebeden begkune hobor pebakke jei tor sombonde hoionde hodagani soittio noi. Hintu tui Niomani paleile thara hobor pebakke jei tui Niomo doge agos.
44021025	Hintu bischias gorsionde Be-jadtunottei, temmangot ami thik gorsei die hodagan tharare legkiei. Sieni olode thara moktire gojeie jinij no hedak, lo no hedak, gortona mojori dinei morei phellie poshu era no hedak ar shanda no gortak, ar sei bara oinnio ekkan no paleidak.”
44021026	Tar hellie Paulai sei manuschun loinei tharar somot sudduo ologoi. Sebeden the mondirbuot jeinei sudduo oidie ses dinnuo janeilogoi, jene thara jon bagenettei pujo dipebak.
44021027	Ar sat din pureibar oinei, Asia dejottun Judai manuschune Paulare mondirbuot deginei goda manjior jhagkuo jodeinei tare dhorilak.
44021028	Sigune jogar pari-pari hodon, “Oh Israel jado manuschun, amare bol duo. Ei Manuschuoi amar manuschuno biruddie, niomo biruddie, ar ei jagano biruddie begkunore jagai jagai sigkie de. Ei bara, the Grik manuschun ei mondirbuo bidirie aninei ei pobitro jagan aw-pobitro gorilogi.”
44021029	(Haron ei agendi, Ephesi hullie Trophimare Paular loge sohoranot degkuon. Thara mone gorsionde, the tare mondirbuo bidirie bhoreiegi.)
44021030	Sebeden goda sohoran jagulug bodinei manuschun je jindi pai jadon. Thara Paulare dhorinei mondirbuottun nigilei anilak ar jogon-togon girier duorani nadilak.
44021031	Tare morei pheleibar sadonde lokkene, Romor soinniogunor senapotibuoδ sidu hoboran lungiegoi. The suinniede goda Jerusalem sohoranot jagulug uttie.
44021032	The jogon-togon hoiek jon ek shot jono ugure senapotiδ ar soinnio loinei tharar sidu daba-daba gelo. Judai manuschune Romor senapotibuoreδ ar soinniogunore deginei Paulare no maron ar.
44021033	Sebeden Romor senapoti-buoiδ einei Paulare jobdo gorilogi, ar tare dien shingolloi banibartei ugum dilo. Sebeden the honna ar the hi gorsie pujor gorilo.
44021034	Manjior jhagkuottun ek jone ekkan hon aro ek dagie ekkan hon. Jagulugot the soittio hodagan hobor no peinei, Paulare soinnio-gunor hembot bhoreibartei the ugum dilo.
44021035	Paula hembor phoidiegunot lungineioi, manjior jhagkuoi tare rage edok gori girilakkoi jei, soinniogune tare alok gorinei ni peion.
44021036	Haron pune-pune jeion manjior jhagkuoi jogar pari-pari hodon, “Pelo! pelo!”
44021037	Sebeden Paulare hembot bhoradegoi, the Roman senapotibuoreδ hujoli gorilo, “Mui torloi hoda hoi parim ni?” Romor senapotibuoi holo, “Tui Grik hoda janos ni?
44021038	Tui sei Egypt dejiabuo ni na, je hoiekdino agendi ekkan andolon tulinei ser azar manus hun gorie moruobomit nejeie?”
44021039	Hintu Paula holo, “Mui Tarsa sohoro hullie Judai manus. Mui Kilikia rejjior shadaron sohoro manus noi. Doye gorinei more manuschundoi hoda hobar de.”
44021040	Sebeden jokkene Paulare onumoti die olo, the phoidiegunot thieinei manuschunore adedi ijirie dilo. Ar jokkene begkune juro olak, the tharare Hebru hodadi holo,
44022001	“Bab-bheilog, ikkie mor rokkie hodagan suno.”
44022002	Paula Hebru hodadi tharare hode suninei, thara sittun bes juro olak. Sebeden the aro holo,
44022003	“Mui Judai manus, Kilikia rejjior Tarsa sohorot jormo. Hintu mui ei sohoranot Gamalielottun shigi-shigi dangor-digowl oiong. The more amar Purbo-puruschununor niomani shokto gori sigeie, ar edchie tomar begkuno dogkie Itchioro pokke muio utjogi elung.
44022004	Ar Podtan adeiegunore morei pelana song uttiesar gorsiong. Milie-morod mui tharare bani aninei jielot gojei duonggi.
44022005	Ei sombonde moharajguruthagurbuo ar beg borjono dolluo mor shakki agon. Tharattun mui bheilogkunottei sidi loinei, Damaska sohorot jeiong. Siot elakke sigunore sasti dibartei tharare Jerusalem sohorot bani anibartei mui jeiong.
44022006	“Ar edogkie olo, mui jade ar perai dibursie somoiot Damaska sohoro hai lungineioi, jhimid gori ekkan birat phor mor seropala phudilogi.
44022007	Sebeden mui madit borat gori porsiong ar ekkuoi roi more hode sunilung, ‘Saula, Saula hittei more uttiesar goror?’
44022008	Sebeden mui uttor dilung, ‘Probu, tui honna?’Ar the more holo, ‘Mui olunge tui uttiesar gorotte sibie, Nazareth hullie Jisu.’
44022009	Mor somarsiegune sei phoran deginei doreon, hintu more hoiede robuo thara no bujon.
44022010	Sebeden mui holung’ ‘Mor hi gora poribo, Probu?’Ar Probuie more holo, ‘Udinei Damaska sohorot sommoi. Tui hi goribartei mui tore thik gorsiong sidu tore begkani hoidie obo.’
44022011	Sei phorano tejchandoi mor sogkun morsion hinottei, mor somarsiegune more adot dhorinei Damaska sohorot bhoreilakkoi.
44022012	“Anania nange siot ek jon manus thedo. Niomo onusare the Itchior bhokto ar siot thande beg Judai manuschune tare gom hon.
44022013	The mor hai einei ar thieinei more hologi, ‘Bhai Saula, tor sogkun gom odog.’ Ar thik sokkene mui tare degilung.
44022014	Sebeden the holo, ‘Amar Purbo-puruschununor Itchiorbuor ischiegan tui hobor pebartei, Dhormittobuo degibartei ar Tar muor robuo sunibartei the tore bei loie.
44022015	Haron tui degkoschie ar suinnioschie sieni beg manuschunottei tui tar shakkidiebuo obe.
44022016	Ar ikkie tui hi barsei agos? Uth, baptisma lo. Probur nangan daginei tor pabpani dhoi pelagoi.’
44022017	“Ar edogkie olo, mui Jerusalem sohorot phiri einei ar mondirbuot mui bor magode be-us oinei porsiong.
44022018	Ar Probuie more hode degkuong: ‘Jhadi gor ar Jerusalem sohorottun jhadi gori nigili jagoi. Haron thara mor sombonde tor shakkigan no manibak.’
44022019	Sebeden mui holung, ‘Probu, prottiek synagog bagene thara hobor pan jei je tore bischias gore mui tharare jiel-hadang ar marong.
44022020	Tor shakkidie Stephanare lo phele dedonde lokkeneio mui siot hai elung ar tare morei pelana muio raji oiong. Tare morei peladonde sigunor haborani mui subi elung.’
44022021	“Sebeden the more holo, ‘Jagoi, haron mui tore iottun durot Be-jadtuno sidu dipadem.’ ”
44022022	Judai manuschune Paular hodagan sittur song sunilak. Sebeden thara jogar pari-pari hodon, “The baji thana lak noi, pelo! Pelo!”
44022023	Thara joi jogar parte, tharar ursie haborani phadi pheleion ar dhullie mela dedon.
44022024	Sebeden senapotibuoiδ Paulare hembo bidirie nejeibartei ugum dilo. Ar tar biruddie hittei joi jogar parton hobor pebartei mari mari pujor gora bajei dilo.
44022025	Paulare soinniogune samara duriloi bannionde lokkene, siot thiei agede ek shot jon soinnio ugure senapotibuoreδ the holo, “Duj sara gori ek jon Rom nagorig marana ainot age parapang?”
44022026	Ek shot jono ugure senapotibuoiδ sien suninei, the Romor senapotibuo sidu jeinei hologoi, “Tui hi goror seis hobotdar, haron ei manuschuo olode Rom nagorig.”
44022027	Sebeden Romor senapotibuoiδ einei Paulattun pujor gorilogi, “More ho tui Rom nagorig ni na?” Paula uttor dilo, “Oi.”
44022028	Rom senapotibuoiδ holo, “Ektal tengaδ dinei ei Rom nagorigkan mui hini loiong.” Hintu Paula holo, “Mui olungge jormo darai nagorig.”
44022029	Sebeden Paulare mari-mari pujor goribar oionde sigune jogon-togon pit lamilak. Romor senapotibuoiδ ek jon Rom nagorig the bannie bili buji parinei theo dorelo.
44022030	Tar hellie Romor senapotibuoiδ Paulare nojor bondittun iri dilo. Ar Judai manuschune hittei tare duj badei dedon sien the hobor pebar sai hinottei, the Rajguruthagurunore ar beg Sanhedrinuore azil obarlittei ugum dilo. Sebeden the Paulare lamei nejeinei tharar mujungot thie bajei dilo. Ar Paula Senhedrinnuot ekrini seinei holo,
44023001	“Bab-bheilog, Itchioro samne mui edchie song beg gom idie-ittaniloi agong.”
44023002	Sebeden moharajguruthagur Ananiai Paular hai thiei agonde sigunore Paulare mu sei suoreibartei ugum dilo.
44023003	Sebeden Paula tare holo, “Tui dhub hos-soreidie dogkiebuo, Itchiore tore suoreibo. Haron tui more niomo doge bijier goribartei boji agos. A hittei niomo biruddie gori tui more suoreibartei ugum dile?”
44023004	Paular hai thiei agonde sigune tare holak, “Itchioro moharajguru-thagurbuore tui goborte oi ni?”
44023005	Sebeden Paula holo, “Bheilog, the moharajguruthagur de mui hobor no pang. Haron Sastroie hoi, ‘Tor manuschunor sason-goriebuore no sorjeis.’ ”
44023006	Siot ek dagi olakke Sadduki dolottun ar ek dagi olakke Pharisi dolottun bili Paula hobor peinei, the Senhedrinnuot birat ro gori holo, “Bab-bheilog, mui ek jon Pharisir puo Pharisi. Morattun jiei uduona ashagano sombonde more bijier gora awr.”
44023007	Paula sei hodagan hoinei, Pharisigunor ar Saddukigunor moiddie birat torga-torgi bajilo. Ar siendoi manjior jhagkuo di bhag olo.
44023008	Haron Saddukigune honde jiei uduonagan nei, sorgo-dud nei, aptaio nei. Hintu Pharisigune duogan age gori manon.
44023009	Sebeden ekkan birat holorobo udilo. Pharisi dolottun dhormo niomo mastorune thajei torgo gorinei holak, “Ei manuschuor ami hitchu duj no pelong. Hintu aptai bah sorgo-dude judi tare hoi thele, Itchiorbuo biruddie judduo no goribong.”
44023010	Bes torga-torgi awr hinottei, Paulare shinie-shini goron bili Romor senapotibuoiδ dorelo. Senottei, soinniogun jeinei tharar moiddiettun Paulare bolajure aninei tare hembot nejeibartei the ugum dilo.
44023011	Hintu tar porendi reidtuot Probuie Paular hai thieinei hologi, “Sahoj gor, Jerusalem sohorot tui more shakki duoschie dogkie gori, Rom sohoroto tui more shakki die poribogoi.”
44023012	Phor oinei, hoiek jon Judai manjie dol ekkuo goton gorinei thara nije-nije sobot heinei holakke je, Paulare morei no phelele bhat-pani hedong noi.
44023013	Sei dolluot solis jonottun bes agon, jigune hu-ham goribartei goton gorsion.
44023014	Sigune rajguruthaguruno sidu ar borjonnuno sidu einei holakki, “Ami nije-nije sobot heiei, Paulare morei no phellie bhat-pani hedong noi.
44023015	Senottei tumi ikkine senhedrinnuo somot Romor senapotibuoreδ hujoli goro. Hellie the Paulare tomar idu ane para jei tumi aro tartun gome-dalei pujor goribade dogkie gori. Hintu the idu no lungiegi ami tare morei pheleibong.”
44023016	Hintu Paular bon puttuoi sei hapdi thana hodagan suninei, the jeinei hembot somineigoi Paulare hologoi.
44023017	Sebeden Paula ek jon ek shot soinnio ugure senapotiδ daginei holo, “Ei gabursiere Romor senapotibuor sidu neja. Haron tartun tare hoda hobar age.”
44023018	Senottei the tare Romor senapotibuorδ sidu nejeinei hologoi, “Bhondi oi agede Paulai more tar sidu daginei ei gabursiere tor idu mui anibartei magkie. The tore huno ekkan hoda hobar age.”
44023019	Sebeden Romor senapotibuoiδ gabursiere adot dhori ek huredi nejeinei juj gori pujor gorilogoi, “Tui more hi hode sas?”
44023020	Ar the holo, “Paulattun aro gome-dalei pujor goribakke dogkiegori, hellie Paulare tui senhedrinnuo sidu nejas para magibartei Judai manuschune raji oion.
44023021	Tui tharare no dis, haron solis jonottun bes manjie Paulare hapdi agon. Tare morei no phellie bhat-pani no hebak gori thara nije-nije sobot heion. Ikkie thara jugol oinei tore hujoli gorsionde sien barsei agon.”
44023022	“Ei hodagani tui more hoioschi bili harore no hos,” sieni hoinei Romor senapotibuoiδ gabursiere jebartei dilo.
44023023	Sebeden the dijon ek shot soinnio ugure senapotiδ daginei holo, “Di shot soinnio jugol goro, hottur jon ghora pidit gori jeie, ar di shot jon jadhi-bola manus. Edchie reidot noitai Kaisarea sohorot jo.
44023024	Sason-gorie Felixo sidu Paulare huno ekkan no oi para gori nejeibartei tharare ghora duo.”
44023025	The edogkie gori ekkan sidi legilo:
44023026	Mui Klaudia Lysia, Moha manonio sason-gorie Felixore salam janeinei legongor.
44023027	Judai manuschune ei manuschuore dhorsion ar morei pheleibar oion. Hintu soinnioloi mui lungineioi tare uddhar gorsiong. Mui hoi parilungge the olode Rom nagorig.
44023028	Hittei tare duj badei dedon haronan mui hobor pebartei mui tare tharar Senhedrinnuot nejeiong.
44023029	Mui hobor pelungge tare duj badei didonde olode tharar niomano prosonno sombonde. Hintu tare morei pheleibar bah bani tobar huno duj no pang.
44023030	Judai manuschune ei manuschuore hapdi agon bili more hoinei, mui tare tor idu jogon-togon padei dilung. Tare duj bade dedonde sigunoreo tar biruddie tor idu abitti diberlittei mui tharare ugum duong. Bejar no os.
44023031	Sebeden soinniogune tharare ugum die oiede doge, Paulare nejeion ar reide-reide tare Antipater sohorot annion.
44023032	Tar hellie, Paular loge jebar ghora pidit gori jeiegune gelakkoi, ar soinniogune hembot phiri elak.
44023033	Thara Kaisarea sohorot lungineioi, thara sason-goriebuore sidigan duondoi ar Paulareio tar adot gojei dilakkoi.
44023034	Sason-goriebuoi sidigan madanar porendi the hon rejjiottun ejchie pujor gorilo. The Kilikia rejjiottun bili hobor peinei,
44023035	Sebeden the holo, “Tore duj badei duonde sigun lungiliegi mui tor bijieran gori dim.” Sebeden Paulore Herode praetoriumotδ subidar dinei rageibartei the ugum dilo.
44024001	Pas dino porendi, moha-rajguruthagur Anania Kaisarea sohorot gelo. Tar loge hoiek jon borjon ar Tertulus nange ekkuo okil nejeie. The Paular biruddie sason-goriebuor sidu abitti gorilogoi.
44024002	Paulare azil goranar porendi, Tertuluse tare duj badei die arambo gorinei holo, “Tor sasonor darai ami hup shantie agi. Tui lamba gori seinei tui ei jadtuot unjol ani duos.
44024003	Moha manonio Felix, jagai jagai ar je huno pode ami onsur baari hujhi gori mani.
44024004	Hintu tor alsi gorsie no oi para, doye gori ekka sunibartei mui tore hujoli gorongor.
44024005	Haron ei manuschuo jagulug tuli die bili ami peiei. Goda songsaranot Judai manjior moiddie andolon tulo bajei de. Nazareth manjior dolot the olode ek lombor murubbi.
44024006	Mondirbuo pursondo the aw-pobitro goribar sesta gorsie. Ami tare dhorsiei ar amar niomo onusare ami tare bijier goribar seiei.
44024007	Hintu Rom senapotibuoδ Lysia einei bol-bola gori the amar adottun nejeiegi.
44024008	Tare duj badei diegunore tor idu ebartei the ugum die. Tui nije tare porikkie gorilie, ami tare duj bade di die sieni begkani hobor pebe.”
44024009	Judai manuschuneo sieni begkani oi bili hoinei raji oion.
44024010	Sebeden sason-goriebuoi Paulare hobartei shirie tighut-tighut gorsie hinottei, Paula holo, “Ei jadtuo ugure tui onek bojor song bijier gori ejor bili mui hobor pang hinottei, hujhi gori mortei mui uttor duongor.
44024011	Baro dinio no oi mui Jerusalem sohorot jeinei Itchior tobona gorsionggoi sien tui hamakkai hobor pebe.
44024012	Mondirbuot mui harorloi huobula gorte beg manuschunore synagogot ok sohoranot ok jagulug bajei dede thara more no pan.
44024013	Ikkie thara more duj badei didonde sieni tore proman di no paribak.
44024014	Hintu mui sien tor idu haam haang. mui olongge ek jon Podtan adeie ar sien thara ekkuo dol hon. Amar Purbo-puruschununor Itchiorbuo mui sengori tobona gorong. Niomo boibuot ar muniguno boibuot hoidie sieni begkani mui bischias gorong.
44024015	Itchioro iot mor asha age sien thara nijeio asha goron. mui bischias gorong jei mora manuschun, dharmig ar aw-dharmig duo-dagire Itchiore morattun jiei tulibo.
44024016	Sien uddischuo gori, Itchioro pokke ar manjior pokke poriskar idie-it pebartei mui onsur sesta gorong.
44024017	“Onek bojor porendi ikkie mui mor nijor jadtuore dan ar utchorbo dibartei ejchiong.
44024018	Sigunor moiddie Asia dejottun hoiek jon Judai manus einei mondirbuot more sudduo-sanggo ode degkuondi. Mor loge manjior jhag no elo ar mui huno jagulug no tulong.
44024019	Mor biruddie judi tharar hitchu thai, thara tor mujungot einei more duj badei dedokki.
44024020	Anole, mui Senhedrinnuo mujungot thiei agongge lokkene mor iot judi thara be-dhormi ham degei thele, iot agonde sigune nije hodok sale.
44024021	Bana ei jinijchan oi pare. Mui tharar mujungot thieinei jogar pari pari hoiong, ‘Morattun jiei uduonar sombonde more edchie tomar mujungot bijier gora awr.’ ”
44024022	Felixe sei hodagani suninei bijieran din phelei dilo. Podtano sombonde the gome-dalei hobor peinei holo, “Romor senapotibuoδ Lysia ele, mui tomar bijieran goridim.”
44024023	Paulare subidar dinei rageibartei ar tare ekka shadin dibartei ek shot jon soinnio ugure senapotibuoreδ the ugum dilo. Paular somarsiegune tar idu ejana ar tare jotton gorana sieni mana no goribartei the tare holo.
44024024	Hoiek din porendi, Felixe tar mogkuo Drusilla somot elo. Tar mogkuo olode Judai jad. The Paulare daga bajei dinei Kristore bischias gorsiede sombonde tartun sunilo.
44024025	Paula tare dharmigo sombonde, nijor domono sombonde ar ebode bijierano sombonde huobula gorte, Felixe dore holo, “Ikkiettei jagoi ar gom somoi phele mui tore daga bajei dim.”
44024026	Sei bidirendi, the Paulare iride para, Paulattun tengaδ pebar ashaio gorsie. Senottei the Paulare tugut-tugut daga bajei dinei tarloi hoda hoi.
44024027	Hintu di bojor porendi, Felixe bodoli oinei Porcia Festase elo. Ar Felixe Judai manuschunore mon paleidibar seie hinottei, the Paulare jielot bani phelei gelo.
44025001	Rejjioganot Festase lunginei, tin din porendi Kaisarea sohorottun the Jerusalem sohorot gelo.
44025002	Sebeden rajguruthagurune ar Judai manus-chunor murubbigune tare Paular biruddie janeilak ar abitti gorilak.
44025003	Paular biruddie tharare mon paleidibartei thara Festasore hujoli gorilak jene the Paulare Jerusalem sohorot azil obartei daga bajei de. Ar podot hab di theinei Paula ette morei pheleibartei.
44025004	Hintu Festase uttor dilo jei Paulare Kaisarea sohorot raga obo ar the nijeio sidu jhadi gori jebo.
44025005	The holo, “Senottei, murubbigune sidu thara mor loge jeiparibak. Sei manuschuor judi duj thai thara tare duj badeidi paribakkoi.”
44025006	Tharar loge Festase dos din thanar porendi, the Kaisarea sohorot gelo. Tar hellie the bijier gorede jaganot bojinei, Paulare anibartei ugum dilo.
44025007	Ar Paula lunginei, Jerusalem sohorottun jeionde Judai manuschune tar seropala thiei udilak. Thara Paulare shanggadik duj badei dilak jieni thara proman di no paron.
44025008	Sebeden Paula tare the rokkie goribartei holo, “Judai manuschunor Niomano biruddie ok mondirbuo biruddie ok Moharaj Kaisara biruddie ok mui hitchu duj no gorong.”
44025009	Hintu Festase Judai manuschunore mon paleidibar sai hinottei the Paulare uttor dinei holo, “Tui Jerusalem sohorot jeinei sidu mor mujungot ei hodaganir bijier obartei tortun mone hoi ni?”
44025010	Senottei Paula holo, “Kaisara bijier gorede jaganot mui thieiongi, ar iot more bijier gorana osit. Tui gome-dalei hobor pas mui Judai manuschuno sidu hitchu duj no gorong.
44025011	Haron mui judi duj gorie ong, bah moranar sasti pebar lak gori thele, mori jana mor huno abitti nei. Hintu judi ei manuschune more duj badei didonde sieni ekkanio soittio no ole, more huno jone tharar adot gojei di no paribak. Mui Kaisara sidu abitti gortung sang.”
44025012	Sebeden Festase murubbi-gundoi huobula gorinei the holo, “Kaisara sidu tui abitti gorilie, Kaisara sidu jeis.”
44025013	Hoiekdin porendi, raja Agripa ar Bernise somot Festasore salam janeibartei Kaisarea sohorot lungilogi.
44025014	Sidu thara onek din thelak hinottei, Festase Paular hodagan rajabuore holo, “Ek jon manus Felixe bondi gori phelei jei.
44025015	Mui Jerusalem sohorot elungge lokkene moha rajguruthagurune ar Judai manuschunor borjonnune tar sombonde more janeiondi, ar tar biruddie bijier gori dibartei hujoli gorsiondi.
44025016	Mui tharare uttor dinei hoiong, ‘Dujibuoi tare duj badeidiegundoi mujungo-mujungi oinei tar dujchanottun tare the bajeibartei sujuk no die gori morei pelana Rom nagorigor dostur noi.’
44025017	Senottei, thara eksomare mor idu einei bijieran diri phelei no die gori tar hellie mui bijiero jaganot bojinei manuschuore anibartei mui ugum duong.
44025018	Tare duj badeidiegune hobartei thiei udinei, mui asha gorsiongge doge thara tare huno ekkan duj badei di no paron.
44025019	Hintu tharar nijor dhormo sombonde tar biruddie hobar elo ar sien olode Jisur nange ek jon elo, jibe morsie ar Paulai the jeda oie bili hoi.
44025020	Mui sienir sombonde hobor no pang hinottei, sienor sombonde bijier gora oi para the Jerusalem Sohorot jebar mone hoi ni no hoi mui pujor gorsiong.
44025021	Hintu Paula jokkene bijieran moharaja Augustor sidu abitti seie, mui tare Kaisara sidu padei duong song tare rageibartei mui ugum duong.”
44025022	Sebeden Agripa Festasore holo, “Mui nijeio tar bijieran sunibar mone hoi.” Ar Festase holo, “Hellie tui tar bijieran sunis.”
44025023	Senottei tar hellie Agripaloi Bernise lunginei, senapotigunδ somot ar sohoranor ajol ajol manuschun somot bor gudhibuot jakjomog gori somilogoi. Ar Festasor ugumo onusare Paulare siot bhoreilakki.
44025024	Sebeden Festase holo, “Raja Agripa ar amar loge agode beg manuschun, ei manuschuo sawh! Tar sombonde goda Judai manuschunor jhagkuoi mor idu abitti gorsion. Jerusalem sohorot ar iduio jogar pari-pari hoion the baji thebar lak noi!
44025025	Hintu tar morana dondo obar lak bili the hitchu duj no gore bili mui hobor peinei, ar the nijeio moharaja Augusto sidu abitti seie hinottei, tare padei dibartei mui thik gorsiong.
44025026	Tar sombonde moharajare jodepode gori mor legibar hitchu nei. Senottei mui tomar begkunor mujungot, bes gori raja Agripa mujungot tare nigilei anilung. Ami tare porikkie goranar porendi tar sombonde hiju legibar thai para.
44025027	Haron mui mone gorongge duj badei no die gori ek jon bondi gori padei dena jukti noi.”
44026001	Sebeden Agripa Paulare holo, “Tor nijottei hobar tore onumoti die olo.” Sebeden Paula ad biji biji tar nijor pokke holo,
44026002	“Raja Agripa, mor pokke hobartei edchie mui tor mujungot thiei peinei mui baari bhaiggottie bili more mui mone gorongor. Judai manuschune more duj badei duonde sieni begkanir sombonde mor pokke hong.
44026003	Bischas gori tui Judai manuschunor beg dosturanir ar jagulugkanir sombonde podu hinottei, mor hodagani mon di suni thebartei mui tore hujoli gorongor.
44026004	“Agottun duri mui mor nijor jado sere Jerusalem sohorot roiong. Mui haroschie oiongge siottun duri mui hingori roiong beg Judai manuschune hobor pan.
44026005	Thara agottun duri hobor pan. Tharattun judi mone hoi amar dhormot shokto dolor mui ek jon Pharisi bili mor sombonde shakki di paron.
44026006	Itchiorbuoi amar Purbo-puruschununore dede ashagano soittiogan mui bischias gorong hinottei ikkie mui bijierot thiei pelunggi.
44026007	Sei soittiogan amar baro gojai pebar ashai, ega mone thara reide-dine Itchior tobona goron. Oh raja Agripa, sei ashagano sombonde Judai manuschune more duj badei duon.
44026008	Itchiore mora jiei tuli bili hittei tui bischias no goror?
44026009	“Nazareth hullie Jisu nangano biruddie mor onekkan gora poribo gori mui nijeio jodepode bhabi seiong.
44026010	Ar sedogkie Jerusalem sohorot mui gorsiong. Moharajguruthagurunottun odhihar peinei, onek sadhu manus mui jiel-hanat bhoreionggoi, ar sigunore morei peladonde lokkene mui sigunor biruddie vot duong.
44026011	Prottiek synagog bagene mui tharare nitto sasti duong, ar tharare mui sorja bajeiduong. Tharar biruddie mui shanggadik rak oinei, bi-deji sohorot pursondo mui tharare uttiesar gorsionggoi.
44026012	“Sieni gorte mui Damaska sohorot rajguruthagurunottun odhihar ar dipadeie uguman somot jade,
44026013	Oh moharaja, dibursie agajottun ekkan phor belanottun bes photpottie gori mor ar mor loge jadonde siguno seropalaio phuttiegidie mui degkuong.
44026014	Ar ami jokkene begkune madit porilong, ekkuo sobdoi Hebru hodadi more hode sunilung, ‘Saula, Saula, tui hittei more uttiesar goror? Suschieng jadhibuot ladi marana tortei aghattie age.’
44026015	Sebeden mui holung, ‘Probu, tui honna?’ Ar the holo, ‘Mui Jisu, tui uttiesar gorotte sibie.
44026016	Hintu udinei thie. Haron ienottei mui tor idu dega dilunggi: Tore sagorsie banebartei ar tui degilede ieni ar mui tore degeibar agede sienir shakkidie banebartei.
44026017	Tor nijor manuschunottun ar ikkie tore padei dimbie Be-jadtunottun mui tore rokkie gorim.
44026018	Tharar sogkun huli dibartei, andharottun phorot tharare phirei anibartei ar Soitano adottun Itchiorbuo sidu anibartei mui tore dipadangor, jene thara pabor hemagan pan para ar mor iot bischiaso darai pobitro oionde sigunor somare odhiharo sompotti pan para.’
44026019	“Oh raja Agripa, senottei sorgottun ejchiede ajhijiegano biruddie mui aw-mannio no gorong.
44026020	Akke mui Damaska sohorot agonde Judai manus-chunor sidu prosar gorsiong. Tar porendi Jerusalem sohorot elakke Judai manuschunor sidu ar goda Judea rejjiot elakke Judai manuschunor sidu mui prosar gorsiong. Mui Be-jadtuno siduio prosar gorsiong. Jene thara mon phireinei Itchiorbuo sidu phiron, ar mon phireion bili ham goron.
44026021	Sienittei Judai manuschune mondirbuot more dhorsion ar morei pheleibartei seion.
44026022	Sengori Itchiorbuottun sahajjio peinei, ejchiesong mui udinei sigon-dangor begkunor sidu shakki duongor. Ebode sienir sombonde munigune hoi jeionde ar Mosi hoi jeiede sieni bade mui hitchu no hong.
44026023	Kristo hosto bhug goribogi, morattun jiei ude the polimmuo obo, ar Judai manuschuno sidu ar Be-jadtuno sidu porano sombonde prosar goribogi.”
44026024	Engori Paula tare the bajeibar hoda horte seiet, Festase birat ro gori holo, “Paula, tor mada horab oie! Tui bes gori lega shiginei pagol oios!”
44026025	Hintu Paulai holo, “Oh moha manonio Festas, mui pagol noi hintu mui soittio hodagan ar haronan hongorte.
44026026	Mui mone gorong rajabuoi ieni begkani hobor pai, haron ieni hona bidirie gora no oi ar mui tare hulomela gori hoi parong.
44026027	Raja Agripa munigunor hodagani tui bischias goros ni? mui mone gorong tui bischias goros.”
44026028	Sebeden raja Agripai Paulare holo, “Tui more ekkattiei kristien banas.”
44026029	Ar Paulai holo, “Itchiorbuo sidu mui ien bor magong jei awlpo somoie ok bah bes somoie ok edchie tui ar je je mor hoda suner mor sigolan bade begkune oda.”
44026030	Paula ei hodagani hoieio rajabuoloi ar sason-goriebuoi thiei uttuon. Berniseo thiei uttie, ar siot tharar loge boi elakke siguneo thiei uttuon.
44026031	Thara sei gudhibuottun jeineigoi, thara-thara huobula gorton, “Ei manuschuoi moribar bah banan hebar moto ham no gore.”
44026032	Agripa Festasore holo, “The judi Kaisara sidu abitti no gorto ami tare iri di parilongun.”
44027001	Ami Italy dejot jahajot gori janagan thik goranar porendi, Augustan Regimentorδ Julia nange ek jon ek shot jon soinnio ugure senapotiδ elode sibiere Paula ar hoiek jon oinnio jiel porsie loge gojei duon.
44027002	Sebeden Adramyttium sohorottun ejchie jahajchanot udilong. Sien Asia dejor sagoro phare phare jaganit jebar oie. Thessalonika sohorottun Makidonia hullie Aristarka amar loge jeie. Sebeden ami jahajchanot gori gelonggoi.
44027003	Tar hellie ami Sidon sohorot lamilonggoi. Julia Paulare doye gorsie. Paula tar song somarsieguno sidu jeinei tar poran jurebartei the Paulare iri die.
44027004	Siottun ami aro jahajchanot gori gelonggoi. Boieran ami jeirtei mokkiettun bar hinottei, Kupra dippuor andole andole gelong.
44027005	Sebeden Kilikia ar Pamphylia rejjioganir sagoro paro hai sagoran phuri jei Lycia zelar Myra sohorot lungilonggoi.
44027006	Siot ek shot jon soinnio ugure senapotibuoiδ Alexandria sohoro jahaj Italy dejot jebar sien peinei, the amare jahajchanot tuli dilo.
44027007	Ami onek din lare-lare gori janar porendi, bole-bole Knidu sohoro paro uju lungilonggoi. Boierano sujuk nei gori ami ar jei no parilong. Sebeden ami Kret dippuor andole andole Salmon jagano uju lungilonggoi.
44027008	Bole-bole sien pak hei janar porendi, Dol Ghad honde jaganot lungilonggoi. Sien olode Lasa sohorano hai.
44027009	Onek somoi pelanar porendi, amar janagan birat aghattie oie. Senottei Paula tharare uij dilo, haron Ubos thanar somoien honatto bidi jeiegoi.
44027010	The tharare holo, “Oh bheilog, mui mone gorong ei jadtragan thum obode birat bipod somot ar onek hoti somot. Bana mal mattani ar jahajchan noi hintu amar jibonanio arebong.”
44027011	Hintu jahajchano sarangguoi ar jahajchano girojchuoi Paulai hoiede sienittun bes gori ek shot jon soinnio ugure senapotibuoreδ bujeion.
44027012	Jahajor ghadtan jarhalluo hadeibar upojukto noi hinottei, begbhage jebarloittei thik gorsion. Phoenikia sohoranot lunginei sidu jarhalluo hadeibarlottei asha gora oie. Sien olode Kret dippuot, dokkin pojim ar uttor pojim mokkie.
44027013	Dokkino boieran aste-aste jokkene bar, thara mone gorilakke jebar ari udilo. Sebeden tharar luo alan tulinei, Kret dippuor phare phare ja dorilak.
44027014	Hintu hanekkon porendi, Euroklydon honde ekkan bor boier belo.
44027015	Sebeden jahajchan bor boieranot porilo, ar jahajchan boierano mokkie jei no parinei boierane nejar.
44027016	Klauda honde dippuor andole-andole, bole-bole sigon nawgan nigilei parsion.
44027017	Sien panit lamei parinei, jahajchano tole hajhiloi banilak. Syrti Sorbuot adikkie uduondoi bili dore, pangeien tole phelei dinei di ja bajei duon.
44027018	Tubolot bes gori dug peiei hinottei tar hellie pojabiriegani panit phelei duon.
44027019	Tin dino dijiet jahajchanor aittierani amar nijor adtoi panit phelei dilong.
44027020	Onek dinsong belo mu ar thara mu no degi ar tubolan onsur uder. Sejot, ami bajibar asha areiei.
44027021	Onek din ubos thanar porendi, Paule tharar moiddie thieinei holo, “Bheilog, mor hoda suno. Kret dippuottun ami no edong edokkani hoti ar edokkani nosto no olun.
44027022	Hintu mui tomare buk bani duongor, no doreo! Haron huno jon no moribong, bana jahajchan nosto obode.
44027023	Haron gelle reidot, mui sebona gorongge ar mor Itchiorbuottun ekkuo sorgo-dud mor hai thieinei hoiegi.
44027024	‘Paula, no dores! Tui Kaisaror mujungot thiei pebegoi, ar sa, tor loge jahajchanot gori jadonde sigun begkun Itchiore tore hujhie die.’
44027025	Senottei bheilog, no doreo. Haron mui Itchior bischias gorong ar more hoiede doge obo.
44027026	Hintu amar je huno ekkuo dibuot uduo poribogoi.”
44027027	Soiddio dino reidtuot, Adriatik sagorot tubole ejosong endi-undi amare nejar. Perai reid song bhagot jahajchanor manuschune mone gorilakke thara hulo hai etton.
44027028	Thara sobdo bajeinei pelakke panigan huri biong gobhin. Aro hottur jeinei abar sobdo bajeinei pelakke panigan pondoro biong gobhin.
44027029	Sebeden adikkie silo ugure uduondoi bili dore, jahajchano pajhattun seiran luo al phelei duon, ar phor obartei bor magi magi thelak.
44027030	Jahajchano ugurettun luo alani phelei dedonde dogkie gori jokkene sigon nawgan panit lamadon, jahajchanor manuschune jahajchanottun dhei jebarloittei sadon.
44027031	Paula ek shot jon soinnio ugure senapotibuoreδ ar soinniogunore holo, “Ei manuschun jahajchanot no thele, tumi baji parta noi.”
44027032	Sebeden soinniogune sigon nawgano hajhigani habi dinei phelei dilak.
44027033	Phor awtte lokke, Paula begkunore bhat hebartei hujoli gorinei holo, “Edchie soiddio din olo tumi bhat-pani no heie gori eksottie barsei ago.
44027034	Senottei, bhat hebartei mui tomare hujoli gorongor. Haron bhattun olakke tumi bajibartei, hittei hodosele tomar madattun ekkan sulo porto noi.”
44027035	The sei hodagani honar porendi, pidie adot loinei begkunor mujungot Itchiorore hujhi hoda honar porendi hotta gori-gori ha dorilo.
44027036	Siendoi begkunor sahoj barilo ar begkune bhat helak.
44027037	Ami begkune di sho shiehottur jon jahajchanot elong.
44027038	Sebeden thara ped boron heinei, thara jahajchan padol goribartei ghomun panit phelei dilak.
44027039	Phor oinei thara jagagan no sinilak. Hintu thara ekkan ghona ar ekkuo sor degkuon jiot parilie jahajchan bhirebartei thik gorsion.
44027040	Sebeden thara luo alani sagorot phelei dilak. Sieni gorte pangeigano hajhigani areion. Boierot porda haboran tangi dinei bhirebartei selak.
44027041	Hintu dien ghulot porinei jahajchan muro ugure udilogoi. Agagan shokto gori bajhi theinei no sattiei ai. Hintu pajhagan pani tubolo bari hei bhangi jeie.
44027042	Jiel porsiegune shajuri jeinei dhei jan bili, soinniogune tharare morei pheleibartei thik gorsion.
44027043	Hintu ek shot jon soinnio ugure senapotibuoiδ Paulare bajeibartei sigune tharare morei pheleibartei mana gorsie. Ar je shajuri pare jham mari jeinei akke murot udibarloitei the ugum dilo.
44027044	Sebeden hodogkune nawt gori uttuondoi, ar hodogkune jahajchanor bhanga hottat gori uttuondoi. Sedogkie gori begkune gome-dalei muro ugure uttuondoi.
44028001	Muro ugure udinei oi hobor pelakke sei dippuo Malta hon.
44028002	Sei dippuor manuschune egahora lobiot gorsion. Amattei agun jalei dinei amare dakkuon, haron jhor der ar thanda.
44028003	Ar Paula ek thara darbuo aninei agunanot dinei, gorom peinei ekkuo jamuro sab nigili einei Paular adtanot huttiegi.
44028004	Sebeden dippuor manuschune sabpuo tar adtanot dulo-dulo gori deginei, thara-thara huobula gorton, “Ei manuschuo hamakkai hun gorie obo. Judio sagoranottun uddhar oi eleio, Soittiogane tare bajibar no der.”
44028005	Hintu the jhagereinei sabpuore agunanot phelei die ar tar hitchu bis no bai.
44028006	Thara mone gorsionde the phulibo bah borat gori porinei moribo. Hintu thara bhalukkon tare sei theinei ar tar hitchu hoti no oidie deginei, tharar monani phireinei hoionde je the ekkuo Itchior.
44028007	Sei lokkene dippuot, Publia nange ek jon murubbir sei bamot jaga elo. The amare tar ghorot daginei tin din rageie.
44028008	Ar edogkie olo, Publiar babpuo jhor ar shang oinei pori elo. Paule tar sidu jeinei tare adtuli dinei bor magi dinei gom gorilo.
44028009	Sien onar porendi, dippuor oinnio aw-sugkiegune elak ar Paule tharare gom gori dilo.
44028010	Thara amare onek hittendi lobiot gorsion. Ami jadegoi, amar hi hi lage thara amare duon.
44028011	Tin mas porendi, ami Alexandriar jahajot gori gelong. Sienot Jama Bheior mokti ageie elo. Siene jarhalluo dippuot hadeie.
44028012	Syraku sohorot ami laminei siot tin din roiei.
44028013	Siottun guri jeinei Rhegium sohorot lungiegoi. Ar ek din porendi, dokkino boieran beinei tar hellie Putheoli sohorot elong.
44028014	Siot hoiek jon bheilog lagot peinei thara amare boleinei tharar loge ek sapta thelong. Ar sengori ami Rom sohoro mokkie gelong.
44028015	Rom sohorottun bheilogkune amar ejanar sombonde suninei, thara amarloi lak pa-pi obartei, Appii Bazar ar Tin Hotel song ejchuon. Paula tharare deginei, the Itchiorore donniobad dilo ar sahoj elo.
44028016	Ami Rom sohorot lungineioi, ek shot jon soinnio ugure senapotibuoiδ jiel hadiegun hembot ajol netabuore gojei diegoi. Hintu Paula gai-gai ek jon subidarloi thebartei the onumoti dilo.
44028017	Tin din porendi Paula Judai murubbigunore eksomare dagilo. Thara eksomare thubeinei, Paula tharare holo, “Bab-bheilog, judio amar manuschunor biruddie bah amar Purbo-puruschununor dosturani biruddie mui hitchu gori no theleio, tobuio more Jerusalem sohorottun Romor manuschunor adot bondhi gori gojei duon.
44028018	Romor manuschune more porikkie goranar porendi, more morei phelebar moto duj no pan hinottei thara iri dibar seion.
44028019	Hintu Judai manuschune abitti gorinei, Kaisara idu mor abitti gora porsie. Mor jadtuor biruddie mor hitchu duj dibar nei.
44028020	Ei haronanottei mui tomare dega goribartei ar hobartei dagilung. Haron Israelor ashaganottei mui ei shingollandoi banan hei agong.”
44028021	Sebeden thara tare holak, “Tor sombonde Judea dejottun ami huno sidi no pei ar huno bheie einei tore bojong no hondi.
44028022	Hintu tui hi mone goros ami sien tortun sunibar sei. Haron ami hobor peiei jagai-jagai ei dolluor biruddie hon.”
44028023	Paulattei thara ekkuo din thik gorinei, onek manus the thaidie siot jeion. Tharare the beinniettun duri bellie song Itchioro rejjiogano sombonde gome-dalei bhangi dinei ar shakki die. Mosir Niomo boibuottun ar munigunor boibuottun Jisur sombonde proman die.
44028024	Paula hoiede hodaganiloi hoiek jone buj peion bischias gorsion ar hoiek jone bischias no goron.
44028025	Sebeden thara-thara mana mani no olo. Sejot Paula ei hodagan honar porendi thara gelakkoi, “Muni Isaiar darai Pobitro Aptai thik gori amar Purbo-puruschununore hoie.
44028026	‘Ei manuschuno sidu jeinei hogoi, “Sunde suniba, hintu no bujiba. Ar degode degiba, hintu no bujiba.
44028027	Haron ei manuschunor akkolani han oie. Tharar hanedi harai no sunon ar tharar sogkun hattuon. Anole, thara sogedi degibak ar hanedi sunibak. Ar tharar monaniloi bujinei phiribak ar adikkie mui tharare gom gori di dim.” ’
44028028	“Senottei, mui tomare janei duongor, Itchiore tar muktigan Be-jadtuno sidu padei die ar thara sien sunibak.”
44028029	Paula sei hodagani honar porendi Judai manuschune gelakkoi. Thara-thara shanggadik huobula gorilakkoi.
44028030	Ar Paula puro di bojor tar nijor bhara gorsie ghoranot thelo, ar je tar idu eje the tharare daginei bhorai.
44028031	Bug-doro gori the Itchioro rejjiogano sombonde prosar gorsie ar Probu Jisur sombonde sigkie die. Huno jone tare badha no duon.
45001001	Mui Paula, Jisu Kristor banidajibuo. Mui apostol obartei Itchioro gom hoboranot more nokbhaj gora oie.
45001002	Agendi sei gom hoboran tar munigunor darai Pobitro Sastroganit soittio gorsie.
45001003	Sei gom hoboran olode Itchioro Puobuor sombonde. The Davidor bongsot manus oinei jormeiegi.
45001004	The Itchioro Puo bili Aptar Pobitroganor hemoda doge ar tare morattun jiei tulinei janei die. The olode Jisu Kristo, amar Probu.
45001005	Tar darai ami doye ar apostolo haman peiei, jene beg jador manuschune tar nange bischiaschan manon.
45001006	Be-jadtuno loge tomareo Jisu Kristoi dakkie.
45001007	Rom sohorot jigun ago, ar Itchiore hos peinei sadhu manus obartei jigunore dakkie, tomare begkunore mui legongor. Amar Bab Itchiorbuoi ar Probu Jisu Kristoi tomare doyegan ar shantigan dedok.
45001008	Goda songsaranot tomar bischiaschano sombonde huobula goron hinottei, bego akke, mui tomartei Jisu Kristor darai mui mor Itchiorbuore hujhi hoda hongor.
45001009	Jei Itchiorbuore mui tar Puobuor sombonde gom hoborano hamanot mone-prane sebona gorong, the mor shakki age jei mui bor magode tomar nangani nitto hong.
45001010	Mui tomar idu ei paribartei onsur bor magong, jene Itchioro ischie ole je huno prokare sejot mui tomar idu ei parong para.
45001011	Mui tomare hoiekkani aptar dan dibartei tomarloi lag pa-pi obartei dab gori-gori agong, jene tumi shokto aw para.
45001012	Sien olode, amar iot agede bischiaschane tomare ar more sahoj de para.
45001013	Bheilog, tumi hobor po para jei, oinnio Be-jadtuno iot phol pa jeiede dogkie gori tomar iot daw phol pebartei mui tomar idu ebartei onek bar ebar seiong. Hintu ikkie song badha pori age.
45001014	Grik manuschunor sidu, Grik manus no idie sigunor sidu, gyenigunor sidu ar murukkogunor sidu mui olungge horoj heiebuo.
45001015	Senottei, mui jittur parong Rom sohorot agode siguno siduio gom hoboran prosar goribartei mui jugol oi agong.
45001016	Haron Kristor gom hoboranottei mui no lajang. Je ien bischias gore tartei ien olode mukti pebar Itchioro hemodagan. Gom hoboran akke Judai manusnunottei ar Grik manuschunotteio.
45001017	Haron ienot Itchioro dharmigkan dega jeie, jien bischiasottun bischias. Sien Sastrot lega doge oi, “Dharmig manuschun bischiaso darai bajibak.”
45001018	Haron soittiogan aw-dharmig-kandoi sabi ragande beg Itchior-sara ar be-dhormi manuschunor biruddie sorgottun Itchioro rakkan dega diegi.
45001019	Haron Itchioror sombonde hobor paidie jinij tharare degeie. Haron Itchiore tharare sieni degeie.
45001020	Haron songsaran sristi gora oiede siottun duri, sristi gora oiede jinijchanit, tar ononto hemodaganot Itchioro hatchiekkan tar dega no jaidie gunani porak-porak gori dega jeie. Senottei, tharar huno mab nei.
45001021	Thara Itchior hobor peineioio, tare Itchior bilinei mohima no goron. Tare hujhi hoda no hon, hintu tharar sintiegani aw-gunor ar tharar bhul monani hala oi age.
45001022	Thara gyeni holeileio behup oion.
45001023	Poji no jaidie Itchiorbuor mohimagan, poji jaidie manjior subhi, phegor subhi, ser thenggie jonturo subhi ar buk sejerei berande jib-bolar subhi bodolei duon.
45001024	Senottei tharar moiddie heyegani aw-mannio obartei tharar monanit pabor lubbogani hajor obartei gojei die.
45001025	Thara Itchioro soittiogan meyegandoi bodolei diduon. Ar juge-juge baini goronde Itchiorbuo, jibe Sristi gorie, sibiere tobona no gorinei, sristi gorsie jinijchani sebona goron. Amen.
45001026	Senottei Itchiore tharare aw-sorman oipaidie lubboganot gojei die. Haron tharar milieguneo niomo onusaran, be-niomo onusarandoi bodoli diduon.
45001027	Thik sedogkie gori morodtuneio, niomo onusare miliegunore hamot no lageinei, ek jone ek jonore lubbo gorinei morode-morode laj gore para ham goron. Sei upojukto hamo doge sastigan pebak.
45001028	Sei baraio, Itchioro gyenan thara rageibar no san hinottei, Itchiore tharare hojora monan gojei die, jene jien gorana osit noi sien thara goron para.
45001029	Beg be-dhormiganiloi, aw-shot shanda hamaniloi, dujtoganiloi, lubboganiloi, hu-monaniloi, hinsieganiloi, hun goranagandoi, jagulugkiegandoi, thoganagandoi, bojong monandoi thara boron oi agon. Thara gop die oion.
45001030	Thara manus sorjeie, Itchior hos no peie, moromara, phodani, bahadori gorie, bojong jinij abiskar gorie, ar bab-ma aw-mannio gorie oion.
45001031	Thara gom-bojong hobor no peie, aw-bischias-joggio, hos no peie, mab no die, ar doye-meye sara oion.
45001032	Je sieni gore, Itchioro dharmig bijiero onusare sigunor moribar lak bili thara hobor pei theleio, thara nijeio sieni goron ar sieni goronde sigundoio raji on.
45002001	Senottei, Oh bijier goroschie Manuschuo, tor mab nei. Haron tui sasti goroschie sien tuio goros hinottei, tui nije-nije dujot poros. Haron tui bijier goroschie sieni tuio goros.
45002002	Hintu ami hobor pei, sieni goronde sigunore Itchiore soittio onusare bijier gore.
45002003	Oh manuschuo, sieni goronde sigunore tui sasti duos, ar tui nije sieni gorinei Itchioro sastittun sari paribiede tui mone goros ni?
45002004	Tui hi tar shanggadik goman, soijjiogunan, hosto bhugkan obohela goros ni na? Itchioro gomane tor monan phirie bajei di parede sien hobor no pas?
45002005	Tomar akkol-hananor ar ulluor doge Itchioro ragor dinnuot tomar nijottei huttieri joma gori thor. Sei dinnuot Itchiore tar dharmig bijieran degebo.
45002006	The “prottiek jonore hamo onusare dam dibo.”
45002007	Je dhorjio dorinei mohima obartei, sorman obartei ar ononto jibono jinij eksottie togai, tare ononto jibon die obo.
45002008	Hintu jigune nijor labpan togan, soittiogan no manon hintu be-dhormigan manon, thara huttierigan ar rakkan pebak.
45002009	Je bojong ham gore, tharar prottiek jonor ugure dangor hosto ar jagulug ebo. Akke Judai manuschunor ugure ebo, sebeden Be-jadtunor ugureo ebo.
45002010	Hintu je gom ham gore, sigunor ugure baini, sorman ar shanti ebo, akke Judai manuschunor ugure, sebeden Be-jadtunor ugureo ebo.
45002011	Haron Itchiore harore eitzabor no gore.
45002012	Jigune Mosir niomanor sara gori pab gorsion, sigune Mosir nioman sara gori boij jebak. Ar jigune Mosir niomanot pab gorsion, sigunore Mosir niomano onusare bijier gora obo.
45002013	Haron jigune Nioman suinnion, Itchioro sogot thara dharmig noi. Hintu jigune niom palan, tharare dharmig dhora jebo.
45002014	Haron jokkene Be-jadtune jigunottun niom nei, niomanot agede doge gora gele, judio tharar niom no theleio, sien tharar niom oi.
45002015	Sigunor ontorot niomor haman lega age gori degan. Tharar idie-ittane proman degai, jei tharar sintiegane okte-okte duj de ar okte-okte mab de.
45002016	Sokkene Itchiorbuoi manjior guboniogani Jisu Kristor darai bijier goribode dinnuot mor gom hoborano doge obo.
45002017	Tumi daw Judai manus bili ho, niomano ugure nirbhor goro, ar Itchioro iot bar goro.
45002018	Tumi tar ischiegan hobor po, haron tomare niomanottun shigie oie ar begottun gom jinijchani mani lo.
45002019	Tumi shokto gori hobor pode, jei han manjiortei tumi olade pod degei die ar andharot agonde sigunottei tumi olade phor.
45002020	Tumi olade murukkogunottei sigeie, gurogunottei mastor. Niomanot tomar ek doronor gyen ar soittio age.
45002021	Senottei, tumi manjiore shigo, tumi nijore a hittei no shigo? Sur no gorsio gori tumi manjiore shigo, tumi a hittei sur goro?
45002022	Tumi ho, “Shanda no gorsio,” tumi a hittei shanda goro? Mokti hos no po hoinei tumi a hittei mondir luddo?
45002023	Niomanot tumi bar goro, nioman bhonggo gorinei tumi a hittei Itchiorore aw-sorman goro?
45002024	Haron Sastrot lega age, “Tomartei Itchiorbuor nangan Be-jadtunor moiddie sorjan.”
45002025	Haron Nioman judi palo, sundu-sam habanagan lab age. Hintu tumi judi Niom bhonggo goro, tomar sundu-sam habanagan, no habe para obo.
45002026	Senottei, sundu-sam no happiei ek jone judi Niomo doge dharmigkan ragai, tar sundu-sam no happiegan sundu-sam happie sannie dhora jebode noi ni?
45002027	Tomartun Nioman sejo okkiorbuo song age ar heyeganot sundu-sam happuo. Tobuio Niomanor biruddie tumi jo. Je heyeganot sundu-sam no habe, ar judi the Nioman puro gori palai, the tomare bijier goribuo.
45002028	Haron uguredi Judai manus ole noi, ar sundu-sam habanagan heyeganot ugure habanagan noi.
45002029	Hintu je bidirendi Judai manus, the jodepode Judai manus ar sundu-sam habanagan olode ontorot. Legaloi legkie noi, hintu aptat legkie, ar sienor bainigan manjiortun noi, hintu Itchiorottun.
45003001	Salen, Judai manjiortei hi shobidie age ar sundu-sam habanagan hi lab?
45003002	Je huno iet onek lab age. Bego akke, Itchiore Judai manuschunore tar hodagan phelei di jeie.
45003003	Salen, judi hoiek jone bischias no gorilie hi obo sei? Thara bischias no goronde siendoi Itchioror bischias-joggiogan loribo ni na?
45003004	Hamakkai noi. Sienor jagat, Itchiorbuo soittio ar prottiek manus olakke gal madie. Sien Sastrot legkiede doge, “Tor hodaloi tui dharmig os para, tore bijier gorilie tui jidos para.”
45003005	Hintu judi amar aw-dharmigkane Itchioro dharmigkan degai ami hi hobong sei? Itchiore amar ugure rak tulilie, tare be-dhormi hobong ni na? (mui manjior doge hongor.)
45003006	Hamakkai noi. A salen, Itchiore hingori songsaro manuschun bijier gore?
45003007	Haron mui gal madimbie siendoi judi tar oborug obartei Itchioro soittiogan bes oi jai, a hittei more ejong song pabi bili dhora jai?
45003008	Salen, ami a hittei no hoi, “Goman ebartei bojong ham gori”? Sedogkie gori amare thara barei-barei hondoi ar ami sedogkie gori hoiei bili hon. Tharare duj denagan thik age.
45003009	Salen hi? Ami tharattun bes gom ni na? Shobai noi. Haron ami duo-dagire honatto duj diei die, Judai manuschun ar Be-jadtun begkune pabor odinot tole.
45003010	Sien Sastort legkie age, “Huno jon dharmig nei, na, ek jonio nei.
45003011	Huno jone no bujon, huno jone Itchior no togan.
45003012	Thara begkune pazara phari jeiondoi, thara eksomare dorkar no lakkie oion. Huno jon gom ham no goron, na, ek joneo no goron.”
45003013	“Tharar todagun olakke hulo sidiesalo dogkie. Tharar jilaniloi phagara hoda hoion.” “Tharar jilanir tole dummuo sabor bis age.”
45003014	“Tharar muonit obisab ar tidie age.”
45003015	“ Lo phelei dibartei tharar thenganie jhadi-jhadi akkoloi.
45003016	Tharar podtanit dongso ona ar dugot poranagan age.
45003017	Shantir podtan thara hobor no pan.”
45003018	“Tharar sogkunot Itchiorore dhoranagan nei.”
45003019	Ami hobor pei, Niomane jien hoi sien olode, Niomanor tole agonde sigunore hoi, jene beg muoni bondo oi para ar beg songsaro manuschun Itchiorbuor mujungot duji on para.
45003020	Senottei, tar mujungot Niomano hamor onusare huno jonore dharmig gona no obo. Haron Niomanor darai manjie pabpan sinibak.
45003021	Hintu ikkie Itchioror dharmig-kan Niomanor bara dega jeie. Sienor shakkigan olode, Nioman ar munigun.
45003022	Jisu Kristore bischiaso darai agede Itchioro dharmigkanio begkuno sidu ar tare bischias goribakke siguno sidu dega jeie. Haron siot huno partokko nei.
45003023	Haron begkune pab gorsion ar thara Itchioro mohimaganot no lungibakkoi.
45003024	Jisu Kristor iot the shoreiede tar doyeganor darai the dam sara gori dharmig gona obo.
45003025	Bischiasor darai tar loganot, Kristore Itchiore tare hujhi gorede dali ijebe diegi. Ieno phol olode Itchior manuschunor ago pabpani hema gori dinei degelode jei the dharmig. Sorjiogunor darai Itchior sei pabpani hadei die.
45003026	Je Jisure bischias gorsie, sibiere the bijier gorie ar dharmig bili degebartei ei somoi the tar dharmigkan degeie.
45003027	Salen, baini goranagan hudu? Sien bad die oie. Hon Niomano darai? Hi hamor darai? Noi, hintu Bischiasor niomo darai.
45003028	Senottei, ami ien hoinei thum gori pari, ek jon manus bischiaso darai dharmig dhora oi, niomor hamano darai noi.
45003029	Nahi, Itchior bana Judai manuschunor Itchior de? The Be-jadtunoro Itchior noi ni na? The Be-jadtunoro Itchior.
45003030	Haron ekkuo gori Itchior age hinottei, the bischiaso darai sundu-sam happiegunore ar sundu-sam no happiegunore dharmig goreibo.
45003031	Salen, bischiaso darai nioman bhonggo gorilong ni na? Hamakkai noi. Sei bodoli, Nioman ami shokto gorilong.
45004001	Salen, manjior ijebe amar Purbo-puruschun Abrahame hi peie bili hobong sei?
45004002	Haron Abrahamore judi hamo darai dharmig gona odo, tar bar goribar thelun, hintu sien Itchiorbuor mujungot no thelun.
45004003	Haron Sastroie hi hoie? “Abrahame Itchiorore bischias gorsie, ar sien tare dharmigkanot gona oie.”
45004004	Je ham gore, tar haman dan dhora no jai hintu bedon dhora jai.
45004005	Hintu Itchiorbuo olode Itchior sara manuschunore dharmig gonie. Je ham no gorsie gorinei Itchiorore bischias goribo, tar bischiaschan Itchiore dharmigota bilinei gonibo.
45004006	Davide sei hodagan hoie. Ham sara gorinei Itchiore dharmig gonilie sei manuschuo hoballie.
45004007	“Jigunor niom sara hamani mab die oie sigun hoballie. Ar jigunor pabpani muson gori die oie.
45004008	Jei manuschuor pabpani PROBUIE dai no goribuo the hoballie.”
