45004009	Salen, sei asirbadtan bana sundu-sam happiegunor ugure eje, nahi sundu-sam no happiegunor ugureo eje? Haron ami hoi, bischiaschanottei Abrahamore dharmig gona oie.
45004010	Salen, sien hingori gona olo? The sundu-sam happiede lokkene nahi, sundu-sam no habede lokkene? Hamakkai sundu-sam happiede lokkene noi, hintu sundu-sam no habede lokkene.
45004011	Sundu-sam habanagan the peiede olode ekkan sinno. Bischiasor darai the peiede dharmigkanor marga olode sien. Sundu-sam no habode Bischiasor darai dharmigkan the peie. Senottei, jigune sundu-sam no habi theleio, je bischas gorsie sigunor begkunor bab oie, jene dharmigkan tharar ugureo gona oi.
45004012	Abrahame bana sundu-sam happiegunor bab noi, hintu the sundu-sam no habode peiede bischiaschan Purbo-puruschun Abrahame adeiede bischiaso huschuo je adai sigunor babpuo the oie.
45004013	Haron Abrahame ar tar bongsogune songsaran odhiharo sompotti ijebe pebar protiggiagan peion. Sien Niomano darai no pan, hintu Bischiasor darai peionde dharmigkanor darai sien peion.
45004014	Je Niomano doge theinei sien pan, salen bischiaschan hitchu noi ar huno moillio nei.
45004015	Niomane rakkan ane hinottei, jiot Niom nei siot Niom bhonggo nei.
45004016	Senottei, doyegan protiggiagano doge obartei, sien Bischiasor ugure nirbhor gore, jene sei protiggiagan Abrahamor beg bongsogunor ugure hamakkai oi. Sien bana Niomo doge noi, hintu Abrahamor bischias elode ugure nirbhor. The olode amar begkunor Purbo-puruschun.
45004017	Sastroie sien hoie, “Onek jador Purbo-puruschun mui tore banelung.” Jei Itchiorbuoi mora manjiore jibon de ar jare ami bischias gorsei sibier mujungot Abrahame amar bab olo. Sei Itchiorbuoi neidie jinijchanir sombonde agede dogkie gori the hoi.
45004018	Abrahame tar polim ashagan thum oinei, the asha gorinei Itchiorore bischias gorsie hinottei, the onek jador Purbo-purus oie. Sien Itchiore hoiede siendoi milie, “Tor bongsogun sedukkun obak.”
45004019	Tar bischiaschan hom no gorsie gorinei, the ek shot bojor oie hinottei the bujilode tar heyegan ar Sarir gorbhoganio morsie.
45004020	The Itchiorbuor protiggiagan bischias no annie gori shiongshama no gore. Hintu bischiaschan shokto gori Itchiorore baini gorsie.
45004021	The puro gori bischias gorsiede jei, Itchiore tare jien protiggia gorsie, sien goribar tar hemodaio age.
45004022	Senottei, “Sien tartei dharmigkanot gona oie.”
45004023	Sien bana Abrahamottei gona oie bili lega no oi.
45004024	Hintu sien amatteio. Je amar Probu Jisure morattun jiei tulliede Itchiorbuore bischias gore, tharareo dharmigkanot gona obo.
45004025	Amar aw-porattanittei Jisure mora bajei die, ar amare dharmig goragan obartei tare jiei tulo oie.
45005001	Senottei, Bischiasor darai dharmig gona oinei, amar Probu Jisu Kristor darai Itchiorloi milie mili olong.
45005002	Tar daraio ami Bischiasor darai doyeganot somilong. Ami sei doyeganot agi ar Itchioro oborug ashaganor phorti gorir.
45005003	Bana sien noi, hintu hosto bhugotio phorti gorir. Haron ami hobor pei hosto bhugot dhorjio bare.
45005004	Dhorjio thele sorittro gom oi, ar sorittro gom ole asha bare.
45005005	Ashagane amare laj no de. Haron amare die oiede Pobitro Aptabuor darai Itchioro hospanagan amar ontorot dali die oie.
45005006	Haron ami bolnei gori thagke thik somoie Kristo Itchior sara manuschunottei morsiegi.
45005007	Ek jon dharmig manjiortei ek jon morte hodin, ar ek jon gom manjiortei ek jon moribar sahojio gori pare.
45005008	Hintu amattei Itchiore tar hospanagan edogkie gori degeie: Ami pabi elongge lokkene Kristo amattei morsiegi.
45005009	Sienottun bes olode, Kristor logano darai Itchiore amare dharmig gonnie, ar tar darai Itchioro rakkanottun bajeibo.
45005010	Haron ami Itchioro sottru oi thagke, Itchiore the nije tar Puobuor moranaganor darai amarloi milie mili goreie. Ar milie mili goranar pholano baraio, tar jibonandoi ami mukti obong.
45005011	Ar bana sien noi, hintu amar Probu Jisu Kristor darai Itchioro siot daw ami porti goribong, haron tar darai ami ikkie milie-mili olong.
45005012	Senottei, ek jonor darai pabpan songsarot sommie. Thik sedogkie gori, moranagan pabpanor darai songsaranot sommiegi. Ar sengori, begkune pab gorsion hinottei, moranagan begkunor sidu shidie gelo.
45005013	Haron Nioman no ette pabpan songsarot elo. Hintu Nioman no elode lokkene pabpan no jai.
45005014	Tobuio, Adamor amolottun duri Mosir amol song moranagan sason-gorie elo. Ebar agede sibier dhoronor Adame bhonggo gorsiede dogkie gori pab no goronde sigunor ugureo, moranagane sason gorsie.
45005015	Hintu magana dan oborad-tano dogkie noi. Haron ek jonor oborador darai onek manus morsion. Hintu onek manjior sidu bari jeiede Itchioro doyegan ar doyeganor danan sittun bes. Sei doyegan olode ek jonor darai ar sibie olode Jisu Kristo.
45005016	Ar danan ek jone pab gorsiede darai ejchiede sieno dogkie noi. Haron bijieran ek jono dujottun ejchie jienor darai sastigan ejchie. Hintu magana boksittan olode jien onek jonor dujor darai ejchie, jienor phole dharmigkan ejchie.
45005017	Haron ek jone judi duj gorinei, moranagane sei Manuschuor darai sason gorsie. Je alajhala doye ar dharmigkanor danan peie sittun bes sigunor jibonot sason-goribuo. Sigune tar darai sason goribak, ar sibie olode Jisu Kristo.
45005018	Senottei, ek jonor dujor darai begkunor sidu sastigan ejchie. Thik sedogkie gori, ek jonor dharmig hamor darai, dharmigkane begkunottei jibon ani die.
45005019	Haron ek jonor aw-mannior darai onek jonore pabi baneie. Thik sedogkie gori, ek jonor manjior darai onek jonore dharmig baneie.
45005020	Nioman ejchiede Niom bhonggogan barebartei. Hintu jiot pabpan bare doyegan sittun bes bare.
45005021	Sien olode, pabpane moranagandoi sason gorsie. Thik sedogkie gori, amar Probu Jisu Kristor darai doyegane dharmigkandoi ononto jibonottei sason-goribuo.
45006001	Salen, ami hi hobong? Doyegan bare para eksottie pab goribong ni na?
45006002	Hamakkai noi. Pabor nange ami morilie, a hingori pabor nange bajibong sei?
45006003	Ami jedog jon Jisu Kristo iot baptisma loiei, tar moranaganot baptisma oieidie hobor no po ni na?
45006004	Senottei, baptismagano darai moranaganot tar loge amare gara oie. Babor mohimagandoi Kristore morattun jiei tulo oiede dogkie gori, amio nuo jibondoi berana.
45006005	Haron ami judi tar morana-ganot ek ole, hamakkai tar jiei uduonaganotio ek obong.
45006006	Ien hobor pei, pabor dolabuo pharok goribartei amar puron manuschuore tar loge krosot die oie. Senottei, ami pabor banidaji noi ar.
45006007	Haron je morsie the pabottun sarsie.
45006008	Ikkie ami judi Kristor somare mori, ami bischias gori, amio tar somare bajibong.
45006009	Ami hobor pei, Kristore morattun jiei tulo oie hinottei morto noi ar. Moranaganor tar ugure hitchu odhihar nei ar.
45006010	Haron jokkene the morsie, the pabor nange umore-umorottei morsie. Hintu jokkene the jeda oie, the Itchiorottei jeda oie.
45006011	Thik sedogkie gori, tumio pabor nange jodepode gori morsio bili mone gorsio. Hintu amar Probu Kristor iot Itchioro nange baji thago.
45006012	Senottei, mori jebode tomar heyeganot tar lubpan maninei, pabpanore sason goribar no duo.
45006013	Tomar heyet onggogani pab goribartei be-dhormi aittier banebar no duo. Hintu morattun jiei uttie bili jugol gorinei tomar heyet onggogani dharmig aittier banebar Itchiorore gojei duo.
45006014	Haron pabpane tomar ugure sason goribar hemoda nei hinottei, tumi Niomo tole noi, hintu doyegano tole ago.
45006015	Salen hi? Ami Niomo tole noi, hintu doyegano tole hinottei, pab goribong ni na? Hamakkai noi.
45006016	Tumi hobor no po, tumi nije jare manibartei banidaji gori gojei duo, tumi tar banidaji ode? Pabore manibartei gojei dile the morei pheleibo. Mananaganore gojei dile dharmigkano banidaji oba.
45006017	Hintu Itchioror donniobad ok jei, judio tumi pabor banidaji ela, tumi ontoredi mannio, sei sigkiegan tomare die oie.
45006018	Ar tomare pabottun sari die oie hinottei, tumi dharmigkanor banidaji ola.
45006019	Tumi heyedi norom hinottei mui manjior doge hongor. Haron tumi jemon agendi niom sarattei nijor-nijor onggogani aw-poriskar ar niom saragani idu banidaji obartei gojei duo, thik sedogkie gori ikkie pobitroganottei nijor-nijor onggogani dharmiganottei banidaji ijebe gojei duo.
45006020	Haron tumi jokkene pabor banidaji ela, dharmigkanottun tumi shadin ela.
45006021	Ikkie tumi lajottei jinijchanittun hi phol pela sei? Haron sei jinijchanir thuman olode moranagan.
45006022	Hintu ikkie pabottun sarinei, Itchioro banidaji oinei, pobitro pholan, ar seschan, ononto jibonan pela.
45006023	Haron pabor bedonan olode moranagan, hintu Itchioro danan olode amar Probu Jisu Kristo iot ononto jibonan.
45007001	Jigune Nioman hobor pan sigunore mui hongor. Bheilog, jedogkon song baji tha jai sedogkon song Niomano odhiharo tole thei paidie hobor no po?
45007002	Haron mogkuoi jedogkon song tar negkuo baji thai sedogkon song niomo onusare tar negkuor odhiharo tole thai. Hintu judi tar negkuo mori gele, niomo onusare the tar negkuottun halas oi.
45007003	Thik sedogkie gori, judi tar negkuo baji thagke the aro ek jonore loi, tare shanda ho jebo. Hintu tar negkuo judi mori jai, the sei niomanottun halas obo. Ar judio the aro ekkuo neg lolegoi tare shanda ho no jebo ar.
45007004	Bheilog, thik sedogkie gori, tumio Jisu Kristor heyegano darai Niomano nange morsio. Tumi aro ek jonore loi pariba, sibie olode jare morattun jiei tulo oie jene, ami Itchiorore phol di pari.
45007005	Haron ami heyer doge thagke, niomor onusare pabor lubbogane moranaganor pholan dibartei amar heyet onggoganit ham gorsie.
45007006	Hintu ami ikkie amare Niomanottun halas gora oie, jiene amare dori elo sien morsie. Senottei, ami nuo Aptadi ham gorana, purona okkiorodi noi.
45007007	Salen ami hi hobong? Nioman pab hobong ni na? Hamakkai noi. Tar bodoli, Niomo darai no odo, mui pabpan no sinilungun. Haron judi Niomane no ho daw, “Tui lubbo no goris.” mui lubbogan hobor no pelungun.
45007008	Hintu pabpane Ugumanor sujuk peinei, mor iot beg jabotio bojong lubbogani ani die. Haron Nioman sara pabpan mora.
45007009	Eksomoi Nioman sara mui jeda elung. Hintu ugumani einei, pabpan jeda olo ar mui morilung.
45007010	Ar Ugumani, jienie jibon dibar elo, mui pelungge sienie moranagan anidie.
45007011	Haron pabpane Ugumanir sujuk loinei more thogeilogi, ar sieno darai more morei pheleilo.
45007012	Senottei, Nioman pobitro, ar Ugumanio pobitro, dharmig ar gom.
45007013	A salen, jien mortei gom siene more morei pelai ni na? Hamakkai noi. Hintu pabpan pab bili mui sinibartei, hubon gom sieno darai pabpane mor iot moranagan ani di die. Senottei, Ugumanir darai pabpan sie bes olo.
45007014	Haron ami hobor pei Nioman olode aptattei gom. Hintu mor manjior akkol age, pabor nange pabor sidu beja jeie.
45007015	Haron mui hi gorongor, mui no bujong. Ar mor hi goribar age sien mui no gorong. Hintu jien mui hos no pang sien mui gorong.
45007016	Salen mor jien no goribar elo sien mui gorong. Nioman gom bili mui ega hora manong.
45007017	Hintu ikkie ham gorede sibie mui noi, hintu pabpane mor iot agede siene ham gorer.
45007018	Haron mui hobor pang, mor iot (mor heyeganot) huno gom nei. Haron ischiegan mor loge age, hintu jien gom sien hingori pebo hobor no pang.
45007019	Haron mui gorimbie gom haman mui no gorong. Hintu bojong ham mui no goribaran mui gorong.
45007020	Ikkie judi mui jien no goribar sien mui gorong, sien goriebuo mui noi hintu sien obode pabpane jien mor iot thai.
45007021	Senottei, ikkie mui bujongge ei Niomane mor iot ham gorer. Mui gom ham goribar sele bojongan mor iot thai.
45007022	Haron bidirie-bidirie mui Itchioro Niomanot hujhi ong.
45007023	Hintu mor heyet onggot aro ekkan niom degong. Siene mor mono Niomanore uij der jiene mor heyet onggoganire pabor niomanot banidajit pelai.
45007024	Oh mui hendogkie iet agong! Ei heyegano moranaganottun honna uddhar goribo?
45007025	Amar Probu Jisu Kristor darai Itchiorbuore mui hujhi hoda hong. Senottei, mor monandoi mui Itchioro Niomo haman gorim, hintu heyegandoi pabor niomo haman gorim.
45008001	Senottei, je Jisu Kristor iot theinei heyet doge no solinei, Aptar doge sole tar huno duj nei.
45008002	Haron Jisu Kristo iot jibon dede Aptabuor Niomane morei pelaidie pabor niomanottun more halas gori die.
45008003	Haron heyeganot norom hinottei Niomane hitchu gori no pare hinottei, Itchiore tar nijor Puobuo pabir manjior heye dogkie gori di padeie. Pabottei the heyeganot pabpan duj die.
45008004	Aptadi no solinei, heyedi solidie manuschunottei gom Niomor Nioman purei dibartei tar Puo di padeie.
45008005	Haron jigune heyet pokke solon, tharattun heyet jinij mone hoi. Hintu jara Aptadi solon, tharattun aptar jinij mone hoi.
45008006	Haron heyet monan olode moranagan hintu Aptar monan olode jibon ar shanti.
45008007	Heyet monan Itchioro sottru hinottei, Itchioro Nioman no mane ar gorio no pare.
45008008	Senottei, jigune heyet pokke agon thara Itchior hujhi gori no paron.
45008009	Hintu tumi heyet pokke noi, Aptar pokke, ar judi jodepode gori Itchioro Aptabuo tomar iot thai. Jar Kristo aptabuo nei, the tar manus noi.
45008010	Ar judi Kristo tomar iot thai, pabor nange heyegan morsie, hintu dharmigkanottei Aptabuo olode jibon.
45008011	Hintu Jisure morattun jiei tulliede sibier Aptabuo judi tomar iot thai, Kristore morattun jiei tulliede sibier Aptabuoio tomar morede heyeganore tar Aptabuor darai tomar iot thaidie sibiei jibon dibo.
45008012	Bheilog senottei, ami olongge Horoj heie, heyet doge thebartei heyeganor noi.
45008013	Haron tumi judi heyet doge thago tumi moriba. Hintu tumi judi Aptabuor darai heyeganor hamani morei pelo tumi bajiba.
45008014	Haron jedog jon Itchioro Aptabuoi nejai, sigun Itchioror puo-shaba.
45008015	Haron tumi aro banidajit poribar dhoranaganor aptabuo no po, hintu tumi palok aptabuo peio jiber darai ami hoi, “Oh Abba, Ba.”
45008016	Itchioro Aptabuoi amar aptabuoloi shakki dede jei ami olongge Itchioro puo-shaba.
45008017	Ami Itchioro puo-shaba hinottei, ami Itchioro odhiharo sompotti peiegun ar Kristor somare odhiharo sompotti peiegun olong. Ami judi tar somare hosto pei, tarloi eksomare oborugio obong.
45008018	Haron mui mone gorongge amar ikkie hosto bhug goranagani amar iot jei mohimagan dega dibogi siendoi tulona goribar upojukto noi.
45008019	Itchiore sristi gorsiede songsarane Itchioro puogun sebartei asha gori barsei age.
45008020	Haron sristigan aw-gunorano tole banidajit thuo oie. Mone hoinei noi, hintu Itchiorbuor darai ashagan no pureibartei.
45008021	Haron sristigano poji jaidie banidajittun nije Itchioro puoguno oborugkan shadinanot gojei die obo.
45008022	Haron ami hobor pei jei, goda sristigane ikkie song guro obar ped pirie dogkie gori mojora-hojora har.
45008023	Bana sien noi, hintu amio jigun Aptar ak-phol, amio nije-nije ontorot dug peir. Ar amar heyegan uddhar obartei, palokkan asha gori barsei agi.
45008024	Haron ami ashaganot mukti peiei, hintu dega jaidie ashagan asha noi. Salen, dega jaidie ashagan hittei asha gori thana?
45008025	Hintu ami judi no degidie sien asha gori thei, ami sien ega hore dhorjio dori asha gori thebong.
45008026	Thik sedogkie gori, amar bolneieganit Aptabuoi amare bol de. Haron amar hi bor magana osit ami hobor no pei. Hintu Aptabuoi amattei bor-nijes phelei phelei bor magi di die jien hoi para no jai.
45008027	Je ontoran porikkie gore the hobor pai Aptabuoi hi sintie gore. Haron Itchioro ischie doge sadhu manuschunottei Aptabuoi bor magi dide.
45008028	Ami hobor pei Itchior hos pande sigunottei ar tar uddischuoi doge daga oiede sigunottei beg jinijchanie gomortei eksomare ham gore.
45008029	Haron jigunore the akke duri hobor pai, sigunore honatto tar Puobuor subhi doge obartei akke duri the thik gorsie jene the onek bheilogottun polim puobuo oi para.
45008030	Sei bara, jigunore the akke duri thik gorsie sigunore the dakkie. Ar jigunore the dakkie sigunore the dharmig gonnie, ar jigunore dharmig gona oie sigunore oborug gorsie.
45008031	Salen, ami sienire hi hobong? Itchior judi amar pokke thai, honna amar biruddie obo?
45008032	Je tar nijor Puobuoio amattei bad no dinei, amattei die, tar logeo amare beg jinijchani hulomela gori a hittei no dibo?
45008033	Itchiore beiloiegunor biruddie hi duj ebo? Dharmig goniebuo nije Itchiorbuoi.
45008034	Honna duj badei dibo? Kristoi the nije morsiegi. Aro sei bara, tare jiei tullie, ar Itchioro denedi amatteio bor magi derloi.
45008035	Kristor hospana-ganottun honna amare pharok goreibo? Hostogane ni na, dugkane ni na, uttiesarane ni na, bhadorattane ni na, uttie langdagane ni na, bipodtane ni na, nahi horgogane?
45008036	Sastrot lega agede doge, “Tortei goda dinnuo morilong. Morei pheleibar bera-shagolo dogkie amare gona olo.”
45008037	Hintu ienit begkanit amare hos peiede sibier darai ami jidiegunottun bes.
45008038	Haron mui shokto gori hobor pangge jei huno ekkane amare Itchioro meyeganottun pharok gori no paribo. Moranagane ok, jibonane ok, sorgo-dude ok, sason-gorie ok, hemoda-bolai ok, bortoman jinije ok bah bhobisot jinije ok.
45008039	Uguro jinije ok, nijo jinije ok, oinnio sristi gorsie jinije ok amar Probu Jisu Kristo iot Itchioro hospanaganottun amare pharok gori no paribo.
45009001	Kristo iot soittio hodagan mui hongor. Mui gal no madongor, mor idie-ittaneo Pobitro Aptabuo iot mor sombonde shakki der.
45009002	Mor monot baari monot dug age ar eksottie hosto lager.
45009003	Haron mortun mone horte jei mor bheilogkunottei, mor jadottei roktor doge obisab heinei mui Kristortun pharok odung.
45009004	Jigun Israel manus, jigunottun palokkan, mohimagan, suktigani, niom peiegan, Itchioro sebonagan, ar protiggiagani age.
45009005	Jigun olakke Purbo-puruschun, ar roktor ijebe tharattun Kristo ejchie, jibe begkunor ugure sason-gorie ar juge-juge baini goronde Itchior. Amen.
45009006	Hintu Itchioro hodagan brithai no jai. Haron jigun Israel jador, sigun begkun Israel jador noi.
45009007	Abrahamor bongso bili thara begkun tharar puo noi. Hintu, “Isaakor iot tharare tor bongso hobak.”
45009008	Sien olode, jigun roktodi puo sigun Itchioro puo noi. Hintu protiggiagano puogun bongso bili gona jai.
45009009	Haron ien olode protiggiagan, “Ejette bojor ei somoiot mui eim ar Sarar ekkuo puo obo.”
45009010	Ar bana ien noi, hintu Rebegkio ek jono darai ekkuo puo peie, ar sei manuschuo amar Purbo-puruschun Isaake.
45009011	(Haron gurogun no ode, huno gom bojong no gorte, Itchioro uddischuogan basonigano doge pureibartei, hamo doge noi, hintu je dakkie sibier doge obartei.)
45009012	Itchiore Rebegkare hoie, “Jettuoi honettuore sebona goribuo.”
45009013	Sastrot lega age: “Jakobore mui hos pang, hintu Esaure hos no pang.”
45009014	Salen, hi hobong? Itchiorottun hi aw-dharmigkani age nahi? Hamakkai noi!
45009015	Haron Itchiore Mosire hoie: “Mui jare hos pang, tare hos peim, ar mor jare sit puribo tare sit puribo.”
45009016	Senottei ien manjior ischie noi, dumurede sibier ischie noi, hintu meye gorede Itchiorbuor ischie.
45009017	Haron Pharao rajare edogkie gori Sastroie hoie, “Ienottei na mui tore ojolot tulliong jene tor iot mor hemodagan degei parong para. Ar mor nangan goda songsaranot janei duon para.”
45009018	Senottei tartun jare mone hoie tare meye gore ar jare hos no pebar mone hoi tare akkol han gori de.
45009019	Tui more hoi paros, “A hittei the duj badei de? Haron honna tar ischiegan badha die?”
45009020	Hintu Oh manuschuo, Itchiorbuo biruddie uttor die tui honna? Baneie jinijchane Baneiebuore hoboni, “A hittei more edogkie gori baneos?”
45009021	Hum baneiebuoi bah humorbuoi ek dola begottun sormanio hamortei ekkuo hum ar aw-sormanio hamortei aro ekkuo hum banebar tar phegkano ugure odhihar nei ni na?
45009022	Ar iot hi, judi Itchiore tar rakkan ar hemodagan degebartei sai. Senottei, the nosto goribar rakkandoi baari gai thai.
45009023	The doye gorede sigunore tar mohimagano alajhagan degebartei the honatto mohimaganottei baneie.
45009024	The amareo dakkie, bana Judai manuschunore noi, hintu Be-jadtunoreo dakkie.
45009025	Sien muni Hosea tar boibuot legkiede doge, “Mor manus noi die sigunore mor manus hom. Mor agojor manus noi die sibiere mor agojor manuschuo hom.”
45009026	Ar the hoi, “Ar edogkie obo, jiot tharare huo oie, sienot, ‘Tumi mor manus noi,’ hodaganor bodole tharare jeda Itchiorbuo puo, bili daga obo.”
45009027	Muni Isaiaio Israel manus-chunor sombonde edogkie gori jogar pari-pari hoi, “Judio Israelo bongsogun sagoro horoliganittun bes oleio, ugursiegun mukti obak.
45009028	Haron tar haman pureibo, dharmigkanot tar aiu badhi obo. Haron PROBUIE tar pittimit hanekkon gori goribuo.”
45009029	Muni Isaiai agendi hoiede doge, “Sorgo ‘soinniogunor PROBUIE’ hoiek jon amare bongso ekkuo phelei di no jedo, ami Sodom sohoro manuschuno dogkie olongun ar amare Gomora manuschuno dogkie goreilakkun.”
45009030	Salen, ami hi hobong? Jei Be-jadtune dharmigkan no togan sigune dharmigkan pelak, bischiaso dharmigkanio pelak.
45009031	Hintu Israel manuschune Niomano dharmigkan togande sigune Niomano dharmigkan no pelak.
45009032	Hittei no pelak? Haron bischiaso darai thara sien no togeinei, Niomano hamo darai togeion. Haron ujuot haidie silluot thara ujuot heion.
45009033	Sastrot lega age, “Sawh, Zaion sohorot ekkuo ujuot hebar ar azar haidie sil thoiong. Je tare bischias gore the huno din laj pedo noi.”
45010001	Oh bheilog, mor ontorane horte ar Itchiorottun mui bor magi duongge Israel manuschune mukti pan para.
45010002	Haron tharar sombonde mui shakki duongge jene, Itchiorottei tharar agoj thai hintu gyeno doge noi.
45010003	Haron thara Itchioro dharmigkan hobor no pan. Ar Itchioro dharmigkan no togeinei nijor dharmigkan goreibartei togan, ar Itchioro dharmigkanot gojei no duon.
45010004	Haron je bischias gore tartei Kristo olode Niomano thumanottei dharmigkan.
45010005	Haron Mosi Niomano dharmigkano sombonde legkie: “Manjie thara goronde hamani darai bajibak.”
45010006	Hintu bischiaso dharmigkane edogkie gori hoie, “Ontorot tui no hos, ‘Honna sorgot udibogoi?’ (Ugurottun Kristore anibalottei.)
45010007	Bah, ‘Honna tolanei gattuot jebo?’ (Kristore morattun jeda gori anibalottei.)”
45010008	Hintu Sastroie hi hoi? “Hodagan tor hai agegi, tor han ar ontorot.” (Sien olode ami prosar goridie bischiaschano hodagan.)
45010009	Itchiore Jisure morattun jiei tullie bili judi tui tor ontorot bischias goros ar muendi tare Probu bili haam haas, tui mukti pebe.
45010010	Haron ontoredi bischias gorinei dharmigkan pan, ar muendi muktigan haam haan.
45010011	Haron Sastroie hoi, “Je tare bischias goribuo, the huno din laj no pebo.”
45010012	Haron Judai manjior ar Grik manjior sere hitchu judo nei. Haron ekkui Probure je dage sigunottei the alajhala.
45010013	Haron, “Je PROBUR nangan dage the mukti pebo.”
45010014	Jare bischias no goron, tare hingori dagibak? Jar sombonde no sunon, sibiere hingori bischias goribak? Ar prosar gorie sara hingori thara sunibak?
45010015	Di no padeile hingori thara prosar goribak? Sastrot lega age, “Gom jinijor gom hobor ar gom hoborano shanti hodagan prosar goronde sigunor thengani hodog doul!”
45010016	Hintu beg bhage gom hoboran no manon. Haron muni Isaiai hoie, “Probu, honna amar hoda bischias goribuo?”
45010017	Senottei, sunilie bischiaschan eje ar sunonagan ejede Itchioro hodaganottun.
45010018	Hintu mui hongge, thara suinnion ni? Thara suinnion daw. “Gom hoboran annionde manuschunor sobdobuo goda songsarot jeie. Ar tharar hodagan pittimir thumsong jeie.”
45010019	Hintu mui hongge, “Israel manuschune hobor no pan ni na?” Polim Mosi edogkie gori hoie, “Jigun jad noi siguno darai mui tomar ugure pijhum gori di dim. Murukko jadtuor darai mui tomare rak tuli di dim.”
45010020	Sebeden muni Isaiae baari sahoj gori Itchioro hodagan edogkie gori hoie, “More no togande sigune more sup peion, ar more pujor no goronde siguno sidu mui dega oionggoi.”
45010021	Hintu Israel manuschunore the hoie, “Hoda no manonde ar ulluo manuschunore goda dinnuo mui ad babeie elung.”
45011001	Salen mui hong, Itchiore tar manuschun phelei dilo ni na? Hamakkai noi. Haron muio daw ek jon Israel manus, Abrahamor bongso, Benjamin gojadtun.
45011002	Akke duri hobor paidie tar manuschun Itchiore phelei no de. Nahi, Sastroie muni Elijar sombonde hi hoie sien hobor no po de? The Itchiorloi Israel manuschuno biruddie edogkie gori abitti die,
45011003	“PROBU, thara tor munigun morei phellion, tor pallieng-ghorani bhangi phelei duon, ar bana mui bagi agongge. Ar more morei pheleibartei togadon.”
45011004	Hintu Itchiorbuottun hi uttor elo? Itchiore tare hoie, “Baal mokti Itchiorbuore adu pari salam no gorsie sat azar jon mortei mui sara di thoiong.”
45011005	Sedogkie oleio, doyeganor basoni darai ejosong ek dagire bhagottun ugurei thuo oie.
45011006	Ar sigun judi doyer darai oi, salen hamo darai noi. Anole doyegan doye no obo. Hintu hamo darai ole, doyer darai no obo. Anole, haman ham no obo.
45011007	Salen hi? Israel manuschune togande sien thara no pan, hintu bhagottun ugursiegune sien peion, ar bagigunore han gori die oie.
45011008	Sastrot edogkie lega age, “Itchiore tharare gyen neie apta die. Sogedi no degon para, hanedi edchie song no sunon para.”
45011009	Ar Davide hoie, “Tharar tebilani idi ar unduro hijik ok. Ujuot hebar ghuttie ar hena ugureie ok.
45011010	Tharar sogkun no degon para andhar odog, ar tharar pidtani onsur gujong ok.”
45011011	Salen mui hong, Azar hebartei thara ujuot helak ni na? Hamakkai noi. Hintu thara pab gorsion hinottei tharare huttieri tuli dinei muktigan jene Be-jadtune pan para.
45011012	Ar tharar pab goranagan judi songsaro manjiortei lab oi, ar tharar phola phol no oinei Be-jadtunottei lab ole, thara hodog poripunno odak ar!
45011013	Oh Be-jadtun, mui tomare hongor: mui Be-jadtunottei ek jon apostol hinottei mor haman baini gorim.
45011014	Je huno prokare mui huttieri tuli dinei di mor jadottun hoiek jon mukti goribartei.
45011015	Haron Israelunore phelei dinei songsarloi judi milie-mili ole, tharare grohon goranagan hi obo, morattun jiei ude para obode noi ni?
45011016	Haron polim pholluo judi pobitro ole, goda dolabuo pobitro obo. Ar goragan judi pobitro ole, dhelagunio pobitro obak.
45011017	Ar hoiekkun dhela judi bhangi dinei, ar tumi jharbuo oliv gajchun, tharar loge tomare polop bani die oi, sebeden tumi tharar loge goragano bhag peie ar gajchuor ros bhag peie ola.
45011018	Senottei, dhelagunor biruddie bar no gorsio. Hintu tumi judi bar goro, monot rageio jei tumi goraganore no palor hintu goragane tomare palar.
45011019	Salen tumi hoi paro, “Dhelagun bhangi die oie jene siot more polop bani die oi.”
45011020	Thik age. Bischias no goron hinottei tharare bhangi phelei die oie ar tumi Bischiasor darai tigi ago. Phodani no gorsio, hintu doreo.
45011021	Haron Itchiore judi ajol dhelagun bad no dile, the tomareo bad no dibo.
45011022	Senottei, Itchioror goman ar pakka-pakkigan bhabi sawh. Je porsie tharattei hodin, hintu tomartei ole tumi judi tar gomanot eksottie thago tar goman tomartei thebo. Anole, the tomare habi phelei dibo.
45011023	Ar Israelunoreio judi bischias no gorsieganot eksottie no than, salen tharare polop bani die obo. Haron Itchiore aro tharare polop bani di pare.
45011024	Itchiore tomar jharbuo elade sien habi phelei dinei gom oliv gajchuot noi die sien polop gori die hinottei, Itchiore ajol dhelagun tharar nijor gajchunot polop bani no dibo ni na?
45011025	Oh bheilog, ei oghur gubonanot tumi aw-gyen bili mui tomare mone no gorongor. Anole, tumi nije gyeni bili mone goriba. Be-jadtunor somoien no phuroi song Israel manuschunore dol ham gori die oie.
45011026	Senottei, Sastrot lega agede doge beg Israel manuschune mukti pebak: “Uddhar goriebuo Zaion sohorottun ebo. The Jakobor manuschunor aw-dharmigkan dabei dibogi.
45011027	Haron ien olode mor thararloi protiggiagan ar, sokkene mui tharar pabpani dhoi phelei di dim.”
45011028	Gom hoboranottei thara tomar sottru, hintu bajiteiegunor sombonde Purbo-puruschununottei thara olakke Itchioro agojorun.
45011029	Haron Itchioro danan ar daganagan olode phirei no parsie.
45011030	Haron eksomoi tumi Itchior aw-mannio ela, hintu ikkie tumi tharar aw-mannioganottei tumi doyegan pela.
45011031	Thik sedogkie gori, tharaio ikkie aw-mannio elak jene, tomare die jeiede doyegano darai tharaio doyegan pan para.
45011032	Itchiore tharare begkunore aw-mannio bili mannie hinottei, the begkunor ugure tar doyegan ragei die.
45011033	Itchioror gyenan ar hobor panagan hodog shanggadik gobhin! Tar bijieran honna togei paribo ar tar podtan honna shub pebo?
45011034	Haron “Honna PROBUR monan hoi parsie? Honna tare bujei parsie?”
45011035	“Itchiore jene phirei de para honna tare akke die?”
45011036	Haron beg jinijchani tartun, tar darai ejchie ar beg jinijchani tartei. Mohimagan umore-umor tar ok. Amen.
45012001	Bheilog, senottei Itchioro doyeganor darai mui tomare hujoli gorongor. Tomar heyegani jeda, pobitro ar Itchiorottun monot pore para dali ijebe gojei duo. Sien olode tomar upojukto sebona haman
45012002	Ei songsaro doge no solinei, tomar monani puribotton gori nuo oio. Sebeden tumi proman peba Itchioro ischie doge huboni gom, gojhi lobar joggio ar puripunnuo.
45012003	Haron more die oiede doyegano darai mui hongge, tomar moiddie prottiek jone nijottei jedogkie gori sintie goribar elo sedogkie bar gori sintie no gorida. Hintu Itchiore prottiek jonore bischias dede doge moiddie gujoror gori sintie gorida.
45012004	Haron amar heyet onek onggo age hintu beg onggoganir ekkui ham noi.
45012005	Thik sedogkie gori, onek jon oleio Kristo iot ekkan heye ar gai-gaio ek jondoi ek jon somporko age.
45012006	Doyer darai onek bor peieidie doge hamot lagei. Muni dogkie gori hoda hobar ole, amar bischiaschano onusare muni dogkie gori hoda hoi;
45012007	lobiot hamot ole amar lobiot hamot lagei; sigkiet ole sigkiet lagei;
45012008	uschonit ole uschonit lagei; denat ole puro gori di; murubbi hamot ole uijkare murubbi hamot lagei; doye goranat ole hujhie doye gori.
45012009	Hospanagan phagara no gorsie hospana ok. Jien bojong sien hos no peio, jien gom sien dhori thago.
45012010	Bheior doye dogkie gori doye gora-gori gorsio. Nijottun bes gori oinnio jonore sorman gorsio.
45012011	Hamot alsi no oinei hammuo oio. Probure sebona gorte utchuo oio.
45012012	Asha gori hujhi oio. Hosto ele gaisuei thago, ega mone bor mago.
45012013	Hi-hi lage sadhu manus-chundoi diedi gorsio. Gorba lobiot gorsio.
45012014	Je tomare uttiesar goron sigunore asirbad duo, asirbad gorsio, geil no duo.
45012015	Hujhi oieguno loge hujhi oio, ar hanonde siguno loge hannio.
45012016	Tomar moiddie oinnio jondoi ekkui mon oio. Gourobot tomar monani no lageio, hintu niroit manuschundoi song porsio. Nijor mone gyeni no holeio.
45012017	Harore bojonggo hena bojonggoi no ugureio. Beg manuschuno sogo samne Gom ham gorsio.
45012018	Judi sombob ole jeddur paro begkundoi shantie thebar sesta gorsio.
45012019	Mor agojorun, hena no ugureio, Itchioro rakkanot gojei duo. Haron Sastrot lega age, “Hena ugurana haman mor. Mui hena ugureim,” Probuie hoi.
45012020	Senottei, “Tor sottrugunottun ped purilie bhat duo. Tharattun pani saj gorilie pani duo. Haron tui siennie gorte, tar mada ugure angie angara tuli dibe.”
45012021	Bojonganore jidibartei no duo, hintu bojongan gomandoi jitto.
45013001	Prottiek jone odhihariguno sidu niroit oio. Haron Itchiorbuottun bade ar huno jon odhihari nei, ar odhiharigun olakke Itchiore thik gorsie.
45013002	Senottei, je odhihariguno biruddie sole, the Itchioro ugumo biruddie sole. Ar je siguno biruddie solibo the nijor ugure sasti pebo.
45013003	Haron sason-goriegun olakke gom hamgoriegunottei dorebar noi, hintu bojong hamgoriegunottei dorebar age. Odhiharigune bojong ham goronde sigunore dor no lageibartei sasti lagan ni na? Jien gom sien goro, sebeden thara tomare baini goribak.
45013004	Haron the olode gom ham goribartei tor nange the Itchioro sagorsie. Hintu tui judi bojong ham goros, salen dores. Haron the magana-magana horgogan dhori no age. The Itchioro sagorsie hinottei je bojong ham gore sibier ugure hena ugureibartei tar rakkan tulibo.
45013005	Senottei, bana rakkan seinei noi, hintu idie-ittanotteio tar sidu niroit oio.
45013006	Haron ienottei hajanaio duo. Thara Itchioro sagorsie hinottei onsur thara ei jinijchani hial ragan.
45013007	Jare jien die pore sieni begkani duo. Hajana dibar thele hajanagun duogoi. Mal mattar hajana thele malo hajanagun duogoi. Jare dorebar age tare doreo, ar jare sorman goribar age tare sorman gorsio.
45013008	Hospanagan bade oinnio jinij bajei no thoio. Haron je hos pa-pi gore the Nioman purei de.
45013009	Niomane hoi, “Tui shanda no goris,” “Hun no goris,” “Sur no goris,” “Mijie shakki no dis,” “Lubbo no goris.” Aro oinnio silie judi thele, begkun ei hodaganot egottor oion. Sien olode, “Tor paralliegunore nijo dogkie gori hos peis.”
45013010	Hospanagane paralliegunore hoti no gore hinottei hospanagan olode Nioman purei denagan.
45013011	Ar ien goro, somoibuo hobor peio. Ghumottun jagibar somoi ejchie. Haron polim bischias gorsei die darane ikkie amar muktigan hai ejchie.
45013012	Reidtuo bidi gelogoi, dinno ejer. Senottei reido hamani bad dinei, dino aittierani loi.
45013013	Dinot bereidie dogkie gori gome-dalei berei. Holorobo no goribong ar mattol no obong, hanggi, lubbo no goribong, hoschie herengkal ar hinsie-nindie no goribong.
45013014	Hintu Probu Jisu Kristore loinei, heyegano lubboganore mon dinei sujuk no dile gom obo.
45014001	Bischiasot norom manus-chunore grohon gorsio. Monot shiongshama jinijchanit tare no nejeio.
45014002	Haron ek jone bischias gorinei begkani hei pare, hintu je bischiasot norom the bana tonpat hebo.
45014003	Je hai the oinnio jonore aw-pela no gorsie gori hok, ar je no hai the begkani haidie sibier bijier no gorsie gori hok. Haron Itchiore tare grohon gorsie.
45014004	Oinnio jonor sagorsiebuore bijier goriebuo tui honna? Sagorsiebuor jei odosat tar girojchuottun hoda. Haron Itchiore tare rageibo hinottei, the thebo.
45014005	Ek jone ek jonor ugure ek din dangor bili mone gori pare. Aro ek jone begkun dangor bili mone gori pare. Prottiek jone nijor monan buj dedok.
45014006	Je dinno palai, the Probur nange palai. Ar je dinno no palai, the Probur nange no palai. Je hai the Probur nange hai, ar je no hai. Haron the Itchiorore hujhi hoda hoi. Ar je no hai the Probur nange no hai. Ar the Itchiorore hujhi hoda hoi.
45014007	Haron huno jone nijottei baji no than ar huno jone nijottei no moron.
45014008	Haron ami judi baji thei, Probur nange ami baji thei. Ar ami judi mori jei, Probur nange ami mori jei. Senottei, ami mori jei bah baji thei ami olongge Probur.
45014009	Haron sei uddischuoi Kristo morsiegi ar jiei udinei baji age, jene the moragunor ar jedagunor Probu oi.
45014010	Salen, hittei tui tor bheibuore bijier goros? A hittei tor bheibuore aw-pela goros? Haron ami begkune Kristor bijiero jaganot thiei pebonggoi.
45014011	Haron Sastrot lega age, PROBUIE hor, “Mui jeda hinottei, prottiek jone mor mujungot adu pari salam gori pebakki, ar prottiek jile Itchiorore baini gori pebak.”
45014012	Siennie ole, ami prottiek jone nije-nije Itchioro sidu ijeb di pebonggoi.
45014013	Senottei, ek jone oinnio jone bijier no goribong ar. Sei bodoli, ien gorsio, bheilogkune azar no haan para, bah no poron para, ujuot hebar jinij tharar podot thoi no dibong.
45014014	Mui hobor pang ar shokto gori hobor pang Probu Jisu iot hitchu aw-pobitro nei. Hintu je prottiek jinij aw-pobitro bili mone gore, tartei sieni aw-pobitro oi pare.
45014015	Tor bhattunottei tui judi tor bheibuore monot dug lagei duos, salen tui hospanagandoi no solor ar. Jadtei Kristo morsiegi tare tor bhattunottei nosto no goris.
45014016	Senottei, tor goman bojong hobar no dis.
45014017	Haron Itchioro rejjiogan haana-dana gorana noi, hintu dharmigkan, shantigan ar Pobitro Aptat hujhi onagan.
45014018	Haron je ei hamanit Kristore sebona gore, Itchiore gojhiloi ar manjottun monot pore.
45014019	Senottei, shanti dede jinijchani ar oinnio jonore gorei tulede jinijchani lorei.
45014020	Bhadottei Itchioro haman nosto no gorsio. Beg jinijchani jodepode gori pobitro, hintu ek jone judi heinei, oinnio jonore azar hai para gore sien tartei bojong jinij.
45014021	Tor bheibuoi judi azar hai, monot dug pai, bah bischiasot norom oi, salen era haana ok bah mod haana ok bah je huno jinij no haanagan gom obo.
45014022	Tor sei bischias age ni? Itchiorbuor mujungot sien tortei rageis. Je jien nijore-nije dujot no pelai, sibie hoballie.
45014023	Hintu je haidie jinijchanit shiongshama thai, the bischiaso darai no hebo hinottei the nije-nije dujot poribo. Haron bischiaso darai no ole sien pab.
45015001	Ami bischiasot shoktogune ami nije-nije hujhi no oinei, bischiasot no romunor bharan lona osit.
45015002	Gorei tulibartei, prottiek jone paralliegunottei tar paralliebuore hujhi gorog.
45015003	Haron Kristoio nijore-nije hujhi no gore. Hintu Sastrot lega agede doge gorsie, “Tomare bodnam tangi duonde sigunor bodnaman mor ugure porsiegi.”
45015004	Haron jien agendi lega oie sien lega oiede ami shigibartei. Jene dhorjio dori thenei ar Sastroganot lega agede shantonagane amare asha de para.
45015005	Jisu Kristo onusare dhorjio ar shantona dede Itchiorbuoi tumi ek jone oinnio jonottei ekkui monan duok.
45015006	Tumi jene ek mon ar ekkan muendi Itchiorbuore, jibe ar amar Probu Jisu Kristor Bab mohima gori paro para.
45015007	Senottei, Kristo amare gojhi loiede dogkie gori Itchioro mohima obartei tumio gojhi lo-li goro.
45015008	Mui tomare hongor, purbo-puruschundoi gorsie soittiogan purei dibartei Itchioro soittioganottei Jisu Kristo sundu-sam happiegunottei sagorsie oie.
45015009	Sastrot lega agede doge Be-jadtune Itchiorore tar doyeganottei baini goron para. Edogkie gori lega age, “Ei senottei mui tomare Be-jadtuno sidu shakki dim, ar tor nange gid geim.”
45015010	Aro oinnio bhagot the hoie, “Oh Be-jadtun, tar manuschuno loge hujhi oio.”
45015011	Aro oinnio bhagot lega age, “Oh beg Be-jadtun, Probure baini goro. Begkun manuschune joi dhuni duo.”
45015012	Isaiai aro hoie, “Jesitun ekkan singor thebo. Sien udinei Be-jadtuno ugure sason-goribuo. Be-jadtunor tar iot asha thebo.”
45015013	Pobitro Aptar hemoda darai alajhala asha pebartei, asha dede Itchiorbuoi beg hujhiganiloi boron gori tumi bischias gorode doge shanti duok.
45015014	Oh bheilog, mor tomartei bischias age jei tomartun goman boron gori, beg gyeno puripunnuogan, ar ek jone ek jonore gorei tulonagan age.
45015015	Oh bheilog jai ok, Itchiore more doyegan die hinottei mui tomare mono tuli dibartei sohoj gori hoiekkani sombonde legilung.
45015016	Be-jadtuno sidu Jisu Kristor sagorsie ong para, Itchioro gom hoboran dhormothagurune gojande dogkie gori dibartei, ar Be-jadtuno sien Itchiore gojhiloi para ar Pobitro Aptai pobitro gore para.
45015017	Senottei, Itchioro jinijchor sombonde Jisu Kristo iot mor baini goribar haron age.
45015018	Haron hodadi ok hamodi ok Be-jadtunore manon para goreibartei, Kristo mor darai no gorede sieni ekkano mor hobar sahoj nei.
45015019	Oborug sinno hamedi, ar oborug hamedi Itchioro Aptar hemoda darai mui Jerusalem sohorottun duri goda Illyrikum rejjior seropala song Kristor gom hoboran puro gori prosar gorsiong.
45015020	Senottei, mui thik gorsiongge jei jaganot Kristo nangan ejo hobor no pan, sei jaganot prosar goribarlottei, jene oinnio jone tola tullionde sieno ugure mui no tulong para.
45015021	Sastrot lega agede doge goridung sang: “Jiguno sidu tare phogodang gora no oi, sigune tare degibak. Ar jigune tar hoda no sunon sigune bujibak.”
45015022	Ei sienittei, mui tomar idu ebar onek badha pori elo.
45015023	Hintu ikkie ei bamot mortei prosar goribar jaga nei ar, ar onek bojor olo mui tomar idu ebar dhap gorongotte.
45015024	Spain dejot mui gele, tomar idu eim. Haron mui jade tomare sebar dhap age, judio polim bar hanekkonottei tomarloi podot lak pa-pi oleio sahajjio obo.
45015025	Hintu ikkie sadhu manuschunore sebona goribarlottei mui Jerusalem sohorot jangor.
45015026	Haron sadhu manuschunor moiddie nadongsara manuschunore Jerusalem sohorot sahajjio dena, Makidonia, ar Akaia dejor manuschunottun baari mone hor.
45015027	Be-jadtune hujhi gori mone gortonde, thara sadhu manuschunor Horoj ugureie. Haron Be-jadtune judi aptar jinij bhag peie on, tharare heyet jinij denagan olode tharar daetto.
45015028	Senottei, mui sei danan di phureile ar Jerusalemor manuschune peion bili ses gora poribo. Sei porendi, mui Spain dejot jade tomar idu eim.
45015029	Hintu mui hobor pang, mui tomar idu ele, Kristor gom hoborano asirbadtan puro gori ani di dim.
45015030	Bheilog, Probu Jisu Kristor ar Aptabuor hospanar darai mui tomare hujoli gorongor. Mortei Itchioro sidu shanggadik bor magi dinei bol duo.
45015031	Judea dejot bischias no goronde sigunottun Itchiore more uddhar gore para, ar Jerusalem sohorot sadhu manuschuno sidu mor haman gojhi lon para mortei bor magi duo.
45015032	Itchioro ischie mote hujhi gori mui tomar idu ei parong para ar tomarloi jirei paronggi para mortei bor magi duo.
45015033	Shanti dede Itchiorbuo tomar begkuno loge thok. Amen.
45016001	Kenkheria mondolibuor sagorsie amar bon Phoebire mui tomar idu mor monot porsiebuo bili janei duongor.
45016002	Tare sadhu manjior dogkie gori Probur nange gojhi loio. Tar hamot jei tomartun tar jien lage sien tare bol duo. Haron the onek jonore boldie elo ar the nije moreio bol die.
45016003	Jisu Kristo iot mor hamot phagot sommie, Priskillare ar Akuilare salam janeio.
45016004	More bipodottun sharebartei tharar gortonagun gojei duon. Tharare hujhi hoda hoie bana mui noi, beg Be-jadtuno mondoliguneio tharare hujhi hoda hon.
45016005	Thik sedogkie gori, tharar ghoro mondoligunoreio salam janeio. Akaia dejot Kristor polim pholluo oiede, mor agojor Epanetare salam janeio.
45016006	Amattei onek ham gorsiede Merire salam janeio.
45016007	Andronikare ar Juniare salam janeio. Thara olakke mor sodorsie ar eksomare jiel-hadie. Thara apostoluno dogkie dorkari manus. Mor agendi thara Kristo iot elak.
45016008	Probu iot mor agojor Ampiliare salam janeio.
45016009	Kristo iot amar hamot phagot sommie Ubanure, ar mor agojor Stakure salam janeio.
45016010	Kristo iot monot porsie Apellese ar Aristobular ghorbogunore salam janeio.
45016011	Mor sodorsie, Herodienore salam janeio. Probu iot agonde Narkasir ghorbogunoreo salam janeio.
45016012	Probu iot hadoni gorsionde Trypenare ar Tryphosare salam janeio. Probu iot onek hadoni gorsiede agojor Persisoreio salam janeio.
45016013	Probu iot basoni oie Rufore salam janeio. Tar mabuore, jibe moro ma oi, sibiereo salam janeio.
45016014	Asynkriture, Phlegonare, Hermesore, Patrobore, Harmasore, ar tharar loge agonde bheilogkunoreo salam janeio.
45016015	Philologore, Juliare, Neresure ar tar bonnuore salam janeio. Olymphare, ar tar loge agonde beg sadhu manuschunoreio salam janeio.
45016016	Pobitro sumon dinei salam jana-jani gorsio. Kristor beg mondoligune tomare salam janadon.
45016017	Bheilog, ikkie mui tomare uij duongor, tumi sigkiode sieni biruddie pharok gorande ar azar habande siguno pokke uijkare thagkuo ar tharattun pharok oio.
45016018	Haron edogkie goronde sigune amar Probu Jisu Kristore sebona no goron, hintu tharar pedtun sebona goron. Shadoron manuschunor monani thara midie-midie ar suot-suot hodaloi bhulon.
45016019	Haron tumi hoda manode sien begkune hobor pan. Senottei mui tomar pokke hujhi oiong. Hintu mui sangge tumi gom pokke gyeni oda, ar bojong pokke aw-gyeni oda.
45016020	Sebeden shanti dede Itchiorbuoi Soitannuore jhadi gori tomar thengot tole dolibo. Amar Probu Jisu Kristor doyegan tomar ugure thok. Amen.
45016021	Mor hamot phagot sommie-buoi Timothi, ar mor sodorsie Lucia, Jasone, ar Sosipatore tomare salam janadon.
45016022	Mui, Tertia, ei sidigan legkuongge sibiei Probur nange salam janangor.
45016023	Mor ar goda mondolibuor boleiebuoi, Gaiuse, tomare salam janar. Sohoro sompotti rakkolibuoi, Erastase, tomare salam janar. Amar bhei Quartuseio tomare salam janar.
45016024	Amar Probu Jisu Kristor doyegan tomar begkuno ugure thok. Amen.
45016025	Mor gom hoborano darai ar Jisu Kristor prosaro darai Itchiorbuoi tomare shokto goribar hemoda age. Sei prosaran songsar sristi no ode siottun duri oghur gubone rageie ar ikkie sien prosar gori dilo.
45016026	Hintu Ononto Itchiorbuor ugumo onusare, munigune legkuonde sienir darai manjie sei oghur gubonan buji paron para phogodang gori die, jene bischiaso darai beg jadtune tar hoda manon.
45016027	Ek Mattro gyeni Itchiorbuor Jisu Kristo darai umore-umor song mohima ok. Amen.
46001001	Mui Paula, Itchioro ischie doge Jisu Kristor Apostol obartei Itchiore more dakkie. Amar bhei Sosthena mor loge age.
46001002	Korinth sohorot Itchioro mondolibuore legir. Tumi olade Jisu Kristo iot pobitro gori thoiede manuschun. Tumi sadhu manus obartei tomare daga oie. Probu Jisu Kristor nangan dagonde sigunor begkuno loge tumio sadhu manus. Tar nangan beg jaganit idot thulon. Jisu Kristo olode tharar, ar amar Probu.
46001003	Amar Bab Itchiore ar Probu Jisu Kristoi tomare doye ar shanti duok.
46001004	Jisu Kristo iot Itchiore tomare doye gorsie hinottei mui onsur tomartei Itchiorore hujhi hoda hong.
46001005	Ortat, Itchiore tar iot tomare begkanit, beg hoda battat ar beg gyenanit thagoie gorsie.
46001006	Sien olode Jisu Kristor sombonde shakkigan, Itchiore tomar siot thik gorsiede doge.
46001007	Senottei, tomar huno bor ekkanio pora nei bili, amar Probu Jisu Kristo dega dibogi die sieno tumi asha gori barsei ago.
46001008	Ses song tomareo the shokto goribuo. Amar Probu Jisu Kristo dinnuot tomare hitchu duj dibar no thebo.
46001009	Itchiorbuo bischias goribar lak. Tar puo Amar Probu Jisu Kristoloi song pora-poriganot The tomare dakkie.
46001010	Bheilog, amar Probu Jisu Kristor nange tumi begkune ekkan hoda ho para, tomar moiddie pharok ona no thai para ar tumi uijkare ek oinei ekmon ar ekkui bijier oi para mui tomare uschoni tuli duongor.
46001011	Bheilog, haron Kloi ghorbuottun hoi ek jone tomar sombonde more janeiondi. Thara more hoiondi die tomar moiddie hoschie herengkal bajeio.
46001012	Mui ien hongor, tumi jon bagene hode, “Mui Paular dolor manus.” Bah “Mui Apollor dolor manus.” Bah “Mui Kepha dolor manus.” Bah “Mui Kristo dolor manus.”
46001013	Kristo bhag oie ni na? Tomartei Paulare krosot duon ni na? Tomare Paula nange baptisma gori duon ni na?
46001014	Krispu ar Gaius bade mui tomar moiddie huno jonore baptisma gori no duong hinottei Itchiorore mui hujhi hoda hongor.
46001015	Mor nijor nange baptisma gori duong bili manjie no hon para mui baptisma gori no duong.
46001016	Stephana ghorbuogunoreio mui baptisma gori duong. Oinnio jonore baptisma gori duong bili mor monot nei.
46001017	Haron baptisma gori dibartei Kristo more di no padai, hintu gom hoboran prosar goribartei the more dipadeie. Kristor kroschan moillio no thai bili gyeno hodaloi hobartei the more di no padai.
46001018	Haron boij jadonde sigunottei kroschano hoboran olode bhulo hoda. Hintu mukti phertie igunottei sei hoboran olode Itchioro hemodagan.
46001019	Haron Sastroie hoi, “Gyeni manuschunor gyenan mui nas gori dim. Ar bujonde manuschunor bujonagan ortho sara gori dim.”
46001020	Gyenigun hudu? Dhormo niomo mastorun hudu? Ei jugor torgo goriegun hudu? Ei songsaro gyenan Itchiore bhul banei no de ni na?
46001021	Haronan olode, Itchioro gyene songsaro manuschune tharar gyenandoi Itchior hobor no pan. Bhul hodagandoi prosar gorinei je bischias gore the mukti pai hinottei Itchiore hujhi oi.
46001022	Judai manuschune sinno magon ar Grik manuschune gyen togan.
46001023	Hintu manjie krosot duonde sei Kristo hodagan ami prosar gori. Judai manuschunottei the olode ujuot haidie sil ar Grik manuschunottei the olode bhul hoda.
46001024	Hintu jigunore daga oie Judai manus bah Grik manus, duo-dagittei Kristo olode Itchioro hemodagan ar gyenan.
46001025	Haron Itchioro bhulan olode manjior gyenanottun bes gyeni ar Itchioro bol neiegan olode manjior bolanottun bes boli.
46001026	Bheilog, monot rageio tomare daga oiede lokke tumi hi ela. Manjie mabonde jogai tumi balukjon gyeni no ela. Balukjon boli no ela ar balukjon utchuo hulo manus no ela.
46001027	Hintu gyeni manuschunore lajot pheleibartei Itchiore songsaro bhul jinijchani bei loie. Ar boli manuschunore lajot pheleibartei Itchiore songsaro bol neie jinijchani bei loie.
46001028	Niroit manuschun Itchiore the bei loi. Manjie aw-pela goronde ar dorkar no lakkie jinijchani dorkarot lakkie oi para The sieni bei loi.
46001029	Tar mujungot huno jone phodani gori no paron para The sieni bei loi.
46001030	Tar darai tumi Jisu Kristo iot ago. The oie amattei Itchioro gyenan, dharmig-kan, pobitrogan ar muktigan.
46001031	Senottei, Sastroie hoidie doge oi para hon, “Je baini gore, the Probuiot baini gorog.”
46002001	Bheilog, mui jokke tomar idu Itchioro sombonde shakki dibartei ejchiong, gom hodaloi ar gyendoi mui no ejong.
46002002	Haron mui dharona gorsiongge krosot duonde Jisu Kristo bade hitchu tomar moiddie hobor no pedung.
46002003	Mui tomar loge thagode bolneie elung, doredung ar girgireidung.
46002004	Mor hodagani ar mui prosar gorsiongge ieni bhuleibar ar gyeni hoda noi. Hintu mor hodaganie Aptabuor hemodagan degeie.
46002005	Senottei, tomar bischiaschan manjior gyenedi no oinei hintu Itchioro hemodadi oi para.
46002006	Hintu bujunor manuschuno idu ami gyeni hoda hoi. Tobuio ien ei jugor gyeni hoda ar aw-gunor ei jugor sason-goriegunor hoda noi.
46002007	Hintu Itchioro gyeno hodagan ami oghur gubone hoi. Sei gyeno hodagan jugkuo arambo no ode amar oborugottei honatto Itchiore ghubei thoie.
46002008	Ei jugor sason-gorie huno jone ien hobor no pan. Judi thara hobor pedak, oborug Probure thara krosot no dilakkun.
46002009	Sastrot lega doge olo, “Itchiore thara hos pande sigunottei jugolei dede sieni, huno soge no dege, huno hane no sune ar huno jone monot bhabi no san.”
46002010	Hintu Itchiore tar Aptar darai sien amare degeie. Haron Aptabuoi begkani togai ar Itchioro gubono jinijchanio togai.
46002011	Haron ek jone oinnio jono mono hodagani hobor pebo ni? Bana tar aptabuoi tar nijor mono hodagani hobor pebo. Thik sedogkie gori Itchioro mono hodagani huno jone hobor no pan. Bana Itchioro Aptabuoi sieni hobor pai.
46002012	Songsaro aptabuo ami no pei. Thik sedogkie gori, Itchioro Aptabuo ami peieidie Itchiore amare boksit ijebe dede sieni hobor pei para.
46002013	Ar ami sei hodagani hoi, Manjior gyendoi sigeinde doge ami no hoi, hintu Pobitro Aptai sigeiede doge ami hoi. Aptar hodaloi aptar hodagani bhangi di.
46002014	Jeda Itchior no sinnie manjie Itchioro Aptar hodagani no bujon. Tharattei sieni bhulo hoda. Aptar doge sieni shagi sa pore hinottei, the sieni bujibar noi.
46002015	Aptar manjie begkani shagi san, hintu huno jone tare porikkie no san.
46002016	Haron, “PROBUR monan honna hoi parsie? Honna tare sigeibo?” Hintu Kristor monan amar age.
46003001	Bheilog, aptar manuschuno dogkie gori mui tomarloi hoda no hong. Hintu Kristo iot pabi manjior dogkie gori mui tomarloi hoda hong.
46003002	Mui tomare dud habeiong ar doro bhat no habang. Haron tumi ejosong bhat hei paro para no aw ar hei no pariba.
46003003	Tumi ejosong pabi manjior dogkie ago hinottei, tomar moiddie ejosong hos pa-pi nei, hoschie herengkal ar pharok ona age. Senottei tumi pabi manjior dogkie noi ni?
46003004	Haron ek jone hoi, “Mui Paula dolor manus, ” ar ek jone hoi, “Mui Apollo dolor manus.” Tumi jokke sengiri ho, tumi pabi manjior dogkie noi ni?
46003005	Honna Paula? Honna Apollo? Ami olongge Probuie jon bagene thik gorsiede doge bana sagorsie ar amar darai tumi bischias gorsio.
46003006	Mui lageiong ar Apolloi pani die. Hintu Itchiore na saragun dangor gori di die.
46003007	Senottei, lageiebuo ar panidiebuo hitchu noi. Hintu saragun dangor gori dede Itchiorbuo dorkari.
46003008	Lageiebuor haman ar panidiebuor haman ekkan. Nijor hamo onusare jon bagene poriskari pebak.
46003009	Haron ami olongge Itchiorloi eksomare ham gorie. Tumi olade Itchioro jhuman ar ghoran.
46003010	Itchiore more doye gorsiede doge ek jon gyeni ghor tullie dogkie gori mui tolagan baneong. Oinnio ek jone ieno ugure tullie. Hintu hingori ieno ugure banebo jon bagene uijkar uo poribo.
46003011	Haron honatto baneie tolagano bade huno jone aro ekkan oinnio tola banei no paribak. Sei tolagan olode Jisu Kristo.
46003012	Ek jone judi sei tolagano ugure sonaloi, rubuoloi, mongga silloi, gajchoi, bah, herloi banai,
46003013	jon bagene tharar haman henjannie dega jebo. Haron Dinnuoi janei dibo. Agundoi ienore porikkie sa obo hinottei, ien henjannie ham bili agunone prottiek jonor hamani porikkie goribuo.
46003014	Jar ieno ugure gorsiede haman tigi thai the poriskari pebo.
46003015	Jar haman puri jai, tar gunohar poribo. Hintu agunottun baschiede dogkie gori the nije rokkie pebo.
46003016	Tumi olade Itchioro mondir ar Itchioro Aptabuo tomar bidirie thaidie tumi hobor po ni?
46003017	Huno jone judi Itchioro mondirbuo nas gore, Itchiore tare nas goribuo. Haron Itchioro mondirbuo olode pobitro. Ar tumi olade sei mondirbuo.
46003018	Nijore-nije no thokko. Tomar moiddie je ei jugot gyeni holai, the gyeni oi para the bhul ok.
46003019	Haron ei songsaro gyenan olode Itchioro sidu bhulan. Sastroie hoi: “Gyenigunore tharar nijor salagkanot the hi gore mui hobor peim.”
46003020	Aro Sastroie hoi, “Ononto PROBUIE gyenigunor torgogani hobor pai, jei sieni hitchu noi.”
46003021	Senottei, manjiore manjie gourob no gortok. Haron begkani olode tomar.
46003022	Paular ok, Apollor ok, Kephar ok ar songsaror ok, jibonor ok bah moronor ok bortomanor ok bah bhobisodor ok begkani olode tomar.
46003023	Tumi olade Kristor ar Kristo olode Itchioror.
46004001	Senottei, manjie amare Kristor sagorsie ar Itchioror oghur gubonan rakkoli mone gortok.
46004002	Sei bara, rakkolibuo hamakkai bischias-joggio uo poribo.
46004003	Tumi judi more porikkie goro, bah, manjior Kodot judi more porikkie goron ien mortei ekkan shadoron hoda. Jodepode more mui porikkie no gorong.
46004004	Haron mor biruddie mui hitchu hobor no pang. Hintu siendoi mui dharmig ombe sien noi. More porikkiegoriebuo olode Probu.
46004005	Senottei, Probuie no eje song akke duri hitchu bijier no gorsio. Andharo jinij manjie lugei thonde sieni ar manjior ontoro hodaganio the bhar gori dibogi. Sebeden Itchiore jon bagene baini goribogi.
46004006	Bheilog, ikkie sei hodagani more ar Apollore bhor dinei tomare holung, jene tumi amattun shigo ar Sastroie hoidie bara tumi no bhabo. Sebeden tumi ek jono biruddie ek jone phodanio no aw para.
46004007	Haron honna tore manjiortun parok gore? Ar tor no peie hi age? Jokke peios, no paschie dogkie a hittei bar goros?
46004008	Tomar honatto alajhala oie. Honatto thagoie oio. Ami sara tumi raja dogkie gori sason gorsio. Mui mone gorong tumi hamakkai sason goriba ar amio tomar loge sason goribong.
46004009	Haron mui mone gorong Itchiore ami, apostolunore morei pheleibar ses hadallie degebo. Manjie amare sebak. Songsaro manjie ar sorgo-dude sebar obong.
46004010	Kristortei ami bhul, hintu Kristo iot tumi gyeni. Ami durbol, hintu tumi boli. Ar manjie tomare sorman goron, hintu thara amare aw-pela goron.
46004011	Ikkie song ami ped porai ar pani saje agi. Habor-subor pora peir. Manjie amare maron ar ami ghor neie gori agi.
46004012	Amar adtaniloi ham gorinei hameir. Amare aw-hoda hole, ami tharare bor di. Hosto lagele thori thei.
46004013	Amare sorjeile soijjio gori thei. Songsaro pela jeieni ami oiei. Edchie song bego aw-pelani oiei.
46004014	Tomare laj nejeibartei mui no legongor. Mor agojor puo ijebe mui tomare uij duongotte.
46004015	Haron judio dos azar Kristo iot tomar sigkie die thei paron, tobuio, tomar bes bab nei. Haron gom hoborano darai Kristo iot mui tomare jormo duong.
46004016	Senottei, tumi mor leik adeibartei mui tomare ujuluongor.
46004017	Sienottei, mor agojor puobuo, Probu iot bischias-joggiobuo Timothire mui tomar idu dipadeong. Jisu Kristo iot mui hingori roiong The tomare monot tuli dibogi. Jagai jagai prottiek mondolit mui jengori roiong mui sengori sigeiong.
46004018	Mui tomar idu no eim bili, tomartun hoiek jone phodani oio.
46004019	Probur ischie thele, mui jhadi eim. Sebeden phodani oionde sigunor bana tharar hodagani noi, tharar hemodaganio hobor peimbi.
46004020	Haron Itchioro rejjiogan hodadi noi, hintu hemodadi.
46004021	Tumi hi sawh? Bari dhorinei edung nahi, hospanagandoi ar nombro gori edung?
46005001	Ajole, hobor pa oiede tomar moiddie aw-shot sineli ham soler. Ar esannie aw-shot sineli ham ek jone tar shadanga mabuore lona, Be-jadtuno moiddieo nang no oi.
46005002	Tomar monot dug obar lakkanot tumi phodani goror! Sei haman gorsiede manuschuore tomar moiddiettun tumi bar gori dena osit elo.
46005003	Haron mui heyedi no theleio aptadi agong. Mui elungge dogkie gori, sien gorsiede manuschuore mui honatto duji baneong.
46005004	Probu Jisur nange jokke tumi thubo, mui tomar loge aptadi thang ar amar Probu Jisur hemodagan thai.
46005005	Tar heyegan nosto obartei tare Soitano adot gojei duo, jene Probu Jisur Dinnuot tar aptabuo mukti oi para.
46005006	Bar goranagan gom noi. Tumi hobor no po, goda bhattun ekkena moli-gurie joraidie?
46005007	Senottei, puron molibuo phelei duo tumi nuo bhat aw para, jokke tumi moli-guri a gullie. Haron Kristo olode Rokkie Utchobo bera-shagolo shawhbuo amattei dali die oie sibie.
46005008	Senottei, utchobpan palei, puron moliloi noi, hinsie ar dujto moliloi noi. Hintu soittio ar jodepode moli a gullie pidieloi palei.
46005009	Aw-shot sineli ham goronde manuschundoi song no poribartei mui tomare ekkan sidit legkuong.
46005010	Songsaro sineli ham gorie manuschuno hoda mui no hong. Lubbo, bol-bola gorie manus ar mokti pujieguno hoda mui no hong. Siennie judi ole, tomar songsaran sari ja poribo.
46005011	Tumi bhei hode sibier sombonde mui legongor. The judi sineli ham gorie oi, lubbo, mokti pujie, manus hinsie gorie, mattollie ar bol-bola gorie manus oi, tarloi song no porsio ar haba-daba no gorsio.
46005012	Haron, hittei mui barendi manuschunore bijier gortung? Bidire manus noi ni tumi bijier gorana?
46005013	Hintu barendi manuschunore Itchiore bijier goribuo. Senottei, “Aw-shot manuschun tomar moiddiettun bar gori duo.”
46006001	Tomartun ek jonor judi ek jono biruddie jagulug thai, bijierottei the sadhu manuschuno sidu no jeinei be-dhormi manuschuno sidu jebar sahoj goribuo ni?
46006002	Sadhu manuschune songsaro manuschunore bijier goribakke tumi hobor po ne no po? Ar tumi judi songsaro manuschunore bijier goro, shadaron hoda tumi bijier gori paribar joggio noi ni?
46006003	Sorgo-dudtunoreio bijier gori dibongge tumi hobor no po? Ei jibonano sombonde bijier goribar amar hodog thedo ar?
46006004	Ei jibonano sombonde judi bijier thele, salen mondolie bes sorman no gorede sigunore bijier goribartei tumi thik goriba parapang?
46006005	Tumi lajo para ien mui hongor. Bheior bheior bijieran gori dibartei tomar moiddie ek jono gyeni manus nei ni na?
46006006	Hintu ek bheior biruddie bijierot jana, ar sieno bischias no goronde siguno sidu!
46006007	Senottei ikkie ek jono biruddie mogoddimat jana honatto hoti oie. Sienor ajai tumi hittei nije be-ainigan mani no lo? A hittei tumi nijore thogebartei manjiore no duo?
46006008	Sei bodoli, tumi bojong goro ar thogo. Ar tomar bheiunoreio esannie goro.
46006009	Be-dhormi manuschune Itch-ioro rejjiogan no pebakke tumi hobor no po? Thoga no heio. Sineli hamgoriegune, mokti pujiegune, shanda gorie morodtune ar shanda gorie miliegune, ar morode-morode bah miliei-miliei jur jande sigune Itchioro rejjiogan no pebak.
46006010	Surune, lubbogune, Mattolliegune, moromaragune, ar bol-bola goriegune Itchioro rejjiogan odhihari no obak.
46006011	Tumio hoiek jon siennie ela. Hintu Itchiore Probu Jisur nange ar amar Itchioro Aptabuo darai tomare dhoinei, pobitro gorinei, dharmig gori thoie.
46006012	Mui goribartei begkani hulo age, hintu, begkani mortei lab no oi. Mui goribartei begkani hulo age, hintu mor ugure odhihar thebartei mui hitchu onumoti didung noi.
46006013	Bhattun olakke pedtuottei ar pedtuo olode bhattunottei. Hintu Itchiore duogan ses gori dibo. Heyegan aw-shot sineli ham goribartei noi, hintu Probuttei ar Probu olode heyeganottei.
46006014	Itchiore Probure jiei tullie ar the amareio tar hemoda darai jiei tulibo.
46006015	Tomar heyegani Kristor onggo hobor no po? Kristor onggogani beschie milier onggo banei dim ni? Hamakkai noi.
46006016	Je nije beschie milieloi ek oi, tarloi ek heye oidie hobor no po? Haron Itchiore hoi, “Di jone ek heye obak.”
46006017	Hintu je Probu loi ek oie tarloi ekkuo apta olo.
46006018	Aw-shot sineli hamortun dhei jo. Ek jone jei pab gorto sat sien heyet barendi. Hintu je aw-shot sineli ham gore sien tar nijor heyegano biruddie obo.
46006019	Itchiorottun peiode Pobitro Aptabuo tomar heye bidirie thaidie sibie mondir ar tumi tomar nijor noi die tumi hobor no po?
46006020	Haron Itchiore tomare dam dinei hinnie. Senottei, tomar heyegandoi ar tomar aptabuoloi Itchiorore mohima goro. Sieni olode Itchioror.
46007001	Tumi more legkuode sombonde hong: Morode miliere no shuona gom.
46007002	Tobuio, aw-shot sineli hamo pokke, prottiek morodor nijor mogor prottiek milier nijor neg thana osit.
46007003	Negkuoi tar mogkuore mon purei dena osit. Sedogkie gori mogkuoio tar negkuore mon purei dena osit.
46007004	Mogkuor tar nijor heyegano ugure odhihar nei. Tar negkuor, tar mogkuor heyegano ugure odhihar age. Thik sedogkie gori, negkuor tar nijor heyegano ugure odhihar nei. Tar mogkuor, tar negkuor heyegano ugure odhihar age.
46007005	Ubos theinei bor magibartei ole, hanekkon pharok gori thebartei duo jone judi mano, salen bad duo. Anole, mon purei die dien bad no duo. Nijore-nije domon gori no paro hinottei, soitane porikkie no sai para aro egottor gori thagkuo.
46007006	Mui holungge ien onumoti, Itchioro ugum noi.
46007007	Mor mone hoidie beg manuschune mor dogkie gori thedak. Hintu prottiek jone Itchiorottun ekdogkie bor no pan. Ek jonor ekdogkie aro oinnio jonor ekdogkie bor peion.
46007008	Neg-mog no londe sigunore ar rani-miliegunore mui hongor, thara mor dogkie gori thei parilie gom obo.
46007009	Hintu thara judi lub shamelei no paron, sale lodok. Haron angibode darane lonagan bhala.
46007010	Lo-li oiegunore mui ei uguman duongor, hintu mui noi, ien olode Probur hoda: mogkuoi nije tar negkuottun pharok no ok.
46007011	The judi pharok oleio, the neg no lokkoi ar no ole tar negkuoloi aro egottor okkoi. Negkuoi tar mogkuore sari no duok.
46007012	Bagigunore mui hongor: Ei hodagan mortun, Probuttun noi. Ek bheior judi aw-bischiasi mog thai, ar the tarloi hele, the tare hamakkai sari no duok.
46007013	Ar ekkuo miliettun judi aw-bischiasi neg thele, the judi tarloi hebar mon thai, the tare sari no duok.
46007014	Haron mogkuor darai Aw-bischiasi negkuo pobitro obo, ar negkuor darai Aw-bischiasi mogkuo pobitro obo. Siennie no ole, tomar puo shabagun aw-poriskar obak, hintu ikkie thara pobitro olak.
46007015	Aw-bischiasibuoi judi the nije share, sale sharok. Sei lokkene, bheibuo ok bonnuo ok the bondhi oi thedo noi. Hintu Itchiore amare shantittei dakkie.
46007016	Haron, oh mogkuo, tui hi hoi paros, tor negkuore tui mukti gori paros daw! Oh negkuo, hoi hi paros, tor mogkuore tui mukti gori paros daw!
46007017	Hintu Itchiore daginei prottiek jonore jon bagene dede doge thagodok. Sien olode mui beg mondoligunot duongge uguman.
46007018	Sundu-sam happie manus Itchiore dakkie ni? Siennie judi ole, the no habede dogkie no ok. Sundu-sam no happie manus Itchiore dakkie ni? Siennie judi ole, the sundu-sam no habok.
46007019	Sundu-sam habok bah no habok sien hitchu noi. Itchioro ugumani manana sien dorkar de.
46007020	Itchiore jare jedogkie gori dakkie the sedogkie gori thok.
46007021	Banidaji oi thagke Itchiore tore dakkie ni? Sidie no goris. Hintu tui judi shadin oi paros, shadin aw.
46007022	Haron banidaji oi thagke Probu iot daga ole, the Probur shadin manus. Thik sedogkie gori shadin oi thagke daga ole, the Kristor banidaji.
46007023	Itchiore tomare dam dinei hinnie. Manjior banidaji no oio.
46007024	Bheilog, Itchiore jare jedogkie gori dakkie the sedogkie gori thok.
46007025	Shodi gabur-milieguno sombonde, Probuie more hitchu ugum no de. Tobuio, mui bischias-joggio obartei Probuttun doye peiong hinottei, ekkan hoda hong.
46007026	Ikkie hosto ani seinei, mui mone gorong tumi agode sei doge thele gom obo.
46007027	Mog loio ni na? Lole sari no duo. Mog no lo ni na? Mog no togeio.
46007028	Hintu tui mog loi theleio tor pab no oi. Hintu low-li oiegunor heyet hosto obo ar mui tomare bajeidung sang.
46007029	Bheilog, mui ien hong, somoi thum oi ejer. Ikkiettun duri mog-bolagune mog neidie dogkie uo poribo.
46007030	Hanonde sigune no hanonde dogkie uo poribo. Hujhi oiegune hujhi no onde dogkie uo poribo. Jar age the neidie dogkie uo poribo.
46007031	Je ei songsaro jinij hamot lagai, the bes no larette dogkie uo poribo. Haron ei songsaro jinijchani udi jarloi.
46007032	Mui sangge tumi sidie no gorta. Neg-mog no loiegune hingori Probure thara hujhi goribak, Probur haman sidie goribak.
46007033	Hintu mog loiegune hingori mogkuore thara hujhi goribak, songsaro sidie goron.
46007034	Mog ar shodi gabur-milie olakke judo. Neg no loie miliei tar heyedi ar aptadi pobitro obartei Probur haman sidie goron. Hintu neg loie miliei hingori the tar negkuore hujhi goribuo songsaro sidie goron.
46007035	Tomar labottei sien mui hongor, tomare phalot bajeibartei noi. Hintu jien osit sien mui hongor, jene Probure tumi ega mone sebona goro para.
46007036	Ek jone judi mone gore the thik gorsiede shodi gabur-miliebuoloi tar sal-solonan gom no awr, ar gaburir judi boios bes oi, ar the tare lona osit bili bhabilie tar mone moton gorog. Thara lo-li ona osit ar siot pab odo noi.
46007037	Hintu ek jone tar monot shokto dharona gore jei mog lona dorkar nei ar tar nijor ischiegan domon gori pare, ar siennie gori thai sien bes gom.
46007038	Senottei, je neg lo bajeide sien gom ar je neg lo bajei no de sittun bes gom.
46007039	Negkuo baji thagke niomane mogkuore tar negkuoloi bani thoi. Hintu negkuo judi more, the jare lodo sat dhorapagara nei. Hintu Probur doge the lona osit.
46007040	Mui ien mone gorong: the judi no loie gori thai, the aro hujhi obo. Ar mui mone gorong moro Itchioro Aptabuo age.
46008001	Ikkie moktire gojeie jinijor sombonde mui legongor. Amar begkunor gyen agede ami hobor pei. Gyene phodani barai, hintu hospanagane gorei tule.
46008002	Je begkani hobor pai bili mone gore, the jedogkie gori hobor pana osit sedogkie gori ejo hobor no pai.
46008003	Hintu je Itchior hos pai, tare Itchiore hobor pai.
46008004	Senottei, moktire gojeie jinij hebar sombonde legongor. Ami hobor pei songsarot mokti hitchu noi, ar ekkuo Itchior bade oinnio Itchior nei.
46008005	Judio sorgot ar pittimit onek Itchior ar probu agon hon, (jodepode onek Itchior ar probu agon).
46008006	Hintu amattei ekkuo gori Bab Itchior age. Beg jinijchani tartun ejchie ar ami olongge tar. Ar amattei ek jon gori Probu Jisu Kristo age ar beg jinijchani tar darai ejchie ar ami tar darai baji agi.
46008007	Sei gyenan begkunor nei. Hintu hoiek jone mokti putchuon hinottei, thara hele, ejo tharattei moktire gojeie era bili mone goron. Tharar idie ittan norom hinottei, thara hele tharar idie ittandoi mon hajor oi.
46008008	Haidie jinije amare Itchioro hai no nejai. Haron heleio lab nei ar no heleio horab odo noi.
46008009	Hintu seio, tomar odhiharan bischias shokto noi die sigunor adikkie ujuot haana obo.
46008010	Senottei tor daw gyen age. Hintu mokti mondirot tui hebartei bojilegoi ar norom idie-it bolai ek jone tore degilie, moktire gojeie jinij hebar tar sahoj ebo ni?
46008011	Ar tor gyenanottei, Kristo jadtei morsie sei idie-it norom bheibuoi nas obo.
46008012	Jokke engori sei bheibuo biruddie tui pab goribe, ar tharar norom idie ittan aghat gori dibe, Kristo biruddie tor pab obo.
46008013	Senottei, judi hadie jinije sei bheibuore azar habai, mui tare azar no habang para huno din dali die era hedung noi.
46009001	mui apostol noi ni? mui shadin noi ni? Amar Probu Jisu Kristore mui no degong ni na? Probu iot tumi mor haman noi ni?
46009002	Oinnio manjiortei mui apostol no oleio, mui tomartei daw oi. Haron tumi olade mor apostolo hamanot Probu iot marga.
46009003	More porikkie goronde siguno sidu ien mor jobabpan:
46009004	Amar haba-daba goribar odhihar nei ni?
46009005	Oinnio jon apostoluno dogkie, Probur bheiuno dogkie ar Kepha dogkie bischiasi mog pune-pune nejeibartei odhihar nei ni?
46009006	Nahi, bana Barnabaloi mui bajibartei amar ham gora porede?
46009007	Ek jon soinnioi nijor horojchoi judduo gore ni na? Ek jone anggur bagan tulilie siottun anggur no hebo ni na? Ek jon bera-shagol soreiei tar bera-shagolunottun dut no hebo ni na?
46009008	Manjior ijebe mui hongor ni na, nahi niomaneio sien no hoi ni?
46009009	Haron Niomanot Mosi legkie, “Sela-goru dhan marte mu bani no duo.” Ien Itchiore sela-gorubuor sombonde hoie ni na?
46009010	Hamakkai ien The amattei horte noi ni? Ien amattei lega oiede, haron alsueiebuoi tar alsuanaganottun bhag pebar asha thana osit ar dhan mariebuoi the dhan marette siottun bhag pebar asha thana osit.
46009011	Ami judi aptar jinij tomar moiddie shidi di thei, tomartun judi ami jinij diei, dangor hoda obo ni na?
46009012	Oinnio jonor judi tomar ugure ei odhiharan thai, amio aro bes no pebong ni na? Ami ei odhiharan hamot no lageinei hintu begkani suei agidie jene, Kristor gom hoboran badha no pore para.
46009013	Tumi hobor no po, jigune pobitro jinijor belai ham goron, mondirottun haan ar jigune pallienganot ham goron, palliengano jinij bhag pande noi ni?
46009014	Thik sedogkie gori Probuie ugum dede, jigune gom hoboran prosar goron, gom hoboranottun hebar pan para.
46009015	Hintu mui sei odhiharani hamot no lagang. Ar sieni tumi more gori dibarteio mui tomare no legong. Haron huno jone mui bahadori gorimbie sien hari nibakke darane mor mori janagan bhala.
46009016	Gom hoboran prosar gorilie mui bar gori no parong. Haron gom hoboran mor prosar gora poribo. Gom hoboran mui judi prosar no gorong, mor hobal purok!
46009017	Mui judi mone hoinei sien gorong poriskari peim. Ar judi mui mone no hoie gori gorong, salen bana mor daettogan palangotte sie.
46009018	Salen mor poriskarigan hi? Bana ien: Gom hoboran magana mui prosar gortung ar prosar gorte mor odhiharani hamot no lageidung.
46009019	Haron mui begkunottun shadin oleio, more mui begkunor banidaji baneongge jene onek jon mui jidi parong para.
46009020	Judai manuschun jidibartei, Judai manuschuno sidu mui thara dogkie oiong. Nioman palande sigunore jidibartei, siguno sidu mui Niom paleie dogkie oiong.
46009021	Niom sara manuschunore jidibartei, siguno sidu mui niom sara manuschuno dogkie oiong. Itchioro mujungot mui niom sara manus noi, hintu Kristor mujungot mui niom paleie.
46009022	Bolneiegun jidibartei, sigunor sidu mui bolneieguno dogkie oiong. Begkunottei mui begkani oiong, je huno prokare hoiek jon jene mukti gori parong.
46009023	Mui sieni begkani gorongge gom hoboranottei jene mui tomar somare bhag pang.
46009024	Tumi hobor po ni, dumuro dumurit thara begkune dumurilie hintu bana ek jone gori poriskari paidie? Poriskari hamakkai po para dumuro.
46009025	Je harat jidiejittie sai, the begkanit nijore-nije domonot ragai. Thara daw hoi jaidie poriskari tuk pebartei jidiejittie san, hintu ami daw hoi no jaidie poriskari tuk pebartei gori.
46009026	Senottei, uddischuo sara gori mui no dumurong. Boieran bugkotte dogkie gori mui mara mari no gorong.
46009027	Hintu mui mor heyeganore shokto gorinei domonot ragang, jene mui manjior sidu prosar gorilie mui nije aw-joggio no ong para.
46010001	Bheilog, amar buro-burigun begkune megsagkano tole elak ar thara sagor phuri jeionde sombonde tumi hobor no po bili mui mone no gorong.
46010002	Thara begkune megsagot ar sagorot adi jeinei Mosir baptismagan loion.
46010003	Thara begkune ekkui aptar bhat heion.
46010004	Ar thara begkune ekkui aptar pani heion. Haron tharar pune-pune jeiede sei Aptar Silluottun pani heion, ar sei silluo olode Kristo.
46010005	Hintu thara begbhage Itchiorore hujhi gori no paron hinottei, tharare moruobomit morei pela oie.
46010006	Bojong jinij tharar porane magkiede dogkie, amaro porane no mage para sieni amattei udahoron oie.
46010007	Tharattun hoiek jone mokti pujie elak. Ami tharar dogkie gori mokti pujie no ona. Haron Sastroie hoi, “Manuschune hebartei bojchuon ar hela ronggo goribartei thieilak.”
46010008	Tharattun hoiek jone shanda gorsion ar thara dogkie ami shanda no gorana. Ar ekkuo dine teiz azar manus tharattun porinei mori jeion.
46010009	Tharattun hoiek jone Kristore porikkie gorsionde dogkie, amio Kristore porikkie no sana ar sigun sabe hudinei morsion.
46010010	Ar thara dogkie no budbudeio. Nasgoriebuoi tharare nas gorsie.
46010011	Sieni begkani tharar ghodi jeiede amar udahoronottei. Sei beg legani olode amare uij dibartei udahoron. Amar iot jug ses obartei ejchie.
46010012	Senottei, je the thieie bili mone gore, the no pore para uij ragog.
46010013	Manjiortei shadoron porikkie bara tomar idu oinnio porikkie no eje. Hintu Itchiorbuo bischias-joggio. Tumi thori no paribade porikkie the sedo noi. Hintu tumi thori paro para porikkiegan sari jebartei the pod ragei dibo.
46010014	Oh mor agojorun, tumi nije moktire pujo goranattun durot thagkuo.
46010015	Bujuno manjiore hongor. Mui hi hongor bhabi sawh.
46010016	Asirbado golojchuo ami asirbad goridie sibie Kristor logandoi egottor oidie sien noi ni? Ami hotta di die pidiegan Kristor heyegandoi egottor oidie sien noi ni?
46010017	Ekkan pidiettun ami begkune hei hinottei, ami judio jhagkuo, hintu ami olongge ekkan pidie ar ekkan heye.
46010018	Munischioro ghorbuo ijebe Israel manuschunore bhabi sawh. Pallienganot gojeie jinij haande sigun palliengano bhag peie on ni no on?
46010019	Sale mui hi hongor? Moktibuo huno ekkan hemoda-bola jinij oi, nahi moktigunore gojeieni huno ekkan hemoda-bola jinij oi ni?
46010020	Mui hongorte ien olode, Be-jadtune jien gojan sien bhudtuno sidu gojan, Itchioro sidu no gojan. Mui sangge tumi bhudtundoi song pora-pori no oda.
46010021	Probur golojchuottun ar bhudtuno golojchuottun hei no pariba. Probur bhat poibuottun ar bhudtuno bhat poibuottuno hei no pariba.
46010022	Probure pijhum gora bajei dibong ni na? Nahi, ami tartun bes boli?
46010023	Mortei begkani goribar hulo age, hintu begkani goribar mor lab nei. Mortei begkani goribar hulo age, hintu begkani gorei no tullie.
46010024	Huno jone nijor labpan no togeinei, oinnio jonor labpan togadok.
46010025	Tomar idie-ittanittei hitchu pujor no gorsie gori era bazarot ja bejon heio.
46010026	Haron, “Pittimigan ar pittimit jieni age begkani PROBUR.”
46010027	Aw-bischiasi manjiortun judi ek jone tomare haanat bolai, ar tumi jebar mone hole, tomar idie-ittanittei hitchu pujor no gorsie gori jien duon sien heio.
46010028	Hintu ek jone judi hoi, “Ien moktire gojeie.” Ei hodagan hobode manuschunottei ar tar idie-ittanottei no heio. Haron, “Pittimigan ar pittimit jieni age begkani PROBUR.”
46010029	Mui hongorte “Idie-ittan” tomar noi, hintu manjior idie-ittanottei. Haron mor shadinan hittei ek jonor idie-ittandoi bijier gorto?
46010030	Mui judi hujhi hoda hoinei haang, mui hujhi hoda hoiongge bhattunottei a hittei more sorjana?
46010031	Senottei, tumi jien heda sat, ar jien gorta sat Itchiorore baini goron para goro.
46010032	Judai manuschunore ok, Grik manus-chunore ok, Itchioro mondolire ok, ujuot no habeio.
46010033	Thik sedogkie gori, je huno iet mui begkunore hujhi gorongge dogkie gori tumio goro. Mui nijor labpan no seinei onek jonor labpan sang, jene thara mukti pan para.
46011001	Kristor leik mui adangge dogkie gori tumio mor leik adeio. Gome Tobona Gorana
46011002	Bheilog, je huno iet tumi more monot rago hinottei ar mui tomare duongge ago sigkiegani dori ago hinottei mui tomare baini gorongor.
46011003	Mui sangge tumi ei hodagani hobor peda: Prottiek jonor siriebuo olode Kristo. Morodtuo olode miliebuor sirie. Ar Kristo siriebuo olode Itchiorbuo.
46011004	Jei morodtuoi tar siriebuo daginei bor mage bah muni dogkie gori hoda hoi, the tar siriebuore aw-sorman gore.
46011005	Hintu jei miliebuoi tar siriebuo ghongoda no die gori bor mage bah muni dogkie gori hoda hoi, the tar siriebuo aw-sorman gore. The tar siriebuo mureileio ekkui hoda obo.
46011006	Haron judi ekkuo miliei tar siriebuo ghongoda no de, the tar siriebuo murok. Hintu miliei judi sul habon bah sirie muron, lajo hoda oi. Senottei, sirie ghongoda dena osit.
46011007	Morodtuo olode Itchioro subhibuo ar oborugkan hinottei the hamakkai sirie no dagana osit. Hintu miliebuo olode morodtuor oborugkan.
46011008	Haronan olode, morodtuo miliebuottun noi, hintu miliebuo morodtuottun.
46011009	Itchiore, morodtuo miliebuottei no banai, hintu miliebuo morod-tuottei banedie.
46011010	Senottei sorgo-dudtunottei, miliegunor siriet ekkan odhiharo sinno thana osit.
46011011	Tobuio Probu iot, miliebuo morodtuottun pharok noi ar morodtuoio miliebuottun pharok noi.
46011012	Haron miliebuo morodtuottun ar sedogkie gori, morodtuoio miliebuor darai nigillie, hintu begkani Itchiorottun.
46011013	Tumi nije tomar moiddie bhabi sawh, miliei sirie ghongoda no die gori Itchiorottun bor magana osit ni na?
46011014	Ei badeio bujo jai, morode judi sul lamba rageile, sien tartei aw-sorman oidie noi ni?
46011015	Hintu miliei judi sul lamba ragan, sien tharar oborugkan. Haron siriebuo dagibartei Itchiore tharare lamba sul die.
46011016	Judi huno jone ieno sombonde bhejal tulibar sele, sale, amattun ar Itchioro mondoligunottun oinnio dostur nei.
46011017	Hintu mui tomare ei sigkieni dede baini no gorong. Haron tumi jokke eksomare thubo, gomortei noi hintu bojonggottei.
46011018	Haron bego akke jokke tumi mondoli ijebe thubo, mui sunongge tomar moiddie bhag bhag ago, ar ekka ekka mui bischias jang.
46011019	Haron tomar moiddie thik gora oiegun hobor pa jai para, tomar moiddie bhul sigkie dieio thana dorkar.
46011020	Hebartei tumi ekkan jagat thubeile, Probur bellie haanabuo hebartei no thubo.
46011021	Haron hade, ek jonottun akke ek jone tar nijor bellie haanabuo hai. Ek jone ped pora hei hei thagode ar ek jone mattol oi tangore.
46011022	Hi? Haba-daba goribar tomar ghor nei ni na? Itchioro mondolibuore aw-pela goror ni ar neidie sigunore lajot pheleibartei sorte noi ni? mui tomare hi hom? ienottei mui tomare baini gorim ni? mui tomare baini gortung noi.
46011023	Haron Probuttun mui jien peiong, sien mui tomare duongge jei Juda Iskariode tare dhora bajei dede reidtuot, Probu Jisu pidiegan adot lolo.
46011024	Hujhi hoda honar porendi, the pidiegan hotta gorinei holo, “Ien mor heyegan mui tomartei hotta duongor. Loinei ho. More monot rageibartei ien gorsio.”
46011025	Sedogkie gori bellie saschuo haanar porendi, the golojchuoio adot loinei holo, “Ei golojchuo olode mor loganot nuo nioman. More monot rageibartei ien tumi onsur ho bagene gorsio.”
46011026	Ei pidiegan ho bagene ar ei golojchuottun ho bagene Probur meyegan The eje song prosar gorsio.
46011027	Senottei, aw-joggio gori Probur ei pidiegan ar ei golo-jchuottun je hai, the Probur heyeganot ar loganot dujot puribo.
46011028	Hintu nijore-nije porikkie gorinei ar sengori pidiegan ar golojchuottun heio.
46011029	Haron je Probur pidiegan ar golojchuottun aw-joggio gori hai, the nije dujot poribartei hai. The Probur heyegano sombonde gome-dalei gom bannie hobor no pai.
46011030	Senottei tomar moiddie onek jon durbol ar aw-sugkie agon, ar onek jon ghum jadon.
46011031	Hintu ami nijore-nije bijier gorilie, Itchiore amare bijier no goribuo.
46011032	Hintu jokke Probuie amare bijier gore, sokkene the amare uijhiar gore, jene songsaro manuschuno somare dujot no pori.
46011033	Bheilog, senottei jokke hebartei tumi eksomare thubo, barcha-barchi gorsio.
46011034	Hintu jar ped pure, the ghorot hokkoi jene bijierot poribartei eksomare no thubo para. Ar bagi hodagani mui ele thik gori dimbi.
46012001	Bheilog, ikkie aptar dano sombonde tumi aw-gyen obartei mui no sang.
46012002	Tumi Be-jad ela bili hobor po. Hoda hoi no parsie mokti sidu tomare jindi pai pharok gorei nejeion.
46012003	Senottei mui sangge tumi hobor peda, jar Itchioro Apta age the hodo noi, “Jisu obisab heie.” Pobitro Apta darai no ole huno jone hodak noi, “Jisu olode Probu.”
46012004	Nanan babottie bor age, hintu ekkui Apta.
46012005	Nanan babode lobiot gori pare, hintu ekkuo Probu.
46012006	Nanan babottie ham, hintu ekkuo Itchiore beg manuschuno bidirie begkanit ham gore.
46012007	Labottei jon bagene ekkan ekkan boksit denar darai Aptabuoi nijore-nije degeie.
