46012008	Apta darai ek jonore gyeno hoda de, aro ek jonore sei Aptabuoi buddhir hoda de.
46012009	Ekkuo Apta darai Itchiore ek jonore bischiaschan de, aro ek jonore sei Aptabuo darai gom gori paribar bor de.
46012010	Ek jonore amok ham gori paribar bor de, ek jonore muni dogkie gori hoda hobar bor de, ek jonore aptagun hobor pebar boksit de, ek jonore nanan hodadi hoi paribar bor de ar ek jonore nanan hoda ortho bhangi di paribar bor de.
46012011	Hintu jei, sei ekkuo Aptai begkanit ham gore ar tar ischie doge prottiek jonore borani bhag gori de.
46012012	Haron jedogkie gori heyegan olode ekkan ar ienot onek onggo age, hintu jhagkuo oleio jei ekkan heyet onggo. Kristoio sedogkie.
46012013	Haron ekkuo Aptar darai ami begkune heyettei baptisma loiei. Judai manus ok, Grik manus ok banidaji ok bah shadin manus ok ekkuo aptat begkunore habana oie.
46012014	Haron heyegan bana ekkan onggo noi, hintu onek onggo age.
46012015	Thengane judi hoi, “Mui ad noi hinottei, mui heyeganor noi.” Senottei thengane heyeganor noi ni na?
46012016	Ar hanane judi hoi, “Mui sog noi hinottei, mui heyeganor noi.” Senottei hanan heyeganor noi ni na?
46012017	Goda heyegan judi sog odo, hingori suno gelun? Goda heyegan judi han odo, hingori bas pa gelun?
46012018	Hintu Itchiore prottiek heyet onggo the jiot mone hoi siot bojei di die.
46012019	Beg onggogani judi ekkan odo, heyegan hudu olun?
46012020	Onek onggo hintu ekkan heye.
46012021	Sogkuoi adtanore hoi no paribo, “Tui mor dorkar nei.” Siriebuoi thenganore hoi no paribo, “Tui mor dorkar nei.”
46012022	Ami mone gori heyet hoiekkani onggo bol neie hintu sieni bes dorkari onggo.
46012023	Ami mone gori heyet hoiekkani onggor sorman nei. Sienire bes ami sorman gori. Hoiekkani onggo ami no degei. Sienire bes jottone thoi.
46012024	Hintu amar dega jaidie onggoganir no lage. Itchiore heyet onggogani gome-dalei jar jagat tare sorei di die. Sorman neie onggoganit bes The sorman di die.
46012025	Heyegan bhag bhag no obartei, hintu ekkan onggoi oinnio onggoganir sintie gore para The gori di die.
46012026	Ekkan onggoi dug phele, beg onggoganie sieno somare dug pai. Ar ek onggoi sorman phele beg onggoganie hujhi oi.
46012027	Tumi olade Kristor heyegan ar tumi prottiek jon heyeganor onggo.
46012028	Mondolit agonde igunore Itchiore thik gorsie. Akke apostolun, the munigun, sei jeredi mastorun. Sei porendi, amok ham goribartei Itchiore hoiek jon thoie. Sei porendi, gom goribar baro hoiek jonottei the thoie. Manjiore sahajjio goribartei hoiek jon the thoie. Hoiek jon murubbi obartei ar nanan hodadi hoda hobartei the hoiek jon thoie.
46012029	Begkun apostol ni, begkun muni ni, begkun mastor ni ar begkun amok ham gori paron ni?
46012030	Begkunor gom goribar hemoda age ni? Begkune nanan hodadi hoda hoi paron ni? Begkune nanan hoda ortho bhangi di paron ni?
46012031	Hintu begottun gom boran shokto gori dhap goro.
46013001	Mui judi manjior hodadi ar sorgo-dudtuo hodadi hoda hong hintu mor hospanagan no thele, bascheie mong bah jurijora dogkie om.
46013002	Mui judio muni dogkie gori hoda hobar bor phele, beg oghur gubonio hoda buji parileio, beg gyenani pheleio, muon muro ullei parong para beg bischiaschani theleio hintu hospanagan no thele, mui hitchu noi.
46013003	Ar judio goribpunore habebartei mor beg sompottigani duong ar mor heyegano puri pheleibartei duong, hintu mor hospana no thele, sieni mor hitchu lab odo noi.
46013004	Hospanagane soijjio ar doye gore. Hospanagane pijhum no gore, bar no gore ar phodanio no gore.
46013005	Hospanagane ulluo no gore, nijor labpan no togai, harai rak no tullie ar manjior bojongani monot no ragai.
46013006	Hospanagane Aw-dharmiganloi hujhi no oi hintu soittiogandoi hujhi oi.
46013007	Hospanagane begkani dagi thai, begkani bischias gore, begkani asha gore ar begkani thori thai.
46013008	Hospanagan huno din thum no oi. Hintu muni hodagani theleio thum obo, nanan hodadi honagan theleio thum obo ar gyenan theleio thum obo.
46013009	Haron ordek gori hobor pei ar ordek gori ami muni dogkie gori hoi.
46013010	Hintu jokke sei puripunnuogan ebo, sokke sei ordek gori sien lugi jebo.
46013011	Mui guro elungge lokke, guro dogkie hoda hodung, guro dogkie gori bujidung, ar guro dogkie sintie gortung. Hintu jokke bujunor olung, guro dogkieni phelei duong.
46013012	Haron ikkie ami anat mora-mora gori degir, ar ordek gori hobor peir. Hintu jokke mujungo mujungi gori degibong, sokke mui puro gori hobor peim, Itchiore more puro gori hobor paidie dogkie gori.
46013013	Ei tinan jinij tigi thai: Bischiaschan, ashagan ar hospanagan. Hintu ienittun bego dangoran olode hospanagan.
46014001	Hospanagan togo, aptar boran baari dhap gorsio, bes gorinei muni dogkie gori hoda hobar sawh.
46014002	Haron je nanan hodadi hoda hoi, the manjiore no hoi hintu the Itchiorore hoi. Haron huno jone tar hodagani no bujon tar aptabuodi oghur gubono hoda hoi hinottei.
46014003	Hintu je gorei tulibartei, uschoni tulidibartei ar shantona dibartei hoi the muni dogkie gori manjiore hoi.
46014004	Je nanan hodadi hoda hoi the nijore-nije gorei tule, hintu je muni dogkie gori hoda hoi the mondoli gorei tule.
46014005	Mor mone hoidie tumi begkune nanan hodadi hoda hobartei. Hintu sittun bes mor mone hoidie tumi muni dogkie gori hoda hobartei. Haron nanan hodadi hoda hoiebuoi judi mondoli gorei tulibartei ortho bhangi no de, sale muni dogkie gori hoda hoiebuoi tartun dangor.
46014006	Bheilog, hintu ikkie judi tomar idu einei nanan hodadi hoda honggi, ar Itchiore phogodang gori die hoda darai, gyeno hoda darai, muni dogkie gori hoda hona darai ok sigkie hoda darai ok mui tomare no hole mui tomartei hi lab om?
46014007	Poran neie jinij, bashi ok bina ok thik gori no bajilie, ek jone bashi bazar nahi bela bazar hingori hobor pa jebo?
46014008	Thik sedogkie gori, begolo ro judi porak-porak no ole, honna judduo goribartei jugol obo?
46014009	Thik sedogkie gori, manjie sohoje bujon para hoda tomar ho poribo. A no ole, tumi hi hor hingori thara hobor pebak? Haron boierot tomar hoda hoi para obo.
46014010	Songsarot nanan doronor ro thei pare ar prottiek ror ortho age.
46014011	Ek jone judi morloi hoda hoi ar mui tar hodagan no bujilie, mui tartei bi-deji dogkie om ar the mortei bi-deji dogkie obo.
46014012	Ieno siendoi ekkui, ar tumi aptar borani dhap goro hinottei, mondoli gorei tulede aptar boranit alajhala obartei togo.
46014013	Senottei, ek jone judi nanan hodadi hoda hoi, ortho bhangi dibartei the bor magok.
46014014	Haron mui judi nanan hodadi bor magong, mor aptabuoi bor mage hintu mor bujonaganot phol no thai.
46014015	Senottei mui hi gorim? Aptadi ar mor bujonagandoio mui bor magim. Aptadi ar mor bujonagandoio mui gid geim.
46014016	Anole, tumi jokke aptaloi hujhi hoda hoba, barendi manus siot thele tumi Itchiorore hujhi hoda hole the tomar hodagan no buje hinottei, “Amen” hingori hobo?
46014017	Haron tumi daw gome hujhi hoda hor, hintu oinnio jon gorei no uttuon.
46014018	Mui mor Itchiorbuore hujhi hoda hong, haron tomar begkunottun bes mui nanan hodadi hoda hong.
46014019	Huno jone no buschie hoda mui nanan hodadi dos azar hoda hona darane manjiore sigeibartei mondolit paschan hoda mor monedi holeio gom obo.
46014020	Bheilog, guro dogkie no bhappo, bojong bhabonat guro dogkie oio, hintu gyenedi bujunor dogkie oio.
46014021	Niomanot legkie, “Ei manuschunore mui oinnio hodadi ar oinnio manjiore uttaniloi holeio, thara mor hoda no sunibak,” Probuie hor.
46014022	Senottei, nanan hodadi hoda honagan bischiasigunottei noi, aw-bischiasigunottei sien olode ekkan sinno. Hintu muni dogkie gori hoda honagan aw-bischiasi-gunottei noi, bischiasi-gunottei.
46014023	Judi goda mondolibuo ekkan jagat thubeile ar begkune nanan hodadi hoda hole, ar siot hobor no peie ok bah Aw-bischiasi ok ele, thara pagol hobakke noi ni?
46014024	Hintu ek jon Aw-bischiasi ok bah hobor no peie ok judi begkune muni dogkie gori hoda hode ele, tare begkune duj degei dibag ar porikkie goribak.
46014025	Sedogkie gori tar gubonio ontoran hulo jebo. Sebeden the nije bukpari porinei Itchior tobona gorinei hobakke je Itchiorbuo hamakkai tomar loge age.
46014026	Bheilog, senottei hi gora poribo? Jokke odosat tumi eksomare thubeile, prottiek jonor ekkuo baini gid thok ar sigkie ok, nanan hodadi hoda hona ok, Itchiore phogodang gorsie hoda ok, oinnio hoda ortho bhangi denagan thana dorkar. Gorei tulibartei begkani gorana osit.
46014027	Judi huno jone nanan hodadi hoda hon, di tin jone ok, tin jonottun bes no hodok. Gada bolla gori hodok ar ek jone ortho bhangi duok.
46014028	Hintu judi huno jon ortho bhangi die no thele, mondolit olor gori thana osit. The sube-sabe nijore ar Itchiorore hok.
46014029	Di tin jone muni dogkie gori hoda hode, oinniogune olor gori shagi sadok.
46014030	Itchiore judi huno ekkan phogodang hoda hai-hure bojsie manuschuore janei de, polim manuschuoi sub ona osit.
46014031	Haron ek jon ek jon gori tumi begkune muni dogkie gori hoda hoi paro hinottei begkune shigon para ar begkunore tumi uschoni tuli diparo para gorsio.
46014032	Munigune tharar aptaguno ugure domon gori paron.
46014033	Haron Itchiorbuo jagulugkie Itchior noi, hintu the olode shanti Itchior, ar sadhu manuschunor beg mondoli-gunot agede dogkie Itchior.
46014034	Mondoligunot miliegune sub gori thana osit ar tharar hobar ugum nei. Haron Niomane hoidie doge thara odino tole theinei sub gori thana.
46014035	Thara judi huno hitchu shigibar san ghorot tharar nijor negkuottun pujor gortok. Haron mondolit miliei hoda hona lajor hoda oi.
46014036	Itchioro hodagan tomartun nigillie ni na, nahi bana tomar idu ejchiede?
46014037	Je, the nije muni bah aptar manus mone gore, mui tomare legongotte sieni Probur ugum bili the gome-dalei bujok.
46014038	Hintu je aw-bujunor the aw-bujunor gori thok.
46014039	Bheilog, tumi muni dogkie gori hoda hobar dhap goro. Nanan hodadi hoda hobar badha no duo.
46014040	Begkani gome-dalei ar upojukto gori gorana dorkar.
46015001	Bheilog, mui tomar idu prosar gorinei tumi jien loinei dori agode gom hoboran tomare idot tuli dibar sang.
46015002	Ei gom hoborano darai tumi mukti peio. Judi mui tomar idu prosar gorsiongge hodagan shokto gori dori no thago, tumi bischias gorsiode sien brithai obo.
46015003	Haron mui peiongge sien tomare begkunore mui proman duong. Sien olode Sastroie hoiede doge Kristo amar pabpanittei morsie.
46015004	Ar Sastro doge tare gareion, ar tin dino dijiet tare aro jiei tulo oie.
46015005	Kepha sidu ar baro jon apostolo sidu the dega diegoi.
46015006	Sei porendi, ekkubare pas shot jonottun bes bheilogkuno sidu dega diegoi. Tharar moiddiettun beg bhag ejosong baji agon, ar hoiek jon ghum jeion.
46015007	Sei porendi, Jakobo sidu The dega diegoi. Sebeden beg apostoluno sidu The dega diegoi.
46015008	Bego jere, the mor iduio dega diegi, be-somoie jormeiongge sibie idu.
46015009	More apostol daganaio lak noi. Haron Itchioro mondolire mui dug-hosto lageiong hinottei, beg apostolunottun bes aw-gunorbuo olungge mui.
46015010	Hintu Itchioro doyet darai mui edogkie olung. The more doye gorsiede sien brithai no oi. mui tharar begkunottun bes hadoni gorsiong. Hintu hadoni gorsiebuo mui noi, Itchioro doyegan mor loge hadoni gorsie.
46015011	Senottei, jei odosat, mui ong bah thara odog prosar gorsei ar tumi sien bischias gorsio.
46015012	Morattun Kristore jiei tulona-gan ami prosar gori. Ami prosar gorilie io, tumi hoiek jone morattun jiei no udibag hingori ho?
46015013	Hintu judi morattun jiei uduonagan no thele, salen, Kristoreio jiei tulo no oi.
46015014	Kristore judi jiei tulo no odo, salen amar prosaran labnei, ar tomar bischiaschano lab nei.
46015015	Sei bara, Itchioro sombonde ami shakki dilongge Kristore jiei tulo oie. Hintu judi moragun jiei no uduon, salen Itchiore Kristore jiei no udilun. Sien judi soittio ole, salen manjie hobor pebakke Itchioro sombonde ami mijie shakki dir.
46015016	Haron judi moragun jiei tulo no ole, salen Kristoreio jiei tulo no oi.
46015017	Judi Kristore jiei tulo no oi, tomar bischiaschan moillio nei ar tumi ejosong pabot pori ago.
46015018	Ar Kristo iot jigun morsion thara nas oion.
46015019	Bana ei hale judi Kristo iot amar asha thai, salen ami begottun sitpure para.
46015020	Hintu ikkie Kristore morattun jiei tulinei, ghum jadonde sigunor polim pholluo olo.
46015021	Ek jono darai moranagan ejchie hinottei, morattun jiei uduonagano ek jono darai ejchie.
46015022	Adamor iot beg manuschun morsionde dogkie, Kristo ioto beg manuschunore jeda gora obo.
46015023	Hintu prottiek jone nijor doge udibag. Kristo olode polim pholluo. Sei porendi jokke Kristo ebo, je tar manus, sigune jiei udibag.
46015024	Sebeden thuman ebo, jokke the rejjiogan Bab Itchiorbuore gojei dibo. The beg sason ani, beg odhiharani ar hemodagani thum gori dibo.
46015025	Haron beg sottrugun the tar thengot tole thoi song The sason gori pebo.
46015026	Jero sottrubuo dongso obode sibie olode moranagan.
46015027	Haron “Itchiore begkani Kristor thengo odinot tole thoidie.” (Judio the nijore-nije “begkani Kristo odinot thole thoie” hintu ien poriskar je Itchiore nijore Kristor odinot no thai.)
46015028	Jokke Itchiore begkani Puobuor odinot thoie die, sebeden puobuoio the nije tar sidu gojei dibo. Itchiorbuo olode Puobuore begkani odinot tole thoidiebuo. Itchiore je huno iet The begkanit oi para goribuo.
46015029	Anole, jigune mora manjior azai baptisma gorsion, judi morattun shobai jiei no udile, thara hi goribak? Salen a hittei thara mora manjior azai baptisma gorsion?
46015030	Ar ami hittei sob somoi bipodot portong?
46015031	Amar Probu Jisu Kristo iot tomar sombonde mor jei bar goribar age, siendoi mui soittio gorongge mui din bagene morono dojad porong.
46015032	Ephesi sohorot jharbuo jonturloi mui judduo gorsiong. mui judi manjior ischieloi judduo gortung mor hi lab olun? Mora judi jiei no udile, ien hoi: “Hellie moribong hinottei, baza ludi hei.”
46015033	Thoga no heio. “Bojong somarsiei gom sobhab nas gori duon.”
46015034	Dharmig gori jhagoron aw, pab no gorsio. Haron hoiek jonor Itchioro gyenan nei. Tumi lajo para mui ei hodagan hongor.
46015035	Hintu hoiek jone hobak, “Mora hingori jiei udibag? Hedogkie heyeloi thara ebag?”
46015036	Behup! Tui jien shidos sien mori no gele jeda no oi.
46015037	Ar tui jokke shidos heyegan obartei tui no shidos, bana bijigun shidos. Sigun gom bah oinnio biji oi pare.
46015038	Hintu Itchiore tar ischie mote bijibuot heyegan de. Prottiek biji bagene sidibar nijor heyegan the de.
46015039	Beg heyegani ekkoi noi. Manjior ek doronor heye age, poshugunor ek doronor heye age, major ek doronor heye age ar phegor ek doronor heye age.
46015040	Sorgo heye ar pittimi heye theleio hintu sorgo heyet dolani ar pittimi heyet dolani judo-judo.
46015041	Belor ek doronor shodok age ar junanor ek doronor shodok age. Taragunor ek dogkie shodok age. Ekkuo tharar shodokkanottun aro ekkuo tharar shodokkan judo.
46015042	Morattun jiei uduonagano sedogkie. Garande heyegan poji jei pare, ar jiei udibode heyegan poji no jai.
46015043	Aw-mannio gori heyegan gara oi, ar sien oborug gori jiei tulo oi. Heyegan shokti nei gori gara oi, ar sien hemoda dinei jiei tulo oi.
46015044	Munischioror heyegan gara oi, sei heyegan aptar heyeloi jiei ude. Munischioror heyeio ar aptar heyeio age.
46015045	Sien Sastroie hoidie doge, “Polim manuschuo Adame poran-bola manus olo,” ar sejo Adame jibon die apta olo.
46015046	Hintu polim manuschuo aptar manus noi. The olode munischioror heye-bola manus. Sei porendi aptar Manuschuo ejchie.
46015047	Polim manuschuo pittimittun, madiloi baneie. Jero Manuschuo olode Probuie sorgottun.
46015048	Madittun baneie manuschun madittun ejchiede manuschuo dogkien. Sorgottun ejchionde manuschun Sorgottun ejchiede Manuschuo dogkie.
46015049	Madir manuschuo subhibuo dogkien gori, sorgottun ejchie Manuschuo subhibuor dogkien ami obong
46015050	Bheilog, ikkie mui ien hongor, manjior heye ar loloi Itchioro rejjiogan pedo noi. Thik sedogkie gori, poji jaidie siene poji no jaidie sien pedo noi.
46015051	Suno, mui ekkan tomare oghur gubono hoda hong. Ami begkun mortong noi, hintu Itchiore amare begkunore bodoli dibo.
46015052	Jhimidot sotte, sog thebot sotte, jero begolo robuot ami bodolibong. Haron begol bajilie, morattun poji no jan para jiei tulo obo ar amare bodolei die obo.
46015053	Haronan olode, ei poji jei parede heyegane poji no parede sien lo poribo. Ei mori jei parede heyegane mori jei no parede sien lo poribo.
46015054	Ei poji jei parede heyegane poji jei no parede sien lobo. Ar ei mori jei parede heyegane mori jei no parede sien lobo. Sien ole, Sastrot hoiede sien puron obo, “Jidenagane moranagan gillie”
46015055	“Oh Padalan, tor jidenagan hudu? Oh Moranagan, tor bischan hudu?”
46015056	Moranagano bischan olode pabpan. Pabpano hemodagan olode Nioman.
46015057	Hintu amar Probu Jisu Kristor darai amare jidenagan dede Itchiorbuor donniobad ok.
46015058	Senottei, Oh mor agojor bheilogkun, shokto gori thago, no lorsio, onsur Probur hamot puro-puri lagi thago. Tumi hobor po, Probur iot tomar hadonigan panit no poribo.
46016001	Ikkie sadhu manuschunottei sanda tulona sombonde mui legongor. Galatia rejjiot mondoligunore mui ugum duongge doge tumio goro.
46016002	Saptar polim dinnuot tumi prottiek jone tengaδ bajei thoio. Tumi unnoti oiode doge joma gori thoio jene, mui ele tomar tenga tulo no pore para.
46016003	Tomar monot porsie manus hoiek jon bajilak. mui lungilegi, thara tomar doyer dogkineni nibartei tharare mui sidiloi Jerusalem sohorot padei dim.
46016004	Judi morio jebar dorkar ole muio jeim, thara mor somare jei paribak.
46016005	Makidonia rejjiogan phuri einei mui tomar idu lungimbi. Haron mui Makidonia rejjiogan phuri ejongor.
46016006	Mui jidu jedungsat, tumi mor porbhajottei more hottur baredi parogoi para, mui tomar somare theimbi ar jarhalluo hadeimbi.
46016007	Haron jade somoi mui tomare sebar dhap no gorong. Hintu mui asha gorong Probuie judi more onumoti de, mui tomar somare hoiek din theimbi.
46016008	Hintu Pentikost Utchob song mui Ephesi sohorot theim.
46016009	Haron Itchiore mortei ekkan dangor ar hemoda-bola duor huli die. Hintu more biruddi gorie shagor agon.
46016010	Timothi judi lungegi, the tomar somare no doreie gori thai para seio. Haron mui Probur haman gorongge doge theio gore.
46016011	Senottei, huno jone tare aw-pela no gortok. Hintu the mor idu eje para, tare shantie porbhajot padei duo. Haron mui tare bheilogkun shomot barsei agong.
46016012	Ikkie amar bhei, Apollo sombonde legongor. Bheilogkuno somare the tomar idu ebartei mui tare baari ujuleiong. Hintu sei somoi the jebar tar mone no hoi. Sujuk phele the ebo.
46016013	Uijkare thago, bischiaschanot shokto gori thago. Sahoj goro, doro aw.
46016014	Tumi jieni goro, hos pa-pigandoi gorsio.
46016015	Bheilog, tumi Stephana ghorbuogun hobor po. Thara Akaia rejjiot polim pholun ar sadhu manuschunore lobiot goribartei thara nijore-nije duon.
46016016	Thara dogkie manjior sidu ar je amar somare ham ar hadoni goron siguno sidu niroit obartei mui tomare hujoli gorongor.
46016017	Stephana, Fottuna ar Akaikusot lunginei mui hujhi oiong. Haron tumi jieni gori no paro, sieni thara duondi.
46016018	Haron thara mor aptabuore ar tomar aptaguno taza gori duondi. Esannie manuschunore monot rageio.
46016019	Asia dejor mondoligune tomare salam janadon. Akuilaloi Priskilla ar tharar ghoro mondolibuo somot Probur nange tomare sit digol salam janadon.
46016020	Beg bheilogkune tomare salam janadon. Pobitro sumon dinei salam jana jani gorsio.
46016021	Mui Paula, mor nijor adtoi leginei salam janangor.
46016022	Je Probu Jisure hos no pai, tar ugure obisab porok. Oh Probu ai .
46016023	Probu Jisur doyegan tomar ugure thok.
46016024	Mor hospanagan Jisu Kristo iot tomar begkuno ugure thok. Amen.
47001001	Mui Paula, Itchioro ischie darai mui ek jon Jisu Kristor apostol. Amar bhei Timothi mor loge age. Korinth sohorot Itchioro mondoli manuschunore ar goda Akaia rejjiot agonde beg sadhu manuschunoreio mui legongor.
47001002	Amar Bab Itchiore ar Probu Jisu Kristoi tomare doye ar shanti duok.
47001003	Amar Probu Jisu Kristor Bab ar je huno iet shantona dede ar doye gorede Itchiorbuor donniobad ok.
47001004	Je huno dug-hostot porsiegunore Bab Itchiorottun ami peieidie shantonandoi, shantona di pari para The amar je huno dug-hostot shantona de.
47001005	Haron Kristor hostogani amar iot bes gori agede dogkie, amar shantonanio Kristo iot bes gori age.
47001006	Ami judi sab hei, ien tomar shantonattei ar uddharottei. Iene ami hosto peidie sei hostogani tumi suei thebartei boldibo. Ar ami judi shantona pei, ien tomar shantonattei ar uddharottei.
47001007	Tomartei amar ashagan shokto. Haron ami hobor pei tumi jeannie gori dug-hosto bhag por siennie gori shantonagano bhag peba.
47001008	Haron Asia dejot amar hosto oiede sien, bheilog tumi hobor no peie gori ago bili ami mone no gori. Amar ugure bugie no jinnie bhar oie hinottei, bajibero asha areiei.
47001009	Hamakkai moribong bili ami mone gorsei. Ien olode jene ami amar ugure nirbhor no gorinei hintu, mora jiei tulede Itchiorbuore nirbhor gori.
47001010	The amare sedogkie moronor dojadtun rokkie gorsie ar rokkie goribuo. The amare porendio rokkie goribuo bili ami tare asha gorsei.
47001011	Tumio amattei bor magi dinei amare bol duo. Sebeden bhaluk jonor bor magana ami borani peiei hinottei, amar bhaluk jone Itchiorore hujhi hoda hobak.
47001012	Ami edogkie gori bar gori: Songsarot ami hedogkie gori agi amar idie-ittane shakki de. Tomar samne ami hedogkie gori agi sienottun bes iene shakki de. Ekkan uddischuoloi ar sholona no dhorsie gori uijkare ami agidie sien olode Itchiorottun. Ami manjior gyeno doge no thei, hintu ami Itchioro doyegano doge thei.
47001013	Tumi jien mador ar bujor, sieni bara ami tomare oinnio hoda no legir. Mui mone gorong tumi thumsong bujiba.
47001014	Sien olode tumi amare ordek gori bujilade dogkie. Tumi amare baini gorode dogkie gori Probu Jisur dinnuot amio sedogkie gori tomare baini goribong.
47001015	Ar ien bischias gorinei, agendi mui tomar idu ebar seiong, jene tumi di lombor labpan po para.
47001016	Mui Makidonia dejottun jade tomar idu phiribar, sebeden tumi more Judea dejot dipadeba gori mui asha gorsiong.
47001017	Senottei, mui ien jugolode, mone hong no hong gori gorsiong ni na? Nahi, mui jugol gorongge sieni, oi, oi ar noi, noi obartei heyet doge gorong?
47001018	Itchiorbuo hamakkai bischias-joggio hinottei, ami tomare hoidie hodani oi ar noi no oi.
47001019	Itchioro Puo Jisu Kristor sombonde mui, Sila ar Timothi tomar idu prosar gorsei die sienot oi ar noi no oi. Hintu tar siot onsur oi.
47001020	Haron Itchioro beg soittiogani tar siot oi ar sieni tar siot Amen hinottei amar darai manjie Itchiorore baini goron.
47001021	Kristo iot ami shokto gori thebartei Itchiore tomare ar amare shokto gori di die. Itchiore amare tel guli di die.
47001022	The amar ugure sinnuo di thoie. Amar ontorot The Apta babona di thoie.
47001023	Tomar hosto no oi para mui Korinth sohorot no phirong. Itchiorbuo mor aptabuo ugure shakki age jei mui hongorte sieni soittio.
47001024	Ami tomar bischiaschano ugure sason goribar no sei. Hintu ami tomarloi ham gorittie tomar hujhittei. haron bischiaso darai tumi shokto gori ago.
47002001	Mono dugot mui tomar idu no eim ar gori mone-mone thik gorsiong.
47002002	Haron mui judi tomare monot dug lagei dile, honna more hujhi goribuo? mui tomare monot dug lagei dile, tumi more hujhi ong para goriba ni?
47002003	Mui lungiliegi more hujhi goribakke sigunore mui monot dug lagei di paronggi. Siennie no obartei tomare mui edogkie gori legilung. Mui bischias gorong mor hujhigan tomar begkuno hujhigandoi ekkui.
47002004	Haron baari hostoi, monot duge ar sogo pani phelei phelei mui tomare legkuong. Tomare monot dug lagei dibartei noi, hintu mui tomare baari hos pangge sien tumi hobor po para.
47002005	Hintu ek jone judi dug lagei di thai, more monot dug lagei no de, hintu the tomar begkunore ekka-ekka monot dug lagei die. Bes no hoinei oddek gori holungge.
47002006	Begbhage tare sasti duonde sien tartei jogarsie oie.
47002007	Hintu, tumi tare hema gorana ar bujona osit, anole, the baari mono dugot thebo.
47002008	Senottei, mui tomare hujoli gorongor, tumi tare hos pode sien proman gori dego.
47002009	Sienottei, tumi beg hodani manila ni no manila mui tomare porikkie sebartei legilung.
47002010	Tumi jare hema gorsio, muio tare hema gorsiong. Haron mui judi je huno iet hema gorong, sien tomartei mui tare Kristor samne hema gorsiong,
47002011	jene Soitannuoi sujuk no pai para. Soitannuor hu-buddhiani ami hobor pei daw.
47002012	Kristor gom hoboran prosar goribartei mui Troas sohorot jeiong. mui jeinei Probuie mortei ekkan pod huli die.
47002013	Sidu mor bhei Titare suph no peinei, mor monanot shanti no elo. Sebeden mui tharattun bidei loinei Makidonia dejot jeiong.
47002014	Kristor darai amare onsur jakjomog gori nejaidie ar amar darai jagai jagai tar tumbas gyenan shidie jadte Itchiorbuor donniobad ok.
47002015	Haron mukti padonde sigunor moiddie ar nas odonde sigunor moiddie Itchiorbuottei ami olongge Kristor tumbaschan.
47002016	Ekdagittei ami olongge moronor baschan aro ekdagittei ami olongge jibonor tumbaschan. Ar ei hamanittei honna upojukto obo?
47002017	Haron onek jone labottei Itchioro hodagan bejonde dogkie ami noi. Hintu Itchiorottun dipadeie manjio dogkie gori Kristo iot Itchioro samne soittio gori hoi.
47003001	Ami aro amare baini gora arambo goribong ni na? Hoi ek jonor tomare baini gorsie sidi lage ar hoi ek jonor baini gorsie sidi tomartun tharar lage. Amareo sedogkie sidi lagibo parapang?
47003002	Tumi olade amar ontorot legkie sidi. Begkune sien madan ar hobor pan.
47003003	Amar hamo phole tumi olade Kristor sidi, haliloi legkie noi, hintu Jeda Itchioro Aptaloi legkie. Silo-padot legkie noi, hintu manjior ontoro padot legkie.
47003004	Kristo darai ami sien Itchiorore bischias gori.
47003005	Ami joggio bili dabi goribar amar hitchu joggiota nei. Hintu amar joggiotagan olode Itchiorottun.
47003006	The amare nuo niomanor upojukto sagorsie baneie. Ami okkioror ham no gori, hintu aptar ham gori. Haron okkiorbuoi morei pelai, hintu Aptabuoi jibon de.
47003007	Moranagan anede haman silo-padot legkiegan oborug elo hinottei, Israelo manuschune Mosir muonot oborugkanottei rini sei no paron, judio sei oborugkan boij jeiegoi.
47003008	Aptar haman sittun bes oborug no obo ni na?
47003009	Haron manjiore duji banaidie hamanot judi oborugkan thaidie oi, manjiore dharmig banaidie hamanot onek bes oborugkan thebo.
47003010	Haron jei oborugkan elo, dangor oborugkanottei sei oborugkan nei ar.
47003011	Elode oborugkan boij jeiegoi hinottei, tigi roiede oborugkan bes oborug.
47003012	Amar edogkie asha age hinottei, ami birat sahoj gori hoi.
47003013	Ien Mosi gorsiede dogkie noi. Israelo manuschune boij jargoidie sien thumsong ek rini sei no than para the tar muon andoldi thoie.
47003014	Hintu tharar akkolani Itchiore han goridie. Kristor darai pordagan hojei thuo oie hinottei, edchie song puron Nioman thara madei sei pordagan a hojeie roie.
47003015	Hintu edchie song thara Mosir boiun madade pordagane tharar akkolani dagi thoie.
47003016	Tobuio je Probu idu phirie, Probuie pordagan hojei thoie de.
47003017	Probu olode Apta. Jiot Probur Aptabuo age, siot shadin age.
47003018	Probuie amar muonittun dakkiegan hojei die hinottei, ami begkune Probur oborugkan anat degidie dogkie gori degi. Amio sedogkie subhi ek oborugottun aro ek oborug song oi para the amare puribotton gore. Sei oborugkan Probur Aptabuottun eje.
47004001	Ami Itchioro meyegan peieidie dogkie gori, ei sebona hamanio peiei. Senottei ami pitbagoli no hei.
47004002	Hintu laj gorede gubono hamani ami bad diei. Ami manjiore no thogei, ar Itchioro hodagan ami no barei. Hintu soittio hodagan uju-uju ami hoinei Itchioro samne prottiek manjior idie-ittan ami huli di.
47004003	Hintu judio amar gom hoboran daga geleio, ien nas odonde sigunottei daga jai.
47004004	Itchioro subhibuo, Kristor oborug gom hoborano phoran tharar ugure no pore para, bischias no goronde sigunor akkolani ei jugor Itchiorbuoi han gori di die.
47004005	Ami amar sombonde prosar no gori, hintu Kristo Jisu, Probu bili ami prosar gori. Jisuttei ami tomar sagorsie bilio ami prosar gori.
47004006	Haron Itchiorbuoi phoran andharottun phudibartei ugum die. Sei Itchiorbuoi amar ontoranit phor phudei diegi, jene Jisu Kristor mujungot Itchioro oborug gyeno phor de.
47004007	Sei dangor hemodagan Itchior-buottun, ar amattun noi bili degebartei sei dhonan madtie humot amar age.
47004008	Onek hittettun manjie amare sabon, hintu ami sab no pori. Amare thara jagulug goron, hintu ami asha no arei.
47004009	Thara amare hosto duon, hintu Itchiore amare phelei no jai. Ar thara amare phelei duon, hintu ami nosto no oi.
47004010	Amar heyet Jisur jibonan dega jai para, ami onsur Probu Jisu moranagan amar heyet gori loiberei.
47004011	Haron amar mori jaidie heyeganot Jisur jibonanio dega jai para, ami jeda agidie igun onsur Jisuttei moribar duon.
47004012	Senottei, moranagane amar iot ham gore, hintu jibonane tomar iot ham gore.
47004013	Ar amattun ekkui bischiaso apta age hinottei, Sastrot lega agede doge: “Mui bischias gorsiong hinottei mui hoiong.” Amio bischias gori hinottei hoi.
47004014	Ami hobor pei Itchiore Probu Jisure jiei tullie, ar the amareo Jisur darai jiei tulibo. The amare tomarloi egottor gori dibogi.
47004015	Haron sieni olode begkani tomar labottei, jene alajhala doyegan ar onek manjior sidu oinei manjie Itchiorore hujhi hoda hon para, hujhi hoda ho bajei dibo.
47004016	Senottei, ami pitbagoli no hei. Judio amar barendi Manuschuo hoi jai, amar bidirie Manuschuo din-din taza oi.
47004017	Haron amar hostogan olode padol ar hanekkon gori tigi thai hinottei, aw-phurondi oborugkan beg hostoganittun bes obo.
47004018	Senottei, degkie jinijchani ami hando no gorinei, no degkie jinijchani bes hando gori. Haron degidie jinijchani olode hanekk-onottei, ar no degede jinijchani olode umore-umorottei.
47005001	Haron ami hobor pei judi amar pittimir ghoran, ei terpalan dongso oi, Itchiorottun ami ekkan ghor pebong, sien sorgot umore-umorbuo age jien adtoi tullie ghor noi.
47005002	Haron sorgot thebarlottei habor uribar dharoj gori-gori bor-nijes pheleir.
47005003	Jokke ami uribong, ami uttie langda no thebong ar.
47005004	Haron ami ei terpalo ghoranot thagke, gor bugibuottei bor-nijes pheleir, haron ami uttie langda thebar no sei hintu sorgot thebarlottei habor uribar sei, jene jien more sien jibonane gilie.
47005005	Itchiore sei uddischuoi amare jugol gorsie. The amare Aptabuoio joma ijebe die.
47005006	Senottei, ami hobor peinei onsur sahoj no areie gori, heyegandoi ami ghorot thele, heyegandoi ami Probuttun durot.
47005007	Haron ami bischiaso darai soli, seinei no soli.
47005008	Ami sahoj gorir heyeganottun durot theinei Probur iot thanagan odik gom.
47005009	Senottei, ami asha gorir ghorot thei bah no thei ami tare hujhi gorir.
47005010	Haron, ami begkune Kristor bijiero jaganot hamakkai azil uo poribo. Sebeden prottiek jone tar heyegandoi gom ham ok bah bojong ham ok gorsie doge dam pai para.
47005011	Senottei, Probure dhora-nagan hobor peinei, ami oinnio jonoreio ujulei. Hintu Itchiore amare gome-dalei hobor pai, ar mui asha gorong tomar idie-ittanieo amare gome-dalei hobor pai.
47005012	Haron ami nijore-nije tomar idu aro bar no gorir, hintu amar iot tomar bar goribartei ami tomare sujuk dir. Hoi ek jone jien degon sienot bar goron ar thara ontorottun bar no goron. Tharare uttor dibartei ami tomare amaiot bar goribar sujuk dir.
47005013	Haron amar judi mada horab oi, sien Itchiorottei. Ar ami judi mon shanto oi, sien tomartei.
47005014	Begkunottei ek jon morsie hinottei begkune morsion. Sien ami begkune bujchei hinottei Kristor hospanagane amare giri ragai.
47005015	Jigune baji agon, sigune tharar nijottei baji no theinei, hintu tharattei morinei aro jiei uttiede sibiertei baji thebartei, the begkunottei morsie.
47005016	Senottei, ikkiettun duri ami harore manjio doge hobor no pei. Judio Kristore manjio doge ami hobor pei thei, ikkie ami sedogkie gori tare ami hobor no pei ar.
47005017	Senottei, je Kristo iot thai, the nuo gori sristi olo. Sawh, purona jinijchani nei ar, begkani nuo oie.
47005018	Begkani Itchiorottun. The nije amarloi Jisu Kristo darai tarloi milon oiegi ar milon gori dena haman the amare die.
47005019	Sien olode: Itchiore manuschunore duj no dinei, Kristor darai songsaran tarloi milon gorer. Ar milon gorede hodagan the amare gojei die.
47005020	Senottei, ami olongge Kristor raj-dud. Ien olode Itchiore amar darai tomare ujuluotte dogkie. Kristor pokko oinei ami tomare ujuleir: Itchiorloi milon ogi.
47005021	Haron jar pab no elo Itchiore tare amattei pab bugei die, jene tar darai ami Itchioro dharmigkan pei para.
47006001	Ami tar somare ham gorie hinottei tomareo hujoli gorir: Mangana-magana Itchioro meyegan tumi no loio.
47006002	Haron Itchiore hoi, “Somoi oktot mui tomar hoda suinniong. Ar mukti peiode dinnuot mui tomare bol duong.” Suno, ikkie olode gom somoi, ar ikkie olode mukti paidie din.
47006003	Huno jone ujuot haide ham ami no gori. Ami judi gortong, manjie amar haman sorjeilakkun.
47006004	Ami Itchioro sagorsie bili je huno iet upojukto bili degei. Hub soijjio ar hosto bhug gorsei. Amar onek Aw-bhab ar sab-sristi elo.
47006005	Amare pidtuon, jiel duon, andolon soijjio gori peiei ar dug gori peiei, ami onek ghum mari peiei ar ubos thei peiei.
47006006	Ami sudduo elong, amar gyen elo, ami dorjio dhorsie, ami nombro elong, amar Pobitro Apta elo, amar hospanagan phagara nei gori elo,
47006007	ami soittio hoda hoi ar Itchioro hemodagan amar age. Amar dene-bange dharmigo aittieran age.
47006008	Hoi ek jone amare sorman goron ar hoi ek jone amare be-sorman goron. Hoi ek jone amar biruddie bojong hoda hoi duondoi ar hoi ek jone amar sombonde gom hoda hoi duondoi. Hoi ek jone ami hu-podedi nejei holeio amar ien soittio hon.
47006009	Hoi ek jone amare gome-dalei hobor peineio, hobor no pande dogkie gori amare bebohar goron. Mori jeir hintu sawh ejo baji agi. Sasti duon hintu morei no pelan.
47006010	Amar monot dug theleio ami onsur hujhi. Ami gorib oleio onek jonore thagoie gorier. Amar hitchu nei hintu amar beg age. Sei begkanit ami Itchioro sagorsie bili degeir.
47006011	Oh Korinth manuschun, ami tomare pang gori bhangi hoiei. Amar ontorani tomartei ojar gori huli diei.
47006012	Amar ontorani tomartei bondo no gori. Hintu amattei tomar nijor ontorani bondo gorsio.
47006013	Gurore hoi para mui tomare hongor: Amatteio tumi amar dogkie gori tomar ontorani ojar gori huli duo.
47006014	Aw-bischiasigundoi song no oie gori jungol hanat no loio. Haron dharmigkane niom saragundoi hingori song pori pare? Phorane andharandoi hingori egottor oi pare?
47006015	Kristo Belialoiδ hingori milibo? Bischiasiloi Aw-bischiasi hi milibar age?
47006016	Itchioro mondirloi mokti hi milibo? Haron tumi olade Jeda Itchioro mondir. Itchiore hoiede doge: “Mui tharar loge bojotti gorim ar mui tharar loge bereim. mui tharar Itchior om ar thara mor manus obak.”
47006017	Probuie hoi, “Senottei, tharar moiddiettun nigili ejo, Pharok awh. Aw-shijhi jinijchani no dhorsio, sale mui tomare gojhi lom.”
47006018	“Sebeden mui tomar Bab om ar tumi mor puo-jhi oba. Sorbo-shoktiman PROBUIE ien hor.”
47007001	Oh mor agojorun, ei soittiogani age hinottei heyegan ar aptabuo goda hajor gorede sienittun ami nijore-nije hajei. Itchioro iot dhoran amar age hinottei amar pobitrogan puripunnuo gori.
47007002	Tomar ontoranit amare jaga duo. Ami harore oinniei no gori, harore hoti no gori ar harore no thogei.
47007003	Tomare dujot pheleibartei sien mui no hongor. Haron mui tomare ei akke hoiong, tumi amar somare bajibartei ar amar somare moribartei amar ontoranit ago.
47007004	Tomar ugure mor baari bischias age ar mui tomare baari baini gorongor. Shantona pelung ar beg dug-hostogani moiddie mui baari hujhi olung.
47007005	Haron jodepode, ami jokkene Makidonia dejot lungiei, amar heyegani jiren no pei. Manjie amare nanan hittettun sabpuon. Barendi elode judduo ar bidirendi elode dor.
47007006	Tole porsie manusch-unore shantona dede Itchiorbuoi Tita lunginei amare shantona die.
47007007	Bana Tita einei ami shantona peieidie sien noi, tumi Titare shantona duo hinotteio Itchiore amare shantona die. Tita more hoiede, tumi morloi lak pa-pi obartei, hani-hani dhap gori-gori ago, tumi more shanggadik hos po. Senottei mui baari hujhi olung.
47007008	Judio mui tomare mor sidigandoi monot dug lagei duong, mui sien no postang. mui sien posteleio, mui mone gorongge mor sidigane dug lagei die, hintu bana hanekkonottei.
47007009	Tomar monot dug oiebili noi, hintu tomar monot dugkane tomar monani phirei die hinottei ikkie mui hujhi. Itchioro ischie doge tomar monot dug oie hinottei amar torobottun tomar hitchu hoti no oi.
47007010	Haron Itchiorottun ejede monot dugkane mukti paidie mokkie mon phirei de. Sebeden manjie sienottei no postan. Hintu songsarottun ejede monot dugkane moronan dage.
47007011	Sawh, tomareo sedogkie olo. Itchiorottun ejede monot dugkandoi tomar monot dug olo. Siendoi tomar gom ham goribar dhap olo. Nijore rokkie gorana mon olo ar siendoi tomar huttieri udilo. Dhoran, dhappan, dharojchan tomar olo. Hena ugureibar tomar mone hoi. Sei begkanit tumi sudduo bili proman degela.
47007012	Senottei, mui tomare judio legong, je bojong ham gorsie sibiettei mui no legong. Je bojongan gujhi loie sibietteio mui no legong. Hintu ami jei tomare Itchiore saidie doge sei, sien dega jebartei mui legkuong.
47007013	Haron tomar shantonanot ami shantona pei. Ar sittun bes, Titar monan tumi begkune taza gori duo hinottei the hujhi oie ar amio baari hujhi oiei.
47007014	Haron huno iet judi tomar sombonde mui tare baini gorong mui no lajeim. Hintu soittio gori ami begkani tomare hoiei, senottei ami Titare baini gorittie sieno proman olo.
47007015	Tumi tare dore girgirei-girgirei hingori gojhi loio ar tomar begkunor manniotagan the idiot tullie tomartei tar baari meye lage.
47007016	Je huno iet mui tomare nirbhor gori parong hinottei mui hujhi.
47008001	Bheilog, Makidonia dejor mon-doligune Itchioro meyegan peionde sien ami tomare janei dir.
47008002	Tharare hostoi porikkie gorsie, tobuio thara baari hujhi oion. Judio thara baari gorib oleio, thara thagoie dogkie gori dan duon.
47008003	Haron thara jedog paron sedog duonde mui shakki elung. Tharar nijor ischiei di parsionde sittun bes thara duon.
47008004	Sadhu manuschunore seba gorana ham bhag pebartei ar ami thara doye gorinei duonde sieni gojhiloi para thara amare shokto gori hujoli gorsion.
47008005	Ar bana ami asha gorsei die doge noi, hintu thara akke nijore-nije Probure duon, sebeden Itchioro ischie doge thara amare duon.
47008006	Senottei, Titare ami hujoli gorsei, the jokke sahajjio goribartei tulona arambo gorsie, tomartun sanda tulonaganio puro gori tulog.
47008007	Tomar begkanit bes agede dogkie gori bischiasot, hodat, gyenot, ni-alsit, ar amattei tomar hospanaganot. Sedogkie gori ei doye gori dena ganoteio bes ole gom obo.
47008008	Mui tomare ugum no duongor. Hintu tomar hospanagan soittio oni noi manjior ni-alsigandoi porikkie sangor.
47008009	Haron Probu Jisu Kristor meyegan tumi hobor po. Judio the thagoie oi theleio, tomartei the gorib oie, jene tar goribpandoi tumi thagoie aw para.
47008010	Mui tomare mor upodeschan duongor. Haron ien ekkan tomartei labor jinij. Gelle bojor begottun akke tomar dibar mone hoie ar tumi begottun akke duo.
47008011	Senottei, gorotte sien puro goro. Tomar dibar dab elo hinottei, tomar jien age sienittun puro goro.
47008012	Haron dibar mon ischie thele, jien age sei doge Itchiore grohon gore, tomar neidie doge noi.
47008013	Haron oinnio jonor bugi padol oinei tomare bugi gour gori dibar ami no sei.
47008014	Hintu ami sei die begkunor soman-soman odo. Ikkie tomar alajhalaniloi tharar neidie sien puron odo ar tharar alajhalaniloi tomar neidie sieno puron odo. Sebeden begkunor soman-soman obo.
47008015	Sien olode Sastroie hoidie doge: “Je bes thuboi tar sie bes nei. Je hom thuboi tar hitchu pora nei.”
47008016	Tomartei mor ontorot Titaloi ekkui dharoj Itchiore die hinottei Itchiorore mui hujhi hoda hongor.
47008017	Haron ami tare hujoli gorinei, the mannie. Tare sittun bes dharoj elo ar the tar nijor ischiei tomar idu ejchie.
47008018	Tar loge bheibuore ami padei dir. Gom hoborano hamanottei sei bheibuore beg mondoligune baini goron.
47008019	Tumi duode jinijchaniloi the amar loge jebartei mondoligune tare basoni gorsion. Probur nijor mohimattei ar sahajjio goribar tomar dharoj age bili degebartei ami sei jinijchani bhag gori dieioi.
47008020	Sei bor dano jinijchani ami jei doge dieioi sienit manjie amare bodnam gori paron. Ami shabodane soli.
47008021	Bana Probur mujunge noi manjior samneio jien osit sien ami gortong sei.
47008022	Amar bheibuo tharar loge padei diei. Ami tare onek hittendi porikkie sanar porendi, tar dharojchan age. The tomare shanggadik bischias gore hinottei, ikkie tar baari dharoj age.
47008023	Titar sombonde mui legongor. The olode mor phagot sommie ar mor somare tomar idu ham gorie. Bheiunor sombonde mui legongor: Thara olakke mondoli azai dipadeie ar Kristor mohimagan.
47008024	Senottei mondoligunor mujunge, tharare ar tomar hospanagano promanan degeim. Ami tomare baini goridie haronan tharare dego.
47009001	Sadhu manuschunor hamani sombonde mui tomare legibar dorkar nei.
47009002	Haron sahajjio goribar tomar dab agede mui hobor pang. Ar Makidonia manuschuno sidu mui ien bar gorinei hong: Gelle bojorottun duri Akaia dejor man-uschune dibartei jugol oi agon. Tomar dhappane tharar onek jonore dibartei utsaho tuli di die.
47009003	Tobuio bheilogkunore mui tomar idu dipadeong, jene ami tomare baini goridie sien magana no oi. Ar mui hoiongge doge tumi jugol aw para.
47009004	Makidonia dejor manus judi mor loge ejon ar tumi judi jugol no aw, ami lajot poribong. Ami tomare shokto baini gori hinottei tumio lajot poriba.
47009005	Senottei mui sintie gorsiong, thara akke duri tomar idu ebartei bheilogkunore hujoli gorana dorkar. Tumi dibartei haam heiode sieni thubei thoi paron para. Sebeden sieni mone hoinei die jinij obo, mone hong-nohong gori die jinij odo noi.
47009006	Mui ien hong: Je hom shidie the hom deibo ar je bes gori shidie the bes gori diebo.
47009007	Je jedog dibartei mone hoi the sedog duok. Ek jonor lager bili the mone hong-nohong gori no duok. Haron Itchiore mon hujhi gori diegunore hos pai.
47009008	Itchiore tomare nanan asirbad shagor gori je huno iet di pare. Jene beg alajhala gori onsur theienei, prottiek gom hamot tumi gori paro para.
47009009	Sastroie hoiede doge: “The settera gorsie. The goribpunore die. Tar dharmigkan umore-umor thai.”
47009010	Jei biji-shidiebuore biji ar hebar pidie de, shidibartei the tomareo biji bes gori dibo ar dharmigo hedtan barei dibo.
47009011	Tumi bes gori di paro para, the tomare je huno iet bes gori dibo. Sienittei ami Itchiorore hujhi hoda hobong.
47009012	Tumi gorilade haman bana sadhu manuschunor Aw-bhabpan puron no oinei, hintu Itchiorbuoreio onek donniobad obo.
47009013	Kristor gom hoboran haam haanaganor manniode sien ar tumi thararloi ar je huno jondoi ega mone tumi bhag duode sien hamano darai tumi nije proman degela hinottei, manjie Itchiorore baini goribak.
47009014	Tomar iot shagor Itchioror meye age hinottei, thara tomare idot tuli-tuli tomartei bor magi duon.
47009015	Senottei, hoi borei no ejchie boranottei Itchiorore hujhi hoda ho.
47010001	Tomar samne niroit ar tomar tomar abitjone tomar pokke sahojibuo, mui Paula, ikkie mui nije Kristor niroitandoi ar nombrotagandoi tomare hujoli gorongor.
47010002	Jokke mui tomar loge thang, bischias somot sahoji obartei mui asha gorong. Hoi ek jono biruddie udibartei mui dharona loiong. Thara mone goron ami songsaro niomo doge solir. Mui tomare hujoli gorongor mor sedogkie sahoji aw no poribo.
47010003	Haron ami judio songsarot agi, songsaro doge ami judduo no gori.
47010004	Ami judduo goridie aittierani manjior aittier noi hinottei, shokto rokkie gorede debal pursondo bhangi di paribar siennie hemoda Itchioro darai sienit age.
47010005	Torgo, bi-torgo ami bhangi di pari. Itchioro gyeno sombonde biruddi gorinei honde abittieni ami bhangi di pari. Kristore manon para, prottiek bhabonagani ami doriloi.
47010006	Tumi jokke puro gori maniba, sebeden no manonde sigunore sasti dibartei ami jugol agi.
47010007	Tumi bana ugure-ugure sawh. The Kristor manus bili ek jonor judi bischias thai, amareo the sedogkie bhabok. The jedogkie gori Kristor manus, amio sedogkie gori Kristor manus bili nije abar bhabok.
47010008	Haron ami tomare gorei tulibartei Probuie amare odhihar die. Tomare bhangi pheleibartei the amare odhihar no de. Judio sei odhiharano sombonde mui ekka bar gorong, lajeidung noi.
47010009	Mor sidiganiloi mui tomare dor lagangor bili mone no gorsio.
47010010	Haron manjie hoi paron, “Paular sidiganit gour ar shokto hoda age. Hintu heyedi the norom ar tar hodagani hitchu moillio nei.”
47010011	Sedogkie manjie ien bhabodok, ami jokke no thei, hodagani ami sidit legi. Ami jokke thei, amar hamani jedogkie amar hodaganio sedogkie.
47010012	Haron hoiek jone thara nijore-nije baini goron. Ami tharar somare mijie bar no sei ar ami nijore-nije thararloi song no gori. Thara nijore-nije mabon ar nijore-nije song goron. Tharar gyen nei hinottei thara sedogkie goron.
47010013	Hintu Itchiorttun ami jittur bhag peiei sei bara ami bar gortong noi. Ami bar goridie sienot tumio ago.
47010014	Haron ami tomar idu song lungibarlittei, ami sei bara no jei. Ami na tomar idu Kristor gom hoborandoi lungiegidie.
47010015	Ami odorbara baini no gori. Oinnio jonor hamanio ami baini no gori. Hintu ien amar asha: ‘Tomar bischiaschan barilie, tomar darai amar haman tomar moiddie baribo.
47010016	Tomar obola jaganit gom hoboran ami prosar gori pari para. Haron oinnio manjior jagat honatto gorsie haman ami goribar no sei.
47010017	Hintu, “Je bar gore, the PROBU iot bar gorog.”
47010018	Haron je nijore-nije baini gore tare mana no oi. Hintu Probuie jare baini gore tare mana oi.
47011001	Mui bhulo hoda hole, tumi ekka soijjio goribartei mui tomartun sang, ar tumi soijjio goro daw.
47011002	Haron Itchioro agudo-nagandoi mui tomare agudong. Mui tomare ekkuo neg jodon banibartei thik gori duong hinottei, Kristo idu mui tomare sodi gabur-milie dogkie gori gojei dim.
47011003	Sabpuoi Evire hu-buddhi darai thogeie. Thik sedogkie gori adikkie tomar monani bojong gori de bili mui dhorangor. Kristor pokke tumi bhabode sieni the bojongendi ni pare.
47011004	Haron ek jone einei oinnio ek jon Jisur prosar gori parondi, jiber prosar ami no gori. Agendi tumi no pode siennie judo apta tumi pei paro. Ar agendi tumi no lode siennie judo gom hobor tumi loi paro. Tumi sien sohoje mani lo bili mui dhorangor.
47011005	Hoiek jon apostol olakke nangkora ar mui mone gorong muio sigunottun hom noi.
47011006	Hoda-battadi mui hom oleio, gyenedi mui hom noi. Tomar moiddie sieni begkani mui tomare degeong daw.
47011007	Gom hoboran magana mui tomar idu prosar gorsiong. Itchiore tomare ojolot tule para mui nije niroit oiong, sienot mor pab oie ni na?
47011008	Tomare seba goribartei mui oinnio mondolittun bedon loinei ludde para oie.
47011009	Mui tomar loge roiongge lokke huno ekkan pora oi theleio mui harore bhor no duong. Haron Makidonia dejottun ejchionde bheilogkune mor jien pora elo sien purei duondi. Huno ekkanot mui tomar bhor ong bili more mui rokkie gorsiong, ar sedogkie mui onsur gorim.
47011010	Kristor soittiogan mor iot age hinottei mui haror bhor noi bili mui bar gorilie, Akaia rejjio bamo manjie huno jone more badha no goribak.
47011011	A hittei? Itchiore hobor pai mui tomare hos pang
47011012	Hintu mui jien gorong, mui sien onsur gorim, jene amar dogkie bili sujuk togande sigunor sujukkan haba jai.
47011013	Haron edogkie manuschun olakke nogoli apostol. Thara olakke manus thogana ham gorie. Thara nije Kristor apostolo bhes doron.
47011014	Sien amok obar nei. Haron soitannuoi nijeio phor sorgo-dudtuor bhes dorsie.
47011015	Tar sagorsieguneio thara nije dharmigkano sagorsie bhes dhorsion. Sien ekkan dangor ham noi, ar tharar thuman tharar hamo onusare obo.
47011016	Mui aro hongor:More huno jone murukko no bhabodok. A no le, hom se hom the more murukko dogkie gori mani lok, jene muio ekkena bar gori parong para.
47011017	Mui jien hong, sokke Probur doge no hong, hintu murukko dogkie gori bischias gorinei bar gori hong.
47011018	Onek jone songsaro doge bar goron hinottei muio sedogkie gori bar gorim.
47011019	Haron tumi gyeni hinottei murukkogun tumi hujhi gori suei ago.
47011020	Ek jone tomare banidaji banei pare, hei phelei pare, hari loi pare. The nijore-nije dangor banei pare ar tomare the mu sei suorei pare. Murukkogun tumi suei paro hinottei sieni begkani suei paro.
47011021	Ami norom elong hole lajor hoda oi. Hintu manjie jedogkie sahoji muio murukko dogkie gori hongor: Muio sahoji.
47011022	Thara Hebru manus oi ni? muio daw Hebru manus. Thara Israelo manus oi ni? muio daw Israelo manus. Thara Abrahamo bongso oi ni? muio daw Abrahamo bongso.
47011023	Thara Kristor sagorsie oi ni? muio daw Kristor sagorsie. Mui pagolo dogkie gori hong. Thara onek ham gorsion, hintu mui sittun bes ham gorsiong. Mui goni borei no ejchiesong gori meir heiong. Tharattun bes mui jiel-hattuong. Onek bar mui morong-morong oiong.
47011024	Pas bar Judai manuschune more ek hom solis bari duon.
47011025	Tin bar more mugorsion, ekbar more sil mela duon, tin bar mui uttuongge jahajchan tubole bhangi die ar sagoro panit ek reid ek din mui hadei peiong.
47011026	Mui nitto porbhaj gori peiong, sorat hodog bipod lagot peiong, hodog dagedo adot ar mor nijor jado manuschuno adot porsiong. Hodog Be-jadtuno adot porsiong, hodog sohorot ar jonosunnio jagat bipodot porsiong. Hodog sagorot bipod lagot peiong ar hodog bhes dhorsie bheiuno adot porsiong.
47011027	Mui hosto gori ham gorsiong. Onek reid ghumna-ghamna gori roi peiong. Bhat hei no peie gori ped pora ar pani saj gori-gori roi peiong. Habor-subor nei gori jar hei-hei roi peiong.
47011028	Sieni bara, nitto beg mondoliguno sombonde mor sidie thai.
47011029	Ek dagie norom ole, muio norom ongge noi? Ek dagie ujuot hele, mor buk angede noi ni?
47011030	Mui judi bar gorong, mor noromanot mui bar gorim.
47011031	Itchiore hobor pai mui gal no madongor. Itchioror ar amar Probu Jisu Kristor Babpuor umore-umor baini ok.
47011032	Damaska sohorot raja Aretar sason-goriebuoi more dhoribartei Damaska sohoran subi thoie.
47011033	Hintu more ekkuo harangot gori giriegano phogodi hanadi duriloi lamei diduon. Sengiri mui tar adottun sari jeiong.
47012001	Bar gorana mortei thik no oleio, mui bar gorim. Probuie more azil degeie ar phogodang gori di die.
47012002	Kristor ek jon manus mui hobor pang. Soiddio bojoro agendi Itchiore tare tin sorgo song tulliegoi. Heyegan somot ni na, heyegan sara gori mui hobor no pang, Itchiore hobor pai.
47012003	Mui tare hobor pang, hintu heyegan somot ni na, heyegan sara gori mui hobor no pang, Itchiore hobor pai.
47012004	Tare paradisot song tulo oiegoi. The hoi no parsie hoda suinniegoi ar sien manjie hobario noi.
47012005	Mui tar sombonde bar gorim hintu mortei bar gortung noi. Mui judi bar gorilieo bana mor durbolanit bar gorim.
47012006	Mui judi bar goribar seleio mui murukko odung noi. Haron mui soittio hoda hong. mui bar gortung no sang haron mortun jien sunon ar degon sei bara, more addikie judo no bhabon para.
47012007	Itchiore mor idu bes gori phogodang gorsie hinottei mui adikkie more mui bar gorong bili mor heyet ekkuo hada die oie. Sibie olode ekkuo Soitano dud, mui bar no gorong para more thoschie lageibartei die oie.
47012008	Sienottei, sibie mortun jaigoi para Probure mui tin bar hujoli gorsiong.
47012009	Hintu The more hoie, “Mor meyegan tortei jodasto. Noromanot mor bolan puro gori ude hinottei.” Ar Kristor hemodagan mor ugure thai para mor noromanot mui hujhi gori bar gorim.
47012010	Senottei Kristor nange mui norom ole bah more hinsie gorilie mui hujhi ong. Mui pora phele bah hosto phele, mui baari hujhi ong. Mui obhabot phurile hujhi ong. Haron mui jokkene durbol sokkene mui doromoro.
47012011	Mui murukko ong para tumi more bar gora bajei duo. Tumi na baini gorana osit elo. Haron mui hitchu no oleio nangkora apos-tolunottun hom noi.
47012012	Apostolo sinno ham hamakkai mui tomar moiddie mon di gorsiong. Sieni olode sinno ar amok ham hemodaloi gora jaidie hamani.
47012013	Oinnio mondolittun tumi hiot unode? mui tomar bugi no ong hinottei tumi hom oi paro. Sei bhulan more hema duo.
47012014	Ei tin bar mui tomar idu ebartei jugol oi agong. Mui tomar bugi odung noi. Tomar jinijchani mui lubbo no gorong, hintu mui tomare sang. Haron gurogune bab-magunottei joma thobar noi, hintu bab-magune gurogunottei joma thona osit.
47012015	Senottei, tomar porananittei je huno jinij mui hujhi gori horoj gorim, ar horoj gora obo, judio tumi more bes hos no pheleio mui tomare bes hos pang.
47012016	Sien soittio oleio, mui tomar bugi odung noi. Tumi more hoi paro, the chalak hinottei, chalakkandoi the amare dhorsie.
47012017	Muio tomar idu dipadeongge siguno darai mui harore thogeiong ni na?
47012018	Tomar idu ebartei Titare mui hujoli gorsiong. Tar somare bheibuore mui dipadeong. Tita tomare harore thogeie ni na? Ami ekkuo aptaloi roiei ar ekkui gori solleidie oi ni noi?
47012019	Aro ejabot song, ami tomar idu amar dujchani hadeir bili mone goror parapang? Kristo iot Itchioro samne ami hor. Agojorun, tomare shokto goribartei sieni begkani ami hor.
47012020	Haron mui tomar idu ele, mui asha gorongge doge tomare no panggi bili mui dhorangor. Ar mui gelegoi, mui asha gorongge doge tumi more no po bilio mui dhorangor. Mui dhorangotte adikkie hoschie bazana, hinsie gora-gori, rak tulo-tuli, holi gora-gori, sorja-sorji, gop diedi, bar gora-gori ar jagulug oi bili.
47012021	Adikkie, jokke mui tomar idu abar ejong, mor Itchiorbuoi more tomar samne niroit goreibo ar jigune agendi aw-pobitro oinei, sineli ham gorinei, ar hanggi oinei pab gorsion ar tharar monani no phirien sigunottei buk porah ong bili dhorangor.
47013001	Tomar idu ejana ien mor tin bar obo. “Di-tin jono muottun shakkigan mana obo.”
47013002	Agendi jigune pab gorsion sigunore mui uij duong. Ar ikkie mui no theleio, mui tomar loge di barot elungge dogkie gori oinnio begkunore uij duongor. mui judi aro ejong, harore bad didung noi ar.
47013003	Kristoi mor iot hoi bili tumi proman sebar dhap hinottei Kristo tomar pokke norom noi, hintu tomar iot the hemoda-bola.
47013004	Haron norom bili tare Krosot die oie. Tobuio, Itchioro hemoda darai the jeda age. Thik sedogkie gori, ami tar iot norom oi agi. Tobuio, tomar pokke Itchioro darai ami tar loge bajibong.
47013005	Bischiaschanot tumi ago ni na nei, nijore-nije porikkie goro. Nijore-nije proman shona. Tumi tigi tho song Jisu Kristo tomar iot agede tumi hobor no po?
47013006	Hintu mui bischias gorong ami tigi thebong bili tumi hobor peba.
47013007	Tumi bojong ham no goro para ikkie Itchiorottun mui bor magi duongor. Ami upojukto dega jebartei bili noi, hintu judio tigi no theleio, tumi thik ham goro para.
47013008	Haron soittiogano biruddie huno ekkan amar hemoda nei. Hintu soittiogano pokke amar hemoda age.
47013009	Ami norom oinei tumi doro ole ami hujhi oi. Ar tomare puro gori banebartei ami bor magi di.
47013010	Senottei, tomare shokto goribartei, nosto goribartei noi Probuie more odhihar dede doge, mui thieinei adikkie tomare korgos gorong bili abitjone ei hodagani mui tomare legongor.
47013011	Bego sejot, bheilog hujhi aw. Puro gori jugol oinei nijore-nije sahoj goro. Ega mone bhabo ar shantie thago, sebeden hos paidie ar shanti dede Itchiorbuo tomar loge thebo.
47013012	Pobitro sumon dinei salam gora-gori gorsio.
47013013	Beg sadhu man-uschune tomare salam janadon.
47013014	Probu Jisu Kristor doyegan, Itchioro hospanagan ar Pobitro Aptar egotagan tomar begkuno ugure thok. Amen.
48001001	Mui apostol Paula, manjiortun ar manjior darai mui apostol noi, hintu Jisu Kristor darai ar Jisure morattun jiei tulliede Bab Itchioro darai mui olungge ek jon apostol.
48001002	Mor loge agonde beg bheilogkundoi, Galatia rejjiot agode mondoligunore legongor.
48001003	Bab Itchiore ar amar Probu Jisu Kristoi tomare doye ar shanti duok.
48001004	Amar Bab Itchioro ischie doge, ei bortoman bojong jugkuottun The amare uddhar goribartei, amar pabpanittei Jisu Kristoi the nijore-nije die.
48001005	Amar Bab Itchiorbuor umore-umor mohima ok. Amen.
48001006	Kristor doyeganot tomare dakkiede Sibiettun tumi edok jhadi gori judo gom hoboranot pharok oi joulloi bili mui asarjio olung.
48001007	Sien judo noi, hintu hoiek jone tomare jagulug gorton. Thara Kristor gom hoboran bodoli didak san.
48001008	Hintu judi ami oi bah sorgottun sorgo-dude ok, ami tomare prosar gorsei die bara aro oinnio gom hobor tomar idu prosar gorilie the obisab hok.
48001009	Agendi ami tomare hoieidie doge mui aro hongor, tumi peiode gom hoborano bara oinnio gom hobor tomar idu prosar gorilie the obisab hok.
48001010	Haron mui manjiore mana bajei duongor, nahi Itchiorore mana bajei duonggotte? Nahi mui manjiore hujhi goribar sangge? Haron mui judi ejosong manjiore hujhi goribar sang, mui Kristor banidaji odung noi.
48001011	Bheilog, mui tomare janei duong, mui prosar gorsiongge gom hoboran manjior doge noi.
48001012	Haron ei gom hoboran manjiortun mui no pang. Manjieio more ien no shigan, hintu ei gom hoboran Jisu Kristoi dega denar darai mor idu ejchie.
48001013	Haron mui agendi Judaiunor dhormot thagode jei ijebe roiong sieni tumi sunnio. Itchioro mondolibuore mui shanggadik uttiesar gorsiong ar sien dongso goribartei sesta gorsiong.
48001014	Mor amolot nijor jadot onek manjiortun bes gori mui Judaiunor dhormot akkol elung. Mor Purbo-puruschununor dosturani adeibartei mui shanggadik utjogi elung.
48001015	Hintu Itchiore more mar gorbhottun nokbhaj gorsie. Tar doyer darai the more dakkie.
48001016	Be-jadtunor sidu tar sombonde mui prosar goronggoi para, tar Puobuo mor iot degeie. Sien jogon-togon manjiorloi mui alab no gorong.
48001017	Mor agendi apostol elakke sigundoi alab goribartei mui Jerusalem sohorot no jang. Hintu Arabia dejot jeiong ar sittun Damaska sohorot aro phiri ejchuong.
48001018	Sebeden tin bojor porendi, Pitorloi dega obarlottei mui Jerusalem sohorot jeiong ar tar loge pondoro din roionggoi.
48001019	Probur bheibuo Jakob bade oinnio huno jon apostol mui no degonggoi.
48001020	Ikkie mui tomare legongotte sienir sombonde sawh, Itchioro mujungot mui gal no madongor.
48001021	Sei porendi, Syria ar Kilikia rejjioganit mui jeiong.
48001022	Judea dejot, Kristo iot elakke mondoligune mor muon no degon.
48001023	Bana thara mor sombonde suinnionde, “Agendi amare uttiesar gorsiede sibiei the ekbar dongso goribar sesta gorsiede bischiaschan, ikkie the prosar gorer.”
48001024	Mortei thara Itchiorore baini gorsion.
48002001	Sebeden soiddio bojor porendi, Barnaba somare mui aro Jerusalem song jeiong. Mor loge Titareo mui nejeiong.
48002002	Prosar gori mui jeinei, Be-jadtunor moiddie mui prosar gorongge gom hoboran tharare janei duonggoi. Hintu mui sien murubbigunor sidu gubone janei duonggoi, adikkie mui brithai gori dumursiong bah brithai gori dumurong bilinei.
48002003	Tobuio, mor loge elode Tita, the Grik manus oi theleio, tare sundu-sam habi dena baddio no goron.
48002004	Ien oiede haronan olode hoiek jon nogoli bheilogkun gubone bhoreiondi. Thara guptosor ijebe sube-sabe einei, Kristor Jisur iot amar shadinan seiondi jene thara amare bondit phelei paron.
48002005	Ami tharar sidu ek ghontaio gojei no di, jene gom hoborano soittiogan tomar iot onsur thai.
48002006	Hintu murubbi gujoror sigunottun ole, thara jei odak sat, mortei huno eitzabor nei. Itchiore harore nijor aguttiegan no degai. Murubbi gujoror sigune more hitchu baledo hoda barei no duon.
48002007	Hintu sei bodoli, sundu-sam happieguno sidu prosar goribartei Pitorore die oiede dogkie gori, sundu-sam no happieguno sidu gom hoboran prosar goribartei more die oiede thara degkuon.
48002008	(Haron sundu-sam happieguno sidu Pitoror apostolo haman je gorsie, sieno dogkie gori Be-jadtuno sidu mor iot the ham gorsie.)
48002009	Jakobe, Kepha ar Johone jigun olakke haam, thara bujilakke doyegan more die oie. Thara more ar Barnabare song pora-porir den adtan amare duon, jene ami Be-jadtuno sidu jei para ar sundu-sam happieguno sidu thara jan para.
48002010	Tharattun mone hoiede ami bana goribpunore monot rageidong, ar sien goribar mortunio baari mone hoi.
48002011	Pitore jokkene Antiok sohorot lungilogi, mui tar biruddie thiei udilung, haron tare duj dibar goribar age.
48002012	Haron Jakobottun hoiek jon ebar agendi, the Be-jadtuno somare haba-daba gorto. Hintu thara einei, sundu-sam happiegunore dorenei the tharattun jeinei nije-nije pharok gori roiegoi.
48002013	Ar bagi Judai manuschuneio tar phagaraganot mijeilak. Senottei Barnabareo tharar phagarane thani nejeilo.
48002014	Hintu gom hoborano soittioganot thara uju gori no solon bili mui deginei, tharar begkuno mujungot Pitorore mui holung, “Tui Judai manus oineio tui judi Be-jadtuno doge thas, ar Judai manjior doge no thas, Be-jadtunore hittei tui Judai manuschuno doge tha bajei duos?
48002015	“Ami daw eneio Judai manus, ar Be-jadtunor pabi noi.
48002016	Ami hobor pei, jei ek jon manus hamor niomo onusare dharmig gona no oi, hintu Jisu Kristo iot bischiaschano darai dharmig gona oi. Hamo niomo darai noi, hintu Kristo iot bischiaso darai dharmig gona obartei amio Jisu Kristore bischias gorsei. Haron hamo niomo onusare harore dharmig gona no obo.
48002017	Kristo iot ami dharmig gona obartei togeir hinottei, ami nijeio pabi bili hobor pelong. Senottei, Kristo pabir dajibuo ni na? Hamakkai noi.
48002018	Haron mui bhangi phellie jinijchani mui judi aro banang, mui nije niom bhonggo gorie om.
48002019	Haron Itchiorottei mui bajong para, niomo onusare niomanottei mui morsiong.
48002020	Kristo somare more krosot die oie, ikkie baji agongge sibie mui noi ar, hintu Kristo mor iot baji age. Heyedi ikkie baji agongge jibonan olode, more hos peinei the nije mortei dede Itchioro Puobuo iot bischiaso darai baji agong.
48002021	Itchioro doyegan mui ek huredi no thong. Haron judi dharmigkan niomo darai eje, salen Kristo brithai gori morsie.”
48003001	Oh bhul Galatia hulliegun! Honna tomare topbo goreilo, jei tumi soittiogan bischias no gorida? Tom ar sogor samne poriskar gori dega oiede Jisu Kristore krosot die oie.
48003002	Tomartun bana ien mui hobor pedung sang, Aptabuo hamor niomo darai peio, nahi bischiaso hodagan suninei peio?
48003003	Tumi edok bhul olade? Aptabuot arambo gorinei, ikkie heyedi puripunnuo awr ni na?
48003004	Brithai gori onek hosto peio ni na jodepode gori bul ole?
48003005	Senottei, Je tomare Apta die, ar tomar moiddie oborug ham gorsie, the hamo niomo darai gorsie, nahi bischiaso hodagan sunonar darai gorsie?
48003006	Ien Abrahamor hodagano dogkie. “Abrahame Itchiorore bischias gorsie, ar tar bischiaschan dharmigkano dogkie gona oie.”
48003007	Senottei, jigune bischias gorsion, sigun Abrahamor puo bili hobor peio.
48003008	Itchiore Be-jadtunore dharmig gonibo gori Sastroie honatto deginei, akke duri Abrahamore gom hoboran janei die oie. Sastroie hoi, “Tor iot beg jadtunore asirbad die obo.”
48003009	Senottei, bischias gorsionde sigun, bischias gorie Abrahamor somare asirbad peion.
48003010	Senottei, hamo niomanot jedog jon agon, thara begkun obisabpanor tole porilag. Haron Sastrot lega age, “Niomor boibuot lega doge je begkani eksottie no gore, the obisab heie.”
48003011	Hintu Itchioro samne niomo darai harore dharmig gona no oidie sien poriskar. Haron, “Dharmigkun bischiaso darai bajibak.”
48003012	Tobuio, nioman bischiaschanor noi, hintu, “Je sieni gore the sieni darai bajibo.”
48003013	Kristoi amattei obisab heinei, the amare niomanor obisab-panottun hini loie. (Haron Sastrot lega age, “Je gajot tangan hai, the obisab hai.”)
48003014	Jene Kristor darai Abrahamor asirbadtan Be-jadtuno sidu ebartei Aptar soittiogan bischiaso darai amar lo poribo.
48003015	Bheilog, mui manjior dogkie gori hongor: ien bana manjior suktigan oleio, judi ien thik ole, huno jone ien ek huredi thoi no paribak, bah bareo no paribak.
48003016	Itchiore Abrahamore ar tar bongsogunore soittio dede lokkene, the edogkie gori jhagkuo ijebe no hoi, “Tor bongsogunore.” Hintu ek jono dogkie gori hoie, “Tor bongsobuore,” ar sibie olode Kristo.
48003017	Ar mui ien hodung sang: Nioman seir sho tiris bojor honet, ar Niomane suktiganore ek huredi thoi paribar noi, jien Itchiore honatto Kristo iot thik gorsie, sei protiggiaganore aw-gunor banebar nei.
48003018	Haron odhiharan judi niomanor darai oi, sien soittiogano no obo ar, hintu Itchiorbuoi Abrahamore sien soittioganor darai die.
48003019	Salen Niomane hi uddische ham gore? Nioman die oiede bhonggoganottei. Soittiogan die oiede sibier idu tar Bongsobuo eje song, ek jon mil goridier ade sien sorgo-dudtuo darai thik gora oie.
48003020	Mil goridiebuoi bana ek dagire mil gori no de, hintu Itchiorbuo olode ek.
48003021	Salen Ni-oman Itchiorbuor soittiogano biruddie ni na? Hamakkai noi. Haron Nioman judi thedo, jiene jibon di parilun, salen jodepode gori dharmigkan Niomano darai thelun.
48003022	Hintu Sastrogane beg-kunore pabor tole bondi gori thoie, jene Jisu Kristo iot bischiaso darai bischias-goriegunore soittiogan die oi.
48003023	Hintu bischiaschan ebar agendi amare Niomano tole bondi gori raga oie. Jei bischiaschan porendi phogodang gora obo sienottei bondi oi elong.
48003024	Senottei, amare Kristo idu aninei bischiaso darai dharmig obartei, Nioman olode amare sigkie die.
48003025	Hintu bischiaschan ejanar porendi, ami sigkiediebuor tole nei ar.
48003026	Haron Jisu Kristo iot bischiaso darai tumi olade begkun Itchioro puo.
48003027	Haron tumi jedogkune Kristo iot baptisma loio begkun Kristo iot haboro dogkie gori urei die oie.
48003028	Kristo Jisu iot begkun ekkui hinottei, huno jon Judai manus noi, Grik manus noi, banidaji noi, shadin manus noi, ar milieio nei morodo nei.
48003029	Tumi judi Kristor manus awh, salen tumi Abrahamor bongso, ar soittiogano onusare odhiharigan peiegun.
48004001	Odhiharigan peiebuo ikkie mui holungge sibie, guro lokkene banidajittun huno phartokko nei, judio the begkanir malik.
48004002	Hintu babe thik gorsie somoibuo song The rakkolibuor ar ghor lobiot-goriebuor tole thai.
48004003	Thik sedogkie gori, guro lokkene amio songsaror polim sigkienir tole bondi oi elong.
48004004	Hintu puripunnuo somoibuo lunginei, Itchiore tar Puobuo padei die. Ekkuo miliei tare phudeie, Niomanor tole tar jormo oie.
48004005	Palok puogun pei para, ar Niomor tole sigunore hini lobartei the Niomor tole jormo loiegi.
48004006	Tumi puo hinottei, Itchiore tar Puobuor Aptabuo tomar ontorot padei die. Aptabuoi “Abba, Ba,” gori dager.
48004007	Senottei, tumi banidaji noi ar, hintu puo ola. Ar judi puo ole, salen, Kristor darai odhiharigan peie ola.
48004008	Hintu jodepode gori, eksomoi tumi Itchior hobor no po. Ar tumi sebona gorsiode sigun eneio Itchior noi.
48004009	Hintu ikkie tumi Itchior hobor panar porendi, bah Itchiore tomare hobor panar porendi, hingori tumi aro sei pela jeie ar aw-gunor polim sigkienit phirinei aro bondi obar mone hor?
48004010	Din, mas, ritu ar bojor tumi palor.
48004011	Mui tomartei adikkie bul gori hadoni holung bili dhorangor.
48004012	Bheilog, mui tomar dogkie oiong hinottei, tumio mor dogkie obartei mui tomare hujoli gorongor. Tumi more shobai oinnie no goro.
48004013	Tumi hobor po, mui heyei no parinei, bego akke tomar idu gom hoboran prosar gorsiong.
48004014	Mor heyet jien porikkie elo sien tumi aw-pela no gorinei, bah phirei no dinei, sei bodoli, tumi more Itchioro sorgo-dudtuo dogkie gori, ar nije Kristo Jisur dogkie gori more gojhi loio.
48004015	Salen tumi hi asirbad pela? mui shakki duongotte, judi sombob ole, tomar nijor sogkun hueinei ar sigun more diba.
48004016	Soittio hodagan mui tomare hong hinottei mui tomar sottru olung ni na?
48004017	Thara tomare shanggadik agudibag, hintu gomortei noi. Thara tomare nigilei dibar sebak jene tumi tharare agudo.
48004018	Bana mui tomar loge thagke noi hintu gom jinijottei onsur agudona gom.
48004019	Gurolok, Kristo tomar bidirie jormai song mui aro tomartei hadoni gorsiong.
48004020	Mor robuo bodoleibartei ikkie mui tomar idu azil obar sang. Haron tomar sombonde mor mon jagulug age.
48004021	Niomanor tole thebar mone hoidie sigun, more ien ho, Niomane hi hoi sunor ni?
48004022	Haron Abrahamor dibie puo agon gori Sastrot ien lega age. Ekkuo banidaji miliettun ar ekkuo shadin miliettun.
48004023	Hintu banidaji milie-buottun oiede sibie olode bongso darai, ar shadin miliebuottun oiede sibie olode soittiogano darai.
48004024	Hubone tulona gorsie. Haron ien olode dien sukti. Sinai Mounnottun jormeiebuo olode banidajibuo, ar sibie olode Hagari.
48004025	Haron ei Hagari olode Arabia dejot Sinai Mounnuo, ar sien Jerusalem sohorloi milie, ar ikkie the tar manuschundoi banidaji oi age.
48004026	Hintu uguro Jerusalem sohoran olode shadin, ar the olode amar begkunor ma.
48004027	Haron Sastrot lega age, “Oh bhaj miliebuo, tui puo no phudos, tui ped pirie hobor no paschie sibie jogar pari-pari hujhi awh. Haron phelei jeie miliebuor, neg-bola miliebuottun bes puo-shaba obak.”
48004028	Bheilog, Isaakor dogkie ikkie amio soittiogano puogun.
48004029	Hintu bongso-goto oiede sibiei Aptar darai oiede sibiere hosto lageiede dogkie gori, ikkieio thik sedogkie awr.
48004030	Tobuio, Sastroie hi hoi? “Banidaji miliebuore ar tar puobuore nigilei duo. Haron banidaji miliebuor puobuoi, shadin mileiebuor puobuor somare odhiharigan no pebo.”
48004031	Bheilog, salen, ami banidaji miliebuor puo noi, hintu ami olongge shadin miliebuor puo.
48005001	Shadinanottei Kristoi amare shadin gorsie senottei tumi shokto gori thiei thago. Banidaji jungolluot aro no baschuo.
48005002	Mui Paulai tomare jodepode gori hongor, tumi judi sundu-sam habo, salen Kristoi tomare hitchu lab dido noi.
48005003	Aro mui begkunore shakki duongor, je sundu-sam habe, the goda Niomanor Horoj heiebuo obo.
48005004	Niomor onusare dharmig obar seiegun, tumi Kristortun pharok ola, ar doyeganottun jhuri porila.
48005005	Haron Aptabuoloi Bischiasor darai dharmigkan ega mone ami asha gori barsei agi.
48005006	Haron Kristo Jisu iot nahi sundu-sam habanagane ham gore bah sundu-sam no habanagane hitchu lab de. Hintu hospanat darai bischiaschane ham gorer.
48005007	Tumi gome dumursio daw. Soittiogan adeibartei honna tomare badha gorsie?
48005008	Tomare dagede sibiettun ei ujuluonagan no eje.
48005009	Ekkena moli-gurie goda bhattun jorai.
48005010	Probu iot mui tomare bischias gorong, tomar oinnio mon nei. Hintu je tomare hosto lagai, the je odo sat, tar sastigan suei pebo.
48005011	Bheilog, mui judi ejosong sundu-sam habananor sombonde prosar goridung, salen mui hittei ejosong uttiesar lagot pangor? Salen daw kroschane azar habaidie sien thum olun.
48005012	Mortun mone horte jei, je tomare hosto lagai thara nijore-nije habi pheleidak.
48005013	Bheilog, tomare shadinanot daga oie. Shadinan bana heyet lubbo pokkettei hamot no lageio, hintu hospanaloi ek jonore ek jone sebona gora-gori gorsio.
48005014	Haron goda Niomani ekkan hodat puripunnuo oie, ienotio oie, “Tui nijore-nije hos paschie dogkie gori tor paralliegunore hos peis.”
48005015	Hintu tumi judi ek jone oinnio jonore hamoro ar hei pelo, seio, adikkie ek jone oinnio jonore ha-hi goriba.
48005016	Salen mui ien hom, “Apta-buo iot ado, sebeden heyet lubb-ogan puron no goriba.”
48005017	Haron heyegano lubbogan Aptabuor biruddie, ar Aptabuor lubbogan heyegano biruddie. Ieni ekkane ekkano biruddie hinottei, tomartun jien mone hoi sien gori no paro.
48005018	Hintu tomare judi Aptabuoi nejai, salen tumi Niomanor tole noi.
48005019	Heyeganor hamani alge dega jai. Sieni olode: Shanda, hanggi, aw-pobitro, lub shamelei no parsie,
48005020	mokti pujona, jadu, hinsie, mara-mari, bis dega-degi, rage ohongkari, holi gora-gori, pharok oie, bhul sigkie,
48005021	dei para-pari neie, hun gorana, mattol ona, mod heinei phorti gorana, ar sedogkie hamani, jienir sombo-nde mui tomare honatto hoiong. Mui tomare agendi hoiongge doge, sieni goronde sigune Itchioro rejjioganot odhihar pedak noi.
48005022	Hintu Aptabuor pholan olode, hospana, hujhi, shanti, soijjio gorana, doye, goman, bischias-joggiogan,
48005023	nombrotagan, ar nijore-nije domon goranagan. Ienir biruddie huno niom nei.
48005024	Jigun Kristor manus, thara monan ar lubbogan somot heyegan krosot duon.
48005025	Ami judi Aptabuo iot thei, Aptabuo iot soli.
48005026	Barbuo oinei, ek jone oinnio jonore huttieri tuli diedi ar bis dega-degi no obong.
48006001	Bheilog, ek jone judi dujot dhora pore, salen, apta-bolagune nombro mone tumi tare phirei annio. Nijoreio seio adikkie tumio porikkiet poriba.
48006002	Ek jone aro ek jonor bugi loi diedi gorsio, ar sengori Kristor nioman purei duo.
48006003	Haron ek jone the hitchu noi, hintu the judi nije ek jon dangor mone gore, salen the nijore-nije thoge.
48006004	Hintu prottiek jone tar nijor haman porikkie gorog. Sebeden, the nije gai-gai hujhi obo, manjior hamot noi.
48006005	Haron prottiek jone nijor bugibuo bugibak.
48006006	Je gom sigkie peie the beg gom jinijchani tare sigeiede sibieloi bhag gorog.
48006007	Thoga no heio, ar Itchiorbuore thatta gori no pare. Haron je jeannie shidie, the siennie phol pebo.
48006008	Haron je jeannie tar heyeganot shidie, the tar heyeganot poji jaidie phol pebo. Hintu je jeannie Aptabuot shidie, the Aptabuottun siennie ononto jibon pebo.
48006009	Gom ham gorte ageie no obong. Haron ami judi obohela no oi, somoi mojim gori phol pebong.
48006010	Senottei, amar sujuk age bili begkunottei gom ham gori, bes gori, bischiasi ghorbuogunottei.
48006011	Mor nijor adtoi birat birat orokkoi mui tomare legkuongge sawh.
48006012	Jedog jone ugure-ugure heyet goman degebartei dhap goron, thara tomare sundu-sam haba bajei dibag, jene Kristor kroschanottei uttiesar lagot no pan.
48006013	Haron bana sundu-sam happiegune nijeio Niom no palan, hintu thara tomare sundu-sam haba bajei dibar sande, jene tomar heyenit thara baini goron.
48006014	Hintu amar Probu Jisu Kristor kroschanor bade oinnio hoda sombonde baini gorana mortun durot tok. Sei kroschanot mui songsarottei krosot porsiong, ar songsaran mortei Krosot porsie.
48006015	Haron Kristo Jisu iot nahi sundu-sam habanagane ham gore bah sundu-sam no habanagane hitchu lab de, hintu nuo sristigan olode ajolan.
48006016	Jedog jone ei niomanot adon, shanti ar doyegan tharar ugure thebo. Itchioror Israel manuschunor ugureo ieni thebo.
48006017	Probu Jisur sinnogani mor heyet gori loi berangor hinottei, ikkiettun duri huno jone more jagulug ar no gortok.
48006018	Bheilog, tomar aptagunor loge amar Probu Jisu Kristor doyegan thok, Amen.
49001001	Mui Paula, Itchioro ischie doge Jisu Kristor ek jon apostol. Ephesi sohorot sadhu manuschunore ar Jisu Kristor bischias-joggiogunore mui legongor.
49001002	Amar Bab Itchiorbuoi ar Probu Jisu Kristoi tomare doye ar shanti deduok.
49001003	Kristor iot prottiek sorgoganit, aptar asirbadtaniloi amare asirbad dede Itchiorbuor ar amar Probu Jisu Kristor Babpuor baini ok.
49001004	Tar mujungot hospanaganot ami pobitro ar duj di no parsie oi para, the amare songsar sristi goribar agendi the amare Kristor iot bei loie.
49001005	Tar hujhir ischie mote tar nijor iot ami palok puo obartei Jisu Kristo iot akke duri thik gorsie.
49001006	Tar doyer mohimagan baini goribartei sien The gorsie. Sienot The amare tar Agojor iot magana die.
49001007	Tar iot, tar alajhala doyeganor onusare tar loganor darai amare hinnie. Sien olode pabor hemagan.
49001008	Beg gyenanit ar bhujonaganit alajhala gori tar doyegan amar pokkettiei die.
49001009	Tar ischie onusare oghur gubonan The amare janei die. sien the nije Kristo iot honatto uddischuo gori thoie.
49001010	Jene puro gori somoibuo puriponnuo goribartei, sorgot agede sieni ar pittimit agede sieni, begkani Kristor iot sieni eksomare thubei pare para.
49001011	Tar nijor ischier poranorio onusare begkani gorede sibiei akke duri thik gorsie hinottei, tar iot ami ekkan odhiharo sompotti pelong.
49001012	Jene ami jigune akke Kristore asha gorsei tar mohimaganot baini gori para.
49001013	Soittio hodagan, jien tomar muktiganor gom hoboran sunonar porendi tumio tare bischias gorsio. Tumi bischias gorinei, tar iot tomare soittior Pobitro Aptai marga di thoie.
49001014	Tar mohimagan baini obartei, Itchioror hinnie jinijchan hine song the olode amar odhiharo sompottiganor marga.
49001015	Senottei, Probu Jisur iot tomar bischiaschanor sombonde ar beg sadhu manuschunor pokke tomar hospanaganor sombonde sunonar porendi muio tomare hujhi hoda hoiong.
49001016	Tomar nangani mui bor magode hoi-hoi tomartei hujhi hoda hona thum no gorong.
49001017	Jene amar Probu Jisu Kristor Itchiorbuoi, jibe oborug Bab, sibiei tomare gyeno apta ar tar sombonde prosar gyen de para.
49001018	Tomar bujonar sogkun hulo jadok, jene tar daganaganor ashagan ar sadhu manuschunor iot tar hi oborug alajhala gori odhiharo sompotti age tumi hobor po para.
49001019	Tar hamanot dangor hemodaganor onusare, ami jigune bischias gorsei sienot hi dangor odhihar age hobor po para.
49001020	Sei hemodagandoi the Kristor iot ham gorsie, ar the tare morattun jiei tulinei, sorgot tar denendi bojei thoiegoi.
49001021	Beg sason-goriegunor ugure, hemodaganir ugure, odhi-harigunor ugure ar rajagunor ugure bojei thoie. Ei jugkuot ar ebode jugkuot nang thoi dibagke sei prottiek nanganir ugure tare bojei thoie.
49001022	Beg jinijchani tar thengot tole thoi di dinei, mondolibuottei beg jinijchanir ugure madabuo tare bana oie.
49001023	Mondolibuo olode tar heyegan. Sien olode tar puripunnuogan je begkunottei begkani puron gore.
49002001	Tumi pabpanit ar oboradtanit mora ela.
49002002	Sienit tumi eksomoi songsaro dosturo doge ar boiero rajabuor hemoda doge sollio. Boiero rajabuor aptabuoi ikkie aw-mannio manuschunor iot ham gorer.
49002003	Amio begkune sigunor moiddie eksomoi heyet lubbo doge ami nije-nije gorsei. Heyet dhappan ar monor dhappan pureibar seiei. Oinnio manuschunor dogkie gori, ajole ami ragor puo elong.
49002004	Hintu doye sagor Itchiorbuoi tar dangor hospanagandoi the amare hos peie.
49002005	Ami oboradtanit mora elongge lokkeneio the amare Kristor somare jeda goreie. Doyer darai tumi mukti pela.
49002006	Jisu Kristo iot amare eksomare jiei tulinei, sorgot amare eksomare bojeie.
49002007	Jene ebode jugkuot amar pokke Jisu Kristo iot tar sitpuronaganot shanggadik doye age bili degei pare para.
49002008	Haron bischiaschandoi doyer darai tomare mukti gora oie, tumi nije-nije mukti no awh. Muktigan olode Itchioror danan.
49002009	Ien hameie noi adikkie je huno jone bar goribak.
49002010	Haron ami olongge tar adtoi gorsie haman. Kristo iot amare gom ham goribartei sristi gora oie. Ami sienit solibartei Itchiore akke duri jugolei thoi die.
49002011	Senottei monot rageio, eksomoi tumi jormogoto Be-jad ela. Heyet adtoi sundu-sam happiegune tomare sundu-sam no happie dakkuon.
49002012	Sei lokkene tumi Kristortun pharok ela. Israel manuschunor begkunor dhonanor ar sukti gorsie protiggianor barendi ela. Songsarot tumi asha sara ar Itchior sara gori ela.
49002013	Hintu tumi sei lokkene durot elade sigun ikkie Kristor loganor darai Jisu Kristo iot hai ana olo.
49002014	Haron the nije olode amar shantibuo. Pharok gori rageiede moiddie bersagagan the bhangi di dinei, the duo dagire ek goreie.
49002015	Tar nijor heyet sottrugan ses gori die. Sien olode Niomanor ugumani, jieni dostur. Di jonottun ek jon nuo manus tar iot the nije baneie hinottei, mil goreie.
49002016	Sottrugan morei pheleinei, kroschano darai Itchioro siot ekkan heye gori dibartei sienire egottor goreie.
49002017	The einei, hai ar durot agonde sigunor sidu shantigan prosar gorsiegi.
49002018	Haron tar darai ami duo dagie ekkuo Aptar darai Babo sidu jei pari.
49002019	Senottei ikkie, tumi aw-sin ar bi-deji noi ar, hintu sadhu manuschun-doi ar Itchiorbuor ghorbuogundoi ek dejia nagorig ola.
49002020	Apostol-undoi, ar munigundoi tomar somot tolagan bana oie jienor mul konar silluo nije Jisu Kristo.
49002021	Sigundoi goda ghoran ektade tulinei, Probur iot ekkuo pobitro mondir tulo oie.
49002022	Aptabuo iot Itchiorbuo thebar jaga banebartei, sienot tomareo eksomare bana awr.
