49003001	Ei harone tumi Be-jadtunottei mui Paula olungge Jisu Kristortei bondibuo.
49003002	Tomartei Itchiore more dede doyegan tumi hamakkai suinnio,
49003003	Mui tomare legkuongge doge, sei phogodang gorsiegandoi hodog tar oghur gubonan more janei die.
49003004	Sieni tumi madei sele hobor peba, Kristor oghur gubonan mui hobor pangge sien tumi buji pariba.
49003005	Ikkie tar pobitro apostolunor ar munigunor aptagunor darai janei die oiede dogkie gori, ago phirigunor amolot manjiore janei die no oi.
49003006	Sien olode Be-jadtune gom hoborano darai Kristo iot tar soittiogan bhag peie oinei ekkan heyet song somare odhiharo sompotti bhag pebakke sien.
49003007	Tar hemodagan hamo tejor darai more die oinei, Itchioro doyer dananor doge sebokkuo mui oiong.
49003008	Beg sadhu manuschunor moiddie begottun aw-gunorbuo more ei doyegan Be-jadtuno moiddie prosar goribarlottei die oie. Gom hoboran olode Kristor togei borei no ejchie dhonan.
49003009	Mui sei gubonan hi bili begkunore bujeidibartei. jien akketun duri Itchioro siot lugei elo. Itchiore Jisu Kristo darai beg jinijchani sristi gorsie.
49003010	Ikkie uddischuogan olode mondoli darai Itchioro onek bar gyenan sorgot sason-goriegunore ar hemoda-bolagunore janei dibartei.
49003011	Sien olode amar Probu Jisu Kristor iot tar ononto uddischuogan pureibartei.
49003012	Jisure bischias gorinei amar monor bol age jei tar iot sahoj gori somi paribong.
49003013	Senottei, mui tomartei hosto pangotte sienit tumi monore bhito no goribartei mui tomare hujoli gorongor. Mor hostogani olode tomar oborugkani.
49003014	Ei senottei, mui amar Probu Jisu Kristor Babpuor mujungot adu hubi salam gorong.
49003015	Tartun sorgor ar pittimir goda ghorbuob-uoi nang peie.
49003016	Tar alajhala oborugkanottun tar Aptabuor darai tomar bidirie Manuschuore bolendi shokto gorog.
49003017	Bischiasor darai Kristoi tomar ontoranit thai para, ar tumi hospanaganot gobhin ar oghur gori singor hubibartei mui bor magi duongor.
49003018	Ojaran, lambagan, gobhinan ar ojolan beg sadhu manuschundoi buji paro para bor magi duongor.
49003019	Gyenanottun bes Kristor hospanagan bili tumi hobor po para, ar jene tumi Itchioro puri-punnuogandoi boron aw para bor magi duongor.
49003020	Ami bor magidie bah bhabidie sittun bes gori phare Itchiorbuoi tar hemoda doge amar iot ham gorer.
49003021	Beg phiri bagene umore-umor Jisu Kristor darai mondolibuot tar mohima ok. Amen.
49004001	Senottei, mui Probuttei bondi-buoi tomare shokto gori hujoli gorongor. Tomare daga oiede daganaganot upojukto gori solo.
49004002	Beg nombrotaloi, norom mone ar dhorjioloi, hospana-ganot soijjio gora-gori gorinei solo.
49004003	Shantir bannuot Aptabuor egotagan rageibartei sesta gorsio.
49004004	Ekkan ashat tomare daga oiede doge, ekkan heye ar ekkuo apta age.
49004005	Ekkuo Probu, ekkan bischias, ar ekkan baptisma age.
49004006	Bana ekkuo Itchior age. The olode begkunor Bab, ar begkunottun dangor. Begkunor moiddie ar tomar iot the age.
49004007	Hintu Kristor dananor mabpuor doge amare prottiek jonore doyegan die oie.
49004008	Senottei the hoie, “Jokkene the ojolot uttiegoi, the bondigunore bondi gori annie. Ar the manjiore dan die.”
49004009	“The uttiegoi,” sienor ortho, the akke pittimit toleo lammiegi ni na?
49004010	Je lammiegi, the nije begkani pureibartei, the beg sorgoganir ugureo uttiegoi.
49004011	The nije hoiek jon apostol obartei, hoiek jon muni obartei, hoiek jon prosar gorie obartei, hoiek jon palok ar mastor obartei die.
49004012	Sigune jene lobiot gorede hamot sadhu manuschunore jugol gora bajei dinei, Kristor heyeganot gorei tuli paron.
49004013	Bis-chiaschanot ami egota oi song, Itchioro Puobuor gyenan pei song, puripunnuo manus oi song, ar Kristor puripunnuogano soman oi song, the amare sigun die.
49004014	Jene ami guro dogkie oinei no thei para. Manjior bhulot porinei, phagara-nagara buddhiloi thogeibartei barsei thande boiero dogkie sigkieganiloi urei ninei ar endi-undi nejaidie dogkie no oi para.
49004015	Hintu hospanaganot soittio hodagan hoi para, Madabuo Kristor iot je huno iet ami begkanit dangor oi para.
49004016	Tartun goda heyegan jorabode. Prottiek onggoi tar nijor hamani gorede dogkie, prottiek jora-jorie ektade dori thai. Senottei, heyegan barinei, nijore-nije hospanaganot gorei tullie.
49004017	Senottei, Probur iot shakki dinei ien mui tomare hongor: Hali mondoi Be-jadtunor dogkie gori no sollio ar.
49004018	Tharar bujonagan hala, ar Itchioro jibonottun pharok. Tharar iot aw-gyenan age hinottei tharar akkolani han oie.
49004019	Thara lajchan onubhob gori no paron hinottei, lubbogandoi thara nije-nije shanda hamot porinei beg aw-pobitro hamani gorsion.
49004020	Hintu Kristo sedogkie noi bili tumi sigkuo.
49004021	Tumi tar sombonde suinnio daw. Jisur iot soittiogan agede doge, tar iot thara tomare sigeion.
49004022	Phagara lubboloi bojong oiede purona Manuschuore phelei duo.
49004023	Tomar aptabuor monanot puribotton goro.
49004024	Soittio dharmigkandoi ar pobitrogandoi Itchioro doge sristi gora oiede nuo Manuschuore habor ure para uro.
49004025	Senottei, mijie hodagani bad dinei, “prottiek jone tar nijor paralliegundoi soittio hoda hok.” Haron ami ek jone oinnio jonor onggo.
49004026	“Rak tullio, hintu pab no gorsio.” Belan dubegoi song huttieri gori no thagkuo.
49004027	Diabolareδ jaga no duo.
49004028	Je sur gorsie, the sur no gorog ar. Hintu jien gom sien the tar nijor adtoi hadoni gorog, jene jiber dorkar lage sibiere the huno ekkan jinij dibar thai para.
49004029	Tomar muonittun aw-joba bhaz no nigileio. Hintu dorkaro onusare gorei tulibartei jei hodagani gom bana sieni hoio jene, suniegunor monot doye eje.
49004030	Itchioro Pobitro Aptabuore monot dug lagei no duo. Muktir dinnuottei the tomare marga di thoie.
49004031	Beg tidiegani, huttierigani, rakkani, rage ro sara-sarigani, sorja-sorjiganir loge beg heja-hejchani ekkobare bad duo.
49004032	Doye ar norom mondoi ek jone oinnio jonore doye gora-gori gorsio. Ar Kristo iot Itchiore tomare hema dede dogkie gori, hema diedi gorsio.
49005001	Senottei, Itchioror agojor puo ijebe Itchioro leik adeie oio.
49005002	Kristoi amare hos peinei tare the amattei dede dogkie gori hospanaganot sollio. Itchioro sidu thumbas jinij obartei tare the dali dogkie gori gojeie.
49005003	Hintu sadhu manuschunor lak noi hinottei, shanda ham, ar beg aw-pobitro bah, lubbo hamani tomar moiddie nango no thana dorkar.
49005004	Hajorchie hoda, murukko hoda, bojong sola-soli hoda, jieni lak noi sieni bad dinei, hujhi hoda huo-hi gorana dorkar.
49005005	Haron tumi ien hobor po jei, shanda goriettei, aw-pobitro manjiortei, ar mokti pujie, je lubbo gore sigunottei Itchioror ar Kristor rejjioganot huno odhihar nei.
49005006	Huno jone ortho sara hodaloi tomare no thogadok. Haron sienittei aw-manniogoriegunor ugure Itchioro rakkan eje.
49005007	Senottei tharar loge bhag loie no oio.
49005008	Haron eksomoi tumi andharot ela, hintu Probu iot ikkie tumi phor ola. Phoranor puo shaba dogkie gori solo.
49005009	Haron Aptar pholluo olode begkanit gom, dharmig, ar soittio.
49005010	Jieni Itchiore gojhi lobar lak sieni hobor peba.
49005011	Phol neie andharanor hamaniloi song no porsio, hintu sienit duj degei duo.
49005012	Haron thara gubone goronde sienir sombonde hobario lajor hoda.
49005013	Hintu jieni duj degei die oi, sieni phoranor darai phogodang gori die oi. Haron jiene phogodang gori de sien olode phoran.
49005014	Senottei, the hoi, “Ghum jotte sigun jago, morattun jiei uduo, sebeden Kristoi tomare phor dibo.”
49005015	Senottei, uijkare ado, murukko manjior dogkie gori noi hintu gyeni manjior dogkie gori ado.
49005016	Somoien gome hamot lago, haron dinun olakke bojong.
49005017	Senottei aw-gyen no oio. Hintu Probur ischiegan buji loio.
49005018	Shimie neie modtoi mattol no oio, hintu sei bodoli, Aptabuoloi boron oio.
49005019	Tomar ontoranit Probure gidodi baini goribartei baini gidtoi, hujhi hoda gidtoi, ar aptar gidtoi ek jone oinnio jonore hoio.
49005020	Amar Probu Jisu Kristor nange Bab Itchiorbuore begkanittei onsur hujhi hoda hoio.
49005021	Itchiorbuore dorenei ek jone oinnio jono tole thagkuo.
49005022	Oh neg-bola miliegun, Probur tole thagode dogkie gori tomar nijor negkunor tole thagkuo.
49005023	Kristo mondolibuor madabuo dogkie gori, negkuoio olode tar mogkuor madabuo. Kristo olode heyeganor Muktigoriebuo.
49005024	Senottei, mondolibuo jedogkie gori Kristor tole, thik sedogkie gori mogkuneio je huno iet tharar nijor negkunor tole thadok.
49005025	Oh mog-bola morodtun, Kristoi jedogkie gori hos peinei mondoli-buottei nijore-nije die, thik sedogkie gori, tomar mogkun hos pa poribo.
49005026	Kristoi mondolibuore pobitro goribartei paniloi dhonde dogkie gori hodaloi dhoinei poriskar gorsie.
49005027	Jene the mondolibuore tar nijor sidu oborug mondoli, dak halneie, bah shidie bah je huno sedogkie dak sara gori, pobitro ar duj di no parsie gori gojei di pare.
49005028	Senottei negkune tharar nijor heyegani hos pande dogkie gori tharar nijor mogkunore hospana osit. Je nijor mogkuore hos pai, the nijore-nije hos pai.
49005029	Haron huno jone honobar tar nijor heyegan bis degkie gori no thai. Hintu Probuie mondolibuore gorede dogkie gori, tar heyeganore boron pujuon ar lalon-palon gore.
49005030	Haron ami olongge tar heyeganor, tar saschanor, ar aarunor onggo.
49005031	Ei senottei, “Ek jone tar bab magunore phelei jeinei, tar mogkuoloi egottor obogoi, ar thara di jone ek heye obak.”
49005032	Ien ekkan oghur gubono hoda. Hintu mui hongorte sien olode Kristor ar mondolibuor hodagan.
49005033	Jei odosat, tumi prottiek jone tomar nijor mogkuore nijore-nije hos pode dogkie gori hos peio. Ar mogkuoio tar negkuore sorman gorog.
49006001	Oh puolok, ien thik hinottei, Probur iot tomar bab-ma hoda mannio.
49006002	Protiggia somot polim uguman olode ien, “Tor bab-magun sorman goris.
49006003	Jene tortei gom oi, ar pittimit tor aiu lamba oi para.”
49006004	Oh puo shaba-bola babpun, tomar puo shabagunore rak tulei no duo. Hintu tharare Probur dikkie-sigkieloi palei tullio.
49006005	Oh banidajigun, Kristore manode dogkie gori, dore girgireinei heyet doge ega mone tomar girojchunor hoda dorsio.
49006006	Manus hujhi gorie dogkie gori bana sog degat noi, hintu Kristor banidaji dogkie gori, ontoredi Itchioro ischie doge gorede dogkie gori hoda dorsio.
49006007	Gom mondoi Probure sebona goridie dogkie gori gorsio, manjiore goridie dogkie gori noi.
49006008	Ien hobor peio, banidaji ok bah shadin manus ok, je gom ham gorto sat, sei onusare the Probuttun pebo.
49006009	Oh girojchun, tumio tharare sedogkie bebohar gorsio. Tharare dor no lageio ar. Tomario nijor ekkuo Giroj sorgot age bili hobor peio. Tar iot huno eitzabor nei.
49006010	Oh bheilog bego sejot, Probur iot ar Probur hemodar bole doromoro awh.
49006011	Diabolarδ hu-buddhir pokke thori paro para, Itchiore die puro aittierani pini lo.
49006012	Haron ami lo ar eraloi boda-bodi no sei. Hintu hemodar biruddie, odhiharigunor biruddie, ei jugor andharanor sason-goriegunor biruddie, ar sorgot aptagunor bojongano biruddie ami boda-bodi sei.
49006013	Senottei, bojong dinnuot thiei thei paro para, puro Itchioro aittierani lo. Begkani jugol ole, tumi thori thei pariba.
49006014	Senottei, shokto gori thio. Soittiogan homorot homor pijoni bane para bano, ar dharmigkan buk patti bane para bano.
49006015	Shantir gom hoboran thengot pininei jugol oi thago.
49006016	Dujtobuor beg aguno shellun morei phelei di paro para, bischiaschanor ar bugot dede dalan lo. Sien olode begkanittun gunoran.
49006017	Muktigan rokkie gorede tokkie madat de para madat duo ar Aptabuor horgogan, jien Itchioro hoda, sien lo.
49006018	Aptabuo iot beg bor magana somot ar hujoli gori bor magana somot onsur bor mago. Thum song uijkare theinei, beg dhorjio somot, ar hujoli gori bor magana somot beg sadhu manuschunottei bor magi duo.
49006019	Gom hoboranor oghur gubonan mui janei di parong para, sahoj gori mor muon hulinei hoi parong para, hoi paribartei mortei bor magi duo.
49006020	Gom hoboranottei mui olungge shingolloi bondi oie raj dudtuo. Mor sahoj gori hona lak doge mui hoi parong para mortei bor magi duo.
49006021	Tumi mor hamani hobor pebartei ar mui hingori gorongor sieni tumi hobor pebartei, Tykhika tomare begkani janei dibogi. The olode mor agojor bhei ar Probur iot the ek jon bischias-joggio sebog.
49006022	Sei uddischuoi mui tare tomar idu padei duong, jene tumi mor hamani hobor po para, ar tomar monani buj pai para.
49006023	Bab Itchiorbuottun ar Probu Jisu Kristortun bheilogkuno idu shanti ar bischias somot hospanagan thok.
49006024	Jodepode gori jara amar Probu Jisu Kristore hos pan, sigunor begkuno ugure doyegan thok. Amen.
50001001	Ami Jisu Kristor banidajigun Paulaloi Timothi, Philippi sohorot agode Jisu Kristor beg sadhu manuschunore, mondoli murubbigunore ar lobiotgorie-gunore legir.
50001002	Amar Bab Itchior-buoi ar Probu Jisu Kristoi tomare doye ar shanti duok.
50001003	Mui tomare idot tulong bagene mor Itchiorbuore hujhi hoda hong.
50001004	Mui tomartei onsur bor magi duong bagene hujhi gori tomar begkunottei bor magi duong.
50001005	Polim dinnuottun duri ikkie song gom hoboranot tomar song pora-poriganottei mui hujhi hoda hong.
50001006	Mui bischias gorong jei Itchiorbuoi tomar iot gom ham arambo gorsie the Jisu Kristor dinnuo no ette thum goribuo.
50001007	Tumi mor ontorot ago hinottei, tomar begkunor sombonde mor ien edogkie gori sintie goranagan osit. Mui gom hoboranottei banan heleio, rokkiettei oleio ar shokto goranat oleio, doyeganot tumi olade begkune mor loge bhag peiegun.
50001008	Haron Jisu Kristor meyegandoi mui hodog tomare bhabong, Itchiorbuo olode mor shakki.
50001009	Tomar hospanagan, gyenan ar beg bujonagan bari jai para mui bor magi duong,
50001010	jene Jisu Kristor dinnuo song tumi uttom jinijchani porikkie sawh para, sorol mone thago para ar bejar no po para.
50001011	Haron Jisu Kristor darai Itchiore tomare dharmigo pholundoi boron gori thoie, Itchioror mohima ar baini obartei.
50001012	Bheilog tumi hobor pebartei mor ien mone hor jei mor jien ghodi jeie sien ajole gom hoboran prosar obartei.
50001013	Senottei goda raj-ghoro soinnioguno sidu ar oinnio begkuno sidu proman olode jei mui Kristortei banan heiong.
50001014	Mui banan heiong hinottei Probur iot bheilogkune begbhage sahoj peinei, no doreie gori doromoro oinei Itchioro hodagan ho dorsion.
50001015	Hoi ek jone hinsie mondoi ar jagulug tuli dibartei Kristore prosar goron. Hintu ek dagie gom monottun prosar goron.
50001016	Hoiek jon prosar gorie sorol mone noi, nijor labor ashai Kristor hoda prosar gorsion. mui banan heiongge sienot aro hosto barei dibartei tharar uddischuo elo.
50001017	Hintu onnio prosar goriegune nijor hospanattun prosar gorsion. Thara hobor pan, gom hoboran rokkie goribartei more thik gora oie.
50001018	Salen hi obo sei? Jengori odosat, gorette san gori ok bah jodepode gori ok Kristor hoda prosar oie hinottei mui hujhi oiong ar onsur hujhi om.
50001019	Mui hujhi ongge haronan olode tumi mortei bor magi denar phole ar Jisu Kristoi Apta denar phole mui shoran peim.
50001020	Mui shokto gori bischias gorong ar asha gorong, mui lajot portung noi. Hintu mui onsur sahoj gorongge dogkie gori shokto sahojchoi, ikkieio mui heyedi morinei ok bah bajinei ok Kristore dangor gorinei degeidung.
50001021	Haron mortei, baji thanagan olode Kristor lab ar mori janagan mortei lab.
50001022	Hintu mui judi heyedi baji thele, sien obode mor hamano pholan. Mui hubon bei lom hobor no pang.
50001023	Haron dien jinije more sabi age. Kristor loge jebar mor baari asha age ar sien mortei bes gom obo.
50001024	Tobuio, mui heyedi baji thana tomartei dorkar.
50001025	Ar mor ienot shokto bischias age, mui hobor pang mui baji theim ar tomar unjolottei ar tomar bischiaschanit hujhi obartei mui baji theim.
50001026	Senottei, mui tomar idu aro eim hinottei mortei tomar hujhigan Jisu Kristo iot alajhala obo.
50001027	Noito, Jisu Kristor gom hoboranottei lobiot nit upojukto oi thago, sebeden mui judi tomare sah ejong, sunimbi. A no ole, mui no theleio tumi ega mone ega sintie gom hoboranottei eksomare shokto gori hosto goror bili mui tomar hamani sombonde sunim.
50001028	Tomare biruddi goronde sigunore no doreo. Sien olode thara nas obakke promanan. Hintu tomartei ole sien Itchiorottun muktigano promanan.
50001029	Haron Kristor nange tomare die oiede, tumi bana tare bischias gorana noi, hintu tar nange tumi hostoio goro na.
50001030	Mor jei jagulugkan tomareo sei jagulakkan. Mui jagulugot porsiongge tumi degkuo ar ikkieio mui jagulugot agongge sunor.
50002001	Senottei, Kristor iot judi tomar utsaho thai, hospanar darai shantonagan thai, Aptabuoloi song pora-pori thai, hos pa-pi thai, ar sit puro-puri thai,
50002002	ekkui mon oinei, ekkui hospanaloi, ega mone ega sintie mor hujhigan purei duo.
50002003	Aguttie monandoi bah phodaniloi hitchu no gorsio. Hintu apta doye monandoi ek jone aro ek jonore sorman gora-gori gorsio.
50002004	Prottiek jone bana nijor labpan no togeinei, hintu oinnio jonor labpanio togei duo.
50002005	Jisu Kristor monan tomareo tha poribo.
50002006	The Itchioro allien-gandoi elo. Itchiorloi soman obartei sien hari lona mone no gore.
50002007	Hintu the nije tar shobidieni gorinei, banidaji dogkie oinei the shadoron manjior dogkie oinei ejchie.
50002008	Ar manjior dogkie oinei the nije niroit oie. More song hoda manie oinei kroschanotio morsiegi.
50002009	Senottei, Itchiore tare shanggadik mohima gorinei tare ekkan nang thoi die, jien begkunor nanganittun dangor.
50002010	Senottei, Jisur nange sorgot, pittimir ar norogot agonde begkune adhu pari pebak.
50002011	Ar prottiek manjior jilaniloi Jisu Kristo Probu bili haam heinei Bab Itchiorore baini goribak.
50002012	Senottei, Oh mor agojorun, bana mor mujungot noi hintu mor abitjoneio onsur mor hoda tumi mano hinottei, dore girgirei-girgirei tomar nijor muktigan hameio.
50002013	Haron Itchiore tomar iot tar ischie doge ar the gom paidie doge ham gora bajei de.
50002014	No budbudeie gori ar torga-torgi no gorsie gori begkani goro,
50002015	jene tumi duj di no parsie ar hoti no gorsie oinei, ei bojong ar pabi jugkuot duj di no parsie oinei Itchioro puo awh para. Tumi tharar moiddie songsarot potpottie thara dogkie joliba.
50002016	Mui magana magana no adong bah hadoni no gorong bili Kristor dinnuot mui hujhi ong para Jibonor hodagan shokto gori dori thago.
50002017	oi, judio more haidie jinij dali pujot duonde dogkie gori dileio ar tomar Bischiasor hamot lagei dileio, mui hujhi ar mui tomar begkuno ugure hujhi.
50002018	Thik sedogkie gori, tumio hujhi oinei mor ugure hujhi awh.
50002019	Probu Jisur iot mor asha age jei mui tomar sombonde hobor pebartei Timothire tomar idu jhadi gori padei dim, jene mui tomar obostani hobor phele, mor utsaho bare.
50002020	Haron Timothi dogkie tomar sombonde gome-dalei sintie gorie mor huno jon nei.
50002021	Jisu Kristor hamanir sintie no gorinei, begkune nijor sintie goron.
50002022	Hintu tumi tar sorittrogan proman peio. Haron gom hoboranot the babo loge puoi ham gorede dogkie gori ham gorsie.
50002023	Senottei mor hi oi seinei, mui tare jhadi gori tomar idu padei dim.
50002024	Probu iot mor asha age, mui nijeio jhadi gori tomar idu eim.
50002025	Hintu mui mone gorong, Epaphroditare tomar idu padei dena dorkar. The mor bhei, eksomare ham gorie ar mor loge eksomare soinnior ham gorie. The olode tomar hoborbuo ar mor dorkarieni gori diebuo.
50002026	The tomar begkunore dhap gori-gori age. The aw-sug oie bili tumi suinnio hinottei the sintiet porsie.
50002027	Haron the aw-sug oinei perai moribar oie. Hintu Itchiore tare doye gorsie, bana tare noi, moreio, a no ole mor mono dugo ugure dug olun.
50002028	Senottei bes mui tare aghos gori padei dilung, jene tumi tare degilie hujhi awh para ar mui hom mono dugot no thang para.
50002029	Senottei Probu iot tare hujhi gori gojhi loio, ar tar dogkie manjiore sorman gorsio.
50002030	Haron the tar jibonan jotton no gorinei, the mor pokke tomar bagi haman gori didede Kristor hamanottei the perai moribar oie.
50003001	Bheilog sejot, Probur iot hujhi awh. Ekkan hoda mui tomare legana ageibar noi, hintu ien tomartei rokkier hoda.
50003002	Huguro dogkie manuschunor pokke, dujto hamgoriegunor pokke ar sundu-sam habonde sigunor pokke uijkare thagkuo.
50003003	Haron ami jigune Itchioro Aptabuo iot Itchior tobona gori, Jisu Kristor iot hujhi oi ar manjior sestagan bischias no gori, ami olongge ajol sundu-sam happiegun.
50003004	Judi mui manjior sestaganot bischias gori parong, huno jone judi mone gore jei the manjior sestagan bischias gore, mor tartun bes bischias thebo.
50003005	Attio dinot more sundu-sam habidie oie, mui Israelo bongso, mui Benjamin goja, mui Hebru jadottun Hebru. Niomano doge mui Pharisi.
50003006	Utsaho sombonde ole mui mondoli manuschun uttiesar gorsiong, Niomo onusare dharmigo sombonde ole, mui duj sara.
50003007	Hintu mortei lab obode jinijchani, Kristor nange sieni areiong bili mui mone gorong.
50003008	Jodepode gori jinijchani moillio neie bili mui mone gorong. Haron mor Probu Jisu Kristore hobor pana olode begottun moillioban. Mui tartei begkani areiong, ar mui sieni phelei die jinij mone gorong, jene mui Kristore pang para.
50003009	Kristor iot more dega jai para, mui sieni phelei die jinij mone gorong. Niomo doge mor dharmigkan nei, hintu mor dharmigkan olode Kristore bischias gorinei Bischiasor darai Itchiorbuottun ejchie.
50003010	Mui tare hobor pang para, the jiei uduonagano hemodagan hobor pang para, tar hostoganit ar tar moranaganot bhag pang para,
50003011	jene je huno prokare morattun jiei uduonaganot mui phagot somang para.
50003012	Mui honatto peiong, bah puripunnuo oiong bili noi, hintu jienottei Jisu Kristo more dhori agede sienot muio dhori pang para hemi jangor.
50003013	Bheilog, ejosong mui dhorsiong bili more mui mone no gorong. Hintu ekkan jinij mui mone gorong, bidi jeie hodagani monot no rageinei, mujunggendi agede sienit lungonagoi.
50003014	Jisu Kristo iot, sorgot Itchioro dagana poris-karigan pebartei mui hemi jangor.
50003015	Senottei, jedog jon bujunor oiei ien sintie gori, tumi oinniota bhabilie Itchiore sieno tomare degeibo.
50003016	Ami jittur song lungilonggi, ega mone ega sittiei sei doge soli.
50003017	Bheilog, leik adeibartei ami jeannie udahoron tomare diei, sigunore seinei mor leik ado.
50003018	Haron onek jon Kristor kroschanor sottru oinei solon. Sienor sombonde mui nitto tomare hoiong, ar ikkieio mui hani-hani hongor.
50003019	Tharar seschan olode nas ona. Pedtuo olode tharar Itchior. Thara no lajande hamanit bar goron ar tharar songsaro jinijchani mone hoi.
50003020	Hintu amar nagorigkan olode sorgot. Mukti gorie Probu Jisu Kristo sorgottun ebo, ar ami tare dhap gori-gori barsei agi.
50003021	The amar poji jaidie heyegani tar oborug heyegano dogkie gori bodoli dibogi. Begkani tar nijor iot jidi parede hemodagandoi the sien gori dibogi.
50004001	Oh mor agojor ar dhap gori-gori agongge bheilogkun, tumi olade mor hujhigan ar raj-tukkuo. Senottei, Oh mor agojor bheilogkun, Probur iot shokto gori thiei thago.
50004002	Euodiare ar Syntychiare Probur iot ek mon obartei mui hujoli gorongor.
50004003	Tui olede morloi somora-somori eksomare ham gorie. Gom hoboranot mor loge hadoni gorsie miliegunore tuio sahajjio goribartei mui toreio hujoli gorongor. Thara Klement ar oinniogunor somot mor somare ham gorsion. Tharar nangani jibono boibuot age.
50004004	Probur iot onsur hujhi oio. Aro mui hongor hujhi oio.
50004005	Tumi shanto sil bili begkune hobor padok. Probu hai agegi.
50004006	Huno hitchuttei sidie no gorsio. Hintu tomar begkanit bor maginei ar hujoli gorinei hujhi hoda honar somot tumi begkune Itchiorottun hujoli gorinei mago.
50004007	Jisu Kristor darai Itchioro shantigan jiene begkunottun bes bujie, siene tomar ontorani ar monani rokkie gori dibo.
50004008	Sejot bheilog, ienir sombonde bhabi sawh: huboni soittio, huboni sormanio, huboni niai, huboni sudduo, hubonie mon hujhi gori de, ar huboni manjie gom hon. Judi huno ekkan uttom jinij thai, ar judi huno ekkan baini goribar jinij thai, sienir sombonde sintie gorsio.
50004009	Jieni mortun tumi sigko, jienittun peio, jieni tumi mortun suinnio ar mor iot tumi degkuo, sieni gorsio. Ar shanti dede Itchiorbuo tomar loge thebo.
50004010	Onek din porendi tumi aro mortei sidie goror. Senottei, Probu iot mui shanggadik hujhi olung. Tumi mortei sintie gori theleio, hintu tumi more sahajjio goribar sujuk no elo.
50004011	Mor hi-hi lager bili mui no hongor. Haron mui jengori thedung sat, mono
50004012	Gorib ar thagoie gori thana mui thei janong. Jidu odosat ar je huno iet, alajhalat ok bah nirie tittiet ok, ped boron haana ar ped pora haana mui akkieng oiong.
50004013	More bol dede Kristor darai mui begkani gori parong.
50004014	Tobuio, tumi mor hostogani bhag lola hinottei egahora gom oie.
50004015	Tumi Philippi hulliegune hobor po, gom hoboranor arambot mui Makidonia dejottun ejchuongge lokkene, tumi bade huno mondolie morloi die-di no goron.
50004016	Haron mui thessalonika sohorot thagke tumi more ek bar sahajjio di padeio. Tumi mor dorkarienittei onek bar sahajjio dipadela.
50004017	Boksit pebar mor dhap nei, hintu mui sangge tumi alajhala gori tomar nange phol joma gorta.
50004018	Mor begkani alajhala gori age. Epaphroditar ade tumi more padeiode jinijchani mui peinei mor lagede sieni begkani pelung. Tumi padeiode jinijchani tumbas jinij, gojhi lobar joggio ar Itchiorottun monot pore.
50004019	Jisu Kristor darai tar oborugkanot dhon agede onusare tomar beg dorkarieni mor Itchiorbuoi tomare dibo.
50004020	Amar Bab Itchiorbuor umore-umor mohima ok. Amen.
50004021	Jisu Kristo iot beg sadhu manuschunore salam janeio. Mor loge agonde bheilogkune tomare salam janadon.
50004022	Beg sadhu manuschune, bes gori, Kaisaror ghorot thande sigune tomare salam janadon.
50004023	Amar Probu Jisu Kristor doyegan tomar begkuno ugure thok. Amen.
51001001	Mui Paula, Itchioro ischie doge Jisu Kristor ek jon apostol. Ar amar bhei Timothi mor loge age.
51001002	Kolosa sohorot agode sadhu manuschunore ar Kristor bischias-joggio bheilogkunore legir. Amar Bab Itchiorbuoi ar Probu Jisu Kristoi tomare doye ar shanti dedog.
51001003	Tomartei onsur bor magi dede, amar Probu Jisu Kristor Bab Itchiorbuore ami hujhi hoda hoi.
51001004	Haron Jisu Kristo iot tomar bischiaschan ar beg sadhu manuschunottei tomar hospanagan ami suinniei.
51001005	Sei ashagan tomartei sorgot thoidie oie hinottei, gom hoborano soittio hodagan tumi agendi suinnio.
51001006	Sei gom hoboran goda songsarot ejchiede doge tomar idu ejchie. Jei dinnuot tumi sien suinnio ar soittioganot Itchioro doyegan hobor peio, sokkenettun duri songsarot jedogkie phol der, sedogkie gori tomar moiddieo phol der.
51001007	Amar agojor somarsie sagorsie, Epaphrajottun tumi sigkuode doge sien oi. The olode tomar pokkettei Kristor bischias-joggio sebog.
51001008	Theo Aptabuo iot tomar hospanagan amare janei diegi.
51001009	Ei senottei, amio sien suinni-eidie dinnuottun duri tomartei bor magi dena thum no gori, beg gyenanit ar aptar bujonaganor darai tumi tar ischieganor gyenandoi boron aw para.
51001010	Jene tumi Probur lak ijebe solo, tare puro gori hujhi goro, prottiek gom hamot phola phol awh, ar Itchioro gyenan tomar bare para.
51001011	Tar oborug hemodagano doge, beg bolendi tomare shokto gore para, hujhi gori beg dhorjio ar lamba hosto suei paro para.
51001012	Phoranot amare sadhu manuschunor somare odhiharigan bhag peie obar lak goreiede Babore hujhi hoda hoi.
51001013	Haron the amare andharano hemodaganottun uddhar gorinei, tar agojor Puobuor rejjioganot amare par goreie.
51001014	Tar iot, tar loganor darai amare hinnie. Sien olode pabor hemagan.
51001015	Puobuo olode no degkie Itchiorbuor subhibuo, ar beg sristiganir madabuo.
51001016	Haron dega jaidie jinij bah dega no jaidie jinij, pittimit ok bah sorgot ok tar darai beg jinijchani sristi gora oie. Singason ok bah sason goranagani ok, odhihari ok bah hemoda ok, beg jinijchani tar darai ar tartei sristi gora oie.
51001017	The beg jinijchanir agendi elo, ar tar iot beg jinijchani eksomare dhori age.
51001018	Kristo olode heye-ganor madabuo ar heyegan olo mondoli. Beg jinijchanir ugure the polimmuo obartei the olode arambogan, morattun polim jormeiebuo.
51001019	Haron siendoi Babe hujhi oiede jei, tar iot beg puripunnuogani thedo.
51001020	Tar darai beg jinijchani tar idu milie-mili odo. Sorgo jinijchani ok bah pittimir jinijchani ok tar darai, tar Krosor lo darai shanti gori die.
51001021	Ar tumi, dujto hamor darai monedi eksomoi barendi manus ar sottru ela, tobuio the ikkie milie-mili gori dilo.
51001022	Sien the tar heyedi morinei, tar mujungot the tomare pobitro, duj sara, ar duj di no pas gori gojei dilo.
51001023	Tumi judi shokto ar gobhin gori bischiaschanot thago, ar tumi suinniode gom hoborano ashaganottun no lorsie gori thago. Jei gom hoboran Itchiore debar tole prottiek sristi gorsie manuschunore janei die oie, sei gom hoborano sebokkuo olungge mui Paula.
51001024	Mui tomartei hosto peiongge sienot mui hujhi. Tar heyegano pokke, jien olode mondoli, Kristor bagi hostogani mor heyet purei-lung.
51001025	Itchioro hodagan purei dibartei, Itchiorbuottun tomartei mui peiongge daetto hamano doge mui sagorsie olung.
51001026	Jei oghur gubonan juge-juge ar piri bagene lugei elo, sien ikkie tar sadhu manuschuno idu phogo-dang gora oie.
51001027	Tharar sidu Be-jadtuno moiddie ei oghur gubonano oborug dhonan janei dibartei Itchiorottun mone hoie. Oghur gubonan olode: Tomar iot Kristo olode ashaganor obo-rugkan.
51001028	Prottiek jonore beg gyenanit uij dinei ar prottiek jonore sigeinei ami tar sombonde prosar gori, jene prottiek jon Kristo Jisu iot puripunnuo gori gojei di pari.
51001029	Sei uddischuoi muio hadoni gorsiong. Tar hamo onusare the mor iot hemodaloi ham gorer.
51002001	Haron mui sangge tumi hobor peda jei tomartei, Laodicea sohorot agonde sigunottei ar mor muon no degonde sigunotteio mui hi dangor jagulugot porsiong.
51002002	Tharar monanit sahoj oi para, hospanaganot egottor oinei, buj-onaganot beg dhonani hamakkai peinei, Babor ar Kristor duo jonor sombonde Itchioro oghur gubono gyenan pebartei mui jagulugot porsiong.
51002003	Kristor siot beg bujonar ar gyenor bujonar dhonani lugei age.
51002004	Ei hodagani mui hongorte, jene huno jone bhuleie hodaloi tomare no thogan para.
51002005	Haron mui heyedi no theleio, mui tomar loge aptadi agong. Tumi doge doge solor ar Kristo iot tomar bischiaschan shokto bili sebartei mui baari hujhi.
51002006	Senottei, Jisu Kristore Probu bili tumi loiode doge, tar iot tumi ado.
51002007	Tar siot tumi singor hubinei gorei uttuo ar tomare sigie oiede doge bischiasot shokto oio ar hujhi hoda hoi-hoi pelangbei jeio.
51002008	Uijkar oio, adikkie je huno jone manjior gyeno hodaloi ar ortho sara hodaloi tomare thogeibak. Sei hodagani manjior dosturo doge, ar songsaror polim sigkier doge, Kristor doge noi.
51002009	Haron tar iot Itchior onar beg puripunnuogan heyedi thai.
51002010	Ar tumi tar iot puripunnuo oio. The olode beg sasonanir ar hemodaganir madabuo.
51002011	Tar iot tumio sundu-sam habpie oio. Hintu sei sundu-sam habanagan manjio adtoi noi hintu heyeganottun pabpani duoi dena darai oie. Ei sundu-sam habanagan Kristo darai gora oie.
51002012	Baptismaganot tumi tar loge gara jeio, ar tare morattun jiei tulliede Itchiorbuor hemodar darai tomareo Bischiasor darai jiei tulo oie.
51002013	Tumi tomar oboradtanit ar tomar heyet sundu-sam no happieganot mora ela, hintu the tomar beg oboradtani hema dinei the tar loge tomareo jeda goreie.
51002014	Amar biruddie legkie elode horjo legagani puji phelei die, jien amar be-pokko. Sien the kroschanot joloi mari dinei amar podtanottun shorei nejeie.
51002015	Sasonani ar hemodagani jhorei dinei, the tharare hulomela gori degeie, ar ienot the tharar ugure jittie.
51002016	Senottei, haana-danar sombonde ok bah utchobor som-bonde ok, nuo sananor sombonde ok bah Jireni dinnuor sombonde ok, tomare hono jone bijier no gortok.
51002017	Sieni olode ebode jinijchanir shaba, hintu ajol jinijchan olode Kristo.
51002018	Ek dagi manjie niroit hujhi oinei ar sorgo-dud tobona goron. Sedogkie gorinei tomar poriskarigan no po para tomare huno jone no thogadok. Sedogkie manjie no degkie jinij nirbhor gorinei, heyet monandoi brithai gori phodani goron.
51002019	Sedogkie manjie madabuot dhori no than. Madabuottun heyegan dangor oi, Itchiorbuottun bare hinottei, goda heyegan dhori theinei, joragundoi ar rokkundoi dhori thai.
51002020	Senottei, songsaror polim sigkie onusare tumi judi Kristor loge mori jo, hittei songsarot theinei tumi nije Niomor tole theba para pang?
51002021	“No sueis, sagi no seis, ar no dhoris.”
51002022	Ieni olode manjie ugum ar sigkie doge baneie niom. Senottei, sei jinijchani manjior hamot lagele, nosto oijai.
51002023	Sei jinijchani nije baneie dhormot degte gyeni lage. Niroit ona ar heyeganore olib gorana, hintu heyegano pabpanir pokke sieni hitchu lab nei.
51003001	Senottei, tomare judi Kristor loge jiei tulo oi, salen, Itchioro denedi Kristoi boji agede siot uguro jinijchani togo.
51003002	Pittimir jinijchanir ugure noi, uguro jinijchanir sombonde sintie gorsio.
51003003	Haron tumi morsio, ar tomar jibonani Itchioro iot Kristor loge lugei age.
51003004	Kristo, je amar jibonan jokkene dega dibogi, sebeden tumio tar loge mohimaganot dega dibagi.
51003005	Senottei, tomar songsarik onggogani morei pelo. Sieni olode: shanda ham, aw-pobitro, lub shamelei no parsie, bojong mon, ar lubbo. Ieni mokti pujuonaloi ekkui.
51003006	Ei jinijchanittei Itchiorbuor rakkan aw-mannio manjior ugure ejer.
51003007	Agendi tumi tharar loge elade lokkene ei jinijchaniloi roio.
51003008	Hintu tumi ikkie ieni begkani phelei die poribo: rak, huttieri, goba-gubi, sorja-sorji, ar tomar muottun bojong hodagani.
51003009	Puron akkolan tar haman somot phelluo hinottei, gal mada-madi no gorsio.
51003010	Sristi goriebuor subhibuo doge nuo goraidie gyenanor nuo Manuschuore uri loio.
51003011	Siot Grikio noi, Judaio noi, sundu-sam happie ar no happie noi, barendi manuschio noi, Scythia jadio noi, banidaji bah shadin manuschio noi, hintu Kristo olode begkunottei ar begkanittei.
51003012	Senottei, Itchiore bei tullie ijebe tumi olade pobitro ar Itchiore hos peiegun. Sit puro-puri, doye-meye, niroit, nombro, dhorjiogani habor ure para uro.
51003013	Gai suo-sui, ar hema die-di gorsio, judio ek jonor aro ek jonor biruddie abitti thai, Kristoi tomare hema dede dogkie gori tomareo hema diedi gora poribo.
51003014	Hintu ieni begkanir ugure hospanagan rageio, sien olode puripunnuoganor bannuo.
51003015	Itchioro shantigane tomar ontoranit sason gorog, jienot tomareio ek heyet daga oie. Hujhi hoda hoio.
51003016	Beg gyenanit Kristor hodagan tomar iot alajhala gori thok. Baini gidodi, kirtonedi, ar aptar gidodi ek jone ek jonore shigie-shigi ar uschoni tuli diedi gorsio. Doyegandoi Probure tomar ontorot gei duo.
51003017	Jien hoda sat bah jien gorta sat, Probu Jisur nange begkani gorsio. Tar nange Bab Itchiorbuore hujhi hoda hoio.
51003018	Mogkun, Probur iot osit mote tomar nijor negkunor odinot tole theio.
51003019	Negkun, tomar mogkun hos peio. Thararloi horab bebohar no gorsio.
51003020	Puolok, je huno iet tomar bab-ma hoda dorsio. Haron siendoi Probuie hujhi oi.
51003021	Babpun, tomarpuo-shabagunore rak tulei no duo adikkie sieniloi thara bhito obak.
51003022	Banidajigun, je huno iet tomar Munischioro girojchuno hoda dorsio. Bana sog suot degat noi, manus hujhi gorie ijebe noi, hintu Itchiorore bhokti gorinei monedi gorsio.
51003023	Tumi jien goro, manjior ijebe noi hintu Probur ijebe mone-prane goro.
51003024	Hobor peio jei Probu Kristore sebona goror hinottei, odhiharor poriskarigan Probuttun peba.
51003025	Hintu je onnio ham gore, the tar hamor puriskar pebo. Siot huno eitzabor nei.
51004001	Girojchun, tomartuno sorgot ek jon giroj age bili hobor peinei, tomar banidajigunore jien dibar osit ar lak, sien duo.
51004002	Uij rageinei hujhi hoda honar somot, eksottie ega mone bor magkuo.
51004003	Ekkui somoiot amatteio bor magi duo jene, Itchiore tar hodagan ami phogodang gori pari para amare pod huli de. Kristor oghur gubonan hoi pari para bor magi duo, sienottei muio shingolloi bondi oi agong.
51004004	Mui hobar osit doge janei di parong para bor magi duo.
51004005	Barendi sigunor mujungot gyeni ijebe sollio. Sujukkan hini lo.
51004006	Doyegan somot hoda hoio. Nundoi suot gorede dogkie gori hoda suot gorsio jene prottiek jonore osit mote hingori uttor diepore hobor po daw.
51004007	Tykhika tomare mor sombonde begkani hobo. The olode mor agojor bhei, bischias-joggio sebog ar Probur iot song somarsie sagorsie.
51004008	Ei senottei mui tare tomar idu dipadangor, jene the tomar obostani hobor pai para ar tomar ontorani shantona gori degi para.
51004009	Tar somare Onesimareio padeilung. Theio ek jon bischias-joggio agojor bhei, ar tomar dolor manus. Idu hi-hi awr, sieni thara tomare hobakki.
51004010	Eksomare jiel hadie, Aris-tarkaio tomare salam janar. Barnabar bhei, Markaio tomare salam janar. Tomartei mui tar ade tar sombonde upodes di padangor. The ele tare patturu-turu janeio.
51004011	Justa honde Jisuio tomare salam janar. Igun olakke Itchioro rejjioganottei sundu-sam happier moiddie bana mor eksomare ham gorie. Thara more shantona duon.
51004012	Epaphrase tomare salam janar. The olode ek jon tomar dolor manus ar Kristor banidaji. The tomartei onsur hadoni gori-gori bor magi de, jene tumi Itchioro ischieganot puripunnuo ar hamakkai puro aw para.
51004013	Tomartei tar baari dab age bili mui tar sombonde shakki duonggi jei, Laodicea ar Hierapolis sohoranit agonde sigunotteio tar baari dab age.
51004014	Amar agojor Daktor Lukaloi Dema tomare salam janadon.
51004015	Laodicea sohorot agonde bheilogkunore salam janeio. Nymphare ar tar ghorot agede mondolibuore salam janeio.
51004016	Ei sidigan tomar moiddie madanar porendi, Laodicea mondoli-buotio madei duo para seio. Thik sedogkie gori, Laodiceattun duonde sidiganio tumi madeio.
51004017	Arkipasore hoio, “Probu iot peioschie sebogor haman purei paros para uij rageis.”
51004018	Mui Paula, mor nijor adedi ei salamigan legongor. Shingolloi bondi oi agongge sien monot tullio. Doyegan tomar ugure thok. Amen.
52001001	Ami, Paula, Silvana ar Timothi, thessalonika sohorot Bab Itchiorbuo iot ar Probu Jisu Kristo iot agode mondolibuore legir. Amar Bab Itchiorbuoi ar Probu Jisu Kristoi doyegan ar shantigan tomare dedog.
52001002	Ami bor magode tomar sombonde, amitomarbegkunottei Itchiorore onsur hujhi hoda hoi.
52001003	Amar Bab Itchiorbhuor mujungot tomar Bischiasor hamani, ar hospanar hamani ar amar Probu Jisu Kristor ugure dhorjio dorsie ashaganot no thameie gori monot tuli.
52001004	Agojor bheilogkun, ami hobor pei Itchiore tomare basoni gorsie.
52001005	Haron amar gomhoboran bana hodadi no eje. Hintu sien hemodadi, Pobitro Aptadi, ar onek asha dineio ejchie. Ami tomartei tomar moiddie hedogkie manus elong tumi hobor po.
52001006	Ar tumi amar ar Probur leik adeie oio hinottei, Itchioro hodagan onek hostoloi ar Pobitro Aptar hujhiloi tumi peio.
52001007	Senottei, goda Makidonia ar Akaia dejot bischias gorsionde sigunor begkunor sidu tumi udahoron ola.
52001008	Haron Probur hodagan prosar goranar sobdobuo tomartun bar oie. Bana Makidonia ar Akaia dejot noi, hintu beg jaganit sobdo oie. Tomar Itchioro bischiaschan jeie hinottei amar hitchu hobar no lage.
52001009	Haron thara nije prosar gorsion ami tomar idu hedogkie gori ejchiei ar tumi jeda ar soittio Itchiorbuore sebona goribartei hingori moktigunottun phirsio.
52001010	Ar morattun jiei tulliede tar Puobuo sorgottun ebode sibiere barsei ago. Sibie olode Jisu je amare ebode rakkanottun rokkie goriebuo.
52002001	Bheilog, tumi nije hobor po, ami tomar idu ejanaganbrithai no oi.
52002002	Tumi hobor po, Philippi sohorot ami onek hosto ar itjiot peiei. Hintu sedogkie jagulugkie sere Itchioro gom hoboran tomare janei dibartei Itchiorottei ami sahoj gorilong.
52002003	Haron amar uschoni tuli denagan bhulo-krome bah, aw-pobitrottun, bah thogabajittun no eje.
52002004	Hintu gom hoboran janei dibartei Itchiore amare thik gorsiede doge, manus hujhi goribartei noi, hintu amar ontorani shagi saidie Itchiorbuore hujhi goribartei phogodang gori.
52002005	Haron tumi hobor po, huno somoie ami bhulona hodaloi haror habor lubbo no gori. Itchiorbuo amar shakki age.
52002006	Kristor apostol ijebe ami dabi goribar theleio, tomartun ok oinnio jonottun ok manjie amare baini goribarteio no sei.
52002007	Hintu mabuoi tar puo shabagunore sedon seresta gorede dogkie gori, ami tomar idu niroit elong.
52002008	Senottei, sit puri-puri tomare ami dhap gori-gori agi. Tumi amar agojor oio hinottei, bana Itchioro gom hoboran tomare dibartei noi, hintu amar jibonanio tomare dibartei hujhi oio agi.
52002009	Haron bheilog, tomar monot age, ami ham gorsei ar hadoni gorsei. Itchioro gom hoboran tomare janei dede, ami tomar bugi no oi para ami reide-dine ham gorsei.
52002010	Ami hodog ega mone, sorol mone ar duj di no parsie gori tumi bischias gorsiode sigunor moiddie bebohar gorsei, tumi ar Itchiorbuo olode amar shakki.
52002011	Tumi hobor po, babe tar nijor puogunore gorede dogkie gori, ami tomare uschoni tuli diei, santona diei, ar tomare begkunore daetto diei.
52002012	Sieni ami tomartei gorsei, jene Itchiore tar nijor rejjioganot ar mohimaganot tomare dagkiede ienot upojukto gori soli paro.
52002013	Ei harone Itchiorore amio no thameie gori hujhi hoda hoi. Haronamattun suinniode Itchioro hodagan tumi gojhi loio. Manjior hoda dogkie gori tumi gojhi no lo, hintu Itchioro hodagan soittio bili gojhi loio, ar sien tomar moiddie je bischias gore the dolei ham gore.
52002014	Bheilog, tumi Judea dejot agonde Jisu Kristor Itchioro mondoligunor leik adeie ola. Haron thara jedogkie gori Judea dejigunor adot hosto peion, tumio tomar nijor dej hulliegunottun ekkui hosto pela.
52002015	Sigune Probu Jisure ar tharar nijor munigunore morei phellion, ar thara amare uttiesar gorilak. Thara Itchior hujhi no goron, ar thara olakke begkunor biruddi.
52002016	Be-jadtune mukti pan para hobartei amare badha duon. Sedogkie gori, onsur pabpaniloi boron on. Hintu rakkan tharar ugure shanggadik gori lungiegi.
52002017	Bheilog, hintu ami ikkie hanekkonottei tomartun pharok oi theleio, ontoredi pharok no oi. Ami tomar muoni sebartei shanggadik dhap oinei, siebes jur gorinei sesta gorir.
52002018	Senottei, ami tomar idu ebartei seiei. Mui, Paulaio bar bar ebar seiong, hintu Soitane amare badha die.
52002019	Haron amar ashagan, bah hujhigan, bah hujhir raj tukkuo hi? Amar Probu Jisu ebode lokkene tar mujungot tumi amar raj tuk obade noi ni?
52002020	Haron tumi olade amar bainigan ar hujhigan.
52003001	Senottei, ami sien soijjio gori no parinei ar, Athen sohorot amarepheleielegomobobili sintie gorilong.
52003002	Amar bhei Timothi, jibe Itchioro sagorsie ar Kristor gom hoboranot eksomare ham gorie, the tomare bischiaschanot shokto goribarlittei, ar tomar bischiaschano sombonde tomare utsaho diberlittei tare ami padei diei,
52003003	jene huno jone ei porikkieganir darai no loron. Haron tumi nije hobor po, ienottei amare thik gora oie.
52003004	Haron ami tomar loge elongge lokkene ami tomare akke duri hoiei jei ami hosto bhug goribong, ar sien godhi gelode ien tumi hobor po daw.
52003005	Ei senottei, mui thori thei no parinei ar, doreongge jei huno prokare porikkiegoriebuoi einei tomare porikkie goregi bili, ar amar hadonigan brithai oi bili, tomar bischiaschan hobor pebartei padei duong.
52003006	Hintu Timothi ikkie sittun amar idu ejchie. The tomar bischiaschanor, tomar hospana, ar amio tomare sebartei dhap gorittie dogkie gori, tumio amare onsur gome monot tulo ar amare sebartei shanggadik dhap goror bili gom hobor annie.
52003007	Bheilog, senottei tomar bischiaschanor darai amar beg hosto ar jagulugkanit ami mono shantona pelong.
52003008	Haron, tumi judi Probur iot shokto gori thago, ami baji thebong.
52003009	Ami tomartei Itchioro sidu hi hujhi hoda hobonggoi? Haron tomartei amar Itchiorbuor mujungot goda hujhiganiloi hujhi oi.
52003010	Ami tomar muoni degi para ar tomar bischiaschanot aw-puron agede sieni puripunnuo oi para, reide-dine ami shanggadik gori bor magir.
52003011	Amar Bab Itchiorbuoi the nije ar Probu Jisu Kristoi amare tomar idu amar podtan degei duok.
52003012	Ami tomare hos peide dogkie gori, tomar hospanagan ek jonottun ek jonor ar begkuno sidu Probuie barei duok ar alajhala gorei duok.
52003013	Sengori, amar Probu Jisu Kristoi tar beg sadhu manuschundoi ebode lokkene amar Bab Itchiorbuor mujungot, pobitroganot duj sara aw para, the tomar ontorani shokto gori degi.
52004001	Bheilog, sejot ami tomare Probu iot ujuleir, ar uschoni tuli dir, jene tumi Probu Jisu Kristo iot din din begottun bes bari jo para. Tumi amattun peiode sieniloi hingori sola poribo, ar Itchior hingori hujhi gore amattun tumi peiode doge ami tomare hujoli gorir.
52004002	Haron tumi hobor po Probu Jisur darai ami tomare hi ugum diei.
52004003	Ien Itchioro ischie jei tumi nokbhaj obartei shanda hamattun durot thago.
52004004	Tomar prottiek jone tar nijor heyegan hingori pobitro ar sorman gori domon gore hobor pa poribo.
52004005	Itchior hobor no peie Be-jadtuno dogkie sintie lubbot thana noi.
52004006	Huno jone tar bheibuore ei sombonde sujuk loinei tare no thogadok. Ami akke duri tomare uij diei ar hoiei, jei sienit begkanit hena ugureiebuo olode Probu.
52004007	Haron Itchiore amare aw-poriskar obartei no dage, hintu pobitro obartei dagkie.
52004008	Senottei, je ien no goje the manus no goje, hintu amare tar Pobitro Apta dede Itchiorbuore no goje.
52004009	Bheilogkun hospanar sombonde, ami tomare legibar dorkar nei. Haron ek jone oinnio jonore hos pebartei Itchiore tomare sigeie.
52004010	Makidonia rejjiot agonde beg bheilogkunore tumi jodepode gori hos po. Bheilog, hintu aro bes gori hos pebartei ami tomare ujuleir.
52004011	Ami tomare sigeidie doge tumi shanto sil gori thebartei, nijor haman mon dibartei, ar nijor adtoi ham goribartei ami tomare ugum dir,
52004012	jene, barendi agonde sigunor pokke tumi gome-dalei solo, ar tomar hitchu pora no obo.
52004013	Bheilog hintu ghum jeionde sigunor sombonde tumi aw-gyen obartei mui no sang. Anole, asha neidie sigunor dogkie tomar monot dug obo.
52004014	Haron ami bischias gori jei Jisu morinei aro jiei uttie. Senottei, Jisur iot ghum jeionde sigunoreo Itchiore tar loge anibo.
52004015	Senottei, Probur hodar darai ami ien tomare hor. Probuie ebode lokkene, bagi thebakke sigun, ami jigun baji thebong, ar ghum jeionde sigun somot akke ami jebong.
52004016	Haron Probuie the nije sorgottun lami ebode lokkene joi jogar poribo. Moha sorgo-dudtuoi ro saribo, ar Itchioro begolluo bajibo. Sebeden Kristo iot moragune akke jiei udibag.
52004017	Sei porendi, ami baji thebongge sigune, Probuie amare tharar somare megsagotgori tulibogoi. Sedogkie gori, ami Probur loge umore-umor thebonggoi.
52004018	Senottei, ei hodaganiloi shantona diedi gorsio.
52005001	Bheilog, hintu somoi ar oktor sombonde ole, mui tomare legibar dorkar nei.
52005002	Haron tumi nije gome-dalei hobor po jei, Probur dinnuo edogkie gori ebo, jene sur reidot ejon.
52005003	Manjie jokkene hobak, “Shanti ar rokkie age,” sebeden tokkanot tharar ugure dongso onagan ebo. Sien pedoli-milier guro oidie ped pirie oidie dogkie gori ebo. Ar thara sari jei no paribak.
52005004	Bheilog, hintu tumi daw andharot no ago. Senottei ei dinnuo suro dogkie gori tomar idu no lungibogi.
52005005	Tumi begkune phoro ar dinor manus. Ami reidor manus noi, andharo manuschio noi.
52005006	Senottei, oinnio jone ghum jande dogkie gori ghum no jebong. Hintu uijkare ar nijore-nije domon gori.
52005007	Haron jigune ghum jan thara reidot ghum jan, ar jigune mattol on thara reidot mattol on.
52005008	Hintu ami dinor manuschuno dogkie gori nijore-nije domon gori. Bischiaschan ar hospanagan buk patti dogkie gori bani, ar muktir ashagan tamar tokkie dogkie gori madat di.
52005009	Haron Itchiore amare rak tulibartei thik no gore, hintu amar Probu Jisu Kristor darai muktigan pebartei thik gorsie.
52005010	Jisu amattei morsiegidie olode jene, ami jagonot ok, ghumot ok, ami tar loge baji thebartei.
52005011	Senottei, tumio gorotte doge shantona diedi ar gorei tulo-tuli gorsio.
52005012	Bheilog, tomar moiddie hadoni goronde sigunore ar Probu iot tomare sejei nejande, ar uij duonde sigunore sorman goribartei ami tomare ujuleir.
52005013	Tharar hamo obodananittei hospanaganot tharare shanggadik gori sorman gorsio. Tomar moiddie shantiethago.
52005014	Bheilog, ami tomare ujuleir. Alsigunore uij duo, mon shoktogunore utsaho tuli duo. Durbol manuschunore bol duo, ar prottiek jondoi soijjio gorsio.
52005015	Harore bojonggoi hena uguro-uguri no gorsio. Tomartei ar begkunottei jien gom sien onsur loreio.
52005016	Onsur hujhi oio.
52005017	No jireie gori bor mago.
52005018	Begkanit hujhi hoda hoio. Haron Kristo iot tomartei sien Itchioro ischiegan.
52005019	Aptabuore aguno dogkie gori morei no phellio.
52005020	Muniguno hodagani bis no degkio.
52005021	Begkani porikkie gorsio, jien gom sien shokto gori dori thago.
52005022	Beg bojonganittun durot thagkuo.
52005023	Shanti Itchiorbuoi the nije tomare puro gori pobitro gorog. Ar amar Probu Jisu Kristo ebode lokkene tomar goda aptabuo, poranan, ar heyegan duj di no parsie gori ragei duok.
52005024	Tomare dagkiede sibie bischias-joggio ar sien goribuo.
52005025	Bheilog, amattei bor magi duo.
52005026	Beg bheilogkunore pobitro sumon dinei salam duo.
52005027	Ei sidigan beg pobitro bheilogkuno sidu madeibartei Probure shakki gori mui tore daetto dilung.
52005028	Amar Probu Jisu Kristor doyegan tomar loge thok. Amen
53001001	Ami Paula, Silvana ar Timothi, Bab Itchioro iot ar Probu Jisu Kristo iot agode thessalonika manuschunor mondolibuore legir.
53001002	Bab Itchiorbuoi ar Probu Jisu Kristoi tomare doye ar shanti dedok.
53001003	Bheilog, osit mode ami tomartei Itchiorore onsur hujhi hoda hona osit. Tomar bischiaschan shanggadik gori bari jar hinottei, prottiek jonor hospanagan, prottiek jonottei tomar prottiek jonor shanggadik gori barer.
53001004	Tomare uttiesar gorilie ar shanggadik hosto lagot phele, bischiaschandoi tumi sieni begkani thori thago hinottei, Itchioro mondoligunot ami nije tomartei bar gori.
53001005	Itchiore bijier gorede sieni soittio bili proman oi. Siendoi tomare Itchioro rejjioganot upojukto bili gona obo, jienottei tumio hosto por.
53001006	Tomare hosto lagande sigunore hosto denagan Itchioro pokke thik hinottei,
53001007	tomare hosto legile, Probu Jisu jokkene sorgottun tar shoktisali sorgo-dudtundoi dega dibogi sokkene the tomare amar somare jiren dibo.
53001008	Itchior hobor no pande sigunore, ar amar Probu Jisu Kristor gom hoboran no manonde sigunore the angie agundoi tharare hena ugureibogi.
53001009	Sigunore ononto nostogandoi sasti die obo. Probur mujungottun ar tar mohimar hemodaganottun pharok gora obo.
53001010	The jokkene sei Dinnuot ebo, tar sadhu manuschuno sidu mohima obartei ar tare bischas goronde sigunor sidu tare baini goribak, haron tomar moiddie amar shakkigan bischias gorsio.
53001011	Senottei, amio tomartei onsur bor magi dir, jene amar Itchiorbuoi tomare tar daganaganot upojukto gone para, ar tar ischie mote beg gomanit ar bischiaso hamanot hemodaloi puroi para.
53001012	Amar Probu Jisu Kristor nangan tomar moiddie baini goron para, ar tar iot ami tomare amar Itchiorbuor doyegano onusare ar Probu Jisu Kristor onusare baini gori para.
53002001	Bheilog, amar Probu Jisu Kristo ebode sombonde ar ami tar loge eksomare thubeibongge sombonde ami tomartun pujor gorir.
53002002	Probur dinnuo honatto ejchie bili tumi harai tomar monani jagulug no gorsio. Sei jagulugkan aptar darai, bah hodar darai bah, amattun sidi peiode dogkie darai ei pare.
53002003	Huno prokare manjie tomare no thogadok. Haron ieni ghodi no gele sei dinnuo edo noi. Akke manjie bischiaschan phelei dibag, pabi manuschuo dega dibogi, jibere dongso gora obo.
53002004	Manjie Itchior honde bah tobona goronde sienir begkanir ugure biruddie obo ar dangor holeibo. Senottei the nije Itchiorbuor mondirbuot Itchioro dogkie gori bojibogi ar nije Itchior bili degeibogi.
53002005	Mui tomar loge elungge lokkene mui tomare ei hodagani hoiongge tomar monot nei?
53002006	Ikkie tumi hobor pela, hie pabi Manuschuore dhori age jene the tar nijor somoie dega die oi.
53002007	Haron niom saraganor oghur gubonane honatto hamot lagi age. Tare dhori agede sibiere nejana no oi song pabi Manuschuore dhori thebo.
53002008	Sokkene Niom sarabuo dega dibogi, jibere Probuie boij goribuo. Probuie dega dilegi, Niom sarabuore tar muor bhappoi ar the ebode phorandoi tare dongso goribogi.
53002009	Soitannuor hamor onusare, beg hemodaloi, sinno hamboi ar mijie oborug hamboi sei niom sarabuo ebo.
53002010	Mukti obartei soittior hospanagan no lon hinottei, nas obakke sigunor moiddie beg be-dhormi thogana hamani goribogi.
53002011	Sei haronanottei Itchiore tharar sidu shokto bhul bischias padei dibo, jene thara mijiegan bischias jan para.
53002012	Soittiogan bischias no gorinei, hintu be-dhormienot gom pande sigunore senottei begkunore the sasti dibo.
53002013	Probuie hos peie bheilogkun, ami tomartei onsur Itchioro sidu hujhi hoda huo porer. Haron Aptabuoi nokbhaj gorinei, soittioganor bischiaso darai, mukti pebartei Itchiore tomare agottun duri bei loie.
53002014	Amar Probu Jisu Kristor mohimagan pebartei, the tomare amar gom hoborano darai dagkie.
53002015	Bheilog, senottei shokto gori thago. Ami tomare amar hodaloi ok amar sidiloi ok tomare sigei die oiede sigkiegan dori thago.
53002016	Nije amar Probu Jisu Kristoi, ar amare hos peinei amare ononto shantona dede amar Bab Itchiore doyer darai gom asha dedok.
53002017	Thara tomar ontoranit shantona dedok ar prottiek gom hodat ar hamot tomare shokto goron para.
53003001	Bheilog, sejot Probur hodagan jhadi gori shidie jaipara ar tumi baini gorsiode dogkie gori baini obartei, amattei bor magi duo.
53003002	Ulluo ar dujto manjiortun ami uddhar goribartei bor magi duo. Haron beg manuschunor bischiaschan nei.
53003003	Hintu Probu olode bischias-joggio. The tomare shokto goribuo ar dujtobuottun rokkie goribuo.
53003004	Probur iot tomar sombonde amar bischias age jei, ami tomare jien ugum di tumi goro ar goriba.
53003005	Probuie tomar ontorani Itchiorbuor hospanaganot ar Kristor dhorjioganot nejeibo.
53003006	Bheilog, amar Probu Jisu Kristor nange ami tomare ugum dir. Jei bheibuoi alsi gori sole, ar tumi amattun peiode dosturo doge no sole, tartun pharok oio.
53003007	Haron tumi nije hobor po tumi hingori amar doge solana osit. Ami tomar moiddie alsi gori no soli.
53003008	Ami haror pidie magana gori no hei, hintu ami tomar haror bugi no oi para, dine-reide hadoni gori-gori ham gorsei.
53003009	Amattun odhihar nei bili noi, hintu tumi amare hingori adeiba, ami nije tomar udahoron obartei ham gorsei.
53003010	Haron ami tomar loge elongge lokkeneio ami tomare ugum ien diei: Je ham no gore, the no hok.
53003011	Haron ami suinnieidie jei tomar moiddie alsi gori solon. Thara shobai ham no goron, hintu thara manjiore hamot thoschie lagan.
53003012	Jei manuschun edogkie, sigunore ami amar Probu Jisu Kristor nange darai ugum dir, ar ujuleir jei thara sube-sabe ham gortok ar nijor pidie hadok.
53003013	Bheilog, hintu tumi gom ham goranat bol-porsie no oio.
53003014	Ei sidiganot amar hodagani je no mane, sei manuschuore sinno rageio. The lajai para, tarloi song no porsio.
53003015	Tobuio, tare sottru bili no gonnio, hintu bhei ijebe uij duo.
53003016	Shanti Probuie the nije tomare je huno iet onsur shanti duok. Probuie tomar begkuno loge thok.
53003017	Mor beg sidiganit mui dostok duongge dogkie gori, mui Paulai mor nijor adtoi leginei tomare salam janeilung.
53003018	Amar Probu Jisu Kristor doyegan tomar begkuno ugure thok. Amen.
54001001	Mui Paula, amar Mukti gorie Itchiorbuor ugumo darai ar amar ashagan Probu Jisu Kristor ugumo darai mui olungge ek jon Jisu Kristor apostol.
54001002	Timothi, tui olede bischiaschanot mor soittio puo mui tore legongor. Amar Bab Itchiore ar amar Probu Jisu Kristoi tore doyegan, sitpuronagan ar shantigan dedok.
54001003	Makidonia dejot mui jangorte lokkene tui Ephesi sohorot thebartei mui tore hujoli gorsiong, jene ek dagie oinnio sigkie no duon para tui tharare ugum duos.
54001004	Sigunore tui ugum dis jene thara golpo ar aw-phurondi guttir hoda hando no goron para. Sienittun torga-torgi oi ar Bischiasor darai Itchioro daetto pa no jai.
54001005	Ugumano uddischuogan olode hospanagan. Sien ejede poriskar ontorottun, gom idie-ittanottun ar phagara sara bischiasottun.
54001006	Hoiek jone sieni tak no peinei, ortho sara hoda hobartei sienittun pazaradi jeion.
54001007	Dhormo niomo guruthagur obar dhap goron, hintu thara hi hon ar hi shokto gori janei duon sien thara no bujon.
54001008	Ami hobor pei, Nioman judi gome hamot lagele gom.
54001009	Ien ami hobor pei, Nioman dharmig manjiortei bana no oi, hintu ien olode niom saragunottei, ohongkarigunottei, Itchior- saragunottei, pabigunottei, aw-pobitrogunottei ar aw-dharmigunottei, bab-ma morei pelande sigunottei ar hungoriegunottei,
54001010	shanda goriegunottei, morode-morode ar miliei-miliei jur-jande sigunottei, manus bejiegunottei, gal madiegunottei, mijie-shobot heiegunottei, ar je huno ei gom sigkiegano biruddie sienittei.
54001011	Sei gom sigkiegan olode gom hoborano doge ami baini goridie Itchiorbuor mohimaganor sombonde Itchiore more sien gojei die.
54001012	Amar Probu Jisu Kristoi more hemoda die ar the more bischias-joggio bili mone gorsie hinottei, mui tare hujhi hoda hongor. mui ham goribartei the more thik gorsie.
54001013	Agendi, mui manjiore sorjeidung, hosto lageidung ar gortung. Mui hobor no pang ar bischias no gorong hinottei mui sieni gorsiong. Senottei Jisu Kristoi more doye gorsie.
54001014	Ar amar Probur doyegan, Jisu Kristor iot bischiaschan ar hospanagan somot mortei aw-phurondi gori age.
54001015	Ien ekkan bischias-joggio hoda ar begkunor manana lag: Jisu Kristo songsarot ejchiede pabigunore mukti goribartei, ar sigunor moiddie mui olungge begottun dangor pabibuo.
54001016	Ei senottei na mui doyegan peiongge jene Jisu Kristoi oghur sorjio-dorjiogani begottun dangor pabibuo ugure degei pare. Ononto jibon pebartei jigune tare bischias jene goribar oion, sigunottei sei hostogan olode ekkan nomuna.
54001017	Umore-umor song Raja, jibe no more, dega no jai ar bana the olode gyeni Itchior. Tar sorman ar mohima umore-umor song ok. Amen.
54001018	Oh put Timothi, agendi tor sombonde manjie muni dogkie gori hoi jeionde doge ien mui tore ugum duongor. Thara hoionde doge gom judduo gor.
54001019	Bischiaschan ar gom idie-ittan dori theinei judduo gor. Hoiek jone sieni bad duon hinottei tharar bischiaschan dubi jeie jahajo dogkie oie.
54001020	Sigunor moiddie olakke Hymenaloi Alexander. Itchiorore sorjana thara no shigon para, mui tharare Soitano adot gojei duong.
54002001	Senottei bego akke, mui tore hujoli gorongor: Beg manuschunottei magi dena, bor magi dena, hujoli gori bor magi dena ar begkunottei hujhi hoda hona.
54002002	Rajagunottei ar jigun odhiharot agon sigunottei bor magi dena jene ami shantie, beg bhokti ar mane-sormane juro gori thei pari.
54002003	Haron sien amar mukti gorie Itchiorbuor samne gom ar joggio.
54002004	Tartun mone hoidie beg manuschune mukti pedak ar begkune soittiogan gome-dalei hobor pedak.
54002005	Haron Itchior age bana ekkuo ar, Itchioro sere ar manjior sere ek jon Mil goridie age. Sibie olode manus Kristo Jisu.
54002006	The beg manuschunor muktir dam obartei tar nijor poranan die. Okto gori sien shakki oie.
54002007	Sienor sombonde mui ek jon prosar gorie ar apostol obartei Itchiore more thik gorsie. Kristo iot mui soittio hodagan hongor, gal no madongor. Bischiaschanot ar soittioganot Be-jadtunore sigkie die mui olungge.
54002008	Senottei mortun mone hoidie jagai jagai manjie pobitro ad alok gorinei, rak ar monot shiongshama nei gori bor magidak.
54002009	Thik sedogkie gori, mortun mone hoidie, milieguneo osit pojakkoi jogarsie ar moiddie gujoror gori shajidak. Sul seraban dinei ok, sona pinniei ok, mukto ok bah dami habor loi no shajidak.
54002010	Hintu gom hamendi shajidak. Itchioro pokke bhokti honde miliegunottei sien osit.
54002011	Begkani maninei miliegune sube-sabe shigodok.
54002012	Morodore sigeibartei ok, bah ek jon morodo ugure milier odhihar thana mui no manong. Hintu miliebuo sub ona osit.
54002013	Haron Itchiore Adamore akke baneie, sebeden the Evire.
54002014	Sabpuoi Adamore no thogai. Hintu Evire thogeinei niom bhonggo gora oie.
54002015	Tobuio miliegune puo phudeinei mukti pebak, judi thara bischiaschanot, hospanaganot ar pobitroganot nijore domon gorinei eksottie than.
54003001	Ien ekkan bischias-joggio hoda: Jadtun mondolir murubbi obar dhap thai, tar gom ham goribar dhap tha poribo.
54003002	Mondolir murubbibuo huno jone duj di no parsie uo poribo. The ek mokkie, nijore-nije domon gori parie, shantoshil, gom sorittro-bola, lobiot gorie, ar sigkie di pare para uo poribo.
54003003	The mod palonggie uo no poribo, ohongkari no gorsie, tengaδ lubbo no gorie, hintu nombro, hoschie no bajeie, ar lubbo no gorie uo poribo.
54003004	The tar nijor ghoran gome sason gori parie uo poribo. Tar puo-shabagune man gorinei tar hoda manon para uo poribo.
54003005	Haron ek jone judi tar nijor ghorbobuo sason gori no jane, hingori the Itchioro mondolibuo lobiot gori paribo?
54003006	The nuo-bischiasi no uo poribo, haron adikkie phodani gorinei sunibuoi gorsiede pabo bijieranot theo poribo.
54003007	Sei bara, barendi manuschunottunio tar gom nang tha poribo. A no le, the bodnamot porinei Diabolarδ idiganot bajibo.
54003008	Thik sedogkie gori, lobiot goriegunor manonio uo poribo. Thara be-jobannie, mod palonggie, ar tengaδ lubbo no gorie uo poribo.
54003009	Gom idie-ittoi bischiaschano ghur-gubonan rageie thara uo poribo.
54003010	Tharare akke porikkie gori seis. Tharare judi hitchu duj badei dibar no thai, sebeden thara lobiot gorede ham gori paribak.
54003011	Thik sedogkie gori, tharar mogkuno manonio uo poribo. Thara manjiore duj degeidie no odog. Thara nijore-nije domon gorie ar je huno iet bischias-joggio uo poribo.
54003012	Lobiotgoriegun ek mokkie uo poribo. Thara tharar puo-shabagun ar tharar ghorbogun gome sason-gorie uo poribo.
54003013	Haron jigune gome lobiot gorie ijebe ham gorsion, sigune gom podobi peion ar Jisu Kristo iot bischiaschanot onek sahoj peion.
54003014	Mui tor idu jhadi eim gori asha gori theleio, ei hodagani mui tore legongor.
54003015	Mui tor idu ette diri oi parong. Senottei, jeda Itchioro mondolibuot, jien soittiogano mur ham ar tola, sei Itchioro ghorbobuot tui nije hingori ham goribe hobor pas para mui tore legilung.
54003016	Ami haam hei oghur ghur bhoktigan oborug. “Itchior heyeloi dega diegi. The dharmig bili Aptabuoi phogodang gorsie. Sorgo-dude tare degkuon. Manjie Be-jadtuno sidu tar sombonde prosar gorsion. Tare oborug gori tuli neja oie.”
54004001	Aptabuoi bhangi horte, jeredi hoiek jone bischiaschan bad dinei, manjiore hu-podedi nejande debedagunore ar debo sigkieni mon dibag.
54004002	Siennie gori pharok oi jande manuschune gal madi-madi phagara goribak. Sedogkie manuschuno idie-ittan gorom luo dago dogkie.
54004003	Manjie lo-li obar thara mana goribak. Hoiekkani hebar jinij manjie no hebartei thara mana goribak. Itchiore sei hebar jinijchani sristi goridede jigune bischias goron ar soittiogan gome-dalei hobor pan, sigune hujhi hoda hoinei haan para.
54004004	Itchiore sristi gorsieni begkani gom. Senottei, hujhi hoda hoinei haana, phirei no dena.
54004005	Haron sieni Itchioro hoda darai ar bor magana darai pobitro gora oie.
54004006	Tui judi ei hodani bheilogkunore sigeis, tui Jisu Kristor gom sagorsie obe. Bischiaso hoda ar gom sigkie hoda tui gome-dalei dorsioschie sieniloi Itchiore tore paleibo.
54004007	Hintu purona be-dhormio golpo buro-miliegune honde sieni bad dis. Tui nijore-nije dharmig obar sa.
54004008	Haron heyeganore akkieng gorilie hom lab oi. Hintu dharmigkan begkanittei lab. Ienot, ei hale ar poro halottei jibono soittiogan age.
54004009	Ien ekkan bischias-joggio hoda, ar puro gori manana joggio.
54004010	Senottei na, ami dug-hosto gori ar manjie amare hinsie goron. Haron jeda Itchiorbuore ami bischias gori. The olode beg manuschunor Mukti gorie, bes gori jigune tare bischias goron.
54004011	Ei hodani ugum goris ar sigeis.
54004012	Tui gabursie bili jene huno jone tore nahaj no goron. Hintu hodat, beboharot, hospanat, aptat, bischiasot ar sudduo bischiasigunore deges.
54004013	Mui no ejong song, Sastro porei sunona, upodes dena ar sigkie dena mon dis.
54004014	Borjonnune tore ad tuli dinei, thara muni dogkie gori hoinei tui peioschie boran obohela no goris.
54004015	Sei hodani gome bhabi sa. Sienit tui lagi thak. Sebeden tui begkanit ujei jor bili bege degibak.
54004016	Tore tui hial rageis Tui sigeischie sieni eksottie gor. Tui judi ieni goros, tore tui rokkie goribe ar jigune tor hoda sunon, sigunoreo tui mukti goribe.
54005001	Buro manjiore no gubis. Hintu babo dogkie gori utsaho dis. Gabursiegunore bheio dogkie gori utsaho dis.
54005002	Hub sudduo mone gabur-miliegunore bono dogkie gori utsaho dis ar buro miliegunore ma dogkie gori utsaho dis.
54005003	Jei rani-miliegun jodepode rani-milie, sigunore sorman goris.
54005004	Hintu rani-miliebuor judi puo-shaba bah nadin than, ghorot akke pobitrogan degana shigodok. Ar tharar buro-burigunore sujodok. Haron siendoi Itchioror mon hujhi oi.
54005005	Jei miliebuo jodepode rani-milie ar ega-jhara, tar ashagan Itchioro iot. Reide-dine the hujoli gorinei bor magibo.
54005006	Hintu jei rani-miliebuo anondot thebo, the baji thagkeio mora.
54005007	Thara duj di no parsie on para, tui ei hodani ugum goris.
54005008	Hintu je tar nijor sodorsiegunore, bes gori tar nijor ghorbuogunore lobiot no gore, the tar bischiaschan phelei die ar the Aw-bischiasittuno horab.
54005009	Rani-milie heit bojor boios no ole ar bana ek negkie ole the rani-milie bili legkuo.
54005010	The gom ham gorsie gori hobor pa ole, puo-shaba dangor-digowl gorilie, aw-sin manjiore lobiot gorilie, sadhu manuschunore the theng dhoi dile, hosto pande manuschunore the sahajjio gorilie, ar je huno gom hamot the lagilie.
54005011	Gabursie rani-miliegunore no legkuo. Haronthararporantak-takkie ole, Kristor biruddie obo, sebeden neg lobar sebak.
54005012	Thara polim bischiaschan phelei duon hinottei, bijierot poribak.
54005013	Ieni badeio, thara alsi ona akkieng oion. Thara ghore-ghore beran. Alsigano badeio, thara gop duon ar manjiore hamot thoschie lagan. Thara jieni hobar osit noi sieni thara hon.
54005014	Senottei, mui mone gorong, tomar gabursie rani-miliegune neg lodok. Thara puo-shaba peinei ar ghor lobiot gortok. Biruddibuoi tharare duj di no pare para, tare sujuk no dedok.
54005015	Haron hoiekkuo rani-miliei honatto pharok oi jeinei soitano pune-pune jadon.
54005016	Judi huno bischiasi manjior bah milier rani-milie thele, thara sigunore paladok, jene thara mondolibuor bhar no on para. Sebeden mondolibuoi jigun jodepode rani-milie sigunore sei paribo.
54005017	Jei borjonnune prosar goranat ar sigeinat hosto goron ar gome lobiot goron, sigunore dunuo sorman pebar lak bili gonnio.
54005018	Haron Sastroie hoi, “Dhan marte gorubuore mu bani no duo.” Ar, “Hamgoriebuoi bedon pana lak.”
54005019	Ek jon borjono biruddie ekkan duj badei dile, di-tin jon shakki die no thele gojhi no los.
54005020	Jigune pab goron, sigunore begkuno mujungot gubis, jene oinniogune dhoran para.
54005021	Itchioro mujungot, Probu Jisu Kristor mujungot ar Itchiore bei loie sorgo-dudtuno mujungot mui tore ugum duongor: Ei hodani dhoris. Haro pokko no os ar haro indi no bajis.
54005022	Harore hijie-hijchie gori murubbit thik no goris. Manjior pab bhag no los. Nijore sudduo gori rageis.
54005023	Bana pani no heis ar. Tor pedtuottei ar tui tugut-tugut aw-sug oschie sienottei ekka-ekka angguro ros heis.
54005024	Hoiek jono pab alge dega jai. Tharar pabpani bijierottei tharar akke-akke jai. Hintu oinniogunor pabpani tharar pijendi pune-pune jai.
54005025	Thik sedogkie gori, gom hamani alge dega jai. Ar jieni sedogkie noi, sieni ghubei thoi para no jai.
54006001	Jungollo tole jei banidajigun agon, sigune tharar nijor girojchun beg sorman pebar lak bili mone gortok. Itchioro nangan ar sigkiegan bodnam no oi para, thara sedogkie gortok.
54006002	Ar jigunor bischiasi giroj agon, sigune tharare bhei bilinei aw-pela no gortok. Hintu lab pebakke sigun bischiasi ar agojor hinottei, sie bes thara ham gortok. Ei hodagan tharare sigeis ar hujoli goris.
54006003	Judi huno jone oinnio sigkie de, soittio sigkiegan no mane,
54006004	The phodani ar hitchu hobor no pai. Hintu the hoda sombonde hoschie bajeibar ar torgo goribar sai. Sebeden sittun hinsie, mara-mari, sorja-sorji ar hu-sondeho eje.
54006005	Sittun manjior bojong monottun thum no oie torga-torgi eje. Soittio sara oi. Thara mone goronde pobitrogane tengaδ hamei de. Siennie manjiortun pharok os.
54006006	Hintu mono hujhie pobitro ole moha lab.
54006007	Haron, songsarot ami hitchu no ani, ar ittun hitchu ni no paribongge sieno dega.
54006008	Amar judi bhat-pani ar uron-pinon thai, sieniloi mon hujhi gori thei.
54006009	Hintu jigune thagoie obar san, pabo lubbot poron, ar idit bajon. Ar thara nanakkan bojong ar hoti oidie lubbot bajhi nas on ar boij jan.
54006010	Haron tengaδ lubpan olode beg bojonganir gora. Manjie tenga lubbot bajilie, tenga lubpane tharare bischiaschanottun pharok gorei nejai, ar onek monot dug phude.
54006011	Hintu tui Oh Itchioro manuschuo, sienittun dhei ja ar dharmigkan, bhoktigan, bischiaschan, hospanagan, dhorjioganor nombrogan loreis.
54006012	Bischiaschano gom judduogan gor. Itchiore tomar dogkie ononto jibonan dori thak. Itchiore tore sienot dagkie. Onek shakkidieguno mujungot tui gom ham heis.
54006013	Begkunore poran dede Itchiorbuo mujungot ar Pontio Pilado mujungot gom ham heiede sei Jisu Kristor mujungot mui tore ugum duongor.
54006014	Amar Probu Jisu Kristo dega no degisong, tore duji ar bodnam gori no paron para, ei uguman manis.
54006015	Itchiore tar okto ele, Jisure degeibogi. Itchiore olode bana ek jon gori Hemoda-bolabuo, ami baini goridie sibie. The olode rajagunor Raja ar probugunor Probu.
54006016	The olode ekmattro aw-mor ar huno jone jei no parsie phorot the thai. Huno jone tare no degon ar degaio no jai. Tar sorman ar ononto hemoda ok. Amen.
54006017	Ei jugkuot jigun thagoie, sigune phodani no on para, ar hoi jaidie dhonani ugure nirbhor no gorinei, hintu beg jinijchani bhug goribartei dede jeda Itchiorbuore bischias goribartei ugum goris.
54006018	Thara gom ham goron para, gom ham goranat thagoie on para, holi no gorsie gori duon para ar bhag-juk goron para tharare ugum dis.
54006019	Sedogkie gori tharar nijottei dhon thubeibak jien ebode somoibuot tharattei ekkan shokto tola dogkie obo, jene thara ononto jibonan dori ragei paron.
54006020	Oh Timothi, jien rokkie goribartei tore die oie sien rokkie gor. Be-dhormio hoda-batta, jagulugkie torga-torgi, jien manjie gyen bili mijie gori hon, sien bad dis.
54006021	Jigune sei gyenan peion bili hon, sigune bischiaschanottun pharok oi jeion. Meyegan tor ugure thok. Amen.
55001001	Mui Paula, Itchioro ischie darai, Kristo Jisu iot jibono protiggiagano doge mui olungge ek jon Jisu Kristor apostol.
55001002	Mor agojor puo Timothi, mui tore legongor. Bab Itchiore ar amar Probu Kristo Jisu tore doyegan, sitpuronagan ar shantigan dedok.
55001003	Mor Purbo-puruschunune jeannie gori Itchior sebona gorsion, siennie gori muio gom idie-ittoi sebona gorongge Itchiorboure mui hujhi hoda hongor, jei reide-dine mui bor magode tore onsur idot tulong.
55001004	Tor ugure mui hujhi ong para, tor sogo pani ani mor idot udile, sebar mor baari dhap oi.
55001005	Phagara sara bischiaschan tor agede sien mor monot age. Sei bischiaschan akke tor borongabuo Loir ar tor mabuo Eunikir elo. Mui mone gorong sei bischiaschan tor nischoi age.
55001006	Senottei, mui tore monot tuli duongotte, mui tor ugure ad tuli dinei tui peioschie Itchioro borani taza gori de.
55001007	Haron Itchiore amare dorebar apta no de. Hintu the amare hemodar, hospanar ar nijor domono apta die.
55001008	Senottei, amar Probur sombonde shakki dibar no lajes. Mui, tar bondibuotteio no lajes. Hintu Itchioro hemodagan loinei, gom hoboranottei mor loge hosto bhug gor.
55001009	The amare uddhar gorsie ar pobitro dagkoi amare dagkie. Sien amar hamo onusare noi, hintu tar nijor uddischuoi ar doyer darai. Sristi agendi, Kristo Jisu iot the amare tar doyegan die.
55001010	Hintu ikkie, amar mukti gorie Jisu Kristor dega denagan dega dinei, moranagan nas oie, jibonan ejchie ar gom hoborano darai jibonan ar omoran dega dilogi.
55001011	Sienottei Be-jadtuno sidu prosar gorie, apostol, ar gom hoboran sigeie more thik gora oie.
55001012	Senottei mui sieni hosto bhug gorsiong, hintu mui no lajang. Haron mui hobor pang, mui hare bischias gorsiong, ar mui mone gorong sei dinno song mui tare jien gojei duong, the nischoi rokkie gori paribo.
55001013	Mortun suinnioschie gom hodaganir nomunagan tui shokto gori dori thak. Kristo Jisu iot bischiaschanot ar hospanaganot raga.
55001014	Mui tore duongge gom hodagani amar iot agede Pobitro Aptabuor darai raga.
55001015	Tui hobor pas Asia dejot elakke sigune, Phygela ar Hermogena somot begkune more phelei jeiondoi.
55001016	Onesiphoror ghorbobuo Probuie doye gorog. Haron the nitto more mon taza gori diegi ar mui shingolloi banan heiongge sien the no lajai.
55001017	The Rom sohorot lunginei, more sot-bottie gori togeinei suph peie.
55001018	Sei dinnuot Probuie tare doye gore para, Probuie tare asirbad duok. Tui gome-dalei hobor pas Ephesi sohorot the more nanakkan ham gori die.
55002001	Senottei, Oh put, Kristo Jisu iot agede doyeganot shokto os.
55002002	Onek shakkidieguno somare tui mortun suinnioschie hodagani, bischias-joggio manuschunore gojei dis, jene sigune aro oinnio jonoreio sigei parondoi para.
55002003	Jisu Kristor ek jon gom soinnio dogkie gori hosto bhug gor.
55002004	Je judduo ham gore, the ei jibono hamot no baje jene, tare je soinniot bhorti gorsie sibiere hujhi goribartei the goribuo.
55002005	Je jidiejittie harat sominei niom onusare no hele, tare poriskari tuk no duon.
55002006	Je dajibuo dug-ham goribuo, the akke phol pebo.
55002007	Mui hi hongor bhabi sa. Probuie je huno iet tore bujibar hemoda gyen dibo.
55002008	Mor gom hoborano onusare morattun jiei tulo oiede sei Jisu Kristore monot rageis. The olode Davidor bongso.
55002009	Sienottei bojong ham gorie dogkie gori banan hai song mui hosto pelung. Hintu Itchioro hodagan banan no hai.
55002010	Senottei, beiloiegunottei mui begkani soijjio gorongor, jene tharaio Kristo Jisu iot ononto oborugkan somot muktigan pan para.
55002011	Ien olode ekkan bischias-joggio hoda: Ami judi tar somare mori, amio tar somare bajibong.
55002012	Ami judi soijjio gori, amio tar somare sason goribong. Ami judi tare bharei, theio amare bharebo.
55002013	Ami judi bischias sara oi, the bischias-joggio oi thai. Haron the nijore-nije bharei no pare.
55002014	Ei hodagani tui bischiasi manuschunore monot tuli dis. Hodar sombonde thara hoschie no bazan para, Probur mujungot tui tharare shokto gori ugum dis. Sien huno moillio sara ar suniegunor baari hoti oi.
55002015	Itchiorottun monot pore para ham gorie obar sesta gor. Edogkie ham goriei laj pebar noi. Soittio hodagan the thik mote sigkie de.
55002016	Aw-sormanio ar be-dhormio hoda-batta bad dis. Haron sedogkie hoda-battai manjiore Itchior aw-bhokti gorai.
55002017	Sedogkie hoda batta poja ghaδ dogkie bari jai. Hymenaloi Philetu olakke sei doronor manus.
55002018	Jiei uduonagan honatto oi jeiegoi hon hinottei, hoiek jonor soittiogan thara phelei die bajei duon. Sedogkie gori thara hoiek jono bischiaschan ullei phelei duon.
55002019	Tobuio, Itchioro shokto tolagan tigi thai. Ienot marga dogkie gori age, “Probuie hobor pai hugun tar.” Ar, “Jara Kristor nangan loion, thara be-dhormoganottun pharok odog.”
55002020	Ekkan bor ghorot bana sona rubuorloi baneie bajon-hodhora no than, gajor ar madiloi baneieio than. Hoiekkuo bajon-hodhora olakke sormanio hamortei ar hoiekkun bajon-hodhora olakke aw-sormanio hamortei hamot lagan.
55002021	Senottei, je nijore-nije sienittun poriskar gore, the sormanio hamor bajon-hodhora obo. Je huno gom hamortei jugol oi thebo, the pobitro ar Girojchuottei dorkaribuo obo.
55002022	Gaburo halo lubbonittun dhei jeis. Hintu jigune Probure pobitro mondoi dagon, siguno somot dharmigkan, bischiaschan, hospanagan ar shantigan loreis.
55002023	Murukko ar aw-gyen torga-torgi bad dis. Tui hobor pas, sienittun hoschie baje.
55002024	Probur sagorsiei hoschie no bazan. Hintu the begkundoi nombro gori sola poribo, sigei pare para uo poribo ar dhorjio tha poribo.
55002025	Biruddie solonde sigunore the nombro gori porinei shigie poribo jene, soittiogan thara hobor pan para, Itchiore tharare mon phiranagan di pare.
55002026	Tar ischie doge goribartei, Diabolaδ tharare phajei thoiede sien tharar jhagoron oi pare ar thara tar idi ganottun shorei ei paron.
55003001	Hintu ien monot rageis, sejo dinunot aghattie somoi lungibogi.
55003002	Haron manus nijore-nije hos peie obak. Thara obakke tengaδ lubbo, bahadori gorie, phodani, manjiore sorjeie, bab-ma aw-mannio gorie, hujhi hoda no hoie ar aw-pobitro.
55003003	Thara obakke meye sara, mab no die, manjiore duj badei die, nijore domon no gorsie, dor gore para ar gom’an hos no pebak.
55003004	Thara obakke bischias ghatok, moro-mara, ar barbuo. Itchiorbuottun bes phorti goranagan hos peie obak.
55003005	Thara ugure-ugure Itchior bhokto holeibak, hintu mure-mure ienor hemodagan no manon. Sedogkie manjiortun pharok os.
55003006	Haron sedogkie manus, ghorot juj gori sominei norom-norom miliegunore, jigune pab bugi agon, nanakkan lubboloi pharok gorei nejan sigunore mone monjokka goron.
55003007	Thara onsur shigon, hintu huno din soittiogan puro gori hobor no pelak.
55003008	Jannaloi Jambra jedogkie gori Mosir biruddie sollion, thik sedogkie gori sei manuschune soittiogano biruddie solon. Tharar monani hajor oie, ar bischiaschano sombonde ole, tharare bad die jai.
55003009	Hintu thara bes tigidak noi ar. Haron tharar bhulan manjie jedogkie gori degkuon, thik sedogkie gori sei mansuhuno bhulani degibak.
55003010	Hintu tui mor sigkiegan, solon phironan, uddischuogan, bischiaschan, soijjiogun goranagan, hospanagan, dhorjiogan gome-dalei adheios.
55003011	Antiok, Ikonium, ar Lystra sohoranit more jei uttiesarani gorsion ar mui jei hosto bhugkani gorsiong, sieni tui hobor pas. Hintu Probuie more sieni begkanittun uddhar gorsie.
55003012	Jigune jodepode gori Kristo Jisu iot bhokti gori thebar san, sigune hosto bhug goribak.
55003013	Hintu bojong manuschun ar phagara manuschun din din aro bojong obak. Thara oinnio jonore hu-podedi nejeibak ar thara nijeio thogibak.
55003014	Hintu tui jien sigkuos sienot thik gori thak. Haron tui hartun sigkuos tui hobor pas ar sigkieganot tor shokto bischias age.
55003015	Gurottun duri Pobitro Sastrogan tui hobor pas. Siene Kristo Jisu iot bischiaso darai mukti paidie gyenan tore dibo.
55003016	Beg Sastrogan Itchioro nijeschanor darai die oie. Sieni sigkiettei, bujeibartei, songsudonottei, ar dharmigkan sigeibartei hamot lage.
55003017	Jene Itchioro manus prottiek gom hamortei puro-puri gori jugol oi paron.
55004001	Jibe dega dibogi die lokkene ar tar rejjioganot jedagunore ar moragunore bijier goribogi, sei Itchiorbuor samne ar Probu Jisu Kristor samne, mui tore shokto gori hujoli gorongor.
55004002	Hodagan prosar gor! Somoiot ok aw-somoiot ok jugol oi thak. Begkani dhorjio dori theinei sigkie somot bujei dis, gubis ar utsaho tuli dis.
55004003	Haron emon ekkuo somoi ebo, sokkene manjie gom sigkie soijjio no goribak. Hintu tharar mone monjokka gori tharar sidu onek sigkie die thubeibak. Sei sigkiediegune, han hukkudi more song sunibartei mone hoidie sigunore sigeibak.
55004004	Manuschune soittiogan hando no gorinei golpo hando goribak.
55004005	Hintu tui begkanit nijore-nije domon gori theis. Hostogani gaisuei thak. Prosarogo ham gor ar tor haman puro gor.
55004006	Haron more honatto utchorbo dogkie gori dali die oie, ar mor moranagan hai ejchie.
55004007	Mui gom judduo mone-prane gorsiong. Dumuro-dumurigan mui phureiong, ar bischiaschan mui rokkie gorsiong.
