55004008	Ikkiettun duri dharmigkano raj-tukkuo mortei thoi die oie. Dharmitto Bijier goriebuoi, Probuie sibie more sei dinnie dibogi, bana more noi, hintu jigune tar dega dibogidie sien hos pan sigunore begkunore dibogi.
55004009	Jhadi gori tui mor idu ebar seis.
55004010	Dema ei jugkuo hos pai hinottei, the more phelei jeinei thessalonika sohorot jeiegoi. Kresen, Galatia dejot jeiegoi ar Tita, Dalmotia dejot jeiegoi.
55004011	Bana Luka mor loge age. Markore togeinei tor loge anis. Haron ham goribartei the mortei dorkar oie.
55004012	Tykhikare mui Ephesi sohorot dipadeong.
55004013	Troas sohorot Karpa idu mui phelei ejchiongge huttuo ar boiun tui ele ani dis. Samarar boiun hamakkai ani dis.
55004014	Alexander, tamar ham gorede sibiei more onek hoti gorsie. Tar hamo onusare Probuie tare sujok.
55004015	Tar pokke uijkare theis. Haron shokto gori the amar hodagani badha de.
55004016	Mor polim bijieranot huno jone more sahajjio no gorinei begkune phelei jeion. Probuie ien tharare duj no duok.
55004017	Hintu jene mor darai gom hoboran puro gori prosar oi, ar beg Be-jadtune sunon para, Probuie mor hai theinei more bol die. Ar the more singhobuor muottun bajeie.
55004018	Probuie more beg bojong hamortun rokkie goribuo ar tar sorgo rejjioganottei rageibo. Umore-umor song tar mohima ok. Amen.
55004019	Priskaloi Akuilare ar Onesiphoror ghorbuogunore salam janangor.
55004020	Erastas Korinth sohorot roie. Trophima aw-sug oie hinottei, mui tare Miletus sohorot phelei ejchiong.
55004021	Jarhal no ette tui mor idu ebar seis. Eubulaloi, Pudene, Linu, Klaudia ar beg bheilogkuneo tore salam janadon.
55004022	Probu Jisu Kristo tor aptabuor loge, ar doyegan tor loge thok. Amen.
56001001	Mui, Paule olungge Itchioro banidaji ar Jisu Kristor apostol. Itchiore akke duri beitulliede sigunor bischiaso doge, pobitro ar soittio gyeno doge mui olungge ek jon apostol.
56001002	Sei pobitrogan ononto jibono ashaganot age. Somoibuo arambo no ode, gal madi no parede Itchiorbuoi sien protiggia gorsie.
56001003	Itchiore thik gorsiede somoibuot, tar hodagan prosaro darai janei dilo. Amar mukti gorie Itchiorbuor ugumano doge sei prosaran more die oie.
56001004	Tita, mui tore legongor. Amar bischiaschano doge tui mor soittio dhormotto puo. Bab Itchiore ar amar mukti gorie Probu Jisu Kristoi tore doyegan, meyegan ar shantigan dedok.
56001005	Kret dippuot mui tore phelei ejchiongge, bagi roiede hamani tui thik goribartei. Mui tore ugum duongge, prottiek sohorot mondoli borjon banes.
56001006	Mondoli borjonnuo duj neie uo poribo. The ekkuo mog-bola ar tar puo-shabagun bischiasi uo poribo. Thara duj di no parsie ar ohongkari no gorsie uo poribo.
56001007	Haron, Itchioro porsoni ole, duj neie uo poribo. Tar nijor monjokka doge gorie ar han gorommie oi no pebo. The mod no heie, mara-mari no gorsie ar oinniei gori lab no togeie uo poribo.
56001008	Sienir bodoli, gorba lobiot, ar goman tar hos pa poribo. The shantoshil, dharmigar pobitro manus uo poribo ar the nijore-nije domon oi pebo.
56001009	Bischiaso hodagan tare shigie jeiede doge the shokto gori dori thok jene the gom sigkie dinei manjiore the bujei pare para ar jigune biruddie solon, sigunore the tharar bhulani degei di pare para.
56001010	Haron onek ohongkari manjie ortho mormo neie hoda hon ar thogan. Sundu-sam happiegune bes siennie goron.
56001011	Thara jien sigkie dibar osit noi, oinniei labottei sien thara sigkie duon. Thara siennie gori sigkie dile, goda ghorbuogun jagulug gori duon. Tui tharar muoni bondo gori die poribo.
56001012	Thara nijor ek jon munie hoie, “Kret dippuor manuschune onsur gal madon. Thara olakke darittie emano dogkie, alsi ar nadanie.”
56001013	Sei hodagan soittio. Senottei, thara gome-dalei bischias goron para, tui tharare shokto gori bujes.
56001014	Judaiuno potchonani ar manjior ugumani thara hando no goron para, tui tharare bujes. Thara siennie gorilie, soittioganot no than.
56001015	Pobitro manuschunor begkani pobitro. Hintu, jara aw-pobitro ar bischias no goron, tharattei hitchu pobitro noi. Tharar monani ar idie-ittanio aw-pobitro.
56001016	Thara muendi Itchior hobor pan gori haam haan, hintu hame horjai tare haam no haan. Itchiore hos no paidie hamani thara goron. Thara olakke aw-mannio, ar je huno gom hamortei shobai gunor noi.
56002001	Hintu tui dorkari soittio sigkie hodagani hos.
56002002	Buro manuschunore tui sigkie dis jene thara nije-nije domon on para. Thara manonio ar shantoshil uo poribo. Tharar gom mon, shokto bischias, hospana ar dhorjio tha poribo.
56002003	Thik sedogkie gori, buro miliegunore tui sigkie dis jene thara pobitro manjio dogkie solon phiron goron. Thara manjiore bodnam tangidie ar modo hur no on para uo poribo. Sienir bodoli, thara gom sigkie die uo poribo.
56002004	Gabur-miliegune tharar negkunore ar tharar puo-shabagunore hos pan para, buro miliegune tharare osit bijier goron para shigie poribo.
56002005	Gabur-miliegune shantoshil, sudduo, ghoro ham gorie, doyelu ar nijor negkunor tole than para thara sigei pebak, jene Itchioro hodagan huno jone bodnam gori no paron.
56002006	Thik sedogkie gori, gabur morodtune shantoshil on para utsaho tuli dis.
56002007	Je huno iet tharare gom ham gorinei deges. Tor sigkieni bojong no oinei sormanio oi para uij rageis.
56002008	Huno jone tore duj badei di no paron para, soittiogano doge hoda hos. Tor biruddigune lajan para siennie goris. Tor sombonde tharar hitchu bojong hoda hobar no thebo hinottei, thara lajeibak.
56002009	Banidajigune tharar nijor girojchuor tole thebartei ar beg hamanit tharare gome hujhi goron para tui sigeis. Tharare mue-mue suol no dibartei tui sigeis.
56002010	Thara sur no goron para sigeis. Sieno bodoli, je huno hamot thara bischias-joggio bili degadok. Je huno hittendi amar mukti gorie Itchiorbuo hodagani shaje para, thara siennie uo poribo.
56002011	Haron muktigan anede Itchiorbuor doyegan beg manuschuno idu dega diegi.
56002012	Aw-pobitrogan, songsarik lubbogan bad dinei, ei jugkuot shantoshil, dharmig ar bhokti bhabe thebartei iene amare sigei.
56002013	Hujhi ashagan ami barsei thagode, ami sedogkie gori tha poribo. Sei ashagan olode amar oborug Itchiorbuor ar mukti gorie Jisu Kristor mohimagan, dega dibogi die sien.
56002014	Beg niom sara hamanittun amare shorei anibartei, ar ami pobitro oi para the nije-nije amattei die. Ami tar manus oinei gom ham goribartei utjogi obartei the amare pobitro gorsie.
56002015	Ei hodagani sigeis. Beg odhiharaniloi utsaho goris ar bujei dis. Tore hono jone aw-mannio no gortok.
56003001	Sason-goriegunor ar odhihar-bolagunor tole thebartei ar tharar hoda manibartei manuschunore monot tuli dis. Thara je huno gom ham goribartei jugol oi tha poribo.
56003002	Manuschune harore no sorjan para ar hoschie herengkal no bazan para monot tuli dis. Nombro ar begkunottei niroit tharar uo poribo.
56003003	Haron eksomoi ami nijeio murukko ar hoda aw-mannio gorie elong. Manjiore thogeie, nanandhoronorlubborsugtogeie, banidaji, hinsie-nindie gora-gori, ar bis dega-degi gorsei.
56003004	Hintu amar mukti gorie Itchiorbuor doye-meyegan begkuno idu lungiegi.
56003005	Sebeden the amare mukti gorsie. Ami dharmigo ham gorseidie sienottei noi, hintu tar doyegano darai, Pobitro Aptar nuo jormoloi nuo goraidie sieno darai amare mukti gorsie.
56003006	Amar mukti gorie Jisu Kristor darai the amare Pobitro Apta alajhala gori die.
56003007	Jene tar doyegano darai, the amare dharmig gonanar porendi, ononto jibono ashagano doge ami babo sompotti pai para pebong.
56003008	Ien bischias-joggio hoda. Mortun mone horte tui ei hodagani shokto gori dhoris. Je Itchiorbuore bischias gorsie, gom hamortei uij ragana osit. Ieni gom hoda ar manjiortei labhoban.
56003009	Niomano bepare piri adeinei magana- magana suol tana-tani, hoschie herengkal goranagani bad dis. Haron sieni gorana labnei ar hamot no lakkie.
56003010	Bejhallie manus di ek bar uij denar porendi bhar gori dis.
56003011	Seis, esannie manus nije-nije nas on hinottei, soittioganot no than ar pab goron.
56003012	Artemare ok Tykhikare ok mui sidu dipadele, tui mor idu Nikapoli sohorot hamakkai eis. Haron sidu mui jarhalluo hadeimboi.
56003013	Okil, Zenare ar Apollore, thara jade, tui jeddur paros sahajjio goris, tharar huno hitchu obhab no oi para.
56003014	Dorkari jinijchani pajai para, ar pholneie no on para, amar manuschuneo gom ham gorana shigodok.
56003015	Mor loge agonde sigune begkune tore salam janadon. Bischiaschano darai amare hos pande sigunore salam janeis. Tomar begkunor ugure Itchioro doyegan thok. Amen.
57001001	Mui Paula, Jisu Kristor bondibuo, ar amar bhei Timothi somot, Philemon amar agojor ham gorie somarsiebuo, tore legir.
57001002	Amar agojor Apphiare, amar somarsie soinnio Arkipasore ar tor ghorot bischiasi mondoli agede sibiereo legir.
57001003	Amar Bab Itchiorbuor ar Probu Jisu Kristor doyegan ar Shantigan tomar idu thok. Donniobad Ar Bor Magi Dena
57001004	Mui onsur tortei bor magi duong ar Itchiorore tortei hujhi hoda hong.
57001005	Probu Jisure tui bischias goros ar beg sadhu manuschunore tui hos paschie sien mui suinniong.
57001006	Jisu Kristo darai tomar jei gom jinijchani age, tor bischiaschan oinnio jonore bhag dile lab obo bili tui hobor phele gom obo.
57001007	Bhei, sadhu manuschunor monani tui hujhi gori duos hinottei tor hospanagandoi mui baari hujhi olung ar shantona pelung.
57001008	Tui hubon gorilie gom obo, mui tore ugum goribar Kristor darai mor onek sahoj age.
57001009	Mui Paula, burobuo ar ikkie Jisu Kristor bondibuo oleio, tobuio hospanagano darai mui tore hujoli gorongor.
57001010	Mui bondi oi thagke mor puo oiede sibie, Onesimattei mui tore hujoli gorongor.
57001011	Eksomoi the tor dorkar no elo. Hintu ikkie the tortei ar mortei dorkar oie.
57001012	Mui tare tor idu aro dipadangor. Senottei, the mor nijor agojorbuo bili tui tare gojhi lo.
57001013	Mui tare mor loge rageibar mone hoie. Haron mui gom hoboranor bondi oi thagode, the tor azai more ham gori dipare.
57001014	Hintu tor onumoti sara mui hitchu goridung no sang. Mui tore bolajure gom ham gora bajei didung no sang, hintu tui tor ischie mote goribartei mui sang.
57001015	The umorbuo tor oi para, hanekkonottei the tortun pharok oiede obode ai.
57001016	The banidaji noi ar. The olode ek jon agojor bhei. Mui tare shanggadik hos pang hinottei tui sittun bes tare hos pa poribo. Haron theo olode ek jon manus ar Probur darai bhei.
57001017	Senottei, tui judi more ek jon tor somarsie bhabos, tui more gojhi lobede dogkie gori tare gojhi los.
57001018	Hintu judi tor biruddie oinniei gori thai, bah tore dibar thai, sieni more aberei dis.
57001019	Mui Paula, mor nijor adtoi ei hodagani legongor: mui ugureim. Tui more tor nijor poranano duoschie sien, tobuio mor legibar dorkar nei.
57001020	oi bhai, Probur darai mui tortun lab pang para gori de, ar mor monano hujhi gori de.
57001021	Tui mor hoda manibie bili asha loinei mui tore legongor. Mui hobor pang mui magongotte sittun bes tui gori dibe.
57001022	Mui thebarlitteio ekkuo gudhi jugol gori thoi dis. Mui asha gorong, tui bor magos hinottei, more Itchiore tor idu lungei dibogi.
57001023	Epaphraje, Jisu Kristortei mor loge jiel-hanat porsiegidie sibieio tore salam janar.
57001024	Mor loge ham gorie Marka, Aristarka, Dema ar Lukao tore salam janadon.
57001025	Amar Probu Jisu Kristor doyegan tor aptabuo loge thok. Amen.
58001001	Purona amolot Itchiorbuoi onek bar ar onek hittendi munigunor darai amar Purbo-puruschununore hoie.
58001002	Ei sejor dinunot tar Puobuor darai the amare holo. Itchiore tare beg jinijchanir odhiharo sompotti peiebuo obartei thik gorsie. Ar tar daraio the songsarani baneie.
58001003	Puobuo olode tar mohimaganor aluogan, ar the olode Bab Itchiorbuor ajol subhibuo. Tar hemodar hodaloi beg jinijchani dori age, ar the nije amar pabpani dhoi phelei dinei, bego ugure Jakjomogkuor denedi boi age.
58001004	Sorgo-dudtunottun onek bes the gom oie hinottei, sorgo-dudtunottun bes seresto nang, odhiharo sompotti doge the peie.
58001005	Haron Bab Itchiore huno sorgo-dudtore huno din no hoi, “Tui olede mor puo, edchie mui tore jormo dilung.” Aro the huno sorgo-dudtore no hoi, “Mui tar Bab om, ar the mor puo obo.”
58001006	Hintu Bab Itchiore polim morod puobuo songsarot anniede lokkene aro the hoie, “Itchioro beg sorgo-dudtune tare tobona gortok.”
58001007	Ar sorgo-dudtunor sombonde the hoie, “Tar sorgo-dudtunore apta uo bajei die. Ar tar sagorsiegunore aguno jil uo bajei die.”
58001008	Hintu Puobuore the hoie, “Oh Itchior, tor singasonan umore-umor age. Dharmigo rajaro ludigkuo olode tor rejjiogano rajaro ludig.
58001009	Dharmigkan tui hos peios, ar niom saragan tui bis degkuos. Senottei Itchiore, tor Itchiorbuoi Tore hujhir telandoi tel guli dibartei tor somarsiegunottun bes guli die.”
58001010	Ar the hoie, “Oh Probu, adi purbe tui pittimir tolagan bojeios. Ar sorgogani olode Tor ador hamani.
58001011	Sieni bos jebo, hintu tui thebe. Haboro dogkie gori sieni begkani puron obo.
58001012	Haboro dogkie gori tui sieni halab goribe, ar sienire bodolei dibe. Hintu tui jei ekkui thebe, ar Tor bojorun thum no obak.”
58001013	Hintu Itchiore huno sorgo-dudtore huno din no hoi, “Mui tor sottrugun tor thengot tole no thong song mor denedi boji thak!”
58001014	Beg sorgo-dudtun hi? Thara olakke sebona gorie apta. Muktigan odhiharo sompotti ijebe pebakke sigunore sebona goribartei tharare padei die oie.
58002001	Senottei, ami pazarandi no jei para, ami suinneidiehodaganit shanggadik gori mon die poribo.
58002002	Haron je niom bhonggo gorsie ar je aw-mannio gorsie sigune upojukto sasti peionde sien sorgo-dudtune shokto proman duon.
58002003	Sedogkie oborug muktigan ami judi obohela gori, sastigan hingori sari paribong? Sien Probuie polim janei die, ar jigune sien suinnion thara sien amare proman duon.
58002004	Itchioreio sien sinnoloi, amok hamboi, ar onek oborugkoi proman die. Ar tar ischie mote the Pobitro Aptabuottun boksit die.
58002005	Haron ebar agede songsaran Itchiore sorgo-dudtunore no gojai. Ar sei songsaran olode ami hoidie songsaran.
58002006	Hintu ek jone Sastrot proman dinei hoie, “Tare monot rageibartei, manus hi? Bah, tare jotton goribartei, manjior puobuo honna?
58002007	Tui tare sorgo-dudtunottun ekkena tole phellios. Tui tare mohimaloi ar sormandoi raj-tuk madat di duos. Ar tui Tor adedi ham gorinei baneie jinijchani ugure tare bojeios.
58002008	Tui tar thengot tole beg jinijchani thoi di duos.” Haron sienit the beg tar tole thoie. Tar tole no thoie hitchu nei. Hintu tobuio ikkie ami begkani tar tole thoiegani degidong noi.
58002009	Hintu ami Jisure degir. Hanekkonottei tare sorgo-dudtunottun tole pela oie. Itchioro doyer darai the begkunottei moranagan sagi sai para, moranaganor hosto bhug gorinei, mohimaloi ar sormandoi raj-tuk madat die.
58002010	Beg jinijchani tar darai oie ar tartei. The onek manjiore mohimaganot nejeibo. Puobuo sigunor muktir gorabuo hinottei, the Puobuore hosto bhug gora bajei dinei tharare puripunnuo gorana lak.
58002011	Haron the olode pobitrogoriebuo ar pobitro odonde sigundoi begkun ek hinottei, the sigunore bhei daganagan the no lajai.
58002012	The hoi, “Tor nangan mor bheiunore janei dim. Shoba moiddie mui tore gidodi baini gorim.”
58002013	Aro the hoie, “Mui tare bischias gorim.” Aro hoie, “Sah, Itchiore dede puogundoi mui iot agong.”
58002014	Puogunor lo ar era age hinottei, thik sedogkie gori, Jisuio sien bhag loie. Tar moranaganor darai moranagano ugure hemoda elode Diabolareδ nosto gori di die.
58002015	Goda jibonanot moranagano dore bondi oi agonde sigunore the Shorei di die.
58002016	Haron jodepode gori the sorgo-dudtunore sahajjio no gore hintu the Abrahamor bongsogunore sahajjio gorsie.
58002017	Senottei, Itchioro jinijchor sombonde doyeli ar bischias-joggio Moharajguruthagur oi para, ar manuschunor pabpanittei hujhi gori die oi para, je huno iet the bheilogkunor dogkie uo porsie.
58002018	Haron sienot the nije porikkiet porinei hosto bhug gorsie, jene porikkiet poronde sigunore the bol di pare para.
58003001	Oh pobitro bheilogkun, tumi olade sorgottun dagkieganot phagot sommie. Senottei, ami haam heidie Jisu Kristore Apostol ar Moharajguruthagur bili mone gorsio.
58003002	Itchioro goda Itchioro ghoranot Mosi jedogkie gori bischias-joggio elo, thik sedogkie gori, Jisuio tare thik gorsiede Sibier sidu the bischias-joggio.
58003003	Sienottei Jisure Mosittun bes dangor bili gona oie. Thik sedogkie gori, ghor-tulliebuo ghoranottun bes sormanio.
58003004	Haron je huno ghor ek jone noi ek jone tulon, hintu beg jinijchani baneiebuo olode Itchiorbuo.
58003005	Sagorsie ijebe Mosi Itchioro ghorot bischias-joggio elo. Tar hamanir sombonde porendi shakki dinei tare hoion.
58003006	Hintu Kristo olode tar ghorano ugure Puo. Ar sien judi sedogkie ole, ami sahoj gori thum song dori thana ar asha gorinei ami bar gori, jei ami olongge tar ghoran. Bischias-joggio Oio
58003007	Senottei, Pobitro Aptai hoiede doge, “Edchie judi tui tar robuo sunoschie oi,
58003008	tui akkol han oinei moruobomit bijiero dinnuot ulluo no goros,
58003009	Tor Purbo-puruschunune more porikkie seinei proman peion. Ar mor hamani thara solis bojor song degkuon.
58003010	Senottei, sei piri manuschunor ugure mortun rak udinei mui hoiong, ‘Tharar ontoredi thara onsur hu-podedi jan, ar thara mor podtani hobor no pelak.’
58003011	Senottei, mui rage sobot heiong jei, ‘Thara mor jireni holat somi no pebak!’ ”
58003012	Bheilog seio, adikkie tomartun huno jone bojong mondoi Aw-bischiase Jeda Itchiorbuottun pharok oba.
58003013	Hintu “Edchie” hoidie siot nitto uschoni tuli diedi gorsio, adikkie tomartun jei huno jone pabor bhulot porinei akkol han oba.
58003014	Haron ami judi amar bischiaschanot gorattun duri thum song shokto gori dori thei, ami Kristor somare bhag peie obong.
58003015	Sastroie hoiede doge, “Edchie judi tui tar robuo sunoschie oi, tui akkol han no oinei, ulluo no goros.”
58003016	Haron suninei ulluo gorsionde sigun honna? Hamakkai Mosie Egypt dejottun nigilei anniede sigun begkune noi ni?
58003017	Solis bojor song the har ugure rak tullie sei? Pab gorinei tharar heyegani moruobomit porsiede siguno ugure noi ni?
58003018	Thara tar jireni holat somi no pebak gori the sobot heiede sigun olakke hoda aw-manniogoriegun noi ni?
58003019	Senottei ami degidie jei, thara somi no pande olode aw-bischiaso darai.
58004001	Senottei, tar jireni jaganot somi paribar soittio age hinottei, adikkie tomartun huno jone lungi no paribaran dega jai, bili ami dhorana dorkar.
58004002	Haron gom hoboran jodepode gori amare ar tharare janei die oie. Hintu thara suinnionde gom hoboran tharar lab no oi. Ar suinnionde sigune bischiaschanot egottor no goron.
58004003	Haron ami suinneidie sigune sei jireni jaganot the hoiede doge somibonggoi, judio songsaran sristi gora oiede siottun duri hamani ses gora oie, “Senottei, mui rage sobot heiongge jei, ‘Thara mor jireni jaganot somi no pebak.’ ”
58004004	Haron sat dinot Sastrot ekkan jagat the edogkie gori hoie, “Sat dinot Itchiore tar beg hamanittun jireie.”
58004005	Aro the hoie, “Thara mor jireni jaganot huno din somi no pebak.”
58004006	Somibar age hinottei ejosong ek dagie somibag. Aw-bischiaso darai, polim prosar gora oiede sigune sienot somi no pan.
58004007	Aro ek dine the Davidor darai the thik gorsiede dinnuot, “Ejchie” bili hoie. Onek din porendi sien huo oie, “Edchie judi tui tar robuo sunoschie oi, tui akkol han oinei ulluo no goros.”
58004008	Haron Joshua judi tharare jiren dido, salen porendi oinnio din bili the no holun.
58004009	Senottei Itchioro manuschunottei ekkan jireni jaga age.
58004010	Haron Itchiore tar hamanittun jireiede dogkie gori, je tar jireni jaganot sommie, theo tar hamanittun jeie.
58004011	Senottei, sei jireni jaganot somibartei sesta gori, adikkie huno jone sei ekkui Aw-bischiasjot poraganor udahorono doge no oi para.
58004012	Haron Itchioro hodagan olode jeda ar hemoda-bola, ar dou-dhara damattun bes dhar, aptat sere porano sere pharokanotio somi pare. Joraguno sere ar mogojo sere somi pare. Sintie dharonagani ar mono uddischuogani hobor pai.
58004013	Huno poran-bola the no dege para gori lugei thobar nei, hintu beg jinijchani tar sogor samne adikkie ar hulo, ar ami tare ijeb di pebong.
58004014	Sorgogani par oinei ejchiede Moharajguruthagurbuo, Itchioro Puobuo Jisu amar age bili seinei, amar ham haanaganot shokto gori dori thei.
58004015	Haron amar bol neieganit sitpura heie Moharajguruthagur amar ek jon age. The amar dogkie hinottei, ekkui gori theo porikkie lagot peie. Hintu the olode pab neie.
58004016	Senottei, dorkari somoiot doye ar sarjio doye pei para, doyer singasonanot sahoj gori jei.
58005001	Haron pabottei dan ar dali di pare para, Itchioro hamor sombonde manjiortei prottiek moharajguruthagur manjiortun thik gora oi.
58005002	The nijeio durbolan peie hinottei, aw-gyen ar hu-podedi jande sigunore tartun sitpuronagan age.
58005003	Ei senottei, the manuschunottei ar tar nijottei, pabor dali dibar dorkar.
58005004	Itchiore Aronore dagkie, hintu Itchiore dagkiede sigune huno jone ei sormanan nije-nije no lon.
58005005	Thik sedogkie gori, Kristoio the Moharajguruthagur obartei nijore-nije mohima no gore. Hintu Itchiore tare hoie, “Tui olede mor puo, edchie mui tore jormo dilung.”
58005006	The aro Sastror oinnio bhagot hoie, “Melkizedegor dogkie tui olede siro jibono Dhormothagur.”
58005007	Jisu heyeloi baji thagke tare moranaganottun rokkie gori parede Sibiettun the bor magi die, manjiortei hani-hani ar sogo pani pheleinei bor magi die. The bhokti dhorai hinottei Itchiore tar bor maganagani suinnie.
58005008	The ekkuo Puo oi theleio, tobuio the hosto bhug gorsiede sienittun the hoda mananagan shigi loie.
58005009	Ar the puripunnuo oinei, tare je mane sigunor begkunottei the ononto muktiganor odhiharibuo oie.
58005010	“Melkizedegor dogkie,” Moharajguruthagur bili Itchiore tare dagkie.
58005011	Puobuor sombonde amar shagor hobar age. Hintu tumi hom sunor hinottei sien tomare bhangi dena baari aghattie.
58005012	Haron judio ikkie tumi mastor ona lak oleio, pollie Itchioro shadoron hodagani aro tomare sigeie tomar dorkar oie. Tomar dud dorkar; doro bhat noi.
58005013	Haron ek jon hojhi guro ole, the bana dud hai, the dharmigo hodat podu noi.
58005014	Hintu doro bhat olode buro manjiortei, ar sien je tharar gyenani nitto hamot laganar harone gom-bojong buji loi paron.
58006001	Senottei, Kristor sombonde sigon-sigon hodagani huobula goranagan bad dinei, puripunnuoganot jei. Aw-gunor ham ar Itchior bischias goranar sombonde mon phiranaganor goranot aro tulobatta no gorana.
58006002	Baptisma sombonde sigkie, ad tuli dinei bor magi dena, morattun jiei uduona, ar aw-phurondi sastir sombonde no tulona.
58006003	Itchiore judi hujhi thai sien ami huobula goribong.
58006004	Haron jigune ekbar gyeno phoran peion, sorgor danan sagi seion, ar Pobitro Apta bhag peion,
58006005	sigune Itchioro gom hodagan, ar ebode jugkuor hemodagan sagi seion.
58006006	Thara judi jhuri poron, tharar monani aro phiran para tharare phirei anana aw-sombob. Haron tar nije Itchioro Puobuore Krosot dinei tare jonogonor mujungot laj duon.
58006007	Haron pittimit nitto jhor porede sieni madie hai, ar hed-goriegunor dorkarieni pittimigane utponno gori dide. Sien Itchiorottun pittimigane asirbad pai.
58006008	Hintu madigane judi hada ar hojoi utponno gore, sieni bad die jai, ar obisabo soman oi, ar sieni puri pheleinei ses gora oi.
58006009	Oh agojorun, ami judio edogkie gori hoi, hintu ami tomartei bischias gori jei, tumi uttom jinij utponno goriba jiene muktogano somare jebo.
58006010	Haron Itchiorbuo aw-dharmigo ham no goribuo. tar nange tumi ham ar baari hospanar hadoni gorinei degeiode sieni the puri no pheleibo. Tumi sadhu manuschunore sebona gorsio ar sebona goriba.
58006011	Ar amattun mone horte jei tumi prottiek jone thum song puro ashaganot ekkui gori hadoni gorida.
58006012	Senottei, alsi no oio, hintu jigune Bischiasor darai ar dhorjio darai soittiogan odhiharo sompotti ijebe peion sigunor leik adeio.
58006013	Haron Itchiore jokkene Abrahamore soittio die, tartun dangor nange sobot hebar nei hinottei, tar nijor nange sobot heie.
58006014	Itchiore hoie, “Hamakkai asirbadtoi mui tore asirbad dim. mui tore shagor bongso dim.”
58006015	Ar sebeden Abrahame dhorjio dori theinei, Itchiore tare soittio dede sien peie.
58006016	Haron manjie borjon dhorinei sobot haan. Ar siendoi sobottan tharattei shokto bili thik gora oi, ar sien beg torgoganir seschan.
58006017	Sedogkie gori Itchiore tar soittiogan odhiharo sompotti ijebe peiebuottei tar uddischuogan no loribo bili alajhala gori degebartei, sobot heinei shokto gori thik gorsie.
58006018	Senottei, dien no loribode jinijchoi, Itchiore gal madibaraw-sombobbili dega oie, jene amar shokto mono shantona thai para. Amar mujungot thoidie ashaganot rokkie pebartei daba jeinei dori thebartei jei paribong bili thuo oie.
58006019	Ei ashaganot amar aptabuottei ekkan luo al age. Sien olode nischoi ar shokto, ar siendoi pordaganor pijendi somanagoi.
58006020	Siot amattun akke-akke jeiebuoi amattei sommiegoi. Ar sibie olode Jisu, jibe umore-umor Melkizedegor dogkie Moharajguruthagur oie.
58007001	Haron ei Melkizedege olode Salem sohoro raja ar bego Dangor Itchiorbuor dhormo guru elo. Abrahame rajagun morei pelanarporendithephiri ette seiet, Melkizedege tare lagot peinei tare asirbad die.
58007002	Tare Abrahame beg jinijchanittun doje-ek bhag die. Tar nanganor polim orthogan olode, “Dharmigkanor raja,” ar Salemor raja. Sieno orthoganio olode, “Shantir raja.”
58007003	Melkizedegottun bab-ma nei. Tartun Purbo-puruschun nei, jormor gora nei, ar tar jibonanor thum nei. The olode Itchioro puo dogkie, ar umore-umorbuo dhormo guru oi age.
58007004	Ei manuschuo hottoman dangor ikkie bhabi sawh. Tarar Purbo-purus Abrahameio tare lud gorinei peiettun doje-ek bhag die.
58007005	Levir bongsogun dhormo guru oion. Thara Abrahamor bongso oi theleio, Niomanor doge ugumanor onusare, tharar bheilogkunottun dos bhagor ek bhag tulon.
58007006	Hintu Melkizedege Levir bongso no oleio, the Abrahamottun dos bhagor ek bhag peie, ar Itchioro soittiogan agede sibiere the asirbad die.
58007007	Dangorbuoi sigonnuore asirbad de. Sien ulluo no oi.
58007008	Ienot mori jande manuschune dos bhagor ek bhag lon. Hintu siene shakki dette jei, Manuschuo baji age ar dos bhagor ek bhag lor.
58007009	Salen hodo sele, dos bhagor ek bhag loidie Levio Abrahamor darai dos bhagor ek bhag dilo.
58007010	Haron Melkizedege jokkene Abrahamore lagot peie, Levio tar Purbo-puruschun Abrahamo iot elo.
58007011	Senottei, puripunnuogan judi Levi dhormothagurunor darai oi (haron sieno tole manjie Nioman peion), Aronor dogkie dhormo guru no oinei, Melkizedegor dogkie oinnio dhormo guru aro hi uduo porette?
58007012	Haron dhormothagurunor haman bodoli gora oinei, dorkaro onusare niomanio bodolana dorkar.
58007013	Haron Jar sombonde ei hodagani huo oie the olode oinnio jador manus. Tar jadottun huno jone palliengot ham no goron.
58007014	Haron amar Probu Judar jadottun ejchie bili jana age. Sei jadtuottun Dhormo mastoror sombonde Mosi hitchu no hoi.
58007015	Tobuio, Melkizedegor dogkie dhormo guru judi ole, oinnio dhormo guru uduonaganot poriskar proman age.
58007016	Sei Dhormothagurbuoi niomo onusare bongso durinei no eje, hintu aw-phurondi jibonor hemoda loinei the ejchie.
58007017	Haron Itchiore shakki dinei hoi, “Melkizedegor dogkie gori, tui olede siro jibono Dhormothagur.”
58007018	Haron norom ar lab nei hinottei, ek hittendi agor nioman phelei die oie.
58007019	Haron niomane hitchu puripunnuo no gore. Hintu ek hittendi ami Itchioro hai jebar uttom ashagan ani de.
58007020	Haron Kristore sobot sara dhormo guru banana no oi.
58007021	(Haron thara sobot sara gori dhormo guru oion, hintu the sobottoi dhormo guru oie. PROBUIE tare hoie, “Itchiore sobot helo, ar the tar monan phireido noi, ‘Melkizedegor dogkie tui olede siro jibono Dhormothagur.’ ”)
58007022	Sei sobottano darai, Jisu uttom suktiganor jabin oie.
58007023	Oinnio shagor dhormo guru agon jigun moron hinottei eksottie dhormo guru oi no paron.
58007024	Hintu the umore-umor thebo hinottei, tar Dhormo mastoro haman bodola no jebo.
58007025	Senottei, jigune tar moddiome Itchioro sidu ejon, tharare the puro gori uddor gori pare. Haron tharattei bor magi dibartei the onsur baji age.
58007026	The olode pobitro, bojong noi, pela no jeie, pabigunottun pharok, ar sorgoganittun the ojol oie hinottei edogkie Moharajguruthagur amattei lak.
58007027	Jisu tare the jokkene dali die, the beg pabpani ekkubare shirei die. Senottei the oinnio Moharajguruthaguro dogkie noi, jigune nijor pabottei, ar manjior pabottei nitto dali die pore.
58007028	Haron niomane manjiortei moharajguruthagur thik gorede sigun olakke norom. Hintu sobottano hodagan jien niomano porendi ejchie, siene Puobuore puripunnuo gorinei umore-umorottei dhormo guru thik gorsie.
58008001	Ami hortie ajol hodagan olode ien, amattun edogkie ek jon Moharajguruthagur age, jibe sorgot Dangorbuor singasonanor denedi boji age.
58008002	Manjie baneie noi, Probuie baneie soittio pobitro jaganot, jibe soittio tobona gorede tambulanot ham gorie.
58008003	Haron prottiek moharajguru-thagur thik gora oidie olode dan ar dali dibartei. Senottei, Etareo huno ekkan dali dena dorkar.
58008004	Haron the judi pittimit thedo, the dhormo guru no olun. Haron niomo onusare dan dibartei dhormothagurun agon.
58008005	Sorgottun nogol gorsie pobitro jaganot thara sebona gorsion, jien shaba dogkie elo. Pobitro jagagan banebartei Itchiore Mosire sigei die. Itchiore tare hoie, “Mounnuot tore dega oiede nomunagano doge begkani banebartei seis.”
58008006	Hintu ikkie the sittun bes uttom ham pelo. Ar Ar theo uttom suktiganor mil goridiebuo olo, jien uttom protiggiaganor darai thik gora oie.
58008007	Haron polim suktigan judi aisai ole, salen jero ien dorkar no lagilun.
58008008	Tharar bhulan peinei the hoie, “Sawh, dinun etton PROBUBUIE hor. Sokkene mui Israelo ghorbuogundoi ar Juda ghorbuogundoi ekkan nuo sukti gorim.
58008009	PROBUBUIE hor, Egypt dejottun mui tharar Purbo-puruschununore adot dhorinei nigilei anniongge dinnuot niom duongge sieno dogkie noi. Haron thara mor nioman no palan, mui tharare aw-pela gorsiong.
58008010	Ei suktigan Israelo ghorbuogundoi gorim gori, PROBUBUIE hor: Haron Sei dinunor porendi mui ei suktigan gorim, ‘Tharar monanit mui mor nioman bhorei di dinei tharar ontoranit mui legi dim. Sebeden mui tharar Itchiorbuo om ar thara mor manus obak.
58008011	Tharattun huno jone tharar paralliegunore ar tharar bheiunore sigeibartei huo no poribo, ‘PROBURE hobor peio.’ Haron tharar moiddie sigonottun duri dangor song begkune more hobor pebak.
58008012	Haron mui tharar be-dhormionittei doyelu om. Tharar pabpani ar niom sara hamani mui monot no rageim ar.”
58008013	Sienot Probuie hoi, “Ekkan nuo niom” poliman puron olo. Ar ikkie jien puron ar buro oie sien bos jebartei jugol oi age.
58009001	Polim suktiganot hamakkai Itchior tobona goribar niom ar pittimit pobitro jaga elo.
58009002	Haron tambul haboro mondirbuo edogkie gori bana oie. Polim bhagkanot serag danieni, tebilan, ar ak pidiegani thon. Jien pobitro jaga hon.
58009003	Di lombor pordagano pijendi pobitro jagano bhagkuo honde Pobitrottun Pobitro.
58009004	Sienot sonar palliengan ar Itchioro sundukkuo age. Itchioro sundukkuo sero hittendi sonaloi mureie, ar siot sonar lodabuo jieno bidirie manna age. Aronor hor uttie ludigkuo, ar pobitro soittiogani legkie silo pattani siot age.
58009005	Itchioro sundukkuor ugure oborug cherubimδ sorgo-dudtuo doyer asonan ugurottun jhabeie gori age. Sienir sombonde ikkie ami puro gori hobar noi.
58009006	Ei jinijchani jokkene jora lagana oie, sebona hamanittei dhormothagurune onsur polim tobona gorede tambulo bhagkuot jan.
58009007	Hintu jero bhagkuot bojore ek bar bana moharajguruthagurbuo, the abar lo sara no jai. Tar nijor pabpanittei ar tar manuschune aw-gyenot gorsie pabpanittei the dan degoi.
58009008	Pobitro Aptabuoi ien degatte olode, polim tobona gorede tambulanot roie, Pobitrottun Pobitro jaganot jebar podtan dega no oi.
58009009	Dan ar dali die oidie sien olode ikkiettei ekkan nomuna. Idie-ittoi gorede sibiere sienie puripunnuo gori no pare.
58009010	Dan ar daligani olode haiddio sombonde, onek poriskar onar sombonde, ar manjior jibono sombonde puribotton somoibuo no ejesong sieni gora awr.
58009011	Hintu ebar agede gom jinijchanittei Kristo Moharajguruthagur ijebe ejchie. Oborug ar onek puripunnuo tambulanot the sommiegi, jien adtoi bana no oi. Sien olode ei songsaror noi.
58009012	Shagolo loloi ar goru-shawh loloi noi, hintu tar nijor loloi umore-umorottei hinenar porendi Pobitro Jaganot umorbuottei the sommiegi.
58009013	Haron damara goru loloi, shagolo loloi ar pari madam goru sheiloi judi shidi dinei aw-shijhigan pobitro gora oi, sien bana heyegan poriskar gora oi.
58009014	Sienittun bes olode, Kristor logane mora hamani poriskar gori dinei, tomar idie-ittaniloi jeda Itchiorbuore dak hal neie gori ononto Aptaloi sebona goribartei Kristo nije Itchioro sidu dan die.
58009015	Ei senottei, tar loganor darai the olode nuo niomanor mil goridiebuo. Haron tar moranaganor darai polim niomanor tole niom bhonggo gorsionde sigunore hininei ononto odhiharo sompottir protiggiagan pan para daga oie.
58009016	Haron suktigan thele, sukti diebuoiohamakkaimoranadorkar oi thai.
58009017	Haron Manuschuo moranar porendi suktigan shokto oi, hintu soittio diebuo baji thagke sien tor no oi.
58009018	Senottei polim suktiganio lo sara gori gojei die no oi.
58009019	Haron Mosi jokkene beg manuschunore niomo onusare prottiek sigkiedinei hoie. Sokkene the goru-shawhgunor logani, shagoluno logani, paniloi loie. Ranga ullan, ar hyssop gajor pada jhubpo bureinei, the niomor boibuo ugure ar beg manuschunor ugure shidi die.
58009020	Mosi hoie, “Ien olode loloi gorsie suktigan jien Itchiore tomare ugum die.”
58009021	Sebeden thik sedogkie gori, tambulanot ar tobona gorte lagede beg bajon-hodoragunor ugure logan shidi di die.
58009022	Niomo onusare perai beg jinijchani loloi sudduo gora oi. Ar lo phelei no die gori pabor hema nei.
58009023	Senottei, sorgottun nogol gorsie jinijchani, ieniloi poriskar gorana dorkar. Hintu sorgor jinijchani nije ittun bes uttom dali lagibo.
58009024	Haron ajol jagaganir nomunaganit, adtoi baneie Pobitro Jaganit Kristo no somaigoi. Hintu sorgoganot the nije somineigoi, amattei the ikkie Itchioro sidu dega obogoi.
58009025	Moharaj guruthagurbuoi bojor bagene oinnio poshur loloi begottun Pobitro Jaganot somaigoi. Hintu Kristo the nije bar-bar tare the dali dibar no lage.
58009026	Songsar sristittun duri the hosto pebar elode sienot, hintu ikkie jugkunor sejot ekkubare the nijore-nije dali dinei, umore-umorottei pabpani dhoi phelei dibartei dega dilogi.
58009027	Haron, manuschun ekbar moribartei thik gora oie, sei porendi bijier obo.
58009028	Thik sedogkie gori, Kristo ekbar diegidie onek manjior pabpani bugibartei. Pabpanir baraio tare ni alsi gori barsei agonde sigunottei the tharar muktiganottei di barottei the dega dibogi.
58010001	Nioman olode gom jinij ebar agede sienir nomunagan. Sien ajol jinijor subhibuo noi. Hintu bojor ekkui dali dile io, sei daligune tobona goribartei ejonde sigunore huno din puripunnuo no gorai.
58010002	A no ole, thara dali dena bondo gorilakkun? Haron ekbar sudduo oinei tobona goriegunor pabor idie-ittan no thelun ar. Hintu sien sedogkie no oi.
58010003	Hintu sei daligun olakke tharar pabpani prottiek bojor monot rageibartei.
58010004	Haron damara gorur lo ar shagolunor loganie pabpani nejeibar sombob noi.
58010005	Senottei, Kristoi songsarot ejchiede lokkene the hoie, “Dali ar dan tortun mone no hoi. Hintu tui mortei ekkan heye jugolei duos.
58010006	Pabottei puri pelana dandoi ar daliloi tui hujhi no os.
58010007	Sebeden mui holung, ‘Sa, mui lungilungi! Onek boiot mor sombonde lega oie, Oh Itchior, tor ischie doge goribartei mui ejchuong.’ ”
58010008	Hintu agendi the hoie, Niomo onusare die oiede daligunot “Dali ar dan, puri pelana dali, ar pabottei dananit tui hujhi no os ar moneio no hoi.”
58010009	Sebeden the holo, “Oh Itchior, sa, tor ischie puron goribartei mui ejchuong.” Jero soittiogan bojeibartei the poliman nejeibo.
58010010	Itchioror sei ischiegano doge Jisu Kristor heyegan ekkubare dali denar phole ami pobitro olong.
58010011	Beg dhormothagurune din bagenethieineibar-bardangoron. Hintu sienie huno din pab muson no gore.
58010012	Hintu ei Manuschuoi umore-umorottei ekbar pabottei dali dinei, Itchiorbuor denedi boji agegoi.
58010013	Siottun duri tar sottrugun tar thengot tole thuo no oi song barsei age.
58010014	Haron ekkuo dalir darai pobitro gora otte sigunore umore-umorottei he puripunnuo goreilo.
58010015	The agendi hoiede doge, Pobitro Aptaio amare shakki dilo,
58010016	“PROBUIE polim holo, Sei dinunor porendi ei suktigan mui thararloi gorim. Tharar ontoranit mor niomani thoi di dim, ar tharar monanit mui sieni legim.”
58010017	Porendi the aro holo, “Tharar pabpani ar tharar niom sara hamani mui monot no rageim ar.”
58010018	Jiot ienittei hema age, siot pabottei dali die no pore.
58010019	Bheilog senottei, Jisur loganor darai Pobitrottun Pobitro Jaganot somibar amar sahoj age.
58010020	Nuo ar jibono podtano darai the amattei sudduo shanggo gorsie, sien olode pordaganodi, jien tar heyegan.
58010021	Itchioro ghoranot ikkie ek jon Rajguruthagur age.
58010022	Senottei, amar monani bojong idie-ittanittun poriskar ar amar heyeganiporiskarpaniloidhoinei, gom mondoi puro bischias loinei hai jei.
58010023	Soittio dede sibie bischias-joggio hinottei, lor sor no oie gori amar ashagan shokto gori dori thei.
58010024	Hospanagan ar gom hamani barebartei, ek jone oinnio jonor pokke sintie gori.
58010025	Dinnuo jedog pai bes gori ghone ejer hinottei, ek dagie goronde dogkie gori, amio sedog amar dolluo phelei no jeinei, ek jone oinnio jonore uschoni tuli diedi gori.
58010026	Haron soittior gyenan ami panar porendi ami judi heizgori pab gori, salen pabottei dali no thebo ar.
58010027	Hintu thebode sien obode dor gore para sasti ar aguno dogkie rak jiene biruddigunore nas goreibo.
58010028	Je Mosir Nioman bad de, tar biruddie di tin jonor shakki die thele, doye meye sara gori mori pan.
58010029	Hodog hodin sasti thebo bili mone goro, je Itchioro Puobuore thengot tole gorinei uribo, logandoi die suktiganor darai pobitro gora oie sien moillio sara mone goribo, ar doyer Aptabuore thatta goribo?
58010030	Haron edogkie gori hoiede sibiere ami hobor pei, PROBUIE hor, “Hena sujonagan mor, ar mui hena ugureim.” Aro Probuie hor, “Probuie tar manuschun the bijier goribo.”
58010031	Jeda Itchiorbuor adot poranagan dor gore para.
58010032	Hintu agor dinun monot tulo. Tumi phoran panar porendi, hosto bhug gorinei onek jagulug lagei peio.
58010033	Ek hittendi tomare jonogonor mujungot laj nejeion, aro ek hittendi siennie hosto peiegunore hostortun shareio.
58010034	Haron tumi mor bondiganot more sit pursie. Ar jokkene thara tomar malani ludi loion tumi hujhi gori sieni maniloio. Sorgot thorede uttom dhon tomar age bili hobor peinei sieni tumi suei roio.
58010035	Senottei, tomar shokto ashagan phelei no duo. Haron siot dangor poriskari age.
58010036	Haron tomar dhorjiogan dorkar oie, jene Itchioro ischie doge goranar porendi, Itchioro soittiogan po para,
58010037	The soittio die, “Haron hanekkon porendi, ejette sibie ebo, the diri no goribo.
58010038	Dharmigkun Bischiasor darai bajibak. Hintu huno jone judi pitbagoli haan, mor monan tar iot hujhi no obo.”
58010039	Hintu nas odonde sigunor moiddie ami sienot pitchuo phiri jedong noi. Hintu ami olongge apta mukti oidie bischias goriegunor loge.
58011001	Bischiaschan olode asha goridie jinijchanir mulan, ar no degkie jinijchanir promanan.
58011002	Haron Bischiasor darai agor borjonnune gom nang peion.
58011003	Bischiasor darai ami bujidie jei, songsarani Itchiore tar hodar darai sristi gorsie. Senottei, dega jaidie jinijchani dega jaidie jinijchanittun bana no oi.
58011004	Bischiasor darai Abele Kainottun bes uttom dali Itchiorore gojeie. Sienor darai the dharmig bili promanan peie. Itchiore tar dananor sombonde shakki der hinottei, the morilieio sienor darai ejosong hoda hor.
58011005	Enokor bischiaschanottei, the no more para, Itchiore tare tuli nejeie. Tare tuli neja oie hinottei tare suph pa no jai ar. Haron tare tuli nejeibar agendi manjie hon, “The Itchiorore hujhi gorsie.”
58011006	Hintu bischiaschan bade Itchiorore hujhi gori bar sombob noi. Haron je Itchioro idu eje, Itchior age bili ar tare ega mone togeiegunore boksit de bili the hamakkai bischias gora poribo.
58011007	Noa huno din no degede sienor sombonde Itchiore tare uij die, ar the Itchiorore doreie. Bischiasor darai Noa ekkan bor jahaj banenei tar ghorbobuo rokkie gorsie. Sienor darai the songsaro manuschunore duji baneie, ar bischiaso doge dharmigkanor odhiharo sompotti ijebe peiebuo oie.
58011008	Bischiasor darai Abrahame Itchioro hoda duoschie. Porendi ekkan jaga odhiharo sompotti ijebe lobartei tare daginei ja bajei die oie. Ar the hudu jar hobor no peie gori, the jeie.
58011009	Bischiasor darai, bi-deji dogkie gori soittio gorsie dejchanot the hoiek din roie. Isaak ar Jakob somot the tambul haboro ghorot roie. Isaakoi Jakobe olakke sei ekkui soittiogan tar loge odhiharo sompotti ijebe peiegun.
58011010	Haron tola-bola ekkan sohor the asha gori barsei elo, jien baneiebuo ar tulliebuo olode Itchiorbuo.
58011011	Bischiasor darai Saraio tar gorbhot puo jormeibar shokti peie. The dhuo pala ereiede oktot ekkuo puo phudeie. Haron the shokto gori the buji loiede jei, soittio dede sibie bischias-joggio.
58011012	Senottei Abrahame, mora manjiortun bes oineio, agajor jhagkuo thara dogkie ar sagoro paror horoli dogkie shagor aw-gonito bongso tartun jormo oion.
58011013	Bischiaschandoi theinei ei manuschun begkun soittiogani no peie gori mori jeiondoi. Hintu tharattun durot gori thara deginei, nischoi gorinei sieni shokto gori thara dori roion. Pittimit thara olakke bi-deji ar tirtho jadtri bili thara haam heion.
58011014	Haron jigune ei hodagani hon, thara pang gori janei duonde jei thara ekkan thebar dej togan.
58011015	Ar jodepode gori, thara jei dejchanottun nigili ejchuon thara judi phiri jebar mone gortak, sei dejchanot phiri jei parilakkun.
58011016	Hintu ikkie thara ekkan uttom dej pebar dhap gorton, ar sien olode sorgo dejchan. Senottei, Itchiore tharattei ekkan sohor banedie hinottei, tharar Itchiorbuo bili hobartei Itchiore no lajai.
58011017	Abrahamore porikkie gora oiede lokkene, Bischiasor darai the Isaakore dali dibartei nejeie. Ar jokkene the soittiogan peie, tar ekkuo gori puo sibie the dali dibartei nejeie.
58011018	Isaakor sombonde Itchiore hoie, “Isaakor darai tore bongso dim.”
58011019	Abrahame bischias gorsiede Itchiore Isaakore morattuno jiei tuli paribo, jien the tulona ijebe tare gojhi loie.
58011020	Bischiasor darai Isaake Jakobore ar Esaure bhobisodor jinijchanir sombonde asirbad die.
58011021	Bischiasor darai Jakobe morette lokkene the Josebor puogunore jon bagene asirbad die. Ar tar ludigkuot abujinei the Itchioro sidu tobona gori di die.
58011022	Bischiasor darai Josebe morette lokkene, Israel manuschun Egypt dejottun ebagke sien ar tar aarunor sombonde the ugum die.
58011023	Bischiasor darai Mosi jormo oinei, rajar uguman no doreie gori tar bab-magune tare tin mas song lugei rageion. Haron thara degkuonde gurobuo doul.
58011024	Mosi dangor-digowl oinei, Bischiasor darai, tare Pharaor jhibuor puo honde sien the no mane.
58011025	Bidi jebode pabpanit anondo utchob no gorinei, Itchioro manuschunor loge hosto bhug goranagan the bei loie.
58011026	The poriskarigan seie hinottei, Egypt dejot dhon-sompotti alajhaganittun bes Kristor aw-sormanan the moillio mone gorsie.
58011027	Bischiasordarai,rajarrakkan no doreie gori the Egypt dejchan phelei ejchie. Haron no degede Sibiere the degkiede dogkie gori dhorjio dori roie.
58011028	Bischiasor darai Mosi Rokkie Utchob ar lo shidi dena paleie, jade jibe Egypt dejor manuschunor polim morod puogun more phelei dede sibie tharare dori no pare.
58011029	Bischiasor darai, suguno madidijaiparaIsraelmanuschune Ranga Pani Sagoran par oi jeion. Hintu Egypt manuschun phuri jebar sesta gorinei, thara duppuon.
58011030	Bischiasor darai, Jerikko sohoro giriegan sat dinsong ber denar porendi, bhangi porsie.
58011031	Bischiasor darai, beschie miliebuo Rahabi, guptosorunore jokkene shantie gojhi loie, Aw-bischiasigunor loge the no more.
58011032	Ar mui tomare hodog hodung ar? Haron Gidionor sombonde, Barakor sombonde, Samsonor sombonde, Jephtar sombonde, ar David dagir, Samuel dagir ar munigunor sombondeio hobar somoie no hulelo.
58011033	Thara Bischiasor darai rejjio jittuon, dharmig ham gorsion, soittiogani peion, singhogunor muoni bondo gori duon.
58011034	Thara agunot tejchan mari duon, jolkridor muottun sarsion. Thara bol neiettun boli oion, judduot sahoji oion, bi-deji soinniogunore lorei duon.
58011035	Miliegune tharar moragun aro jiei tulinei phirei peion. Oinnio bischiasigunoreuddharnogorinei hodin sasti duon, jene thara uttom jiei uduonagan pan para.
58011036	Ejosong ek dagire thatta gorona ar mugurona sastir porikkie peion. Ar ek dagire baninei jiel-hanat thoiondoi.
58011037	Sigunore sil mela duon. Tharare araloi hotta duon. Porikkie gorinei, horgoloi habi phellion. Thara sattok sara oinei, hosto pei-pei sasti bhug gori-gori, bera-shagolo sam ar shagolo sam uri pini ilie padare berei-berei roi peion.
58011038	Songsaro manuschunottei sei manuschun lak no elak. Thara moruobomit ar moununot berei berei roi peion. Thara madir hulongot ar gadot roi peion.
58011039	Igune begkune Bischiasor darai gom nang peineio Itchiore dede pobitro soittiogan no pan.
58011040	Haron Itchiore amattei hoiekkani gom jinij thoi die, jene ami sara thara puripunnuo no on para.
58012001	Amar seropala megsagor dogkie edukkun sei theie agon hinottei, amare dori ragaidie prottiek gourani, ar pabpani jienie amare sohoje dhoregi, sieni amio ek huredi thoi. Amar mujungedi thoi die dumuro-dumuriganot ega mone dumuri.
58012002	Amar bischiaschanor gorabuo ar thuman, Jisure seinei dumuri. Tar mujungedi thoidie hujhigan seinei the kroschan suei roie, lajchan hitchu mone no gore, ar ikkie the Itchioror singasonano denedi bojilogoi.
58012003	Haron adikkie tumi ageie oinei tomar ontorot sahoj neie awh bili tar nijor biruddie pabigunor sottruganit the gaisuei roiede sien bhabi sawh.
58012004	Pabor biruddie tumi judduo goror, ejo song lo phelei denagan badha no duo.
58012005	Puore hoi para uschoni tuli die hodagan tumi puri phelluo. The hoie, “Oh put, PROBUIE sasti gorede sien obohela no goris. The Aw-hoda hole monot dug no goris.
58012006	Haron PROBUIE jare hos pai, the tare shabodanot ragai. gore. Ar tar puogun the jigun gojhiloi sigun the shabodan gore.”
58012007	Tumi judi shabodan goranagan gaisuei thago, Itchiore tomare puo dogkie gori bebohar goribuo. Haron babe puobuore shabodan no goribuo ni na?
58012008	Hintu tumi judi shabodanan no peie gori thago, jien Itchioror beg puogune bhag pebar age, salen tumi jarbuo puo, shodor puo noi.
58012009	Ei baraio, amar munischioro bab agon jigune amare shabodan goron, ar ami tharare sorman gori. Aptar Babpunore ami hujhie tar tole no porinei no thebong ni na?
58012010	Haron hamakkai thara amare hoiek din sasti denagan tharattei uttom dega jai. Hintu amar labottei, jene ami tar pobitrogan bhag peie oi para Itchiore amare sasti de.
58012011	Ar huno shabodanot bortomane hujhi obar noi. Hintu bana phirie. Tobuio, porendi dharmigkanor shantir pholluo tharar doribo, jigune shabodan gora oi.
58012012	Senottei, tomar dhulo-dhulo adtani alok goro, ar tomar durbol adugun uju goro.
58012013	Leng thengani no bijittie gori gom oi para, tomar thenganittei podtani uju goro.
58012014	Beg manuschundoi shanti ar pobitrogan loreio. Pobitrogan sara huno jone Probure degidak noi.
58012015	Adikkie huno jone Itchioro doyeganot no lungibakkoi, uijkare seio. Ar adikkie tidie hodar goragan udinei jagulug udi pare, ar siendoi onek jone borbat oi paron.
58012016	Adikkie shanda gorie ar Esau dogkie jagotik manus obak. The ek sas bhadottei tar jormo odhiharan beschie.
58012017	Haron tumi hobor po, porendi the jokkene asirbadtan odhiharo sompotti ijebe seinei, tare phirei die no oi. The sogo pani phelei phelei mono dug gorilieo tar sujuk nei.
58012018	Haron, tumi je mounnuo agundoi anger, dori para jai, andhar, hala ar bor boier baide jaganot no ejo.
58012019	Sei mounnuot begolo ro ar hoda ro suno jai. Jigune sien sunon, hoda robuo no eje para thara hujoli goron.
58012020	(Haron ugum die oiede sien thara suei no paron. Uguman olode, “Ar judio aro ekkuo jonture mounnuo dhore, sibie sil mela dinei bah, shelloi morei pelana.”
58012021	Degte dor gore para hinottei, Mosi hoie, “Mui dore girgireiong.”
58012022	Hintu tumi ejchuode mounnuo olode Zaion Mounnuo, jiot jeda Itchioro sohoran, sorgor Jerusaleman age, aro aw-gonito sorgo-dud lagot pei.
58012023	Siot dangor temmangan goron, ar sorgot nang legkie polim morodtunor mondolibuo lagot pelagi. BegkunorebijiergoredeItchiorbuo ar dharmig manuschunor aptagun puripunnuo oiegun siot lagot pelagi.
58012024	Siot nuo niomanor mil goridiebuo Jisure lagot pelagi. Abelor loganottun bes uttom lo shididiegan hoidie siot tumi ejchuo.
58012025	Hoda hoidie Sibiere gojhi no lo bili seio. Haron pittimit hoda hoiebuore judi manjie no gojhinei sastigan sari paron, sorgottun hoda hoidie Sibiettun judi ami dhei jei, sittun bes hodin sastigan ami sari paribong ni?
58012026	Sei lokkene tar robuoloi the pittimigan jhagerei die, hintu ikkie the soittio dinei hor, “Aro ek bar mui bana pittimigan no jhagereim, hintu sorgoganio jhagereim.”
58012027	“Aro ek bar” horte sien olode, jhagerei parede sieni the jhagereibo, ar the baneie jinijchani lareibartei jhagereibo, jene jhagerei no parede sieni thai para.
58012028	Senottei, jhagerei no parede rejjio ami peir hinottei hujhi oi. Sienor darai bhoktie, Itchior dorenei ar gojhi lobar joggio gori Itchiorore ami sebona gori pari para.
58012029	Haron amar Itchiorbuo olode bosnejaidie aguno dogkie.
58013001	Bheior dogkie eksottie doye gora-gori gorsio.
58013002	Gorbare lobiot gorana puri no phellio. Haron sedogkie lobiot gorte hobor no peie gori sorgo- dud lobiot gora jai.
58013003	Tumio jiel-hanat agode dogkie gori, jiel-hanat agonde sigunore monot rageio. Ek heyet agode dogkie gori, dugot pori agonde sigunoreo monot rageio.
58013004	Lo-li onagan begkune sorman gortok, ar bischonan aw-pobitro no gortok. Haron shanda ar biebijier goriegunore Itchiore bijier goribuo.
58013005	Tengaδ lubbo no gorsio. Tomartun jien age siendoi hujhi oio. Haron Itchiore nije hoie, “Mui tore huno din phelei no jeim ar no sarim.”
58013006	Senottei, ami sahoj gori hoi pari, “PROBU olode more sahajjio gorie, mui no dorem. Manjie more hi gori paribak?”
58013007	Tomare Itchioro hoda hoi duonde tomar sei murubbigunore monot rageio. Tharar sal-solonani sintie gorinei, tharar bischiaschanor leik adeio.
58013008	Jisu Kristo olode agendi, ikkie ar porendio jei ekkui.
58013009	Aw-sin ar oinnio annio sigkieloi bhokkol no oio. Haron haba-dabar sombonde mon dinei thande sigunottei bhade lab no dede sieni no gorinei, monan doyeloi shokto gorana gom.
58013010	Amar ekkan pallieng age. Pobitro jaganot ham goronde dhormothagurune siottun hebar odhihar nei.
58013011	Moharajguruthagurbuoi Pobitro Jaganot logani ananar porendi poshugunor heyegani hembor barendi puri pela oi.
58013012	Thik sedogkie gori, Jisuio tar nijor loloi manuschunore pobitro goribartei sohoro girieganor barendi hosto peiegoi.
58013013	Senottei, ami hembor barendi tar aw-sormanan buginei tar sidu jei.
58013014	Haron idu amar siro jibonio sohor nei, hintu ebode sohoran ami togeir.
58013015	Senottei, tar darai eksottie Itchiorore amar bainigan dali ijebe gojei. Sien olode amar muonor hodar pholluo, tar nanganot hujhi hoda honagan.
58013016	Hintu gom ham gorana ar bhag diedi gorana puri no phelluo. Haron Itchiore sienit hujhi oi.
58013017	Tomar murubbigunor hoda dorsio ar niroit oio. Haron thara tomar aptagun seresta gori duon ar sigune Itchioro sidu ijeb di pebak. Thara sieni tomartei bejare no gorinei, hujhi gori duon para. Haron bejare gorilie tomartei lab nei.
58013018	Amattei bor magi duo. Haron amar gom idie-it pebar gome hobor pei, ar je huno iet sormanio gori thebar dhap.
58013019	Mui tomar idu jhadi gori aro ebartei, mortei bor magi dibartei mui tomare bes gori hujoli gorongor.
58013020	Amar Probu Jisu, bera-shagolunor Dangor bera-shagol soreibuore morattun jiei tulliede shanti Itchiore ononto suktiganor logan darai,
58013021	tumi tar ischiegan pureibartei the tomar iot tar hujhittei tomare prottiek gom hamot puripunnuo gorog. Jisu Kristor darai tar umore-umor baini ok. Amen.
58013022	Bheilog, mui tomare hujoli gorongor, mui badhi gori legilung hinottei, mui tomare ujuluongotte sien hando gorsio.
58013023	Amar bhei Timothi halas oie bili hobor peio. The jhadi ele mui tarloi tomar idu eim.
58013024	Tomar beg murubbigunore ar beg sadhu manuschunore salam janeio. Italy dejottun tomare salam janadon.
58013025	Doyegan tomar begkunor ugure thok. Amen.
59001001	Mui Jakob, Itchioror ar Probu Jisu Kristor banidaji. Jadtuno sere baro jad settera oionde sigunore mui salam janei nei legongor.
59001002	Oh bheilog, tumi nanan dhoronor porikkiet porilie, sieni begkani hujhi hoda bili mone gorsio.
59001003	Tumi hobor po tomar bischiaschan porikkiet porilie dhorjio ane.
59001004	Tumi puro obartei ar puripunnuo obartei, dhorjiogane tar haman purei pebo. Sebeden tomar hitchu pora odo noi.
59001005	Tomartun judi huno jone gyen pora oi, the Itchiorottun magok, no gobpie gori Itchiorbuoi begkunore alajhala gori dede sibiei sien tare dibo.
59001006	Monot shiongshama gori no maginei hintu the bischias gorinei magok. Haron jar monot shiongshama thai, the olode sagoro pani-tubolan boiere jindi pai nejaidie sieno dogkie.
59001007	Je shiongshamagan monot ragai, the Probuttun huno ekkan pebo gori no bhabibo.
59001008	Sei manuschune jar dien mon, the jien gorto sat thik noi.
59001009	Jei bheibuo niroit, the dangor podobi phele bhaggottie bili nijore-nije mone gorog.
59001010	Ar thagoiebuoi niroit oleio hujhi ok. Haron thagoiegun jharbuo phul phudinei jhuri poronde dogkie obak.
59001011	Haron belan gorom gori udiboio herani shugei pelai ar phulun jhuri poron. Sebeden phulunor doulan nosto oi jai. Sedogkie gori thagoie manuschuneio tharar hamanot nosto obak.
59001012	Je porikkiegan thori thei pare, the hoballie. The thori thei parsie hinottei, the jibono raj-tukkuo pebo, Probuie soittio dede jigune tare hos pan, sigunore siennie raj-tuk dibode sibie the pebo.
59001013	Pabo bhulot pole huno jone no hodok, “Itchiore more pabot pheleibartei bhuleie.” Haron Itchiore harore bojonggoi pabot pheleibartei bhulei no pare, ar the nijeio harore pabot pheleibartei no bhuloi.
59001014	Hintu prottiek jone pabo bhulot poronde sien olode, jokkene tharar nijor lubbogane tani nejai ar sebeden dhora poron.
59001015	Lubbogan jormeile, siene pabpan jormei de. Ar pabpan dangor ole, moranagan dage.
59001016	Oh mor agojor bheilogkun, tomare huno jone no thogadok.
59001017	Prottiek gom boksit ar puripunnuo dan ugurottun eje. Sieni sorgo phoranir Babpuottun lamonnie eje. Shaba dogkie the huno din no bodole.
59001018	Soittio hodagano darai tar nijor ischiei Itchiore amare jormo die. The sristi gorsiede sienor ek dhoronor polim pholluo ami obartei the amare jormo die.
59001019	Oh mor agojor bheilogkun, senottei, jhadi suinnio, lare gori mattio, ar jhadi rak no tullio.
59001020	Haron rakkandoi Itchioro pobitrogan ham no sole.
59001021	Senottei, beg gom noi ani ar odorbara bojongani ek huredi tho. Niroit oinei tomare bhoreidie hodagan lo. Sei hodagane tomar aptagun rokkie gori paribo.
59001022	Bana hodagan suninei no gorilie, tumi nije-nije thogiba. Hodagano doge-dogeio gorsio.
59001023	Ek jone judi hodagan suninei sei doge-doge no gore, the olode ek jon manjie tar jormo lokke elode muon anat saidie dogkie.
59001024	The tar muon seinei jeiegoio tar dogkan the puri phellie.
59001025	Hintu je shadin paidie puripunnuo nioman seinei eksottie palai, ar the suninei puri no pelai, hintu haman gore, the gorede hamanit the hujhi obo.
59001026	Tomar moiddiettun ek jone judi the dharmig holai, hintu the tar jilan no domai, sei Manuschuoi tar monanore thogai. Tar dhormogan moillio nei.
59001027	Hintu je bab-ma mora-shawh ar rani-miliegunore tharar hosto lokke sai, ar the songsaro bodnam-binnamortun sarsie gori thai. Bab Itchiorbuoi edogkie dhormo hati ar bojong sibier nei bili maniloi.
59002001	Oh bheilog, oborug Probubuo amar Probu Jisu Kristor bischiaschandoi eitzabot gorinei ham no gorsio.
59002002	Haron ek jone judi tomar shobat sonar andik ar doul habor uri eje, ar ek jone judi hajor habor uri eje,
59002003	tumi judi doul habor ursie manuschuore sorman gorinei tare ho, “Ei gom jaganot boj.” Ar tumi judo gorib manuschuore ho, “Iot thiei thak,” bah “Mor theng thongge jagano hure boj.”
59002004	Mono hu-bhabedi bijier gorinei tomar moiddie eitzaboran anibade noi ni?
59002005	Oh mor agojor bheilogkun, mor hodani suno. Itchiore ei songsaro gorib manuschun bischiasodi thagoie obartei ar jigune tare hos pan the soittio dede thara rejjiogan peiegun obartei bei loiede noi ni?
59002006	Hintu tumi gorib manuschunore aw-mannio gorsio. Thagoiegune tomare hosto lagande ar Kodot bolajure nejande noi ni?
59002007	Tomare daga jaidie gom nangan thara sorjande noi ni?
59002008	Sastro onusare rajotto nioman, “Tui nijo dogkie gori tor paralliegunore hos peis,” tumi judi soittio gori puron goro tumi sale gom goror.
59002009	Hintu tumi judi eitzabor goro salen pab goror. Niomane hoi, tumi niom bhonggo goro.
59002010	Haron je beg niomani palade bana ekkanot aw-puron thele, the beg niomani no palai para oi.
59002011	Senottei Itchiore hoi, “Tui shanda no goris, Ar tui huno no goris.” Tui judi shanda no goros hintu tui judi hun gorilie, tui niom bhonggo gorie obe.
59002012	Shadin dede Niomano darai tomare bijier gora obo. Senottei, osit hoda hoio ar osit ham gorsio.
59002013	Haron jei manuschunor oinnio jonore sit no pure, tharareo sit no pursie gori bijier gora obo. Sitpuronagan bijieranottun bes dangor.
59002014	Oh bheilog, ek jone judi hoi, “Mor bischiaschan age, ” hintu tar haman nei, hi lab obo sei? Sei bischiaschane tare mukti gori paribo ni?
59002015	Ek bheior bah ek bonor judi uron-pinon bah bhat-pani no thai,
59002016	ar tomartun ek jone judi tharare hoi, “Shantie jogoi, ume ghume thagkuo. Ped boron ho, ” hintu the judi tharar heyettei lagede sieni no de, hi lab obo sei?
59002017	Bischiaschanio thik sedogkie. Bischiaschane judi ham no degai, ien nije-nije mora.
59002018	Ek jone judi hoi, “Tor bischiaschan age ar mor haman age, haman nei gori tor bischiaschan more dega dei.” Salen mor hamandoi mor bischiaschan mui tore degeim.
59002019	Tui bischias goros Itchior ekkuo, thik, bhudtuneo daw bischias goron, ar dore girgiran.
59002020	Oh bhola, haman nei gori bischiaschan mora de tui hobor pas ni?
59002021	Amar Purbo-puruschun Abrahame tar puobuo Isaakore palliengano ugure gojeinei tar hamano darai Itchiore tare dharmig gonniede noi ni?
59002022	Shah, bischiaschane hamandoi eksomare gorer. Hamano darai tar bischiaschan puripunnuo olo.
59002023	Sastroie hoiede hodagan puron olo, “Abrahame Itchiorore bischias gorsie hinottei tare dharmigkanotgonaoie.” Sebeden tare Itchioro bondhubuo ho oie.
59002024	Senottei tumi sawh, hamano darai dharmig bili gona oi, bana bischiaschano darai noi.
59002025	Thik sedogkie gorie, Rahabireio hamor darai Itchiore dharmig gonniede noi ni? Guptosor the raganar porendi, tharare oinnio podedi the ja bajei die.
59002026	Aptabuo sara heyegan mora. Thik sedogkie gori, haman sara Bischiaschanio mora.
59003001	Oh bheilog, tomartun sigkie die no oio, haron ami sigkie diegunor bes gour bijier obo.
59003002	Amio onek hittendi ujuot hei hinottei je tar hodat bhul no gore, the bujuno manus. The tar goda heyegan domon gori parede sie.
59003003	Sawh, ami jindi mone hoi sindi nibartei ghoraguno muonit jing sorei di. Jinganor darai ghoragunore ami jindi pai gurei pari.
59003004	Jahajchano sawh. Sieni baari dangor ar boiero nale nilieo, ekkan sigon pattoliloi majhibuoi jindi mone hoi sindi phirei.
59003005	Thik sedogkie gori, jilan olode heyeganor sigon ek onggo. Hintu iene bor-bor hoda hoi. Sawh, ekkan sigon agune bor jhar ekkan puri phelei pare.
59003006	Jilan olode aguno dogkie. Ien olode amar heyet ekkan aw-dharmigor songsar. Jilan olode heyeganor ekkan onggo, jiene goda heyeganore hajor gore. Ienie ama jibono begkanit agun jale dei. Jilano agunan ejede norogottun.
59003007	Haron manjie nanan dhoronor poshu, pheig, buk-sejerei berande sigun ar sagorot poran-bolagunore sigkie gorton ar tharare honatto sigkie gorsion.
59003008	Hintu huno jone jilanore sigkie gori no paron. Ien ekkan manjie dhori ragei no parsie jinij. Ienot morei pelaidie bis boron gori age.
59003009	Jilandoi Bab Itchiorbuore ami hujhi hoda hoi. Jilandoi Itchioro subhibuo dogkie gori sristi gorsie manuschunore ami geil di.
59003010	Ekkan muendi ami baini gori ar geil di. Oh bheilog, sieni sedogkie ona osit noi.
59003011	Ekkan uiphudottun poriskar pani ar tidie pani nigilibo ni?
59003012	Oh bheilog, ekkuo dumur gajot oliv gulo dori paribo ni? Ekkan angguro ludit dumur gulo dori paribo ni? Thik sedogkie gori ekkan uiphudottun nun pani ar poriskar pani nigili no paribo.
59003013	Tomar mioddie honna gyeni ar buje? The shot podedi solette ieno darai degok. Tar gom haman niroit gyenandoi degok.
59003014	Hintu tomar ontorot judi bis deganagan ar holigan thai, bar no goris ar soittiogano biruddie gal no madis.
59003015	Sei gyenan ugurottun no eje, hintu sien olode songsarik, ontorottun ar debedar.
59003016	Haron jiot bis deganagan ar agudonagan thai, siot jagulugkan ar beg bojongani thebo.
59003017	Ugurottun ejede gyenan olode polim sudduo, sebeden shantoshil, nombro, oinnio jonottei gom. Ienot sitpurona ar gom phole bora thai. Ienot eitzaboran ar phagaragan nei.
59003018	Shantittei hamgoriegune shanti ham goron ar siene dharmigkan barai.
59004001	Mara-mari ar hoschie herengkal tomar idu huttun eje? Tomar heyet ongso moiddie porane magkie, il oidie ham goribartei judduo gorede sittun ejede noi ni?
59004002	Tomartun shokto gori porane mage, hintu porane magkiegan no po. Tumi hun goro, ar tumi jieni lubbo goro sieni no po. Senottei tumi mara-mari ar hoschie herengkal goro. Tumi Itchiorottun no mago hinottei, tomar porane magede sieni no po.
59004003	Haron tomar porane magkie hamot lageibartei tumi huno ekkan mago. Tumi hu-mone mago hinottei, magilieo no po.
59004004	Oh shanda goriegun, songsarloi bondhu ole, Itchiorloi sottru oi paidie hobor po ni? Senottei, je songsarloi bondhu odosai the nijore-nije Itchioro sottru oi.
59004005	Sastroi magana-magana no hoi, “Amar bidirie thaidie sibie Pobitro Aptabuoi shokto gori pijhum gore.”
59004006	Hintu Itchiore amare baari doye gore. Senottei the hoie, “Itchiore phodani manuschunore badha de, hintu niroit manuschunore the doye gore.”
59004007	Senottei nijore-nije Itchioro sidu gojei duo. Hintu Diabolareδ badha duo, sebeden the tomartun dhei jebo.
59004008	Itchioro hai ejo, sebeden theo tomar hai ebo. Pabigun, tomar adtani dhoi pelo. Dien mon-bolagun, tomar monani sudduo goro.
59004009	Tomar dugo obostagano sombonde monot dug gorsio, gujhi-gujhi ar gujhi-gujhi hano.
59004010	Probur mujungot niroit oio, ar sebeden the tomare ojolot tulibo.
59004011	Oh bheilog, sorja-sorji no gorsio. Je tar bheibuore sorjai, ar duji banai, the Niomanore sorjai ar Niomanore duji banai. Hintu tui judi Niomanore duji banas, salen, tui Nioman paleie noi, hintu Niomanore duji baneiebuo.
59004012	Niom die bana ek jon, ar the mukti gori pare ar nas gorio pare. Salen onnio jonore duji baneiebuo tui honna?
59004013	Ien tumi hode sigune suno, “Edchie-hellie ami ekkan sohorot jebong. Ami sidu ek bojor thebonggoi. Beja-hine gorinei tengaδ hamei bonggoi.”
59004014	Hellie tomar hi obo tumi hobor no po. Tomar jibonan hi sei? Ien olode bhap dogkie, hanekkon dega dinei ar bos jai.
59004015	Tumi ien hona osit, “Itchioro ischie ole, ami baji thebong, sebeden ien ubuon goribong.”
59004016	Hintu phodanie ikkie tumi bar goror. Siennie bar goranagan gom noi.
59004017	Senottei, je gom ham goribar hobor peineio no gore, sien tartei gom noi.
59005001	Thagoie manuschun, suno. Tomar ugure dugko-doja ebo hinottei, gujhi-gujhi ar gujhi-gujhi hano.
59005002	Tomar dhonani borbat oie. Tomar habor-suborani puge hei duon.
59005003	Tomar sona rubuoganire jangare dhorsie. Sei jangaranie tomar biruddie shakki dibo. Iene tomar eragani agune hai para hebo. Sejo dinunottei dhon tumi joma thoio daw.
59005004	Suno, tomar jhumot ham gorsionde sigunore tumi thogeio. Tumi tharare bedon no duo. Tharar bedonune tomar biruddie jogar parton. Ham goriegune jokkene abitti goron sokke sorgo ‘soinnioguno Probuie’ sune.
59005005	Pittimit tumi suge ago, ar tomar bojong mono ischiegano pureila. Ekko dine morei pheleibartei dogkie tomar monani pokta gorsio.
59005006	Duj nei manuschun duji banenei tumi morei phelluo. Thara tomare badha no duon.
59005007	Oh bheilog, Probu eje song dhorjio dori thago. Sawh, dug-ham goriegune madittun gom phol utponno obartei barsei than. Akke jhoran ar jero jhoran eje song dhorjio dorinei diri gori barsei than.
59005008	Tumio tomar manani shokto gorinei dhorjio dori thago. Haron Probu ebar oie.
59005009	Bheilog, abitti gora-gori no gorsio jene tomareo duj badei die no oi. Sawh, bijier goriebuo duorot thiei agegi.
59005010	Oh bheilog, munigune Probur nange hoi di jeion. Sieni ado. Thara dug-hosto peionde lokke, thara dhorjio dori roion.
59005011	Suno, ami hoi je dhorjio dori thei pare the hoballie. Jobare sawh, the dhorjio dori roie. Tumi hobor po Probuie Jobartei sejot hi gori die. Probuttun onek doye ar sitpuronagan age.
59005012	Oh bheilog, ien begottun dorkari hoda mui tomare legongor. Sobot heinei soittio no duo. Sorgot ok, pittimit ok je huno oinnio jinij loinei sobot no heio. Awle “Oi,” no le “noi” hoio. Anole, phagarat poriba.
59005013	Tomartun huno jone dug-hosto por ni? The bor magok. Huno jone hujhi oio ni? The baini gid gok.
59005014	Tomartun huno jon aw-sug oion ni? The mondolir borjonnun dagok. Thara tare tel guli dinei tartei Probur nange bor magi dedok.
59005015	Bischiasor bor maganagane aw-sugkiebuore gom goribuo. Probuie tare tulibo. The judi pab gori thai, Probuie tar pabpani mab dibo.
59005016	Tomar oboradtani haam ho. Tumi gom oi para, bor magi diedi goro. Dharmig manjior shokto bor maganagane onek ham gori pare.
59005017	Elijaio amar dogkie manus. Jhor no de para the ega mone bor magkie. Ar sebeden share-tin bojor pittimit jhor no de.
59005018	The aro bor maginei, debabuoi jhor die. Sebeden madittun phol utponno oion.
59005019	Oh bheilog, tomartun ek jon judi soittioganottun jhuri pore, sebeden ek jone tare aro phirei ane,
59005020	Ien monot rageio: Je huno jone ek jon pabi manus bojong podottun phirei anilie, morattun ekkuo apta the bajebo. The onek pab dagi rageibo.
60001001	Mui Pitor, Jisu Kristor Apostoloi Pontas rejjiot, Galatia rejjiot, Kappadokia rejjiot, Asia rejjiot ar Bithunia rejjiot settera oinei porbhajchie dogkie gori agonde sigunore legongor.
60001002	Bab Itchiore tomare akke duri hobor peinei, Aptai nokbhaj gorinei Jisu Kristore manibartei ar tar logan shidi dinei tomare bei tullie. Doyegan ar Shantigan tomar idu alajhala gori thok.
60001003	Jisu Kristore morattun jiei tulona darai, jeda ashaganot ebar amare tar alajhala doyegandoi jormo dede Itchiorbuor ar amar Probu Jisu Kristor Babpuor donniobad ok.
60001004	Odhiharo sompotti’ jien poji no jai, hajor no oi, ar sidie no oi sien tomartei sorgot thoi die oie.
60001005	Itchioro hemodagano darai tumio mukti pebartei bischiaso darai ragei die oie, sei muktigan ses somoiot phogodang gori dibartei jugol oi age.
60001006	Judio dorkar ole ikkie hanekkonottei nanan porikkiet porinei monot dug pei paro, ienot tumi shanggadik hujhi aw.
60001007	Sei porikkiegani olode tomar bischiaschan porikkie sebartei. Tomar bischiaschan sonattun bes moillioban, jien agundoi porikkie gorilie goli jai. Jisu Kristo jokke dega obogi, tomar bischiaschan sokkene baini, sorman ar oborug oi para.
60001008	Judio tumi tare no dego, tobuio tumi tare hos po. Ar judio ikkie tumi tare no degor, tobuio tumi tare bischias goror. Senottei, hoi borei no ejchie hujhigandoi ar oborugkandoi shanggadik utchob goro.
60001009	Tomar bischiaschanor thuman olode tomar aptagunor muktigan sien peba.
60001010	Ei muktigano sombonde munigune gome-dalei ar uijkare togeion ar tomar idu ebode doyegano sombonde thara agami hoidi jeion.
60001011	Munigune sei somoibuo hokke ebo ar hingori ebo, sei sombonde topto gorsion. Tharar iot elode Kristor aptabuoi Kristo hosto pebogide sieni ar sei porendi oborug obode sienir sombonde honatto hoi die.
60001012	Ei somoibuot sorgottun padei die Pobitro Aptar darai gom hoboran tomar idu prosar gora oie. Munigune hoionde sieni tomare janei die oie. Munigune hoionde lokke janei die oiede jei sien tharattei noi, hintu sien amattei. Sienir sombonde sorgo-dudtuneio topto goribartei shanggadik dhap goron. Pobitro Oio
60001013	Senottei, homorot habor piji-piji baninei hamortei jugol oidie dogkie gori tomar monani jugol goro. Nijore-nije domon awh ar Jisu Kristoi dega dibogidie lokkene tomare anidibode doyeganot tomar ashagan puro gori rago.
60001014	Hoda manie guro dogkie gori aw-gyenot ela hinottei, ago lubboganit no thagkuo.
60001015	Hintu je tomare dagkie the pobitro hinottei, tumio beg solsorittrot pobitro oio.
60001016	Haron Pobitro Sastroi hoi, “Mui pobitro hinottei tumio pobitro oio.”
60001017	Beg manjiore eitzabor no gorsie gori nijor hamo onusare bijier gorede Babore judi tumi dago, idu tumi porbhajchie ijebe thebade bidirie tomar solsorittrot dorenei thagkuo.
60001018	Tumi hobor po jei tomar Purbo-puruschununottun peie moillio neie poribhesanittun hoi jaidie jinij, jene sona robuoloi shorei lo no oi.
60001019	Hintu Kristo, jibe ni-rugi, dak halneie bera-shagolo shawh dogkie, sibier gunor loloi tomare shorei lo oie.
60001020	Songsar sristi agendi Kristore honatto thik gori tho oie, hintu ei sejo somoigunot tare tomartei degeilo.
60001021	Kristor darai tumi Itchiorore bischias gorsio. Tomar bischiaschan ar ashagan Itchioro iot thai para Itchiore tare morattun jiei tullie ar oborugkan die.
60001022	Soittiogan maninei Apta darai tomar monani sudduo gorila hinottei bheilogkunottei tomar phagara nei hospanan age. Senottei pobitro mondoi ega mone hos pa-pi gorsio.
60001023	Poji jaidie bijittun tumi nuo jormo no aw, hintu poji no jaidie bijittun, Itchioro hoda jien jeda ar umore-umor thai sieno darai tumi nuo jormo peio.
60001024	Haron, “Beg manuschun olakke hero dogkie, Tharar beg oborugkani hero phulo dogkie. Herani sidie oi jai, ar ienir phulun jhuri poron.
60001025	Hintu PROBUR hodagan umore-umor thai.” Ikkie ei hodagan gom hoborano darai tomare janei die olo.
60002001	Senottei, beg bojong monani, beg thoganagani, phagaragani, insie goranagani, ar beg sorjanagani bad duo.
60002002	Hujhi guro dogkie gori aptar hati dut pebartie shokto gori dhap goro, jade tumi sienor gune dangor aw para.
60002003	Tumi joga seio daw, jei Probu olode doyeli senottei dab goro.
60002004	Manjie phelei die hintu Itchiore bei loie silluo jibe jeda ar moillioban sibie idu tumi ejo.
60002005	Tomarloi jeda silo dogkie gori aptar ghor tulo awr. Jisu Kristor darai Itchiore gojhiloi para aptar dali dibartei pobitro guruthaguro dolot tomare lo or.
60002006	Senottei, ei hodaganio Sastrot age, “Sawh, ekkuo baari gunor sil Mui bei loiong. Sibie mui Zaion sohorot begottun gunor mul-sil huppiong. Je tare bischias gore the huno din lajot porto noi.”
60002007	Senottei, tumi bischias gorsio bili tomartei the moillioban. Hintu bischias no goronde sigunottei, “Ghor-tulliegune phelei duonde silluo begottun gunor mul-silluo olo.”
60002008	Ar, “Ujuot haidie sil, ar azar haidie sil.” Hodagan thara aw-mannio goron hinottei ujuot haan, ar sienot tharareo thik gora oie.
60002009	Hintu tumi olade bei loie piri, rajguruthaguro dol, pobitro jad. Tumi olade tar nijor manus, jene tomare andharottun tar oborug phoranot anniede sibiere tumi baini goro para.
60002010	Agendi tumi Itchioror manus no ela, hintu ikkie tumi Itchioror manus ola, ar agendi tumi doyegan no po, hintu ikkie tumi doyegan pela.
60002011	Oh mor agojorun, mui tomare porbhajchie ar aw-sin manjio sannie gori monor hujoli gorongor, aptabuor biruddie judduo gorede heyet hamona lubbottun pharok oi thago.
60002012	Be-jadtunor moiddie tomar hatchiekkani gom uo poribo, jei thara tomare bojong bili hoi theleio, thara tomar gom hamani deginei Itchiore bijier goribogide dinnuot Itchiorore baini goron para.
60002013	Senottei, Probur nange manjior beg murubbiguno tole thago, rajabuo,jibebegkuno ugure odhihar sibier toleo thagkuo.
60002014	Bojong ham goriegunore sasti goribartei ar gom hamgoriegunore baini goribartei rajabuoi judi sason-gorie dipadele siguno toleo thagkuo.
60002015	Haron sien Itchiorottun mone hoidie jei, tumi gom ham goranar darai murukko manuschunor hodagani sub gori thoi dida.
60002016	Shadinandoi bojongan dagi thoinei noi, hintu Itchioro banidaji dogkie gori ar shadin manjior dogkie gori tole thagkuo.
60002017	Beg manuschunore sorman gorsio, bischiasi bheilogkunore hos peio. Itchiorore doreo ar rajabuore sorman gorsio.
60002018	Ghoro sagorsiegun, dorenei tomar girojchuno tole thagkuo, bana gom ar santosilluno sidu noi hintu jigun huttieri siguno toleo thagkuo.
60002019	Haron ek jone judi tar Itchiorbuo proti idie-ittanottei oinniei gori dug-hosto bhug gore siendoi Itchiore hujhi oi.
60002020	Haron tumi duj gorinei meir hele judi suei thago, hi baini obo sei? Hintu tumi gom ham gorinei hosto phele judi suei thago, siendoi Itchiore hujhi oi.
60002021	Sienottei na tomare daga oiede, Kristoio amattei hosto peiegi ar the amattei ekkan sinnuo phelei di jeie jene tumi tar huschun adei paro para.
60002022	“The huno pab no gore, tar muottun huno ekkan thogeibar hoda pa no jai.”
60002023	Tare aw-hoda hoinei, the bare bar aw-hoda no hoi. The hosto bhug gorinei, the harore dhomki no de, hintu soittio bijier gorede sibier adot tare the gojei die.
60002024	The tar nijor heyet amar pabpani gajchuo ugure bugi die, jene ami pabo nange morinei dharmigkano nange baji thei, tar bari-dakkani darai tumi gom ola.
60002025	Haron tumi alga bera-shagolo dogkie ela, hintu ikkie tumi tomar aptar Rakkolibuo ar aptagun Sei dede sibier idu phiri ela.
60003001	Oh mogkun, sedogkie gori tomar nijor negkuno tole thagkuo, jenehoiekjonnegejudio hodagan no manilie, hodagan sara gori tharar mogkunor hatchiekkanloi tharare jidi para jaipara.
60003002	Tomar duoraniloi sudduo hatchiekkani thara jokke debak tumi tharare jidi pariba.
60003003	Tomar shajanagan bana barendi no ok sul seraban dena, sona pinena, bah doul habor urona.
60003004	Hintu shajanagan no degkie ontorot, poji no jaidie nombro ar shantoshil apta doulandoi ok. Sien Itchioro sogedi gom dega jai.
60003005	Haron edogkie gorinei, ago dinot pobitro milieguneo jigune Itchiorore bischias gorsion, tharar nijor negkuno tole theinei thara nije sarsion.
60003006	Sari Abrahamor hoda duoschie ar the tare probu dagkie. Judi tumi gom ham goro ar hono hichu dorgorede jinij no doro sale tumi Sarar jhi oba.
60003007	Oh negkun, thik sedogkie gori tomar mogkundoi bujopara oinei thago. Thara moktoba pilie ar jibonor doyegan odhikaro sompotti bhag peie somarsie ijebe tumi tharare sorman gorsio, jene tomar bor maganagani badha no pore.
60003008	Bego sejot, tumi begkune ekmon oio, sit puro-puri gorsio. Bheio dogkie gori hos pa-pi oio, doyeli ar nombro oio.
60003009	Aw-hoda azai aw-hoda ar insie azai insie phirei no duo. Tumi hobor po odhikaro sompotti asirbadtan pebartei tomare daga oie. Senottei, bojonggo azai asirbad duo.
60003010	Haron, “Je jibonan hos pai ar gom din dedo sai the tar jilan bojong hoda honattun somori thok ar thogeibar hoda honattun tar muon somori thok.
60003011	The bojonggottun phirinei gom ham gorog. Ar the Shantigan togok ar lorok.
60003012	“Haron PROBUIE tar sogkundoi dharmig manuschunore sei age, ar tar hananiloi tharar bor maganagani sune. Hintu bojong ham goronde sigunottun PROBUIE tar muon phirei.”
60003013	Tumi judi gom haman leik ado honna tomare hoti goribuo?
60003014	Hintu dharmigkanottei judio tumi hosto bhug gorilie tumi hoballie. “Ar tharar dhomkieni no doreo, jagulugio no bottio.”
60003015	Hintu Probu Itchiorbuore tomar ontorot nokbhaj gori thoio. Ar tomar ontorot agede ashagano sombonde je huno jone haron pujor gorilie, rokkie goribartei niroit ar sorman gori uttor dibartei onsur jugol oi thagkuo.
60003016	Gom idie-ittan rageio jene, bojong ham gorie bili nang horab gori dile, Kristo iot tomar gom solsorittrogani bojong hoi duonde sigune lajan para.
60003017	Haron, judi Itchioro ischie ole, bojong hamortei hosto bhug gorana darane gom hamortei hosto bhug gorana bes gom.
60003018	Haron, Kristoi heyedi morinei hintu Aptabuor darai baji theinei, the amare Itchiorbuo sidu anibartei, dharmigkuoi aw-dharmigkunottei, theo pabpanittei ekbar hosto bhug gorsie.
60003019	Aptabuor daraio the jiel-hanat jeinei aptagunor sidu prosargorsiegoi.
60003020	Puronaamolot Noa jugot, hoda no manonde sei aptagunore eksomoi Itchiore dhorjio dori theinei barsei roie. Sei lokke Noa bor jahajchan banar, sienot hoiek jon, bana attiobuo apta panittun uddhar gora oie.
60003021	Sei panigan olode ekkan baptisma sinno jiene amare ikkie mukti gore. Baptismagan olode heyettun hajorani dhoi pelanagan noi, hintu Jisu Kristor jiei uduonagano darai gom idie-ittanottun Itchiorbuo sidu protiggiagan.
60003022	The sorgot jeie ar Itchioro denedi agegoi. Sorgo-dudtun, odhikarani ar hemodagani tar odhikaro tole thuo oie.
60004001	Kristo amattei tar heyet hosto bhug gorsie hinottei, sei ekkui monandoi tumio aittier loinei thago. Haron je tar heyet hosto bhug gorsie the pabottun sarsie.
60004002	Senottei the manjior lubbo doge tar bagi jinghanigan no hadeinei, hintu Itchioro ischie doge hadeibo.
60004003	Haron agendi, bes bhag somoi Be-jadtunottun mone hoidie sieni ami gorsei. Ami sineli hamot sollei, lubbo gorsei, mattol oiei, haba-daba gorsei, dol bodinei mod heiei, ar be-aini gori mokti pujchei.
60004004	Sienittei, thara asharjio oion jei, tumi tharar somare sei thamei no parsie pelangbei porsie pabo hamot no jo hinottei thara tomare sorjan.
60004005	Jedagunore ar moragunore bijier goribartei jugol oi agede sibiere thara hamakkai ijeb di pebak.
60004006	Ei haronanottei gom hoborano moraguno sidu prosar gora oie, jene tharare manjior heye doge bijier gora jai, hintu aptadi Itchioro doge bajon para.
60004007	Hintu beg jinijchanir thuman hai ejchie, senottei tumi bor magi pharopara uijkar ar nijore-nije domon gori theio.
60004008	“Hospanagane onek pabpani dagi thoi.” Senottei,jehuno iettun shokto gori hos pa-pi gorsio.
60004009	No budbudeinei lobiot gora-gori gorsio.
60004010	Jengori jon bagene bor peio, sengori sei bor’ani Itchioror onek dhoronor gom doyer dhon-rakkoli dogkie gori sienit sebona gora-gori gorsio.
60004011	Je hoda hoi, the eisannie gori hok, jene the Itchioro muonottun nigillie hoda dogkie gori hok. Je sebona gore, Itchiore bol dede dogkie gori the gorog, jene je huno iet Jisu Kristor darai Itchioror baini oi para, jar mohimagan, hemodagan umore-umor ok. Amen.
60004012	Mor agojorun, tomare aguno dogkie porikkieloi porikkie gora obode sien asharjio jinij tomar ghodi jeiede dogkie no bhappo.
60004013	Hintu Kristor hosto bhugkan eddur song tumi bhag loinei hujhi aw, jene jokkene tar oborugkan dega jebo, tumio shanggadik anondo oinei hujhi aw para.
60004014	Judi Kristor nanganottei manjie tomare insie gorilie, tumi hoballie, haron oborugkano Aptabuo ar Itchioro Aptabuo tomar ugure thai. Tharar indi tare sorja oi, hintu tomar indi tare oborug gora oi.
60004015	Hintu tomartun huno jone hun gorie ijebe, suro ijebe, bojong ham gorie ijebe, ar manjior hamot jagulug gorie ijebe hosto bhug gorie no oio.
60004016	Hintu judi je huno jone Kristien ijebe hosto bhug gori pai, the no lajok, hintu sienot the Itchiorore baini gorog.
60004017	Haron Itchioro ghorot bijier arambo goribartei somoibuo ejchie. Ar ien judi amar iot akke arambo oi, salen Itchioro gom hoboran no manonde sigunor thuman hi obo?
