60004018	Ar, “Judi dharmigkun huno rogome mukti phele, Itchior bhokti-saragunor ar pabigunor hi obosta obo?”
60004019	Senottei Itchioro ischie doge jigune dug-hosto bhug goron sigune gom ham gorinei tharar aptagun bischias-joggio Sristi goriebuore gojei dedok.
60005001	Tomar moiddie agonde borjonnunore mui uschoni tuli duongor. Muio ek jon borjon ar Kristor hosto bhugkani shakki die, ar dega dibogidie oborugkanot phagot sommie.
60005002	Tomar moiddie agede Itchioro dolluo bera-shagol soreie dogkie gori lobiot gorsio, bole-bole noi hintu mone hujhie, hu-labottei noi hintu mone-prane gorsio.
60005003	Tomare gojeidie siguno ugure ugum saleie ijebe noi, hintu dolluoi deginei shigibar lak ijebe gorinei.
60005004	Ar jokkene ajol bera-shagol Soreiebuo ebo, tumi rong no jaidie oborug raj-tukkuo peba.
60005005	Thik sedogkie gori gabursielok, borjonnuno sidu tumi nije-nije tole thagkuo. Tumi begkune ek jone ek jono toleo thagkuo, tole thanagan shigi loio. Haron, “Itchiore phodani manuschunore badha de, hintu tole thande manuschunore doye gore.”
60005006	Senottei Itchiore tomare gom somoiot ojolot tule para, Itchioro shoktisali adtano tole nije-nije niroit oio.
60005007	The tomare jottone sai hinottei, tomar beg sintigani tare gojei duo.
60005008	Diabolaδ, tomar biruddibuo hare hei paribo singho dogkie gori gujuri-gujuri berar hinottei nijore-nije domon gori ar uijkar gori theio.
60005009	Senottei tare badha duo, bischiaschanot shokto gori thago. Tumi hobor po siennie ekkui hosto tomar bheilogkune songsarot peion.
60005010	Hintu beg doyeganir Itchiorbuoi, je Jisu Kristor darai tar ononto oborugkanot amare dagkie, tumi hanekkon hosto goranar porendi the tomare puripunnuo, shokto, doromoro gorog ar bojei duok.
60005011	Tar oborugkan ar hemodagan umore-umor ok. Amen.
60005012	Sila, jare mui bischias-joggio mone gorong tar darai mui tomare uschoni tuli dibartei ar shakki dinei badhi gori legilungge, jei tumi jei doyeganot shokto gori thiei ago sien soittio.
60005013	The tomar loge beiloiebuoi, jibe Babylonot age tomare salam janar. Ar mor puo Markaio tomare salam janar.
60005014	Hospanar sumon dinei salam gora-gori gorsio. Jisu Kristor iot agode begkunor ugure Shantigan thok. Amen.
61001001	Mui Simon Pitor, Jisu Kristor banidaji ar apostol. Amar moillioban bischiaschano dogkie bischias agede sigunore mui legongor. Ei bischiaschan amar Itchiorbuor dharmigkano darai ar mukti gorie Jisu Kristor darai tumi peio.
61001002	Itchioror ar amar Probu Jisur gobhin gyenanot Itchiore tomare doye ar shanti alajhala gori duok.
61001003	Itchioro hemodagane jibono sombonde ar bhokti sombonde amare begkani die. Ami tare gome-dalei hobor pei hinottei, tar hemodagane sieni amare die. The amare tar nijor mohima ar asharjio gomano darai dagkie.
61001004	Sedogkie gori, the seimoillioban ar oborug protiggiani amarloi gorsie. Sienir darai Itchiorbuor hatchiekkan bhag po para, ar lubbogano darai songsaro bojong jinijchanittun sari paro para.
61001005	Sienottei, tomar bischias-chanot goman mijei dibar baari sesta goro. Ar gomanot gyen mijei duo.
61001006	Gyenanot nijor domonan mijei duo. Nijor domonanot dhorjio mijei duo. Dhorjioganot bhoktien mijei duo.
61001007	Bhoktienot bheiunottei doye-meyegan mijei duo. Ar bheiunottei doye-meyeganot hospanagan mijei duo.
61001008	Haron ei jinijchani judi tomar thai, ar bari jai, amar Probu Jisu Kristore puro gori hobor pebartei tomar aw-gunor ar phol neie no thebo.
61001009	Jar ei jinijchani no thebo, the han ar the durot dedo noi. Tar purona pabpani tartun Itchiore dhoi phelei dede sieni the puri phelliede sie.
61001010	Bheilog, senottei Itchiore tomare dagkie bili siebes shokto gori asha gori thago. Itchiore tomare bei tullie bili siebes hamakkai mone gorsio. Senottei tumi judi ieni goro, tomar bischiaschan huno din jhuri no poribo.
61001011	Haron sedogkie gori Itchiore aisai gori tomartei somibar pod huli dibo. Amar Probu ar Mukti gorie Jisu Kristor ononto rejjioganot tumi gome gori somi paribartei the tomare dibo.
61001012	Soittioganot shokto oinei, tumi sieni hobor pei theleio, sienir sombonde mui tomare monot tuli dibar olib gortung noi.
61001013	Bortoman mui ei heyeganot baji agong, ien olode terpal haboro dogkie. Mui ienot jedog bilom baji thang, janei dibartei mui tomare onsur monot tuli dile thik obo bili mone gorong.
61001014	Sien olode, amar Probu Jisu Kristoi more degeiede doge mui ei heyegan terpal haboro dogkie gori jhadi gori iri di peim.
61001015	Mor mone hoidie mui mori janar porendi, tumi nitto ei hodagani monot rago para, mui tomare monot tuli dibartei baari sesta gorong.
61001016	Amar Probu Jisu Kristor hemodagan ar the ebode hodagan jokkene hoiei salag gori ami jorei-jorei no hoi. Hintu ami amar nijor sogedi tar oborugkan degkie.
61001017	Haron, sorgottun ejchiede sobdobuoi jokkene hoie, “Ibie mor agojor Puo, mui tar ugure baari hujhi olung.” The Bab Itchiorbuottun sorman ar baini peie.
61001018	Ami nije tar loge pobitro mounnuot elong. Ar jokkene sei sobdobuo sorgottun ejchie ami suinniei.
61001019	Senottei muniguno hodagani amattei hamakkai thik. Ien olode andhar jagat phor oisong serag jolette dogkie ar shut tarabuo tomar ontoranit phor dede dogkie hinottei, gome-dalei mon duo.
61001020	Ien begottun akke hobor peio: Huno jone nije-nije Sastror agami hodagan ortho bhangibar noi.
61001021	Haron Sastror agami hoda huno din manjior ischiettun no eje. Hintu Pobitro Aptai nejeinei, Itchioro pobitro manuschune Sastror agami hodagan hoion.
61002001	Nogoli muni gunor loge elakke dogkie gori, bojong mastorio tomar loge thebak. Gubone thara nas oidie sigkie manuschunore dibag. Je tharare hinnie sei Probureo thara osikar goribak. Senottei thara jhadi gori nas obak.
61002002	Onek manjie tharar bojong podtani adeibak. Sienittei oinnio manuschune soittio podtano biruddie sorjeibak.
61002003	Lube thara mijie hoda joreinei tomartun lab goribak. Agottun duri bijieran tharattei dhilei die no oi. Thara nas obakke sien ghum no jar.
61002004	Haron pab gorsionde sorgo-dudtunore Itchiore bad no de. The tharare bijier goribartei, baninei andharot thoie, ar the tharare bijier goribartei tartarot phelei di thoie.
61002005	Itchiore puron songsaran bad no de, Itchior bhokti no goronde manuschuno ugure paniban gori die. Dharmigkan prosar gorie Noare ar oinnio sat jon manuschio the bajeie.
61002006	Itchiore Sodom ar Gomora sohorani agundoi puri phelei shei goridinei nas gorsie. Itchior bhokti no goribakke manuschunor hi obo sien the sienot degeie.
61002007	Itchiore dharmig Lotore bajeie. Niom sara manuschune shanda ham goronde sigune tare ogoman lageion.
61002008	Haron tharar loge sei dharmig Manuschuo eil. Din bagini thara hi goron the degkie, ar thara hi hon the suinnie. Tharar niom sara hamanie tar dharmig monanore dug duon.
61002009	Senottei dharmig manuschun porikkiet no poron para, hingori rokkie goribuo ar be-dhormi manuschun sasti pebar lakkun, hingori bijiero dinnuot thobo Probue hobor pai.
61002010	Sittun bes soittio, jigune heyer-hamona ar aw-pobitro ischie doge solon. Odhikar-bolagunore thara aw-pela goron. Thara olakke sahoji ar nijor ischie doge goron. Oborugkunore sorjeibartei thara no dhoran.
61002011	Nogoli mastorunottun bes sorgo-dudtunor onek bol ar hemoda age. Tobuio, oborugkunore duj badei dibartei sorgo-dudtune Probur mujungot tharare no sorjan.
61002012	Hintu sei manuschune thara no bujonde jinijchani biruddie sorjan. Thara olakke shintie neie emano dogkie. Dhorinei morei pheleibartei thara jormo oion. Tharar duje thara nije nas obak.
61002013	Thara be-dhormi phol jhadi pebak. Tharar mon puronagan olode dinot nije-nije anondo utchob gorana. Thara tomar loge hade, thara olakke dhub-haborot hali ar hajor baschie dogkie. Jagulug goranagan ar manjiore thoganagan thara anondo utchob bili mone goron.
61002014	Tharar sogkun olakke por pagollie ar pab goranagan thamei no paron. Shokto noi die manuschunore thara bhulot pelan. Lubbo obartei tharar monanire akkieng gorsion. Thara olakke obisab heiegun.
61002015	Thara gom podtan pheleinei hu-podedi jeion. Bearor puo Balamor je be-dhormi hamor bedon hos pedo thara tar podtan adan.
61002016	Hintu ekkuo gadhai tar dujchanittei tare aw-hoda hoie. Hoda hoi no parsie eman oleio manjior ro dogkie gori tare hoie. Munibuo pagolo haman the badha die.
61002017	Sei manuschun olakke shuguno uiphud ar bor boiere nejaidie megsago dogkie. Tharattei oghur andharan umore-umorottei thoidie oie.
61002018	Haron ortho neie ar bhulot pelaidie hoda thara hon. Ei sedogkie gori hu-podedi jadonde sigunottun hamakkai soittio gori sarsiegunore bhulot pelan. Heyer-hamona ar shokto lub degeinei thara sigunore bhulot pelan.
61002019	Thara nije gom niomor banidaji oi thagke, manjiore thara shadin goribak bili protiggia goron. Haron judi huno ekkane, ek jonor ugure giroj oi thagke, sei manuschuno sienor banidaji.
61002020	Jokkene thara hoi paron Probu ar Mukti die Jisu Kristore, thara dhei jeion sei pittimir hamanittun jieni thararehorab gore. Judi thara aro ei somosto horab hamanit lagi than ar tharare aw-porat gore, sale akke ienittun sejor ien bes horab oi.
61002021	Haron dharmig podtan judi thara hobor no pedak gom no olun. Hintu tharare die oiede pobitro ugumani thara hobor panar porendi no palan hinottei bes bojong oie.
61002022	Soittio dagho hodagano doge tharar olo. “Hugure nijor ogollieganot phiron, ar gadeie sugor deil goribartei pekkanot jan.”
61003001	Oh mor agojorbuo, mui ien tore di lombor sidigan legongor. Tui idot tulos para tor sorol monan idot tuli dibartei mui duogan sidi legilung.
61003002	Agendi pobitro munigune hoi jeionde hodagani tore idot tuli dibartei mui sang. Ami tor apostoluno darai dede Probu ar mukti gorie uguman idot tulis.
61003003	Ien akke hobor peis. Sejo dinnuot thatta gorie ebag. Thara tharar nijor lubbo ischie doge solibak.
61003004	Thara hobak, “The ebartei protiggia gorsie, hoi elode? Haron amar buro-burigun mori jeiondoidie siottun duri sristi arambo oiede song beg jinijchani ekkui gori soler.”
61003005	Heis gori thara ien puri pelan: Purbe Itchioro hodai-hodai sorgogani sristi oie, ar Itchioro hodai-hodai pittimigan panittun ar panit sristi oie.
61003006	Sokkene sei paniganiloi paniban oinei songsaran nas oie.
61003007	Hintu tar sei hodagano darai the ikkie sorgogan ar pittimigan agundoi puri pheleibartei ekkuo dinottei rageie. Sei dinnuot be-dhormi manuschunore the bijier goribo ar tharare nas goribo.
61003008	Oh mor agojorun, ei hodagan puri no phellio. Probu iot ek din ek azar bojoro soman, ar ek azar bojor ek dino soman.
61003009	Hoiek jon manjie diri obo gori bhabonde dogkie gori, Probuie soittio dede ien diri no gore. The amattei dhorjio dori age. Huno jone nas no on para, hintu begkune tharar monani phiran para tartun mone hoi.
61003010	Hintu Probur dinnuo reidot sur ejonde dogkie gori ebo. Sei dinnuot dangor sobdo oinei sorgogani lugi jebogoi. Angie agune jinijchani phudei pheleibo. Pittimigan ar tar beg hamani agune hei pheleibo.
61003011	Itchiore beg jinijchani sengori nas goribo hinottei, tumi henjannie manus ona osit bhabi sawh. Pobitro sal-solon ar Itchiorore sorman gori tomar tha poribo.
61003012	Itchioro dinnuo ebartei tumi asha gori barsei thagode, sengori thago. Sei dinnuot agune sorgoganiphudei pheleibo.Angie agune jinijchani golei pheleibo.
61003013	Hintu the soittio diede doge, nuo sorgogani ar ekkan nuo pittimi ami asha gori barsei agi. Sienit dharmig manuschun thebak.
61003014	Oh mor agojorun, tumi sieni birat asha gori barsei ago daw. Senottei, the tomare tar loge shantie thagke lak paigi para, dak hal neie ar duj neie gori lakpai para uijkare thago.
61003015	Amar agojor bhei, Paulaio Itchioro gyenandoi the tomare legkiede doge, Itchiore diri gori dhorjio dori agede sien the mukti goribar saidie mone gorsie.
61003016	Tar beg sidiganit sienir sombonde the legkie. Hoiekkani sidit, hoiekkani hoda bujode aghattie. No shigonde ar thik gori no thande manuschune Sastror oinnio hodagani benga-honga gori bujei duonde doge, Paula legkiede hodaganio benga-honga gori thara bujei duon. Sengori tharar nijor nostogan thara anon.
61003017	Oh mor agojorun, sei hodagani tumi honatto hobor po hinottei niom sara manuschune tomare hu-podedi no nejan para uijkare thago. Tumi judi hu-podedi jo, salen tomar rokkie jaganottun tumi jhuri poriba.
61003018	Hintu amar Probu ar mukti gorie Jisu Kristor doyegan ar gyenan lab goro. Ikkiettun duri umore-umor song mohimagan tar ok. Amen.
62001001	Adi purbe jien elo, sien ami tomare janei dir. Sien olode jien ami suinniei, ami amar nijor sogedi degkiei, ami gome-dalei rini seiei ar ami adtaniloi dhori seiei. Jibono sombonde sei hodagani ami tomare janei dir.
62001002	Sei jibonan dega oiegi ar ami degkiei. Sieno sombonde ami shakki dinei, sei ononto jibonan ami tomare janei dir. Sei ononto jibonan Babo loge elo ar the sien amare degeie.
62001003	Tomareo amarloi egotagan thebartei, ami jien degkiei ar suinniei, sien ami tomare janei dir. Hamakkai amar egotagan olode Bab ar tar puo Jisu Kristoloi.
62001004	Amar hujhigan puroi para, ami sei hodagani tomare legir.
62001005	Ami tartun suninei tomare janei dirtie hoboran olode ien: Itchiorbuo olode phor. Tar iot andharan shobai nei.
62001006	Ami judi hoi, amar tarloi egotagan age hintu andharot berei, sale ami gal madi, ar soittiogan no palei.
62001007	The phorot agede dogkie ami judio phorot berei, sale amar duo-dagir egotagan age. Tar puo Jisu Kristor logan amar beg pabpani hajei de.
62001008	Judi ami hoi amar pab nei, ami nijore-nije thogeibong ar soittiogan amar iot nei.
62001009	Judi ami amar pabpani tar sidu haam heigoi, amar pabpani hema goribartei ar beg aw-dharmigkanittun amare poriskar goribartei the bischias-joggio ar dharmig.
62001010	Judi ami hoi ami pab no gori, ami tare galluo banei ar tar hodagan amar iot nei.
62002001	Oh puolok, tumi pab no goro para, ei hodagani mui tomare legongor. Judi je huno jone pab gore, amattei ek jon barsie age. The olode Jisu Kristo, dharmittobuo, amar pokke Babo sidu hoidie sibie.
62002002	Ar amar pabpanittei nije the olode hujhi oidie dali ar bana amattei noi hintu goda songsaro pabpanitteio.
62002003	Ami judi tar ugumani mani, ami hobor pebongge ami tare hobor peiei.
62002004	Ek jone hole:’mui tare hobor no pelung.’Hintu judi the tar ugumani no mane, the galluo ar soittiogan tar siot nei.
62002005	Hintu je tar hoda mane, hamakkai Itchioro meyegan tar siot puripunnuo oi. Siennie gori ami hobor pebong ami tar siot agi.
62002006	Je tar siot age bili holai, the nije Jisu solliede dogkie gori solok.
62002007	Bheilog, mui tomare nuo ugum no legongor, hintu ien jei puron ugum jien agottun duri elo, ar sien tumi agottun duri suinnio.
62002008	Aro mui tomare ekkan nuo ugum legongor. Sien tar iot ar tomar iot soittio oi age. Haron andharan jarloi ar soittio phoran honatto phuttiegi.
62002009	Ek jone judi hoi the phorot age hintu the judi tar bheibuore hinsie gore, the ejosog andharot agede sie.
62002010	Je tar bheibuore hos pai the phorot thai, ar tar iot azar hebar huno haron nei.
62002011	Hintu je tar bheibuore hinsie gore the andharot age ar andharot berai. Andharane tar sogkun han gori die hinottei, the hudu jar hobor no pai.
62002012	Puolok, tar nanganottei tomar pabpani hema die oie hinottei mui tomare legongor.
62002013	Bablok, agottun duri elode sibiere tumi hobor pela hinottei mui tomare legongor. Gabursielok, tumi dujtobuore jidila hinottei mui tomare legongor. Gurolok, tumi Babore hobor pela hinottei mui tomare legongor.
62002014	Bablok, agottun duri elode sibiere tumi hobor pela hinottei mui tomare legilung. Gabursielok, tumi olade bolo okto, Itchioro hodagan tomar iot age ar tumi dujtobuore jidila hinotte mui tomare legilung.
62002015	Songsaran ar songsaro jinijchanihosnopeio.Jesongsaran hos pai, Babo hospanagan tar Iot nei.
62002016	Haron ei jinijchani songsarot age: Heyer-lubbo, sogo lubbo ar jibono phodani. Ieni begkani Babottun no eje, hintu songsarottun.
62002017	Songsaran ar songsaro lubbogani lugi jebo, hintu je Itchioro ischie doge gore the umore-umor thebo.
62002018	Gurolok, ibie sejo somoibuo. Tumi suinniode doge Kristor biruddibuo ejer, ar ikkunuio onek Kristor biruddigun ejchion. Sieno darai ami hobor peidie ibie sejo somoibuo.
62002019	Thara amattun nigili jeion, hintu thara amar oi. Haron thara judi amar oi thedak, thara amar somare thelakkun. Thara jeiondoi hinottei, dega jaidie thara huno jon amar noi.
62002020	Pobitrobuoi tomare tel guli die ar tumi begkani hobor po.
62002021	Soittiogan tumi hobor no po bili mui tomare legongor. Hintu soittiogan tumi hobor po ar soittioganottun mijie no oi hinottei mui tomare legilung.
62002022	Honna galluo? Je Jisure Kristo bili no mane sibie galluo. Ar je Babore ar Puobuore no mane the Kristor biruddi.
62002023	Je puobuore bharai tar Babpuoio nei, hintu je puobuore haam hai, tar Babpuoio age.
62002024	Jien tumi agottun duri suinnio, sien tomar iot thok. Tumi agottun duri suinniode sien judi tomar iot thai, sale tumi puobuo iot ar Babpuo iot theba.
62002025	Ien olode the amarloi soittio gorsiede ien, ar sien ononto jibonan.
62002026	Tomare hu-pode nejeibar sande sigunor sombonde mui ei hodagani tomare legilung.
62002027	Hintu tel guli denagan tumi tartun peiode sien tomar iot thebo. Tomare huno jone shige no poribo. Hintu sei tel guli denagane tomare begkani sombonde sigei ar sien soittio, mijie noi. Iene tomare sigeiede doge tumi tar iot thago.
62002028	Puolok, ikkie tar iot thago, jene the jokke dega obogi tomar sahoj thai para ar the ebode lokke tar mujungot tumi no lajo para.
62002029	The dharmitto bili tumi hobor po hinottei, je dharmittogan adai the tartun jormo oie bili tumi hobor po.
62003001	Sawh, amare Itchioro puo hon para, Babottun ami hottoman hospana pelong! Senottei songsare amare hobor no pai, haron songsare tare hobor no pai.
62003002	Mor agojorun, ikkie ami hobor pei jokke the dega dibogi, ami tar dogkie obong, haron the thik jedogkie, sedogkie gori degibong.
62003003	Jar ei ashagan tar ugure thai the nijore sudduo gore, thik the jienie sudduo.
62003004	Je pab gore the niomanio aw-mannio gore ar pabpan olode nioman aw-mannio gorana.
62003005	Ar tumi hobor po amar pabpani nejeibartei the dega oiegi, tar siot pab nei.
62003006	Je tar iot thai the pab no gore. Je pab gore the tare no dege ar tare hobor no pai.
62003007	Gurolok,tomarehunojonehu-podedi no nedok. Je dharmigkan adai, thik the jedogkie dharmig, sibieio dharmig.
62003008	Je pab gore the Diabolarδ, haron sunibuoi agottun duri pab gorsie. Ienottei Itchioro puobuo dega diegi, Diabolaδ hamani nas gori de para.
62003009	Jar jormogan Itchiorottun the pab no gore. Itchioro bijibuo tar siot age. Haron tar jormogan Itchiorottun hinottei the pab gori no pare.
62003010	Ienot Itchioro puogun ar Diabolaδ puogun hobor pazai: Je dhormogan no adai ar tar bheibuore hos no pai the Itchioror noi.
62003011	Ei hoboran tumi agottun duri suinnio: Amar hos pa-pi gorana.
62003012	Ami Kaino dogkie no ona. The olode bojonggottun ar tar bheibuore hun gorsie. The hittei tar bheibuore hun gorsie? Haron tar hamani bojong ar tar bheibuor hamani dharmig.
62003013	Bheilog, songsaro manjie tomare bis degilie amok no oio.
62003014	Ami bheilogkundoi hos pa-pi gori hinottei, ami hobor pei moronottun jibonanot par oi gelong. Je tar bheibuore hos no pai the moranaganot age.
62003015	Je tar bheibuore bis dege the hun gorie. Tumi hobor po je hun gorie tar siot ononto jibonan nei.
62003016	Jisu Kristo tar jibonan amattei pheleie. Hospanagan hi jinij ami siendoi hobor pei. Ar amio amar bheilogkunottei amar jibonani pelana osit.
62003017	Hintu jar ei songsaro jinij age ar tar bheibuoi dorkarot porsiede dege. Ar judi the tar monan tartei nadi thoi, Itchioro hospanagan hingori tar siot thebo?
62003018	Puolok, bana hodadi bah muendi hos no peinei, hamedi ar jode-pode gori hos peio.
62003019	Siennie gori ami hobor pebongge jei ami soittioganor. Tar mujungot siene amar monanire dhorjio dibo.
62003020	Jokkene amar ontoranie amare duji banai, amar ontoranittun bes Itchiorbuo dangor ar the begkani hobor pai.
62003021	Mor agojorun, amar ontoranie judi amare duji no banai, Itchioro mujungot amar sahojchan thebo.
62003022	Ami jien tartun magi sien pei. Haron ami tar ugumani mani ar the hujhi oidie sieni gori.
62003023	Ien tar uguman: Tar Puo Jisu Kristo nangan ami bischias gorana ar the amare ugum dede doge amar hos pa-pi gorana.
62003024	Je Itchioro ugumani mane the Itchioro siot thai, ar Itchior tar siot thai. Ien olode the amare dede Aptabuo darai the amar loge thai bili hoi paridie podtan.
62004001	Mor agojorun, beg aptagun bischias no gorsio. Itchiorottun oi ni noi hobor pebartei, aptagun porikkie gorsio. Haron onek nogoli muni songsar joga nigillion.
62004002	Ieno darai tumi Itchioro Aptabuo hobor peba: Jisu Kristo manjior heyeloi ejchie bili jei aptabuoi mane sibie Itchiorottun.
62004003	Ar Jisu Kristo manjior heyeloi ejchie bili jei aptabuo no mane sibie Itchiorottun noi. Tumi suinnio Kristor biruddibuo ejer. The songsarot honatto age, ar sibie Kristor biruddi apta.
62004004	Puolok, tumi Itchiorottun. Tomar bidirie agede sibie songsarot agede sibiettun dangor hinottei, tumi tharare jittuo.
62004005	Thara songsarottun hinottei, thara songsaro hoda hon, ar songsaro manjie tharar hoda sunon.
62004006	Ami nije Itchiorottun. Je Itchior hobor pai the amar hoda sune. Je Itchiorottun noi, the amar hoda no sune. Ieno darai soittio ar mijie apta ami hobor pei.
62004007	Mor agojorun, hospanagan Itchiorottunhinottei, amarhospa-pi gorana. Je hos pai tar jormogan Itchiorottun ar the Itchiorore hobor pai.
62004008	Je hos no pai the Itchiorbuore hobor no pai. Haron Itchiorbuo olode hospanagan.
62004009	Ienie gori Itchiore amare hos paidie sien degeie. Ami tar darai baji para. Itchiore tar ekkuo gori puo sibie songsarot dipadeie.
62004010	Ien olode hospanagan. Ami Itchiorore hos peidie sien noi, hintu Itchiore amare hos peie ar tar nijor Puobuore dipadeie. Amar pabpanittei Itchiorbuoi hujhi oidie dali oi para Itchiore Puobuore dipadeie.
62004011	Mor agojorun, Itchiore sienie gori hos pai hinottei, hamakkai amar hos pa-pi gora poribo.
62004012	Huno jone huno din Itchior no degon. Ami judi hos pa-pi gori, amar iot Itchiorbuo thebo. Ar amar iot tar hospanagan puron obo.
62004013	Tar Aptabuo amare die hinottei, ami hobor pei ami Itchioro siot agi ar Itchior amar iot thai.
62004014	Ami degilong ar shakki di die Babe Puobuore songsar mukti gorie ijebe dipadeie.
62004015	Jisu olode Itchioro Puo bili je haam hai, Itchior tar siot thai ar the Itchioro siot thebo.
62004016	Itchioro hospanagan amattei agede sien ami hobor pelong ar bischias gorilong. Itchiorbuo olode hospanagan ar je sei hospanaganot thai, the Itchioro siot thai, ar Itchior tar siot thai.
62004017	Bijiero dinnuot amar sahoj thai para, ienot hospanagan amar iot puron olo. Haron the jedogkie, amio ei songsarot agi.
62004018	Hospanaganot dor nei, haron puripunnuo hospanagane dhoran dabei de. Sastiganot dhoran thai hinottei, je dhorai, Itchioro hospanagan tar siot puron no oi.
62004019	Ami tare hos pei, haron the amare akke hos peie.
62004020	Ek jone judi hoi, “Mui Itchiorore hos pang.” Hintu the tar bheibuore hinsie gore, the galluo. Haron je tar bheibuore degede sibiere hos no pai, the no degede Itchiorbuore hingori hos pebo?
62004021	Ar ien ami tartun peieidie uguman: Je Itchior hos pebo the tar bheibuore hos pa poribo.
62005001	Jisu olode Kristo, Itchiorottun jormeiede sibie bili je bischias gore. Ar je jormo diebuoreio hos pai tare jormo dede sibiere hos pebo.
62005002	Jokke ami Itchior hos pei ar tar ugumani mani, ami hobor pei Itchioro puogun ami hos pei.
62005003	Itchiorottei hospanagan olode ien: Amar tar ugumani manana ar tar ugumani gour noi.
62005004	Haron jar jormogan Itchiorottun the songsar jidie. Songsar jidinei joi goranagan olode amar bischiaschan.
62005005	Honna songsar jidie? Jisu Kristo olode Itchioro puo bili je bischias gore sibie noi ni?
62005006	Pani ar lo loi ejchiede sibie olode Jisu Kristo. The bana paniloi no eje, hintu pani ar lo loi the ejchie. Aptabuo soittio hinottei, Aptabuoi shakki de.
62005007	Sorgot tin jone shakki dedon. Thara olakke Bab, Hoda ar Pobitro Apta. Thara tin jone ek jon.
62005008	Pittimit tin jone shakki dedon. Thara olakke Aptabuo, pani ar lo. Tinane ekkan manon.
62005009	Judi ami manjiortun shakki sei, Itchioro shakkigan bes dangor. Haron Itchioro shakkigan olode tar Puobuor sombonde the shakki die.
62005010	Je Itchioro Puobuore bischias gore, shakkigan nije tar siot age. Je Itchior bischias no gore, the Itchiorore galluo banai. Haron Puobuor sombonde Itchioro shakkigan the bischias no gore.
62005011	Ien olode shakkigan: Itchiore amare ononto jibon die ar sei jibonan tar Puobuo siot age.
62005012	Jadtun Puobuo age tar jibonano age, ar jadtun Itchioro Puobuo nei tar jibonano nei.
62005013	Itchioro Puobuo nangan bischias gorode sigunore mui ei hodagani legilung, jene tumi hobor po para tomar ononto jibon age ar Itchioro Puobuor nangan onsur bischias goro para.
62005014	Tar iot ei sahojchan amar age. Judi tar ischie doge ami magi the sune.
62005015	Judi ami hobor pei ami jien magidongsat the sune. Senottei, ami hoi paridie ami magidie sien tare hujoli gorilong.
62005016	Judi ek jone tar bheibuoi no morede pab gorte deginei bor magi de, no morede pab gorsiede sigunore the jibon dibo. Morede pabio age. Sienottei bor magi dedok bili mui no hongor.
62005017	Beg aw-dharmigotagani pab, no morede pabio age.
62005018	Ami hobor pei je Itchiorottun jormo oie the pab no gore, Itchiorottun jormo peiebuoi nijore-nije rokkie gore. Bojonggoi tare hando no gore.
62005019	Ami Itchiorottun bili hobor pei. Ar ami hobor pei songsaran bojong manjio adot age.
62005020	Itchioro Puobuo ejchiede ami hobor pei. Soittiobuo ami hobor pebartei, the amare gyen die. Tar Puo Jisu Kristo iot, jibe soittio siot ami agi. The olode soittio Itchior ar ononto jibon.
62005021	Puolok, muktigunottun tumi nijore-nije rokkie gorsio. Amen.
63001001	Itchiore bei tulliede miliebuore ar tar puo-shabagunore, mui borjonnuoi legongor. Soittiogano darai mui tomare hos pang. Tomare hos peie bana mui noi, soittiogan hobor pande sigune begkune tomare hos pan.
63001002	Jei soittiogan amar iot age ar umore-umor thebo, sienottei mui tomare hos pang.
63001003	Bab Itchiorbuottun ar Babor Puo Jisu Kristortun doyegan, hospanagan, ar Shantigan, soittio ar hospanagandoi amar idu thok.
63001004	Babor uguman ami peieidie doge-doge tor hoi ek jon puo-shaba soittioganot solon bili mui hobor phelung hinottei mui baari hujhi olung.
63001005	Miliebuo, mui tore nuo ugum no legongor. Ei uguman olode agottun duri elo. Ami hos pa-pi goribartei mui tore hujoli gorongor.
63001006	Ami tar ugumani doge-doge solana olode hospanagan. Tumi sieno doge-doge solibartei, uguman tumi agottun duri suinnio daw.
63001007	Jisu Kristo manei hule jormeiegidie sien no manie balukjon beg jagai jagai jeion. Siennie manus olode manus thogeie ar Kristor biruddi.
63001008	Ami ham gorseidie jinijchani no arei para seio! Hintu puro gori hujhi bedon pei para uije thagkuo.
63001009	Je Kristor sigkieni no mane ar bhonggo gore, tar siot Itchior nei. Je Kristor sigkieni mane tar Babpuo ar Puobuoio age.
63001010	Je tomar idu ei sigkiendoi no eje, tare tomar ghorot gorba no tullio ar noio madeio.
63001011	Haron je tare madeibo, theo tar hu-haman bhag lobo.
63001012	Mui tomare legibar shagor age. Mortun legibar mone no hor. Hintu, amar hujhigan puro oi para, mujunge mujungi gori hoda hobartei mui tomar idu ebar asha gorongor.
63001013	Itchiore bei tulliede tor bon puttune tore salam janadon. Amen.
64001001	Mui borjonnuoi, agojor Gaiusore legongor, jare mui soittio gori hos pang.
64001002	Oh mor agojorbuo, tui aptadi gom agoschie dogkie gori heyer hittendi ar je huno hittendi gom thas para, mui bor magi duongor.
64001003	Hoiek jon bheilog einei tui soitioanot agos ar soittiogano doge-doge solotte soittioganor sombonde shakki duondi. Senottei mui baari hujhi olung.
64001004	Mor puo-shabagune soittiogano doge-doge solon bili sunilie, mor sittun para hujhi obar no thai ar.
64001005	Oh mor agojorbuo, bheilogkunottei ar aw-sin manuschunottei tui jien goros, sien tui ega mone gor.
64001006	Thara tor hospanaganor sombonde mondolibuore hondi. Tui judi tharare Itchioro itsie doge dipadas tor sien gom obo.
64001007	Haron tar Nanganottei Be-jadtunottun hitchu no peie gori jan.
64001008	Soittioganottei ami tharar hamanot phagot somi para, ami tharare lobiot gorana osit.
64001009	Mui mondolibuore legkuong. Hintu Diotrepha, tharar murubbi aw daw saidie sibiei amare lobiot no gore.
64001010	Senottei, mui judi ejong, the gorede hamani manuschunore monot tuli dimbi. The amare doulnei-doulnei hoda hoi. Sei hodagani hoineio tar il no oinei, the bheilogkunoreo lobiot no gore. Ar je tharare lobiot goribar sai, the tharare mana gore ar tharare mondolittun bhar gori de.
64001011	Oh mor agojorbuo, bojongani no bhengeis hintu gomani bhengeis. Je gom ham gore the olode Itchiorbuottun. Hintu je bojong ham gore the Itchiorbuore no dege.
64001012	Begkune Demetriare gom bili baini goron, soittioganeio tar sombonde shakki de. Amio tare baini gori. Tumi hobor po ami jien shakki di sien soittio.
64001013	Mor legibar shagor age, hintu mui tore holomboi ar haliloi legibar no sang.
64001014	Mui torloi jhadi gori lak pa-pi obar asha age. Sokke ami mujunge-mujungi gori hoda hobong.
64001015	Tor shanti ok. Somarsiegune tore salam janadon. Siot agonde somarsiegunore jon bagene nang dori-dori salam janeis.
65001001	Mui Juda, Jisu Kristor sagorsiebuo ar Jakobor bheibuoi, Bab Itchiore daginei, pobitro gorinei Jisu Kristo iot rageiede sigunoremuilegongor.
65001002	Doyegan, Shantigan ar hospanagan tomar iot shangadik gori thok.
65001003	Oh mor agojorun, amar begkunor muktigano sombonde legibar mor dhap elo. Hintu tumi tomar bischiaschandoi os phureinei thago para uschoni tuli dibartei mui legongor. Sei bischiaschan sadhu manuschunore umore-umorottei die oie.
65001004	Haronan olode hoiek jon pabi manus gubone sommiondi. Thara amar Itchiorbuor doyegan hulomela gori sineli-hamot bodolei dedon. Ek mattro Itchiorbuore ar amar Probu Jisu Kristore thara bharan. Tharare sasti dibartei Itchiore honatto sinno di thoie.
65001005	Mui tomare eksomoi monot tuli dibar seiong. Judio Probuie tar manuschun Egypt dejottun uddhar gorsie, hintu bischias no goronde sigunore the porendi nas gorsie.
65001006	Hoiek jon sorgo-dude tharar nijor odhikaro jagat no than. Nije thara thande jagattun lorsion. Oborug dinnuot Itchiore tharare sasti dibartei, the tharare ononto shingolloi andharot bani thoie.
65001007	Thik sedogkie gori, Sodom ar Gomora sohoro manuschune ar tharar seropala jaganir manuschuneio sedogkie gorsion. Sei manuschune tharar heyegani shanda hamot ar oinnio doronor shanda hamotio lageion. Huno din no morede agundoi sasti die obode sien tharar siot dega oie.
65001008	Thik sedogkie gori, sug togeiegune tharar heyegani hajor goron. Odhikar-bolagunore thara no manon. Oborugkan thara sorjan.
65001009	Sorgo-dudtuno murubbi, Michael Mosir heyegano sombonde Diabolaloiδ torgo gorte, Diabolareδ aw-hoda hobar the sahoj no gore. Hintu the hoie, “Probuie tore gubibo!”
65001010	Hintu thara hobor no pande hodaganiloi thara sorjan. Ar jieni thara aw-bujo emano dogkie gori hobor pan, sienit thara nije-nije nas on.
65001011	Thara Kainor podtan adeion ar Balamo dogkie, heiz gori lab togeion hinottei hu-podedi jhut-jhurei jeinei Kora dogkie hobal purinei nas oion.
65001012	Tomar hospanar meitbanot thara olakke dhub haborot hali baschie dogkie. Dor nei gori thara tomar somare haan. Thara olakke bana nijor seresta goronde bera-shagol soreieguno dogkie. Thara olakke boiere nejaidie shuguno mego dogkie. Thara olakke horannie singor ugurei die, dibar mora ar gulo neie gajo dogkie.
65001013	Thara olakke dodjiet dor gore para tubolo dogkie. Panit phena sago dogkie gori tharar nijor lajchani bhar goron. Thara olakke jhuri porsie thara dogkie. Tharattei Itchiore siro jibonottei ghur andharan thoi die.
65001014	Enoke elode Adamor porendi sat piri. The tharar sombonde muni dogkie gori hoie, “Sawh, Probure tar azar-azar pobitro manuschoi ebo.
65001015	Begkunore bijier goribartei ar duj badei dibartei the ejer. Beg pabi manuschunore the tharar beg pabi hamanit pabo pode gorsionde sienit tharare pabo duj badei dibogi. Ar pabi manuschune jedogkani bojong hoda tar biruddie hoion, sieni begkani the tharare duj badei dibogi.
65001016	Thara bhud-budon ar abitti duon. Thara nijor lubbo doge solon. Tharar muendi bhulot pelaidie hoda hon, nijor sujuk pebartei manjiore bhulon.
65001017	Hintu, oh mor agojorun, agendi amar Probu Jisu Kristor sisjiogune hoi jeionde hodagani monot rageio.
65001018	Thara tomare hoion: Ses hadallie thatta gorie thebak. Thara nijor pabo lubbo doge solibak.
65001019	Thara nije-nije pharok oi jebak. Thara nijor heyet hamanat thebak ar thara olakke Aptabuo sara.
65001020	Hintu oh mor agojorun, begottun pobitro bischiaschanot shokto gori thago. Pobitro Aptabuodi bor mago.
65001021	Itchioro hospanaganot theinei, ononto jibonottei amar Probu Jisu Kristo sitpuronagan barsei thago.
65001022	Jigunor mono shiongshama thai, sigunore doye gorsio.
65001023	Dhoran rageinei, oinnio jonore uddhar gorsio. Agunanottun thani tullio. Ar jogon-togon tharar haborani pabo sorittroi hajor oiede sieni ghineio.
65001024	Tumi azar no ho para, amar mukti gorie Itchiorbuoi tomare subi thebo. Duj sara ar shanggadik hujhi gori the tomare tar oborugkano mujungot nejeibo.
65001025	Amar mukti gorie Itchiorbuo olode ek mattro gyeni. Bainigan, oborugkan, sasonan ar odhikaran ikkiettun duri umore-umor tar ok. Amen.
66001001	Ei phogodang hodagan Jisu Kristortun. Jhadi gori hi godhi jebo sieni tar banidajigune degibartei, mui tar banidajibuo, Johono sidu Itchiore, tar sorgo-dudtuo di padeinei, janei di die.
66001002	The Itchioro hoda sombonde, Jisu Kristor shakki sombonde ar jieni degkie sieni begkanir sombonde shakki die.
66001003	Somoibuo hai ejchie hinottei, je ei agami hoie hodagani madai ar sune, ar mui legilungge hodagani mane, the hoballie.
66001004	Johone Asia dejot sattuo mondolire leger, Je ikkieio age, agottun duri elo, ar ebo, tartun ar tar singasono samne thande sattuo Aptagunottun doyegan ar shantigan tomar idu thok.
66001005	Ar Jisu Kristortun, je bischias-joggio shakkigan, morattun polim jiei uttie, ar pittimir rajaguno ugure sason-gorie, the tomare doyegan ar shantigan duok. Je amare hos peinei amar pabpani tar nijor logandoi dhoi phelei die.
66001006	Tar Itchior ar Babor sidu the amare raja ar dhormo guru baneie. Mohimagan ar hemodagan umore-umor tar ok. Amen.
66001007	Sawh, the megsagot gori ejer. Prottiek soge tare degibak, ar jigune tare gudeion tharaio degibak. Tar harone pittimir beg jador manuschune gujhi-gujhi hanibak. Siennie obo. Amen.
66001008	“Mui Alpha ar Omega, arambogan ar thuman,” Ien Probuie hor. “Je ikkieio age, agottun duri elo, ar ebo, Sorbo Shoktimannuo.”
66001009	Mui, tomar bhei Johon ar tomar somare Jisu Kristor rejjioganot hosto bhug gorie ar soijjiogoriebuo. Itchioro hodaganottei ar Jisu Kristor shakkiganottei Patmos dippuot agong.
66001010	Probur Dinnuot, mui Aptabuot elung. Sebeden mor pijendi ekkuo birat ro begolo sobdo dogkie gori suinniong.
66001011	Robuoi hoie, “Mui Alpha ar Omega, Polimmuo ar Sejorbuo. Tui jieni degor sieni ekkuo boiot leg ar sieni Asia dejot sattuo mondoli agonde, Ephesi, Sumyrna, Pergamos, Thyatira, Sardis, Philadelphia, ar Laodicea siguno sidu padei dis.”
66001012	Sebeden more horte robuore sebartei mui phirilung. Phirinei mui degilungge sattuo sonar serag-dani.
66001013	Sattuo serag-danir moiddie ek jon Munischioro Puobuo dogkie degilung. The uri agede haboran thengopada song daga jeie ar tar bugkuot ekkan sonar pat bereie elo.
66001014	Tar siriebuo ar suloni ulo dogkie dhub, ar borobo dogkie dhub. Tar sogkun aguno jilo dogkie jolon.
66001015	Tar thengani hamaro olon-shalot shap gorsie joljollie hajo dogkie joler. Tar robuo pani ghumgumotte dogkie.
66001016	Tar den adtandoi sattuo thara dhori age ar tar muonottun ekkan do-dhara dhar horgo nigillie. Tar muon belan dok-dokkie gori jolede dogkie joler.
66001017	Mui tare seionggeio tar thenganit mora dogkie gori porsiong. Hintu tar den adtan mor ugure thoinei holo, “No dores. Mui Polimmuo ar Sejorbuo,
66001018	mui Jedabuo. Mui morsiong, ar sa, mui umore-umor baji agong. Amen. Padalor ar moronor shabigan mor adot age.
66001019	“Tui jieni degilie, jieni age ar jieni ienir porendi jhadi ghodi jebo sieni leg.
66001020	Mor den adtanot sattuo thara ar sattan sonar serag-dani degkuoschie sieno oghur gubonano sombonde leg, sattuo thara olakke sattuo mondolir dudtun. Ar sattan serag dani degkuoschie sigun olakke sattuo mondoli.
66002001	“Ephesi sohoro mondolibuor dudtuore leg, ‘Je tar, den adedi sattuo thara dhori age ar sattuo sonar serag-dani sere berar sibiei ei hodagani hor,
66002002	“Tor haman, hadonigan, ar tor gaisueidigan mui hobor pang. Bojong manuschun tui gaisuei no paroschie sien mui hobor pang. Apostol noi hintu apostol holande sigun tui porikkie gorsios. Sigun galluo bili tui hobor peios.
66002003	Mor nange tui eksottie soijjio gorinei hadoni gorsios ar mora-mora no os.
66002004	“Tobuio, tor biruddie mor ien age, tui tor polim hospanagan phelei duos.
66002005	Senottei, huttun tui jhuri porsios monot tul. Mon phireinei akke haman gor. Anole tui judi mon no pireis, mui tor idu seret gori einei tor serag-danien jagattun larei dimbi.
66002006	Hintu ien tor age. Nikola dolluor hamani mui bis degongge sieni tuio bis degos.
66002007	“Aptabuoi mondoligunore hi hor jadtun han age, the sunok. Je jidi pare mui tare Itchiorbuor Paradischano moiddie agede Jibono gajchuottun hebar dim.” ’
66002008	“Sumyrna sohoro mondoli-buor dudtuore leg, ‘Je Polimmuo ar Sejorbuo ar morinei jeda oiebuoi ei hodagani hor,
66002009	“Tor hamani, hostogani ar goribpan mui hobor pang. Hintu tui thagoie. Judai manus holan, hintu thara noi, ar sorjande sigun mui hobor pang. Thara olakke Soitanor synagog.
66002010	Tui jhadi hosto pebede sieni no dores. Tomare jodepode gori porikkie sebartei, Diabolaδ tomartun hoi ekjonorejhadijielotbhoreibogoi. Tomar hostogan dos din thebo. More song bischias-joggio gori thak, sebeden mui tore jibono raj-tukkuo dim.
66002011	“Aptabuoi mondoligunore hi hor jar han age, the sunok. Je jidi pare tare di lombor moranagane hoti gori no paribo.” ’
66002012	“Pergamos sohoro mondoli-buor dudtuore leg, ‘Jar do-dhara dhar horgo age sibiei ei hodagani hor,
66002013	“Tor hamani ar tui hudu thas mui hobor pang, jiot Soitannuor singasonan siot tui thas. Mor nangan tui dori thas, ar mor sombonde tor bischiaschan no bharas. Soitannuoi thaidie siot tomar moiddie mor bischias-joggio shakkibuo, Antipare morei phelluon. Sei lokkeneio tumi mor sombonde tomar bischiaschan no bharo.
66002014	“Tobuio, tor biruddie mor hoiekkani hoda hobar age. Haron tor moiddie ek dagie Balamorsigkienidorsion.Balame Israel manuschuno agendi phalot bajeibartei idi padana Balagore sigeie. Sien olode tharare dali-pujo jinij habeibatttei ar shanda gora bajei dibartei.
66002015	Thik sedogkie gori, tor iot daw Nikola dolor sigkieni dorie agon. Sieni mui bis degong.
66002016	Senottei mon phira, anole mui tor idu gori einei, mor muonor horgogandoi tharar biruddie judduo gorimbi.
66002017	“Aptabuoi mondoligunore hi hor jar han age, the sunok. Je jidi pare tare mui gubonio manna hebar dim. Mui tare ekkuo dhub sil dim. Sibie ugure ekkan nuo nang lega age, ar sei silluo pebode sibie bade huno jone sien hobor no pebak.” ’
66002018	“Thyatira sohoro mondoli-buor seresta goriebuore leg, ‘Aguno jilo dogkie sog ar joljollie hajo dogkie theng-bola Itchioro Puobuoi ei hodagani hor,
66002019	“Mui tor hamani, tor hospanagan, tor sebonagan, tor bischiaschan ar tor dhorjiogan hobor pang. Tor sejo haman polim hamanottun bes doul oie.
66002020	“Tobuio, tor biruddie mor hoiekkani hoda hobar age. Jezebel miliebuore tui soijjio goros. The nije ekkuo muni milie holai. The mor sagorsiegunore sigkie dinei ar bhulot pheleinei tharare shanda gora bajei die ar moktire dali pujo die jinij ha bajei die.
66002021	Tar shanda haman iri dibartei mui tare somoi duong, hintu the bad no de.
66002022	Sawh, tharar hamanir sombonde mon no phireile, mui tare aw-sugkie bischonot pora bajei dim ar jigune tarloi shanda gorsion sigunore mui shanggadik dugot pheleim.
66002023	Mui tar puo shabagun morei phelei dim. Sebeden beg mondoligune hobor pebakke jei mui olungge mon ar ontor togeiebuo. Tharar hamo doge begkunore mui phol dim.
66002024	Ikkie mui tomare ar Thyatira sohorot agode sigunore hongor. Jar ei sigkiegan nei, ar jigunor Soitanuor sombonde gobhin gyen nei, thara honde doge; mui tomare huno bugi bugei no dim.
66002025	Mui ejong song tomar jien age sien shokto gori dori thago.
66002026	“Je jidi pare ar thumsong je mor haman gori thai, mui tare oinnio jadtuno ugure odhikar dim.
66002027	The luor ludig loinei siguno ugure sason-goribuo. Ar sigune kumoror ara-sara dogkie gori obak. Mui jedogkie gori mor Babattun odhikar peiong, sedogkie gori mui tare odhikar dim.
66002028	Ar mui tare shut tarabuo dim.
66002029	Aptabuoi mondoligunore hi hor jar han age, the sunok.” ’
66003001	“Sardis sohoro mondolibuor dudtuore leg, ‘Itchioro sattuo Apta ar sattuo thara agede sibiei ei hodagani hor, “Mui tor hamani hobor pang je tui jeda bili tor nangan age hintu tui mora.
66003002	Uijkare theis. Mori jebar jugol oi agede bagi jinijchani shokto gor. Haron Itchioro mujungot tor hamani puripunnuo bili mui no phelung.
66003003	Senottei, tui jien peios ar suinnios sien monot tulinei shokto gori dori thak ar mon phirie. Tui judi uijkare no thas, mui tor idu suro dogkie gori eim ar mui tor idu hon hennuot ejong tui hobor no pebe.
66003004	Sardis sohorot tor iot hoiek jonor nang age jigune tharar haborani hajor no goron. Ar sigune upojukto hinottei dhub habor urinei mor loge bereibak.
66003005	Je jidi pare the dhub habor uribo ar tar nangan Jibono Boibuottun huno din puji phelei no dim. Mor Baba mujungot ar tar sorgo-dudtuno mujungot mui tare haam heim.
66003006	Aptabuoi mondoligunore hi hor jar han age, the sunok.” ’
66003007	“Philadelphia sohoro mondoli-buor dudtuore leg, ‘Ei hodagani horte sibie olode je pobitro ar soittio ar “Jartun Davidor chabigan age. The hulidie, huno jone bondo gori no paron ar the bondo gorilie, huno jone huli no paron.”
66003008	“Mui tomar hamani hobor pang, sawh, mui tomar mujungedi ekkan duor huli thoi duong ar sien huno jone bondo gori no paribak. Tomartun bol hom age, hintu tumi mor hodagan dorsio ar mor nangan no bharos.
66003009	Sawh, jigune Soitanor synagog, thara Judai manus holan hintu thara noi, thara gal madon. Mui tharare tomar idu einei tomar thengot tole tobona gorondi para gora bajei dim ar tore hospangge sien thara hobor pebak.
66003010	Tui mor uguman thori theinei mannios hinottei, pittimit agonde sigunore porikkie goribartei goda songsarot porikkie ebar oiede ghontabuot mui tore rokkie gori rageim.
66003011	Sawh, mui jhadi gori ejongor. Tomar raj-tukkuo huno jone hari no nejan para, tomar jien age sien shokto gori dori thago.
66003012	Je jidi pare, mui tare mor Itchiorbuor mondirbuot ekkuo thom banem ar the nigili no jebo ar. Mui tar ugure mor Itchiorbuor nangan ar mor Itchiorbuor sohorano nangan mui tar ugure legim. Sien olode Nuo Jerusalem sohoran, jien mor Itchiorbuottun, sorgottun lami ejchie. Ar mui tar ugure mor nuo nangan legim.
66003013	Aptabuoi mondoligunore hi hor jadtun han age, the sunok.” ’
66003014	“Sardis sohoro mondolibuor dudtuore leg, ‘Ei hodagani horte sibie olode Amen, Bischias-joggio, Soittio Shakkibuo, ar Itchioro sristir Arambogan:
66003015	“Mui tor hamani hobor pang. Tui olede thandaio noi goromo noi. Mortun mone hoiede tui thanda bah gorom obar elo.
66003016	Haron tui um-um, thandaio noi goromo noi hinottei, mui tore mor muottun ogoli pheleim.
66003017	Tui hoschie, ‘Mui thagoie, thagoie oinei, hitchu no lage.’ Tui hobor no pas, tui olede dugi, sitpure para, gorib, han, ar langda-bangda.
66003018	Senottei, mui tore sola duongor, tui thagoie os para, agunot porikkie gorsie sona mortun hini lo. Jene tor langdagan dega no jai para, dhub habor hininei uris, ar tui degos para, tor sogkunot sogo molom gulis.
66003019	Mui hospangge sigunore gobong ar sason gorong. Senottei, utjogi awh ar mon phira.
66003020	Sawh, mui duoro hure thieinei baschiengor. Je mor robuo suninei duoran huli de, mui tar idu sominei tar loge heim, ar the mor loge hebo.
66003021	Mui jedogkie gori jidinei mor Babo loge tar singasonanot bojchuong, thik sedogkie gori, je jidi pare, mor loge mor singasonanot bojibartei mui tare odhikar dim.
66003022	Aptabuoi mondoligunore hi hor jar han age, the sunok” ’ ”
66004001	Ei jinijchanir porendi, mui seinei, sawh, sorgot ekkan duor hulo gori degilung. Ar mui suinniongge polim robuo olode begolo ro dogkie gori more hor, “Idu utti, ienor porendi hi ghodi jebo sieni mui tore degeim.”
66004002	Sebeden jogon-togon mui Aptabuo iot olung. Ar sawh, sorgot ekkan singason degilung ar siot ek jon boi age.
66004003	Siot boji agede sibie olode degte jasper ar sardius pattoro dogkie. Singasonano seropala ekkan ranjoni age ar sien degte emerald pattoro dogkie.
66004004	Sei singasonanor seropala sobbischan singason age. Sei sobbischan singasono ugure dhub haboro pojak ursie gori sobbis jon borjon bojsie gori degilung. Tharar madat sonar raj-tuk elak.
66004005	Singasonanottun deba jhimileni, deba pherag, ar holorobo bar oie. Singasonano mujungot sattuo agun luro angodon. Sigun olakke Itchioror sattuo Apta.
66004006	Singasonanor mujungot holoior dogkie ekkan phudigor sagor age. Singasonanor song moiddie ar singasonanor seropala seirbuo poran-bola jontur agon. Sigunor pije mujunge sog boron gori agon.
66004007	Polim poran-bola jonturbuo olode singho dogkie. Di lombor poran-bola jonturbuo olode goru-shawh dogkie. Tin lombor poran-bola jonturbuor muo-seheragan olode manjior dogkie.Ar serlomboroporan-bola jonturbuo olode urbuo dhoba-chilo dogkie.
66004008	Seirbuo poran-bola jontur jon bagane shogan-shogan duo age, ar seropala ar bidirieo boron gori sog agon. Thara dine-reide no jireie gori hodon, “Pobitro, pobitro, pobitro, Sorbo Shoktiman Probu Itchiorbuo, jibe agottun duri elo, ikkieio age ar ebo.”
66004009	Umore-umor jedabuo jibe singasonanot boje, poran-bola jonturunetarejeilokkenemohima goron, sorman duon ar hujhi hoda hon,
66004010	sei lokkene umore-umor jedabuo, singasonanot bojede sibiere sobbis jon borjone tar mujungot porinei tobona goron. Singasonanor mujungedi tharar raj tukkun thoinei thara hon,
66004011	“Oh Probu, ar amar Itchior Pobitrobuo tui mohima, sorman, ar hemoda pebar lak. Haron tui beg jinijchani baneos. Tor ischier darai sieni age ar sristi gora oie.”
66005001	Singasonanot boji agede sibier den adot ekkuo dalor boi degilung. Siot bidirie ar barendi lega legkie age, ar sien sattuo sealloi marga die oie.
66005002	Sebeden mui ekkuo bolimondo sorgo-dud degkuong. The birat ro gori janei dinei hor, “Dalor boibuo hulibar ar ienor margagan ojorei paribar upojukto honna age?”
66005003	Sorgot bah pittimit bah pittimir tole sei dalor boibuo huli paribar bah sebar huno jon nei.
66005004	Dalor boibuo hulinei ar madei parie bah sien seie huno jon upojukto no pan hinottei, mui baari gujhi-gujhi hanilung.
66005005	Sebeden borjonnunottun ek jone more holo, “No hanis. Sa, Juda bongsor Singhobuo, Davidor singoran, the dalor boibuo hulibartei ar sienor sattuo seal ojoreibartei jittie.”
66005006	Sebeden, sawh, singasonano song moiddie, seirbuo poran-bola jonturo moiddie ar borjonnuno moiddie ekkuo bera-shagolo shawh morei phellie dogkie gori degilung. Sibier sattuo sing ar sattuo sog agon, ar sigun olakke Itchioro sattuo Apta goda songsaranot padei die oiegun.
66005007	Sebeden the einei singasonanot boji agede sibier den adottun dalor boibuo lologi.
66005008	Dalor boibuo the loinei, seirbuo poran-bola jonture ar sobbis jon borjone Bera-shagolo shawhbuor mujungot salam gori porilag. Tharar prottiek jonor ekkuo ekkuo binie ar dhub-hadi boron gori ekkuo ekkuo sonar hodora agon. Sieni olode sadhu manuschunor bor maganagani.
66005009	Sebeden sigune ekkuo nuo gid geinei hodon, “Haron tore morei phelluon, ar tor lor darai tui amare prottiek bongsottun, hoda- bolattun, manjiortun ar jadottun Itchiorbuo sidu hini annios. Senottei, tui sei dalor boibuo loinei sienor margagun ojoreibartei dorkar.
66005010	Tui amare amar Itchiorbuo sidu amare raja ar dhormo guru baneos, ar ami pittimiganot rajotto goribong.”
66005011	Sebeden mui seinei singasonanor ar poran-bola jonturunor ar borjonnunor seropala onek sorgo-dudtoro sunilung. Tharar songkie olakke dos azaro dos azar ar azar-azar.
66005012	Thara birat ro gori hodon, “Morei pela oiede Bera-shagolo shawhbuoi hemoda, dhonani, gyenan, shoktigan, sorman, mohima ar asirbad pebar upojukto!”
66005013	Sebeden sorgot, pittimit, pittimi tole, sagorot ar sienit begkanit agonde prottiek poran-bolai, hode sunilung, “Singasonanot boji agede sibier ar Bera-shagolo shawhbuor asirbad, sorman, mohima ar hemoda umore-umor ok!”
66005014	Sebeden seirbuo poran-bola jonture holak, “Amen.” Ar umore-umor jeda thaidie sibiere sobbis jon borjone porinei tobona gorilak.
66006001	Mui degilungge, Bera-shagolo shawhbuoi sattuo seal marsiettun ekkuo seal hulinei, seirbuo poran-bola jonturottun ekkuoi deba pherago dogkie gori hor, “Ejo, sawhgi.”
66006002	Mui seinei, sawh, mui ekkuo dhub ghora degilung. Ghorabuor ugure boji agede sibier ekkan dhonu age. Tare ekkuo raj-tuk duon, ar the joi gori-gori joi goribartei jar.
66006003	Ar jokkene di lombor sealluo the hulilo, di lombor poran-bola jonturbuoi hode mui sunilung, “Ejo, sawhgi.”
66006004	Sebeden ekkuo aguno dogkie ranga ghora nigili gelo. Ghorabuor ugure boji agede sibiere songsaranottun Shantigan tuli nejeibartei odhikar die oie, jene manjie morei pela-pheli goron. Tare ekkan dangor horgo duon.
66006005	Ar jokkene tin lombor sealluo the hulilo, tin lombor poran-bola jonturbuoi hode mui sunilung, “Ejo, sawhgi.” Sebeden mui seinei, sawh, ekkuo hala ghora, ar ghorabuor ugure boji agede sibier adot palla ekkuo degilung.
66006006	Sebeden seirbuo poran-bola jonturuno moiddie ekkuo roi edogkie gori hode sunilung, “Ek dhawδ gom ek denariδ obo ar tin dhaw hon-sol ek denari obo. Telan ar angguro roschan borbat no gorsio.”
66006007	Arjokkene ser lombor sealluo the hulilo, ser lombor poran-bola jonturbuoi hode mui sunilung, “Ejo, sawhgi.”
66006008	Sebeden mui seinei, sawh, ekkuo mora-mora ghora degilung. Ghorabuor ugure boji agede sibier nangan olode moronan ar Padalane tar pune-pune jar. Pittimir ser bhage ek bhago ugure tharare hemoda die olo, jene, thara horgoloi, bhadoradtoi, moronandoi, ar pittimir jharbuo jonturuno darai morei phelei paron.
66006009	Ar jokkene pas lombor sealluo the hulilo, palliengo tole aptagun degilung. Itchioro hodaganottei ar shakkigan dori roion hinottei tharare morei phelluon.
66006010	Thara birat ro gori hodon, “Oh pobitro ar soittio Probu, bijier gorinei ar amare lo phelei duonde henagan pittimit agonde sigunore homole ugurei dibe?”
66006011	Sebeden tharare jon bagene ekkan-ekkan dhub pojak die olo. Ar tharare huo olode, ekkena aro hanekkon jireidak, jedogkon song tharar song somarsie sagorsiegunore ar bheilogkunoreo tharar dogkie gori morei pelana songkie puro oi.
66006012	Ar mui seinei jokkene shoi lombor sealluo the hulilo, sawh, ekkan birat bhujol belo. Belan hejor bosta dogkie hala olo ar junan lo dogkie olo.
66006013	Bor boiere dumur gajottun jeirbuo dumur gulo jhagereinei phelei de para, agajottun taragun pittimit porton.
66006014	Sebeden pittimigan dalor boi bodajai para bodajeie. Prottiek moun ar dip jagattun lorsion.
66006015	Pittimir rajagun, dangor manuschun, dhoni manuschun, senapotigunδ, boli manuschun, prottiek sagorsiegun, ar prottiek shadin manuschun gattunot ar moununo siluno sere thara nije pollei thelakkoi.
66006016	Thara moununore ar silunore holak, “Singasonanot bojede sibiettun ar Bera-shagolo shawhbuor dangor rago muottun amare lugei thobartei amare jhaba.
66006017	Haron tar dangor rakkano dangor dinnuo ejchie, honna thori thei paribo?”
66007001	Sienir porendi, seirbuo sorgo-dud pittimir ser hunot thiei agonde mui degilung. Pittimit ok, sagorot ok bah, jei huno gajot ok boier no bebartei thara pittimir seirogan boier dori agon.
66007002	Sebeden aro ekkuo oinnio sorgo-dud jeda Itchiorbuor sealluo loie gori pugendittun udi ette mui degilung. Pittimigan ar sagoran hoti goribartei odhikar die oiede sei seirbuo sorgo-dudtore the birat ro gori holo,
66007003	“Amar Itchiorbuor sagorsiegunore tharar hobalot seal-moor mara oi song pittimiganore, sagoranore bah, gajchunore hoti no gorsio.”
66007004	Seal-moor mara oionde sigunor songkien mui suinniong. Israel jador seal-moor mara oiede beg manuschun olakke ek lakh sosolis azar.
66007005	Judar gojadtun baro azar seal-moor mara oie. Reuben gojadtun baro azar seal-moor mara oie. Gad gojadtun baro azar seal-moor mara oie.
66007006	Asher gojadtun baro azar seal-moor mara oie. Nephtali gojadtun baro azar seal-moor mara oie. Manasi gojadtun baro azar seal-moor mara oie.
66007007	Simeon gojadtun baro azar seal-moor mara oie. Levi gojadtun baro azar seal-moor mara oie. Issachar gojadtun baro azar seal-moor mara oie.
66007008	Zebulun gojadtun baro azar seal-moor mara oie. Joseb gojadtun baro azar seal-moor mara oie. Benjamin gojadtun baro azar seal-moor mara oie.
66007009	Sienir porendi mui seinei, sawh, ogonita manjior jhag mui degilung. Thara beg jadottun, beg bongsottun, beg manjiortun ar beg hoda-bolattun. Thara dhub pojakkoi tal pada duoschie gori, singasonano mujungot ar Bera-shagolo shawhbuor mujungot thiei agon.
66007010	Ar thara birat ro gori hodon, “Muktigan singasonanot bojede amar Itchiorbuor ar Bera-shagolo shawhbuor.”
66007011	Beg sorgo-dudtune singasonanor, borjonnunor, ar seirbuo poran-bola jonturunor seropala thiei thagke singasonano mokkie porinei Itchiorore tobona gorinei hodon,
66007012	“Amen! Bainigan, mohimagan, gyenan, donniobadtan, sormanan, hemodagan, ar shoktigan amar Itchiorbuor umore-umor ok. Amen.”
66007013	Sebeden borjonnunottun ek jon borjone mortun pujor gorilo, “Ei dhub pojak ursie manuschun honna ar huttun ejchuon?”
66007014	Mui tare uttor dilung, “Probu, tui hobor pas.” Sebeden the more holo, “Igun olakke dangor hostortun nigili ejchiegun. Tharar pojakkani Bera-shagolo shawhbuor logandoi dhoinei dhub oie.
66007015	Senottei, Itchiorbuor singasonano mujungot thara agondi ar dine-reide tar mondirbuot tare sebona gorton. Ar singasonanot bojede sibiei tharar moiddie bojotti goribuo.
66007016	Tharattun huno din ped no puribo ar pani saj no goribo. Tharar ugure belo phor no puribo ar tharar gorom no phudibo.
66007017	Haron singasonano moiddie Bera-shagolo shawhbuoi tharare paleibo, ar the tharare jibono uiphudo paniganot nejeibo. Ar Itchiore beg sogo panigani tharar sogkunottun puji dibo.”
66008001	Jokkene sat lombor sealluo the hulilo, sorgot adha ghonta ro so neie olo.
66008002	Itchiorbuor mujungot thieie gori sattuo sorgo-dud mui degilung, ar tharare sattuo begol die olo.
66008003	Sebeden oinnio ekkuo sorgo-dud ekkan sonar dhub-hadi sinnogan dhorsie gori einei pallienganot thieilogi. Singasonano mujungot agede sonar pallienganot beg sadhu manuschunor bor maganagani somot gojeibartei, tare onek dhub-hadi die olo.
66008004	Sorgo-dudtuor adottun dhub-hadi dhumogan ar sadhu manuschunor bor magana-ani Itchiorbuor mujungot udilogoi.
66008005	Sebeden sorgo-dudtuoi dhub-hadi sinnogan loinei pallienganottun siot agun bhoreilo, ar sien pittimit lugimari dilo. Sebeden onek sobdo olo, deba pherag gorilo, jhimilenei ar ekkan bhujol belo.
66008006	Sebeden sattuo sorgo-dude tharar begolun bajeibartei nije-nije jugol olak.
66008007	Polim sorgo-dudtuoi tar begolluo bajeilo. Loloi mijiel gori sil ar agun nigililo, ar sieni pittimit phelei die olo. Gajchun tin bhage ek bhag puri gelak, ar beg eil herani puri gelo.
66008008	Sebeden di lombor sorgo-dudtuoi tar begolluo bajeilo. Birat ekkuo moun puri jadte dogkie gori ekkan jinij sagorot phelei die olo, ar sagoran tin bhage ek bhag lo oi gelo.
66008009	Sagorot thande poran-bolagun tin bhage ek bhag mori gelak, ar tin bhage ek bhag jahaj nosto olo.
66008010	Sebeden tin lombor sorgo-dudtuoi tar begolluo bajeilo. Agajottun ekkuo dangor tara, agun luro dogkie gori jhuri porinei, tin bhage ek bhago soranit ar uiphudot porilo.
66008011	Tarabuor nangan olode aguni-tidie . Tin bhage ek bhag pani tidie oinei, panigan heinei onek manus morsion, haron panigan tidie goreie.
66008012	Sebeden ser lombor sorgo-dudtuoi tar begolluo bajeilo. Belanor, junanor, ar taragunor tin bhage ek bhag bari helak. Senottei, sieni tin bhage ek bhag andhar olo. Dinnuo tin bhage ek bhag phor no olo, sedogkie gori reidtuoio.
66008013	Ar mui seinei sunilungge, ekkuo sorgo-dud agajo moiddie uri-uri birat ro gori hor, “Hobal purok! Hobal purok! Pittimit agonde sigunor hobal puribo, haron bagi agonde tinnuo sorgo-dude tharar begolun bajeibar oion.”
66009001	Sebeden pas lombor sorgo-dudtuoi tar begolluo bajeilo. Ekkuo tara agajottun pittimit porte mui degilung. Sei tarabuore tolanei gattuor chabigan die olo.
66009002	Sei tarabuoi tolanei gattuo hulinei, bor olon-shalottun dhumo nigilede dogkie gori gattuottun dhumo nigililo. Gattuor dhumogandoi belan andhar olo ar boieran ghur olo.
66009003	Sebeden dhumoganottun dan-phiring bar olak. Pittimir di-darchie pukkunor jeannie hemoda age sedogkie hemoda tharare die olo.
66009004	Pittimir herani bah je huno eil jinij bah je huno gaj hoti no goribartei tharare ugum die olo. Itchioro seal-moor jei manuschunor tharar hobalot nei bana sigunore hoti goribartei tharare ugum die oie.
66009005	Manus morei pheleibartei tharare odhikar die no oi, hintu tharare pas mas thoschie lageibartei odhikar die oie. Di-darchie puge hamallie jedogkie gori shuluoi, tharar thoschiegan sedogkie obo.
66009006	Sei dinunot manjie moribar sebak hintu mori no paribak. Thara moribartei sele, moranagan tharattun dhei jebo.
66009007	Dan-phiringun degte judduo goribartei jugol oie ghora dogkie. Tharar siriegunot sonar raj-tuk agon, ar tharar muoni olode manjior muo dogkie.
66009008	Tharar milier sulo dogkie sul age, ar tharar dadtun olakke singhor dado dogkie.
66009009	Ar tharar luor buk patti dogkie buk patti age. Tharar duoganir sobdogun olakke rodtani onek ghoraloi judduot jadte sobdo dogkie.
66009010	Tharar di-darchie pugor dogkie leis age, ar tharar leischanit bis age. Tharar hemodagan olode manjiore pas mas hoti goribartei.
66009011	Tharattun ekkuo raja age. Sibie olode tolanei gattuot sorgo-dud. Tar nangan Hebru hodadi Abbadon, ar Grik hodadi olode Apollyon .
66009012	Shawh, polim hobal puronan thum olo, sei porendi dien hobal purona ebo.
66009013	Sebeden shoi lombor sorgo-dudtuoi tar begolluo bajeilo. Itchioro mujungo sonar pallienganor seirbuo singottun ekkuo ro mui sunilung.
66009014	Sei robuoi begol dhorsie shoi lombor sorgo-dudtuore hor, “Euphrates bor soraganot bannie agonde seirbuo sorgo-dudtunore iri de.”
66009015	Sebeden ghontabuottei, dinnuottei, maschuottei, ar bojorbuottei bana oiede seirbuo sorgo-dud iri die olo, jene thara tin bhage ek bhag manei morei pelan.
66009016	Mui tharar songkien sunilungge, ghora-bola soinnio olakke huri kuti jon.
66009017	Ar edogkie gori mui aziliet ghora degilung. Ghoraguno ugure boji agonde sigunor aguno dogkie ranga rongor, sopsoppie nilo rongo dogkie, ar gondrogo dogkie olottie rongor buk-patti age. Ghoragunor siriegun olakke singhor sirie dogkie, ar sigunor muottun agun, dhumo ar gondrog nigillie.
66009018	Sei tinan durbhigkoloi tharar muonittun bar oie aguno darai, dhumo ar gondrogo darai tin bhage ek bhag manei morei phelluon.
66009019	Haron tharar hemodagan olode tharar muonit ar leischanit. Tharar leischani olode sabo dogkie sirie-bola ar sieniloi manjiore hoti goron.
66009020	Hintu durbhigkoganie morei no pelaidie manus bagi roionde sigune tharar ador hamanittun monani no phiran. Thara bhud, sonar, rubuor, hajor, silor, ar gajor mukti jienie no dege, no sune, ar adi jei no pare sieni thara tobona bondo no goron.
66009021	Tharar hun goranagani, salan die di goranagani, shanda hamani bah sur goranagani sombonde tharar monani no phiran.
66010001	Sebeden ekkuo bolimondo sorgo-dud sorgottun nigilinei lami ette mui degilung. The megsag ursie ar tar siriebuot ekkan ranjoni age. Tar muon belano dogkie ar tar thengani aguno thomor dogkie.
66010002	Tar adot ekkuo sigon dalor boi hullie gori age. Tar den thengandoi sagorot hus dibo ar bang thengandoi hubo ugure hus dibo.
66010003	Singho gujuronde dogkie gori the birat ro gori hobo. The ro gorsieo sattuo deba pherage, pherag goribak.
66010004	Sattuo deba pherage, pherag gorsiede bokkene mui begibar oiong. Hintu agajottun ekkuo roi more hode mui sunibung, “Sattuo deba pherage, pherag gorinei hoionde sieni seab mari tho, no begis.”
66010005	Sebeden sagorot ar hubo ugure thieie gori degkuongge sorgo-dudtuoi tar adtani agajot abok goribo.
66010006	Jibe sorgo ar sienit agede sieni, pittimi ar sienot agede sieni, sagor ar sienit agede sieni begkani baneie ar umore-umor baji thai, sibiere dhorinei the sobot heinei, diri no obo ar bibi the hobo.
66010007	Hintu sat bombor sorgo-dudtuoi tar begobbuo bajeibode dinnunot, tar sagorsie munigunore janei dede doge, Itchioro oghur ghubonan pureibo.
66010008	hoiede robuoi more hode aro sunibung, “Ja, sagorot ar hubo ugure thiei agede sorgo-dudtor adot hubo gori agede sigon dabor boibuo bogoi.”
66010009	Senottei mui jeinei sorgo-dudtuore hobunggoi, “More sigon dabor boibuo de.” The more hobo, “Loinei ha. Iene tor pedtuo tidie goreibo, hintu ien tor muonot modhu dogkie midie phudibo.”
66010010	Sebeden sigon dabor boibuo sorgo-dudtuor adottun mui boinei hebung. Ien mor muonot modhu dogkie midie phudibo, hintu mui haanar porendi mor pedtuo tidie obo.
66010011	Aro the more hobo, “Tui onek manjior sombonde, jador sombonde, nanan hoda-bobar sombonde ar rajar sombonde muni dogkie gori hoda ho poribo.”
66011001	Sebeden more ekkuo mabibar budigo dogkie hagara duon. Ar sorgo-dudtuoi udinei hobo, “Uth, Itchioro mondirbuo ar pabbiengan mabpoi. Siot tobona goronde sigun gondoi.
66011002	Hintu mondirbuo barendi udonan Be-jadtunore die oie hinottei no mabis. Thara pobitro sohoranbiabis mas uribak.
66011003	Mor di jon shakkigunore mui hemoda dim. Thara bostar habor urinei, baro sho heit din muni dogkie gori hoda hobak.”
66011004	Sigun obakke pittimir Itchiorbuor mujungot thieie dibie serag-dani ar dibie obiv gaj.
66011005	Huno jone judi tharare hoti goribar san, tharar muonittun agun nigibinei tharar sottrugun morei peban. Je tharare hoti goribar sai, sibie edogkie gori mora poribo.
66011006	Thara muni dogkie gori hoda honde dinnuot jhor no de para, agaschan bondo gori paribar tharar hemoda age. Panigan bo banei paribar ar songsaran badoradtoi jedog bar mone hoi sedog bar maribar hemoda age.
66011007	Jokkene tharar shakkigan thum goribak, sokkene tobanei gattuottun nigili ebode jonturbuoi thararloi judduo goribogi, tharare jidinei morei pheleibogi.
66011008	Tharar mora heyegani bor sohorano podot pori thebo. Sei sohoranor aptar pokkedi nangan olode Sodom ar Egypt, sienot amar Probure Krosot duon.
66011009	Sebeden nanan manjiortun, bongsottun, hoda-bolattun, ar jadottun manjie tharar mora heyegani share-tin din degibak. Tharar heyegani sidie shalot garebartei no dibag.
66011010	Pittimit theiegune tharar ugure hujhi obak, phorti goribak ar ek jone oinnio jonore dan padei die di goribak. Haron sei di jon munie pittimir manuschunore hosto lageion.
66011011	Share-tin dino porendi Itchiorbuottun jibono nijeschan tharar iot somilo. Thara thieilak ar tharare jigune degkuon shanggadik dorelak.
66011012	Ar sorgottun birat ro gori tharare hode sunilak, “Idu uduogi.” Sebeden thara ekkuo megsagot gori sorgot udilakkoi ar tharar sottrugune tharare sei thelak.
66011013	Thik sei somoiot ekkan birat bhujol belo, ar dos bhage ek bhag sohoran bhangi porilo. Bhujolanot sat azar manus morilak, ar bagi manuschune dorenei sorgo Itchiorbuore baini gorilak.
66011014	Di lombor hobal-puronagan bidi gelo, sawh, tin lombor hobal-puronagan jhadi gori ejer.
66011015	Sebeden sat lombor sorgo-dudtuoi tar begolluo bajeilo. Sorgot birat ro olo ar thara hodon, “Ei songsaro rejjiogani amar Probur ar tar Kristor olo ar the sieni umore-umor sason goribo.”
66011016	Itchiorbuor mujungot tharar singasonanit boji agonde sobbis jon borjone bukpari porinei Itchiorbuore tobona gorilak.
66011017	Thara hodon, “Oh begottun hemoda-bola Probu Itchior, ami tore donniobad dir. Tui olede ikkieio agos, agottun duri ele, ar porendio thebe. Haron tui tor moha hemodagan loinei sason gorsios.
66011018	Jador manuschun rak oion ar tor rakkan lungilogi. Moragun bijier goribar ar tui tor sagorsie munigunore, sadhu manuschunore, ar sigon-dangor jigune tor nangan dhorande sigunore poriskari dibe, ar jigune songsaran nas gorton sigunore tui nas goribede somoien lungilogi.”
66011019	Sebeden Itchiorbuor mondirbuo sorgot hulo olo. Ar tar sukti gorsie sundukkuo tar mondirbuot dega gelo. Jhimilelo, bomeilo, deba pherag gorilo, bhujol belo, ar shanggadik sil pheleilo.
66012001	Sorgot ekkan dangor sinno dega dilo. Belan urinei, sanan hus dinei, tar siriebuot barobuo thara pinnie gori ekkuo milie dega dilo.
66012002	The pedoli hinottei, guro onapedpiriei arpuo phudode ped piriei gujhi-gujhi haner.
66012003	Aro ekkan sinno sorgot dega dilo. Sawh, aguno dogkie ranga ekkuo birat dragon dega gelo. Tar sattuo sirie, doschuo sing ar sattuo siriet sattuo raj-tuk agon.
66012004	Tar leischandoi agajottun tin bhage ek bhag thara pittimit phelei dilo. Gurobuo oboio gurobuore more phelei dibartei, puo phudeibar oiede miliebuor mujungot dragonnuoi thieilo.
66012005	Miliebuoi ekkuo morod puo phudelo. Sibiei beg jadtun luor ludigkoi sason goribartei oie. Miliebuor puobuore Itchioro ar tar singasonano sidu tuli neja oie.
66012006	Sebeden miliebuoi jonosunnio dhei gelogoi, jiot Itchiore tartei ekkan jaga jugolei die, jene siot tare ek azar di sho heit din haban.
66012007	Sorgot ekkan judduo bajilo. Michael ar tar sorgo-dudtune dragonnuoloi judduo gorilak. Dragonnuo ar tar dudtuneio thararloi judduo gorilak.
66012008	Hintu dragonnuo ar tar dudtune no jinilak. Senottei, sorgot tharattei jaga nei ar.
66012009	Sebeden sei birat dragonnuore sorgottun nigilei die olo. The olode purona amolor sabpuo, thar nangan olode Diabolaδ ar Soitan. The goda songsaro manuschunore thogai. Tare ar tar dudtun pittimit phelei die oie.
66012010	Sebeden sorgot ekkuo birat roi hode mui sunilung, “Amar bheilogkunore amar Itchiorbuor mujungot reide-dine duj bajei dede sibiere phelei die oie hinottei, ikkie muktigan, shoktigan, ar amar Itchiorbuor rejjiogan, ar tar Kristor hemodagan lungilogi.
66012011	Bera-shagolo shawhbuor logano darai ar tharar shakkiganor hodar darai tare jittuon. Moron song tharar poranani thara doye no goron.
66012012	Oh sorgogani ar sorgot theiegun, senottei, hujhi awh. Diabolaδ birat rakkoi tomar idu lami ejchie hinottei, pittimit ar sagorot theiegunottei hobal poribo. Haron Diabolaδ hobor pai jei, tar ekka gori somoi age.”
66012013	Dragonnuoi jokkene degilode jei, tare pittimit phelei die olo, morod puo phudeiede miliebuore the uttiesar gorilo.
66012014	Hintu miliebuore dien bor dhoba-chilor duo die olo, jene the jonosunnio jagat uri jenei tar jaganot jai para. Sidu tare sabpuor mujungottun, somoi dui somoi ar adha somoi lobiot goribak.
66012015	Sebeden sabpuoi tar muonottun miliebuor pijendi pani ban dogkie gori pani ogoli dilo, jene miliebuore the pani bane bajei ni pare.
66012016	Hintu pittimigane miliebuore sahajjio gorilo. Pittimigane tar muon hulinei dragonnuoi ogoli dede pani banan gililo.
66012017	Sebeden dragonnuoi miliebuor ugure shanggadik rak olo. Dragonnuoi miliebuor bagi bongsogundoi judduo goribartei gelo, jigune Itchioro ugumani manon ar Jisu Kristor sombonde shakki duon.
66013001	Mui sagoro parot dullie-sorot thiei agong. Sagorottun ekkuo jontur nigilode mui degilung. Sibier sattuo sirie ar doschuo sing agon. Doschuo singot doschuo raj-tuk agon ar prottiek siriet Itchiorore sorjeie nang lega age.
66013002	Mui degkuongge jonturbuo olode hokkie-bagho dogkie. Sibier thengani olode bhalugo thengo dogkie, tar muon olode singhor mu dogkie. Dragonnuoi tare tar hemodagan, tar singasonan, ar birat odhikar dilo.
66013003	mui degilungge tar siriegunottun ekkuo sirie morei phellie gobha dogkie. Tar moronor gobhagan gom oinei, goda songsaro manuschune amok olak ar jonturbuor pune-pune gelak.
66013004	Senottei, jonturbuore odhikar dede dragonnuore manuschune tobona gorilak. Ar thara jonturbuoreio tobona gorinei holak, “Jonturbuo dogkie honna age? Honna tare judduo dori paribo?”
66013005	Jonturbuore bor hoda hobartei, ar sorjeibartei ekkan mu die olo. Ar tare bialis mas ek sottie goribartei odhikar die olo.
66013006	SebedenjonturbuoiItchiorbuore sorjeibartei tar muon hulilo. The Itchioro nangan, tar tambulan ar sorgot thande sigunore sorjeilo.
66013007	Sadhu manuschundoi judduo gorinei tharare jidibartei tare odhikar die olo. Ar beg bongso ugure, hoda-bolaguno ugure ar jadtuno ugure tare odhikar die olo.
66013008	Jigunor nangani Bera-shagolo shawhbuor Jibono Boibuot lega nei, pittimit theie sigune begkune jonturbuore tobona goribak. Bera-shagolo shawhbuo songsar sristittun duri morei pela oie.
66013009	Jar han age the sunok.
66013010	Je banidajit nejai, the banidajit jok. Je horgoloi morei pelai, tare horgoloi morei pela obo. Iot sadhu manuschune dhorjio ar bischias tha poribo.
66013011	Sebeden mui aro ekkuo jontur pittimittun nigili ette degilung. Sibier bera-shagolo shawh dogkie dibie sing agon ar jonturbuoi dragonnuo dogkie gori hoda hoi.
66013012	Polim jonturbuor mujungot the beg odhikarani hamot lagai. Polim jonturbuore jiber morono ghobagan gom oie, sibiere the pittimi ar pittimit thande sigunore tobona gora bajei de.
66013013	The dangor-dangor sinno ham gore. Manjior sog dega agajottun pittimit agun lamei ana bajei dipare.
66013014	Polim jonturbuor mujungot goribartei die oiede sinnoganiloi pittimit thande sigunore the thogai. Horgoloi ghoba oinei baschiede polim jonturbuor subhi banebartei pittimit thande sigunore the hoi.
66013015	Jonturbuor subhibuore nijes pheleibar dibartei tare odhikar die olo jene, jonturbuor subhibuoi hodaio hoi pare ar jonturbuor subhibuore jedog jone tobona no goron, sigunore morei pela bajei de para.
66013016	Sigon-dangor, gorib-thagoie, shadin ar banidaji the begkunore tharar den adot bah hobalot marga lo bajei dilo.
66013017	Jar marga age bah jonturbuor nangan age bah jonturbuor nangano lomborbuo age siguno bade huno jone beja-hine no goron para gorilo.
66013018	Iot gyenan age, je buji pare the jonturbuor lomborbuo ijeb gorog. Haron ibie olode manjior lombor ar tar lomborbuo olode shoi sho shoishoittio.
66014001	Sebeden, mui seinei, ar sawh, Zaion Mounnuot ekkuo Bera-shagolo shawh thieie gori mui degilung. Tar loge ek lakh sosolis azar manus tar Babor nangan tharar huobalanit legkie gori thiei agon.
66014002	Sebeden, agajottun mui ekkuo ro sunilung ar sei robuo pani gujurede ar bor deba pherago dogkie. Ar bina bajeiegune tharar binagun bazadonde mui sunilung.
66014003	Singasonano mujungot, seirbuo poran-bola jonturuno mujungot, ar borjonnuno mujungot thara ekkuo nuo gido dogkie gelak. Pittimittun hini lo oie ek lakh sosolis azar manuschunor bade huno jone sei gidtuo shigi no paron.
66014004	Sigun olakke milieloi bodnam no peiegun. Thara olakke sodi manus. Sigune Bera-shagolo shawhbuore the jidu jedosat pune-pune jan. Thara Itchiorbuor ar Bera-shagolo shawhbuor polim pholun bili, manjior moiddiettun tharare hini lo oie.
66014005	Tharar muonit gal madana nei, haron Itchiorbuor singasonano mujungot thara olakke duj sara.
66014006	Sebeden mui aro ekkuo sorgo-dud agajo moiddie urte degilung. Pittimit theiegunore prottiek jadore, bongsore, hoda-bolare, ar manjiore prosar gori dibartei tartun ekkan ononto halor gom hobor age.
66014007	The birat ro gori hor, “Tar bijiero somoibuo lungiegi hinottei, Itchiorbuore doreo ar baini gorsio, je sorgogan, pittimigan, sagoran, ar uiphudtan baneie tare tobona goro.”
66014008	Aro ekkuo sorgo-dude tar pune-pune jeinei holo, “Jhuri porsie! Bor sohor Babylonan jhuri porsie! Haron tar beschie gorsie rakkano modtan the beg jadtunore habeie.”
66014009	Sebeden tin lombor sorgo-dudtuoi tharar pune-pune jeinei birat ro gori hor, “Je jonturbuore ar tar subhibuore tobona gore, tar margagan tar hobalot loi bah tar adot loi,
66014010	The nijeio Itchioro rago modtan hebo, jien tar rage boron gori golojchuot bhori die. Pobitro sorgo-dudtuno mujungot ar Bera-shagolo shawhbuor mujungot tare agundoi ar gondrogkoi hosto laga obo.
66014011	Hosto lagana dhumogan umore-umor ujonnie udibogoi. Jonturbuore ar tar subhibuo tobona goriegunor, ar je tar nangano margagan loi sigunor reide-dine jiren no thebo.”
66014012	Iot sadhu manuschunor dhorjiogan, jigune Itchioro ugumani manon ar Jisure bischias gori solon.
66014013	Sebeden agajottun more ekkuo roi hode mui sunilung, “Leg, ‘jigun ikkiettun duri Probuiot moron sigun hoballie.’ ” Aptabuoi holo, “Oi, jene thara, tharar hamanittun jiren ar tharar hamanie tharar pune-pune jebo.”
66014014	Ar mui seinei, sawh, ekkan dhub megsag degilung. Megsagkuo ugure Munischioro Puobuo dogkie ek jon boji age, jar siriebuot ekkuo sonar raj-tuk age, ar tar adot ekkan dhar shari age.
66014015	Ar aro ekkuo sorgo-dud mondirbuottun nigili einei, megsagkuor ugure boji agede sibiere birat ro gori hor, “Sharigandoi haba dhor. Haron Pittimir hedtan pakkie, tor habibar okto ejchie.”
66014016	Sebeden megsagkuo ugure boji agede sibiei tar sharigan pittimit bajelo, ar pittimigan the dieilo.
66014017	Sebeden aro ekkuo sorgo-dud sorgo mondirbuottun nigili elo. Tareo ekkan dhar shari age.
66014018	Ar aro ekkuo sorgo-dud pallienganottun nigili elo. Tar aguno ugure hemoda age, ar the dhar shari-bolabuore birat ro gori hor, “Tor dhar sharigandoi pittimir angguro ludi jaburun thubo, haron anggurun puro gori pakkuon.”
66014019	Sebeden sorgo-dudtuoi tar sharigan pittimit bajeilo, ar pittimir angguro ludigani thubeinei, Itchioro rago angguro bor ghani-holanot phelei dilo.
66014020	Sohorano barendi ghani-holan thenggoi urilakkoi. Ghani-holanottun lo nigilinei ghoragunor jing song gobhin oinei, perai tin shot kilomiter nal adi gelo.
66015001	Sebeden sorgot mui aro ekkan dangor oborug sinno degilung. Sien olode, sattuo sorgo-dud sattan sejo badorat somot. Haron sienit Itchioro rakkan puro oi.
66015002	Mui ekkan phudigor sagoro dogkie jinij agundoi mijiel-hojal gori degilung. Jigune jonturbuo ugure, tar subhibuor ugure, tar margagano ugure, ar tar nangano lomborbuo ugure jittuon, sigune Itchioro bina dhorsie gori phudigo sagoranot thiei agon.
66015003	Thara Itchioro sagorsie Mosir gan, ar Bera-shagolo shawhbuor gan gadon. Thara gidodi hodon, “Oh Sorbo-Shoktiman Probu Itchior, tor hamani olode dangor ar oborug. Oh sadhu manuschunor Rajabuo, tor podtani uju ar soittio.
66015004	Oh Probu, tore no doreie ar baini no gorsie honna age? Haron tui ekmattro pobitrobuo. Tor dhormitto hamani dega jeie hinottei, beg jadtune einei tor mujungot tobona goribak.”
66015005	Suno, ienir porendi mui seinei, shakkigano terpalo-haborano mondirbuo hulo gori mui degilung.
66015006	Mondirbuottun sattuo sorgo-dud nigili elak. Tharar sattan dhurbhikko age. Thara jhimid-jhimid jolede pado habor ursie, ar tharar bugkun sonar pattoi bereie.
66015007	Seirbuo poran-bola jonturottun ekkuoi sattuo sorgo-dudtore sattuo sonar hodora dilo. Umore-umor jeda Itchiorbuor rakkan sigunot boron gori age.
66015008	Itchioro mohimaganottun ar tar hemodaganottun mondirbuo dhumoloi boron olo. Sattuo sorgo-dudtor sattan dhurbhikko no puroi song huno jone mondirbuot somi no parilak.
66016001	Sebeden sattuo sorgo-dudtore mondirbuottun birat ro gori hode mui sunilung, “Jo, pittimit Itchioro sattuo rago hodora dali duogoi.”
66016002	Sebedenpolim sorgo-dudtuoi jeinei tar hodorabuo pittimit dali dilogoi. Jonturbuo marga agede sigunor ar jonturbuor subhibuore tobona gorsionde sigunor pirie gorede ar ghin gore para ereie gha olo.
66016003	Sebeden di lombor sorgo-dudtuoi tar hodorabuo sagorot dali dilogoi. Sagoran mora manjior lo dogkie lo olo, ar sagoranot prottiek poran-bolagun mori gelak.
66016004	Sebeden tin lombor sorgo-dudtuoi tar hodorabuo sorat ar uiphudot dali dinei, panigani lo olo.
66016005	Ar panir sorgo-dudtuoi hode mui sunilung, “Oh Probu, tui dharmig hinottei, tui ei jinijchani bijier gorilie. Tui olede ikkieio agos, ageio elo, ar tui porendio thebe.
66016006	Haron thara sadhu manuschunor ar munigunor lo phelei duon hinottei, tui tharare lo hebartei dile haron ien thara pana lak.”
66016007	Sebeden pallienganottun aro ekkuo roi hode mui sunilung, “Sorbo-Shoktiman Probu Itchior, oi, tor bijierani soittio ar dharmig.”
66016008	Seir lombor sorgo-dudtuoi tar hodorabuo belano ugure dali dilo. Manjiore agundoi shegibartei belanore odhikar die olo.
66016009	Manuschunore birat gorommoi shega olo. Sebeden ei dhurbhikkogani ugure hemoda agede Itchiorbuor nangan manuschune sorjeilak. Itchiorbuore baini goribartei tharar monani no phireilak.
66016010	Pas lombor sorgo-dudtuoi tar hodorabuo jonturbuor singasonano ugure dali dilo. Tar rejjiogan andhar olo, ar manuschune hosto peinei jil hamorton.
66016011	Hostoi ar ereie ghaganittei sorgo Itchiorore thara sorjeilak. Tharar hamani sombonde mon no phireilak.
66016012	Sebeden shoi lombor sorgo-dudtuoi tar hodorabuo bor sora Euphrates ugure dali dilo. Pugettun rajagun ebartei pod obartei soragano panigani shugei gelo.
66016013	Dragonnuor muottun, jonturbuor muottun, ar nogoli munibuor muottun bengo dogkie tinnuo hajorchie apta nigili ette mui degilung.
66016014	Sigun olakke bhudo apta hinottei, sinno degan. Sorbo-shoktiman Itchioro dangor dinnuor judduoganot pittimir rajagun ar goda songsaro rajagun thubeibartei, sigune tharar sidu jan.
66016015	“Sawh, mui suro dogkie gori ejongor. Je uijkare thai, ar habor uri thai the hoballie, anole, the uttie langda bereibo ar manjie tar lajchan degibak”
66016016	Hebru hodadi Armageddon honde jaganot sigune tharare thubeibak.
66016017	Sebeden sat lombor sorgo-dudtuoi tar hodorabuo boierot dali dilo. Sorgo mondirbuor singasonanottun ekkuo birat ro nigilinei hor, “Ien gora oie.”
66016018	Bomani, deba pherag ar jhimileni olo. Ekkan edogkie dangor bhujol belo, jien pittimit manei agonde siottun duri sedogkie shanggadik ar dangor bhujol no bai.
66016019	Sebeden bor sohoran tin bhag olo ar jadtunor sohorani pori gelo. Dangor Babylon sohoranore Itchioro egahora rakkano modo golojchuo dibartei Itchioro mujungot idot tulo olo.
66016020	Sebeden prottiek dippun uri polakkoi, ar mounun suph pa no gelo.
66016021	Agajottun dangor sil manjior ugure porilag. Ekkuo sil perai ek talenδ Sil porana dhurbhikkoganottei, manjie Itchiorore sorjeilak haron dhurbhikkogan shanggadik dangor elo.
66017001	Sebeden sattuo sorgo-dudtunottun ekkuoi, jiber sattuo hodora agon sibiei mor idu einei more hologi, “Ai, onek pani ugure boji thaidie dangor beschie miliebuor bijieran mui tore degang.
66017002	Tarloi songsaro rajagune shanda gorsion, ar pittimit theiegunore tar beschie modtandoi mattol goreie.”
66017003	Sebeden the more aptadi jonosunnio jagat nejeilo. Ekkuo miliei ranga jonturo ugure boji agede mui degilung. Sei jonturbuor sattuo sirie ar doschuo sing agon, ar tar ugure boron gori sorjeie nang age.
66017004	Miliebuoi halisuri ar ranga habor uri age ar sona, moillioban pattor, ar mukto pini age. Tar adot ekkuo sonar goloj age, ar siot tar beschie gorsie beg ghin gore paragani ar hajorani boron gori age.
66017005	Tar huobalanot ekkan nang lega age: OGHUR GHUR GUBON, DANGOR BABYLON SOHOR, BESCHIE MILIEGUNOR AR SONGSARO GHIN GORE PARA SIENIR MABUO.
66017006	Miliebuore mui seinei, the sadhu manuschunor logani ar Jisur shakkigunor logani heinei mattol oie. Mui tare deginei, mui shanggadik amok oiong.
66017007	Hintu sorgo-dudtuoi more holo, “Hittei tui amok ole? Sattuo sirie ar doschuo sing-bola jonturbuoi miliebuore nejaidie sibier sombonde ar miliebuor sombonde oghur ghur gubonan mui tore hoi dim.
66017008	Jei jonturbuo tui degkuos, sibie agendi elo, hintu ikkie nei. Sibiei tolanei gattuottun udi einei nosto obo.
