Songsaro manuschune, jigunor nangani songsar sristi oiede lokkene Jibono Boibuot lega no oi, sigune jei jonturbuo agendi elo, hintu ikkie nei, ar tobuio age, sibiere deginei amok obak.
66017009	“Gyeni monane bujede sien olode ien, sattuo sirie olode sattuo moun, jiot miliebuoi boje.
66017010	Tharaio olakke sattuo raja. Paschuo raja jhuri porsion. Ikkie ekkuo raja age, ar aro ekkuo ebar age. Jokkene the ebo, the hanekkon tha poribo.
66017011	Jei jonturbuo agendi elo, hintu ikkie nei, the nijeio olode attio lomborbuo. The sattuo rajartun ek jon ar nosto obartei jebo.
66017012	“Tui degkuoschie doschuo sing olakke doschuo raja. Thara rejjio no pan hintu tobuio, jonturbuor loge ek ghonta rajar odhikar pebak.
66017013	Sei sattuo rajai ek mon oinei, tharar hemodani ar odhikarani jonturbuore dibag.
66017014	Thara Bera-shagolo shawhbuore judduo doribak. Bera-shagolo shawhbuoi tharare jidibo, haron the olode probugunor Probu ar rajagunor Raja. Tar loge thebakke sigunore bei loie ar bischias-joggio hobak.”
66017015	Sebeden sorgo-dudtuoi more holo, “Beschie miliebuoi bojede panigani tui degkuoschie sieni olode, manuschun, manjior jhagkun,jadtun, arhoda-bolagun.
66017016	Jonturbuor doschuo sing tui degkuoschie sigune beschie miliebuore hinsie goribak ar tare phelei jebak. Thara miliebuore langda goreinei tar eragani hebak. Sebeden tare agunot puri pheleibak.
66017017	Haron Itchiore tar uddischuogan pureibartei tharar ontoranit bhorei die. Itchioro hodagan puron no oi song thara ek mon oinei tharar rejjiogan jonturbuore duon para.
66017018	Ar tui degkuoschie miliebuo olode songsaro rajagunore sason gorede dangor sohoran.”
66018001	Sienir porendi, aro ekkuo sorgo-dud sorgottun lami ette degilung. Tar birat odhikar age, ar tar mohimagane pittimigan phor goreie.
66018002	The thajei birat ro gori hor, “Porilo, dangor Babylon sohoran porilo! The hajorchie apta thebar jaga, beg prettunor jiel-hana, ar beg hajor ar bis degkie peikkunor pingjuro olo.
66018003	Haron beg jadtune tar beschie rago modtan heion ar songsaro rajagune tarloi shanda gorsion. Songsaro bebarigune tar alajhala dhonaniloi thagoie oion.”
66018004	Aro ekkuo roi sorgottun hode mui sunilung, “Mor manuschun, tar siottun nigili ejo, anole, tumi tar pabpan bhag peba ar tar dhurbhikkogan peba.
66018005	Haron tar pabpan sorgot lungiegoi, ar Itchiore tar be-dharmig hamani monottullie.
66018006	Tomarethejedogkie gorsie tumio tare sedogkie goro. Tar hamani onusare tare dunuo gori sujo, mijei dede golojchuot tartei tumi dunuo gori mijei duo.
66018007	The jedogkie gori tare the baini gorsie ar thagoiet roie, thik sedogkie gori tumi tare hosto lago ar monot dug duo. Haron the tar monot hoi, ‘Mui rani dogkie gori bojim, mui rani-milie noi ar mui mono dug degidung noi.’
66018008	Senottei, tar dhurbhikkogan ekko dine tar ugure ebo: moronan ebo, mono dug obo, ar bhadorad puribo. Tare bijier goribode Probu Itchiorbuo shokti sali hinottei tare agundoi puro gori puri pela obo.
66018009	“Tare puri phellie udibode dhumogan degilie tarloi shanda gorsionde ar thagoiet roionde songsaro rajagune gujhi-gujhi ar gujuri-gujuri hanibak.
66018010	Tar jontronagano dore ek durottun thara hobak, ‘Oh Babylon dangor sohoran! Oh Babylon shokti sali sohoran! Ek somare tor sastigan elo.’
66018011	“Songsaro bebarigune tartei gujhi-gujhi ar gujuri-gujuri hanibak ar mono dug goribak, haron tharar malani huno jone hinie nei ar.
66018012	Tharar malani olode sona, rubuo, mollioban pattor ar muktuo, hoji pado habor, halisuri habor, rejomo habor, ar ranga habor. Nanan dhoronor tumbas gaj, nanan dhoronor edo-dadtoi baneie jinij, nanan dhoronor dami gajchoi baneie jinij, haj, luo, ar marpel.
66018013	Ar tharar malani olode dalcini, aghor, tumbas tel, dhub-hadi, mod, ar tel, moiddie guri, gom; mos-goru ar bera-shagol, ghora ar rod; manjior heye ar apta.
66018014	“Tor porane magkie pholun tortun gelakkoi. Dhoni jinijchani ar mohima jinijchani tortun gelakkoi. Sieni shobai pa no jebo ar.
66018015	Ei jinijchanir bebarigun, jigune tar darai thagoie oion, sigune tar jontronagano dore ek durottun thieinei hanibak ar mono dug goribak.
66018016	Thara hobak, ‘Oh sei dangor sohoran hoji pado habor, halisuri habor, ranga habor ursie, ar sona pinniei, mollioban pattorloi ar muktuoloi saschie.
66018017	Haron sedogkie dangor dhonani ek somare boij olo.’ Prottiek jahajor girojchun, jahajot gori jeiegun, jahajor manuschun, ar sagorot bebar goriegun ek durot thiei agon.
66018018	The angode dhumo deginei thara holak, ‘Huno sohor tar sedog dangor nei?’
66018019	Tharar mada ugure dhullie shidi dinei hani-hani ar gujhi-gujhi hani-hani thara hodon, ‘Oh dangor sohoran, oh dangor sohoran, sagorot jahaj agede sieni tor dhonanir darai thagoie oie. Ek somare tui boij gele.’
66018020	“Oh sorgogan, Oh pobitro apostolun ar munigun, Itchiore tomar henagan tar ugure ugurei die hinottei tar sombonde hujhi awh.”
66018021	Sebeden ekkuo shoktisali sorgo-dude ekkuo birat ghani-holor silo dogkie gori sil loinei sagorot lugimari dinei holo, “Jure dangor Babylon sohoranore phelei die obo, artare deganojebo ar.
66018022	Baiddio jontro bajeiegunor sobdo, bina bajeiegunor sobdo, bashi bajeiegunor sobdo, ar begol bajeiegunor sobdo tor iot suno no jebo ar. Huno bed-ham gorier bedo ham tor iot pa no jebo ar. Ghani-holor silo ro tor iot suno no jebo ar.
66018023	Tor iot lembo phor no jolibo ar. Nuo-jameior ro ar nuo buor ro tor iot suno no jebo ar. Haron tor bebarigun songsarot dangor manus elak, ar tor jadur darai beg jadtun thogeios.
66018024	Munigunor, sadhu manuschunor ar pittimit hun gorsionde sigunor logani tar siot pa oie.”
66019001	Sienir porendi, sorgot jhag-jhag manjior ro mui sunilung. Thara hodon, “Halleluiah! Muktigan, mohimagan, sormanan, ar hemodagan amar Itchiorbuor.
66019002	Tar bijieran soittio ar dharmig hinottei, songsaran borbat phelliede sei dangor beschie miliebuore sasti die. Itchiorbuoi tar ugure hena ugursie, haron the tar sagorunore lo jhore die.”
66019003	Thara aro holak, “Halleluiah! Tar dhumogan umore-umor udibogoi.”
66019004	Sebeden sobbis jon borjone ar seirbuo jeda jonture singasonanot boji agede Itchiorbuore salam gori porinei tobona gorilak. Thara hodon, “Amen! Halleluiah!”
66019005	Sebeden singasonanottun ekkuo ro einei holo, “Tumi tar beg sagorsiegun, ar sigon-dangor tare dorode sigun, Amar Itchiorbuore baini goro.”
66019006	Mui suinniongge olode jhag-jhag manjior ro, pani shojani sobdo dogkie, ar bor deba pherago dogkie. Robuoi hor, “Probu amar Itchiorbuo je Sorbo Shoktiman the sason gorer hinottei, halleluiah!
66019007	Hoji oinei utchob gori, ar tare ami mohima gori. Haron Bera-shagolo shawhbuor melagan edchie ar tar mogkuo the nije jugol olo.”
66019008	Ar tare hoji pado habor uribartei die olo, sien poriskar ar shop-shoppie. Haron hujhi pado haboran olode sadhu manuschunor dharmig hamani.
66019009	Sebeden sorgo-dudtuoi more holo, “Leg: ‘Bera-shagolo shawhbuor melat bellie haanabuot jare daga oie thara hoballie.’ ” Ar the more holo, “Ieni olode Itchioro soittio hoda.”
66019010	Sebedenmui taretobona goribartei tar thengot salam gori porilung. Hintu the more holo, “Seis, tui more sedogkie no goris. Muio tor ar Jisure shakki duonde tor bheiunor somarsie sagorsie. Itchiorbuore tobona gor. Haron Jisur shakkigan olode muni dogkie gori hoda hona aptabuo.”
66019011	Sorgogan hullie gori mui deginei ekkuo dhub ghora degilung. Ghorabuor ugure boji agede sibier nangan olode Bischias-joggiobuo ar Soittiobuo. Dharmig gori the bijier gore ar judduo gore.
66019012	Tar sogkun olakke aguno jilo dogkie ar tar siriebuot onek raj-tuk agon. Tar ekkan nang lega age jien the bade huno jone hobor no pan.
66019013	Lot bureie habor the pinnie, ar tar nangan olode Itchioro Hodagan.
66019014	Sorgor soinniogune hujhi pado habor ursie gori dhub ar poriskar gori dhub ghora pidit gori tar pune-pune jadon.
66019015	Tar muonottun ekkan dhar horgo nigillie ar siendoi the jadtun maribo. The nije luor ludigkoi tharare sason goribo. Sorbo Shoktiman Itchioro shanggadik rakkandoi the nije rago ghani-holan uribo.
66019016	Tar pojakkanot ar tar dabanat ekkan nang legkie age, RAJAGUNOR RAJA AR PROBUGUNOR PROBU.
66019017	Sebeden belanot ekkuo sorgo-dud thiei agede mui degilung ar the birat ro gori agajot uronde beg pheigkunore holo, “Dangor Itchiorbuor bellie haananotejothubogi.
66019018	Rajagunor eragani, senapotigunorδ eragani, shoktisali manuschunor eragani, ghoragunor eragani, ghora pidit soronde sigunor eragani, beg manuschunor eragani, shadin ar banidajigunor eragani ar dangor-sigon manuschunor eragani hei paro para.”
66019019	Jonturbuo, songsaro rajagun, ar tharar soinniogun mui degilung. Ghora pidit bojsiebuoloi ar tar soinniogundoi judduo goribartei thara ek somare thubeilak.
66019020	Sebeden jonturbuore dhorilak ar tar mujungot sinno ham gorede nogoli munibuore dhorilak. Sei sinno hamanir darai jonturbuor margagan loionde sigunore ar jonturbuor subhibuo tobona gorsionde sigunore the thogeie. Thara di jonore jeda bade, gondrogkoi angette aguno billuot phelei dilak.
66019021	Ar bagi manuschun ghorabuor pidit agede sibiei tar muottun nigillie horgogandoi morei phellie. Ar beg pheigkune sigunor eraganiloi ped bhoreilak.
66020001	Sebeden sorgottun ekkuo sorgo-dud lami ette mui degilung. Tar adot tolanei gattuor chabigan ar ekkan birat shingollo chein age.
66020002	The dragonnuore jibe purona amolo sab, jare Diabolaδ ar Soitan hon, tare dhorinei dhori ek azar bojorottei bani tholo.
66020003	Ar tare tolanei gattuot phelei dinei, tare nadi thuo olo ar tar ugure marga di tholo Jene ek azar bojor puroi song the jadtunore thogei no pare ar. Hintu sei porendi, tare hanekkon iri die obo.
66020004	Sebedenmui singason ar sieni ugure manus bojsie gori degilung. Tharare bijier goribartei die olo. Jisur sombonde shakki duon ar Itchioro hodaganottei sirie habi duonde sigunor aptagun mui degilung. Sigune jonturbuore bah tar subhibuore tobona no goron ar thara tar margagan tharar hobalot bah adot no lon. Ar thara jeda oinei Kristor loge ek azar bojor rajotto gorilak.
66020005	Hintu bagi moragun ek azar bojor no puroi song jeda no olak. Sien olode polim jiei uduonagan.
66020006	Jar polim jiei uduonaganot bhag thai, the hoballie ar pobitro. Sigunor ugure di lombor moranaganor hemoda no thebo. Hintu thara Itchioror ar Kristor dhormo guru oinei tar loge ek azar bojor rajotto goribak.
66020007	Ek azar bojor phureinei, Soitannuore tar bondiganottun iri die obo.
66020008	Jadtunore thogeibartei the ser hun pittimit jebo. The Gog ar Magogore judduo goribartei thubeibo. Tharar songkie olakke sagoro paro horoli dogkie.
66020009	Thara goda pittimiganot jenei sadhu manuschunor hembogan ar agojor sohoran girilakkoi. Sebeden sorgottun Itchiorbuottun agun nigilinei tharare boij goreie.
66020010	Tharare thogeiede Diabolareδ aguno billuot ar gondrog angede jaganot phelei die olo jiot jonturbuo ar nogoli munigun agon. Siot tharare dine-reide umore-umor jontrona die obo.
66020011	Sebeden mui ekkan birat dhub singason ar siot ek jon bojsie gori degilung. Tar mujungottun sorgo ar pittimigan uri porilogoi ar sienittei jaga pa no gelo.
66020012	Itchiorbuor mujungot mora manus, sigon-dangor mui degilung. Siot boiun mellie gori degilung. Aro ekkuo boi, jibe Jibono Boi, sibie mela oie. Mora manuschunore tharar hamani onusare ar boibuot lega onusare bijier gora olo.
66020013	Sagorane tar siot mora agonde sigun nigilei dilo. Moranagane ar padalane tharar siot agonde moragun nigilei dilak. Thara prottiek jonore tharar hamani onusare bijier gora olo.
66020014	Sebeden moranaganore ar padalanore aguno billuot phelei die olo. Sien olode di lombor moranagan.
66020015	Ar jar nangan Jibono Boibuot legkie pa no jai, tare aguno billuot phelei die olo.
66021001	Ekkan nuo sorgo ar ekkan nuo pittimi mui degilung. Haron polim sorgogandoi ar polim pittimigan lipto oie. Ar sagorio nei ar.
66021002	Sebeden mui Johone, pobitro sohor, nuo Jerusaleman degilung. Sien, nuo buo shajinei tar negkuo sidu ejede dogkie gori, Itchiorbuottun einei sorgottun lami ejer.
66021003	Sorgottun ekkuo birat roi hode mui sunilung, “Suno, Itchiorbuoi thaidie jagagan maneior loge olo, Itchiorbuoi tharar loge thebo, ar thara tar manus obak. Itchiorbuoi the nije tharar loge thebo, ar the tharar Itchior obo.
66021004	Itchiorbuoi tharar begkunor sogkunottun sogo panigani phuji dibo. Siot morana, monot dug, hana-hudi ar pirie-dhirie no thebo ar, haron agor jinijchani lipto oi jeiegoi.”
66021005	Sebeden singasonanot boji agede sibiei holo, “Suno, mui beg jinijchani nuo gori dilung.” Ar the more holo, “Leg, haron ei hodagani soittio ar bischias-joggio.”
66021006	The more holo, “Ieni gora olo. Mui Alpha ar Omega, arambogan ar seschan. Jar pani saj gore mui tare magana gori jibono paniganor uiphudo nalluo mui dim.
66021007	Je jidi pare, the begkani odhikari obo. Sebeden mui tar Itchiorbuo om, ar the mor puo obo.
66021008	Hintu jigune dhoran, bischias no goron, jigun ghin gore para, hun gorie, shanda ham goron, boiddio-ali goron, mokti pujuon, ar beg galluogun gondrogkuoi angede aguno billuo thara bhag pebak. Sien olode di lombor moranagan.”
66021009	Sebeden sattuo hodora dhorsie sattuo sorgo-dudtortun ekkuoi jiber sat lombor dhurbhikkogan bhoreie elo sibiei mor idu einei morloi hoda hologi, “Ai, mui tore nuo bobuo, jibe Bera-shagolo shawhbuor mokkie sibie degang.”
66021010	More aptadi the ekkuo shanggadik dangor ar ojol mounot tulilogoi ar siottun the more dangor sohoran degeilo. Sien olode pobitro Jerusalem sohor, ar sien Itchiorbuottun einei sorgottun lamelli.
66021011	Sohoranot Itchiorbuor mohimagan age. Sieno phoran shanggadik moillioban jasper pattoro holoior dogkie phon.
66021012	Sienot dangor ar ojol girie age. Sienot barogan girie duor age, ar duor bagin barobuo sorgo-dud agon. Barogan girie duorot barogan nang lega age. Sei nangani olode Israel manuschunor baro jador nang.
66021013	Pugendi tinan girie duor, utturendi tinan girie duor, dogkinendi tinan girie duor, ar pujimendi tinan girie duor age.
66021014	Sohorano girieganor barogan tola age, ar sienir ugure Bera-shagolo shawhbuor baro jon apostolo nangani age.
66021015	Morloi hoda horte sibiettun ekkuo sonar ludig age, sibieloi sohoran, girie duorani ar giriegan mabibo.
66021016	Sohoran ser hunnie gori boja oie. Digolan jittur padaschieganio sittur. Sohoran the ekkuo ludigkoi mabilo. Digellie, padaschie ar ojolan begkani soman. Prottiekkan olode di azar di sho kilomiter.
66021017	Sebeden giriegan the mabilo ar sien olode pas soittio miter ojol. Sorgo-dudtuoi mabpiede mabpo olode manjie mabonde mabpoi ekkoi.
66021018	Giriegan jasper pattorloi baneie, ar sohoran olode hati pudigor dogkie gori hati sonaloi baneie.
66021019	Sohorano girieganor tolagan beg doronor moillioban pattorloi shajei. Polim tolagan jasper pattorloi, sei porendi sien sapphirδ pattorloi, tin lomboro tolagan chalsidony pattorloi, ser lomboro tolagan emerald pattorloi,
66021020	pas lomboro tolagan sardonyx pattorloi, shoi lomboro tolagan sardius sat lomboro tolagan chrysolite pattorloi, attio lomboro tolagan beryl pattorloi, naw lomboro tolagan topaz pattorloi, dos lomboro tolagan chrysopras pattorloi, egaro lomboro tolagan jacinth pattorloi, ar baro lomboro tolagan amethyst pattorloi baneie.
66021021	Barogan girie duorani olode barobuo mukto. Ekkan girie duor olode ekkuo mukto. Ar sohorano podtani olode phon pudigo dogkie gori hati sonar.
66021022	Hintu sohoranot mui mondir no degilung. Haron Sorbo shoktiman Probu Itchiorbuo ar Bera-shagolo shawhbuo olakke sohoranormondir.
66021023	Phordibartei sohoranot belan bah junan dorkar no lage. Haron Itchiorbuor mohimagane sohoran phor gore, ar Bera-shagolo shawhbuo olode sohoranor phoran.
66021024	Mukti peie jadtune sei phorot bereibak, ar pittimir rajagune tharar baini ar mohimagan sohoranot anibak.
66021025	Dinnuot sohorano girie duorani huno din no nadibag, haron siot reid thedo noi.
66021026	Jadtunor baini ar mohimagan thara sohoranot anibak.
66021027	Hintu sohoranot huno bojong jinij huno babode no somibo. Ghin gore para jinij bah gal madana no somibo hintu jigunor nangani Bera-shagolo shawhbuor Jibono Boibuot lega thebo, bana thara somi paribak.
66022001	Ar the more jibono soragano poriskar panigan degeilo, jien Itchioro singasonanottun ar Bera-shagolo shawhbuor siottun nal ader ar sien holoior dogkie phon.
66022002	Sohorano podor moiddiettun, ar soragano di-huledi, jibono gajchuo age. Sei gajchuot baro maje baro jad phol dhoron, mas bagene ek jad phol. Gajchuor padagani olode jadtun gom obartei.
66022003	Obisabpan siot thedo noi ar, hintu Itchioror ar Bera-shagolo shawhbuor singasonan siot thebo, ar tar sagorsiegune tare sebona goribak.
66022004	Tar muon thara degibak, ar tar nangan tharar huobalanit lega thebo.
66022005	Siot reid no thebo. Probu Itchiore tharare phor dibo hinottei, tharattun lembo bah belo phor no lagibo. Ar thara umore-umor sason goribak.
66022006	Sebeden the more holo, “Ei hodagan soittio ar bischias-joggio.” Jhadi gori hi hi ghodi jebo, pobitro munigunor Probu Itchiorbuoi tar sagorsiebuore degebartei tar sorgo-dudtuore di padeilo.
66022007	“Sah, mui jhadi gori ejongor. Muni dogkie gori hoijeie ei boibuor hodagani je dhore the hoballie.”
66022008	Mui, Johone ei jinijchani degkuong ar suinniong. Sebeden sieni mui deginei ar suninei, more sieni degeiede sorgo-dudtuore tobona goribartei mui tar thengot porilung.
66022009	Sebeden the more holo, “Seis, tui siennie no goris. Haron muio tor ar tor bhei munigunor dogkie sagorsie, jigune ei boibuor hodagani manon. Itchior tobona gor.”
66022010	Arthemoreholo,“Somoibuo hai ejchie hinottei, ei boibuor muni dogkie hodagani marga no maris.
66022011	Je aw-dharmig, the ikkie song aw-dharmig ok. Je hajor, the ikkie song hajor oi thok. Je dharmig, the ikkie song dharmig oi thok, ar je pobitro, the ikkie song pobitro oi thok.
66022012	“Sah, mui jhadi gori ejongor. Prottiek jonore tar hamo onusare dibartei, poriskarigan mor loge age.
66022013	Mui Alpha ar Omega, Arambogan ar Seschan. Mui Polimmuo ar Jerorbuo.”
66022014	Je mor ugumani mane the hoballie. Sigune jibono gajchuottun hebar ar sohoranor girie duorede somibar odhikar thebo.
66022015	Hintu jigun sohorano barendi thebak, hugurun, jadu-goriegun, shanda goriegun, hungoriegun, mokti pujiegun, ar gal madana gom pande ar gal madonde sigun.
66022016	“Ei hodagani mondoligunot shakki dibartei, mui Jisu, mor sorgo-dudtuore dipadelung. Mui Davidor Singoran ar tar Bongso. Mui Beinnie Potpottie Shut tarabuo.”
66022017	Aptabuoi ar nuo-jameibuoi holak, “Ai.” Je sune the hok, “Ai.” Jar pani saj gore the ejok. Jadtun mone hoi the magana jibono panigan hokki.
66022018	Haron ei boibuor muni dogkie gori hodagani prottiek jonore mui shakki duongor je ei hodaganitjorai,Itchioreeiboibuot lega agede dhurbhikkogani tare jorei dibo.
66022019	Ar je ei boibuot muni dogkie gori hoie hodagani shini nejai, Itchiore tar bhagkuo Jibono Boibuottun, pobitro sohoranottun, ar ei boibuot legkie jinijchanittun shini nibo.
66022020	Ei jinijchani shakki dette sibiei hor, “Mui hamakkai jhadi gori ejongor.” Amen. Oh Probu Jisu, ai!
66022021	Amar Probu Jisu Kristor doyegan tomar begkunor ugure thok. Amen.
